reviewText: This filter will fit in the Samsung refrigerator and let the water dispense. However the filter is smaller in diameter than the OEM filter.  When dispensing water you can hear the filter banging against the refrigerator housing making a rather loud and unpleasant noise.  Most of the noise goes away if you wedge something between the filter and the refrigerator.  Not worth the savings.

Do not call a service center to replace this part. This is a definite DIY for anyone. It is a very easy part to replace even if you are someone with minimal handyman experience. Was delivered ahead of schedule, and works great.

This arrived quickly and was very easily, and quickly, installed. It made all the difference in securing the dishwasher, which in turn, made it quieter when it runs. How this was never secured by the previous owner, for 10 years, is a mystery.

My refrigerator used to be very noisy before.  Now it runs very quietly.  Though it's been only two weeks I can tell the difference.  I wish I purchased this surge protector a long time ago.  I didn't know they made surge protectors specifically for refrigerators before.  .
summary: My refrigerator used to be very noisy before. Now ...

reviewText: Installed two of these, one on a Freezer and one on a Refrigerator/Freezer and both are functioning as expected/as described by the manufacturer.  I also purchased a third protector not yet installed but will be doing so soon (on another Refrigerator/Freezer).

WE BOUGHT THIS VENT HOOD.....IT WORKED FOR A YEAR. THEN THE SENSORS MALFUNCTIONED AND WE WOULD HEAR IT CYCLING ON AND OFF IN THE MIDDLE OF THE NIGHT AND ALSO WHENEVER WE COOKED ANYTHING IT WOULD START AND CYCLE THE FAN THROUGH ALL THE SETTINGS UNTIL WE HAD TO TURN IT OFF. WE CONTACTED THE SELLER TWICE, THEY SENT OUT PARTS TWICE, WE INSTALLED THE PARTS TWICE AND IT STILL ONLY WORKS ON AND OFF. DON'T BUY THIS!!!  THERE IS NO WAY TO GUARANTEE THIS  WON'T HAPPEN TO YOU!

My newly potty trained 2 1/2 year old LOVES this potty and wants to use it all the time! I got this as a back up for the car but after I unpacked it, it's the only one my daughter wanted to use.
It is more compact than I expected and I love the adjustable height! Much more stable than some of the other similar options.
Very happy with my purchase

This potty has come in very handy at the park. I keep it in the car and put a paper towel in the potty bag to help absorb the pee. I also keep a stash of wipes, ziplock bags, a change of clothes, and hand sanitizer. It came with a few plastic bags without handles and now I use the TidyTots Disposable Potty Chair Liners.

We got 2 of this portable potty a few weeks ago when we started potty training our twin girls. It made potty training so much easier by providing consistency by having a potty ready and available at all times; even during outings. We have one in each car along with a supply of disposable potty bags. We carry it EVERYWHERE we go. It is so much easier and more sanitary than public facilities when we are out and about or traveling.

The perfect potty to take with you. It is small so it fits in my stroller. I was worried it would be too small but my 2 year old sits on it just fine. I like that there is a rim that you lift up. I line it with a plastic bag and the rim holds it in place. Other travel potties we've tried don't have a rim so the kiddo has to sit directly on the plastic bag. That's a no-go for my picky kid. I also like that this is contained. If the bag has a hole for some reason the urine isn't going anywhere.

I don't really understand why this is called the twist potty but oh well.  We put in a plastic bag and keep it in the back of our car.  It is quite small, but the perfect size for our 2.5 year old.  It is so handy to have and allows us to avoid public restrooms.
summary: but the perfect size for our 2

reviewText: Wonderful potty seat! It is low to the ground, but we keep it in the trunk of the car. This makes it the perfect size if the child needs to use it since we keep it in the trunk when she uses it. We didn't buy any of the bags. We actually just use leftover diapers (didn't know what we would do with those!) but opening them up and using the "lid" to hold the diaper down. That way, when your child pees, the diaper absorbs the pee and can easily be removed and disposed of.

I use this outside while camping and it works wonderfully.  It does take a while for pretty wet clothes (that have been spun in the washer), but it is still better than going to the Laundromat while camping.  Hey, it's the campgrounds electricity.  :)  I love it and highly recommend it.
summary: I use this outside while camping and it works wonderfully. It does take a while for pretty wet ...

reviewText: It doesn't dry as well and takes a lot of time to dry clothes, but I'm still very happy I bought it. It's so much better to do laundry at home and not worry about going out to do it. It's been working fine for now.

This item was reasonably priced and I haven't had a problem with a leak in my washer since.  Don't forget to buy the special wrench that you need to install/remove the washer, and feel free to use a sledge hammer to "help" things along.

This kit did what I needed to stop leaks from the base of the tub in our 15+ year old washer. I'm not sure I got the tub lined up properly as it vibrates more than before, but I'm certain that is NOT a problem with this kit, just my skill level at installing it.

No more leaks!

Quality was good.  No problems. I also bought and replaced the bearing kit, since I was replacing the seal kit.  (Washer leaked due to worn out seal kit.)  Washer doesn't leak anymore... which makes my wife happy!  Delivery was speedy too.

YEAH!!! My older than dirt dryer now works better than ever!  It used to take a ridiculously long time for my clothes to dry.  Considering it's the old fashioned type of dryer I think it's wonderful that it only takes about an hour or a little over for a full load of clothes to dry!
summary: It came back from the dead!

reviewText: I've purchased blower wheels before and it cost me twenty bucks, plus tax.  When I rec'd this blower wheel for one quarter of the price it was in the same box and identical to my old overpriced one.  My hat is off to the owner of this company for giving me such a good deal.  Thank You very much!

Great price. I replaced it hoping this would fix the noise. Turns out it wasn't the coupling, it's the gear case, (at $160+). It was worth a shot. The washing machine is 10 years old, we bought it new and it's been a great machine. It's worth sinking the $160 in to get a few more years out of it, and I'm sure replacing the coupling wasn't a bad idea, (even if it didn't fix the problem).

Prior to receiving this hinge, my refrigerator door remained unhinged, unopenable.

Receiving this hinge changed my life.  My refrigerator door now glides open and closed with perfect ease, like magic!

Thank you!

I've replaced this part on a different washer before. It's an easy repair. This part was difficult to install and broke after 5 mins. I would go with a different part. Tried to return to North American HVAC and they sent me a self ship label and a list of questions to answer in order to get my refund for their part that broke after 5 mins. It's not worth it.
summary: Stay away from North American HVAC

reviewText: Unfortunately this part did not fit on the motor shaft. Although it looks just like the original part it was too tight to fit on the shaft. When I tried to gently tap it on with a rubber mallet the metal center part just came out of the plastic rather than sliding down on the shaft. Next time I will stick to actual OEM parts.
summary: Although it looks just like the original part it was too tight to fit ...

reviewText:
I Installed the motor drive coupling. Turned on the machine and it began to spin. About a minute into the spin I heard a snap.
The spinning stopped and I began to smell burning plastic. I rechecked the coupling and found that it had cracked and the inner metal bushing came out.
summary: Very loose on shaft. Broke after one minute of spinning.

reviewText: Just what I needed for my mom's 20 year old dryer. I did the repair myself.  I am the best son a mother can have.  I'm a lot better than I used to be.  Growing up really helps with being the best son a mother can ask for.  Oh did I mention that the product worked great?
summary: I am the best son a mother can have

reviewText: This and an hour's worth of fiddling around the insides of a dryer saved us from having to buy a completely new dryer. Pretty easy and straightforward to install once you look at the old one. Would buy again in a heartbeat if the need ever arises.
summary: Pretty easy and straightforward to install once you look at ...

reviewText:
Exactly the right belt, and seems to be reasonably sturdy. The original lasted for about 40 years - I hope this one lasts as long, although I doubt that I will care by the end of that time.

Installation was a bit tricky. If I followed their instructions, it would have been impossible - my hands are too fat to get into the small spaces around the lower rollers. So, instead, I installed the belt around the lower rollers first, and then put the drum back in place and worked the belt around the drum.
summary: Good belt, but installation was not-so-easy

reviewText:
I couldn't believe the appliance stores don't carry parts, but it makes sense with all the possible options. A repairman would have cost me at least $100, but I figured I'd try replacing it myself first, then call if needed.

The part was exactly what I needed and the instructions to replace the belt were easy to understand and I got it done by myself. Saved me soooooo much money!

The heating element worked perfectly.  Although one person can do the installation, it is much easier with two people to stretch the element and insert it through the insulators.  It was well worth the cost of the kit and the time spent on the project.

Cheaper than letting the repair guy order it!  It has been a year and the bellow is still doing what it is supposed to. When I watched the repair guy install this, I thought, dang, I should have tried to install it myself.  The YouTube videos on replacing washer bellows made it actually look harder than it was.
summary: Order it and then call the repair guy!  Or do it yourself!

reviewText: This fit our Kenmore HE2t washing machine perfectly. After watching a video of one being installed, I was able to get through it just fine. I'm pretty handy and it took me about 45 minutes after getting the dryer unstacked from the washing machine. It may not have been 100% necessary to unstack them, but it's safer that way and enabled me to tilt the washer back and make things easier. I took my time and had my laptop with the video up to double check my work as I went.

I bought this Makita Replacement Battery for my dad's Makita drill.  He asked me to look on the internet for a deal and I said let me check amazon.  Sure enough there it was and for a great price so we bought 2 because there is no Makita replacement battery here on Maui for an older Makita Drill.  Dad loves it and is very happy.
summary: Very happy they had this battery!

reviewText: I pair this with the Haier compact washer. They together have made my life so much easier. Everything coming out of the Haier washer fits into this dryer with some space left. It takes about 2 hours to dry a full load on high heat but I did my research before the purchase so it doesn't bother me. The machine is pretty quiet. I put it in the kitchen and work in the room next to it. I can hear some noise but it's not loud at all. This machine is also light enough to be placed on the kitchen counter top.
summary: The machine is pretty quiet. I put it in the kitchen and ...

reviewText: I love this dryer. I made myself an upstairs laundry room in my house and this little dryer does the trick. Yes, it takes longer than a standard dryer, obviously, but it works well. An added bonus is that I have it vented indoors so it heats up the upstairs and gives added humidity, which is nice in the winter. No complaints.

Our RV is too small to put in the big washers and dryers so we looked for something smaller and this was the answer. It takes about an hour for me to dry two pairs of jeans in it but it is only 110 volt.
summary: No More Laundry Mats While Traveling.

reviewText: This thing has changed my life! It works better than advertised. Clothes don't take any longer to dry than in a full sized dryer. The only drawback is that the loads have to be smaller. But it still does a surprising amount at once. The lint catcher in the back was a bit confusing at first to clean. But once you get the hang of it, it is no big deal.

I HATE going to the laundromat. The price, and my laundromat hate, are definitely what attracted me to this dryer. However, I love it. It's simple and a very practical size. I'm a small woman so I was worried about being able to move this by myself and set it up but, to my surprise, I didn't have any issues setting it up. It has worked well. Nothing beats doing laundry at home in your pjs!

This machine lasted barely 6 months. Takes forever to dry clothes, even if I only place a few items. Just to dry a pair of jeans, you'd have to leave it running all night. The timer dial stopped working within a month. There's a couple of filters that is difficult to find replacements for.

I thought this would've been a great machine to have in my apartment but now it just sits in a corner collecting dust until I find somewhere to dispose of it.

I am so glad we purchased our Panda dryer along with the washer. We live in an RV, and it is compact, drys really well, and does not use a ton of electricity. One RV tip, for small RVs...you might need to open a sky vent to avoid condensation if you do not vent the dryer directly out a window.
summary: I am so glad we purchased our Panda dryer along with the washer

reviewText: I've had this unit a few months now and have come to count on it when I can't hang clothes outside on rainy days. Yes, it takes a little longer to dry clothes but you have to keep in mind it's only a 110 volt unit. The strongest suggestion I can make to those who buy it is to NOT OVERLOAD it. You will harm the motor and drive belt and it will take FOREVER to dry your clothes. REMEMBER SMALL LOADS ONLY. I think most of the negative reviews for this unit is people OVERLOADING it.
summary: DON'T OVERLOAD and it will serve your needs well

reviewText: I bought this Panda Portable Dryer. It works very well for small loads which is what I needed. It did not work with my 4" duct. I purchased a 3" duct and a 3" to 4" taper/converter to get the job done.

This item arrived on time, and in excellent condition. I, like others, got tired of looking at the old chrome drip plate, which was bluish green and flaking. I was not sure, how I would like black, but gave it a try. The black, actually seems to look better, in contrast to the SS door. I am very happy with this product and how it looks. It should last for ever. I would strongly recommend this to others with discolored, flaking, trays. By the way, it is much, much cheaper than the chrome one.

When I moved into my new apartment, the oven was missing the racks.  Apparently the previous tenant liked them so much, he decided to take them with him.  I got approval from the landlord for reimbursement, and ordered a set.

These fit my "Hotpoint" oven perfectly.  They're surprisingly high grade - the metal is thicker than I've seen in an oven rack before, so hopefully they will last for many years to come.  Though I do not plan to take them with me when I move out.  I like them, but not that much.
summary: Not much more to say: It fits, and it works.

reviewText: Perfect fit.  Just be aware that no screws are included so be careful removing the old screws so you can reuse them.  When you get the screws off and pull out the old unit, it helps to have a pair of needle nose pliers to wiggle off the crimped electrical connectors so you don't strain the wires.

Easy to install. Love the wireless/web interface for data retrieval.
For anyone who wants to keep tabs on the temperature and humidity
of their home or basement with the convenience of data output to their
laptop or smartphone, this is the way to go.

Curiously, the company shut down it's old, functioning monitor web site to upgrade to a new monitor one, which doesn't work properly.  The new one is supposed to be more mobile friendly, but that's not the case.  Very strange.  Wait until they get this sorted out.
summary: Curiously, the company shut down it's old, functioning ...

reviewText: I was a little hesitant to buy this as a result of some of the negative reviews. However, setup couldn't have been easier. After setting it up I disconnected the unit from the modem and from power, reconnected it and it was immediately up and running. So, no issues with temporary power outages. Great value for the peace of mind that it provides when I'm away from home.

What a ridiculous waste of money. I get the same error messages every couple of weeks. I've had it repaired once already and it has already broken down again. I'd have better luck with a washboard and a clothesline.

These don't appear to be permanent filters, but the permanent ones were getting pretty scuzzy, so I'm happy to have replaceable filters.  I use distilled water, so I don't anticipate needing to change them too often.
summary: Nice clean replacement for permanent filters

reviewText: I absolutely love these!! This is the third set I have bought. I have burnt them twice, oops. But they are very durable and match my kitchen perfectly. One thing I will say is that the colors have changed. Each time I buy them, the color is slightly different. The first ones I bought were tan, then the second set was more tan with more of a yellow tint. This third set was even more yellow and less tan.

I highly recommend using these Covers if you have an ordinary looking electric stove.  They cover the burners, obviously, so when you walk into the room, the electric burners aren't glaringly ugly.  I have to be careful to not turn on the wrong burner when using the stove top.  I highly suggest taking them all off when cooking on any burner so you don't accidentally scorch the others. They are lightweight and easy to clean.
summary: I highly recommend using these Covers if you have an ordinary looking ...

reviewText: They do exactly what they are intended to do.  I can't see that they're really any better or worse than any other burner cover I've ever owned.  I ordered two sets because I have been known in the past to accidently mess one up and then not be able to replace it.  I love the look they give my range.

I love my new range hood, it sucks the scent of the food right out of the house.  No matter what I cook, you can't smell it 5 minutes after you walk into my home, could not be happier with my choice of range hood.

My front right burner worked, but would not ignite. This burner cost about the same as an igniter, however it was much easier to install and now I have a new burner. I was concerned about the quality, but it appears to be identical in material and weight. I wish I could afford three more.
summary: Works well on my Magic Chef 3458XVS

reviewText:
Yup.  This is helpful.

At first, I thought I would like to be able to bake more things at once, so I had purchased a contraption for stacking baking sheets in the oven.  It was from Betty Crocker, but still a piece of trash.

Then I thought- why not just get a third oven rack? And it was the best idea I have had for the kitchen in a very long time.
summary: Three racks is better than two

reviewText: while this rack may be billed as a replacement part for Kenmore ovens, it does not fit properly. The width and depth are fine, but the bumpers on the side of the rack don't allow the rack to be positioned properly. When we put it in our oven (standard Kenmore), the door wouldn't shut completely.

THIS GE FILTER HAS BEEN UPDATED AND REMODELED. ALTHOUGH THE NOZZLE LOOKS DIFFERENT IT WORKS WELL, JUST MAKE SURE YOU READ THE INSTRUCTIONS AND HAVE THE UNIT ALIGNED CORRECTLY INSIDE TO INSERT THE FILTER NOZZLE OTHERWISE IT DOESN'T PROPERLY INSERT.
summary: THIS GE FILTER HAS BEEN UPDATED AND REMODELED. ALTHOUGH ...

reviewText: I'll admit it. I'm a huge water snob! I mean huge. We bought a new refrigerator and it uses this filter. I am going to cancel my decades-long delivery of bottled water, because the water from my new refrigerator dispenser is just THAT GOOD with this filter. I can continue to be snobby and save money! Win! Win!

That was some water filter, let me tell you! It filters the living daylights out of water and leaves it tasting like water from a mountain spring the day after you won the lottery while woodchucks sing a wonderful song of praise to you concerning your wonderfulness plus your hair starts to grow back. That water filter is some pumpkins, let me tell you!
summary: A Water Filter of True Magnificence!

reviewText: I was reluctant to pay for a refrigerator filter but am glad I finally gave in.  There's a huge difference in the taste of filtered water and what comes out of my kitchen faucet.  I have a whole house filter but the water still doesn't taste as good as filtered refrigerator water.
summary: ... reluctant to pay for a refrigerator filter but am glad I finally gave in

reviewText: We have purchased our filter time and time again from them but this time it was a complete FAIL! SO DISAPPOINTING! Our water tastes more chlorinated than before. It's AWFUL! If I could get a refund, I would.
summary: Good if you like HEAVILY CHLORINATED WATER - YUCK!!!!

reviewText: This is exactly what I needed for my fridge.  The price was much less than if I had ordered it through the manufacturer.  The product came with some instructions which made it clear how to remove the old one and install the new.  Much clearer than in the operating manual for the Fridge.
summary: This is exactly what I needed for my fridge. ...

reviewText:
People often stop me on the streets and tell me, "hey man, nice filter!" Does it get old hearing it? Yeah, a little bit.  But that's what you get when you purchase this bad boy.  The fame and glory comes with the ability to filter out cysts, lead, mercury, asbestos, and select pesticides and chemicals.

Was it easy to install? Heck yeah.

Does it make your water taste like Angelina Jolie's bathwater? Sadly, no.  But it does taste fresh.

I've been too hesitant to try any of the generic replacement filters, so I can't say these are better. They do work well though, and aside from being more expensive than generics, I don't have any issues with them.
summary: so I can't say these are better. They do work well though

reviewText: Great filter!  I have always wondered how big of a difference these filters make.  The only reason I finally changed my filter was because I was sick of the fridge reminding me I needed a new filter.  Well, I was pleasantly surprised with this filter!  I could really taste a difference in the way the water tasted.  Guess these filters do a pretty good job after all :)

This little contraption was a godsend. I needed to connect the drain line from my R/O system to my sink drain but I had very little room on the tailpiece with the dishwasher stem as well. I used this to connect both the R/O and the dishwasher to the one sink drain tailpiece dishwasher stem. Perfect. Nothing else like this that I could find!
summary: Just the perfect piece of plumbing.

reviewText: I bought an Aquasana Reverse Osmosis filtration system from aquasana.com and it came with a difficult to install drain pipe connector that required me to drill holes into my drain pipe, etc.  I bought this instead and used it to connect it to my garbage disposal dishwasher inlet.  Works great.

Manufacturer's note that comes with DLA-D says that it should NOT be used if dishwasher has no *air-gap* device.  Further down, same note says  that DLA-6 or DLA-12 should be used instead.  I also had impossible time detaching tube from GC connector to the point that I decided to cut the hose above the connector and use GC union instead.  DLA-D GC connector is embedded in the device and cannot be replaced.
summary: Manufacturer's note that comes with DLA-D says that it should ...

reviewText: This works great and is super easy to install.  There are instructions on the Sub Zero site and plenty of YouTube videos to show you how to do it.  The authorized repair company has a monopoly where I'm at and is a nightmare to work with, so I've started learning to care for my 25 year old Sub Zero myself.  I saved myself a lot of money by putting this in myself.  It's been in for two months now and works great.

Very absorbent so not really what I had in mind. I had hoped it would prevent spills, especially oily ones, from penetrating the liner so that the oven would not have to be cleaned. Disappointed. Liner is good to catch crumbs but not so hot for spills.
summary: Disappointed. Liner is good to catch crumbs but not ...

reviewText: Our latch broke, we found this one and it looked the same (ours is an Amana) so we gambled and it was a perfect match.  My husband replaced it in about 5 minutes.  I enjoyed doing dishes by hand for the few days we were without a dishwasher, but I'm glad it's back up and running.

Called up one of the local appliance repair shops to ask a few questions about purchasing this part and to possibly have it installed!! They quoted me $57 for the part and $175 to $200 to install it. Found it here for almost half the price and was able to install it myself. The washer worked immediately. The quality of the part is quite superb and the price was perfect. Saved me almost $250.. THANK YOU!!! I AM VERY PLEASED!!

The problem was with the bearing the first time and this was meant to be the replacement. The original worked for the better part of a decade but this one failed after about two months. It failed in the same way as the first and was more annoying the second time around by sounding like a freight train. This was a very unfortunate purchase. I wish I could figure out who to complain to for a little closure on this. Oh well, I guess I'll just have to go vent my anger by correcting grammar on reddit.
summary: Failed after a few dozen loads

reviewText: Today i got in the hose i ordered last week. The problem is the hose i received was not the right one nor did it match the picture of the one i ordered. I was looking forward to being able to use my washing machine again but i guess i'll have to find the hose some place else because i don't feel like i can trust ordering from here again.
summary: not the item in the picture

reviewText: This little part stopped working on my washing machine, which wouldn't allow the lid to lock. The poor design of this washing machine is that if the lid doesn't lock then the machine won't run. So that was annoying. Luckily I was able to buy this and replace this one little part. It was easy to replace and now my washing machine is as good as new.
summary: The poor design of this washing machine is that if the ...

reviewText: Awful.  Bought brand new detergent dispenser and it did not last a month.  I spent an hour replacing the old detergent dispenser with a brand new one and within a month this detergent dispenser had the same problem.  The detergent dispenser does not stay closed so soap washes away too early and dishes do not clean.

Works perfectly with my dishwasher. Looked up the model with Amazon's handy little tool and it showed me all of the parts for my appliance. Received this in the mail two days later and now my dishwasher is as good as new.

The plastic tab broke after a year. I am so frustrated that this tab is plastic. It's the same part that broke on the original dispenser. I don't know of any way around this short of buying a new one, or a new dishwasher with a better design which right now is not an option for me.
summary: Plastic tab broke, wish they would just sell the door and make the tab metal.

reviewText: My dishwasher, an Amana, had a broken door latch. This part fixed the latch. It was a relatively easy install, there's a video on youtube that tells you exactly what to do. No special tools required - just a screwdriver.

I looked up the numbers and even though it's a different design than the original, it fits perfectly and works flawlessly.  Easy to put in with the help of a youtube video and saved me a LOT of money over having someone come from out of town and repair my dishwasher.

I easily installed this myself-a middle aged housewife-on my older dishwasher.  Very easy to do!  I didn't have to pay for the appliance repair guy, which was very nice.  I don't love the dishwasher and plan to replace it one of these days, so it was nice to not spend a fortune on a necessary repair.

This product stinks. I just bought it 3 months ago and the wheels fell off, just as described in the other reviews. I don't know of a better option than to buy this part again. I'm screwed and so are you.

This replacement part is cheap plastic just like the original.  It failed within a week of installation.  I broke down and called for a Sears repairman to come out.  He replaced the part (both sides) with a stainless steel part; it's been a couple of months now (with nearly daily use) and the new part is going strong.  The repairman said that he has replaced "dozens" of these and has never had to replace the metal ones.  The original part should have been made of stainless steel.

They don't make dishwashers like they used to. The pins that hold the wheels on the rack adjuster broke off. Got this part as a replacement. Searched youtube for a video on how to replace the part and within 10 minutes I had the rack back in and the dishwasher going again.

We came home to find our kitchen flooded. The dishwasher was clearly broken. It took awhile to figure out that a new water inlet valve was what was needed, but when we figured it out, we went to Amazon. This product did the job. No more leaks, and certainly no more floods.

Works as expected. I found it easy to replace after searching for an instructional video on YouTube. I watched a video, took out the top rack, replaced the parts, and reassembled the dishwasher in about 30-45 minutes.
summary: I found it easy to replace after searching for an instructional video on ...

reviewText: The part itself is a replacement and no substitution exists. The dishwasher is constantly needing parts as they don't hold up for any length of time. Save yourself some heartache and DO NOT BUY THIS DISHWASHER.

This is a beautiful looking vent fan. It works well but I haven't had it very long. If something goes wrong I will update this but as of right now it's installed and in place. Works and looks great! the vent cover is adjustable as you can see. We had to cut the vent cover because we didn't have enough space between the ceiling and the stove top.  For reference the picture shows a distance of 45 3/4 " from ceiling stove top.
summary: This is a beautiful looking vent fan

reviewText:
This filter is a perfect fit at an excellent price. Just like the original filter.
Water pressure was just like the original that came with the fridge. I would
recommend this for your fridge if it fits.
summary: Filter was just like the OEM the fridge came with. Great price and a perfect fit.

reviewText: Purchased this after the filter that was in my dryer caught on some clothes and ripped to pieces.  We had been dealing with snagged and damaged clothes for a while.  Purchased this and also noticed that deep inside the compartment was a broken/misaligned piece of plastic.  Straightened that out and problem solved. No more damaged clothes!

I have been happy with this. I have had it for more than 5 months. it has done it's job of filling in a gap between my range and countertop. it blends in so its not an eyesore. it hasn't changed color.

I've had it out for about a month and part of it is already burned off and crumbling (I used it between the stove and the counter). It's also extremely short on one side from where the divider sits, so it never really stayed on. I wouldn't recommend it.

Very easy to install. As expected, after installing the filter the water tasted perfect. Just like water should, with nothing in it.

Also, after installation I was shocked at how the sound of the water coming out of the dispenser was notably different, almost quieter. The old one must have been packed with gunk.

I had bought some WHITE colored gap covers, and was very disappointed with the hard plastic.  It got very brittle, and broke within a few weeks of buying.  This product fits wonderfully. It is a softer plastic, is clear to make seeing all the mess easier, and it is easy to clean.  Just pick it up and wash in the sink with some hot soapy water.  I like this so much that I purchased a second one, and then put 2 more on my wish list for later.
GREAT product.  Very good quality.
summary: and was very disappointed with the hard plastic

reviewText: These do a perfect job of solving the problem of food falling between the stove and countertop.  That always really bugs me because over time you end up with a disgusting mess that is difficult to get to and attracts vermin.  The fact that they are silicone means they are very flexible and won't melt when exposed to high heat.

The best part is that they're flexible and stay in place better than the metal or plastic ones. They don't stain even when spaghetti sauce has splattered on them and the heat doesn't seem to be a problem either, although they have not been in direct contact with the burners.

I have had this product for one month and I'm very disappointed.  This is my second filter, the first was from Home Depot. I thought this was going to be a smart purchase but I was wrong. You can tell if your water is being filter properly by the clarity of the ice cube. My ice cubes are cloudy and the water just doesn't taste clean.  Save your money and don't buy this product!!!!!!
summary: ... had this product for one month and I'm very disappointed. This is my second filter

reviewText: I really like this silicone seam guard.  It's soft and flexible,  easy to pick up to clean and lays right back down, conforming to the area it needs to cover.  I'd recommend it to anyone who needs a little extra protection around the stove.

Perfect for keeping stuff from falling in between the oven and counter.  You can easily wash it or throw it into the dishwasher.  Make sure that you get the right color.  I originally purchased the clear, but then I bought the black instead since my countertop and stovetop was black.
summary: An essential item for the kitchen.

reviewText: I had replaced the original LG water filter with the orange big-box brand. The flavor was not the same as that of the original. I decided to go back to this LG filter and the flavor and appearance of the water was restored.

Perfect fit and a nice replacement for the one that was in the dryer, to begin with. This wasn't an upgrade, but our old one had some issues (it was that way when we bought it) and this one was good as new! :)
summary: Perfect fit and a nice replacement for the one that ...

reviewText: I read a few reviews before ordering this part & I'm really glad that I did.  The description states that you need two other parts to assemble this filter assembly; however, that is not accurate.  I only ordered this part & it fits perfectly & works just fine.  You do NOT need the other two parts for this to work.
summary: You only need this part & not the other two as stated in the description.  This one works just fine on its own.

reviewText: So I didn't want to pay $$$ to have my LG fridge fixed when all searches on Google said it was this low cost sensor. So I bought this, and started the long arduous task of disassembling the freezer compartment. Well it wasn't easy, but once it was all taken apart we were able to easily install the sensor. Make sure you have zip ties available as they are used to attach it to the coils. I would recommend that you do it yourself, but only if saving the $$$ is worth it to you.

This is a perfect replacement for my LG dryer MODEL: DLE0442W.  I have been using it for a couple of weeks now and have not had any issues or concerns.  Fits exactly like the original.  It actually may be better than my original as the felt edging on my original tore off at the bottom the first time I used it.  I have had no such issue with this replacement.

First, it arrived in a well-packaged, well-padded box but the middle connector (thermostat) was broken (see picture) so I simply swapped it with the old one. Second, after all that work it does not work and there's no way to return it.
summary: First, it arrived in a well-packaged, well-padded box ...

reviewText:
This filter fit perfectly.  I bought on January 24, 2015 and it worked fine up until now.  The screen is tearing away from the plastic.  I need to buy a new one but don't want to buy this one again and have to replace in 6 months.

Update: I ordered another filter in July 2015.  It lasted until August 11, 2016.  I am not buying another one.  The screen ripped again at the top of the filter.  I will try to find one that will last longer.

It really didn't take me that long to replace the seal.  There is a great video on youtube showing the whole process.  After getting the old one out, I really don't think I had to replace it.  The drain hose was clogged and I think that was causing the problem.

Other than the hassle of installing it myself this was exactly what I needed. It isn't exactly the same as the original but it works perfectly for my needs. Now no more little leaks and it saved me money. Just a couple of disassembly videos and 1 hour later it was all done.

I needed a replacement lint filter for my LG dryer. I checked Amazon.com and, as usual, I found an outlet for the filter I was looking for. The filter fit perfectly and is constucted just like the original. The filter was shipped the same day I ordered it and arrived just a few days later.

My installer when I bought my dishwasher didn't mount it properly  It was a few years ago and now my dishwasher keeps tipping forward.  My installer didn't leave the mounting hardware behind.  Now I'm back in business with a stable dishwasher.

Second set.  Flimsy, can't support the dishwasher.  Second set has bent and crumpled.  Going to see if I can make my own out of something more sturdy.  These do appear to be OEM parts.  The original parts that came with the dishwasher were just as flimsy.

While the design of this part is somewhat questionable, when it develops a small leak you really need to get a new one.  It's not easy to replace, given where it is and how tight the space is, but there are youtube videos to walk you through it.

All of that being said, this part was a great replacement, and has been rock solid since I installed it.
summary: Great Part (But Not Easy To Replace)

reviewText: Solved the problem of the water not draining...usually. It still does fill with water occasionally, but not nearly as often as before. I was surprised it did the trick. The only difference between this one and the original is the width of the white tab on top. This one is wider. So happy it was such an easy and inexpensive fix.
summary: So happy it was such an easy and inexpensive fix

reviewText: After this part ended up on the floor and became a chew toy for our dog, I thought we'd never get another and boom, Amazon has it! Amazon saves the day once again!!  (P.S. Don't get a pug...don't get sucked in by the cute face. Ugh...)

I misplaced this part of my washer after using powdered detergent for many years.  My wife wanted to go back to using liquid detergent so I needed to get a replacement ASAP.  This is the original, new part.  Worked perfectly of course!
summary: A Replacement for a Lost Part

reviewText: I love it.  It fits perfectly.  What I really love is the small holes at the bottom of the baskets.  Things don't go through like the old one, so I don't have to be as careful. And it is a little heavier.  I feel more at ease with it.

Wish I had bought this sooner. Let me start off by saying our LG dishwasher is the worst dishwasher we have ever had. At this point, we only use it to pretty much sterilize our pre-washed dishes. The original silverware basket started to deteriorate and knives and other items started to slip through the basket and prevent the bottom sprayer from spinning. Then I found this and bought it. Great basket! Now it's just a crappy dishwasher that is much less annoying.
summary: Great to replace original basket that disintegrated and would let silverware slip through.

reviewText: Perfect fitting OEM item.  In the grand scheme of things, I think it could use some improvements in quality and durability, but this is identical to the one that came with the fridge, so I guess it is the best I can get!

Installed the new igniter which solved the dryer issue, but it worked for less than a week.  I had to buy a second one to install.  That one has been in the dryer now for more than two weeks and is still working. I have my fingers crossed hoping that this one is also not defective.

Shipped and received as expected.  Installed the ice maker with minimal hassle.  There is a reset process that we were unaware of until we received a copy of the manual that LG emailed within 30 minutes of the request.  The new ice maker works better that the original that came with the unit.

My ice maker quit working. After watching a few videos I felt confident I could replace the ice maker and save a small fortune. Turns out I was right. Took 15 minutes, everything fit as expected and I was back in the ice making business.

This ice maker is better than the icemaker it replaced. The original icemaker made ice slowly, and often formed blobs of ice that plugged the flow of ice out of the refrigerator. The new ice maker makes ice more quickly and has yet to to form blobs of melted ice as the old one did.
summary: Better than the Icemaker it replaced

reviewText:
Great replacement for my broken ice machine on my LG freezer. It was very easy to replace. No need to disconnect the water, just a couple of screws and I was all set.

I did unplug the fridge just to be safe though.
summary: Great replacement for my broken ice machine on my LG ...

reviewText: I had nothing but problems with the old ice maker from the very beginning.  Apparently, LG changed the design and after 7 years the old ice maker finally died.  I replaced it with this one about a month ago and so far, and for the first time, I am getting ice exactly as an ice maker is supposed to.
summary: Does the job.  No more ice problems

reviewText: This was exactly what I needed to fix my LG washer. It was easy to replace (except for the part where we had to take the whole washing machine apart, but there are lots of great videos on YouTube to show you how to repair your machine). It's been a couple of months now and the washer is working great.

I can't tell the difference between filtered and unfiltered water but my wife thinks the filter prevents health problems. She only has 1 kidney so wants to limit introducing impurities into her digestive system.
summary: Wife thinks the filter prevents health problems

reviewText: Very simple to remove old filter and install new one. Simply unscrew by hand. A few drops of water appeared when old filter was removed, but it was not necessary to shut off water supply to refrigerator. The new filter screws in by hand in seconds.
summary: Very simple to remove old filter and install new one ...

reviewText: The filter received is not an NSF53 filter.  It claims to filter out ibuprofin and progesterone.  This filter should filter out mercury and lead. The filter on the Amazon website states it meets NSF53 standards: This filter only meets NSF42. There is a HUGE difference. This is not the $44.73 filter I paid for.  I'm returning it today.  Compare my picture to that on the Amazon website

I truly don't know if the filters are defective. They don't work. Some times they do. Sometimes they don't. Same with 3rd party filters. I think it's a Samsung thing. Thought this won't happen since they are advertised as Original.
summary: Water won't come out. Trying every trick mentioned on the web.

reviewText: I've used one of three and it's worked like a charm. Reading the reviews of the knock-offs, many people complained of leaks with others saying you need to disconnect the water supply. I've pulled and replaced the name-brand filter 3 times now without turning off the water supply with no ill effects. These are also rated to remove lead from the water while the knock-offs are not.

I'm happy with this product. It's easy to plug in and the quality of the water and ice is great.

The only negative with it is that the manufacturer suggests running 3 gallons through it after it is installed. This means a lot of running back and forth between the refrigerator and sink while filling up 3 gallons of water one cup at a time.

The first filter was fine, but the second had a terrible chemical taste which persisted for months. We initially thought there was a problem with our public-supplied water quality, but when we purchased a new filter the problem went away immediately. I may have initially saved money by purchasing a three pack, but I ended up losing money due to quality issues.
summary: The first filter was fine, but the second had a terrible chemical taste ...

reviewText: I did not know I had to replace the filter on my refrigerator. Looked for it on the Samsung website and compared prices. It was cheaper through Amazon. It took me a while to decipher which filter I needed for the refrigerator but picked the correct one. It was fairly easy to install.

Only 1 of the 3 filters worked! Water would not come out of the dispenser after the faulty filters were installed.  After weeks of troubleshooting I finally ordered a new filter from the Samsung website and it worked without a single problem. I feel completely ripped off!

These are the filters that go with my humidifier.  Since the store doesn't carry these any longer,
I ended up looking on line and at least now, I have enough and won't be running out of them.
The filters are exactly what I needed.
summary: Don't have worry about running out

reviewText: I have had my Honeywell humidifier for a month, and so far have not seen any build up of mold, mildew, or even that slimy film that tends to end up in all humidifiers. So, I am very happy with the performance of this product so far.

I desperately needed one of these to replace the one in my son's filter.  It works great and I can tell you that when I replaced it, my son started breathing better at night.  He had been suffering from a nasty cold that was causing him to cough and be congested in his chest and nose, but within 24 hours of replacing his filter I noticed he began to clear up immediately.  I really think the filter helped him to begin the process of feeling better.
summary: Helped my son get rid of his cold

reviewText: Don't buy this product if you are trying to get the ring back on. And you don't need it to get the ring off, you can just use a screw driver and expand the spring. The problem is expanding the spring to put it back on.

I tried asking for this part at Home Depot where I had bought my dryer and they didn't have it. Glad I could find it on Amazon. It came with instructions too. I had my plumber install it for me, and it was his first time doing a conversion on a LG front loader. The most time consuming part was taking the front panel off the dryer. In total it took him an hour and a half to install it. Dryer is up and running on propane now. Working like it should.

I bought this tool after fighting with the ring on my LG washing machine for a couple of hours. I tried everything I could think of and couldn't manage to get it back on. I ordered this tool and it went on no problem (as it should, being the official tool from LG). Would highly recommend this if you need to disassemble your LG washer. Using this tool I was almost able to completely assemble my machine.
summary: Does exactly what it is supposed to do

reviewText: This replacement part does not work.  It does fit into the original slot, but it does not hold the door partially open.  Either the magnet is too weak or the spring is too weak or the length of the replacement part is too short.  But it is useless and once it's installed, you cannot remove the part without breaking the clips.

The little magnet stopper for our washer just broke one day, we really don't know how or when.  Having a front loader, it's important that you don't completely shut the door when it's not in use or it starts to stink and get moldy.  This little piece fit perfectly and does the job of holding the door in place again.
summary: The little magnet stopper for our washer just broke one ...

reviewText: Purchased these but didn't need them. These are just some sliders with a rubber gasket and some grease. Check what you have and if they have some resistances then they are still good. Great product but I didn't need to buy them.

Perfect fit for my dryer. No need to waste my time trying to retrofit parts from a hardware store to make it fit. Just buy this if it is the correct part for your appliance. It is well worth the money without wasting your time. Thanks!

It was not the easiest installation. Only because of the area it had to go into in the dryer. This kit is a very precise fit. It does the job that we needed it to do.
While it doesn't take a whole lot of skill to install, it does take an enormously amount of patience and perseverance
summary: It was not the easiest installation. Only because of ...

reviewText: Purchased this to repair our LG dryer.  The dryer drum just kept spinning, even if the dryer were turned off.  The only thing we could do to stop it was to unplug it - which became a hassle very quickly.  After doing some research online, I found that the only real way to solve this particular problem was to replace the control.  Shipping was fast.  Replacing the control board was very easy and this part works perfectly.

I have been using these for years.  They are the best for covering my electric burners.  Be careful not to leave them on the burner when it is hot... they will discolor.  That's the only reason I have had to replace them.

Very nice! I bought these for my mother, who swears she's broken her habit of leaving them on after turning on a burner. She's gone through two sets that way; if she burns these, she doesn't get any more.
The finish is very attractive. I hope that the contrast in colors will help her remember to remove before turning on the burner.

I got these to replace an older set of burner covers.  I was very pleasantly surprised by this set of covers when they arrived.  They are really nice.  Heavy duty and easy to keep clean.  I would buy them again in a heartbeat.

These look great on a stainless cooktop! I purchased to keep my un-used burners clean while cooking on another burner. They do a great job of keeping splatters off the un-used burner coils and drip pans and they are much easier to wash. They clean up nicely and blend in with the cooktop.
summary: Keep your un-used coils and drip pans clean - These are easy to clean!

reviewText: These cover up my 50-yr-old burners that just won't come clean.  Makes my stove look great!  I did order two sets and only used the small ones, because the big ones are huge.  It looks so much better to have them all uniformly sized, and the small ones JUST cover the big burners too.

I use these to prevent oil from getting on the burners I'm not currently using. They're easy to clean and I avoid smoking burners from oil splatter on the surrounding burners. They're good quality and discreet.

These are great looking burner covers.  They are a little larger and heavier that the flimsy ones sold at the discount stores, and the quality is evident in the look and feel of the stainless steel.  I was pleasantly surprised at how shiny they were when I put them over the burners of my range.

Bought a coupling because I thought changing out the whole tube would be too difficult. The coupling didn't work, so had to go with changing out the tube and it was much easier to replace than I expected and easier than trying to use the coupling.

Thank you again for helping me be able to fix my dryer. The customer service and fast delivery is a great thing and that is what customer service is all about. The item is exactly as described and works great in my LG (red) dryer.

This piece worked as expected. After my dryer stopped drying I did a little research online to see what the problem could be. According to my online research, this piece was the culprit. I then went on YouTube and found a video that showed how to replace it. The part came very quickly (as to be expected when ordering from Amazon), and with the help of a friend, we had the piece replaced in no time and the dryer has been working every since.

My refrigerator was only producing a trickle of water and the ice maker was creating icicles and sheets of ice all over the food in my freezer. After installing the new water valve everything is back to normal. I am very happy with my purchase, and It was easy to install!!!!

I haven't received the part yet, but I am giving this 5 stars because of the fact that I can actually order this part. In Canada, LG forces you to go through one of their "Authorized Technicians" who will not order the part unless you use them to do the repair work.
How crazy is that?
Oh, and what's even crazier - it's out of warranty and LG Canada will still not allow users to order the part without using their Authorized Technicians.
summary: 5 Stars Because I Can Order It

reviewText: Built better than the original part. The original part had a white plastic center while the new part still had the white plastic center but the ribbed part was metal. I'm sure it will outlast the rest of the machine.

Not much to say about the tray.  I had to replace old tray, because the sediments that it had accumulated over time, at the bottom of each space, were preventing the mechanism from emptying the ice after some cycles, causing spills and freezes.  (Cleaning the sediments from the old tray with vinegar didn't always work, I am guessing because of some scratches as well.)  I am hoping that a new tray without the scratches and sediments will allow the mechanism to pour the ice fine on each cycle from now on.
summary: Hoping the new tray pours the ice fine

reviewText: I heard a dripping noise one night and realized it was coming from inside the washing machine. I opened it up, saw that this part was leaking.  Internet research suggested that these parts had an expected life of 7-8 years, so ordered this one as a replacement.  It was easy to install and has been working fine for over a year now.

Worked great to repair our LG washing machine.  Please do note that it DOES come with the filter's.  We ordered filter's because the description said it didn't come with them but it did so we didn't need to order the filter's.
summary: Easy to fix LG washing machine.

reviewText: I have purchased compactor bags in the past and these are superior. The bag is thicker and sturdier than previous bags. The holes for fastening the bag are clearly identified, unlike previous bags where the holes are hard to fine. I am very pleased with these bags.
summary: ... purchased compactor bags in the past and these are superior. The bag is thicker and sturdier than previous ...

reviewText: My compactor is new and I got lucky when I ordered these bags.  They are heavy-duty and are very easy to use.  The holes in the bags line up with the buttons on the side of my Kenmore compactor perfectly.  I will be ordering more.

LOVE! LOVE! LOVE! I love this washing machine. It has been used as a cloth diaper and baby clothes washing machine. It has been working very effectively and has saved us a lot of money. It is really convenient to have right in our kitchen area. It does an excellent job of removing any excess water from the clothes so we simply hang it up and it dries within a few hours.
summary: For Cloth Diaper and Baby Clothes

reviewText: I initially wrote a great review because I thought it was a life saver. However, after having it for some time, I can say that I would NEVER recommend this to anyone. The lint tray just recycles the lint. It does not clean well. And, now the spin cycle which is on the right hand side just stopped working for no apparent reason. Didn't last very long before it broke down.
summary: DO NOT PURCHASE. WASTE OF MONEY!!!

reviewText: I just love this washing machine. I use it about twice a week. I also purchased the Panda dryer as well. The washing machine works wonderfully. You have to remember that it's not going to clean really soiled clothes like a regular machine would. For what I use it for, it is the greatest!!! I would recommend this to anyone!!!
summary: I just love this washing machine

reviewText: Even after a few years of use, it is still working fine. Never have any problem with it and the clothes are always well washed. I wish they could find a way to connect it, a way to soak the water out of the clothes. It would have been so convenient.
summary: it is still working fine. Never have any problem with it and the ...

reviewText: I've only run this thing twice and the results were pretty horrible.  It also requires quite a bit of work surprisingly.  You don't just plug it in and forget about it.  You have to load it up with water, wait, put a few things in the dryer, wait, and repeat that maybe six or seven times since the dryer is so small.  The dryer's pretty much an afterthought really.  For $200+ this thing is a huge rip off.

Our apartment doesn't have a washer and dryer, and it's a giant pain to go to the laundromat, so this was the perfect solution! It holds more than I thought it would, and it washes the clothes really well. I've used it several times a week for over a year, and it still works perfectly!

This machine exceeded my expectations. It gets my clothes clean and I don't have to go to the laundromat anymore. I hated going to the laundromat. Yes it's a small machine, so you have to do smaller loads, so it does take longer. That's ok with me, I don't have to leave my my apartment to do my laundry now. The little spin dryer works good too. I liked it all so much, I also bought a panda electric tumble dryer too. It also works great. I would definitely buy a Panda product again.
summary: I hated going to the laundromat

reviewText:
This little washer is amazing and the fact that it has a built in spin dryer puts this product over the top. We don't have room for a washer and dryer so we decided to give this a try; it has been completely worth it.

We have another brand as well but if I were to recommend one this would be it.

This thing is surprisingly powerful. I only wash my clothes for 3 minutes max. I'm always a little worried that my clothes will be destroyed, but it hasn't happened yet.

I read other reviewers' suggestions about using mesh bags. I first tried using zippered mesh bags, but this washer destroyed the zippers. Now I'm using mesh bags with a drawstring closure, and they are working fine.

After I had surgery I couldn't use the steps to go down to the basement to do laundry. This little washing machine was a big help. It does very small loads because it is a very small machine. But that was OK. I could wash my clothes in this and hang them up to dry on a drying rack in the spare bedroom. It got me through those early post-surgery weeks.

Now I still use it to do socks and underwear. And it is great to clean my Crocs when they get dirty.
summary: I Keep this thing in the bathroom next to the tub

reviewText: DIRECT REPLACEMENT FOR THE ORIGINAL IN MY LG  DLE5579W DRYER. I WAS NOT GOING TO REPLACE THIS BUT I THOUGHT FOR THE COST OF THE PART I SHOULD REPLACE IT WHILE I WAS REPLACING THE BELT. I AM GLAD I ORDERED THIS PART BECUASE THE ORIGINAL HAD A GROOVE WORN INTO IT FROM THE BELT
summary: EXCELLENT PART, YOU SHOULD REPLACE THIS IF YOU ARE REPLACING THE BELT

reviewText: If your washer doesn't drain and will not spin it is due to a faulty water pump. The washer senses the water in the drum so it will not spin. But if the washer pumps all the water out but will not spin it's due to a faulty rotor sensor.

I ordered this for a Kenmore refrigerator. Ordinarily I wouldn't have done so, but I thought, "What are the odds that refrigerators from two different manufacturers would have the exact same part number for the same part if they weren't compatible...." In this case, the odds were quite high. This looks just like the Kenmore spring and performs the exact function as the Kenmore Spring, but it isn't the same size as the Kenmore Spring.....
summary: When it looks like a duck, but isn't. Right part number. Wrong part.

reviewText: This is one of the easiest appliance repairs I have ever done.  The replacement part does seem to have metal splines at the center that will last longer than the original.  The plastic piece should be available separately, for 10% of the cost of this assembly, but it's still way cheaper than a visit from the repairman.
summary: The center piece should be sold separately!

reviewText: This was an exact match to the drain pump that I was replacing. Ive never fixed a washer before, but I watched a YouTube video on how to replace the pump and it was much easier than I expected. Took less than 1 hour from start to finish. Our washer is now back in business and it only took $22 to do it.

Was a perfect fit for my LG front loader. I had never opened up the washer before I replaced the dead drain pump. With the help of various videos, I completed the removal of the old pump and the installation of the new pump without any difficulty. It's been a couple of months since I did the job and the washer is working flawlessly.
summary: Perfect fit and not a bad install

reviewText: This item worked perfectly and could not have been easier to install.  If the washer doesn't have a dryer on top of it, it is simple to remove the two screws from the back, and slide off the top to reach the old part.  Remove the two screws from the front that hold the existing latch in place, unplug the cable from the old, plug it into the new and replace screws.  Latch works great compared.  Not remotely complicated.
summary: Arrived quick. Easy to install. Works perfect.

reviewText: As others have mentioned, this pump is crap.  I ordered it in February 2016, and as of May 2016 it is broken.  The impeller has destroyed itself.  It lasted long enough to get out of the 30-day warranty, which I guess is all the manufacturer cares about.

So far, so good.  We googled the problem with our washer and thankfully came up with this part as the answer.  My washer is working again and I'm thankful my husband is handy so he could do the repair.
summary: so good. We googled the problem with our washer and ...

reviewText: Great replacement for my broken washing machine. I followed a tutorial I found on YouTube and had the washer up and running in less than 45 minutes. It's a great replacement part and it's going to extend the life of the washer!

This drain pump is bigger than the original drain pump.  I had to force it into it's plastic housing and also cut tabs from the housing.  And when the pump runs, it is louder.  I hope it runs at least as long as the original pump.  Otherwise, I would be really upset and give it a zero star!  Update: this Drain Pump produced loud noise, and stopped pumping water in one year and 3 months.  The original pump ran for 7 years. So I was totally disappointed!  It would take a lot of effort to replace it again.

Works perfectly.  I got this to replace the defective switch in my Sears Kenmore refrigerator (Which apparently is made by LG).  It was very easy to replace, and works perfectly.  No more flipping at the switch to try and get it to turn on, or groping in the dark.
summary: Perfect replacement part for a Sears Kenmore Fridge.

reviewText: Bought 2 of these since I cannot find them in stores any more but after 2 days they needed to be replaced. A complete waste of money and time. I will just be buying a newer humidifier; it will be cheaper than buying new filters every other day.
summary: needs to be replaced after 2 days

reviewText: Did not work for our appliance, not sure if it works for anything. On the roll it looked great. As soon as we carefully unrolled it, a few inches at a time, it began "growing" wrinkles. We could actually see these wrinkles growing across the width of the paper, one at a time, as we very carefully tried to smooth it. Obviously the glue on the back did not stretch out when unrolled. Think of it as a garment where the lining is smaller than the outer fabric. It's ugly & you leave it in closet.

As I unrolled the product horizontal lines appeared and never disappeared!  It was next to impossible to apply to the front of the dishwasher without wrinkles and a zillion bubbles.  It was an incredibly frustrating experience and I was not happy with the overall appearance after I was finished.
summary: It was an incredibly frustrating experience and I was not happy with the overall appearance after I was finished

reviewText: Both of these filters worked great....for about 2-3 weeks.  Then, the flow of the water got smaller and smaller and, within 4-6 weeks, it was taking a full minute just to fill a glass of water, and sometimes longer!  At first, we thought we just had a bad filter, so we swapped one out for the other new one.  The exact same thing happened; it worked fine for a couple of weeks and then got progressively worse, fast.  I will definitely not be buying these again!
summary: Horrible performance after a couple of weeks!

reviewText: These filters are terrible.  I regret buying a two-pack because I'm going to just throw out the second.  The water tastes terrible compared to the filter it replaced.  At first I thought it might just need to be flushed with more water before the bad taste was washed out.  But I've used it for a month now and flushed it with many, many gallons of H2O.  Still tastes bad.  I'm going to buy a different brand.

I'm so glad I brought this dryer. It saves me a lot of headache going to the laundry. Bigger inside than I actually thought it would be. My friends are so impressed with it also. I clean the filter after 1 or 2 loads, and I really think people are exaggerating about how difficult it is to do. This is definitely a great purchase and investment. I would definitely recommend this dryer. You won't be disappointed.

Okay, never really though I would say a clothes dryer is cute, but this one is. It is also...amazing!!!  I DO have to get a little table or something to put it up on, but no big deal...the controls ARE at the bottom of the machine. I wouldn't let that stop me from keeping it...it is a gem!

I like this appliance very much. It is larger in size. Therefore I can dry a bigger amount of clothes than before.  I set it on a wouldn't stand so it is easier to adjust and set on whatever I want to set on.
summary: Sonya Portable Compact Laundry Dryer Apartment

reviewText: Once I installed this water filter, I could immediately taste the difference in my water from the fridge dispenser.  I was hesitant in ordering it because of the low price, but I think I made a good decision.  There seems to be no difference in this water filter and the Kenmore 9002 that costs about $50 or more.  I recommend this water filter.
summary: Very happy with this water filter

reviewText: I must admit to being a little doubtful at first, but when these filters arrived and when I installed the first one, my doubts vanished. It popped right in, did not leak and left no taste in the water. And for the price of one original filter, I now have two more replacements for future use.

Installed quickly. Works fine. The wiring color is not the same as the original Whirlpool part. The Whirlpool part on one wire has white stripes on it. This part both wires are black. For the price, it is not  a deal breaker.

Twice now I have blown a fuse on my Whirlpool dishwasher.  Being able to replace it myself has saved me hundreds of dollars.  I don't know if I will buy a Whirlpool again, but in the meantime I always have one of these fuses standing by for the inevitable.
summary: Cheaper than calling out the service center

reviewText: This thing works ridiculously well. Catches 99% of the lint and is easy to manage. I'd like to congratulate whoever made this filter. It's the most difficult piece of the puzzle to solve when using a washer and dryer in an apartment with out hookups.
summary: If you need to dry clothes and vent inside, buy this.

reviewText: Worlds smallest and most frustrating dishwasher.  The top rack fits almost nothing.  It is set very high, cannot accommodate more than four wine glasses, does not really fit cereal bowls.  Bottom rack is small too.  I wish I had seen it in person and not bought it on-line.  A complete waste of money.

Wasn't the same item that was pictured and I need the item that was pictured. needless to say I was a little aggravated and just threw it into a drawer. It will work but until the OEM completely breaks, I won't use it.

I had a broken screen for a very long time, finally broke down and bought a new one. It is very good quality, fits perfectly, and it is so nice not to have a broken screen to deal with every load of laundry!

I immediately installed these on the top of my new Frigidaire stove.  They fit perfectly, are strong and thick enough to last for a while and look great.  As long as they keep making them, I will keep buying them.  I'm sure the 40 will last for at least a year.

These are a very handy item that keep us from having to do a lot of cleaning around the burners. I only wish they came in different sizes, as we always have to cut one to fit the largest burner (it's an old gas stove), but for the burners that do fit, nothing could be easier.

Love these! Very sturdy and there are so many in a pack that I don't have to wash them to keep my stove clean. However, they ARE washable with a quick soak and can return to the stove without tearing. They can easily be bent but returning to shape doesn't seem to be a problem.
summary: Great for keeping our well used stove clean!

reviewText: These have saved me so much stove-cleaning-time. I LOVE these so much! I can usually leave them on for a few weeks before I need to change them. I highly recommend that you buy these, if you are considering it.

Remove the two thumb screws holding on the water pan an then the water pan. Remove the three screws holding the pump. Unplug and remove old pump. Replace pump and screws and plug in. Reinstall water pan and thumb screws. That's it.

The fridge says that I need to replace these every 6 months, but I'm starting to not believe it. The fridge is in my house and the house's HVAC has a pretty good filter in it as well. Therefore, when I took the first air filter out of the fridge, it seemed as clean as a well-steamed Mormon. I'll continue to use these filters when I do change, but I'm going to keep a nose out for the freshness and probably won't change it more than once a year.
summary: The fridge is in my house and the house's HVAC has a pretty good filter in it as well

reviewText: Pretty straight forward with regards to installation. Took about an hour. Works great. Yes, the vent makes a little bit of noise but you can't beat it for the price. We put a low power light bulb in it and use it as a night light for the kitchen.
summary: Pretty straight forward with regards to installation

reviewText: I read some reviews on this filter, half were bad and half were good. I took a chance to save a buck. Don't waste your time and money. It does "filter water" when it is out of the fridge. For some reason once it is in the fridge it won't connect properly, so no water comes out.
summary: Don't try to save a buck.

reviewText: I have had several humidifiers, and they've never quite done the job. But after researching, I purchased the HCM-750 series and I love it! I have a large bedroom and it definitely does exactly what it's supposed to. And yes, there is a slight humming sound and trickling water sound, but it puts me to sleep.

I previously used Swift Green but they weren't available and decided to try a different brand.  Very bad idea.  These were cheaper but after a couple of weeks the water runs really slow thru the filter.  I am going to go back to Swift Green brand.
summary: Water runs slow after a couple of weeks

reviewText: I just installed my new filter on my LG fridge.  It seems to be a perfect replacement for the LG brand filters at a discounted rate.  It is working as advertised and I am confident it will last as long.

The shipment arrived sooner than expected and in good shape.  I haven't used these filters yet, but since they appear to be widely available as a generic replacement for the Kenmore filter, I assume they will work fine.  I have used other generic replacements successfully, so I'm confident these will work as expected.
summary: Best price I found for this product

reviewText: I bought these to put in my fridge because the 3-pack was cheaper than one of the normal filters.  Well, I guess you get what you pay for.  The filter I put in fits, but I had to put nearly two gallons of water through it before the water stopped being BLACK.  Also, I can tell it's not filtering as well as the name brand filter because the water pressure seems so much higher.  Next time, I'll pay the extra for the LG filters.
summary: Discolored water and I'm assuming less filtration than name brand

reviewText: This is EXACTLY the same as the brand name filter for my LG fridge, but less than 1/2 the price.  I am so glad I found this.  I don't really care if my water is filtered or not (I grew up on a farm - with well water; so I'm not picky), but my husband cares.  I didn't tell him I found this off brand filter and he hasn't noticed a difference!

Did not come in a box and smelled like mold. What the hell, these are for use in humidifiers and having them full of bacteria is dangerous, so I didn't use them because of the smell and lack of sealed packaging.
summary: waste of money, find a more reputable place to order

reviewText: I've been looking EVERYWHERE for a power supply cord for our dryer that's longer than the standard 4-6 ft cords.  Stores (brick/mortar and online) just don't seem to get that not every outlet is 2-3 feet off the floor.  With this cord, I was able to stack our washer/dryer set AND avoid hiring an electrician to come out and reconfigure the outlet.  Highly recommended.

Couldn't get this anywhere else. It may or may not be recommended by some, but I haven't detected any issues with it at all. No overheating, and no perceptible issues with build quality. It's just the like the shorter one I have, but, um, longer.
summary: It may or may not be recommended by some

reviewText: Perfect! I ordered a new washer and dryer, and planned to save room by stacking them. This led to a problem as the five foot cord was too short! I went to our local Sears store and two other places to try to purchase a longer one, but they did not carry anything longer than five feet. Instead of making myself crazy, I went directly to Amazon and purchased this cord. It arrived in two days, and worked perfectly!
summary: Perfect! I ordered a new washer and dryer

reviewText:
I know they're just ice cubes, but I love that they last for a few hours, and you only need one per glass.
I also make them with ice tea, and juices, so our drinks don't get watered down. They need to be scrubbed when you use anything other than water, but they don't remain discolored, just takes a little more work to clean them.
My friends love them too... I recommend these!

I went to a restaurant where they had these and thought it was really cool.  I pretty much don't make drinks now without using these.  The material is durable and the cubes turn out perfect every time.  Also the softer material makes it very easy to get the ice out without damaging the tray.

Some recommends boiling the water first to get the ice crystal clear. These are big ice cubes to cool down all you favorite drinks. I also use it for plantar fasciitis. I use a paper towel to wrap around one end to hold the ice and rub it against the sole (plantar fascia). Works great!!
summary: Big Ice cube for multiple uses.

reviewText: I will get a few more of these.  They stack better than regular ice cube trays in the freezer, and they are a fun novelty.  You do have to be careful not to chip a tooth on one of these things, however.  But I had a party with an ice bucket full of them and people loved them.

Every time the ice melts I'm left with a bunch of little white dust on my glass or in my drink. Took me a few drinks before I figured it out but this will be going back. I tested it by placing ice cubes from this tray in an empty glass and from another tray in a different empty glass.  Only the cubes from this tray had the issue. There was also an oil like substance floating on the surface of the water.  No matter how many times I washed and rinsed it this happened every time.
summary: Left white dust in my glass and oil on the surface

reviewText: I was so excited when I received my silicone ice cube tray in the mail. I'm not the type of person to get excited about this stuff, but this thing is really awesome. The seller gave a whole bunch of different ideas for things we can make with the ice cube tray too so that was really cool. Of course, I'm starting off with some Jumbo Jello Shots!

Delivered when promised  Delivered when promised in great shape. Was easy to order and was just what was advertised I will use this dealer again in great shape. Was easy to order and was just what was advertised I will use this dealer again. First one was broken due to shipping and was replace the next day.

We bought this refrigerator from Best Buy last year and it is a badly engineered piece of equipment. The ice maker is fundamentally flawed, and from what I understand, not repairable. I wish we would have returned it right away when we realized how junky it was, but my husband thought he could fix the problems. Now it is out of warranty and we are stuck with it.
summary: We bought this refrigerator from Best Buy last year and it is a badly engineered ...

reviewText: Perfect fit for our Bravo XL dryer! As other reviewers have noted, there's a YouTube video that shows you how to replace the latch...but, repairs are rarely as easy as they appear. We, too, had to take the whole door apart in order to remove the old latch. With the right screwdriver and maybe an extra hand or two to help hold as you wrestle the front and back pieces of the door back together, though, it's a piece of cake! ;)
summary: You can do this repair -- really!

reviewText: Works perfectly. This is the second time I've had to replace the latch. Found it very easily on Amazon, and at a much lower price than at the retail appliance store I checked with.
