This time I bought two, just in case this happens again. Getting the old broken one out was a challenge, but new one went in like a breeze. Arrived on time, as promised.

I had no idea how many dust bunnies lived where I couldn't see...

The wire bends kind of easily, but I guess that is the point.  I just wasn't expecting it.  It bends back fairly well.  It definitely works.  Do yourself a favor and have a vacuum hose in your other hand and ready when you pull this brush out.

This spin dryer is AMAZING! Definitely worth the money! It's larger than I expected which is a good thing because it can fit a small load of laundry and efficiently gets at least 90% of the moisture out.
summary: This spin dryer is AMAZING! Definitely worth the money

reviewText: I can't believe how wonderful this spin dryer works.  I could never squeeze out enough water when I hand washed.  I would hang the items up and they'd be dripping in a matter of minutes.  It took ages for them to dry.  When I take them out of the spinner and hang them up, they're DRY in a matter of minutes.  I'm not exaggerating.  I just love it.  It's so quiet, too.  I hope it lasts forever.

Holy moly this thing is amazing!! I wish I bought it sooner!! I put my clothes inside of this machine and within a few minutes almost all of the water is taken out of them. I leave them to hang dry after and within a few hours they're dry.

I love this thing.  It does exactly what it is advertised to do.  It is a centrifugal water extractor.  It removes water.  It does not dry your clothes.  Undergarments are slightly damp when spun.  Knit shirts are damp and take 2-3 hours to dry.  Jeans dry over night.  I haven't figured out how to do towels.  They turn out crunchy and hard.  We now throw the towels in the dryer and that solves that problem.  They take little time to dry in the dryer.

I am SO happy that I bought this. I wash most of my clothes by hand because it's more convenient than going to a laundromat. I really didn't like wringing the stuff out by hand because I could never wring enough water out, but this spin dryer really does the trick. I just spin the washed and rinsed clothes out, put them on hangers and hang them on my shower curtain rod and in a few hours the things are dry. A wonderful, ingenious, convenient and money saving product in my opinion.

I LOVE this spin dryer. It does a great job getting as much water out as possible. Amazing and worth the money. (Just be ready for water to start coming out the spout on the bottom before you even turn the machine on)

This device is bigger than I expected, substantially bigger than a 5 gallon bucket.  It does not have any timers or buttons - you plug it in and it spins; you unplug it to shut it off.  I am line drying baby diapers and the diapers were taking a long time to dry.  Now, I put the diapers through this device before hanging them up and they dry in an hour or two, the same as any other item.  This device gets a lot of extra water out that the spin cycle on my washer does not.
summary: Much More Effective than Spin Cycle

reviewText: I really love the Nina Soft Spin Dryer! I have had it for a couple of days. It works really great. It gets the water out of clothes , so they're almost dry. Not one drop of water could be squeezed out of the clothes or towels, after using this machine. I'm glad that I got the spin dryer, it helped me out a lot, and is very efficient. Easy to use. Easy to lift and carry to where ever you need it to go. Very nice product and attractive. Well worth the price!
summary: Nina Soft Dryer Works Great-Very Efficient

reviewText: I've had this spin dryer for over a year now. It works very well! For those worried about mold, don't worry. As long as you air it out for 1-2 days after use, you'll be fine. I live in an apartment and our laundry facility is a hike. This little dryer saves me time and energy. I would highly recommend it, despite it's high price. It's something I definitely plan on keeping for several years.
summary: you'll be fine. I live in an apartment and our laundry ...

reviewText: I needed this to speed up the drying time, and it really works well. Just don't overload it, and no need to run it over a few minutes. It has cut down on my drying time in half. I use a portable washer/dryer, and after reading the reviews I'm impressed with this item :B

It's light, fast, small, efficient. I use it a lot. Because it's so fast, it makes hand-washing  more practical and easy. I learned that you can just pour clean water in with soapy clothes and rinse them, repeatedly, without pulling out, ringing out or using hands to rinse, over and over. I always had a problem with that because of my carpal tunnel syndrome.
summary: YOU MIGHT USE THIS MORE THAN YOUR DRYER..HUNG CLOTHES DRY FASTER, NOW

reviewText: This arm fit perfectly. It was even better then the arm the dishwasher came with. Not only was it a perfect fit but it had a metal liner underneath it to protect it from the hot coils. The whole reason we had to replace the arm was because the hot coils melted the original arm in spots causing the water not to shoot out properly and wash the dishes. I am very pleased with this replacement.
summary: It was even better then the arm the dishwasher came with

reviewText: Our old ice maker died and my husband replaced it with this one. It makes tons of ice and has never run low. The cubes are made in sheets which then drop into the bucket and break apart. The cubes are clear and square, about 3/4" each. The exterior of the unit is stainless and blends well with our decor. The only downside to this unit is that it is very loud when it is actually making the ice. Most ice makers are, but, I just want to point out that this one is loud. Other than that, it's fantastic.
summary: Lots of clear, cubed ice. Loud at times.

reviewText: The ice maker was easy to install and started making ice the minute it was turned on.  This one is much, much quieter than the Kenmore Elite that it replaced.  In fact, we really don't notice it running at all until it dumps ice.  This ice maker seems to be all it has been purported to be.

This works REALLY well for a large yard inflatable. We have it hooked up to a 9-foot Halloween cat. It is pretty strong so we unzipped about an inch of the cats belly opening so there would not be quite so much pressure. I don't think it would work very well for a normal sized inflatable but for the jumbo ones it was great. We tried to unhook it and bring it in if it was going to really storm, but it did just fine for rain showers.
summary: It is pretty strong so we unzipped about an inch of the ...

reviewText: It does what it says and does it well. Just plug it and it turns on. It's pretty strong of a blower for its size, so I recommend that your inflatable has an opening as well so the excess air can escape. If not, it might just rupture it.
summary: It's pretty strong of a blower for its size

reviewText: The panel did exactly what was promised.  It went on easily and covers most of the front door of the dishwasher.  I will have to touch up some parts with white enamel on the sides, but it looks as if it belongs.  I am not ready to replace this working appliance, so in the meantime, the door panel will serve its purpose.

For an inexpensive countertop wine fridge, it is attractive and does seem to keep it cool.  I am not a fanatic and don't put a thermometer on the racks to see if the temp is perfect - like I said, it is an inexpensive unit.  I like having a chilled bottle ready at a moment's notice.
summary: it is attractive and does seem to keep it cool. I am not a fanatic and don't put ...

reviewText: Device failed in less than a week. Looks like the thermostat on it has failed. Device always had more than 4 inches of space on every side. Unplugged it for an hour and then plugged it back in and the error cleared and it started to work and then another couple of hours later it had died again. Tried to contact the manufacturer with no success. Luckily I can still return it to Amazon since it's been less than 30 days.
summary: Failed in less than a week.

reviewText: Both oven are very loud!  The convection fans in both ovens make a loud grinding noise.  It's loud enough that you can hear it even when you are upstairs.  We bought a new house with all new GE Appliances and we've had issues with each of them.  GE customer service is very slow.  It took them 2 weeks to come out and look at the ovens.  They ordered 2 new fans and now we must wait 3 more weeks for them to come back and install them.  Very frustrating for ovens that are only a month old.

Not worth the price.  It takes about 10-15 minutes NOT 7 to make cubes.  5 cubes every 10-15 minutes is nothing to rave about.  The large cubes are about the size of the first digit of my thumb the small cubes are about the size of the first digit of my pinky.  I have small hands.  The picture of the cubes on the box are not representative of what is actually produced.  Don't like it and would not recommend it.

This item was purchased to fix my washing machine. It works perfectly now and I have had no problems with it. It was easy to install and the boyfriend had it fixed in about an hour. It works great and my machine is back up and running. I hope this helps when making a purchasing decision and thank you so much for your time. Have a great day!

I have ordered many of these filters in the past and had good luck with them. This time the filter was much thinner than the last ones and it lasted exactly one day. I noticed that the humidifier light was blinking and when I checked it, the filter was collapsed. It was not even thick enough to stand up on its own. I will not be purchasing these in the future.

I installed this product the day I received it and was pleasantly surprised. It worked better than the originals. I used to run the humidifier 24/7. Now I only run it 3 days a week to get the same results. Needless to say I am very pleased.

This was a great dishwasher until the warranty ran out and the pump went out. It was only a year and a half old. It would have cost $375+ to fix, so I went with a Bosch this time. It was very quiet and set up well.

Bought this for my elderly aunt who lives in a  small apartment with a very old refrigerator/freezer. She was having problems defrosting her fridge at her age. I bought this and she hasn't complained once in over 6 months! She's delighted at how well it works!

Fit my washer, which I'd purchased used to replace an old one from the 1970s. I should not have been surprised that the softener dispenser was missing, or that the one from the old Kenmore didn't fit the new one, as the new Kenmores are just like GE, Whirlpool, etc. are now. Fit and locked in place.
summary: as the new Kenmores are just like GE, Whirlpool

reviewText: This made me love my old basic washing machine again - I inherited the washing machine when we bought the house, and not having a fabric softener dispenser was the only thing I disliked about that machine.  Yay!

This is a refrigerator. It keeps things cold. The freezer is a little small, but it's not like there's any reason to assume or expect otherwise. Most people could get by with this and a cheap chest freezer, saving a lot of money on a full-size refrigerator/freezer unit.

It's perfect! We needed to replace an ancient refrigeration in an old RV. The size was a bit bigger in width, but cutting away some of the paneling in the RV did the trick. This refrigerator is roomy and well-designed for it's size. And the energy use is SO much more efficient than the old one from the 80's.

A perfect fit for my RV.  I had a small closet that housed an apartment washer/dryer combo that I didn't use.  I needed more fridge space, so I tossed the washer/dryer and put in this.  Works perfectly.  The first one came in severely damaged, but Amazon came through and got me another one.

I had to rearrange my washer/dryer setup in my laundry room to get the doors to open both outward.  In order to do that I needed longer hoses and this one was exactly what I needed.  Extra long and built well.
summary: This is exactly what I needed

reviewText: The door latch on my Samsung washer quit locking.  I could see that it was broken.  Ordered this and replaced the latch and my washer is back to working again.  Installing this was a breeze.  The difficult part was putting the spring back around the door seal.  Man..... I thought I would never get that spring back around the door seal.....
summary: Fit perfectly and saved me a ton of money

reviewText: It took about 30 minutes to install and we had to make a minor modification because one of the screw holes didn't line up with the one in the washer.  The part works because we've already been able to do several loads of laundry.
summary: It took about 30 minutes to install and we had ...

reviewText: This is a great little ice maker, pops ice at 15 min intervals and works like a champ! This ice maker does not freeze the ice after it is made. It falls into an insulated place that you need to transfer to your freezer or cooler. It does waste a lot of water. It will waste about 5 gallons of water in a 10 or 12 hour period of steady running. I am running filtered water through the ice maker so instead of running the water down the drain, I run it into 3 gallon water bottles and use it for drinking water.

I purchased an after market Heating Element that said it was the same as the OEM, well 3 months later I've just replaced that one with this Genuine Factory Heating Element... It's working perfectly right now... I'll update in 3 months...

One day, our dryer decided to stop drying our clothes. It would spin, it would fluff things, it just didn't get warm anymore. It was literally giving us the cold shoulder. Had to run a few tests on other parts to rule out thermostat and a few other ideas, but thankfully it ended up being the least expensive option.

If only it could have been some sort of awesome super-powered heating element that could sort and fold our laundry after it's dry.
summary: Works great, but the dryer still isn't folding my laundry like I wish it would

reviewText: It is exactly what I needed, it does NOT come with the thermostat so just make sure you don't need one if you are only ordering this part, there are thermostats for this part on sale here in Amazon as well. I will try to remember to update this review in a few months once I've put the part to more use, but it went in easily and worked right away. Looked like it was a quality piece and it came in a box marked as a certified factory part.

Works perfectly and was easy to install. We knew something was wrong when the water that came from our fridge started flowing very, very slowly. A plumber told us we needed to change the filter and that did the trick immediately.

I had never repaired a dryer before, but this kit made it easy.  There were some parts that I did not need, but it had everything necessary to get my dryer running again.  I replaced both heat sensors.  The units in the kit were exact duplicates of what I had so it was easy.

I ordered this part to replace the leaking drain pump on my washer. Arrived on time and installed in less than 15 minutes! For a girl who knows nothing about washing machines, I was pretty proud of myself! It's now been in my machine for 3 to 4 weeks and is working like a charm! I just wish I would have changed it out earlier!
summary: Working great for a month now!

reviewText: Washer was broken and the pump needed to be replaced. Replaced the pump with no luck. Still didn't work. Had to send the product back and get a different one that did work from a home improvement store.
summary: Washer was broken and the pump needed to be replaced ...

reviewText: Got our washer for free so when it broke I wasn't too worried but I fired up the old Youtube and sure enough it looked like an easy fix. Took me about 20 minutes to do the replacement and now the washer works like new.
summary: ... up the old Youtube and sure enough it looked like an easy fix

reviewText: Installed in just a few minutes and works as it should. No leaks. Can't comment on how long it will last, but it looks identical to the factory installed unit it replaced, so hopefully we'll get another 10+ years out of it.
summary: Water goes where it should, not where it shouldn't

reviewText: Good luck, if you're thinking of buying an LG washer. You'll need it. I've had two fail within three years. They only have a one year warranty for the electronics which will fail. So if you like replacing washers on a regular basis, or if you just want to be on a first-name basis with your repairman, go for it.

I've had this product for about a month and so far it's been working great, I've had no issues with it thus far and hope it continues to do so. It's super silent and you can barely hear the motor, and it's also perfect for my studio, it doesn't take up much space at all, I'm happy with is purchase.
summary: ... about a month and so far it's been working great, I've had no issues with it thus far ...

reviewText: Once set up (and it is important to set it up right), it's a perfect little washer. I moved to a small apartment type home and really did not want to have to go to the Laundromat... I was skeptical about it but figure it was worth a try and I am very glad I did.

I've had this washer for about a month and it looks great, works great and is so space-convenient.  I cannot say much about it's durability because I've not had it very long, but so far I'm very pleased with the quality and function.  The metal wash basin looks great. The operation is very quiet. So far I'm not missing a full size washer.

It's a water panel for a humidifier.  Plain and simple.  The humidifier on the other hand is poorly designed and makes the installation much more difficult than it need be.  It is almost impossible to install the water panel without breaking one of the plastic tabs on the water panel frame.
summary: Does what it is supposed to do.  The installation procedure is a different matter.

reviewText: Fixed our drier problem. This is one of the more common causes of the drier's gas burner not coming on (do a google search and you'll see).  Be sure to also get the troubleshooting document that is taped to the inside of the lower cover of the drier (why they don't have it in the manual I have no idea...I didn't discover it till I found out about it in a google search).  This was a 5 minute install not including vacuuming up the lint in the lower areas of the drier.

This axle is better than the one shipped originally with the washer. The old one clips in parallel to the direction of the wheel, so after a certain amount of usage, it keeps falling off as the wheel gets knocked off its tracks. This one clips in perpendicularly to the direction of the wheel, so there is no chance of that happening. I have replaced two of these already.

The igniter was a near-perfect match for the original one -- and I'm really pleased to have "Fire" again in the gas oven!!
[wish it didn't cost so much to have the igniter installed -- but it was a good thing that I didn't try to do that myself...]

I was able to read several reviews about this produce as I was trying to find a fix for the fridge.  Granted it came with more parts than necessary, but the fridge was up and running in a matter of just a few minutes.

I was expecting to receive the "kit" (7 parts in total).  I only received ONE part, which didn't help at all. To make a long story short we ended up having to go to Sears and buying the kit for double the price. We lost out on time, spoiled food, and shipping charges (when we had to return the ONE part for the refund). I do have to say that there was no real hassle when it came to the refund.

Easy solution to a big problem. It would be nice if they offered expedited shipping. Refrigerator stopped working on Friday. Ordered part on Saturday. Received on Thursday. Installed Thursday night. Refrigerator back up and running. Be sure and vacuum or blow away the dust bunnys that accumulate on the condenser tubing.
summary: Easy solution to a big problem. It would be nice if they offered expedited shipping.

reviewText: How about inviting the whole family over for thanksgiving dinner and your oven goes out ? Coincidentally, the appliance parts stores are closed for the holiday. Not to mention, that their price for this item is at least twice as much. So I bought this as a back-up for the holidays.

Installed in just a few minutes. But, read the instructions to identify where to unplug the wiring harness. At first I thought the wiring would not connect but then I realized all I had to do was unplug the harness from the old icemaker and it plugged right into the new icemaker.
summary: Installed in just a few minutes. But, read ...

reviewText: The ignitor worked perfectly!  It comes with an extension bracket if your oven previously had the rectangular ignitor....well, I had a rectangular ignitor originally, but when I replaced it with this one, I didn't even need the extension bracket.  It fit in perfectly sitting in exactly the same spot as the old one was.  I would HIGHLY recommend this product.  It was $25 cheaper than I would have paid for it if I had gone to a parts store near our home!
summary: I would HIGHLY recommend this product!!

reviewText: As luck would have it, my oven went out as the Easter ham was being prepared to put in.  Luckily, we had propane for the grill!  Having had to replace the bake element several years ago, I was able to immediately shop Amazon for what I needed to replace.  I was able to order it from an Amazon seller at half the price if I had purchased it locally.  I am obviously very happy with the bake element - I can bake again! - but I am also very happy to have been able to get it at a great price through Amazon.

After doing some trouble shooting I found that the fuse in my dryer was preventing it from working properly. Finding a guide on disassembling the dryer and accessing the fuse it was a fairly quick and simple fix. With a little bit of time and effort anyone could replace it for mere pennies compared to buying a new dryer or hiring a repair man.

This arrived in around a week after ordering. It wasn't easy getting the fan off the back of the old motor to be able to remove it, but I finally got it.

This has been installed for 5 months now and it has been working great!! I think it is quieter than the old factory motor, but I'm sure that's because it was around 18 years old.
summary: Got this for my Kenmore 70 Dryer 97573220

reviewText: This motor is great!  Not only does the dryer drum spin and tumble the clothes inside, it does it in the correct direction.  It is very stylish and looks great once installed in the dryer.  Unfortunately, once all the panels of the dryer are put back in place you can't see the thing.  Oh well, that one little thing aside it really is a good motor.  It has lasted better than a week now and I expect it to last several more days.

Fell apart in under two months. I received no response back from the seller. Took a closer look at it to see just how flimsy it is compared to the original. I did end up buying an OEM part and all is well now!

This idler is a perfect replacement for a failed idler on a Kenmore portable dryer. It is strong enough to do the job yet flexible enough that does not bend when attaching the new belt.  This is a must buy if you need a new idler for your trusty Kenmore dryer.
summary: Flexible yet strong enough for the job!

reviewText: While this did not directly bolt onto my fridge the way the original did, and it wasn't exactly the same in shape/design, it functions exactly the same way as the original. You just may need to get creative on how it attaches to the frame of your fridge.
summary: Looks different, but functions the same.

reviewText: Used this part to fix a defrosting issue with my Samsung refrigerator. The design flaw resulted in the crisper drawer being flooed with water that was unable to drain. I did some research and found this part had been used to fix what could only be described as a design flaw with the Samsung. It worked perfectly. I have no experience with refrigerators, but I was able to install it in a short time. Saved me hundreds over replacing my relatively new piece of junk Samsung refrigerator.
summary: Great Hack to fix a Samsung

reviewText: In fact, due to a minor design change, this actually fits better than the original part -- it's easier to install.  This comes in a package indicating that it's an original Whirlpool part, which is made in the US.

This water valve is exactly as the picture shows.  It is a direct replacement for single valve Whirlpool or Kenmore refrigerators, and is identical to the one that I replaced on a Whirlpool refrigerator.  If your refrigerator has a water dispenser, then you should get the double water valve (two of these valves combined into a common frame).

This part works great for a refrigerator that only makes ice and does not also have water in the door.  We had to return it for a different one but if you only have an ice maker and not water in the door, this one works great.

My dishwasher started to leak a few months ago. I called a repair man and he wanted to replace the whole thing. I did some research online and discovered that the leak was coming from the heating element being loose. The heating element nuts had cracked. I found these on Amazon and swapped them for the broken ones. Good as new!

It works.  It arrived quickly.  It's relatively easy to install for a do-it-yourselfer.  It's much less expensive than buying at Sears.  My only concern is the durability of the plastic fins that move the water out of the pump. A piece of wire got in the old pump, which also had plastic fins, and it sheared the fins off, making the pump useless.

Found it easy to replace the pump except I did not use the existing spring type hose clamps when I installed the new pump. I used the traditional screw type hose clamps. The job was finished in less than 1/2 an hour.

My dishwasher had a leak so I ordered a pair of these, really hoping that replacing them would fix the problem. I was so happy that it was such a simple fix. I installed the heating element nuts and my dishwasher worked as good as new. It's been a couple of months now and I haven't had any more leaking. These were a perfect fit and were quick and easy to install. Not to mention MUCH cheaper than calling a repairman.

Replaced the Ice Maker in my 12 year old Whirlpool fridge.  Arrived in a Whirlpool parts box.  Easy install.  At first the ice maker was only producing one batch of ice every 8 hours.  Did a little research and learned to fix a slow ice maker, clean out the coils in front/bottom of the fridge or turn down the temperature in the freezer.  I did both.  Ice maker now produces a batch of ice every hour or two.  I've only had it for a few days but it Works great.
summary: Easy install.  Make sure the temperature is cold enough !!!!

reviewText: This was a genuine original manufacturer's replacement part.  It fit perfectly and fixed the problem.  Hopefully it will continue to work for a long time.  If it doesn't I will update my review and lower the rating, but for now it appears to have been a five star purchase.
summary: This was a genuine original manufacturer's replacement part. It ...

reviewText: Bought this to replace an aftermarket brand I installed last year after the OEM unit went down. The "heater" on the aftermarket unit died after about 10 months, so I decided to go back to OEM (the original lasted 10 years). It's worth it if you don't want to be replacing the icemaker every year!
summary: Bought this to replace an aftermarket brand I installed last ...

reviewText: Worked like a champ, thought it was loud, however it is what it is. Probably just as loud as the original. I just never stood around to wait for the drain pump to start. It's been in a couple of weeks and is working like a champ.

I overloaded my washer with a king sized comforter and stripped the agitator gears.  I thought I might have to buy a new washer, but after doing a little research on Amazon and YouTube, I realized I could fix the problem myself and did for less than $12.  A year later, the washer is still doing great.  I think the replacement parts are well made and essentially equivalent to the original parts.  I would highly recommend this gear set.

This heating element is all I could ask for in the product I wanted. The heating element went out in my Kenmore electric dryer and I needed a replacement element. The element arrived in great packaging and worked great for a little while, however a thermostat problem in my dryer caused the element to overheat. This was not the fault of the element, the element worked great as it was supposed to.

This part fit my Kenmore washer perfectly.  If you can not afford a repair man, watch a how to repair video on YouTube and you will have the confidence to fix your washer.  It was easy to replace.  I am a female and I have never fixed a washer and it only took me about 20 minutes to fix. You can do it.

Packaging didn't have Whirlpool (or FSP) logo, just a computer printed label that said Whirlpool with the part number.  I'm not saying it was a knock-off - I'm convinced that it's authentic.  It looked and felt like a genuine Whirlpool part.  Excellent quality, perfect fit, only time will tell about long-term performance, but I installed it with a feeling of confidence that this part will hold up for years.

Amazingly easy and effective fix. Now that I've replaced the dogs it's like I have a new whirlpool. It's amazing people get rid of their washers when all they have to do is literally a 5 min fix, and there are tons of YouTube videos on how to do it.

Instructions weren't included but pretty easy to install. If you can remove your old unit, you can install the new one. It's that easy! Take a look at the tools needed to remove your old ice maker and have them ready to install the new one. It does take at least 24 hours to start making new ice, like other reviewers have stated. Well worth the money. Cheaper to do it yourself and pretty easy.
summary: Easy to install and cheaper than other websites

reviewText: Just as advertised. After watching video on youtube on how to install I ordered the part. Very easy installation and the product worked flawlessly. The switch even got to me faster than I thought it would.

It's a light bulb for my dryer.  It's an expensive, goofy proprietary design that I think is ONLY for dryers and similar appliances.

That being said, it was very easy to install on my model, and has been working for the past 4 months.  I can't fault this bulb, because it does its job.

I bought this product, watched a youtube video and totally fixed my washing machine ALL BY MYSELF. Yes, it made me feel like a rockstar. This is the video I used: [...] and it took me about an hour, but mostly because I cleaned each part out after taking it all apart.
summary: If you want to fix your own washer.

reviewText: Simple easy fix. the original broke because the door hinges need to be replaced, if you are looking to buy this part, take a look at the door hinges and make sure you don't need to replace them too, otherwise this new piece won't last long.
summary: Simple easy fix. the original broke because the door hinges ...

reviewText: GREAT BUY FAST SHIPPPING... THIS IS THE SAME ITEM THAT COSTS 5X WHAT OTHER RETAILERS ARE SELLING AND IS JST AS GOOD.  I HAVE ALREADY INSTALLED IT AND WILL INSTALL ANOTHER ONE SHORTLY.  I WILL BUY AGAIN IF NEEDED. YOU JUST CAN'T BEAT THE PRICE (INCLUDING THE SHIPPING).

My washer was not washing as it should be and the agitator wasn't agitating. I replaced my worn parts with these and my old washer is practically new again. They've been in place for at least a couple of months now and it's still going strong.
summary: My washer was not washing as it should be and ...

reviewText: Bought this to replace the lint filter on a 17-year old Maytag dryer.  The original one started to tear where you constantly poke your finger to start to pull off the lint.  This is much sturdier than the original, so I expect it to last as long as the dryer will, which may not be much longer, but that's fine.  The picture looks like there is a plastic grid behind the mesh, but the one I received did not, which is ok since the mesh is more heavy-duty.

It's great! It came with a tube that was too short, so I just used the one from the old ice maker. Other than that, it works GREAT. I was nervous about ordering it because it was unclear whether or not it'd work with my freezer, but it looked the same as the old one, so I went for it. It was actually pretty easy - really easy - to install, even for a girl.  :)
summary: Looked like the old one so I ordered it...

reviewText: This ice maker works great!  We have had problems with our current Whirlpool ice maker for some time.  It was too expensive to replace it with a Whirlpool part.  When I found this item on Amazon for $36, I decided to give it a try.  It works great and actually makes ice faster than the one that came with ours.  I highly recommend it.

Made the stove look new again.  I have recently purchased two sets of 6-inch and 8-inch burner bowls for my Mother's stove (since I hate to clean up other people's messes).  The clean burners make the stove look new and are very easy to care for as long as they are kept clean.  The stove is around ten years old, so I am thankful parts are still available.  Thanks GE and Amazon!

Our whirlpool refrigerator was a little over 10 years old when the ice maker finally quit.  We often host parties at our house so the ice maker led a hard life.  When the old one quit working, I wanted to make sure we got an OEM replacement unit.  This one was certainly it.  The new ice maker arrived in a whirlpool box and had a few slight design improvements over the old one.  Overall, a very easy installation.  We were back to making ice within two hrs of install.

After hours of troubleshooting my laundry machine I came to the conclusion that the washer dogs were worn. When I received these washer dogs the fit perfectly and now my laundry machine is functioning as it should.
summary: After hours of troubleshooting my laundry machine I came to ...

reviewText: I can't even begin to estimate how much money I've saved over the years doing repairs to my washer, dryer, dishwasher, etc. It's great to be able to get official parts delivered quickly. And thanks to online videos, there are almost always step-by-step instructions to follow that make the repairs even easier. Installing this switch was a breeze.
summary: Easy to install and it works

reviewText: They are a perfect replacement for the ones I had in my Kenmore washing machine.  However, I requested expedited shipping and the item arrived a day later than it told me I was going to get it.  If you need these replaced and you plan to repair the washer on your own, don't plan on doing laundry for a few days to a week.
summary: Perfect replacement for my Kenmore Washer.

reviewText: This is the second icemaker I have installed.  The first one lasted only a few years but at such a low cost and ease of installation, it is a good choice.  This one was a direct replacement.  Pull out the old, put in the new.

Worked like a charm.  No instructions were included, but if you read the reviews you'll find a link to a great instructional video.  I no longer have the patience to do home improvement projects, but this wasn't bad at all.

I was afraid that it was not going to work and that it would take forever to receive. However, it was delivered in less than 2 days and my 15 year old daughter was able to replace it. Yes, that's how easy it was. Our washing machine is back up and running. I gave it a 5 star because as a woman I knew nothing about replacing anything broken on this washing machine.

OK, it took me a long time to actually get around to installing this thing but today was the day.  I was more concerned with the process than I should have been.  After rechecking YouTube and watching an excellent video I got busy and was pleasantly surprised.  This unit is an exact match for the Whirlpool unit that went bad.  It took all of 10 minutes to make the change and the new unit works perfectly.  Don't hesitate to purchase one of these, you'll be totally happy with it.

I read some online message boards and even watch a Youtube video or two before deciding to buy this item. Nine times out of ten if your fridge isn't making ice then its this part that needs to be replaced. It took me about 15 minutes to replace my old unit with this one. It started making ice within an hour.

This product matched the original part exactly, and actually worked better than the original part.  Easy to install(15min).  For me that's great.  I'm not the handiest when it comes to appliance repair.

Fixed my washer from shaking across the floor.  I suspected the springs were wore out, so I changed them first.  That helped but didn't completely fix the problem.  Do yourself a favor and replace the springs and pads at the same time, or at least start with the pads.  It's a little hard to tell how wore your old pads are until you take them off.
summary: First part to look at for fixing shaking washer

reviewText: I replaced my broken gray striker with this one, and it was a perfect fit.  It was very easy to install, too.  I would much rather pay the super low price on Amazon than pay over $40 for Frigidaire to send me the part!  This white striker is exactly the same as the gray one, just a different color.  I ordered the white one because it was less expensive than the gray one on Amazon.
summary: Exactly the same as the gray one

reviewText: It's an older machine so, when the agitator stopped agitating, I was sure it was just time to buy a new one. After a little searching on google, found a number of videos that suggested a simple fix.  Replace these little "dogs" and it's as good as new. They were right. This is a project almost anyone with a few tools can do.
summary: Much cheaper than replacing the whole washing machine!

reviewText: This was exactly the same as the one I had to replace.  I am keeping the old one because I did find out this was not the problem, but since I had this one installed, I am not going back.  After about 3 months, this is still working perfectly.

This replacement icemaker was relatively easy to install.  However, one needs to check the internet for videos on the replacement process.  There are some plastic tabs that lock the icemaker in place and if you don't watch the video, you might not realize where the release points are.  Once installed, the icemaker has worked like a charm.

The appliance repair man was avoided. Our washer was not agitating correctly. A little research on the internet and a youtube video later, made it clear that I could purchase these inexpensive parts to fix our washer. There is nothing more satisfying than being successful with a "do it yourself project". The parts fit perfectly in our Kenmore washer.

I ordered this part due to a broken washer, and because at the "dealership" it was over $40.  I had a friend install it, and the washer works fine again.  It arrived quickly, and is exactly as advertised.  I am very pleased.

I bought this part, it installed in about 2 minutes, and it fits perfectly.  I bought a second one because there is a good chance that this one will break - not because the part is cheap, but because I believe the design is not as robust as it should be.  This is significantly cheaper than the same part from other places.

It was snug at first and I thought there's no way this thing is going to fit but after several uses from the dryer and cleaning the lint trap, it fits better now. I think it just had to be used a couple times to slide in easier.
summary: it fits better now. I think it just had to be ...

reviewText: Fits like a glove, granted it is a tad tight when putting it in or taking it out as someone else has mentioned.  But it does the trick and works like a charm.  For the price, you can't beat it!!  Shipping was more expensive..........................

I ordered this part and just received my order. It was a dishwasher rack. I went onto the companies website to contact them about this, but they do not have phone support, so you have to e-mail your request and wait to hear back. Obviously this is not something that I have a lot of time to deal with, seeing as how I need this part so that I can do laundry. I am very frustrated.

I replaced a Kenmore icemaker that was shot with this one . The only difference was that the original had a selector switch for quick ice. My guess is that this one is hard-wired for quick ice as it started in less than 20 minutes.

4 YEAR OLD ICE MAKER KEPT DRIPPING IN ONE CORNER AND REPLACED FILL VALVE! STILL DRIPPING AND DIDN'T NEED WHOLE KIT ($99.00). THIS IS EXACT REPLACEMENT OF EXISTING ICE MAKER AND TOOK LESS THAN 20 MINUTES TO REPLACE. OLD ONE WAS CORRODING. FOR THE MONEY WOULD REPLACE MORE OFTEN!

Easy to install and fixed my problem. You do have to wait about 12 to 24 hrs for it to start making ice. This is by design. Takes a while for the thermostat to detect that it's cold enough to make ice. Saved a lot of money.

I got this and some high heat adhesive. I put the adhesive on and the dampers were cut to size. I just put them on and then put the grease on and then put the washer back together and my washer doesn't bang around any more.

The ice maker was a perfect replacement for my old ice maker.  It was shipped to me very quickly and was exactly what I expected.  It only took me a few minutes to install.  I'd do business with this company again.

Even though the part number matches exactly, this is a 3-wire switch (2+ground). The one I took out of my Kenmore washer is a 4-wire switch (3+ground). Needless to say, it didn't work. The model number of my washer is 11020872990.
summary: Not for an 80 Series Kenmore washer

reviewText:
I do think this is not necessarily a "true" manufacturer's product, but it is a knock-off that works just like the old.  I did have an issue with the "arm" that tells it to stop making ice, and had to make a bend in it to make it stop earlier, and eliminate ice overflowing the tray.
That being said, it's been in for three weeks, and works like a champ.
summary: Works just like the old one

reviewText: I used this kit to convert our dryer from natural gas to propane. I was a little unsure at first because the new dryer only seemed to need the one jet. After some research, I found out that this is true; I only needed one part from the kit. There was an adjustment built into the dryer to switch between natural gas and propane.
summary: I used this kit to convert our dryer from natural ...

reviewText: Didn't even know there was such a thing as "agitator dogs" until we asked the refrigerator repairman to take a look at the washing machine and he said the "agitator dogs" needed to be replaced.  What a cheap fix!  And we could do it ourselves!

My icemaker didn't work, so I replaced it. But it turned out that there was a slow leak at water inlet solenoid valve. So the ice formed in the tubing and blocked the incoming water from getting into the icemaker when it's time for the valve to fully open. And of course the icemaker didn't get the water to work on. (Now I have a good spare icemaker). I then replaced the solenoid valve (the actual bad part).
I would check the incoming water solenoid valve for slow leak, before buying a new icemaker.
summary: check for slow leak @ water solenoid b4 buying

reviewText: Not exactly the same as original shelf.  Plastic is thinner and more pliable than original shelves and this causes a problem.  The shelf bends and falls off as soon as any pressure or weight is put on it.  It also fits loosely.  I do not recommend this product.  It is unusable.
summary: Looks the same but its not...

reviewText: Not too sure this is a particularly easy do-it-yourself part. I was tempted to try after reading a few of these reviews but I'm glad I found a guy to do it for me for $50. He was a pro and still had a little trouble getting the inside door panel reattached. I was happy to get this part for less than 1/2 of what I could get it for at "retailers".

Fit perfectly. If the new knob just partially slides on, very possibly the metal insert from the old knob is still on the switch stem. If so, just slide off the old metal insert off the stem and the new knob should fully slide on.
summary: Fit perfectly. If the new knob just partially slides ...

reviewText: These agitator dogs fixed my problem on my washing machine and it took a whole ten minutes to install them.  That was great since I never fixed a washing machine before and did not know what I was doing.  A quick video on youtube and I was on my way.  Now my machine is good as new.
summary: That was great since I never fixed a washing machine before and ...

reviewText: Nothing to get excited about but it appears to be comparable to the original one. I was able to install it pretty easily, perhaps 25-30 minutes but I was being very careful. It's been a few weeks and it's working great so far. The old one had deteriorated to the point where it was depositing flakes of material onto the ice cubes.

As has been stated many times already on the reviews for this product, this icemaker will not appear to be working for about 24 hours.  So, just because you don't see any water flowing down or hear any whirring after you install it, don't freak out.  Wait at least a good day or so, then decide if it's working or not.

This product solved the problem I was having with my ice tray overflowing with water.  What's crazy is the difference in price between this product and the OEM.  You'd be crazy not to buy this one (unless you just like spending extra money for no apparent reason).

After doing some research on the Internet, I found out
that these are what would fix my washer agitator problem.
They arrived in a few days, and were easy to install.
Saved myself over $100 for a service call.

This is a great product, however, i did not get the right one.  This is for a fridge that doesn't have a water filter.  That said, it did stop the leak from the water dispenser and it did prevent the water from freezing up in the water dispenser for the ice maker.  Hopefully, they will take back this one.  We'll see...

reviewText: I experienced a product that appeared to be used rather than new.  Electricity would not flow through it and, thus, it lacked the feature of being able to function as a thermostat.  Since I already had a used and broken thermostat that I hoped to replace with a new functional one, the lack of the feature of being able to function as a thermostat made this product unsuitable for the purpose of repairing a dryer.

Repaired by washer's auger for under $2.00 and 10 minutes (first time doing it).  There is a youtube video that shows you how to do it.  Not much more to say, if you are reading this you probably already have a pretty good idea of what you are doing.

reviewText: These are easy to install and work as they are designed to do.  A little more expensive than others, but, if you're in a hurry and want to take advantage of the 2 day free shipping through Prime, this is the way to go.

Pretty sure I was about to have to buy a new dryer to appease my GF, but this repair kit got my dryer back up and running for only a few dollars.  If your dryer is eating clothes or leaving streaks on them, it is time to replace the items that this kit contains.  And it was super easy to follow the instructions to do the repair myself.

My washing machine was making a noise and kind of skipping agitating.  I was about to call the repairman and I decided to go online and see how to remove the agitator myself.  I found a video on YouTube that stated exactly what my machine was doing and what to order to fix it.  These were exactly what I needed to repair my machine.

Cheap fix for an old washer; take the agitator off, put these in, replace the agitator, and you're back in business.  You can even flip the old ones around sometimes to get a bit more use out of them, but these are cheap enough to put in if you're going to take the time to fix the washer anyway.

reviewText: was easy to install and got my washing machine back up and running properly.  It's been running great for a few months now.  Exactly what I needed.  I found directions online and it was pretty easy to install.
summary: got my agitator working again.  just what I needed and has been working great.

reviewText: I was shocked at the low price for these items. My husband repaired the washer in less than 30 minutes for $2.29! Had we called a repairman, it would have cost much, much more. My washer is working just fine now. It would be wonderful if the manufacturers used steel parts but that isn't going to happen.
summary: Excellent price for a repair jub

reviewText: This product is a replacement for my Frigidaire dishwasher.  Easy to install by myself.  Be advised that this part does not come with the new water line adapter.  You may have one that you can use from your old one, but I'd recommend replacing it too.

Exact replacement for our IKEA store-purchased dishwasher. Took a while to figure out which one we needed; the numbers and codes on the old valve itself did not help us, and I had to resort to online manuals and guessing to figure out this one was the correct one for us.

After replacement, the dishwasher actually cleans the dishes properly; most likely the old valve had been barely working for over a year.
summary: Appears to be an exact replacement for our dishwasher, dishwasher is like new again

reviewText: Was looking to replace the thermostat on an older Whirlpool dryer. After having no luck finding an exact replacement for the FPS P/N 3399693 thermostat, I decided to take a chance on the  3977767 thermostat. The new one is a bit smaller than the older one, but it fit just fine. And I'm happy to report it works just fine as well! For less than 8 dollars, I'm hoping to get a few more years out of my dryer.

I was able to get my dishwasher back up and running as soon as I got this part.  Saved me a ton of money being able to repair it myself with this part.  I am not inept at fixing things but by no means am I an expert either!  This was easy to install.  Toughest part was getting my hands underneath appliance to take out old part and put new one in. It's been over a month and it seems to be working just fine!
summary: Just the part I needed fast!

reviewText: I couldn't figure out why my washer wasn't cleaning my clothes until my husband looked at the agitators to see that they were broken. We purchased new agitators and they were very easy to install and my washer works great now.

I'm so happy this was available for our 8 year old dryer, because this was so much cheaper than buying a whole new dryer.  It was easy to install(because my hubby did it, not me) and the dryer is working great again.

reviewText: My washer agitator was on the blink, and I was fortunate enough to find that someone posted a  video on YouTube explaining what the problem could be.  These plastic dogs allow the agitator to rotate in only one direction only allowing the clothes to agitate properly.  I was thinking it would cost me hundreds of dollars to fix my washer, but with a little help from the internet and online shopping I got my washer fixed for less than five dollars!!

I went to a local place and they wanted to charge me $20 for the parts. I told them I can get it online for way cheaper and they went down to $15. Other local repair shops charge $45-$65 for repairing agitators. I fixed it in 10 minutes with the help of my girlfriend. (Her hands were smaller than mine and of course she is great at supervising and telling me how to get it done!)

Too many times we don't bother to fix appliance anymore, we just go out and buy new.  This past winter, I had Cancer and thousands of dollars in medical bills.  My dishwasher broke and the thought of living without one was unbearable.  We did a Google search diagnosed the problem. We purchased this part and repaired it ourselves  and it's worked ever since.  Can't ask for more.
summary: Too many times we don't bother to fix appliance anymore ...

reviewText: Easy installation. This kit comes with everything you need to replace your main motor assembly. No tools needed aside from a screwdriver and a wrench. In about a half hour our dishwasher was ready to go and sounded like a normal dishwasher rather than an angry garbage disposal intent on launching itself into orbit.

Excellent kit for an aging dryer!  This kit will take care of most dryer problems due to age/use.  My brother, who was a appliance repairman, recommended that I also replace the heating element, due to age, even though it had not failed.  I did so, and now, everything is working great. Make sure that it's right for your dryer--will probably only apply to some older dryers.
summary: Excellent kit for an aging dryer

reviewText: Installed this item into my 18 year old Whirlpool, and so far it works just fine. Better than buying a new washer, since I had already replaced the door switch and pump. Installation was easy and depending on the age of your washer, I suggest you buy the coupling and install it along with the motor.
summary: and so far it works just fine. Better than buying a new washer

reviewText: I was amazed at how cheaply I was able to fix my washer.  It's rather sad that the agitation of my washer is dependant on 4 cheap little plastic pieces but I sure was glad to be able to fix it myself for just a few dollars.

This part saved me from paying a hefty repair bill. Bracket was in place in less than 5 minutes. The only hurdle is you have to carefully label the wires on the control board before disconnecting it. I had running water and ice in 30 minutes from start to finish.
summary: Save me from a hefty repair bill

reviewText: My old inlet valve was leaking badly. Bought this one to save some money and to get a little more life out of my dishwasher. The valve angle was slightly different but it fits fine. Saved a lot of time and money buying this here.

My dishwasher died this summer, and this guy was the culprit (well, the old one at least).  It's been running like a charm for several months now.  I probably need a new dishwasher, but this has been a great life-extender.
summary: It's been running like a charm for several months now

reviewText: Worked great and I helped my friend save over $200 by helping him install it.  I have written up a tutorial on the complete replacement of this part and you can find it on my blog at johnfixesstuff.blogspot.com and search for Frigidaire to find the repair.
summary: Perfect fit on Frigidare FDB1502RGCO Dishwasher

reviewText: After doing research on the internet, I discovered this product was needed to solve the problem of my agitator not agitating. This was very easy to replace in only a few minutes and it has continued to work for over a year now.
summary: Very simple solution to agitator problem

reviewText: These agitator dogs fit perfectly in my Kenmore 80 series washer. Installation was relatively simple and saved a load of money by buying these instead of calling a serviceman or replacing the washer. I installed these in my washing machine late last year and they've been working fine without any problems.

These parts are wacky overpriced if you buy them from the manufacturer, so it's great to have a low-priced alternative. They're easy to replace and they fit perfectly. The washer has been working fine for 6 months now, so I'm happy.
summary: Good price, perfect fit. What's not to like?

reviewText: When my washer agitator stopped working properly, I was about to call a repair guy and shell out $100 to get it fixed.  Then I decided to Google the problem and was amazed at how many others had the same issue.  There is even a YouTube video about the problem and how to fix it.  So, I ordered the parts and installed them.  Easy.  It took me longer to place the order than to install the parts.  And...the fix worked.  I am pretty happy about this.
summary: Amazing how easy it was to install this

reviewText: If you want to save money, and who doesn't, purchase this kit.  I also had to replace the bearings.  You need to follow the instructions and have some knowledge of tools to use.  To replace the bearings, the washer must be disassembled.  So if you can read and follow instructions and have mechanical knowledge, order this from Amazon

My Father-in-law has been my best friend for some time, now. When he came to me and asked where we could find this little piece of plastic, I was stumped. I gave Amazon a shot and to my surprise it was there!!! It took us five minutes to replace this piece on his washer. There's just nothing as nice as helping a friend!
summary: I can't believe they had this!

reviewText: Exactly what I wanted to find... I have been searching high and low for this item, and here it is on Amazon.com.  Would never have thought to look here first, but now I know better... you guys have everything!  Thanks.!!

was the exact same size and shape as the one it replaced...these covers tend to get old and crack and discolor after a few years of being exposed to the steam and grease and heat of a stove ...and its nice to actually find the right cover at a good price

although it was a direct match the wiring diagram was different then the original equipment. so not really a direct match. I figured it out. It would be nice if they would show the changes from old to new on the wiring diagram that was also non existent in the package.
summary: It would be nice if they would show the changes from old to ...

reviewText: Super easy installation, and it works perfectly. Had this installed in less than a minute. All you have to do is match up with the old one to figure out which one you need. If you don't have the old one, usually you can look it up online to see which one you will need.

I am so glad that I can buy these separately! We have one burner that we use more than any other on the stove. After the last drip pan cleaning the previous one I had on this burner was deemed unsalvageable. This fits almost perfectly with my other three drip pans and who really pays that much attention to a stove anyways. I will definitely be buying more of these at the end of my lease.

Installation could not have been any easier.  Didn't have to disconnect anything from the dishwasher other than unplugging the power.  Tilted the machine against the wall and worked on my back with a flashlight to remove the two screws and swapping out the old with the new.  Took less than 10 minutes and now the washer works great.  Prior to the fix my washer was not going into the spin cycle along with some weird noise.

The door to my old gas dryer kept popping open, causing the dryer to stop. Discovered the latch was broken. This was a cheap and easy way to repair it. Took maybe five minutes. We're back to having a working dryer again!

Worked great. I love that it had multiple options for spring tension etc. Hate that it is a little wasteful of resources... whichever spring tension you end up choosing... you will end up throwing out 75% of this product. But it definitely was easy to install... took less than a minute and fixed the problem we were having with the dryer door not closing.

A perfect match for the bellows on my washer! It wasn't the easiest thing in the world to install, but we got it, and now no more leaks. I've learned my lesson - make sure there is nothing in the door before you close it and start the washer! That's why the old one tore, sigh.

My dryer wouldn't stay closed and I looked for a latch that would fit. I found this one and decided to go for it. It was a great choice. It was easy to install and I didn't have to take many parts off my dryer. Now I don't have to place things against my dryer door to keep it closed.

I used this wax motor to repair my Maytag Neptune 4000 series washer.  It came with excellent instructions on how to replace the original wax motor, and it was quick and easy to do.  I also had a scorched resistor on the circuit board that I had to replace, and there are plenty of sources on the internet for the resistor specs.  I saved  hundreds of dollars doing the repair myself.
summary: Just what my Neptune washer needed

reviewText: This bellows kit came with everything needed to fix my washer and change out the old bellows kit.  It does not come with instructions.  It is meant for those that know what they are doing.  Do NOT expect this to be an easy job.  It took 3 of us to figure it out and we watched a YouTube video to get us through.  Next time, I'm calling an expert to do the work.  I'll buy the bellows kit here though.  Very reasonably priced and excellent shipping.

COULD NOT BUY JUST THE WAX MOTOR FOR MY DISHWASHER SO I BOUGHT THIS ONE AND MODIFIED IT TO WORK.  I HAD TO CUT THE SHAFT OFF JUST AT THE TIP OF THE FLARE THEN FILE IT FLAT LIKE THE ONE THAT WAS ON MY DISHWASHER.  WORKED GREAT.

Our washing machine was not operating properly and I was getting chewed out because of it. Did a bit of research on youtube and several folks recommended this part. I installed it in just a few minutes and it worked like a charm. The washer functions properly now and the wife is happy so I am happy!

After using off-brand drip pans for several years, I decided to use the pans that were intended for the stove.  Now the burners lock in place and sit perfectly flat on the stove.  Heavy duty quality chromed pans; worth every penny and then some.  Recommend highly.

This saved me so much money because I was able to make the repair myself. It worked PERFECTLY and the parts were much sturdier than the originals. Make sure you watch the following video if you use this kit: [...] . It isn't that hard to do, but the printed instructions are a little difficult to follow because the pictures are poor quality. The video helps discern what you should be doing.

Buying this part was worth it as it helped to prevent me from having to buy a whole new washing machine. It arrived on time and installed relatively easily. It has been in use for a few months and has held up well with no issues.
One thing I would suggest, is that you get the wrench made to remove and install these. I tried unsuccessfully to remove the old one with the tools I had. I finally gave in and bought the wrench and 2 minutes after it arrived I had the old nut off and the new one on.

Finally, I can once again see how much ice and water I'm putting in my cup when I wake up parched in the middle of the night. This is OEM-quality and I hope it lasts awhile. I wish there was an LED equivalent but perhaps I didn't look hard enough.

This actuator was a direct replacement for the one in my washer. My washer didn't want to go into spin mode automatically, which resulted in moving the selector to spin manually. After replacing this component, all worked as designed.

Fixed my dishwasher, which did not turn on and also had water at the bottom.  Took about 15 minutes to install.  MAKE SURE and replace the wiring as well (included in this package) and not just the fuse and the wiring usually goes bad along with the bad fuse.  GREAT PRICE!

It was exactly the same as the one I just put away.  It is brand-new and works marvelously.  It is silent.  There is no leakage at all.  It remains dry.  The seals perform very well.  I really appreciate this item.  Very easy to install.  My dishwasher is new again.

I was going to buy a new washing machine but decided to try this first.  It worked perfectly.  That was a couple weeks ago.  I forgot about it.  It still works perfect and probably will for a few years.

I CAN CLOSE MY DRYER DOOR NOW WITHOUT DUCT TAPE. FOR SOME REASON THE CATCH FOR THE DRYER DOOR CAME OUT AND DISAPPEARED. MY WORLD IS SO MUCH BETTER , I DON,T HAVE TO STAND THERE TO MAKE SURE TAPE STAYS ON .  LOL

This is a genuine original manufacturer part.  It's the same as the original except it has slightly more power than the original.  I purchased it because my water pipes were making a surging sound when the washer was filling, and apparently this valve was oscillating.  The part fits perfectly, the surging sound is gone, and the washer fills somewhat faster.
summary: Eliminates that Surging Sound in Your Water Pipes

reviewText: Arrived on Sunday!  Perfect day for a yucky project! Got this installed with help from the Internet,  and we're back in business. By the way, washers are dirty disgusting things. I recommend being prepared with vinegar and bleach and various scrubbing and scraping tools. Because when you pull the agitator off, you're going to want to barf, and your going to have to clean the part the agitator fits onto before putting it back together.

If you are looking to replace your dryer starter because you believe your old starter is broken.(Like, I realized my starter broken because my dryer kept turning off every 2-3 seconds after I started it). This is the new dryer starter for you. It took 3 days or so for it to get to me but, I was fine waiting. This starter looked the same as my old starter and it works. No problems here.

If your GE washer agitator is not moving, this is the part you need!  It is modified from the original version, but fits perfectly.  I bought a new agitator to go with it, only because I wanted a new one for my almost 10 year old washer.  You don't necessarily need one.
summary: Cheap fix for an agitating problem

reviewText: I have had the washer and dryer since 2004.  My roommate (male) started washing our clothes.  Off goes the knobs on the dryer.  I searched high and low to find them, and to my amazement, I found them on Amazon.com.  Even then, I had to check to see if I was ordering the right knobs.  I did check the reviews that mentioned there were two types.  I went with my gut, got the right ones, and I am extremely happy.  Though I wish Amazon had listed the two types separately.

This little part was easy to install and exactly what I needed to fix my washing machine. My husband was all ready to go out and buy a new one, but I asked him to wait until I got this part in and installed it. Voila! I am a washing machine repair woman! He was so impressed and I saved us a ton of money.

Just what I needed to fix my Whirlpool Duet dryer. The old heating element had a break in the coil so it wasn't heating up when the dryer was run, this part solved that problem perfectly. To diagnose the problem I used a multimeter to test for continuity on heating element and the thermostats. This is the simplest way to determine the cause of the heating element not working. If you're not familiar with using one there are plenty of good videos on YouTube that will show you how to run this simple test.
summary: Simple fix for a cold dryer

reviewText:
We needed a knob to replace a knob that had broken off on our Frigidaire dryer. This was the exact knob that broke, so when it arrived, we put it on the dryer and it worked exactly as advertised.

I don't really know what else to say about it.
summary: Worked Just Like Our Old Knob!

reviewText: I snapped off my old part, and ordered this replacement right away.  It was a perfect replacement for my old broken part and seems to be holding up nicely.  These things are plastic so don't over tighten them... That's what led to this in the first place.  While it arrived soon, I wish I could have picked it up from the shipping facility it originated from...only a couple miles away.

These drip pans were the perfect fit for my GE Spectra. I had a hard time finding some that would fit that weren't ridiculously expensive. I bought two of these large pans and the elements to go with them for the price of one element in the local appliance dealer! More than satisfied. When the time comes...I'll be buying two of the smaller drip pans from here as well.

I noticed that the bottom of my dishwasher was all lopsided and that this piece was broken. I originally thought that I was going to have to buy a new dishwasher. So, I bought this replacement and it is perfect.

I bought this grate after watching a video on YouTube about how to make a rocket stove out of a 1 gallon paint can, 2 tin cans and some sand. This grate fits on top of the paint can like it was made for it.
I expect the tin cans I'm using to make the stove will rust over time, and maybe the paint can will as well, but I have no doubt that this grate will be doing its job for years to come. Super solid. Highly recommended, don't hesitate to purchase.
summary: If you've seen the "how to make a rocket stove out of a paint can" video on YouTube, then this is what you need!

reviewText: The original Whirlpool knob is made of Bakelite which is a really brittle plastic and shatters eventually. This one is aftermarket but is made out of cast metal which is not going to break. It's not quite as pretty as the original but no one's going to care.

There really isn't too much to tell about this bake element.
It's clearly a baking element for an oven.
It was fairly easy to install, and the most important part is that my oven now heats up, allows me to bake things, and thanks to the proper heating, doesn't ruin breads, cakes, meats, and other baked items.
summary: It was fairly easy to install

reviewText: Fixed my whirlpool. The place next door that repairs appliances didn't have these in stock?!  I couldn't believe it. I don't think they knew what they were by the response I got when I asked them if they had a few to spare. My brother has fixed our washers and dryers for as long as I can remember. He always told me to never buy electronic versions because they will break and you'll just have to buy another appliance.

This OEM part is a perfect match to the original!  Whirlpool has improved the original all plastic part so that the threaded portion of this one is metal, with only the outside cap being plastic.  It will not be susceptible to breakage.

A great OEM part, a great price, and a great seller!  It arrived one day early!  I highly recommend the part and the seller!

For the price,I was expecting a less quality knob, but this knob is better than the original part. This knob has a metal core instead of plastic. If the original knob had been built like this,I probably would have never needed to order this one. GREAT JOB!!

This worked very well to fix my washing machine.  My husband recently fixed it when it was trying to run all over the room when it spun.  He was able to get a kit to fix the problem but needed the proper adhesive to finish fixing the problem.  Everything is working as it should and has for a few weeks.
summary: Great glue when you need a high temperature adhesive.

reviewText: Replaced the existing rollers (with wheels) on my dishwasher. This part is better designed than the original. This part will securely connect to the basket - which is something the original part did not do well. Highly recommended.

My Whirlpool Agitator stopped spinning. Did a google search on what the problem could be and was happy to find out that this could be something very easy to fix. Found plenty of video instructions on Youtube and got to work. Works great again, very easy fix.

It either works or it doesn't work...  It worked so will rate it 5 stars.  It was easy to install.  Repairs are not my thing and I was able to install this.  Not only does the washing machine work, but I was the one that fixed it...I feel accomplished!  5 stars!

You know, you really don't realize how much a P.I.T.A. not having a light in your dryer is until you finally put a new bulb in. If your bulb is burned out, replace it; it only take a little bit of time and makes finding everything in the dryer much easier.
summary: You know, you really don't realize how much a ...

reviewText: It is a light bulb. It fits in my Whirlpool Dryer. It lights up the dryer. It makes it so I can see what is in the dryer. What more can I say? If it lasts like the one that came in the dryer, I plan for 4 year or more lifespan.

It was exactly what I needed and it wasn't hard to install. I just followed a step by step video on YouTube. I did, however, need to buy a special kind of wrench but it wasn't very expensive.

Installing this fixed my washer--so now I have no need to buy a new one, which is good, because they cost a lot of money.
summary: Exactly what I needed to fix my washer

reviewText: Finally, an appliance repair where everything went according to plan. We watched a couple of detailed youtube videos that showed us exactly what to do, and we rented a special tool to remove and reset the pulley. A $100 fix keeps us from having to spend $1200 to replace the washer. We took a gamble that we could fix it ourselves and it paid off! No more racket, no more puddles and no surprises.
summary: Quiet and Dry, with no surprises

reviewText: I don't even know what type of whirlpool dishwasher I have. I tried looking up various types online and never came across it. I bought this based on appearance hoping it would fit and it does. It fits and looks exactly like my original dispenser cover.

Bought these for an old oven I replaced but returned them because I ended up getting a new oven but I opened the box and saw what they looked like. They were a perfect match for my old oven and it's a shame I had to return them but I like my newer oven better. They look good so buy the ones I sent back because they were flawless.

Hooked up and worked beautifully.  We bought a house with a washer and dryer in the basement, both were high-end units, but the washing machine was leaking and could only be used near a floor drain.  I was able to replace the pump and give both machines to a tenant who's washer had died.

This fits perfectly in my dishwasher I was worried it might not fit but it's perfect! I purchased this quite a long time ago and it has held up better than the original one that came with the dishwasher.
summary: ... I was worried it might not fit but it's perfect! I purchased this quite a long time ago ...

reviewText: This burner is not exactly like the OEM version. The gas mixture tube is different and the starter electrode does not work half of the time. I am not sure if it is a combination of the two, or, it is a poor design on the starter electrode. Shape and size seem to be the same as OEM, but beware there are slight and important differences. It is too late to return this item now, but it should be replaced as a FIELD failure.
summary: One of these things is not like the other .......

reviewText: We thought we were going to have to replace our dishwasher because of water leaking.  The new door gasket did the trick....we have a very tight seal and no more water leaking.  A lot cheaper than a new dishwasher.
summary: We thought we were going to have to replace our ...

reviewText: Fixed my rather expensive washer for less than $75. Although I should not have had to do this on a 6 year old washer that cost $1000.00. It is obvious that the original seal was a substandard design. If I get another 6 years, I will be happy.
summary: Exactly what I needed at a good price.

reviewText: I tried buying this part at stores in my area. The price was outrageous! One store wanted $30! Most were over $20. Purchased this part at Amazon for a fraction of the cost. It arrived quickly and worked perfectly.

Perfect. This kit is easy to install.

My only criticism is that the instructions that come with it appear to be a copy of a copy of a copy of a copy and the images are useless. I ended up just googling something about installing a frigidare dryer kit, and there was a video of how to install it.

Even though I am critical of the instructions, I'm still giving it 5 stars because the parts are just like the original parts. Installation was simple. And this prolonged the life of my dryer by many years.
summary: This will prolong the life of my dryer by years.

reviewText:
If you're reading this, you probably have experienced the pain of discovering this little item in the bottom of your dishwasher, melted just enough not to work anymore. You will also experience the pain of paying a hefty fee for a new one.

I've had to buy a few of these for my dishwasher. This one is just as good as others I've bought and about 1/2 the price of the ones from Sears, especially if you have Amazon Prime. For that, I give it 5 stars!
summary: Costly little thing but what can you do???

reviewText: Easy to install, everything fit like it was supposed to.  It's too bad the dryer was such a piece of junk that this wasn't enough to save it.  The product itself is first rate, though.  Don't blame it for the dryer's poor design.
summary: Good product, but it didn't save the dryer.  Not its fault, though

reviewText: I had a leak on my dishwasher door about 1/4 of the way up on the left side. I did a quick web search and people said to replace the door gasket. I ordered this one and it didn't disappoint. The old gasket was easy to remove and this one just goes in the same place. It's that simple. I've had it in for about a month now, and no leaks!

bought this part b/c of the original fell off and melted and wasn't holding a seal. Been using this part for about a year now and it holds a seal and it helps that it doesn't come loose so it could fall off. This was exactly what we needed and it works great.

We had been struggling with an old filter which had been falling apart for a long time.  We have not had a lot of success ordering parts online but the old filter was so bad we had to do something so we ordered.  The filter fits perfectly and it is so nice to know that when do the laundry we no longer have to struggle with the old filter!

It is a crudely molded piece of plastic, would be good if you did not have to look at it but it is the handle and you will see it every time you use it.  Nothing compared to the original part. Do not know how long it will last. The price should be no more than $3.00 for what it is. Broke after six weeks do not buy this junk.

My washer was leaking water and sounding like "The Perfect Storm" was happening when it ran.  I bought this kit and installed it on my washer.  Not too difficult at all.  Now my washer is leak free, smooth and quiet like it was when it was new.  Saved me from having to buy a new washer.  Great deal!!!
summary: My washer runs like new again!!!

reviewText: This item was purchased to replace a dryer handle that snapped off in my hand while opening the dryer. Replacement took five minutes. It fit perfectly and looks just like the original handle. The only tool needed was a phillips screwdriver.

I bought a dryer second hand.  I worked but it didn't have a door handle.  The repair guy said it would cost me $30. But then I saw this part and realized I could do it myself for much less.  It fit perfectly.  It was simple and quick to install. Thank you so much.
summary: I bought a dryer second hand. I worked but ...

reviewText: The OEM part (from the manufacturer) was $60 ... this generic one (from Electrolux) was $7.  Works perfectly ... it's white instead of black (like the original), but other than that, it's exactly the same.  Why pay more? Do yourself and your wallet a favor and save yourself $50.
summary: Perfect replacement part - don't waste your money on OEM part
