reviewText: This was a perfect fit for my Kenmore dryer whose handle was broken. Installation was piece of cake. There are step by step instructions online and having seen those, I didn't even have to read the instructions included in the item. It was a genuine Kenmore handle and I can't ask for anything better.

I view a YouTube video on how to install the dryer handle.  It took me 15 minutes to complete the installation.  After three weeks of use the dryer handle is very durable.  Great replacement for my old handle that broke.

I can't believe how long I put up with my unstable dishwasher rack! I finally decided to do the research and see what I needed to try to fix it. I was shocked at how little was needed! It took me longer to locate my screwdriver than to actually install these things. Twenty minutes later I had a dishwasher rack that didn't fall off!! Works great!

The item was exactly as described and I received it before the Estimated Delivery Date.  The directions were a little hard to read but once I began to remove the old ice maker everything fell into place.  The ice maker works perfectly.  I am very happy, not only with the product, but also how quickly the company processed and shipped the item.

I needed to replace the original ice maker because water was leaking from the bottom into the ice bind.  The replacement fit perfectly and was very easy to install.  I found the bar that automatically shuts off the ice maker when the bind is full to be too short and allowed ice to overflow the bind.  I replaced it with the bar from the original ice maker and now it works perfectly.
summary: The replacement fit perfectly and was very easy to install

reviewText: The perfect replacement for my frig. Takes about 5 minutes to install. It comes with a new wiring harness, but I didn't need it, I just plugged it up to the one existing in the frig and it works perfectly. Its an exact replacement of the one I had that lasted 14 years.
summary: The perfect replacement for my frig

reviewText: Super! Having taken the old one out (two days before), it was simple to install the replacement. Be forewarned that you need to hang onto your old one so that you'll have a couple of pieces that the new one doesn't come with.  If it's the correct one for your refrigerator, get it!  You surely don't need to spend the money it'd cost for a repairman to do the job.

This was the perfect replacement for my old ice maker. The installation was quick and easy. There were two parts needed off the old unit to complete the change over. Within an hour of installation, the new unit was making ice. I am very happy and satisfied with the new unit. There are no instructions with the new unit, but as you remove the old unit you will learn everything necessary to accomplish the replacement.

The ice maker came with everything I needed, new cables that are plug and play, took me about 5 minutes to install the unit.  At first I thought it wasn't working because nothing happened, but then in 5 or 10 minutes the tray filled with water, and a while later the ice was ready.

At first I thought it was not working, but after an hour or two it worked as expected,  I guess it had to go through a time cycle or get to a lower temperature.  After a couple of weeks it's still going well.

Bought this for Christmas and my daughter just loves it. She chose the jaguar for a school project and her twin sister chose a bobcat. I thought it would be fun to get them the animals they learned about and I was right. It's cute and cuddly!

I bought this for my 2 year old grand daughter and she loves it. It was easily assembled, took about 15 minutes,  and she has had hours and hours of fun with it. She figured out how it all works and is the perfect size for her.

This is a nice size bag with enough room for two handguns in cases and two sets of ear muffs, as well as smaller items.  The zipper on the top takes a bit getting used to, but overall this is an excellent range bag.
summary: This is a nice size bag with enough room for two handguns in ...

reviewText: Definitely met my expectations. This background was awesome. Definitely worth the money!! It made the surprise party a hit. I was so excited and the guest of honor was taken away by how nice this background was.

Excellent product. I am extremely impressed with the initial presentation and  even more impressed when I opened the container. These are very well made. There is no odor. I gave one to my cockatoo to see how long it would last under extreme conditions. He was unable to get the moving bead off, and he is an expert at that. I would highly recommend this for  the perfect baby shower gift.

So cute! Bought this for my niece for Christmas. She loves jewelry and I thought she'd have fun making her own princess jewelry. It's all wood painted jewelry. Comes with everything to make necklaces or bracelets.
summary: Cute little wooden jewelry craft kit.....

reviewText: This was purchased as a birthday gift for a 7 year old child. She immediately opened the box, and began to make bracelets with her friends right at the party! The beads, cords, etc. were all of good quality, and the girls had fun putting these together with each other. Great purchase!

These are great! My girls have had a lot of fun making necklaces for the whole family, then taking them apart and remaking new ones. It's a great craft for fine motor skills and the beads and amulets are so cute!

Upon receipt I was thinking this bag was too small. Nope, that is not the case at all. Fits a whole slew of gear for a decent day at the range. Well thought-out design and it appears that durability will not be a problem either. Highly recommended bag.

My two-year old absolutely love her backpack. She thinks it's the same backpack that Dora the Explorer uses. She takes her Leap Pad backpack everywhere. It is big enough to fit the LeapPad, headphones, charger, and even a few other small toys. Perfect for trips, car rides, appointments, etc. We don't leave home without it.
summary: My two-year old absolutely love her backpack

reviewText: We have been playing with this table for 3 years and the kids are still excited when I fill it with water.  We now use water on both sides which the kids find more fun.  The kids like all the toys that came with the table.  This is one of the few toys that have kept my kids attention and lasted without issue for three years!  I would give it 6 stars if I could!

I purchased these frames for friends who love and own beagles; one was for a friend who's beloved beagle had just been put down. The frames worked well as both a tribute to and a memorial for, beautifully detailed and lifelike replicas of the breed. If I had a beagle, I would love one for myself!

To be honest, my friend and I were skeptical about this toy until her 9 month old granddaughter began playing with it joyfully. We soon joined in the fun. I'm looking forward to buying this toy for my Granddaughter #4 who is due in April. I'm confident that she'll love it as well and so will her young cousins.

I bought this for my 4 year old, and he is proud to be able to play a card game with me. He has a good grasp on the object of the game, and frequently wins the little cats, which pleases him to no end. The quality of the cards and cats is good.
summary: Great gift for my 4 year old son.

reviewText:
This table is supposed to be able to accommodate 50lbs of sand; however, the legs are NOT strong enough to support that. It did not take long at all for the legs on the sand side of the table to start buckling. Now, they are so bad that the slightest bump can collapse the table. This is a major problem, seeing as how it could fall on a child and could injure them.

This product would also be a lot better if there were a cover for both sides, not just the sand.

Bought this toy for my 2-year old daughter, who loves the cartoon.  Both the motorcycle and the cartoon character (Gil) have a small wheel underneath, so the child can easily roll either one on a flat surface (e.g., a table).  My child loves the toy.

be ready to hear a lot of "wow what are those things" "dang look at that kid" "that is so f*cking cool" "the middle of that kid's skateboard is missing" "woah is that a ripstick?" "did you make those?" Everybody wants to talk about them and try them.  If you don't have a good pair of headphones you will never be able to get any where without having to have the same conversation with everybody who has never seen these before.
summary: If you don't have a good pair of headphones you will never be able to ...

reviewText: I love this bag. I always look at the reviews before buying anything online & there were nothing but great reviews on it. When it arrived, I wasn't disappointed & found that everything I needed to carry had a perfect place & there was plenty of room for everything anyone should need. I recommend this bag to everyone.
summary: Great shooter's bag at a great price!

reviewText: Very nice range bag,  I have taken it to the shooting range quite a few times and it's very convenient.  A little on the small side but still has enough pockets to be a great casual shooters range bag.

I was more than pleased with this bear!  It's the cutest bear with such a sweet face and interesting coloring.  It is soft and dangles, not stiff.  It's the perfect size for a child to tote around or to snuggle with.  The package, with the bear and one other item, came sooner than I expected.

Wanted to get a case that held my kids Leappad 2's and more than 5 games. So I got this hoping that it would fit not only the Leappad but also the 10 game cartridge holder (found on Leapfrog's web site) and it does! Not only that but it will also fit headphones if you use those. We like it a lot. Definitely worth it to us.

They were delivered in great shape. My grandson was very happy to get extra refills. The gun only jammed once when he put something in he shouldn't have. Got it fixed and had a great time the rest of the day. Let's hope he learned his lesson.

Oh No! Hairball really works with my 3 cats, especially with Mollie, the 12 year old.  Her stool was small and hard but with Oh No! Hairball, they are softer and plump.  It's also lessened the number of hairballs with all 3.  The product appears to have disappeared from store shelves which was distressing until I found it on Amazon.com.  Roo, Mouse, and Mollie give it a thumbs up!
summary: Oh No! Hairball - A God Send

reviewText: Our long haired cat seems to really enjoy these every day and it greatly reduces her hairball issues.  She'll still have a few problems now and then, but it's not as bad as it was.  The short haired cat, who doesn't like treats, also likes these so they must taste pretty good.  Also, I got a set and they came in the grocery store display box, which I'm sure the cats really appreciate.
summary: Our cats love them and they work pretty well

reviewText: My cat has heart disease and needs to take three medications (pills) twice a day. I stuff the pills into a treat and she gobbles it down with no problem. I've also used the pill pockets to give her the meds but the pill pockets are too large and she has trouble eating one of them unless she chomps it into pieces. When she does that the pills fall out. The Friskies treats are smaller and she has no problem gobbling it down.

I bought these for my 8 month old granddaughter and she loves them. Whether they are connected to make a chain or individually, they are one of her favorite toys. She likes to shake them to hear the clacking noise as well as crawl around with them in her mouth. I would buy them again.

My mom is in love with this Pomeranian. She loves Pomeranian's and when I saw this, I knew I had to get it for her. It looks exactly like a real Pomeranian and it stands up tall on its four legs. Highly recommended!

I have always loved care bears growing up. I bought this for my 2 year old niece and she loves it too. She carries it everywhere she goes. It most certainly put a smile on her face. I couldn't ask for more.

So cute and reasonably priced. Perfect for my daughter's engagement party cake topper. We live at the beach and her fiance is a surfer. They will love the cake! Many cake toppers are very expensive. This will be just right for the occasion.

I bought this for my step mother, who has Alzheimer's and is in a rest home. I bought this for her to hold and pet throughout the day and that's exactly what she does. She loves it. It looks like a real dog.

Though not made by Nintendo, and though it looks a little different, this third-party Wii remote works just as well for typical use.  It does not have the Motion Plus built in, and the wrist strap fastener is slide-only, not slide-and-lock like Nintendo makes.  Otherwise, I've had no problems using it.  It syncs easily, connects every time, and works the same as my remotes made by Nintendo.

My cats love these so much, they beg for them, and it keeps them regular, so to speak. The price is fair, and they do what they're supposed to do. Plus, I love the autoship, so I don't have to run out and buy them constantly. My kitties love that part, too.

My cat loves the Whiskas hairball treats but won't eat these. After 2 full days of these treats being the only food available to her she still wouldn't eat them. It's back to Whiskas for us! After trying them on our other cat she vomited them up.
summary: She won't touch them with a 10 foot pole.

reviewText: I love Pomeranians but cannot afford to own a pet, so last Christmas my boyfriend gave me this plush one. I LOVE it. It even comes with me on trips. Needless to say, it is adorable as well as very durable. I've never washed it and it still looks like new.
summary: Best stuffed animal I've ever had

reviewText: Friskies Hairball Remedy is now impossible to find in local stores in the San Francisco Bay area. I was happy to find it on Amazon. It works for my cat. It is the only hairball remedy we have found on the market that my cat will eat and she loves it. It is the only one that she will hold in her stomach without heaving it out.

This is a very plush, soft doll. It does not have the hard face or head which I have found to be uncomfortable as a cuddly doll for little girls. My granddaughter was immediately attracted to it. A great success for a gift to a two year old!

I am very pleased with this toy.  Looks just like a real Pomeranian.  You can even carry it around in your purse with its cute face sticking out, if you are so inclined to do so.  If you are shopping for a Pomeranian plush dog, I highly recommend this one.  I think I'll name mine Chester, after that cute red Pomeranian that was in the Nanny TV series years ago.

this arrived very quickly and was exactly what we were expecting. we used it as a cake topper for our Costa Rica wedding even though it's really a salt & pepper shaker. no one was the wiser and it was so cute and got lots of compliments!

My cat gets sick from crunchy treats but gets hairballs if we don't give him anything.  It seems that I can no longer find these particular treats in stores, so I'm glad they have them here.  They are reasonably priced and it's great that they can be delivered with Amazon Prime.
summary: The only treats my cat can eat

reviewText: I purchased the Zoobles at the suggestion of my daughter-in-law, & they are so cute.  My granddaughter loves them & plays with them in and out of the bath.  My daughter-in-law also enjoys playing with them with her daughter.  Very satisfied with the purchase and delivery service.

I purchased this pomeranian because it looked just like my pomeranian.  It was even better than the picture.  I absolutely love it because it is marked up just like my Chipper.  So when (God Forbid) I lose my Chipper I will always have this adorable plush pamy pomeranian to hold dear to my heart.

I didn't know that I was supposed to remove the racks before I cleaned my oven. Well it didn't take long to know what a mistake I had made. Hardly anything would slide on the racks after that. I am so glad I finally ordered this new one. It fit like it is supposed to and now things slide in and out like they are supposed to. Why did I not bite the bullet and order one a long timer ago?????? Great product and price.

Was very easy to install. Had to use the existing wiring harness, those that are supplied would not work. In fairness, the instructions suggest that you use the existing harness if it is okay. But, if you have a problem with your existing harness, note that the ones that are supplied with this unit might not work.
summary: Happy with the replacement, easy to install, clear instructions.

reviewText: Purchased for the griddle on my viking range,  Had to install my own spade connectors to make it work but saved about $60.  Works great on a viking range griddle ignitor.  Just needs a few tweaks to make it work.
summary: Works great on a viking range griddle ignitor

reviewText: This part saved us $2800 for a new washer and dryer.  We've had this set for 15 years with no problems and every single person I've spoken with about new washers and dryers complains that they don't last more than 5 or 6 years.  If you've got an old one that works like this one-- keep replacing the parts!!!!!!!

Okay, my dryer ( a Maytag) wasn't super easy to take apart. And the original motor wasn't super easy to take out. I had to pretty much knock my dryer wheel out from the back in order to get the whole assembly out. However, getting this motor in was super easy. I didn't have to rewire anything, and it worked like a charm. Since the original motor went out I have been using this one for almost a year with zero issues.
summary: my dryer ( a Maytag) wasn't super easy to take apart

reviewText: Our old dryer motor died a high-pitched squealing death, so I got this as a replacement. I watched a couple tutorial videos online and replaced the motor in no time. Dryers aren't complicated - don't be afraid. Just get in there and fix it yourself. I saved a ton of money by not hiring someone else to do it and by not buying a new dryer.
summary: Our old dryer motor died a high-pitched squealing death, ...

reviewText: What a simple, easy, accurate thermometer.  You can't beat the price.  The display is easy to read, big, bold, black digital display.  This is my second thermometer replacing the first one after about 4 years.  Again, you can't beat the price.

It is now the beginning of February and this ice maker decided to stop working. I purchased this in late September. So if you are going to purchase this,  buy an extended warranty or don't expect it to work for long.

I'm an avid ice user and I've been using this machine for over a year on a daily basis, with no problems. I haven't read any other reviews but I can't imagine what went wrong, because mine runs like a champ and never gives me any problems. Sometimes the ice comes out in a big block, and cleaning it is a pain, but otherwise it makes crystal clear ice cubes all day, and night, long. Love it!

Worst product ever! It started leaking as soon as I filled the water tank for the first time. Made quite a mess!
The company is apparently aware of the issue and does nothing to fix it by redesigning whatever part is malfunctioning. I am returning it and getting my money back.

Never has worked properly for more than 24 hours at a stretch.  As far as I can tell it is a substandard pump which causes the problem ... using it to keep ice on my knee postoperatively has been an endlessly frustrating and infuriating experience.  Can't believe I paid more for this machine thinking it would therefore be better.  It's absolutely not worth the price.

I received this to review about four months ago and I am in love with it. It's one of those products that I would have never thought I needed, yet now that I have it, I have no idea how I survived without it. My boys drink more water because they like adding ice cubes, I can always whip up a margarita or a smoothie when I want to, and I don't have to deal with annoying freezer trays or clumped up ice from the store. By far one of the most used appliances in my house!
summary: Perfect for Summer and Works Great

reviewText: Did my research and got the right part for the job. It's just a little plastic disc but with this and some other parts, my washing machine's upper agitator is now fully repaired and works great. I wish there was something more exciting about this item but...I do think it's pretty exciting to fix your washing machine for less than $20 from start to finish. Of all the other plastic washers for washers out there, maybe this one is the best. Why not.
summary: It's a washer for a washer.

reviewText: This is a direct replacement part for Whirlpool and other dishwashers. It is quite easy to install especially if you pay careful attention as to how the old arm was installed. Otherwise, YouTube has a number of videos that illustrates the installation process.

This spray arm (together with the 8539324 rack mount, also available on Amazon) was a perfect replacement for the spray arm in our older Kenmore dishwasher, which had become clogged with soap and eventually broke while disassembling it for cleaning.  Installation was easy to figure out despite the lack of instructions.  Just make sure to get the rack mount as well.

I needed new burner pans for an older model Jenn Air stove.  These fit perfectly, the price was reasonable, and I'm glad I purchased them.  The burner pans available in most kitchen sections of local stores do not fit in the Jenn Air.  It's a pain when you must go to a specialty store to order them.  I am so glad to know that I can get them at Amazon, Prime Shipping, and they are perfect for the stove!

I've been using these bags for 26 years for my trash compactor, and they are the perfect size and strength.  But the store where I originally purchased them went out of business.  After that, I had a difficult time finding them, but now I can get them on Amazon - easy and quick!
summary: and they are the perfect size and strength

reviewText: This is a genuine Whirlpool part.  It appears to be of the same quality as the original although it does lack the metal strips that reinforced the original.  I read some of the reviews for this product where the reviewer stated that part was made of cardboard.  Since the part is available from several sources I can only assume that the part they received was counterfeit.  Anyone who would use a cardboard part in a clothes dryer would have to be an idiot.
summary: This is a genuine Whirlpool part. It appears to ...

reviewText: My dryer controls did not work. The internal light came on, but no controls (nothing lit up - completely DOA).  Didn't really want to spend $200 on a board, but also didn't want to purchase a new dryer.  Put this board in, and the dryer works exactly like it used to.  This board fixed the problem.  I have my washer and dryer stacked on top of one another - so I didn't know if a new dryer would mount exactly the same on top of my washer - this was a great fix!

We have owned a trash compactor for 14 years and have tried numerous types of liners.  These are hands-down the best ones on the market!  They are very sturdy, can withstand heavy loads, and never fall apart.

I wasn't sure if this would work on our dryer since other places said it's not compatible with it, but thought I'd give it a try since it's much more reasonably priced than what I found elsewhere that were supposed to be compatible. The knob appears to be slightly smaller than the original, but this doesn't affect its performance. It does have the metal inside, and I'm using it as a control knob. Works great!

My dryer is more than thirty years old and this is the first filter replacement. It would be nice if this filter holds up as long as the previous one. It seems to be put together a bit differently but it feels as sturdy as the original. The filter slide right into the slot on top of the dryer and is doing the job it's meant to. It doesn't feel too fragile when replacing it each time I clean it out.
summary: About the same as the original

reviewText: ITEM AS DESCRIBED, (FACTORY PART),FAST SHIPPING AND FREE,PRICE ABOUT 5.00 AND PLUS LOCAL TAX LESS THAN MY LOCAL SUPPLIER. PREFER FACTORY REPLACEMENT PARTS VERSES AFTER MARKET PARTS FOR OUR RENTAL PROPERTIES. THEY ALWAYS FIT AND HOLD UP BETTER THAN  AFTER MARKET PARTS WE HAVE TRIED IN THE PAST. THIS PURCHASED WORKED FOR ME!

I had previously purchased a lint screen that would work in my dryer, but it was NOT the "official" one.  That one didn't last very long, so this time I decided to buy the original and it's working much better AND I feel like my dryer is running more efficiently!

I have a Kitchen Aid dryer and couldn't find a replacement for my current lint screen that had started to rip over time.  After doing some research, it appeared this screen was compatible with my dryer.  Although I was worried it might not fit just right, it matches my current one exactly.  I am very pleased with the product and glad I found it!

I was so relieved to know that this product worked...after having a full load of dirty dishes that needed to be hand washed...I was able to use it the next time for a full load of dirty dishes! Worked great

So happy to have found this at such a great price.  I was thinking I was going to have to get a new dishwasher because I certainly wasn't going to pay a repair person to come out for such an old dishwasher.  I'd rather have put the money into a new one.  But for a few bucks, and a few minutes of my time installing it, my dishwasher will hopefully last a while longer.  Very pleased at being able to find something on Amazon that I didn't expect.

This replacement part for the rollers on the top tray of my Whirlpool dishwasher didn't look exactly the same as the old, broken ones.  But they fit perfectly, and seem to be a sturdier, improved design.  They're much less expensive than ordering directly from Whirlpool.

This doesn't solve any of the issues I always had with the oven being hotter in some parts than others, but it did solve the fact that the original heating element broke apart while baking, emitting a hail of sparks as it died.  It was a lot cheaper here on Amazon than I found it on appliance repair sites, too.
summary: My oven is back to cooking thanks to this

reviewText:
I am very pleased with the products and they are well worth the price. I am also very pleased with Amazon's handling and shipping. The products arrived ahead of schedule.
I recommend this to anyone and I am not an easily pleased person. Please keep up the excellent work.
summary: I am very pleased with the products and they are well worth the ...

reviewText: Works well and is a perfect replacement.  I didn't need to cut the hole any wider like some other reviewers.  It is true that the hole is small and if the water is sudsy, the suds tend to take longer to drain, but the water drains fine.
summary: Works well and is a perfect replacement. I didn't need to cut the hole ...

reviewText: Works great for my Jenn-Air downdraft cooktop. Better price than the appliance store. I used high temperature silicone to affix it to the burner and the burner to the cooktop because the screws were corroded and broke. Works great so far.
summary: Works great for my Jenn-Air downdraft cooktop

reviewText: Just when I thought that I would be stuck having to purchase a new dishwasher (not an inexpensive item) I was able to troubleshoot my problem and come across this inlet valve replacement part. The item arrived quickly and was exactly what I needed to get my 20 year old machine back up and running. Installation was simple and my machine is running better than before.

I bought this hose to replace the one in my Maytag PAV2300AWW. The ten year old hose was so brittle that I could stick my finger through it. Since I was replacing the pump anyway, I decided to replace the hose. This hose gets brittle, so if you're replacing the pump, you might want to replace the hose. I hope to get another ten years out of this one.
summary: I bought this hose to replace the one in my ...

reviewText: The knob on the dryer in my apartment started to crack, and was unusable. There's a white version of this but it's about twice the price. I figure since I don't own the dryer, this is a cheap replacement that does the job perfectly. I don't anticipate this one to break as it seems better made than the one that came with the dryer.

Excellent product- fit our dishwasher perfectly. We did need a special tool to install it, so it required a handyman's help pulling out the dishwasher but it was still cheaper to do it on our own than call a repair service. Definitely happy with the quality of the product.
summary: Excellent product- fit our dishwasher perfectly

reviewText:
This broiler pan set is completely ordinary, which is exactly what I wanted.
There are no unusual, exotic, or esoteric features.  Perfect!

The pan set dimensions are:
19" x 15.5"  (edge-to-edge) (the bottom pan is larger than the top rack)
15" x 14"  (top rack "flat" cooking surface)
15.5" x 14.5" ('flat" area of bottom pan)

I really like this broil pan set. It's nice and large but not too big to fit comfortably into the oven. It holds a family sized batch of food so you can broil everything all at once. The porcelain is super easy to clean. I'm glad that I bought this!

I was so happy to find this broiler pan after checking all of my local retail shops.  The broiler pans that come standard with ovens today are too small to fit the needs of a large family.  This pan is perfectly sized and exactly what I was looking for.  It is easy to clean and made of nice, heavy materials.  The package arrived on time and was carefully packed.  All in all a perfect purchase.
summary: Perfectly sized for large family use

reviewText: What can I say? It's a motor starter cap ... not an easy item to enthuse about. However, it is exactly what I ordered and it arrived on time and suitably packaged. I was somewhat surprised at the price but a little further investigation indicated that it was priced competitively. I would recommend both this essential component and the seller.

So far so good.
Not sure how long this one will last before fatigue hardening causes it to break.

Remember to unplug the electricity.
Pop open the top of the washer.  For me, there are two plastic fasteners on the front top left & right.
The rest is a straight shot.

And it's amazing.  I moved into an apartment and the dispenser cap was missing in the dishwasher.  since the cap was gone, small bits of food had gotten inside the rinse aid compartment and had made the dishwasher smell a bit funky.  Long story short,  I drained the rinse aid compartment and rinsed it, added some rinse aid and closed it up with this here rinse aid cap.  All my problems went away.  And my dishes are sparkling clean.  Thank you, Rinse Aid Dispenser Cap!
summary: It's a rinse aid dispenser cap. . .

reviewText: I got the Whirlpool 3378134 Dispenser Cap. My boyfriend broke the cap so I ended up ordering one. It fit perfectly and have not had a problem with it. Twist it on and off easy as that. Do recommend this product to anyone that needs this size of Whirlpool 3378134 Dispenser Cap. :)

I wondered if it would fit. There was no way looking at the picture and looking at the dishwasher that I could tell if it was even made for it. Well, it does. Solved a serious problem (the dishwasher is in a condo I rent) with minimal effort.

I thought i would have to buy a new dishwasher and when i started searching for this tiny part, i was sure i wouldn't find it. To my surprise, there it was. I received it quickly and it worked like a charm. Thank you so much for saving me hundreds of dollars.

This piece was exactly what we needed to repair our dishwasher. The part number was easily displayed as well, so we were able to look up visors on how to do the repair ourselves. It was an easy fix and we didn't need to call a repair guy out to do it.
summary: The part number was easily displayed as well

reviewText: Cheap, Cheap plastic that breaks so fast that you will be buying and buying and buying.  If you own a stove that requires these knobs, plan on spending a whole lot of money to keep your stove from looking like run down junk.  They are just awful.

Fit like a charm on my Kenmore Elite (Whirlpool) fridge.  I thought I would have to remove the faceplate of the water/ice dispenser to install it.  You don't have to do that.  Just press the "lock" button on the fridge so it will not dispense ice/water.  That allows you to press the ice lever to install the guide.  Snap it on the arm and push it up into place.

After 6 years of manually getting ice from my ice maker, I finally got to the root of the problem. My ice guide was messed up and I could not get ice from the door. This item was inexpensive, easy to install, and now I finally have an ice maker that works properly. Wish I would have known about this part sooner!

When the light went out on my refridgerator I checked GE's parts web site and was shocked at the price of a new switch. I figured there was nothing to lose by trying this one. Removing the old switch was the hardest part of the whole job and that only took a couple of minutes. Just connect two wires and pop the new one in. It works as well as the original.

When I order a genuine replacement part, I expect it to look like new, but this one is kind of crusty (for lack of a better term).  A small portion of it is clear like it should be, but the rest of it looks like something corrosive was sprayed on it. Returning, and expecting a full refund.
summary: My old part is in better shape than this replacement.

reviewText: I bought this motor on March 1, 2016.  Just about a year ago.  Today is APRIL 22,2017.  Lasted a little over a year.  Price was reasonable at the time, but when it went out, the food thawed out in the freezer and now it is an expensive motor.  It just quit working.  Made in CHINA is my guess.
summary: 1/2 Star for 1 year.  Maybe NO stars.  It spoiled $500.00 worth of meat and frozen food(at least that much. Full freezer.)

reviewText: Exact replacement for my existing evaporator motor. Now my freezer works again and I don't need to spend money on a new one. This is a good thing because they do not make the style I have anymore, which I really like.
summary: Saved me from buying a new freezer

reviewText: I waited awhile to review this because I wanted to give an accurate accounting.  I have had no problems with the knobs slipping or cracking.  While out of plastic they've held up well.  I think the mistake some people make is they simply turn the knob to turn it on.  Because of the point of resistance you must push down on the knob to get beyond that point then turn it.  If you do not push down on it the knob will split over time.

YEAAAHHHH...THATS WHAT I WAS LOOKING FOR, JUST GREAT PRODUCT, NOW MY DRYER IS AS GOOD AS NEW....
I DID NOT NEED TO TOOLS TO INSTALL IT AND THE BEST PART I DID IT BY MYSELF...
IF YOU HAVE YOUR KNOB BROKEN AND IT LOOKS LIKE THIS ONE ...BELIEVE ME THIS IS THE ONE ORDER IT

It's about $30 for the gasket, holder and the wiper. Since the wiper(door gasket) kept falling out, I thought I'd try this part first and it worked. It doesn't fall down into the interior like the old one did and no leaks since then!!!!

This gasket was to replace the manufacturer provided gasket.  The manufacturer supplied gasket kept causing the dish washer to leak.  This one has a section cut out of the middle that allows the water back into the dish washer, fixing the leak issues.

Works in my Kenmore oven.  Saved me from having to buy a new oven.  When my bake element burnt out, this control board apparently got fried.  The replacement bake element would not heat up, but the broiler element would.  When I replaced this part, the oven worked properly once again and has been working for several months.  This part was also easy to replace.
summary: This part was also easy to replace

reviewText: I own several frigidaire dishwashers in my rental houses. This makes the 4th dishwasher I've replaced the main motor on. It's much cheaper than buying a new dishwasher.  The hardest part is pulling the dishwasher out. And cleaning up the 'charcoal' that falls out of the old motor. I have whirlpool and roper dishwashers that are much older and have never had to work on them.

The detergent dispenser in our dishwasher broke. Didn't feel like spending hundreds for a new dishwasher.  Looked online and found this item along with some videos on how to replace it.  Took less than 10 mins to fix.

I bought the dryer in 2007. The original timer knob lasted until a couple of weeks ago when the plastic shaft on the knob broke. I ordered the exact replacement part (same numbers and size). It worked, but only lasted less than a week. The plastic shaft split in half again. Now I'm stuck with ordering another replacement part.  Obviously this is a cheap part. I cannot afford to replace the same part every week! I am definitely not happy!

Exactly what was expected, and delivered quickly.

If you are not completely sure about how to install this item, it may be a little tricky to find the screws for all the parts of the dishwasher you need to take off to get to the back of this assembly. But there are videos on youtube and elsewhere that make it VERY easy.

The original dispenser which came with our dish washer broke after 13 years and I wasn't sure I was going to be able to find a replacement for it. Amazon comes through again and is an exact replacement for my dish washer. This product did not come with instructions on how to replace the original one but wasn't needed if you are a little handy.
summary: The original dispenser which came with our dish washer broke ...

reviewText:
Plugged right in to my oven and worked flawlessly.
Install tip:
When you remove the faceplate from your old control board, I suggest using a hair dryer to heat up the adhesive that rings the outside edge of the faceplate. With a little heat and patience, you can peel it up without damage and adhere it to your new control board.  The adhesive is only around the edges, so focus the heating there and pull evenly and slowly from one corner.

I installed this by myself in 5 minutes and it works great.  Unplug the fridge, remove two 1/4" bolts, unplug the wiring harness, plug in the new icemaker's wiring harness, put the two 1/4" bolts in, plug in the fridge.  WAIT a little while for it to start working.  It does not start up immediately, I think there is some kind of timer on the water supply.  It works perfectly and was an exact replacement of the original.
summary: ... this by myself in 5 minutes and it works great. Unplug the fridge

reviewText: As advertised; fit perfectly.  Please note that there are two different pieces in this set.  If you put the freezer handle on the fridge the angle will be wrong and it will not match the freezer.  At first glance the pieces look identical, but the angles are reversed between the two pieces since the freezer piece is hung upside down.
summary: As advertised; fit perfectly. Please note that there ...

reviewText: Keep in mind that this is just the door handle.  The brushed aluminum part should be detached from your old handle and connected to your new handle.  Don't throw away that brushed aluminum part like I did.  :(
summary: Don't throw away that brushed aluminum part like I did

reviewText: This handle was purchased to replace the one that my son somehow managed to break.  This one feels sturdy enough that I don't really fear it happening again.  Of course I'm not exactly sure how he managed to do it in the first place.  I'm happy with my purchase and I would buy again, although I hope I don't need to.

I have an older freezer that didn't come with a key.  Now that I needed one I didn't know if this one would work and took the chance.  It is just right.  And the fact that I didn't have to order from the manufacturer (and pay whatever ridiculous price they set) is great.

I bought this to replace a broken knob on my Frigidaire dryer for which I was using a pair of pliers as a temporary fix. The knob has a D-shaped slot which fits perfectly and the color is a match. Problem solved.
summary: Fits perfectly and the color is a match

reviewText: I have ordered these filters on several occasions. They are a fraction of the cost as compared to the prices in stores or from Whirlpool and they work great. I will continue to order them in the future. Thanks!!!!
summary: They are a fraction of the cost as compared to the prices in stores or from Whirlpool and they work great. I will continue to or

reviewText: I tried this product before and I can't say enough about the quality of the product or the responsiveness of the seller. I LOVE this product and it's a great price. Works wonderfully. I'd definitely recommend this product and seller!

Works great!  Fits perfect and can't tell any differences from the Samsung version of this filter.  Started looking for a cheaper option when the "official filter" from Samsung kept going up in price... haven't been able to tell a difference using this filter in its place!
summary: Works great! Fits perfect and can't tell any differences from ...

reviewText:
Stick to Samsung brand filters. This filter stopped working a day or two after I installed it. It affected my Samsung fridge. Meaning: While a new replacement Samsung filter, it stops working after a gallon or so of water flows through. The "workaround" is: You need to remove the filter; drain some of the water from it and then replace the filter. Over and over again. It's a real pain!!!

I did request a refund and the filter manufacturer refunded my money quickly.
summary: Do NOT use EcoAqua in your Samsung refrigerator.

reviewText: This replacement filter was a great price. It installed without a hitch, just like the OEM filter. It seems to be working flawlessly. I definitely cannot tell any difference in the filter quality. According to the specs, it is just as good and with a great cost savings.
summary: This replacement filter was a great price. It installed without a hitch

reviewText: After months of use I'm finally getting around to reviewing this.  I've been using this filter in place of the OEM filter for cost reasons.  I've had no issues after months of use.  I will buy another one when it's time for replacement.
summary: After months of use I'm finally getting around to reviewing ...

reviewText: This is my second order. I noticed no difference between the quality for my ice water and ice cubes with the EcoAqua filters and the Samsung filters. The main difference, of course, is the cost - $10 for the EcoAqua vs $45 for the Samsung. I do not think the EcoAqua filters lasted as long as the original - 6-7 months for the EcoAqua vs 12 months for the Samsung. But that may have been an anomoly. I'll be more observant in the future.

I've used these before and had fantastic results.  This time was different. The product fits well, goes in easily, and is packaged nicely, but left a lot of stuff in my water. I've easily ran 15-20 gallons through it, but there are lots of tiny specks in my water and it makes me uncomfortable. I'm still hopeful that things clear up.
summary: I've used these before and had fantastic results. This time was different

reviewText: The filter only lasted a couple of weeks before it started to plug and not work. I bought two of the filters and I thought maybe the first one was defective when it stopped working after a couple of weeks. But the second filter also stopped working after two weeks.  The OEM GE filters will last 6 months with ease.  The EcoAqua filters are junk and not worth a dime!
summary: The filter only lasted a couple of weeks before it ...

reviewText: This water filter is great. We had to get it to replace a different generic filter that we had only been using for a week. The other one started having an awful metallic taste, but once we switched to this one, the taste went away and the water tastes great again. No metallic taste or chlorine taste at all.  A great filter at a great price.

These are better than some other 3rd party filters, the last ones we had from somewhere else seemed to reduce the water flow to the point we couldn't use them.  These so far seem to be back to normal for water flow.
summary: These are better than some other 3rd party filters

reviewText: So far, the quality of the water has been as good as the name-brand filter.  I'm only a month in to using them, so I can't speak as to if they last as long, but I'm happy with the quality and the price so far.

This filter preforms just like the LG filter that came with the fridge. The water tastes great and it is so much more economical. I've bought and used three of these so far. I'm very happy with them and will continue coming back.

Excellent aftermarket replacement for an otherwise expensive part. The price for the OEM filter has gone up significantly in the past year and I was looking for a less expensive replacement. Well I found it with this filter! These fit in my Samsung refrigerator just like the original, and I've noticed better water pressure coming out of the water dispenser. This filter works just like the OEM filter and I will be buying these from now on!

I purchased the EcoAqua Replacement Water Filters based on previous reviews and the product description.  I am very satisfied with this product.  I replaced it very easily.  There were no leaks or any other problems.  I will purchase this product again.
summary: I am very satisfied with this product

reviewText: It's nice not to have to buy the filters from the refrigerator manufacturer. It saves a lot of money. Although I haven't tested the water, the water tastes filtered. All these filters work the same essentially, using an activated carbon filter to remove chlorine and heavy metals.
summary: Better than paying extra for the Samsung brand filters.

reviewText: I'm not bashing the product, but you should be aware that these filters have a 300 gallon capacity. Compare that to the 750 gallon capacity of the Pur filter and decide for yourself. These are also made in China if that matters to you.
summary: 300 gallon capacity vs. 750 for the PUR filter

reviewText: I bought a 2 pack. The first filter seemed to work fine. Unfortunately, when it was due to be changed, I used the second filter and the water dispenser was not working right, it was dispensing very slowly. I called a repair man and was advised to try changing the water filter. I replaced the filter and the water dispenser works fine again. Of course, it is too late to return it.  I won't try it again. Seems like a cheap product.
summary: The first filter seemed to work fine. Unfortunately

reviewText: Bought a 3-pack. The first one worked well originally. After 3 months it started to block the water stream and cause clapping sound on the water tube. Then I changed a second one. Failed after 1 week. Waste of money............

I initially bought these for the price. I knew I was taking a bit of a gamble not buying a name brand - but the savings was big enough to chance it. I absolutely love the water I get from these. In fact, I use it now for all of my home brewing needs - and I'm very particular about the water I use in those. For me it's a no-brainer to buy these and I'm going to use them as long as they are available.
summary: Makes for a good Home Brew

reviewText: I installed this filter yesterday and after trying to get a glass of water a dozen times, it is still just a trickle coming out.  It seems this filter completely stops the flow of water.  What a piece of junk.  Do not buy this product.
summary: I installed this filter yesterday and after trying to get ...

reviewText: These filters work great. I've used other brands that made noise when you got water from the fridge, but these don't really make much noise and they seem to be the same as the name brand filters. They are easy to install and the water tastes great. I have purchased these filters twice so far and will do so again when I need more.
summary: Less expensive than the name-brand but just as good

reviewText: I haven't used this product as yet.  I'm waiting for the need to replace it is here.  However, I expect to have to replace it soon.  I'll come back and tell you how this product worked out for me after I've installed it.  I was very impressed with your e-mail thanking me for using your business for this need.  So far I can give this a 5 star rating and hope not to change my mind after installing and using it for a while.

The price is right for this filter compared to the manufacturer's model.
As far as I can tell, there is no difference in water flow or quality nor in the duration of filter life. Because of the savings this is a no-brainer for buying again next time I need a replacement filter.
summary: Great value, quality is the same.

reviewText: These filters are much better than original. The water flow is much better. The taste is the same and the price is a lot cheaper also. What's not to like. Better and cheaper, that makes these filters a winner.

Started using this product as a replacement filter in July 2014 and found that not only did the water taste great, but the dispenser stopped running as slowly as it had with the original filters.  I would definitely recommend this product.
summary: ... and found that not only did the water taste great, but the dispenser stopped running as slowly as ...

reviewText:
I bought this as a replacement for my Kenmore Elite fridge. It is an exact replica of the Kenmore one on the exterior. It is easy to replace and fits perfectly. The flavor of the water is the exact same as it was from the Kenmore filter.

The price is good for the quality of product. I will buy this filter again the next time I need one.
summary: Good Filter, Direct Replacement, Tastes Great.

reviewText: They did refund me my money!!  BUT this made my fridge leak water everywhere!!!!!  and then leaked into the freezer and we had to pull chunks of ice out of the freezer. I did not know there was a leak till I went downstairs and there was water on the ceiling and of course when I could barely open the freezer because it was frozen with ice.
summary: They did refund me my money!! BUT this ...

reviewText: It installed with no problem. Ran 2 to 3 gallons of water through the filter to flush it. After flushing the water smelled and tasted of plastic. Ran more water and it still had the same smell and taste. Removed it and reinstalled the old filter. The water tasted fine.

The filters arrived on time. Installation was easy, just unscrew the old one and put on the new one. The water flow improved immediately (I should replace the filter sooner) and the water taste/quality also improves.

The filter has been working well.  I had previously purchased Samsung branded filters, and found that they do not work very long before the "replace filter" light comes on.  I bought two of the filters, and am still using the first one.  Water flow doesn't seem to have slowed down after using it for quite awhile.  I'd recommend this filter to anyone looking to save some money.
summary: Good filters at a great price

reviewText: These are water filters for our fridge.  The only evidence that they're working is that I haven't seen any tadpoles in our drinking water or ice cubes.  I have therefore deduced that they are working as promised.

This filter is the absolute worst. I of course purchased it to save money but quickly learned it is not worth it. The filter initially surprised me because the water pressure was improved over the original GE filter. The very next day the water dispensed was tan in color and smelled like a sewer. DO NOT BUY!!!
summary: I wish "no stars" was a rating!!

reviewText: It did take about 30 minutes after I installed the filter for it to register that a new one was installed.  I did make sure to use the gasket from the old one to prevent any possible leaks though.  So far, so good.

The EcoAqua  Filter is an exactly replacement for the GE MWF filter.  It fit into my refrigerator perfectly and worked exactly the same as the GE filter.  The EcoAqua filter is less expensive than the GE and I will continue to use it in the future.

Exactly the same as the brand name but at a much better price.  This was my first time ordering this and am very happy with my purchase.  I had no problems installing it and it's been working great!  I plan on ordering the multipack in the future now that I know it works so well.

I was somewhat skeptical of buying these non-name-brand filters, especially after I saw some reviews saying they leaked or didn't taste right, but the price was right so I gave them a whirl. We've had no problems and the water tastes exactly as it does with the far more expensive name-brand ones. I'll be buying these from now on.

I've only had this filter installed for a few days but, it seems great thus far. I replaced a GE filter with this one and I can't see any difference in water quality with the Supco brand versus the GE. Install was quick and easy. Supco fit perfectly in place of old GE filter. Arrived quickly and in perfect condition.

I was worried reading some of the reviews that things would be different with this filter, but given the price difference, I wanted to try. I didn't notice a single difference in the ease of putting it, the noise it (doesn't) make, or how it works. I will definitely be doing this filter from now on.
summary: No difference from the GE MWF

reviewText: I was a little worried about it working since it wasn't "name brand", but it fit and works great!!!  I will definitely be ordering this product again from this vendor when it's time for a replacement. Thank you so much!

I just successfully replaced the GE MWF water filter with the Supco 287 filter.  It went in simply and not a drop of water was spilled.  Don't believe the reviewer that states that the Supco filter does not filter out the same minerals, elements and compounds as the GE filter.  It does...at less than half the price of the GE MWF filter.  The list and filtering efficiencies are posted on Supco's web site.  Here's the link:  [...]
summary: Absolutely no reason to buy the overly expensive GE MWF water filter

reviewText: Considering that this filter costs 1/3 of the price of the one that Lowes or Home Depot sell for my fridge, I have to say this is wonderful.  It does the job.  Does it do it as well as the fridge manufacturer's filter?  I don't know?  I'm no scientist to be able to test the water purity as it comes out of both types of filters.  It tastes fine to me!  And it costs 1/3 of the price.  That works!!
summary: I have to say this is wonderful. It does the job

reviewText: This is a great alternative to the OEM filter. It fits perfectly, no leaks, and does a good job filtering the water. With my water tester this filter reduces my tap water which has a tested 685ppm particle count down to a 220ppm particle count. Although I cannot see what exactly it is filtering out, it is making a big dent in the ppm according to my electronic water tester.

Maybe just a coincidence, but my refrigerator started making a horrible noise soon after I installed this filter. Water leaked from around it. I replaced it with the Samsung filter. After that, all was fine, but the noise never went away and I eventually had to pay for a $350 repair. I'm sticking with the Samsung filters from now on.
summary: Didn't do the job for me

reviewText: I've been using this filter for a few weeks now. Simply put, this is just as good as Samsung's more expensive filter. It goes in just as easy, the water quality is great, and it saved me money. I'll continue to get these for my refrigerator.

Had to send it back, it made a loud noise every time we used it and the water tasted funny even after trying to run it. Ended up buying from the manufacturer. Don't waste your time or money Trying to save a few bucks...
summary: Don't waste your time or money!

reviewText: Installed this filter and ran about 3 gallons of water thru it before trying. The water tasted very "off". Hardly palatable. Tried to run more water thru and tried again but still tasted terrible. Installed a filter from a different company and the water now tastes GREATl. Something wrong with this filter. I do not recommend.

Worked for about a month and a half, then started to make a terrible loud groaning noise when water was dispensed. This was followed by a low water flow. NOT GOOD! A total waste of money, with big aggravation.
summary: After 45 days of use, it makes a LOUD NOISE with low flow

reviewText:
I CHECKED THE COMPANY THAT MAKES THE FILTER AND THEY ARE REPUTABLE.  A GOOD COMPANY
MAKES GOOD FILTERS.  MAKES SENSE TO ME.  I WILL BUY A FILTER AT HALF THE PRICE OF A NAME
BRAND ALL DAY LONG.  IT IS A QUALITY FILTER AND A FAR BETTER SELLER THAN AVERAGE.  MY
SAVED SELLER LIST IS SHORT, AND I JUST ADDED THIS SELLER.  A NO BRAINER.
summary: YOU MEAN YOU DON'T HAVE MONEY TO BURN?

reviewText: This is an OEM replacement at half the cost.  It works great and lasts longer than the OEM filters I used to buy.  The several OEM filters lasted only 12 months.  This is the second one I have bought, the first has lasted 14 months and is still going.

I've noticed absolutely no difference between the water from this filter and the water from the GE filter it replaced.  When I first installed it, I noticed a few particulates in the water, so I followed another reviewer's recommendation and ran a couple of gallons through without drinking them.  All the particulates were gone after that, and the water tastes just the same as with the GE filter.  I'll definitely be buying more of these in the future.
summary: Works just like the GE filter it replaced

reviewText: Purchased these as replacements for my Kenmore water system. These are so much more affordable. Already installed and doing a great job. I purchased several to be ready for the time the filter needs to be replaced. I would recommend these for any looking for Kenmore water filter replacements.

Disappointed this did not fit like my MWF GE filter.  It would not latch on to the adaptor and when I would press the water button it would fall off.  I read all the reviews and nobody complained of that.  The inside of this filter does not even have the same grooves of the GE filter so I shouldn't be surprised that it would not latch onto the GE adaptor.  Back to the expensive GE filters we go.

THE ABSOLUTE WORST WATER FILTER.

I WILL NEVER STRAY AWAY FROM GE MWF WATER FILTERS AGAIN.

Save your hard earned money and only Buy GE MWF Water Filter.  This filter makes the water taste TERRIBLE and I will go to LOWES to pick up a real GE MWF Filter.

MAKES WATER TASTE TERRIBLE!
summary: THE WORST WATER FILTER, DO NOT ORDER, STICK WITH GE MWF ONLY for your FRIDGE WATER FILTER, SAVE YOUR MONEY and DO NOT BUY THIS.

reviewText:
I ordered this replacement filter because at that time I could not find the GE filter on Amazon or my local Walmart. I ordered this one and the only difference I can tell between this and the GE filter is the price. This one was much cheaper!

It's super easy to replace. You just twist the old one off and twist this one on. Run some water through it and you're done.

This water filter fit into our Samsung refrigerator perfectly. This is the second time I've purchased this filter and the first one lasted as long as it was supposed to - the water tasted the same at the end of the 6 months as it did when I first installed the filter. I will definitely continue to use these filters.

We are very pleased with this purchase.  The filter was sealed and easy to install.  We can't tell the difference between this one and the original. Unless something changes,  we plan to purchase the next one from this vendor as well.

I put this water filter in the refrigerator and Bam my refrigerator became a time machine and I went back in time. It was like back to the future with the flux capacitor except the flux capacitor was the water filter in my refrigerator.

I thought I would save a few dollars by using this filter rather than the name brand filters I have been using...BIG MISTAKE. The water from the refrigerator tasted bad immediately after replacing the filter. I thought I would give it a few days to see if it would get better, but it did not. I replaced it with the name brand filter and the bad taste was gone.
summary: DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY ON THIS

reviewText: I buy these filters every 6 months as recommended by Maytag. At Home Depot these exact filters cost $44.00, so this is a heck of a deal. They work great and they last every bit of 6 months. I will be buying them again.

The filter was a good direct replacement for the OEM I normally use. Filter seems to be good. My tap water is not that bad so I cannot say how good it is. Water flow is great, especially since I had not replaced my older filter in a long time.
summary: The filter was a good direct replacement for the OEM I normally use

reviewText: Fits like OEM part for half the price. Water tastes great and comes out with more pressure than factory brand. Lasts just as long, if not longer (4-5 months give or take). ***********************REMEMBER to turn off main water supply before changing out filter and ensure all water is out of the refrigerator water hose/pipes/water dispenser as well***********************
summary: Fits like OEM part for half the price

reviewText: I was hesitant because it wasn't the original manufacturer filter, but this thing has been working better than the original.  I've replaced the filter with the original Samsung this summer and replaced it with this one a couple of weeks ago.  The water comes out much faster than it ever did with the Samsung filter.  I'm a bit of a water snob and I haven't tasted any off flavors.  It taste like pure, clean water, which is exactly what I want!
summary: Fast flow, clean water and great tasting.

reviewText: At $50, my OEM GE filter lasted only 3 months before water began the trickle. At less than 1/3 the price of the OEM filter, this was a no brainer and I decided to give it a try. I'm not sure about the technical specs but the water tastes just fine (no different than the OEM filter) and flow is strong. We'll see how long these last. But even if it's just 3 months, I would have made out big compared to the GE filters.

These filters are awesome. Not only are they less expensive than the pricey filters made by the original manufacturer, but I think they make the water taste even better. Even our two kiddos commented on how good it was. Also, their customer service is excellent. Thanks for providing a great product!

I've been using these for 1 1/2 years now without a problem. As noted by others, they even increase the water flow. It is a bit difficult to tell if this kind of product is really working or not, but I'm not scared of tap water. I guess I just hope they don't use anything that's potentially toxic, but it can't be worse than bread from Subway.

This product appears to be just as good or better than Samsung original and costs at least  50% less... Competition from the little guy is what makes America great....Thanks for stocking this product and thanks to the little guy who makes it...
summary: This product appears to be just as good or better than Samsung original and costs at least ...

reviewText: At first I was hesitant to buy this filter because it was not made by the refrigerator manufacturer.  Upon its arrival, my fears were put to rest.  The package arrived timely and was not damaged.  The packaging was superb.  The best part is that the filter is marvelous and meets all my expectations.  Thanks.

So far, this filter provides the best tasting water compared to all other aftermarket filters I have purchased in the past and is the least expensive.  Thanks for such a good filter at a more affordable price
summary: EFF-6027A 3 PACK Water Filter Samsung WF294

reviewText: As anyone knows who has dealt with these filters. They have to be replaced every few months. So it's nice to have found a compatible filter that does the job as well as the name brand and does not cost as much. I have never had any problems with them and will continue to use. They were ship out fast and at a very good price. Nice job on the sellers part.
summary: Works just like the name brand.

reviewText: I have not used this filter yet, but the price is terrific and the shipping is fast.  I know I will save a lot of money over the next couple of years.  Also I can clear notification  and continue to use the filter until the water doesn't run as fast.

This is the way to go.  I can't really tell the difference between the OEM filter and these filters.  I'm satisfied with these SUPCO filters.  This is the FIRST time that I've ever replaced the filter in my refrigerator, so I had to use about 2 gallons of water before all of the air in the line was displaced, but I've heard that is normal...

The filter works perfectly at a fraction of the cost of the Samsung filter.  It doesn't have the word 'Lock' on the end like the Samsung filter, but it works the same.  I would definitely buy from this vendor again!

Product sat in my garage for 2 months waiting for my contractor to do a kitchen remodel.  Went to install it and our contractor pointed out that the product was: (1) used, (2) had been tampered with, and (3) was malfunctioning.  The fan was making an odd noise and the lights would flicker.  My contractor refused to install it, stating that it was not safe to operate.
summary: Inspect returned products before sealing the box and re-selling them

reviewText:
The hood arrived quickly and very well packaged. I opened it up to check everything and was quite pleased with the quality of the product. I don't have this installed yet, so I will update my review after I get some use out of it.

edit:  I have had this installed for a few months now and still love it.  Very nice looking and
  and works like a champ. Not much else to say really, except that it's awesome!

As some people said, the steam/smoke goes through the lights in the back more than it goes through the vent slits in the front, but it has not appeared to be an issue with its functionality. It is very stylish and not too loud for the amount of air it moves. Overall, I am pretty happy with the purchase.
summary: I'd buy another one (I plan to, actually)

reviewText: We have a new home we just built and put this in.  It's VERY nice and looks wonderful!  It's beyond me why anyone would pay more for something like this that looks the way it does.  It has great lighting and some serious suction!  Works great!  I'd definitely recommend over and over again!

The product itself is fine, it looks good, and it does the job.
For the price, it's a great deal.

The company is a pleasure to do business with.  When I realized I'd ordered the wrong one I panicked and wondered how much it would cost me to get the right one.  Not a dime.  I called them and they asked me to ship it back to them and even gave me the shipping label to do so. In a few days I had the correct size hood at my door.  I would recommend them and buy from them again.
summary: I ordered the wrong size, they shipped me the right one...no questions asked, at my door in a few days.

reviewText: I got this as an anniversary present for my husband, and so far it's great! He set it up without issues, and I'm happy I got a system with 2 taps because it's fun to have options! Everyone who comes over to our house thinks it's awesome.
summary: and so far it's great! He set it up without issues

reviewText:
I purchased this as a replacement filter for our GE refrigerator instead of the OEM filter. I was somewhat hesitant but the filter is doing just as good a job filtering the water as the OEM filter did. No, I did not have the water tested by a lab but the taste and clarity of the water is at least the same.
I will purchase this filter again!

These filters are every bit as good as the name brand ones recommended by my refrigerator manufacturer.  They are as good a quality and last just as long as the more expensive ones.  I have used these for years and have never been disappointed.

Yes, the LED lights are very bright, and yes, the whir of the fan can be a bit loud when using the highest setting...but this sucker is versatile, and more importantly, it really works! We chose the recirculating option instead of venting it externally, and it was fairly easy to install, looks great and garners a ton of compliments. After 4 months, I highly recommend it.
summary: An Excellent Buy for the Money

reviewText:
I wanted to purchase a direct replacement for the filter in my stainless steel french door refrigerator without searching in the store and being inconvenienced with driving to a local dealer.  This filter is exactly that, a direct replacement for the filter that came with my refrigerator.  It works flawlessly and removes any foul tastes in the water.

I recommend this product.
summary: Direct replacment as the filter that came with my fridge

reviewText: These filters are thin and flimsy. I should have paid more attention to the negative reviews. I do not have high expectations of this product and will not order these again. I will go back to the brand name product.

Purchased this dryer about 2 years ago.  Worked well for first 6 or 7 months and then would not heat up at all.  No product support.  No where to buy parts.  You are on your own with this.  It was only used a few times before it broke.  An appliance repair shop said it needs a new circuit board but there is no place that sells the part.  Avoid this product.  It is not reliable.  I wrote the seller and got no response.
summary: Purchased this dryer about 2 years ago. Worked well ...

reviewText: I can't even tell you how much I love my Panda! This little guy drys clothes so damn well! It fits my throw blankets and the lint filter works very very well. I'm a lint cleaning fool, so I keep it cleared out... it doesn't seem to take long at all to dry things. I also have a Panda washer, so I'm not overwhelming the dryer with to many things at one time. Unlike the Panda washer, there is no learning curve with this item.

I just love this dryer!!! It was delivered ahead of schedule!!!! I also have the Panda small compact portable washing machine. The washing machine spin dries the clothes so well that when i use the dryer, it doesn't take very long at all to dry them. I use the washer and dryer at least twice a week and I haven't seen any increase in electric bill. I highly recommend both of these products!!! They are fantastic!!!

Cheap and effective. This is a great set of parts to keep on hand if you have a couple of dryers to repair from time to time. These fit about 90% of the dryers I see around in this area. Much cheaper than OEM parts from the manufacturer.
summary: This is a great set of parts to keep on hand if you ...

reviewText: My dishwasher was leaking, and I thought there was no way this would be the remedy. My existing gasket looked like it was in perfect condition. This could be one of the best places to start before calling the appliance repair service out for $250....
summary: My existing gasket looked like it was in perfect condition

reviewText: I purchased these knobs to replace the broken set that was literally just hanging on and/or falling on to the cook top.  I was afraid to put too much pressure on them while installing them, because it didn't seem like they were going to fit at first, so I made my husband do it and they went on beautifully.  So don't be afraid to apply the extra pressure.  They look great and now I don't have to worry about them falling off anymore.

Sorry it took a while to get back with you. The clock was installed easily and went without any trouble. The wiring directions made it easy to do and were very precise. I am very happy with the outcome. The clock works perfectly.

I've now replaced my hinges twice in the past two years. This set definitely has a better build and strength quality to it than the first OEM set I put in. Don't know why there would be a difference. I just know that these are much better. Finally happy with something that works.

Also, don't be intimidated by the install process. Very easy once you review the youtube videos you can find online. Took me less than 30 min once I knew what I was doing.

I couldn't stand having to open my freezer every time I wanted ice, but I knew having a technician come out would cost me several hundred dollars. I did a little research an found out that it was possible to fix myself. Long story short, my ice machine works again and I saved a lot of money.

This was not as hard to install as I had expected and it worked as soon as I had everything plugged in and screwed back together.  I can only imagine what I would have been charged to have a technician come out to fix our refrigerator.

Our icemaker was repaired in a short time by my husband.  He took his iPad and took pictures as he went along of the parts he removed.  Then, when he replaced the motor, he played back his pictures so that he would get all of the parts back correctly.  The icemaker works PERFECTLY now!!!!!

In our case we needed a dishwasher hose that would be longer than the tradition 6 feet drain hose to be able to service our dishwasher or pull it out for any other reasons. It was easy to install and now enables us to be able to pull out the dishwasher without fear of ripping out the drain hose.
summary: It is what it is, noting more, nothing less

reviewText: Due to the distance from my sink/garbage disposal to my new dishwasher, I needed a 10-12' drain hose rather than the 6' one that came with the new dishwasher.  The Whirlpool connections were different on the dishwasher end, so I went with the OEM hose.  The hose was of expected quality and the installation went fine.  It has been 3 weeks and we've run the dishwasher 4-5 cycles and performance is as expected so far.
summary: The hose was of expected quality and the installation went fine. It has been 3 weeks and we've run ...

reviewText: This was a Savior for re-pipping our dishwasher......we are so grateful we found this 12 foot OEM Drain Hose. It fit perfectly onto our dishwasher and the job went so smoothly to switch it over.....we've had it installed for a few months now and we're THRILLED!!!! It was the answer to our problems!!!!
summary: This was a Savior for re-pipping our dishwasher.. ...

reviewText: This is just what I needed.  My dishwasher wasn't draining, and I had already replaced the drain pump, so I figured this was worth a try. After a little maneuvering I was able to replace the drain hose with little difficulty.  It has been in for a couple of months now and is functioning perfectly.  A great, cheap way to fix a malfunctioning appliance!
summary: A great, cheap way to fix a malfunctioning appliance

reviewText: Remodeled our kitchen and had to move our Whirlpool dishwasher farther away from the sink.  The hose was just the right length with enough slack in the line so we could pull out our dishwasher from the wall if needed.  It was easy to install.

I thought it was a good idea to buy the heater with the harness so no splicing would need to be done, but the pink cord was shorter than the blue, the OEM had equal length cords. I had to rearrange the path so the cords would reach which made the job more  difficult and time consuming. If I had to do it all over again I would buy the heater and thermostat separate which would end up being cheaper and quicker.

These carbon filters were exactly what I needed to replace the funky ones in the microwave.  I had just moved to a new house and the microwave needed new carbon filters.  The ones previously installed looked like they had been there for quite some time (they were very dirty, greasy and warped).  They were easy to install.  I received them from the supplier/shipper relatively quick as well.  Thanks.

Almost identical to the scraper which came packed with the Magic Chef range that I bought when I moved in over a decade ago.  The original scraper continues to work well after all these years and I have no doubt that the new one,which serves as a backup, will give just as many years of service as the original

Great price!  Great product!  We were in a bind and didn't know where to go so we took a chance and it was exactly what we wanted and needed!  Plus we received the product in a very timely manner!  Thank you!

This is a direct replacement belt, it is the exact fit and is every bit as good as the one you are replacing. If your belt has broken or if yours is cracking it is time to replace it and this is the one you want. Before removing your old belt look at how it wraps around the pulley and tension roller, if yours is broken find a YouTube video showing how it is done.

This hose was a perfect fit for the drain hose in my washer.  It seemed exactly the same as the hose it replaced, except that this one didn't come with a third hole (a.k.a. "big honkin' leak").  (Or second hole, if you count the hole through the middle as one.)

We messaged Samsung and told them what we needed. They said this would be the part. When we recvd it it was not the correct part and we still cannot find the part we need. We have been everywhere. This is not the fault of the supplier, but Samsung is the one that I blame. They still will not get back in touch with us for the correct part.

Clunk clunk.  That's what I had every time I opened the fridge door...for years.  Why didn't I get this long ago?  So easy to replace.  I still expect a clunk when I open the fridge, but nope...smooth as silk.

My daughter decided to hang on the fridge door and break the hinge bearing. After doing some research I was able to find the part that I needed and ordered it off amazon. Once the part arrived I was able to replace my fridge door in about 15 mins. The part was exactly what I needed.
summary: Exactly the part I was looking for.

reviewText: This item was shipped quickly and arrived quickly.  Everything about this item appeared as advertised.  It turned out that I did not need this item, so I returned it, and experienced no problems with the return process (I believe that another reviewer complained about a significant "re-stocking fee".  I did NOT experience a re-stocking fee.)
summary: This item was shipped quickly and arrived quickly. Everything ...

reviewText: This piece was easy to replace, and an exact match to my Amana door latch.  I purchased this piece, along with the internal door locking piece, checked out a couple of videos on youtube, and saved myself about $125 on a repair service call.  The only tool required was a screwdriver.
summary: This piece was easy to replace

reviewText: This part was a perfect replacement for the broken part in my ice bucket.  It takes some time disassembling and re-assembling the ice dispenser/bucket assembly but it's a lot cheaper than buying an entirely new ice bucket/dispensing assembly.

Rather than buy a new ice-maker I got the part on Amazon.  Saved money on the repair and also saved money on the part. The ice-maker is working beautifully.  I'm really pleased that the part was available at Amazon. The refrigerator manufacturer's spokesperson stated that the part was not available.  Rather than shell out a coupe of hundred bucks for a new ice-maker I fixed the old one for about $15.
summary: Got a Great Deal on Amazon.
