reviewText:
If you do NOT have one, but misplace or loose the one and only key that comes with your machine, you are in a real mess!
This is THE ONLY KEY THAT CAN LOCK OR UNLOCK YOUR MACHINE. Well worth the little bit of money to purchase one and have a spare - just in case!
summary: A good thing to have on hand as a spare

reviewText: Just what I was looking for.  After the kids left the freezer open in the garage (for the third time), I thought I'd start locking the freezer, except I couldn't find my original key.  The replacement key was received within 2 days and was from Frigidaire.  The replacement key works perfectly!
summary: Just what I was looking for. After the kids ...

reviewText: I bought a house, and lived with a broken handle for 3.5 years.  If I knew it would take less than 20 minutes to fix it, I would have done it a long time ago.  This was 100x easier than swapping out a hard drive in a Mac Mini.  look for a youtube video, and watch before you try.  I am a technical person, and this was a little bit of a challenge, but once I saw a video, it all made sense, and it was all easy from there.
summary: I cant believe I didn't do this earlier!!!!

reviewText: The lamp bulb I ordered was a replacement for one in the microwave that had burned out. The replacement came quickly and worked just fine in the microwave. Maybe I should have ordered two? Just to have one when needed on hand.

When I received the new bulbs, I was concerned because the actual bulb size is smaller.  However, it's the same wattage and the prongs are the same size so it easily fits as it is supposed to.  My lights work well now.
summary: Smaller bulb, but it does the job!

reviewText: I've lost the faucet adapter to this dishwasher and have bought 2 different ones that don't fit, does anyone know what kind of adapter I need to buy to fit this dishwasher?  And where I can get the extender hoses.
summary: I've lost the faucet adapter to this dishwasher and have ...

reviewText: I have waited a month to write this review because I wanted to give this portable dishwasher an honest try. I LOVE IT!!!!!!!  It is small enough to stash by the back door, easy enough to wheel around. It washes great. It does not dry, but it never stated that it would. I would definitely recommend this to anyone in need of a small dishwasher

I am disabled and my apartment doesn't have a dishwasher. Plus, the apartment is small so this dishwasher is perfect for my needs. I absolutely love it. It doesn't dry the dishes but when it's done washing just open the door all the way and the dishes dry quickly. It's lightweight so it's easy to move. I would definitely recommend this dishwasher.

I live in an apartment with no option for a built in version. I have had this thing for close to two years now and let me tell you: it has changed my life.
It does an amazing job getting the dishes clean provided you load them properly. It's portable, easy to hook up, and the perfect height for added counter space.

I have a very small kitchen, and this is the perfect size for my space.  I love that it has both the upper and lower washer arms.  I don't even rinse the dishes before I load.  Everything comes out nice and clean.  Does not seem to dry plastic pieces very well at all.  I am not using any rinse aid either tho.  Not sure if that would make a difference or not.  It doesn't bother me any tho.  Came complete with everything I needed to hook it up and get started.  So nice not to see dishes in the sink!

After about 2 weeks with the dishwasher, which, as a side note, is not technically allowed in my apartment building, my partner and I are very pleased. We are still experimenting with the best arrangement so all of the dishes are washed equally well (a few have not come out clean). It is very quiet and easy to use. It holds a fairly large amount of dishes, though you must be careful about where everything is placed.

Out of the box the water went right from the faucet, into the machine and directly out the bottom onto the floor.  It's impossible to try to get it open to check what's wrong without damaging the unit further so I chose to request a replacement.  Sending this thing back for a replacement is a pain in the butt too.  We'll see if it actually works or if the second one is a dud too.

This machine cleaned the dishes well and I was very happy with it, but it was completely inoperable after a couple of months.  The controls wouldn't light up at all, so I figured it was just a fuse.  The problem is, this unit doesn't have any stand-alone fuses.  No protection at all, so it will blow a control board.  Thankfully I still had time to return it for free through Amazon.  A couple more weeks and I would have been dealing with a headache.
summary: ... machine cleaned the dishes well and I was very happy with it

reviewText: This is an awesome little dishwasher. I fought getting a dishwasher because I don't have much room for one but I don't know how I lived without it. I work A LOT and there were always small amounts of dishes littering the counter and sink because I didn't have time to wash them. Now I simply put them in the dishwasher until it's full and wash away!! It's small which is a plus for me because I don't have a lot of dishes yet I can fit large pans in there when I have them. LOVE this!!
summary: How did I live without this?

reviewText: Love it.  It does a really great job.  There are only two of us in my home and it is the perfect size for the amount of dishes I dirty during the day.  It even fits the pots and pans I use when cooking dinner. It has different settings.  I use all in one tables, and the dishwasher has a setting for their use.  I think it would be great for anyone who has limited space, or for just a couple.
summary: Love it. It does a really great job

reviewText: Just the perfect size dishwasher for our small house. My husband is retrofitting it to connect to the water line like a regular dishwasher so no rolling it around and hooking up to a faucet. Also a plus, it was delivered a day early.
summary: Just the perfect size dishwasher for our small house

reviewText: I am very impressed with this item. I was blown away by how cool it got in a matter of seconds. I can not say enough good things about this product. As long as you have a good heat sink attached to the hot side, you should be problem free.

Get it? GET IT?!

That's a thermodynamics joke. These little Peltier coolers, which also work as heaters, are pretty nifty. They are really resilient little devices and don't suffer from the normal issue of degradation on exposure to moisture like other Peltier modules because they are completely sealed. The one downside, and it really wasn't all that big of a deal for me as evidenced by the 5-star rating, is the lack of documentation with the modules.

This description is inaccurate.  It states you are getting 3 small and 1 large, but they WILL send you 2 small and 2 large.  This description needs to be updated and its a huge inconvenience, now I have to return and reorder.  Not happy.
summary: Description not accurate will receive 2 small 2 large, not 3 small and 1 large.

reviewText: Other than the fact that this is a dishwasher that doesn't wash dishes, it's fine. If you don't mind washing dishes twice then maybe you might like this product. It is quiet, perhaps because it doesn't actually do any real work.

Fit perfectly and this is my second one this year.  Now I have one for each of my large burners and can use two pots at once.  Yes, we did have to bend one of the prongs SLIGHTLY but it is easily done and not a big deal.  Just be gentle.
summary: we did have to bend one of the prongs SLIGHTLY but it is easily done and not a big deal

reviewText: This burner has really helped us when homebrewing on the stovetop. It raises the pot off the stove just enough to prevent scorching and allows us to do full whole grain boils for 5-6 gallon batches (starting with a volume of 7-7.5 gallons).
summary: This burner has really helped us when homebrewing on the ...

reviewText: The switch worked like a charm.  I'm so happy that the red "Oven On" light is now working correctly with the replacement.  If I would've known it would be this easy to fix the issue by simply replacing the switch, I would've done it 2 years ago.
summary: Great quality product and very fast shipment.

reviewText: I depend on my humidifier to maintain humidity for the well-being of very valuable wooden musical instruments. This filter doesn't wick the water up like the disposables I've been using. I checked the filter when I refilled this morning, and it was dry except for about 1 1/2" at the bottom. I turned it over, and an hour later, it was the same situation. I'm going back to the disposables. I'd rather pay more for a product that actually works.

So far, so good.  We haven't used it much yet, but it is easily washable and doesn't fall apart like the paper ones.  It wicks water well to humidify the room, too.  I don't know how long it will last, but when the time comes, I'll be back for another!
summary: Just what I was looking for!

reviewText: Buy this one from "Reliable Retailer" as I did and save money. This Sub Zero refrigerator door light switch is made by the same company who supplies the switch to nearly every refrigerator manufacture. Sub Zero doesn't make their own refrigerator door switches...they buy them from manufacturers like Littelfuse. This switch fit perfectly in place of the original Littelfuse brand that was in place when our Sub Zero model 532 was built.
summary: they buy them from manufacturers like Littelfuse. This switch fit perfectly in place of ...

reviewText:
Cheaper than paying a repair person to come out to fix this. Plenty of instruction videos on YouTube on how to do the repair.
Make sure you unplug the refrigerator or turn off the breaker before doing the repair.

Unfortunately, although I paid twice as much for what is supposed to be an OEM part, it failed after only five months. The original lasted 15 years, so I have my doubts that this is a genuine Whirlpool part.
summary: Perfectly good service, part broke after five months

reviewText: I ordered the replacement valve some time ago, but just installed it about an hour ago. The valve was very similar to the OEM valve. The only difference was the location of the wiring terminals was slightly different, but everything plugged in properly. The valve is working great and with no leaks. I spent more time cleaning up around and under the washer than installing the new valve. This valve was far cheaper than the OEM replacement and thus far is working great.

Beware that Maytag will not stand behind their products.  I had to do a repair within the warranty period and when the same problem continued 5 months later, but outside of the warranty period they refused to do more than provide replacement parts, leaving me with expensive service/labor bills.  I have since spoken with several other Maytag appliance owners and they have had similar problems.  I strongly recommend purchasing from a company that stands behind its products.
summary: I strongly recommend purchasing from a company that stands behind its products

reviewText: Our freezer was working fine.  The refrigerator was not working; and there was a clicking sound.  Essentially, the refrigerator is cooled by a fan blowing cool air from the freezer.  The control board controls the speed of the fan, based on the refrigerator temperature.  Replacing the control board worked.
summary: Its working so far. 4 weeks and counting.

reviewText:
DO NOT BUY THESE BOARDS UNLESS THEY ARE AN EXACT REPLACEMENT.  ACCORDING TO THE PRODUCT DESCRIPTION IT SHOULD HAVE BEEN A SUBSTITUTION BOARD THAT SHOULD HAVE WORKED.  HA HA!!!

Please follow the comments below.  Thanks.

Fantastic product. Very easy to use. It screws on to the flex hose exactly like it says. I found this product by accident while looking for a dryer vent. No more smashed flex hose behind the dryer. Excellent!

it fit perfectly into the glass block vent. I had to use glue to attach the piece on the left side of the photo to the glass block vent, because the vent did not have screw holes. the other side fit securely into it as expected.

I was very pleased to find this item on Amazon. For a minimum amount I was able to keep my very good KitchenAid blender. Without this item I would have had to replace my blender so this saved me a bunch.
summary: Great to find this & part works for my KitchenAid blender

reviewText: I had my doubts that this would work on my old washing machine even though I searched using the correct model number, but it fit perfectly and works like a charm! Saved me from having to use a wrench to run the machine and/or purchase a new machine! THANK YOU!!
summary: but it fit perfectly and works like a charm

reviewText:
Sent me the wrong item. They sent4396841, 4396841B, 4396841P, 4396841T, 4396842, 4396842B,4396842P, 4396842T, T1RFWG2, T1WG2, T1WG2L, T2RFWG2, T2WG2, T2WG2L for Whirlpool/Kitchenaid
and/or PUR 2305222, 2305267, 95357630, W10121145, W10121146, W10177635, W10186667, W10193691.
Not at all what I ordered and paid for.  Now I have to send it back and hope like heck I get my money back (credit my card).
Then, do I take a chance and reorder?  I hope this is clear enough for someone to understand.

Not sure what it actually filters out of the water (I know what it says it filters out), but the water has a nasty taste to it. Will stick to the more expensive brand from now on. Spend a few extra bucks and get a good water filter.

I'm shocked at how much the price of these has gone down since I started purchasing them a few years ago.  I have a Kenmore fridge and have been using these for a while.  they fit well and work just as well as other more expensive brands.
summary: I'm shocked at how much the price of these has ...

reviewText: So far, I think these work almost as well as my LGs.  The LG's were so expensive, so I thought I'd try these to save some money.  These are not exactly the same design as the LG. (Some very small differences between the two) but they did connect securely with no leakage.  I've been running one of the filters for several weeks now, and have had no problems.
summary: So far, I think these work almost as well ...

reviewText: THIS WAS AT A GREAT PRICE 2 FOR THE PRICE OF ONE. LOVE IT. I WAS BUYING IT FROM THE FACTORY AND GETTING ONE FOR THE PRICE OF WHAT I AM PAYING FOR TWO HEAR. LOVE IT... I WILL GET MY FILTERS FROM HERE FROM NOW ON..
summary: THIS WAS AT A GREAT PRICE 2 FOR THE PRICE OF ONE

reviewText: The EcoAqua water filter was a real disappointment.  I thought I could save some money by not buying the fridge manufacturer's more expensive filter.  The EcoAqua did not filter out the chlorine taste of water at all (the reason I use a filter).  I ended up suffering with it for a month and then deciding to throw it out and purchase the GE brand.  As soon as I installed the GE brand, the quality of the water went back to perfect.  Live and learn, I guess.
summary: Disappointed -- didn't filter out chlorine taste as promised.

reviewText:
Bought three filters to save money. 1 of 3 didn't work. Water went into the filter, but nothing came out. The other two filters fit and worked fine. Bought this to save money. It turns out I didn't save anything. I should have bought GSWF 3 packs.
Take your chances with after market items. Hope it's not Made In China.  Oops I just looked at the box and it's Made In China. Great! Now I hope I didn't get poisoned by chemicals.

Upon returning to amazon.com today to buy another one of these filters, I noticed some bad reviews. I am about to purchase my 2nd one because my current filter is 6 months old. As far as I can see, it works just as well as the original GE filter. I've had no problems at all--that's why I'm here to buy another one today! The 'stats' on the filtration capabilities of this filter actually claim to out-permorm the GE filter for some particulate matter. Plus, the price is great!

We had a problem with our dryer.  We were not sure what was wrong.  Called a repair man and he told us it was this part that was broken.  We ordered it on line and installed it with no problem.  Now our dryer works like brand new.
thank you
summary: this was exactly what we needed

reviewText: I bought this coupler kit along with a replacement clutch. These parts fit perfectly to my 2003 Imperial Series II Whirlpool washing machine. The sturdiness and quality of these parts are there. I would definitely purchase this item again if I ever needed it. This has been installed for over six months in the washing machine along with the replacement clutch. The washing machine now spins with a renewed force I haven't seen since I bought it 15 years ago.
summary: Great quality part, works like a charm!

reviewText: Unfortunately it didn't meet my expectations. Although I checked before purchasing it - whether it will fit my model or not - but it didn't, and it took me a couple of hours to install it, and because it didn't fit appropriately, it added too much pressure on the engine which burned it and I had to get rid of the whole washer.
summary: Unfortunately it didn't meet my expectations.

reviewText: This is a genuine whirlpool replacement part that is cheaper via Amazon than my not so local parts supplier...and not much else to say other than my washer is back to washing.  It's not a huge deal to install if you are mechanically inclined, know how to operate a screwdriver and don't mind laying your washer down so you can access it from the bottom.  There are plenty of how-to videos on YouTube that cover this as well.

Worked like a charm! Nice to have the washer working again.

There were clear instructions online about how to disassemble the washer (casing, pump, motor) to be able to replace the part, and the fix was cheap and easy.
summary: Easy fix for a Kitchenaid washer that won't spin.

reviewText: Works great!  Box was printed with OEM information - not a label - and the part looked 99.5% identical to the original one in our dryer.  Went with this one since another reviewer stated something similar to what I just said.  If it stops working, I'll update my review.  **Update 07/28/2016:  dryer still working great!!**  **Update 12/01/2017:  dryer still working great!**

Exactly what I needed.  My washer is 8 years old and while not leaking, mold has accumulated on the diaphragm gasket that I could not remove.  I found some good videos on Youtube showing how to replace this with very little disassembly of the unit.  The entire job took around 30 minutes and the washer has been working perfectly.  Thank you for providing this product at a reasonable price.

My husband installed this last week on our Samsung Front Loader and so far there are no leaks or anything. It's definitely a tedious job but once you do it the first time it will be easier to figure out the next time you have to replace it. Definitely worth not having to pay someone a few hundred to do it.

We have a WF328AAW washer that got a hole in the diaphragm and instead of spending a few hundred dollars to call a repairman in, I decided to try it myself.  This part fit perfectly and although I had never even opened up a washer before, the repair only took about an hour to finish. There were a couple videos on Youtube that I followed as well.

Our washer died on us, and it wouldn't even power up.  I took the top off of it hoping I would get lucky and the problem would be obvious.  I noticed a part that looked a bit charred, and it turned out to be the filter assembly.  Since the washer is ~$1000 new, I decided to take a chance and buy this unit.  It came quickly, and installed in about 15 minutes.  The washer came to life, and has been working great.

I thought I was going to have to spend several hundred dollars repairing my washing machine. Thanks to Youtube and Amazon, I was able to figure out the source of the problem (and how to fix it). For just a few dollars, I have a perfectly functioning washing machine.

I have used this speaker almost every single day since it arrived. I love it! It's great to have in the car, while I'm doing dishes (It's waterproof so it doesn't matter if it gets splashed), and even in the shower.

This did work perfectly fine and did its job, but I shouldn't have been messing around with these things as I didn't know enough about what I was doing, so although this item works perfect I would caution other homeowners not to just buy this and use it to squirt a random amount of freon into an old refrigeration appliance in my case I made it worse because I used the wrong type of refrigerant. If you know what you are doing then this is going to work great for you.
summary: This did work perfectly fine and did its job

reviewText: I LOVE, LOVE, LOVE THIS ICE MAKER!!  The only way to get ice faster is to go to the store and buy it!  I bought this one to replace my old one after a power surge fried it.  Best choice I could have made!

This is the second ice maker from this company that I have purchased and the first one didn't even last a month.  I figured, it was a one-off and so I replaced it with the same kind.  My second one lasted from Jan. 13, 2015 until today, April 27, 2015.  The worst money I have ever spent.  I will never buy from this company again.

My small apartment refrigerator just didn't have enough freezer space, and this unit solved the problem perfectly.  I put it on a small end table in my extra bedroom, to bring it to a better height.  I'm very happy with the unit.
summary: to bring it to a better height. I'm very happy with the unit

reviewText: I've read other reviews that weren't very good , but this freezer was the size and price I was looking for. It arrived in perfect condition, and has worked fine for months now.  Best yet ,it hasn't even impacted my electric bill.

I purchased this product at the end of December. I read all the reviews and decided to give it a chance. It is now the first part of April and the freezer is not working; what a waste of money. I recommend that you spend your money wisely and not buy this product.

This door bin matched my fridge's door bin exactly.  I have a Frigidaire fridge and the door bin snapped and fell off one day.  I looked around for a replacement and found them for ridiculous prices until I found this one.  There were no reviews on it but I decided to take a chance with it and I am glad that I did.  There were no issues installing it and it has held up great so far.  Don't waste your money with the more expensive ones!

This is most amazing replacement refrigerator door bin I have ever purchased.  It fits perfectly in my refrigerator and holds things just like the original one did.  I don't know if there are any improvements at all that could be made to this product.  I'm impressed and know for sure that if anything ever happens to any of my other OEM refrigerator door bins, I will be right back here ordering another one of these guys.

These appear to be of the same quality as those sold by the appliance manufacturer - but at half the price.  I have not had the water analyzed for a comparison so I cannot voucher for the purity, but the appearance of the water is the same.
summary: Water Filter Replacement by Swift Green

reviewText: I had previously bought Sears & LG filters at a very high cost.  Some of the LG filters only lasted a few weeks and I couldn't get a refund for the poor performance.  I came across these and thought I'd give them a try.  What a surprise!!! Not only are they less costly, but they do a better job that Sears & LG ever did.  Would strongly recommend these.  They are the only ones I will ever order.

This washing machine is amazing!  I purchased this for my mother who lives in an apartment without a washer/dryer hookup.  This machine washes quickly and efficiently.  The spinner gets most of the water out of the laundry, making drying time much faster.  I printed off a review that had tips on how much detergent to use and how many articles of what type of clothing, etc. to put in.  These tips have been a life saver.  I highly recommend this washing machine to anyone tight on space or money.
summary: This washing machine is amazing! I purchased this for my mother who lives ...

reviewText: I HAVE READ MANY BAD REVIEWS ON THIS MACHINE.....SCRATCH THEM ALL.....IF YOU FOLLOW INSTRUCTIONS THE WAY THEY ARE WRITTEN FROM THE PERSON WHO MADE THIS MACHINE AND KNOWS IT BEST YOU WILL HAVE NO TROUBLE ATALL....THE MACHINE DOES NOT LEAK.....AND THE ONLY SMELL IS THE SMELL FROM ANY NEW PLASTIC ITEM......FROM A CHRISTIAN TO ALL OF YOU THIS IS A GREAT LITTLE ITEM....THANK YOU FOR MAKING IT......I WILL ALSO BE BUYING THE DRYER FROM YALL.....GOD BLESS
summary: I HAVE READ MANY BAD REVIEWS ON THIS MACHINE

reviewText: I highly recommend this washing machine. It cleans my clothes faster and better than the local laundromat, and will save me tons of money in the long run. I can wash 4 pairs of clothing (minus jeans) at a time in this washer. Or one pair of jeans. I wish I would have bought this sooner

Replaced the original rubber hoses that came with the dryer. Easy to follow directions.  Installed easily. Greatest challenge was moving the washer so we could get to the faucet and water hookups. No leaks so far.

I looked everywhere for a braided line to hook in our steam dryer. This kit comes with everything you need to add a steam dryer to an existing washer hookup. I prefer the stainless braided lines over rubber since they are much less likely to fail. I have not had any leaks for a month now.
summary: Perfect to add a steam dryer!

reviewText: We bought this product two years ago and were happy with it until this Christmas Eve when I preheated an empty oven and suddenly heard a loud noise and saw flames in the oven.  LG was completely unresponsive and absolutely unhelpful.  This product is hazardous and the company is irresponsible.  I will never purchase another LG product!
summary: We bought this product two years ago and were happy with it until this Christmas Eve when I preheated ...

reviewText: This is a very good and complete kit.at a reasonable price. It has all the parts needed to install a dishwasher and all of the parts appear to be of excellent quality. The extra parts not needed can be saved for use in future projects.

Great kit for the money. It came with everything in the picture and I didn't end up needing all of the parts. All parts were high quality and the kit was significantly cheaper than anything else I could find. I ended up not being able to use the water line because my dishwasher is not right next to the sink so it was too short, but that's my fault for not measuring beforehand. Happy with the purchase.

This is a great item! I have had an old plastic gap cover for 10 years, and it had slowly fallen apart.  This one is metal, and has a magnet to keep it firmly in place.  If you are looking to bridge the gap between washer and dryer, or stove and counter, I highly recommend this one!

Make sure you measure before ordering to make sure you are getting the right length. I knew it would be a few inches too short (haha!) but went ahead with the purchase anyway. Also, after buying this product you might need to level your stove with the counter if it hasn't been level to begin with. This is a bit tricky and took me quite a while (would've been much faster with more people). Once the stove and counter are perfectly level, this product rests very flat against the surface!
summary: Great product as described. Perfect for stopping food from falling into the crack!

reviewText: So happy with this product! I've been searching for years to find something to keep crumbs and spills from falling down the crack between the stove and countertop and this did the trick! I love that it's magnetic so it stays in place, but it's easy to remove for cleaning.

When I first rec"d the item my first impression was this item is too narrow for the gap between the stove, but once I placed the item on the stove it fit perfectly. The magnets are very strong and the material is not cheap or flimsy. I am very well pleased and satisfied.
summary: I am very well pleased and satisfied

reviewText: At first I was ready to return the item,  it was much smaller than my previous one.  Once I actually put it in place on my stove I saw that it was perfect and because it is magnetic it stayed in place even better than the one I had previously so I kept it and ordered another one for the other side of my stove.

This little conversion kit saved us from having to replace our dryer with a new one set up for propane.  I also went on the Whirlpool site to look up my dryer model to see which conversion kit to use.  We called the Whirlpool line and verified that information and they linked us to an installer who is a factory trained installer.  They came out and installed this kit before we moved and when we got to our new home all we had to do was attach the gas supply line.
summary: Great buy on Amazon as we couldn't find it in the stores!!

reviewText: This is somewhat time-consuming to install. If you are mechanically inclined and have a few tools you will save about $100 to do this yourself. I put this in my new Whirlpool Duet dryer and it works fantastic. It took me about 40 minutes to complete the job. There are many YouTube videos on how to do this project.  I suggest you look at them before you try it yourself.

The new lint filter works fine. It appears nearly identical to the old lint filter that we had to replace because the handle broke. Will be careful with the new lint filter so it doesn't break like the old one did.
summary: New dryer screen  lint filter works fine

reviewText:
Fits perfectly. Works just like the original lint filter.

The differences between this filter and the one that came with my machine are aesthetic (color of the screen, etc.). I have not owned it long enough to assess durability.
summary: Almost exactly like the original lint filter

reviewText: I have an older Kenmore dryer.  Everywhere I looked, the price for this lint filter (even Sears) was astronomical.  I got lucky when I found it on Amazon.  This fit into my dryer seamlessly, so I will be able to hold off looking for a new dryer for just a little while longer.
summary: Making an older dryer last a little bit longer.

reviewText: What a difference a great set of bearings make. I compared these to the original bearings in the washer and it was obvious these are much higher quality. Very pleased and well worth the extra cost. Especially considering what a drag it is to take a front end washer apart. I don't want to have to do this again for many a year.

Easy to install if you take pictures of the relay that is already installed. Make a very close inspection and drawing of the wires and terminals before you disconnect the old relay. I did this and had the new relay installed quickly without any problems. The relay corrected the problem. Take your time with the inspection as this phase is most important.
summary: Easy to install if you take pictures of the relay ...

reviewText: I could not be happier with this Rosewill RHAI-1800W Induction Cooker!!!  This is the first time I have used an induction cooker, and I have cooked eggs, bacon, grilled cheese sandwiches, stews, soups, chicken, steaks, pasta dishes, etc.  In fact, this cooker and a microwave are the only appliances that I have, so it is used every day and for a multitude of cooking needs.  I am considering purchasing a second one to make the preparation of full meals more convenient.  Thanks Rosewill - Good Job!
summary: A GREAT INDUCTION COOKER AT A DECENT PRICE.

reviewText: Love it. I bought it to cook outside the house, specially when you are frying things like fish with a strong smell that will just take over the house. Be aware that as soon as the pot makes contact with the burner it will turn it on....
summary: Love it. I bought it to cook outside the ...

reviewText: I love it, especially for frying shrimp, fries, etc., because it has plenty of power to maintain proper high heat. However, it should be used with a  thermometer (hand-held laser is best) as the temperature settings are really just wattage settings. I also love it's portability because I can set it outside on my grill and avoid the cooking smells that accompany frying indoors.
summary: I love it, especially for frying shrimp

reviewText: I had high hopes for this product. Unfortunately it shouldn't be used by cardiac patients that have a pacemaker or defibrillator implant in their chest. The strong magnetic field it creates could cause a malfunction in the implant or even cause it to set to it's defaults according to my cardiologist. Although the likelihood of this happening is remote the possibility still exists.
summary: Cardiac patients with implanted devices/pacemaker cardio defibrillator beware.

reviewText: Love this cooker. Had to learn to cook again because it is very fast. Once I got used to it, I have used it and used it, and it is just about a month or less old. If it holds up, I will love it even more, and perhaps give one or two to friends for Christmas.

The reflective coating on the bottom, inside of the complimentary pot got dull after the first use. I don't think the pot can stand up to the heat of an induction cooker, but the structure of the pot itself was fine. Like others said, it does feel a bit thin. No complaints with the induction cooker though, it's powerful and works reliably.
summary: inside of the complimentary pot got dull after the first use

reviewText: I read a lot of reviews before buying this as a Christmas gift.  This one seemed to be quite well received and was the right price.  My son sent a thank you after he had used it the first time and said it worked great.
summary: Appreciated by the chef in the family.

reviewText: 10 years later, our lint trap died a horrible death.  I was worried that we wouldn't be able to find another lint trap given that the dryer is outdated.  However, this fit perfectly and does the job.  It is exactly the same quality as the one that came with the dryer.  So I expect it to last another 10 years.

I'm a no frills kind of guy. When I saw these on groupon I went for it. They're a simple design without frilly details on them. They're made of a nice, comfortable, terry cloth material and are easy to get on to appliance handles. I chose the grey color which works for my stainless steel and white appliances. I now have them on my frig, oven, and dishwasher. I need to get another one for my BBQ grill handle. I definitely recommend them.

Love this handle cover.  I use it on the handle of my kitchen stove to keep my dish towel from constantly slipping off and falling onto the floor.  It attaches with Velcro and is easy to put on/take off to wash. The Velcro runs the entire length of the cover.  This cover is made of terry cloth, so it has some stretch and "give" to it.  (Comes in a set of 2).

If I am paying $17.95 for this piece of simple cloth, it better come encased in gold. This is just a simple piece of cloth sewed with Velcro. Even $5 is too much. Poor quality and overpriced. Stay away!

Installed easy.  No leaks.  Says it is sssembled in China.  Water tastes good.
I ran a little over a gallon to flush it out and did not see any discoloration of particles floating in the water. Only had it for one day but so far so good.  Got it for around $15.  So far, this one is as good as the one they sell at Lowes for $55.  I'll update later if there are any issues.
summary: I will order this filter again!

reviewText: This water filter is great. We had to get it to replace a different generic filter that we had only been using for a week. The other one started having an awful metallic taste, but once we switched to this one, the taste went away and the water tastes great again. No metallic taste or chlorine taste at all.  A great filter at a great price.

This filter preforms just like the LG filter that came with the fridge. The water tastes great and it is so much more economical. I've bought and used three of these so far. I'm very happy with them and will continue coming back.

I bought this as a replacement for my Kenmore Elite fridge. It is an exact replica of the Kenmore one on the exterior. It is easy to replace and fits perfectly. The flavor of the water is the exact same as it was from the Kenmore filter.

The price is good for the quality of product. I will buy this filter again the next time I need one.
summary: Good Filter, Direct Replacement, Tastes Great.

reviewText: Purchased these as replacements for my Kenmore water system. These are so much more affordable. Already installed and doing a great job. I purchased several to be ready for the time the filter needs to be replaced. I would recommend these for any looking for Kenmore water filter replacements.

If your dryer goes down, the price for the amount of parts is stupendous.  This pack comes with every sensor needed to rejuvenate your ailing dryer.  You won't go wrong.  My dryer runs better now than the day I bought it and first started using it.

I love my dishwasher again. These replacement wheels and roller studs are far superior to the original wheels. They were easy to install and have remained securely on the rack. The dishwasher is used frequently.

Great product!  I bought 4 of these to fix some broken wheels on my GE dishwasher.  They are far superior to the wheels that come on the dishwasher, so I came back and bought 4 more.  The wheel itself is much wider, thus does not fall off the track.  Also, the clip is much more snug so I have not had a problem with any of them slipping off.  Also, do not be afraid of the "assembly".  I'm not sure what the other users were talking about, it only took me two seconds to snap the clip into the wheel itself.
summary: Great product! I bought 4 of these to fix ...

reviewText: What's wrong with the washer? It's probably the pump. Should I schedule a service call? At this low price the easiest thing to do was replace the pump. It has been running for several months now with no problem. Other web sites wanted over $100 dollars for a replacement pump. Everything lined up and fit with no problem.
summary: Far Cheaper than a service call.

reviewerName: Oops! Invalid URL! Please check parameters in the web address.
reviewText: "Went without an ice maker for a month, finally bought this one. Received it quickly and it was reasonable priced. Plugged it in, no ice. Checked the back of the frig and saw a large air bubble in the water line to the ice maker. Unplugged the frig, air bubble disappeared, and we waited. About a half an hour later we heard the sound of ice falling into the container."  So relieved!!  Thank you!
summary: "Went without an ice maker for a month, finally ...

reviewText: I don't know how many years I put up with that cracked dryer filter before I thought to look for a new one.  I just searched for the model number of the dryer to find the right one.  It fits perfectly and makes me happier with every load.
summary: New filter for an old dryer

reviewText: My old filter was corroded & I was worried about lint build-up causing a fire. This new one has been in my dryer for almost a year now doing its job and holding up well. I would recommend doing thorough research to make sure you're purchasing the correct one. My dryer is about 15 years old, and the original GE product number changed. I would suggest going to GE's website to confirm it's the correct one. At the time I bought it, it as much cheaper here than the manufacturer's site.

Worked perfectly to stop our leaky dishwasher. The old one had an obvious indentation in it, which was causing the leak. It was 10 years old. It popped right out, and this one went right in. The only thing that you have to do it make sure that you set it evenly. You want to have the same amount of leftover on both sides. Entire process took 2 minutes. No more leaks.
summary: Perfect fit, and it works great.

reviewText: I love it!  My son has down syndrome and autism so I have to keep everything locked up.  I have a side by side refrigerator and put one set on each side on the top of the fridge with a padlock with combination.
summary: I love it! My son has down syndrome and autism ...

reviewText: My daughter takes medication that leaves her constantly hungry.  She is autistic and will get up in the middle of the night and eat anything that is not locked up.  This contraption works well.  Sticks to the door strongly without needing anything except the sticky pad that comes on it.

The sticky surface has an iron grip once it's set in place.  The holes are big enough to accomodate a regular size padlock.  I had bought one set for the refrigerator door and another set for the freezer door.  I only wish I could have placed them close enough to allow for 1 padlock to be used for both sets.  The handles didn't allow for that, but nonetheless, an excellent product.

The only items allowed in my mancave refrigerator/freezer are pizza, ice, ice cream, bratwurst, and the occasional soda.

These ensure that only I have access.

The large adhesive pads stick solidly to the smooth, clean surface of the doors. Not exactly the best looking solution, but hey... "mancave", and with these in place, my wife and teenager cannot fill up my space with non-mancave related "overflow".

I purchased this not for a refrigerator, but to lock down my $500 printer. I was robbed of a large sum about a year ago, and I purchased this to lock down an expensive printer to a heavy piece of office furniture. It doesn't look that great, but it works! It will be obvious if someone tries to move this!

These locks are great! They work well. We've installed these on a mini-fridge at work and our personal chest freezer (that is outside of our home and easily-accessible to unwanted visitors if they chose to look in our freezer). No drilling involved so you don't ruin your refrigerator or chest freezer, but once you place these on your appliance, you'll have to pry them off. They won't just come off easily. Great for what we needed.
summary: No drilling involved! You won't ruin your applicances, but this helps keep unwanted visitors out of them!

reviewText: I've ordered 2 of these, and both have leaked... as in coffee leaking out when it is percolating. The bottom of the glass appears to be cut crooked. I'm guessing that's the reason for the leak. I had one that came with the percolator that worked but was bumped against something and broke. Not sure why I can't get my hands on one that is working.
summary: I've ordered 2 of these, and both have leaked ...

reviewText:
I have tried this filter on two occasions and both times,  myself and my family members all noticed that water did not taste nearly as good as the GE brand water filters.

 We ended up replacing the filter with the GE brand shortly after it was installed each time.
summary: Water does not taste good or not as good at the GE brand.

reviewText: I have purchased this product many times in the past and have been very satisfied. But the manufacturer has now changed the design, and even though it says it should work with my fridge, the new design does not work with my fridge.
summary: No longer works with my fridge

reviewText: Screwed right in. Didn't work.  No water flowed into  it. Looked it over and didn't see what was causing the problem, nothing looked questionable.  Checked the model number, it was the right one. Tried a dozen times, still didn't work.  Got a refund in no time.  Ordered a replacement from another company,  just in case.  This happened once before with a genuine GE filter.
summary: Sometimes these filters just don't work.  Not sure why.

reviewText: I bought these filters because I could no longer find the replacements made by Whirlpool for my Whirlpool filter.  I installed one of the filters and think that it works better than the brand-name filters that I had always used.  I am very pleased with the product.  In addition, it was nicely packaged and shipped promptly.  I will definitely order more from this seller.

This filter is about half the weight of the original GE filter, but other than that I cannot tell any difference. This filter installs exactly the same way and the water tastes just as good with this filter as with the more expensive GE filter. Very happy with this purchase.
summary: GE GSWF SmartWater Comparable Refrigerator Filter.

reviewText: I bought 3 of these from Woot. I put in the first one and flushed a few gallons of water through it, but the water tastes horrible (a chemical taste). I thought maybe the first one was defective, so I tried another. No luck, the water is still terrible tasting. What a waste of money!

This product does not work.  I'm not sure where the defect is, but when inserted, it doesn't quite line up properly and once turned into place, it makes a horrible noise and water pours out on to the floor.  I tried this a couple of times and finally decided it is not a workable alternative to the overpriced brandname one.  Don't waste your money on this cheap alternative- you get what you pay for...
summary: Didn't line up and water poured out onto the floor

reviewText: The filters were shipped shortly after ordering and arrived on the expected day.  They fit the refrigerator perfectly and are functioning well.  These seem like a good replacement for the more expensive Whirlpool filters.

I was concerned at first that the filter would not fit my Kenmore Refrigerator. When they arrived, I was pleasantly surprised that they fit perfect. Besides this, the price is quite a bit lower than the OEM I've had to purchase in the past.  I will continue to purchase from DiscountFilterStore as their service is awesome and prices are fantastic.
summary: I was pleasantly surprised that they fit perfect. Besides this

reviewText: I installed my first Tier 1 filter in May of 2015 and it's still working. I've ordered another filter because the name brand ones usually last 6 to 7 months. I would highly recommend this filter. Today is May 20th, 2016 and I just ordered my 3rd tier 1 filter. These last as long as the name brand filters, but at less than half the price.

I checked around and found this 3-pack, which had the lowest cost per unit. Upon receipt of my order, I installed one and it went on exactly as an OEM unit would, no problems whatsoever. Truth be told, I can't tell if the water tastes any better, but the ice cubes do look a little clearer so I'm sure the filter is doing its job.

This is the first time I bought this brand of filter. In the past I have always used Kenmore or Whirlpool.  Anyway, I installed it a few days ago.  The water tastes terrible, I will not drink it.  This has never happened before.  I will be throwing this out and going to the store to buy one of the brands I usually used and never had any issues with.

I ordered this product as a set of 3 and was given a ship date that would be 5 weeks in the future.  I was pleasantly surprised to receive it just 10 days after placing the order.  I've used it for over a month now and the water that comes out is clean and clear as expected.  I'm glad I bought 3 and will enjoy the fresh water produced for the next 18-24 months.

Compared to the original LG water filter, this is terrible. I can taste the chlorine in the water and the taste is very different compared to when the water is filtered by the original LG filter.

Not recommended.
summary: this is terrible. I can taste the chlorine in the water ...

reviewText: These are great filters. We travel to the Great Smoky Mountains every year & stay in really nice cabins. Nearly all of them use well water that smells of sulphur. It's safe, but smelly. These filters eliminate all the taste & smell. The best part is how fast they work. No waiting for that annoying slow drip.

This is the most convenient and efficient water purifier I have ever owned.  Now I don't have to keep bulky water pitchers in the refrigerator.  The filter is easy to use, takes up little room in the cabinet, and can be taken anywhere I go.  Since I travel it is always a part of my suitcase.  Love it !

It's plastic, but the "chrome" plating looks pretty good and won't rust. Plus, you can't argue with the price.

The "tall style" description might make you think it's larger than it is. It's only 2.5" tall with a 1.8" diameter, which is exactly what I needed. However, many of the dishwasher air caps sold on Amazon are larger, so don't let the "tall style" description make you assume it will fit if you have a large air gap. Make sure you measure before buying.
summary: No complaints. It's nothing fancy, but it's cheap and works fine. Make sure you measure your air gap before buying.

reviewText:
I just wanted the cap, but this came with the air gap (the part the hoses connect to) as well, for about half the price I saw at a certain big-box store that really likes orange.

This is a chromed plastic cap, so the chrome will probably wear off in a few years, but it's perfect for my current needs.
summary: More than expected at a great price

reviewText:
I did not think I could change the dryer belt myself. But after watching the videos on YouTube I decided to tackle the job. Beware! Do not get a belt that is not an OEM product. My belt came in record time and it was exactly as described. I cannot imagine how much money I saved by doing it myself.
One note though. When putting the belt back on you will need at least two people, one to position the belt tensioner as the other person threads the belt around the motor.

I've never really worked on a dryer before but thanks to the power of youtube and amazon, I was able to successfully get my dryer back up and running.  The belt is just the right size and seems to be of good quality.

Do yourself a favor and buy a different part.  It took me an hour to file the metal tab by hand so that it would fit onto my washer (by the way my original part did not have metal tabs).  It's working fine now that I got it installed, but so not worth the effort...
summary: It's working fine now that I got it installed

reviewText: This was not identical to the one I removed from my washing machine, the center piece was metal. After it was installed it spun for almost 1 minute, then smelled of burning rubber and would not spin. I removed it and found the new piece had broken. The metal piece broke the plastic and wouldn't turn. I used the 1/2 that was not broken along with the 1/2 from the one I removed and it worked .I will be reordering a new peice ... but not this one.
summary: This was not identical to the one I removed from ...

reviewText: Saved me a bunch of money. Installation wasn't bad thanks to videos on youtube.com showing step by step how to do the repair. I've only had it in my samsung for about a month now. I'll come back if this thing breaks down on me.
summary: Installation wasn't bad thanks to videos on youtube

reviewText: I'm not sure if I can say I love it mostly because it's a heating element and it doesn't seem really "sexy" in and of itself. It does work well and I haven't had any issues the past couple months since I replaced the old heating element.
summary: I'm not sure if I can say I love it mostly because it's a heating element and it ...

reviewText: If you're a do-it-yourselfer, this is the perfect way to avoid a costly repair bill.  When my KitchenAid dryer stopped heating up, I was pretty sure the problem was in the heating element, but just to make sure, I unplugged it (very important; 220V can kill you) and checked the old heating element with an ohmmeter to verify that it was bad.  This replacement was easy to install, and my dryer is as good as new.

Easy to use and apply.  Much cheaper option than replacing the rack(s) with a new one.  I don't know why all the dishwasher manufacturers use such a thin plastic coating on the racks.  Even thin coating on the very expensive dishwashers!  Takes some patience if you have lots of areas to fix, but definitely a much more cost effective option compared to replacement.

Very pleased with how this worked. Covered the broken/rusting bit easily. Followed the instructions and it worked perfectly. Very glad to have been able to fix this on my own and especially glad to have stopped the rust marks on dishes and dishwasher.

This product worked great on my EXTREMELY sad dishwasher racks. I waited way too long to do this (probably hoping the dishwasher would die so that I could get a new one) and  am very happy with the results. I did prep work as suggested on YouTube, and the results are very satisfactory.
summary: Help for sad, sad dishwasher racks

reviewText: This covered all the rust spots on our dishwasher! The fumes are a little strong, but it eventually goes away. I would recommend not using the dishwasher for 3-4 days JUST to be safe! These were a great alternative to buying a new set of dishwasher racks (which are ridiculously over priced).

Yes you have to redo it from time to time but this product works well and will save you from buying a new dishwasher that doesn't work takes 3 hours to clean your dishes.  Of course if your current dishwasher doesn't get your dishes clean go right ahead and buy a new one you will not notice the difference.
summary: Don't buy a new dish washer!!!!!!

reviewText: I moved into my house about five years ago and the racks in my dishwasher had started to rust in places. This rack repair worked fine. I just used it about a week ago, so I can't say how it will hold up, but the repair looks sturdy. I was pleased with the results.

Worked pretty well with two coats.  Most of the rust that I was trying to cover has been concealed.  This has saved me from having to buy a new lower dishwasher rack.  Who doesn't like saving money?  And my wife thought I was awesome for fixing the rusted rack.  Who doesn't like to be admired by their wife?  Or husband?  Not making any judgments here. I don't care if its your dog that admires you. Its just nice to be appreciated for the little things you do around the house.  Am I right?
summary: Worked pretty well with two coats

reviewText:
When I moved to my current house, my dishwasher had rusts inside and I found on the web that I can fix this issue by using a dishwasher rack repair. And I bought this product because of it's good reviews. I used it for my dishwasher rack and I do not have any rust issues so far.
(Please remember to ventilate the area while using this product)

We had 6 or 7 medium and some small rust spots on our dishwasher racks.  I didn't want to replace the dishwasher just for the racks and decided to take a chance on Rerack Dishwasher Rack Repair.  It's been at least 6 months and it works like a charm.  Easy to use and apparently is extremely tough since I haven't been able to destroy it because I am known for just slinging stuff onto the racks.

Delivered quickly and worked really well.  We had a lot of rust areas on our dishwasher racks.  I didn't put on as many coats as I wanted to, but even in the areas where there were only one or two coats, it's held up so far (5 or 6 weeks).  I would definitely recommend using this as soon as any rust areas show up as the earlier you coat them, the better.  The only negative was the strong chemical smell.  It didn't bother me, but gave my wife a bad headache.  Other than that, I have no complaints.

summary: Steel Couples Eternal Love Pendants Necklace Set 18" & 22" Chain

reviewText: This is what I have needed for a long time.  Dishwasher racks are very expensive.  This is a simple and inexpensive way to solve my problems from wear and tear.  The product is great and the Seller was a joy to work with.

My dishwasher is old, but still works fine. The replacement racks are too expensive; so, I figured I'd try this and get a new dishwasher if it didn't work. However, it did the trick. It is easy to apply and I've washed a lot of dishes without any flaking, peeling or any problems.

Does exactly what it is supposed to do.  Who knew that your dishwasher rack would break down and corrode and rust over like that?  I didn't but this stuff does work.  It wasn't hard to apply but I did find that you have to work fast because it sets up very very quickly.

I am putting off buying new appliances until I can buy all of them together and remodel my kitchen. This is just what I needed. It works great. I had very bad rust and if you get it off first and create a good surface this will help you keep your dishwasher going without the expense of buying new racks or a new dishwasher.

For less than $10. I saved the cost of a new dishwasher.  Nothing wrong with mine, other than rusting racks.  When I learned that replacing the racks would cost more than $200, I decided that a new dishwasher was a better option.  Then I discovered Rerack.  It was easy to apply & was done in less than an hour.  Fantastic!

This stuff is great. I was pricing new dishwasher racks (expensive) to replace my rusted ones when I ran across this product.  I couldn't pass it up for the price; I figured it was worth a shot and it was.  It takes three to four coats to do a good job, but the time involved is worth it.  No more rust spots on my dishes. No more rust spots on the interior of my dishwasher. One bottle is more than enough to do one dish washer.  Don't buy new racks; buy ReRack instead.

I only put this stuff on a few weeks ago but it took care of the rust problem in the dishwasher at our rental and has held up.  It took a bit of time to put on multiple coats but it seems to have been worth it.  Also, the fumes are pretty strong so you may want to apply in a ventilated area.

Unfortunately this cleaning brush did not work at all for us. As soon as my husband placed it into the duct, it broke and got stuck. We had to cut the drywall out in order to remove it. Waste of time and money!

This is a great tool. It had been twenty years since we bought our house and the dryer vent had never been cleaned. The time it took to dry went from less than 60 minutes to 80 minutes. This tool went around corners and with a drill went through packed areas with very little effort. I used my shop vac to get the lint as it came out and I worked from both ends as there was more than 12 ft. Of pipe. I ended up with enough lint in my vac to fill up a 3.5 gallon bucket.
summary: This is a great tool. It had been twenty years since we ...

reviewText: I'm one of those people that have always heard how important it is to clean out your dryer vents, but I never really got around to it. I finally decided to do it and I ordered this kit. Wow. You wouldn't believe how much lint came out of my dryer vent. I ran a load of clothes after cleaning, and they get dry 10-15 minutes faster than before. Not only does cleaning the vent reduce fire risk, but also saves me time every time I do laundry.

The lint remover works well.  The rods have just the right amount of flex to go around bends in the duct and are stiff enough that they will not kink.  The brush scrapes off lint you probably could not get off any other way.

It completely exceeded my expectations. It worked perfectly with the drill, it pretty much loses force when it's bent at a 90 angle but I can't imagine how it couldn't. The handles/extenders are stiff enough to allow for manual use too (i.e. without a drill), which helps with those 90 angles.

The brush was a lot more durable than I thought it would be.

Easy to use w/ an electric drill. I followed the package instructions and was very pleased with the results. Our dryer is doing a better job w/ everything cleaned out. (I also used a brush to clean out the dryer itself.)
summary: Easy to use w/ an electric drill

reviewText: I'm very impressed. This thing cleaned out my dryer exhaust line better than anything I've ever tried. Tip: have a vacuum cleaner running while using it, so you can suck up the lint that it pulls out. Also, it's pretty much only good for a single 90 degree bend; if you have more than that, you'll have to go at it from both sides or take the line apart at one of the bends.

This was a very good tool.  We had quite a build up of lint in our dryer and its associated vents.  The tool was so strong, we didn't have to use the drill attachment.  Rather, we used just the tool and it was very successful.  Our dryer works as good as it did the day it was delivered.  We're now on a schedule to use this tool quarterly.
summary: This was a very good tool. We had quite a build up of ...

reviewText: I pulled a ton of lint out of my dryer vents that I had no idea was even there!  I could have very well avoided a house fire from this nifty little gadget. Well worth the money...don't regret this purchase at all.
summary: I pulled a ton of lint out of my dryer ...

reviewText: I bought these to clean out my dryer vent after my heating element burnt out. I wanted to make sure a clogged dryer vent didn't cause it to burn out among other things. I was worried this wouldn't work because my dryer vent has two sharp turns and is made of a cheaper foil material. I had no issues at all with the curves or with damaging the ventilation. I didn't hook it up to a drill just to be cautious so I wouldn't tear the ventilation. Highly recommend.

These measuring cups are so great.  The cups have the measurements engraved (imprinted) on them which means they'll never wash off so you'll never have to guess what measure you're using!  I would highly recommend them!

The smallest cup (1/8) fell off the counter when I was making pancake batter this morning.  The handle broke off from the cup, so that's the end of its use.  I cook and bake a lot.  A cup needs to be able to take a fall and not break.  I had high expectations for this set.  It lasted a little over a month.  I could have bought sixteen sets from the dollar store for what I paid for these.  Very disappointed!
summary: Lasted a little more than a month.

reviewText: The quality is great.  I love the fact that the writing is not going to rub off from wear.  I bake a lot and have been looking for something like these for a very long time!  I highly recommend these and the company is very nice to work with.

Terribly overpriced. These just barely cover the interior surface of a standard drip pan, but there is no "lip" on them, to keep food from dropping down between the two. They're flimsy--of course they are--but also ill-fitting, so there's really no hope of them doing what they're supposedly designed to do. They neither protect nor improve the appearance of the drip pans on my stove.  I was definitely reminded, with this purchase, that the cost of Prime shipping results in inflated product costs.
summary: Terribly overpriced. These just barely cover the interior surface ...

reviewText:
I had used these in the past and they were great.  I have been unable to find them in my city, so of course I went to Amazon and there they were.
These liners do a fantastic job of keeping the burners clean.
summary: ... had used these in the past and they were great. I have been unable to find them in ...

reviewText: I am feeling like I have been scammed.  The product picture is very misleading.  It implies that there will be more than one receptacle when it really only contains parts to repair one.  The number of pieces should have been provided so that I could have made a decision.
summary: I am feeling like I have been scammed

reviewText: Water was leaking from the original feed tube which was 14 years old..  The feeding tube snapped immediately when I removed it off the humidifier.  Was unable to remove the old filter strainer from the solenoid valve and install the new one in it.  Left the old strainer in the valve and installed the new feed tube and orifice.  The leak stopped.
summary: Stopped my water leak coming from the feeding tube

reviewText: I bought this for my Mom (as she was tired of buying ice all the time). She was skeptical when she first saw it but 10 minutes after I turned it on and it started pouring ice out her excitement grew. Now, every time I go to her place she has it on. She loved it so much she bought me one. And yep, I love it too! No more trips to the store for ice (unless you have a group of people in which case this may not be able to keep up).
summary: Makes ice like it says and does it well

reviewText: Bought this for my mom as a gift. She loves it. She said it takes longer than stated to make the ice but it is not a concern for her. She has had it for over a year now and she really likes it and uses it often.
summary: Bought this for my mom as a gift. She ...

reviewText: I love this product. However, I have had to get a new one every year although I have selected the same product from different brands and companies. It is, in my opinion, the best item to have in one's office or bedroom. Very ingenious mechanism.

I love this thing. I love having ice on hand and my current freezer does not have an ice maker and I didn't want to bother with ice cube trays. I thought this would be a ridiculous frivolous purchase but I love it.

I have only been using this ice maker for a month or so, but I love it so far.  It makes ice very quickly. I use only filtered water. Just follow the instructions.  It was securely packaged and arrived on time.
summary: but I love it so far

reviewText: I needed an ice maker and this is a great one. It makes a batch of ice in about six minutes. You can take the ice out as it freezes and bag it for future use. I usually just use it right out of the machine. If you don't use it fast enough it melts and recycles itself into more frozen cubes. I love it, it is perfect for me!
summary: I needed an ice maker and this is a great one. It makes a batch of ice in ...

reviewText: It just arrived a few days ago and it was an instant win for my household!!! By the end of our first day, our ice tray (in our freezer) was completely full! I was quite impressed with how fast the cubes start popping out. Although it only makes a few at a time, it does bode well that it only takes about 10 minutes for more to be made. And, thankfully, this ends my family's usual summer feud over who didn't refill the ice cube trays, lol.
summary: Cold beverages all day, every day!

reviewText:
When I got this, I couldn't wait to use it. I can't believe how quiet it is.. I'm making Ice and putting it in plastic bags and putting them in the freezer.
I love eating ice when I get done with the drink. water, soda pop, OJ, yummy....
summary: I love eating ice when I get done with the drink

reviewText: The ice is made quickly.  It doesn't take much for this machine at all.  All you have to do is plug in the machine and add water!  The ice cubes are nice and big.  You can also choose to have smaller ice cubes.

The fridge in our apartment has no ice maker and the freezer is too small to keep ice in as there is no shelf and no space for a bag. So this was the perfect solution. It makes plenty of ice for my boyfriend and myself and is so easy to use.
summary: Good for those with no freezer space

reviewText: This product works great! We use a lot of ice in our family. Our ice maker broke, so we bought this. It gives us plenty of ice, more than we could use most days. So we started bagging it up and putting it in the freezer. The color is a great compliment to our kitchen. I would definitely buy it again if we needed one. It would also be a great gift for a college student. Or even to use in an office.

It was smaller than we thought but works great and makes lots of ice quickly. The smaller size turned out to be a great benefit as it allowed us to put it in a more convenient spot. The only issue we had was that the ice had a plastic type taste for awhile. We added vinegar to the water for a couple of batches (threw away the ice). This cleared up the problem.
summary: It was smaller than we thought but works great and makes lots of ice quickly

reviewText: This machine does a great job cranking out all the ice I need very quickly. I don't have an ice maker in my current fridge and this is on my counter top next to my sink. Whenever I need ice I just fill up with water and make some. Keep the ice in a ziplock bag in my freezer. Perfect!
summary: Love My Lil' Red Ice Maker

reviewText: GREAT ice maker!!  We've had this for a month, and have used it every single day!  It's simple to use, the ice cubes are made SO fast, the machine hardly makes any noise at all.  Cannot recommend this ice maker enough!  It is EXCELLENT!
summary: This is THE ice maker You Want!

reviewText: Love it! If you don't have an ice maker in your fridge, this is awesome! It makes enough ice for a single drink in about 8 minutes, and makes about 3-4 glasses of ice in a half hour. Much faster than ice trays in the freezer, and all you do is add water and push a button. I love ice in my beverages, so this was really worth it for me. I am very pleased. One caveat, it does take up counter space, like a bit larger than a coffee maker or mixer, so make sure you have the room for it.
summary: Love it! If you don't have an ice maker ...

reviewText: Absolutely love it.  We use a lot of ice in a day and ice trays couldn't keep up.  I can make two or three batches of ice and that will get us through the day and start the next day. The only downfall is it takes a little over an hour to make a batch, but that is still faster than ice trays.
summary: Love it we use a lot of ice.

reviewText:
THIS IS THE SECOND IGLOO ICE MAKE I HAVE BOUGHT.  THE FIRST ONE LASTED A YEAR, THIS ONE I BOUGHT ON 1-30-16 AND THE WARRANTY WENT OUT MARCH 2, 2016.  THE ICE MAKER QUIT WORKING MARCH 3, 2016.  ONE MONTH IT LASTED ENOUGH TO GET OUT OF THE AMAZON WARRANTY BY ONE DAY.  I AM TRYING TO DEAL WITH THE IGLOO PEOPLE BUT THEY DON'T WARRANTY IT THEY FARM IT OUT TO SOME TITUS INTERNATIONAL COMPANY.
DO NOT, DO NOT DO NOT BUY AN IGLOO ICEMAKER.  THEY ARE JUNK.
GENE HOWARD
summary: DON'T BUY IGLOO ICE MAKERS THEY ARE JUNK

reviewText: My ice maker in my freezer broke about 4 years ago. I have been buying ice every other day. Having my new iGloo ice maker has been awesome. Plug it in, add water and watch the ice fall. I figure I will have the iGloo paid for in 3 months and no more trips to buy ice. I totally recommend it. Thank you.
summary: Having my new iGloo ice maker has been awesome. Plug it in

reviewText: It hasn't worked since the day it arrived.  I will never order another igloo product again. I had to search for a number to call for troubleshooting help.  It still does not work.  I would not recommend purchasing anything from igloo.

I did a lot of research on one of these and we purchased this unit. I could not believe how fast it started making ice and filled the basket pretty fast. Some reviews said it was noisy but we did not find it noisy. It does make some sounds but not loud at all. We also like the fact that you can make two different sizes of ice.
summary: I could not believe how fast it started making ice and filled the basket pretty fast. Some reviews said it was noisy but ...

reviewText: This was our Christmas gift to ourselves a year ago. We love it! We live in a small apartment with a small fridge. Got sick of buying bags of ice and HATE ice cube trays. This is so very easy to use. When we're running low I just fill it with water and turn it on. I dump the bucket every once in a while and we're set. Couldn't be better. And LOVE the color!!!
summary: We love it! We live in a small apartment with ...

reviewText: This is the second Compact Ice Maker I have bought from Amazon.  The other was similar but different so I thought I would buy this one and see if it lasted longer than the one before.  This one lasted six months and died.  I came back to Amazon to look at reviews to see if anyone else was having the same experience and from reading the bad reviews, I can see it is not worth trying to get it fixed.  Buyer beware, this is not built well.

It worked fine for 6 months but now it doesn't work at all - just says "ice is full" and it isn't even making ice.  I'd return it but it is out of warranty.

If you would like to replace it that would be great.

This iGloo is AMAZING!  Upon receiving it, I read the directions, plugged it in and started making ice.  It's a non-stop ice maker that is fast and uses  remarkably little water to produce tray after tray.  Even when it pauses for you to empty the ice tray (which makes about two glasses per tray) it keeps the ice cold.  We have had this machine running non-stop for over a week and storing away ice in the freezer for future use.  It's great for producing ice for two or three people at a time.

The ice maker did save me about $300 from getting it fixed in the refrigerator. it is a little inconvenient taking the ice out and putting it in the freezer but I've had so much trouble with this ice maker in the refrigerator I know that I'm better off! The ice maker itself does a great job. I'm well satisfied with the product!
summary: it is a little inconvenient taking the ice out and putting it in the freezer but I've had so much trouble with this ice maker in

reviewText:
It made ice cubes the first time i turned it on but it doesn't keep them from melting. You have to put them in the freezer as they are made.
The second time i turned it on it only made a couple cubes in an hour. It is not worth the money to me. I need something that is dependable in making ice cubes and then keeps them frozen until i need them.
summary: It made ice cubes the first time i turned it ...

reviewText: This little ice maker has completely revolutionized my life. The ice is delicious, it comes out quickly, it's the perfect size, the machine looks great in my kitchen and it doesn't make too much noise. It's PERFECT.
summary: it's the perfect size, the machine looks great in my kitchen ...

reviewText: I have had this item for less than 2 months and it is making a horrible noise now and cannot be returned for Amazon's 30-day period is over. I bought the igloo brand name because it was a reputable name but now I am not so sure.

Great little ice maker, does exactly what it's supposed to.  If you're looking for something to pump out a lot of ice at one time this isn't for you but if you would like to have a glass or two of ice at a time for your home bar this is an excellent option for you.  Good price.  And it looks good, too!

Use it every day to make all the ice that I need (and I use a lot of ice).  It is a little noisy, so I turn it off a night.  However, it has been making ice for 16 hours per day for over a week now.  I could not be more pleased.  In fact, I intend to buy another one for work.
summary: I could not be more pleased. In fact

reviewText:
It works very well and makes ice quickly. The only thing I don't like about it is that the ice cubes melt quickly, due to the way they're formed. I have a fridge with no built-in ice maker, so I transfer the ice cubes from this thing to the freezer, and they freeze more thoroughly.

It will make larger cubes if you dump some ice into the water reservoir itself, so it's freezing ice water instead of lukewarm water.

My iGloo has been in use for over a month now and is performing very well,  it takes up very little counter space and looks good too.  I have friends who would like an Ice maker and have recommended the iGloo to them also.  It's a great little machine for the money.
summary: it takes up very little counter space and looks good too. I have friends who would like an ...

reviewText: I never had the ice maker in my refrigerator hooked up to a water line. I found all types of ice cube trays to be inconvenient. Purchasing bags of pre-frozen ice from the grocery store was a hassle and the bags took up too much room in my freezer. This ice machine solved all of those issues and it works wonderfully. Plus I love kitchen gadgets and the red color goes with the color theme in my kitchen.

If you're replacing the heating element, you might as well replace the thermostat fuses too. I purchase this thermostat fuse kit along with a heating element (Napco 279838) for my not-so-mechanical brother in law (sister's husband) to install on their long suffering dryer. He reported that the replacement was fairly straight forward and their dryer has worked like a champ for over a year now. This is an easy and cost effective DIY project.

What can I say...its an agitator that cost me money. I never want to spend money on an agitator. I like the Fisher and Paykel washing machine. I've had it for about 10 years and the bottom flap on the agitator broke off and I had to replace it. It was an easy fix and I am glad I was able to replace the part rather than buying a new machine.
summary: I like the Fisher and Paykel washing machine

reviewText: At first I thought I had been burned by a cheap knock off as the filter did not seem to work.  Turns out that I did not turn the filter hard enough to actually get it to engage.  Once I did that it worked like a charm and saved me money!

As others here have mentioned, this filter seemed to fit in place of the old GE one, but once I had it in place and tried to get water, the motor hummed and nothing came out.  It never really 'snapped' into place like the GE filter did, and I was uncertain that it was in place, but it wouldn't turn any farther, and although I tried inserting it from different angles, nothing I did was able to make it work.  Disappointing.
summary: Motor hums but no water comes out -- returning it

reviewText: I can't believe I am typing this: but this product actually works. I was highly skeptical at first, but turns out, it works like a charm. I wanted to make sure the stove was in tip-top shape before I turned over my old apartment back to the leasing office, and this product really did the trick.

I thought we were going to have to spend hundreds of dollars to replace our washer.  Instead, we spent a few dollars, watching a few youtube videos, and repaired our current washer!

If your agitator isn't turning correctly, replace these parts and you'll be just as proud of your handy skills!
summary: Replaced these and saved hundreds of dollars!

reviewText: These are very nice stuffed toys, much nicer than I expected when I placed the order.  All characters are very soft and sturdy.  It should be noted that Pocoyo has a plastic face, which doesn't detract from how nice these toys are.  My child really loves them.

This is a really nice three piece of stuffed toys.  Ellie's backpack opens and it is removable from her back.  Pocoyo has a hard plastic/rubbery face but the rest of him is a stuffed toy.  His head also turns 360 degrees but that could just be my Pocoyo.  The plush used for the toys is very soft.  They are also not overfilled.  I find they are a bit floppier than I like.  However, my 4 year old likes them.  She has no complaints.  As a result, I have no complaints either.

These were purchased for my 2 year old who loves Pocoyo. I haven't given them to her yet because they are Christmas gifts. The quality of them are great. They were a little bigger than I expected which was great. Pocoyo's face is not plush, but a soft plastic. They are really cute and worth the money.
summary: The quality of them are great. They were a little bigger than I expected ...

reviewText: This unit does not allow the flow of water.  This is not a bypass, but a cap.  We were not able to use the water and ice dispenser after installing this item.  Do not purchase if what you want is a bypass.  This item only works as a cap.
