summary: Does not work as a bypass on my GE Side-by-Side Refrigerator

reviewText: I love this refrigerator! I specifically bought this one because we store bottles of water and cans of soda in it as well as wine and beer. It doesn't just have wine bottle slots like many other wine refrigerators. It also has a nice look from the outside. It is not industrial-looking.

Why did I choose this filter?  it's MADE IN THE USA !!!  I don't know about you but after melamine was found in baby formula and pet food, there was no way I was going to put an imported water filter in my fridge.  This one costs less than the brand name, the water tastes great, I'm supporting a small business in our country and I feel a little safer.  Can't ask for more.
summary: the water tastes great, I'm supporting a small business in our country ...

reviewText: Such a great filter at a great price. This is the second time I purchased this filter brand and have nothing but good things to say as it relates to the quality of the water it filters and how long it lasts. You won't be disappointed.
summary: Such a great filter at a great price

reviewText: This one's a good deal.  This is my third purchase.  I can definitely tell the difference in the taste when my "change filter" light turns on.  It goes back to tasting like tap water. It's definitely doing its job filtering out the bad taste.  I can only hope it is also filtering out any bad stuff.
summary: I can definitely tell the difference in the taste

reviewText:
Dryer timer works.  Arrived in good time.
UPDATE - I've had this for less than 5 months & it does not work.  They tell me I can't return.  I'm going to buy from others who offer a one year warranty from now on.  It may cost a bit more but it will be worth it.

While the model number had changed, I was able to confirm on the OEM web site that this was the right piece. Physically, mechanically and electrically, this item is a seamless replacement, and it cost half of the OEM's price. The only difference between the timer I have now and the one I replaced is its country of manufacture: the old one was Taiwanese, and this one comes from Mexico.
summary: Exactly the same, but just a little different.

reviewText: These are great replacement filters for the Samsung Refrigerator.  I was hesitant to buy them because they were so much cheaper than the other replacements.  I am so happy that I ordered them!  They are working just fine and I saved a lot of money!

I was a little concerned about buying these at first, it took me a few times spending twice the amount of money before I got fed up and took a chance.  These filters fit perfectly and were as easy to replace as the Samsung brand.  I have been using this filter for a few months now and the taste seems even better than the OEM filters, but I'm not sure if that is because it is a better filter or because I am happy that I saved money :-)  I highly recommend these filters, save your hard earned money!!!
summary: Great filter for a lot less money!!!

reviewText: I bought these in the past with no issues. However, last time I made this purchase, it stopped working properly (I'd get leaks in my fridge). I thought it was one of these that was defective, but the other two caused the same issue. When I put in the filter I had there before, the leaks stopped.

So far, so good. Been using these for about 2 weeks now. Water is as "fresh" as with the OEM Samsung filter. I don't live in a third world country, so I'm not worried about the higher standard filtration that this may, or may not, be able to achieve. If it takes out the chlorination taste and "freshens up" the water, as this does, I'm happy.

Pirate approved......ARRRRRRRRRRRRR!!!!!!!!!!!!
summary: Water is fresh and at a cost that is 3/4 that of OEM, if not more.

reviewText: My husband has always bought the more expensive Samsung filters for our refrigerator, but this time I decided to try this less expensive brand. For less than the price of one of the Samsung filters I bought 3 of these filters. So far they are working as well if not better than the Samsung.  We are very pleased with this product!
summary: So far they are working as well if not better than the Samsung

reviewText: Easy to install. No leaking. The water tastes fresh and good. These filters seem to be as good as the original equipment filters. Time will tell, but so far I'm very happy with them and the price is right.

Excellent product. I was uncertain if it was compatible with my refrigerator. But it was. I am very satisfied with the price of the three filters. I hope the filters are continued to be offered at this price because I certainly will be a continued customer. The delivery was timely and the filters were well packaged. Great product for the price.
summary: Three for the price of one.

reviewText:
Works great!  Cost less than, and is just like another brand (Aqua Fresh) we had been using.  Very pleased with this product!  Definitely recommend!

___________________________________
Sold and Shipped by: DiscountFilterStore
Delivered: 5 days after order date

I have installed one of the three filters I ordered; water was tasting good; in 2 weeks, the water quality degraded substantially as if there were no filter. Not sure whether that filter was defective...
Removed that one and installed the second one this week; immediately the water quality and taste became good again.
Will write if the experience is any better than the first one in terms of longevity...
I am disappointed so far as this filter should last 6 months.
summary: Experience with an OEM fiter for Samsung refrigerator

reviewText: These are the best replacements I've found for my fridge instead of spending a fortune on name-brand filters from my fridge's manufacturer.  We ran one name-brand filter that came with the fridge until it was time to change it out, then switched to these filters.  We didn't notice any change in the quality of the water coming out of the fridge dispenser.  I will keep buying these in the future, the price vs quality can't be beat.

I waited three months before posting a review. I wanted to see how this filter operated compared to the LG Brand that is so much more expensive. I can honestly say that these work just as well as LG. They fit perfect, and the water quality and flow is still very strong even after three months. I normally am hesitant about buying brands other than retail. However, this filter is one that I will be purchasing again. I am completely satisfied.
summary: These Filters Show Why Retail Sometimes Isn't Always Better

reviewText: We needed to replace our water filter so I did some research and when I found this deal I thought the price was too good to pass up.  We need to change our filter roughly every 6 months so we should have a ready supply on hand for a while.  Switched out the old one and replaced it with one of these and it didn't skip a beat.

If I could 0 star this thing I would. The tricky thing about it is it works great for an entire month and then just like that it seems to run out of juice and the water tastes like it came out of a garden hose. I was so excited because of all the great reviews but I guess they must have posted theirs before the month was up. Or maybe I just got a horrible batch.
I originally bought these because of the lower price compared to the LG filters but at least LG lasts 6months. So I went back to LG.

The Tier1 filters for my LG fridge saved money which is important and fit perfectly.  I don't notice any difference between the Tier1 filter and the filter that came with my fridge, so I will be using these filters from now on.

These filters are a perfect match for my original filter.  The water quality is as good, or better, than the original.  I had no issues with having to clear the filter before we were able to drink the water.  We have a deep well, therefore, no chlorine in our water.  I am not sure how well they filter out chlorine.  However, for our purposes, they work great.
summary: These filters are a perfect match for my original filter

reviewText: I installed it about a month ago and so far the results are good.  Works just like the far more expensive one that GE wants you to order.  Probably  one third the cost.  Definitely will buy again if the price remains the same.
summary: ... a month ago and so far the results are good. Works just like the far more expensive one ...

reviewText: The water tastes bad.  These filters aren't as good as the original filters.  I threw these away and bought the manufacturer's recommended filters instead.  Yes, they are much more expensive, but I won't drink the icky tasting water from these cheap filters.

It's a little tricky to set up, in terms of making sure you've got someplace to drain and someplace to input water. But once you get that settled, this little thing is a lifesaver. Quick, quiet, and most importantly...cheap!
summary: It's a little tricky to set up, in terms ...

reviewText: I only wish I had got this sooner.  I am living in an RV on an oil pad in south Texas, I don't get to go to town very often to do my laundry, so this has been a God-send.  It is very quiet and it does everything it is supposed to do!  I am very pleased!  You won't be sorry if you buy this washer!  I am not mechanical or tech-savvy, but if I can hook it up, ANYBODY can!  I will buy the dryer sometime in the future when I have a bigger RV.
summary: I am very pleased! You won't be sorry if you buy this ...

reviewText: Description read HYGROMETER and the picture shows the (%) percentage for relative humidity (which is what a hygrometer is supposed to do). What I got in the mail was a thermometer that only reads Celsius. I'm sure somewhere else in the world, Celsius will do just fine. I couldn't even use it. Waste of time. Now that I've returned some time later, the description now reads THERMOMETER. I guess they realized their error after I requested my refund.

I had wanted one of these for years but hesitated to buy one. I'm very glad I bought this one. It's fast, the ice is a perfect size, and the unit is small enough to set on the counter top. This is a good machine with a good price.
summary: I'm very glad I bought this one

reviewText: We bought this ice maker because we have an RV that does not make ice very well. We tried out this ice maker and within a little more than 2 hours we had more than ice than we expected. The company that we bought it from was excellent. They contacted me to make sure we got the it. I have been very impressed. I would buy from them again without hesitation.

I agree with all they say except the words "extended life". Mold kills these filters as fast as it does with the others. The only way to extend a filter's life is using chemicals in the water. The quality and price are good, though.
summary: The quality and price are good, though

reviewText: I just replaced my original filter (which I was using for the past two and a half months) last week and already this filter has developed a pinkish color on it as well as some brown around the edges.  I make sure that I air out the filter every morning and we only use the humidifier at night.  I am very disappointed because I thought that this filter was for an extended life.  I do not think that within a week I would be seeing changes to the filter.

THIS WAS THE WRONG FILTER FOR MY FRIDGE & IT WASN'T RETURNABLE BECAUSE I BOUGHT EARLY & WHEN I TRIED TO RETURN IT I WAS TOLD IT WAS TOO LATE. BECAUSE THE PRODUCT DESCRIPTION DOESN'T SHOW THE TOP OF THE PRODUCT I COULD NOT SEE THE PART THAT GOES INTO THE FRIDGE & I COULD NOT TELL IT WOULD NOT FIT. THIS WAS A WASTE OF MONEY FOR ME.
YOU NEED TO SHOW THE TOP OF THESE FILTERS WITHOUT THE PAPER COVERING SO WE CAN SEE THE PART THAT HAS TO FIT INO THE FRIDGE.
THANK YOU FOR LETTING ME VENT
summary: THIS WAS A WASTE OF MONEY FOR ME

reviewText: We have just put the first filter in and it works great!  Don't know how long it lasts compared to the original filter, but so far we are really pleased with it.  So much cheaper than the brand of the refrigerator.
summary: ... just put the first filter in and it works great! Don't know how long it lasts compared to ...

reviewText:
Incredibly easy replacement. The dryer was making a thumping sound when it would start up. Turned out to be one of the rollers had seized up and one roller had worn unevenly. The pulley also was not turning well.

This kit fixed all those problems and only took about an hour to replace. It requires only basic tools to take the dryer apart and there are plenty of videos online to help you out.

Save money by buying this kit to repair your dryer yourself!
summary: Save money buy doing it yourself!

reviewText: Exactly what I needed to repair my dryer.  It now runs again, and much quieter than before. I would recommend watching a youtube video on how to do it if you have never done it before though. The dryer has been running for a few months with no addition problems.

Moved into a new house and the dryer in the basement was making quite a racket. I figured it had to be the rollers, but wasn't 100% sure it wasn't the idler pulley. So this kit was perfect for me.

Arrived a little slowly because it was out of stock when I ordered it, but it shipped immediately when it was back in stock and arrived the next day.

Quality is good, parts are a perfect fit. They went into a Kirkland "Signature Series" dryer with no issue at all. Dryer sounds nice and quiet now!

My dryer was squealing on startup. After watching a short YouTube video to help diagnose the problem and another on how to perform the needed repair I ordered this kit. Installation took less than an hour and everything fit perfectly. My dryer now runs like it was new. Very pleased with this purchase.

Bought this primarily for the belt. Decided to replace all the parts in the kit after looking at the condition of the broken belt I was replacing, and cogitating about the fact that the dryer is 37 years old and none of those parts had been replaced in that time.  I just didn't want to open the thing up again to replace any of them.  Dryer is now working just fine.
summary: Dryer is now working just fine.

reviewText: This kit was a life saver as the dryer was making a loud squeak.  Replaced all the parts in an evening, and the dryer is like new and SO QUIET!  Hardest part was replacing the tri-rings that go around the wheels.  Saved a ton of money by doing it myself instead of hiring a repairman or buying a new machine. Was also cheaper than getting the parts at a local appliance repair store.
summary: and the dryer is like new and SO QUIET

reviewText: Arrived on time. Was relatively easy to install and the price was unbeatable. I repaired my dryer for a fraction of the cost of a pro. I had no previous experience and completed the job in less than three hours.
summary: Was relatively easy to install and the price was unbeatable

reviewText: This kit did not have the right pully.  I had to buy it separately for my dryer.  You should probably take a picture of your dryer parts and make sure to compare them with the kit and then chat with the reps if you can.  That being said, the reps were willing to help with the issue.
summary: This kit did not have the right pully. I ...

reviewText:
I just got my panda washer, and I am absolutely in love with it.

Edit: It's been a couple of years since I bought this washer, and I'm still in love with it. I personally believe it was the wisest investment I've made.
summary: and I am absolutely in love with it

reviewText: I bought this machine 5 months ago and it worked beautifully, until one day it just died. I do maybe 2 or 3 loads of clothes a week, so it hasn't been abused. The machine is still under warranty, but I would have to pay to ship it to get it fixed, and pay to ship it back. That's not going to happen. I don't know if I can find someone local to come out to work on it. Very unhappy because I certainly did not get my money's worth from this purchase.
summary: Died unexpectedly after only 5 months of use

reviewText: The package had everything I needed, and more.  I guess they put the package together to accommodate several different models because one of the bearing sets was an extra of a different size that I didn't need.  Not a problem, as long as I got what was necessary for my job.

This is the best icemaker we have ever purchased.  The older models we bought never made this much ice.  We run this one in the RV and it keeps our beer cooler full of ice and keeps the ice container in the freezer full of ice.  Not much difference between the small and large cubes, but we like the small ones for cocktails and the large ones for cooler ice.
summary: This is the best icemaker we have ever purchased

reviewText: Received as a gift. It lasted 7 months. Motor burned out and when we took it apart to try and repair it ourselves, parts that came into contact with water were RUSTED. I'm figuring if you make an ice machine, the parts that touch water SHOULD NOT RUST.

These fit perfectly on my Frigidaire Crown Stove.  Really spruced her up after 19 years of service.  The only thing is the colour is more a dark-grey than the light-grey of the original.  But honestly, it looks so good it does not matter.  Stove looks brand new, and these new burners were worth it.  Thank you.
summary: it looks so good it does not matter

reviewText: The hose had a split in it where it connects to the hook part. I did not notice until I was draining my first load of laundry and water started spraying everywhere. I had to cut it off at the hook to finish draining the load of laundry. Went and bought a replacement at Home Depot later that day.
summary: The hose had a split in it where it connects ...

reviewText: Initially this filter seemed to be clogged and defective, but after soaking it in water for 10-20 minutes, and adding it and removing it from the refrigerator a couple of times, it finally started working without an issue.
summary: Clogged at first, but then worked fine

reviewText: They work just fine!  Do keep in mind you will need to flush out the line immediately after replacing the filter, as the first drops will be discolored.  It's normal, but a surprise if you don't remember right off the bat.

Not sure if the photos do it justice, but the tannish one is from the manufacturer. The plastic is nearly twice as thick. More importantly, it's a different plastic, the kind that doesn't bend when deflected, but snaps. Do not buy.  I "popped" these into the rack and could pull them down with a finger. Do not buy.
summary: Absurdly cheaply made knockoff. The plastic is so paper thin that when the bin is "popped" into place, you can pull it out with

reviewText: This is a great filter for my refrigerator.  I have purchased several filters in the past but the last several times, I have purchased this one.  Unlike some of the other filters, this one actually last as long as it's supposed to.  This is the only filter I buy now!!
summary: This is a great filter for my refrigerator

reviewText: I bought this to replace the OEM filter. Unfortunately, I could not get any flow out of it. I had prefilled it with water per the instructions. I put the old OEM filter back in and everything worked fine. I spent a good 15 minutes tinkering with this filter to try to get it to work. No luck. Amazon wouldn't let me return it so I got on their chat and they refunded me in full. Apparently, it's not a returnable item. Try at your own risk. At least Amazon will give you a refund if it doesn't work.

This is the second filter that I have purchased from them.  It works just like manufacture's filter for 1/2 the price.  Next year when the frige says it needs a new filter I will be buying another one.
summary: It works just like manufacture's filter for 1/2 the price

reviewText: The filter works well and the follow up from the company is wonderful! They make sure that you know the product is on its way and that you understand how to properly install the filter. I am impressed!

I use this compatible water filter in my fridge on a regular basis so I order this twice a year. It works perfectly and the water is always very good. I will continue to order this as long as the fridge is working.

Customer service is amazing! After ordering this product, I received a thank you from the company. After delivery, I received a follow-up making sure I knew how to install the product. Very simple installation instructions. I'm impressed with the company's desire to see me happy. Water tastes great. I will definitely order again.

This is a knock-off product, NOT made by GE.  I could taste the chlorine.  The only thing this filter is supposed to do is remove chlorine and it did NOT even do that!  Terrible waste of money.  When I complained to the company, they did NOTHING.

I have been using this kind of filter for years (ever since I bought my refrigerator) and they last a long time.  They are easy to install.  They arrived very quickly which was good since the indicator light was on.

Works like a charm. Easy to install (same installation as OEM).  This is my second filter; the first lasted almost 11 months which is the average for the previous 6 OEM filters which cost on average twice as much. Last time I ordered on a Friday and received it on SUNDAY, this time I ordered on Monday and received it on WED.... quick, reliable service.
summary: Great Replacement Option as Half the OEM Cost

reviewText: I purchased this twice. The first time (several months ago) it was great. Seemed to work just fine. This last one just doesn't work. I try to bleed the line over and over and it won't work. I guess it doesn't seal. I didn't put it on right away and there is only a 30 day return period. You got a 50/50 chance.
summary: Maybe it will work, maybe it won't.

reviewText: Works as expected. I'm picky about water and typically only drink bottled. This filter doesn't make the water quite as delicious as natural spring or bottled water but it's much, much better than the original tap.

Great filter for half the price of the GE replacement. Easy to install and almost indistinguishable from the original. Sure, I can hear water running through it with the refrigerator door open, but how often does one stand in front of the fridge with the door wide open? Overall, a great product. I will be back for more.

DO NOT BUY THIS ITEM AS IS MADE IN CHINA,& WAS NOT SHOWN IN LISTING ORIGIN OF MANUFACTURE. I DO NOT TRUST ITEMS MADE IN CHINA & MANY OTHER FOREIGN COUNTRYS AS I DO NOT KNOW WHAT MATERIALS HAVE BEEN USED IN PRODUCT.CHINA HAS A REPUTATION OF USING INFERIOR & DANGEROUS PRODUCTS IN MANUFACTURING ITEMS SOLD IN USA . Ray J
summary: ORIGIN OF MANUFACTURE CHINA IS NOT SHOWN

reviewText: Wow, what wonderful customer service!  At first I wasn't pleased with the taste of the water. I received an email asking about my experience which also listed frequent issues. This prompted me to run a gallon of water through the filter which fixed the issue. Now I have wonderful tasting water for a fraction of the price. This company also has wonderful customer service. I'll definitely purchase this type of filter in the future.

Just installed my second SmartWater filter.  I used my first one for 8 months. I'm very pleased with this filter.  It costs less than the GE brand.  It has a greater water flow than the GE brand and the filtered water tastes great. There is a noticable  degree of chlorine in my city water system.  This filter eliminates the chlorine taste completely. I plan to continue to use this filter.

So far, so good...at a much lower price than the original GE filter.

Update: I just replaced this filter after being in use for a year and it performed well.  It's a very good product at a great price!

This filter is absolutely fantastic and I highly recommend it! The water actually flows through it better than the OEM filter. It is less expensive and, in my opinion, works as good as the OEM if not better. Will definitely purchase these from now on.
summary: This filter is absolutely fantastic and I highly recommend it

reviewText: Very fast shipping and great customer support (not that I've ever needed it).  They follow up with you to make sure you received and are happy with your purchase.  As for the quality of the filter, it is just fine.  Filter does not impart any taste or odors to the water.  Water is clean, clear, and tastes just as it should!  And you cannot beat the price!  This is my second filter from Waterfall Filter Company and I will continue to buy my filters from them.

I installed the water filter CORRECTLY, as instructed on the paperwork.  It didn't work.  My husband blew out the lines in the rear of the refrigerator, and it still did not work.  We did get a trickle of water but only if the filter was held up.  It also makes noise.  I had my neighbor come over to try to figure out what could be wrong, but she also said we were doing everything correctly.  I am very disappointed in this product.  Save your money.

This is the second filter that I have ordered from this company.  It works the same as the GE filter that I used to pay twice as much for.
I do not see any reason not to use these filters unless you don't like to save money.
summary: Works as a water filter should!

reviewText: I was really leery of getting a non GE brand water filter. How do I really know how well it will work? I was pleasantly surprised. At first, the water had a metallic taste and I was sure I would be returning it. But after a day, that went away and we were in good shape. It seems like the water comes out faster with this filter (is there really anything in it? I guess you just need to have faith). It's been in for quite a few months without any issues. I would buy it again.
summary: Great Non GE Brand Filter at a Better Price

reviewText: Of course, I haven't torn the filter apart to see what's inside, nor have I the ability to test the purity of the water. But the filter fits like it's supposed to fit and the water tastes good after being filtered, so that's 5 stars in my book.
summary: Perfect as far as I can see

reviewText: I bought this after seeing all the positive reviews.  After following the installation instructions, I tested the water.  It had a strong chlorine taste.  There is a fair amount of chlorine in our city water.  The water tasted worse than my 3 year old GE filter.  I bought a new GE MWF filter and installed it today and chlorine flavor is gone.  So I would have to say this filter doesn't always work well.  I definitely think the quality is lower than the GE filter.

WONDERFUL!  The original filter on our GE fridge was causing the water to dispense SO SLOWLY.  I thought something was wrong with the refrigerator.  Turns out we just needed a new filter.  This one works perfectly!!
summary: WONDERFUL! The original filter on our GE fridge was ...

reviewText: I had been to the store and could not find this filter. From now on, I will always order my filter from Amazon. I like it because I have gravity fed water, and this filter does such a good job, the filtered water is very refreshing.
summary: I like it because I have gravity fed water

reviewText: I ordered three filters. One of the three leaked and I am returning the filter, even though it is wet, as per Amazon's instructions. The filter is marked: "Made in China". The description of the product did not mention that fact, Had I known that, I would not have purchased the product. Who in their right mind would entrust their health to the Chinese?

I was tired of the constantly rising price of the GE brand filter, which only works for about 2 months in my refrigerator before the water output slows to a trickle!  This filter looks identical to the GE filter and fits perfectly into the filter receptacle.  Whats more, the stream of water is stronger than its ever been and it doesn't seem to be slowing down at all.  The water, as far as I can tell, tastes exactly the same as the GE brand filter.

Bottom line: Try this filter, you won't be disappointed.

The wheels on the dishwasher are not like the wheels on the bus. These go round and round and fall off all the time. Well one of ours fell off and sat on the bottom of the dishwasher during the cycle. Needless to say it was melted when we found it. When I looked for replacements I found several. The problem was most places wanted three to four times as much as these were. I ordered these and got them in a few days. Our dishwasher is rolling again.

My dish washer was missing a wheel.  I replaced the missing wheel with one of these, and now it works perfectly.  I had to insert the plastic clip into the wheel first (before installing it in the dish washer).
summary: Does what it says on the tin.

reviewText: This item was exactly what I needed to replace missing and broken rollers on the bottom rack of my dishwasher. The rollers were an exact fit, and it was easy to install. Now, I don't have to drag the bottom rack over the door of the dishwasher: it rolls perfectly! I am a very satisfied customer!

When we purchased our house the old dishwasher worked great, but was missing two of its 6 wheels. Adding these back on made it like a new dishwasher. So, instead of buying a new $500-600 dishwasher, I spent a couple dollars on these perfect little wheels.

I replaced the solenoids, as I did 4 years ago, and the dryer still did not work.  So I ordered the ignitor kit and thermal fuse, as the laundry was starting to pile up.  After removing the ignitor, I could see that it looked different than the new one, with some significant pitting.  relatively simple to replace, I was careful to keep the insulation from the old ignitor in place when I installed the new one.  worked like a charm.

This little machineis MINT! Amazing power for such a little thing, does a great job and fits a lot more than you would think it did. I know that a lot of people asked me if it is even worth it to have a dishwasher this small...I can tell you that it saves me at least 30-45 minutes every day.
summary: Amazing power for such a little thing

reviewText: So, it's just a tad bigger than I thought it was going to be.  And to be clear, it doesn't hold many dishes.  But what it does do rather impressively is retain the heat from the heated water to make them impressively hot at the end of the cycle (as in sanitary).  It's a nifty machine.  If your house is not designed for a dishwasher this is a legit alternative.

Best water filter ever! My water taste pure. There is no strange odor or chlorine taste anymore. It doesn't hurt my throat like my unfiltered water used to. It literally tastes like the bottled water you get at the store. I feel so much safer drinking my water now.. The water before was just plain gross. I feel healthier, and I'm just overall happier now. I highly recommend this water filter, it works! It's eco-friendly too!

It worked great for the first time. Came back an hour later to get more water and there is barely any water coming out of it and the very little that comes out is cloudy and tastes and smells bad. Also after you turn off the faucet, it keeps dripping for a few minutes before it stops. The faucet attachments are good quality except that instead of the metal pin that switches between regular water and filtered water, it has a plastic switch. Faucet and plastic should not be used in the same sentence.
summary: It worked great for the first time

reviewText:
HOW ARE THESE CUSTOMERS SAYING GOOD THINGS ABOUT THIS, I HAVE THIS FOR MY TOASTER OVEN , THE CHEAP PIECE OF PLASTIC FALLS APART NOT LONG AFTER I BOUGHT IT. AND TOO SMALL FOR MY APPLIANCE,

NOT WORTH  ANY PRICE, DO NOT BUY.
summary: HOW ARE THESE CUSTOMERS SAYING GOOD THINGS ABOUT THIS

reviewText: I HOPE I LIKE THIS.  I HAVE NOT SEEN IT YET, AS I ORDERED IT FOR MY DAUGHTER.  SHE IS GIVING IT TO ME FOR CHRISTMAS.  LOL  WE ORDER WHAT WE WANT AND HOLD FOR CHRISTMAS, SO THE OTHER PERSON IS SURE TO GET SOMETHING THEY LIKE AND WOULD LIKE TO HAVE!!  NO RETURNS THAT WAY...  I AM LOOKING FORWARD TO THE TOASTER OVEN COVER.
summary: I HOPE I LIKE THIS. I HAVE NOT SEEN IT YET

reviewText: I only used this maybe four times and purchased a little over four months ago.... and it started making a loud noise and wouldn't work at all now. I thought it was a good purchase but now not so much. Dissatisfied and a waste of money now.
summary: I thought it was a good purchase but now not so much

reviewText: This thing is absolutely amazing.  I am a single guy in a small apartment and this is all I need for my everyday laundry.  Truthfully, I think it cleans better than my old $2,000 washer/dryer set up ... just doesn't hold as much laundry per load.  I still have to use the laundromat for my bedding, but my normal clothes and towels this thing is boss.
summary: This thing is absolutely amazing. I am a single guy in a small ...

reviewText:
This thing works great!
It's small enough to fit in my tiny apartment bathroom, but big enough to do at least a week's worth of laundry for myself and my boyfriend. It's SO easy to use! Not to mention quiet! My dog is extremely skittish, and he was napping in the bedroom while it ran. I had to go check to make sure it was still working the first time I used it because I didn't hear it at all.
summary: This thing works great! It's small enough to fit in my tiny ...

reviewText: I just got my Panda Washer today and I love it I am on my second load of clothes. I live in an upstairs apartment and hate lugging laundry up and down the stairs but have done it for years until recently when I fell down and sprained my ankle. I am so glad I found out about this washer. It is like a dream come true to be able to stay home and wash clothes.
summary: I just got my Panda Washer today and I love it I am on my second load of clothes

reviewText: My daughter bought one of these and I have found it to be quite amazing. They live in the city and going to the laundromat was next to a nightmare, especially now that she is pregnant. When I cam to visit, I was more than a little amazed at the performance of this machine. A perfect solution to the problem of "nowhere to put a washer" (they got the dryer too, of course). She is thrilled and tells me it has already paid for itself in dollars and hassle; PLUS their clothes are actually getting cleaner!

I absolutely love this product! It is well worth every penny so far!  It's not like a your standard washer, but it serves it's purpose.  I still have to go to the laundromat for my blankets, and comforters, but this beats the heck out of dragging everything to the laundromat.  Everything else I'm able to wash in my apartment.

I knew intellectually that this washer was labor-intensive, but it really is. You can't just "set it and forget it", you have to stay on top of it and manually do a lot of things that regular washing machines do for you automatically. With that said, it washes and spins the clothes really well, and I am glad that I bought it.
summary: and I am glad that I bought it

reviewText: I love my Panda! I live in a small apartment and needed something to fit in my bathroom. This washer does the trick. It cleans my clothes very well and is fairly easy to use. Keep in mind, it is not fully automatic and takes more work than a regular machine.

I bought one of these earlier in the year. When I installed it leaked. I bought a samsung brand at home improvement store and no leaks. I noticed this one has one o-ring but the samsung brand has two o-rings. I think this is the problem.
summary: I bought one of these earlier in the year. ...

reviewText: This is a repeat purchase.  I will continue to purchase this filter as long as possible.  The water from the filter tastes good and the filter is easy to install.  My current filter came in a box that was probably damaged in transit but didn't affect the product in any way.  I would highly recommend this filter.
summary: The water from the filter tastes good and the filter is easy to install

reviewText: This is a terrific alternative to the brand name filter and I think the filters are the exact same.  Waterfall filters works just like the brand name filter for a fraction of the cost. Will load up with these filters soon.
summary: This is a terrific alternative to the brand name filter and I think ...

reviewText:
DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT!!!  ____ IT LEAKS!

I bought this product thinking that it is a great replacement for the actual Samsung filter, considering how much cheaper it is than the original Samsung filter.... BIG MISTAKE.

Save yourself the hassle and go with the original
summary: I bought this product thinking that it is a great replacement for the actual Samsung filter

reviewText: After putting filter in and flushing a gallon of water from the new filter, the water tastes worse than when the old filter was in there. Has a bad metal& plastic taste. Not pleasing. I chose this filter to replace the last filter. I only chose it for the money and good reviews. I am sorry, but my water doesn't taste good.

This product is performing well and I'm anxious to see how well it keeps the cold air out of our laundry room this winter. I do wish that it was available in a dark brown as well as the white. It would have been nice to have not gone to all the trouble of prepping and painting of it to match my brick house. Other than that, I am very pleased with it.
summary: It would have been nice to have not gone to all the trouble of ...

reviewText: We have an Amana washing machine, and the manual stated this was the fabric softener dispenser for it.  Considering we use fabric softener and were sick of waiting for the right time to put it in, I bought this dispenser for ease of use and convenience.  No more waiting for the right time, now we just load the fabric softener just before we start the load.  Perfect fit and easy to use for our washing maching!

We have a basic Roper washing machine that didn't come with a fabric softener dispenser. This fit perfectly. I pulled the cap off the hole in the agitator and dropped the fabric softener dispenser in. Working as expected.

All the years I lived without one of these, I never dreamed it would be so cheap and easy to install. Now my clothes always smell great and I don't have to remember to hit the rinse cycle. Highly recommended.
summary: I never dreamed it would be so cheap and easy to install

reviewText: We "inherited" a Whirlpool washer from one of our children who is living out-of-the-coiuntry. The washer did not have a dispenser for the fabric softener, but did have a place to put it. A bit of research, and we purchased this unit. It works just fine, who would ever know it was a replacement part.

Fantastic story for all ages.  As an avid reader of crime fiction, nonfiction, futuristic novels, and young adult dystopian novels, I was delighted to stumble upon this young adult fantasy tale which is a real page turner.  The heroine, Tessa, is spunky and determined; Calder, her companion, reminds me of Tyrion from Game of Thrones, and Ash is an all-round hero.  Looking forward to the sequel!

I got this as a replacement for my old broiler pan. The old pan had rolled edges so there were no sharp edges. This GE pan does not have rolled edges. For the pan the edges stick straight down leaving sharp edges exposed. For the tray it also has sharp edges all around. If you are not careful while washing this broiler you will likely cut a finger.
summary: I got this as a replacement for my old broiler ...

reviewText: Looked online at several sites for this part and found this because compared to the others this part was reasonably priced.  Received the part sooner than expected and installed the part which worked perfectly.  The whole experience was great.  I was trying to decide whether or not to replace the washer and now I'm glad I went with doing the repair.  Would definitely use this site again.

I needed to rebuild my dryer. I found this part easy to remove, disconnect and reinstall. Instructions were good and I had no problems whatsoever. Highly recommend! Part has been working flawlessly for nearly a year now.

Easy to install and fixed the issue that we were having with our dishwasher (the buttons stopped working.) My husband swapped this out with the old one and it works like new! It was a bit expensive, but we were very happy that we didn't have to buy an entire new unit which would have cost a lot more.

After installing this valve in the water dispenser of our refrigerator it worked perfect for 3 weeks. Then it waited until we went to bed and turned itself on. I could not believe it. I woke that morning to thousands of dollars worth of damage. How on earth this valve is able to open itself is beyond me. There is no question where the problem lie. Right there in the valve.
summary: If you put this  valve in your fridge don't go to sleep

reviewText: Very disappointed in freezer, I bought it before I was having major surgery. I wanted it so when I came home from the hospital I would be able to stock it up with meals that my family were making for me. My sister plugged it in, and it didn't turn on, she tried several different plugs, the freezer would not work. I returned it and purchased one from a local store. This may have been a fluke, but did not want to chance it.

Thank you to the reviewer who mentioned this cutlery basket fits the Frigidaire 18-inch dishwasher. After my Frigidaire basket disintegrated into pieces,(they all eventually do) I looked all over to replace it, but most were overpriced. To my surprise this basket is constructed of sturdier material than my original one. It fits exactly!

Arrived on time, in perfect condition and as advertised.  Perfect replacement for the existing flatware holder.  For the life of me, I cannot figure out what the covers are for, but they are removable and I have them saved for when I figure it out.  It never hurts to get more then what you need.
summary: Good Replacement For Old Flatware Holder.

reviewText: Our old basket was falling apart and all of our silverware was ending up at the bottom of our dish washer.  I did some research online and this was the only replacement basket I could find but I was grateful to find it online at all.  I like the pieces that go on top of the basket to put the silverware in individually since it will help save the bottom of the basket but my husband doesn't like using it.  So far the quality is pretty good.

I had some difficulty getting the blade on the spindle and I didn't want to force it and break the blade or worse. The fix was a small amount of Vaseline on the spindle, which allowed me to ease the blade on.
summary: Great fit with a little tweaking

reviewText:
The rack was exactly what I needed, the price was better than anywhere else.  The original was a heavier rack, I was not wanting to spend a lot of money on an older dishwasher; I bought this one because of the price and it is PERFECT!
  I love that I can still use this dishwasher without spending a fortune on it.

I was not sent a genuine GE replacement part.  Not knowing the difference quality-wise, I installed the bogus part, which failed after 4 months.  I obtained a genuine GE replacement part, which is a lot stiffer and harder to work with.  I just installed it, and hopefully, it will hold up longer.

Do not order from this seller!!

Popped it right in and we were back in business.  This new one is a little stiffer than the original gasket, but I am sure that is because it hasn't been exposed to the heat as much as the original one.  Seals just fine.

My freezer was having difficulty keeping things cool, in part because I had it so loaded with piles of frozen venison.  The shelf gave me some usable storage space, and strangely enough, decreased the amount of time it would take for me to freeze meats, make ice cubes, etc.
summary: My freezer was having difficulty keeping things cool, in part because I had it so loaded ...

reviewText: It was a little tricky to put in but adding a shelf to my already packed freezer made things much easier to organize. The tall side (left)really only holds ice trays but the short side (right) can hold anything.

We needed to replace the basket in our seven-year-old KitchenAid dishwasher. I ordered this based on the product ID code printed on the basket and it is an exact match to what we had. Thank you, Whirlpool!
summary: Exact match to what we replaced

reviewText: Perfect replacement for my KitchenAid dishwasher.  Note that this product says "KitchenAid" on it even though it's listed as a Whirlpool item.  If you buy the same item labelled as a KitchenAid item, you pay more.
summary: Perfect replacement part for my KitchenAid dishwasher

reviewText: It was exactly what I wanted.  Another retailer sent me a basket based on the model # of my dishwasher, and it was totally the wrong one. I was a little nervous when ordering this one, but it was the right one and was a little better than the one that had worn out.  This one has separate slots for the silverware.  It is very, very nice....and it was less expensive than the wrong one that was sent to me.

I was looking for the same silverware basket as the one that came with my dishwasher and Whirlpool was asking a lot of money for the replacement. I found this exact basket at a much lower price on this website. It arrived quickly and is perfect.

THIS WAS A PERFECT FIT FOR THE ORIGINAL. ONE THING I LEARNED IS WHEN PUTTING SILVERWARE INTO THE BASKET, DON'T DROP IT IN. SET IT IN EASY SO YOU DON'T CRACK THE BOTTOM OF THE BASKET. I THINK WHEN THE DRYING CYCLE IS ON, IT HAS A TENDENCY TO MAKE THE PLASTIC BRITTLE.

The knob worked and was a good color match. When I bought it, the price was only about $9.00. Now, it runs around $16. That's insane for a little knob.

Initially, I thought the replacement knob stuck out way too far.  I eventually discovered the knobs have a little metal sleeve inside. When the old one broke, its sleeve remained on the shaft and wouldn't let the new knob slide on as far as it should. I pried it off (very easy to do) and the new knob slides on perfectly.

This is just a small plastic knob.  Why the heck is it so expensive?  I've searched other internet sites, and it averages $28!!  It's just a knob!!  I'm going to look around and see if I can fabricate something that will fit.  It's just a knob!!!

We are very happy with our new dryer knob, in fact it works so much better than the original knob that was on the dryer when we bought it just a few years ago. Having the part number really helps if you are looking for any new parts, all you have to do is put in the part number and if it's there it will pop right up. Sure makes shopping a lot easier.

So far, this machine is doing great. I have had it for a few months now and it's been working great. Just understand that this machine does not dry like a normal dryer and takes longer. For situations where you need this and don't have a gas line to use, this is great.
summary: this machine is doing great. I have had it for a few months ...

reviewText: The price was great.  It was the lowest I could find for a replacement heating element and the kit even included a new thermostat.  I did not pay for expedited shipping but it came in just a few days...  I would highly recommend.  Great!
summary: The price was great. It was the lowest I could find for ...

reviewText: This item was a perfect replacement for the burned out heating element in my dryer. I also changed the thermostat that came with the element. My fuse was still good so I am saving the one that also came with the element, since this is also a potential source of failure of the dryer. The three pieces were a great bargain and shipping was very quick.

Please note that these are LOW PROFILE Broan bags, and will not fit the regular Broan trash compactor. I've ordered Broan bags from amazon before, but I got it wrong this time. The bag is about 25% too small for the regular compactor, so there's no way to force a fit. They are nice and thick, dark brown color.

I went ahead and gave it 5 stars, because the seller shouldn't pay for my inability to read ;)
summary: Low Profile trash bag...make sure this is what you need

reviewText: Had to have the dryer repairman install it for $95, but yes, the seal worked great.  When putting the seal on, you will need 2 people and a few vise grips to hold it in place.  Once you open the glue, put it around the edge real quick and keep the seal tight by still using the vise grips as you go around because the glue is very gooey and runny.  Wait about 5-10 minutes after you have done the entire seal and then replace it back where it goes.
summary: the seal worked great. When putting the seal on

reviewText: Super easy to install myself. Saved a little more than $100 by doing it myself. Learned a lot about dryers and got about $5 in change for the job. It also gave me a chance to clean the dust out of the nooks and crannies. The dryer runs better than before and I know I won't be burning the house down anytime soon because of it.
summary: Super easy to do it yourself

reviewText: I do not recommend this filter. We have run countless gallons of water through this filter and the water still tastes like plastic. The taste is less noticeable when the water is cold, but as the water comes up to room temperature, the plastic flavor is quite strong. My wife described the taste as water from a garden hose. Waste of money.

Trying to find the correct water filter can be such a huge pain!  I trusted the information provided for these and I was so happy I did.  When I took it out of the package, I noticed that the notches were not exactly like the ones on my previous filter (which is very difficult to get locked in) so I was afraid it wouldn't work.  However, this one was so much easier to install in my Samsung Refrigerator.  I ordered and installed this back in May and I'm happy to report it is working perfectly!
summary: Easier to install than original filter and still working perfectly after 2+ months.

reviewText: I bought two of these so I'd have an extra on hand. A few weeks after installing the first in my fridge, I noticed fibrous particles floating in the water.  I thought it might just be a bad filter, so I replaced it with the second filter. A few weeks the same thing happened. The material that comprises the filter is falling apart and contaminating the water.
summary: Filter material falls apart contaminating your water

reviewerName: A Warm, Close, Personal Friend of Al
reviewText: I should have believed the reviews. The filter lasted a few weeks before it started to taste funny. After a month, it tastes and smells like you're drinking water out of a garden hose. Into the trash and back to the official filter.

Great water filter. I replaced my old one with this one about a week ago. It was very easy to change out. I ran about 3 gallons of water through it to get the air out and to flush the filter. The water tastes great, no issues there. I'd highly recommend this filter or any filter sold by the Waterfall Filter Company. They care about their customers getting a quality product.

Although I was a little apprehensive about whether the filter would be a "match" to the more expensive Samsung model I've used in the past, I was delighted with its compatibility and functionality.  I am very satisfied.

I have used the more expensive brand filters in the past, but I have found this Waterfall brand filter to be just as satisfactory as those filters. The advantage of the Waterfall filter is the price. Why pay more if they are functionally equal? I am very satisfied with function and price!

The filter fits perfectly and appears to be doing exactly what it is supposed to do. I will never again buy filters at three times the cost! You can be sure I will order the next filter from you and not the home improvement store. Thank you
summary: The filter fits perfectly and appears to be doing exactly ...

reviewText: Love this feature.  The filter is easy to install and remove and my fridge tells me when to change it automatically.  What 's to like-well, I don't have to crawl under a sink to remove a filter that always seems to get stuck and I don't have to remember how long ago it was installed so that changes are done on time.
summary: Fresh water filter change in less than a minute

reviewText: I ordered this instead of the original Samsung refrigerator water filter because it cost much less. I was skeptical but was very pleased when I received it. It installed right away. No drips or leaks.  The taste of the water is very good, even better than with the original filters when new.  I can only vouch for the taste and not the actual filtration, but the test results show that it is just as effective.

I bought the black and white beverage holders. I LOVE THEM! These were such a great hit at my last BBQ that I ended up giving one away. I put my wine glass in there and it holds it up perfectly. It's the perfect size and extremely sturdy. I also like that this isn't made from cheap materials. These holders are solid!
summary: I LOVE THEM! These were such a great hit at ...

reviewText: It's a must-have if you like to be outdoors, like we do.  It's easy to move around, and easy to pull up if you need to mow.  It's also easy to move from one chair to another.  Who would have thought this crazy little item could make outdoor living so much nicer!  It's handy and it's slick!
summary: Must have, if you like sitting outdoors!

reviewText: These are absolutely great. Easy to put in the ground and easy to move from one place to another if needed. Very convenient when there is not a lot of table space in the middle of the yard. Also, no need to worry about spills, they are very durable and we have bumped into them and not had a mess.
summary: These are absolutely great. Easy to put in the ground and easy ...

reviewText: I love this freezer! It's small enough for my apartment, but actually holds A LOT of stuff! I took the basket off the top shelf so I could stack boxed items. The bottom basket is full of frozen veggies, and the center basket is filled with meat, and I still have room for lots more. This freezer is very quiet, and it doesn't put off any heat. I love that it locks too, so I can put my Klondike Bars in it and not worry about the kids eating them all in one day!
summary: Doesn't take up much space but holds so much stuff!

reviewText: Works perfectly. I was worried about the heat problem being too high but its not an issue. Took out the grill and popped this one in and voila! The downdraft doesn't automatically come on. Works like a dream!

I'm very happy that the actual product isn't light gray and blue, as pictured, but light gray and dark gray, which matches the interior of our Kenmore Elite dishwasher perfectly. It's basically the same basket as the original one that came with our dishwasher, but with the bottoms of the baskets intact (they tend to wear out over time). Arrived quickly with Amazon Prime, packaged nicely, no issues.
summary: Matches my Kenmore Elite dishwasher perfectly...

reviewText: Fit my dishwasher perfectly. My old one fell apart at the sides and this one does the job. I had it for about 6 months now and it still holds up like a charm. Very sturdy. Don't think I would need to buy another one for years but if I do, I'm buying this one again.
summary: I had it for about 6 months now and it still holds up like a charm

reviewText: Even though this was not the basket that goes with my dishwasher it fit perfectly.  My old basket was one of these that you could take apart and put back together depending on where you wanted to put it in the machine.  It always came apart and would mess up my dishwasher.  This one does not come apart and keeps my silverware and other things in its basket.
summary: Even though this was not the basket that goes with ...

reviewText: I measured my dishwasher first to make sure it would fit and it fits exactly as expected. I love that the three compartments connect and disconnect if I need to, all the slots to keep the flatware from touching each other, the volume of flatware it holds, and the hinged "lids" on each compartment. That way I can put small objects in it and they don't fly around.

It fit my Whirlpool dishwasher, even though it wasn't made for it.  I think it could fit most dishwashers since the bottom rack spokes of the dishwasher can go through the bottom of the baskets.  The baskets can also be separated and used independently.

This is great!  When I bought my dishwasher, it came with only part of this basket.  I really like the extra side baskets and they have lids that you just slide the silverware through, giving everything more room to get clean.
summary: Got more than what came with the dishwasher when I bought it.

reviewText: So far so good. It's the perfect size for the corner of my garage. My freezer in the kitchen just wasn't big enough. I plugged it in and let it run for a day, then added food. Freezer thermometer reads 0 degrees.
summary: So far so good. It's the perfect size for the corner of ...

reviewText: This is exactly what we were looking for. It has shelves in it which make it easy to pull them out and find what you're looking for rather than having to dig for it. I've been using it for 4 months and have not had to defrost it yet. It's worth every penny

Excellent freezer.  We just needed some extra space from what our refrigerator has.  This comes with 3 baskets that slide out which is excellent as it keeps the food from falling out when you open the door!  It was packaged well.  No dents or dings.  I would recommend to anyone needing a small amount of extra freezer space.

This was a quick and inexpensive fix to my trash compactor. The switch is exactly like the original and completely fixed my problem.  I am sure it would have cost 10 times as much to call a repairman to fix it.  It took 15 minutes to install.
summary: Exact replacement part, easy to replace.

reviewText: There are four of these in the dryer, buy four with some lithium grease and save the headache of opening your dryer again.  Make sure you have vacuum on hand, there is going to be a lot of lint that needs to be cleaned out.

This worked perfectly for my Kenmore (made by Whirlpool) dishwasher. Although the description didn't include my washer's model number, the basket looked a lot like this one, and it did fit exactly into the same spot in the rack as the old one. Even better, this basket is a lot sturdier. Very happy to have this.
summary: Sturdier than the one that came with the dishwasher

reviewText: Mine does not heat up on the back side but my husband thinks it is not suppose to so we are using it. I have asked this question and got two different responses. One said yes it should heat up and the other said no?????
summary: I think it is working ok

reviewText: Exactly what I needed and what I was looking for.  It took me approximately a hour to replace because I vacuumed and cleaned the inside of the dryer.  A very doable project in very little time.  I probably saved myself $250-$300 dollars.  Youtube is a great resource.

After 2 failed attempts at repair by the warranty service provider they paid me off and I decided to fix it myself. Replacement was painfully easy. I didn't even remove the drawer. I expect this part will last 2 years just as the original one did. It's disappointing they can't make a better part, but at least it is cheap.

A bit expensive for what its made from, but it worked perfectly on my Whirlpool dishwasher. I was able to save a few bucks by buying an "open box" gasket which was in perfectly good condition when it arrived.

These are LG products. My wife & I installed 4 of these rollers; two in front and two in the back. Our LG dryer now runs quietly.
I was apprehensive at first because the product looked way smaller than the picture. But these rollers fit perfectly.

I'm giving this a 5 star review because the knob works flawlessly for my application.  It fits and matches the current knobs, and it seems like it will last at least another 8 years, which is fine.

Of course, I do not think this is worth the price they are charging, ~$12 but I needed a replacement.

Also, because there are some misleading postings with pictures of multiple knobs, this is a single knob, NOT a multiple pack.
summary: and it seems like it will last at least another 8 years

reviewText: This assembly unit was easy to install and fixed our refrigeration problem immediately.  Spending the money on this was well worth it and it saved us from getting another refrigeration.  Delivery was as promised.
summary: This assembly unit was easy to install and fixed our refrigeration problem immediately

reviewText: The freezer still does not seal with the door shut.  The material in the seal was mashed and kinked in some areas and they allow air to pass through the door and ice to form inside.  The seal originally supplied with the freezer was installed with one of the corners not properly attached so it sagged so air could pass through.  I hoped to fix the problem with the new seal.
summary: Door seals on this freezer are a problem

reviewText: I was given a price of $670.00 for parts and labor by a appliance repair company. I was able to get the part for $83.95  and it took about 30 minutes to replace the part.  After replacing the part everything is working fine.

I haven't used them yet, but they look the same as the ones I bought in the store where I bought my LG refrigerator.  So, I'm sure that they will fit properly and do the job as air filters.  I change the air filter and water filter about every 12 months.  The guidebook suggests every 6 months, but our salesman said if it was just us two old folks we probably could go 12 months. And that seems about right.

My husband loves hard boiled eggs and sometimes doesn't put them in a container that has a lid, but will stick them in a bowl in the fridge. Normally, this would stink up a fridge pretty badly but honestly, it doesn't. For the price, you can't beat this. It works very well and keeps our fridge from smelling like stinky old food. I'm a fan.

I bought this as a replacement for our KitchenAid dishwasher and it fits perfectly. Since I've changed where I put knives in it, I'm hoping that this basket does not fall apart after 5 years like my old basket did. It was cheaper here than from the KitchenAid/Whirlpool site.

I was hesitant to buy this as I wasn't sure about buying something like this from Amazon and not from the OEM or Best Buy, which is where I bought my refrigerator in the first place. But in the end, I am very happy with my purchase (after 2 months now).

The product was delivered quickly and met my expectations very well.
summary: Skeptical, but happy with my purchase in the end!

reviewText: It works.  The first cycle after installing, the tray didn't fill.  I'm pretty sure this is because the icemaker tells the valve to be open for a set period of time, and the first time through, the tube from the valve to the icemaker was empty, and the 'valve open' time period was too short to fill the tube and also fill the tray with water. From then on, it's worked perfectly.

This was a replacement basket for a KitchenAid dishwasher.  After 8 years, the original basket had to be retired.  This Whirlpool basket is a direct replacement.  The only difference is the original had a thick silver handle.  You can remove the handle and transfer it to this new one.

This product was exactly what we needed to keep the water filter held firmly in place, ensuring that it would not pop out over time and that a leak-free seal was maintained.  Installation was very easy; all that was required in our particular case was to remove a few screws in the top of the refrigerator, move quick-release plastic water pipe connections from the old base to the new one, and move the connecting rod for the filter release button.  After that it was a simple matter of replacing the screws.
summary: Exactly what was needed to stop leaks and keep filter firmly in place

reviewText: The package was bent along with the filter inside. I'm using it, but it is ugly. It seems like it would be easy to put a piece of cardboard in the package so the filter doesn't bend. Look elsewhere for this item.

The part was exactly the same as the original.  I went to youtube.com to see how to install it. It took about an hour to do the installation including removing the old part. I installed it about a week ago.  It's great having my dishwasher working again.
summary: It's great having my dishwasher working again

reviewText: This was a little bit bigger than our rack. It's 1/8 of an inch off. Super frustrating, but with some teamwork and elbow grease we made it fit. Now the rack will have to stay in the same spot because it's not coming out.

It's annoying enough when your dryer stops working, but when you buy a replacement part and it doesn't work after you've disassembled the thing... that's frustrating!  No excuse for poor quality, especially when the package claims "Factory Certified Whirlpool Parts".
summary: Once again Amazon makes returns easy.

reviewText:
When the switch on my dryer broke, I thought that I would have to have a repairman come out and replace it. After popping the lid on my dryer and noticing that the switch was connected by a Molex style connector, not unlike those used in PCs, I bought one of these and fixed it myself.

Total cost was less than $5 and my dryer is working fine again.

I had to order a new lint screen because my brand new Electrolux did not have one, but I got an incredible deal on it so I didn't mind spending the money on this screen. The screen fit perfect and snug. From what I have read, this is a better made lint screen than the original.
summary: Great new lint screen and it fit perfectly

reviewText:
The agitator cam kit was of questionable quality - poorly manufactured - the dogs (cams) are made of an inferior quality plastic, and failed quickly.
To add insult to injury, the kit arrived only after reporting its non-arrival one week after it was supposed to arrive.
summary: Be sure to get an original quality part - this one isn't!

reviewText: The first replacement failed right away and was promptly replaced. That 2nd replacement has now failed 4 months later. This part seems to be a very problematic part.  It looks like this part is getting overheated because of it's proximity to the compressor.
summary: This part breaks down very often.

reviewText: I bought this dryer back in March but was too busy to open it and use it. However, I opened it and used it for the first time today,July 1st, and was shocked that the dryer doesnt rotate and unfortunatly it is outside the return window. What a scam!
summary: Recieved a Defective dryer that doesnt rotate

reviewText: For a small dryer, it seems to get the job done pretty quickly. Although there was/is a scent to it. I can't pinpoint exactly what it is, but every single time I've used it, it comes out smelling a certain way. Nothing a dryer sheet won't fix though.

We were a little skeptical buying the small dryer but to be honest with you if it's a one or two person family it may be worth it other than that I think you need a bigger dryer. make sure you remove the filter which is in the center of the dryer otherwise it won't dry your clothes well enough.

I purchased a complete new unit then came up with the idea below.

I got a hose clamp 1 3/4 x2 3/4 from the hardware store. You undo the clamp completely and slip it over the broken part slip it as far back as you can,  and tighten it down. Make sure the split in the piece is closed. I put the old unit in and it dispenses ice just like the new one.

As I just did this I have no idea how long it will last, but if it does not I have a new unit to put in.
summary: I put the old unit in and it dispenses ice just like the new one

reviewText: So far so good.  It's only been installed a couple weeks now.  I can tell you, the water tastes good. I've been purchasing the LG one for years & was hesitant on buying a generic.  But the price for the generic is much better.  Like I said, so far it's doing what it's supposed to do!
summary: Much better price!  So far so good!

reviewText: After about 3 months the water flow started to slow down and eventually stopped. I thought there was something wrong with the fridge,but just in case I replaced this filter with the recommended one and eventually the water began to flow again and is now fine. I would not recommend this product.

Junk.  Don't waste your money.  I thought paying a bit more would get me something at least rust resistant.  Around 1 year old.  The quality of the "stainless" steel is obviously of the lowest possible quality.

I purchased this from Costco on sale over a year ago as gift for my parents.  However, I noticed spots appearing on the metal and originally thought it was mold assuming stainless steel does not rust.  However I was wrong and the rust returns in a few days.  I like KitchenAid products but I cant understand how they can make a product with such low quality.  I am definitely rethinking about buying any KitchenAid products in the future.
summary: Do not buy this product due to rust!

reviewText: Mine has started rusting after a few months.. I purchased it at Costco for $25 or so. They are going to take it back and refund. I will try another brand and hope they aren't lying about it  being stainless steel. VERY DISAPPOINTED IN KITCHEN AID.  It's a disgrace imo.

It is advertised as "Stainless Steel".  However, on closer reading, it is noted that the wires that hold the dishes are simply chrome-plated steel.  If you are like me, and leave one-off dishes in the rack to dry (isn't that what it is for?), then the rack is getting wet frequently......and rust has appeared within a couple of months.
summary: Rust is a problem on mine, too.

reviewText: This rack should cost about $10. The only 2 parts of it that are stainless steel are the 2 decorative side plates that advertise the KitchenAid brand name. Everything else is chrome plated steel and rusts.

I'm amazed this product is still being sold.  It began rusting within the first 2 months, and at 9 months it was so rusty it had to be thrown away.  It's a dish rack - did the manufacturer expect that it wouldn't get wet???

This dish rack was advertised as stainless steel. The only thing that is stainless steel are the side panels, purely cosmetic function. The rack is chrome plated steel, and it starts to rust in a few months of use.

In the past used to loosen the Frigidaire filter housing by hand, the Frigidaire refrigerator filter housing is located in an awkward spot and this wrench makes it a lot easier to unscrew the housing to be able to change the filters every six months or so.

This is a joke.  This thing can't be used as it is currently built.  At least it can't be used efficiently.  Very disappointing.  Feel like someone somewhere is laughing at me for being a fool to buy this thing....sigh...

The filter container in my refrigerator tends to become too tight over time to unscrew by hand. It also proved to be too tight for this filter wrench which broke the first time I used it. By the way, I only screw the container down until it is just snug. I will have to find a different filter wrench.
summary: Too weak to be of any use

reviewText: This is the second weather station I have owned. The first was a basic model from Wal-mart. This station offers a huge display that I also use as a night light on my night stand. I observe outside temperature/humidity and inside temperature/humidity. And I track outside barometric pressure to be aware of impending hurricanes here on the Gulf of Mexico. There's a graph that I do not use normally. I love this unit and highly recommend it.

I have an older dryer and I was close to buying a new one because of the noise. The squeaking was horrible! Apparently the heat from the dryer melts this wheel piece causing it to need to be replaced. My father in law told me about this wheel, so I bought it and he installed it. I saved a lot of $$$! It's like I have a new dryer!
summary: The squeaking was horrible! Apparently the heat from the dryer melts this ...

reviewText:
The parts arrived on time and were what was needed to make the repairs. Instructions on where the flex metal washer and fiber washer went
would have been nice. It was unclear if the flex metal washer went in the back or front of the roller. The original had fiber washers on both sides.
summary: Instructions on where the flex metal washer and fiber washer went would have been nice. It was unclear if the flex metal washer

reviewText:
This thing can carry a tremendous volume and it really doesn't take up much space.

I packed 2 lunches, 1 decanter with 4 glasses, 5 bottles of liquor, 2 bottles of mixers, and had lots of room to spare after a sizable ice pack was added.
summary: This thing can carry a tremendous volume and it really ...

reviewText: This product works fine, but a word of caution - problems with the solenoid are often due to a bad timer.  Apparently, a bad timer keeps the solenoid activated too long which will melt the plastic around the metal post preventing it from freely moving up and down.  A new timer is $150, so if you have to replace both the solenoid and timer, you could probably buy used dishwasher from an appliance vendor.
summary: Works Great, But Make Sure Your Timer is Not Bad

reviewText: BASKET WAS TOO BIG FOR MY FREEZER.. TRIED TO RETURN IT IN THE ORIGINAL BOX.. COSTS MORE TO SHIP IT BACK THAN THE COST OF THE BASKET..THE DIMENSIONS GIVEN WERE INCORRECT SO BUYER BEWARE.. WILL PLANT FLOWERS IN THE BASKET--YOU WILL NOT GET ME AGAIN

I put aluminum foil in the bottom of my oven.  Because the heating elements are just below, the foil bonded to the original oven bottom panel.  Requires a 1/4 socket wrench to remove and replace screws.  I was able to do it myself.  An expensive lesson for me.  There was a slight scratch in the side, but not sufficient to ask for a replacement.  After all, it's an oven bottom.
summary: Easy to install if you have the tools

reviewText: I purchased one about a year ago, and after about 3 months it burned out with very little use.  OK, i thought, maybe it was just a dud bulb.  So i bought another, and that 2nd one burned out after only a few months as well.  Now that a few more months have gone by, i see others have had the same problem.  I guess I'll shop for another bulb elsewhere.
summary: Two of them burned out after a few months :(

reviewText: Fixed my fridge in about 1 hour.  There is a Youtube video with the exact step by step instructions.  It would have taken less than 1 hour but I screwed up the spring placement on the selector rod and it took about 20 minutes to figure out what was wrong.

I am on my third fuse now. The first one lasted about a month, the second one lasted about two days and we will see about the third. Due to the reviews I read, after the first one went out, I ordered two so that I would have a spare. I am glad I did since I needed it two days later! I honestly don't understand how these fuses can be so horrible. I am going to try to find an alternative to order, as I am not "holding my breathe" that the third fuse will last long.

Worked perfectly.  Here's a tip- take 2 photos before you take your old one off- one showing you how to thread the belt through the pulleys and another showing you which side is up.  It's not hard to figure either of these out without the pics, but they can provide some reassurance that you're placing it correctly and won't have to redo it.

DIRECT REPLACEMENT FOR THE ORIGINAL IN MY LG DLE5579W DRYER. I HAD TO REPLACE THE DRUM ROLLERS IN MY DRYER AND IT THOUGHT I SHOULD REPLACE THE BELT WHILE I HAVE IT APART. I AM GLAD I DID BECAUSE THE BELT IN MY 11 YR OLD LG DRYER WAS VERY WORN.

Had bad leaks all over the utility room from the washer and was afraid it would be something I'd have to call a plumber in for. Nope. This was fairly easy to install, even for an all-thumbs person like me. Had a little bit of difficulty getting the inside hose attached, but that was a washing machine issue, not a problem with this valve. Did the job in under 30 minutes and saved money. Yay!
summary: Had bad leaks all over the utility room from the washer ...

reviewText: This valve was exactly what I needed for my DIY washing machine repair. I had never cracked open a washing machine to fix one for myself. I was able to replace our leaky valve with this one with just simple tools and basic knowledge.
summary: Easy to replace and save a lot of $$$ not calling a repairman.

reviewText: This thermostat fit my LG dryer perfectly. I removed the old one and checked it with the multi-meter. It was definitely broken. This one fit perfectly and the dryer is working again flawlessly. It's a great feeling of accomplishment to not have to call an appliance repair man every time something breaks.
summary: It's a great feeling of accomplishment to not have to call an ...

reviewText: Didn't work. How do I know? My husband installed it and it didn't work so I called a repairman. He checked it out and said it was defective so I returned it. Replaced it with a new pump and the washer works now.

Worked perfectly. Price was economical. Shipping was quick. I was a little concerned after reading a few of the reviews prior to buying this replacement part, as many said their washing machine was noisy after installing this part. I have not noticed that my washing machine is noisy at all, and I replaced this part myself in just a couple of hours. Taking the washing machine apart and putting it all back in place properly was the most time consuming part of the job.
summary: Great replacement part at a much better price than local parts suppliers

reviewText: I have been dealing with broken bins in my refrigerator and finally broke down and ordered these. I ordered two and was initially only sent one. But I contacted the seller and they sent the other one no questions asked! It is so nice to have bins in my refrigerator door again!

I received the drain pump when promised.  The drain pump on my washing machine quit working. The new drain pump was relatively easy to install.  I even had a leak for a long time that I thought was being caused by something else.  The leak stopped when I installed the pump so it was a plus.

It worked perfectly- good fit and still operational. We did notice a bit of smoke during the first test run after installing the pump, but upon further inspection it was not the pump at all. The removal of the old pump and the installation of the replacement will take less than an hour. Be sure to check YouTube for installation videos.

Not bad.  They don't fit my stove exactly, but what am I to expect?  These are a thicker aluminum than some of the others I've bought in the past. I just put them on my cooktop, I think they will do just fine.
summary: Not a bad purchase at all.

reviewText:
This piece did not fit our refrigerator door even though the model number was listed for this part and it was the part specified by the manufacturer.
I'm not sure if the manufacturer specs are wrong or what, but this was a total waste of money.
summary: but this was a total waste of money

reviewText:
Just put it in my dryer last night.  Ohm'd the old one out to see it was bad, replaced it with this one, and re-assembled.  Fired up my dryer and everything worked.
