  I also took the time to clean everything on the inside of the dryer.  The moisture sensor needed attention, so I took care of that, and vacuumed the bottom of the dryer.
summary: So far so good.  Will update if that changes.

reviewText:
Easy to install once you get to the heating element housing and remove it from the dryer.  Works perfectly. As you have to practically disassemble the entire dryer to get to and remove the heating element housing, I replaced all the thermostats and element (this particular thermostat was the only defective part).

This is also several dollars less expensive than what Samsung charges on their website.

So far so good. Did not want to work at first . I lifted the bale up and down as if turning the device off and on a few times . Out of frustration I worked the wire bale a few more time very quickly and the unit began to operate. I now have several cycles of ice and it seems to be working just fine . Time will tell.

Finally, Ice again.  We use a lot of ice in our house.  The OEM ice maker did a good job keeping up but the first replacement we got didn't really fit the bill.  So when it finally died I was hoping that this one would keep up.  And it did.

This little freezer fit our needs perfectly.  Just the right size, we are in a mobile home in Florida for the season and needed a bit extra freezer space.  The size is right and it helped us to be able to store a little more food as well as ice cubes.
summary: This little freezer fit our needs perfectly. Just the ...

reviewText: The wheels I received are green, not red, which makes no difference, and they also didn't include the metal lock washers, just the triangle clips.  My dryer didn't need the lock washers so I'm perfectly happy with what I received and the wheels worked perfectly.  They fit the axle perfectly and they're the right diameter.  But if your dryer needs the lock washers you might want to know.
summary: Did the job; dryer seems to work perfectly

reviewText: My 70 year old parents were told by the dryer repairman that the cost to repair their dryer ( rollers and belt) would be about $500.  I bought this kit on amazon for less than 10% of the cost and installed it very easily within 30 minutes.
summary: Great product at a great price.

reviewText: I had been looking for a window vent for some time.  I hesitated to pay as much as this one was, but once it arrived, I was glad that I did.  It's perfect for the job.  It fits in the window with no gap, the flap opens seamlessly, it's easy to put in and out, light weight but sturdy.  It does not come with a clamp, so be prepared to supply one.
summary: I was glad that I did

reviewText: I live in an apartment that does not have washer and dryer hookups. This is awesome. I thought it would cause the room I use it in to be warmer but it didn't. The only thing I wish was different is the sides are too thick and will not fit in the track on the sides of the window. Thank goodness I got a metal dryer hose because its stiffness keeps it in the window.
summary: This is awesome. I thought it would cause the room I ...

reviewText: I am extremely pleased with my new window dryer vent.  First off, it arrived quickly.  Secondly, it is solidly built of steel and is performing beautifully.  This product is all that I had hoped it would be.  I highly recommend this steel window vent to anyone considering purchasing it.
summary: A well-crafted product for a lifetime of use.

reviewText:
I've tried so many things that have not worked. This little gadget is so simple and easy to use, and best of all it really works!
I was hesitant to order the first one, but after using it once, I ordered 2 more. It works equally well for us with small to large sizes.
No more tangles or frayed, dirty strings. Everything comes out clean and in good condition, easy to hang to dry.
summary: This little gadget is so simple and easy to use

reviewText: If the water runs out during the day, and you aren't there to fill it, the filters dry out and will never wick up the water again.  Filters only last a couple weeks and even less if they dry out while you are at work.  Not a good value.  Hope someone markets a filter that can survive a few hours without water.
summary: Not a good value. Hope someone markets a filter that can ...

reviewText: Most filters have slowed the water flow as they fill up with particulate. This one does not. My conclusion is that either there is a bypass (meaning you get increasingly more unfiltered water) or the filter is not capturing what it says it will. Either way it's not something I can recommend or would buy again.

I bought the package of 3. The first one leaked all over the inside of the refrigerator. The second one didn't leak, but after filling one glass with water I couldn't get any more water for over a half hour. I put up with it for awhile then put in the third which also leaked everywhere inside of the refrigerator. I finally went to Lowes and bought the replacement.

This costs a little bit more than the other knock-offs on amazon, but it's also the only one I've bought that still works after a month of use. The others all blew their fuse after a couple of weeks. Pay the $10 more for this.

How many clothes washers have been thrown away because the owner did not know to replace this basic and essential part?  If your washer has been wobbling due to an unbalanced load and is now down for the count, this may be the part you need.  I installed it myself, and it completely fixed the problem.  (With the help of a YouTube video.)

This is the exact part I needed to fix my washing machine.  Fit perfectly, the repair was easy & it is a cheap part.  To call in a repairman would have been at least $300.  This part was very cheap & it took me about 15 minutes to repair the washing machine.

It took me a while to troubleshoot why my gas dryer wasn't firing, but once I did I was pleased to find the solution to be easy and inexpensive. I probably should have replaced both fuses since it came with two, but I only replaced the one that failed. Don't judge me!
summary: but once I did I was pleased to find the solution to be easy and inexpensive

reviewText: This was the piece that had gone bad (it was worn to shreds when we got it) my wife had taken it apart and decided to see if this was the part that was in need of replacement on our used Kenmore washer. She found it and it was ecstatic that we could fix it and not have to buy a whole new washer.

This is the second time I have bought these to fix a washer (separate washers) and they work great.  They are easy to install and are a perfect fit.  I have had no problem with either of the washers, and would buy this part again.  If you are looking to save money and do it yourself, then this is a great buy.
summary: Right part for the right price!

reviewText: I am happy to say the item came in earlier than expected. I am very pleased with my purchase. The washing machine is up and running again, and after many many loads, works beautifully. I am very glad I read the other reviews as well, it helped me make the right choice.  Thank you!!!
summary: I am happy to say the item came in earlier than expected

reviewText: This doesn't have the same handle that my original filter had, but it does what it needs to do and it doesn't bother me a bit that it isn't exactly the same. I'm not into spending a ton on a dryer filter, so this does just the trick.
summary: Fits and way cheaper than buying OEM

reviewText: BOUGHT THIS  FOR MY DAUGHTERS WASHING MACHINE. SHE HAS A BAD HABIT OF OVERLOADING IT. THIS IS NOT THE FIRST TIME THAT THIS SAME PART HAS BROKEN .  IT HAS ONLY BEEN INSTALLED ONE DAY BUT IS WORKING FINE. IT LOOKED EXACTLY LIKE THE OTHER REPLACED PART THAT WAS IN THE MACHINE.

When the washing machine stopped working I ordered the Whirlpool Motor / Pump Drive Couple. Although I could not fix it myself and still had to call a repair man, I still saved money because I did not have to pay for the same part which would have been much more expensive if he had to supply it.

I was kind of hoping for a new dryer, but when I could fix the old one with this for less than 10 bucks I decided to keep the old one.  Not only did this fix my immediate problem (the dryer would not start) it also fixed the low heat setting that had been not working for several years.
The thermostat does not look exactly like the 20+ year old one it replaced but it fits and functions just fine.  You can't hook it up wrong because the two sets of wires have different size spade connectors.
summary: Dryer starts and low heat setting is fixed at no extra charge.

reviewText: I definitely recommend this product.  Other models I have purchased at slightly lower prices have leaked and have produced bad tasting water.  This model did not even leak a drop when I installed it and the water tasted excellent as soon as I had finished priming the device.

Bought this water filter for our LG refrigerator. I found it to be virtually indistinguishable from the OEM filter. Obviously I have no way of testing the purity of the water, so I have to assume it works the same as the OEM. But I always thought LG's price on their filters was pretty lofty (for something you throw away every 6 months), so I'm happy for the cost savings.
summary: But I always thought LG's price on their filters was pretty lofty (for something you throw away every 6 months)

reviewText:
We had moved into a new house that had a kenmore-  when the filter died I tried to find a replacement- when I did, the best case arrival date was 3 weeks away.  I decided to try this filter- it fit well with no leaks, and after a week seems to be working fine.
I can't comment on its longevity, then again I can't comment on the longevity of the original filter.  This seems to be a much more cost effective option.
summary: works great at a much lower price than original

reviewText: This filter is a much better value than the overpriced Kenmore-branded filter. It is important to 'charge' the filter by running a gallon or two of water through it before using the water for any purpose.

I installed my new Waterfall filter 4 days ago with great ease and it seems to be working quite well.  I followed the instructions on the package and have seen no difference so far between the capabilities of this filter compared with the original filter that came with the refrigerator. The main benefit is that this filter seems to do the same job of the old filter at a fraction of the cost.  Assuming I continue to be satisfied by this filter's performance, I will definitely order this product again!
summary: ... installed my new Waterfall filter 4 days ago with great ease and it seems to be working quite well

reviewText: I was a little hesitant to buy an "off brand" filter.  I had an issues once before with another refrigerator where the off brand did not fit properly.  However, I have been very satisfied with this filter thus far.  It fit perfectly.  My only concern was that when I first ran the water through it, there was a lot of grey in the water.  I have never seen this before with another filter.  However, it cleared out after running water through it.

Our fridge needed a new filter, and this is my first time replacing it since we bought our house. I went to Sears to get one and they wanted $70 for one. I started looking online for a quality product at a good price. That's when I found this one. I was a bit skeptical because of the price difference between the two, but it was a perfect fit.  The water and ice also taste pretty good... so I am satisfied.

I was afraid to buy this filter instead of the Kenmore filter for my new Kenmore Elite fridge but figured I would try it because of the price difference. I am glad I did. So far so good. It was easy to install and no leaking. I will be ordering another Waterfall filter when needed.

They arrived folded up in a little envelope which made them crumple up and bend.  They did not offer any protection and they are unattractive against the stove.  I would not purchase this item again, nor would I recommend this item.  I tried to wash them in them in the dishwasher and they completely warped.  I don't see how they are heat resistant. Not even worth trying to use, I just tossed them in the garbage.

These are the worst!  They will not stay in place and it is very easy for stuff to get underneath.  They may work for something other than between the stove and cabinet, but they do not work at all for that purpose.  I do not recommend them at all.

We needed some extra freezer space for our cottage and this one fit the bill. It provides the extra space for the times we are getting ready for company for the weekend or when we are preparing for being snowed in for a number of days. Very happy with this purchase.

I was surprised in the size difference between the old one I replaced and the new one I received. The old one got to the point where it would pop out each time you turned on the disposer full of food. The chopped up food flew everywhere, Hard to believe the old one shrank so much over time. The new one was so tight it seemed as if it would never go in properly. Once I got it seated properly, works exactly as expected. No more ducking each time we turn on the disposer!
summary: No more looking out for flying food!

reviewText: The bulbs showed up as promised.  I ordered two bulbs, although only one had burned out.  When I installed the bulbs I wore disposable rubber gloves so that my fingers didn't touch the bulb surface.  Direct hand contact can significantly reduce the life of a halogen bulb.

This dispenser works in GE model GTW220ACK3WW. If you go to the GE website this dispenser is recommended for this model. The important thing to check is your washing machine to ensure it has the 'deep rinse' option or some option for fabric softener. If it doesn't have a deep rinse or other fabric softener rinse option this will not work for you.
summary: If you go to the GE website this dispenser is recommended for this model

reviewText: The filter we had was old and extremely nasty. I have no idea how long it's been in our house, but it was definitely time for a replacement. This filter was just the right size and works great to replace the one we had.

I bought this to replace an old silverware basket that had holes in the bottom. I really like the fact that this basket has a lid to keep silverware from sliding all the way through to the bottom. It fit perfectly into my dishwasher (I measured the old one first.)

I bought this to replace the one we already had, which didn't have the little things on top to separate the silverware. It's great-- no more spoons sticking together. HOWEVER, it's a little bit difficult to figure out how to get the little tray things (what in the world are they called?) into the dishwasher basket at first. I broke one of them trying to get it in place. But, once they're in, you don't have to do it again.

My husband and I purchased this because the dishwasher at our apartment barely held one day's worth of silverware. This dishwasher rack is perfect! It has lots of room, yet it doesn't take up too much space in the dishwasher.

Checked measurements to make sure it would fit in my Whirlpool. Works great! The increased size makes it easy to get every piece of silverware with room to spare. By the way, it was a lot cheaper than purchasing the Whirlpool replacement part that was an eighth of the size.

I am really not sure why it took me so long to replace the original one...that had only two slots that were usable.  This one is affordable, fits perfectly and keeps my utensils where they are supposed to be!
summary: I Should Have Purchased This Sooner!

reviewText: I ordered one of these for my 5 cu. ft Artic King chest freezer.  As carefully as I measured, it was slightly too long to hang over the inside rim of the freezer, but I decided to keep it anyway and use it as an extra freezer basket.  The quality is good, and it holds a lot, so I'm happy with it.  I'd be happier if it fit my Artic King chest freezer, but it looks like you have to stick with the brand of the freezer when it comes to something like a hanging basket that requires a precise fit.

I wanted another basket for my Frigidaire 5.1 chest freezer.  This basket was exactly what I wanted and fit perfectly.  I wanted to store small items in baskets so that they would be handy when I needed them.

This fridge perfectly fit the space that we had available. We were looking for a refrigerator with no freezer space, to maximize it's use as a second fridge for our house. It is quiet and spacious and meets all of my needs.
summary: Perfect no-freezer fridge to use as a 2nd fridge.

reviewText: I had previously bought this fridge and modified it for my home bar, and it worked great! I was quite pleased. When it was time to expand our bar, I purchased the same exact fridge. Unfortunately, THIS ONE DOESN'T WORK. I'm very displeased.

It was bought to replace one, just like it, that we had bought a few years ago from Costco.  The first had the stainless steel door, this one is black.  It seems to be an improvement in design ... anyway, we are quite pleased... and pleased also that we could order it from Amazon.
summary: It is a nice addition to this household ... very convenient.

reviewText: I've had this for over 2 years now and this is the best mini fridge I've ever come across, so I'm not sure what some of the bad reviews are about, but I think if people would just follow instructions their products would function as they should.

I love this fridge...especially because it doesn't have a freezer.  I bought it for my classroom and I didn't need a freezer, but I did need the extra space - and that's what I got.  It works really well and holds lots of bottles of water on the door. I would recommend it to anyone.
summary: If you don't need a freezer, this is the fridge for you.

reviewText: This refrigerator is wobbly.  I called to ask them about getting an additional leg to adjust it because the wobbling is happening on the side that does not have the adjustable leg.  I was told that there was only one adjustable leg and to keep adjusting it.  There is nothing that can be done to make this appliance not wobble.  Do not waste your money on this piece of crap!
summary: Do not waste your money on this piece of crap

reviewText: This is a beautifully engineered high quality mini-fridge.  It maintains temperatures at ( + or - ) 2 degrees F.  That's better than any full sized (and full priced) fridge I've ever owned.  This is not the flimsy mini-fridge found in national stores.  Congrats to Danby for a well built machine at a very reasonably price.
summary: I Rate This A Best Buy

reviewText: I love this small fridge! We needed some extra fridge space, and didn't need another full size refrigerator. This keeps everything nice and cool where it should be, and this is very nice looking as well. There's lots of shelf space. I'd recommend!

I bought this for my son who is staying with us while going to college. It's a good fridge, with plenty of capacity, it's almost half the height of our full size fridge. There is no freezer in it, but it's a great little fridge.
summary: It's a good fridge, with plenty of capacity

reviewText: My old chrome plated grille lasted less than a year and costs $41.  A real piece of junk.  So I got this one and it fits well and should last much longer as it is solid plastic and costs $13 and not $41.  The chrome one is a real waste of money and looks nasty in less than a year.

The basket that came with my dishwasher held very little and my silverware wouldn't fit in some of the slots that it did have. This one is great. Since there are so many different sizes listed in the descriptions I wasn't positive it would fit but it does.

This works perfectly with my GE dishwasher.  It's exactly like the one that came with the machine.  I don't know why the first one got so shredded, but there were gaping holes all over the bottom and the silverware would fall through if not placed exactly right.  It's nice to be able to just throw the silverware in again and not worry about rearranging.  Hopefully it holds up better than the original!
summary: My silverware stays in the basket!  Yay!

reviewText: My dishwasher is eight years old and the plastic silverware basket had gotten a hole in the bottom. It was annoying when knives would slip through the hole and get stuck in the bottom of the dishwasher. This was an easy fix for $20.

I didn't know if this was the correct meat probe for my oven but luckily it worked!  A word of advice: never, ever put this item in the dishwasher to clean it!!! If you use one of these temperature probes I can guarantee That your Thanksgiving turkey, your Christmas ham and your Easter leg of lamb will cook to perfection!! If you don't have an oven that can use one of these, I highly recommend you get a new oven.
summary: Took a chance that this was what I needed

reviewText: It's a great product, but it was my mistake for not ordering the right size for my dishwasher model.  This is pretty large and doesn't fit, but I am now using it in my bathroom as a sorter for my shampoo, etc.

My Whirlpool dishwasher came with a very narrow basket that was a real hassle to unload. This basket is wide, has five large pockets, and is very easy to unload. Be sure to measure the space available in your dishwasher. The dimensions are 19 in.long x 5 1/2 in. high x 3 3/4 in. deep. Pocket covers are included but removable for ease of access. Unit is very sturdy and does not tip when removing it from your dishwasher.
summary: A basket that holds lots of silverware and is easy to unload.

reviewText: This saved my husband and I a fortune when our washer's "brain" blew. We took a risk that we'd be able to install the thing. Turned out it was an easy, easy job. The entire project took about fifteen minutes and most of that was just fitting the washing machine's metal pieces back together. Well worth the price.
summary: Saved me from having to buy a new washing machine

reviewText: The new replacement filters do not fit the original refrigerator filter heads properly, which causes the water the dispense very slowly.  Well, after swapping out the filter head with this one, the new replacement filters works perfectly now.  I think it probably took me about 10-15 minutes to install.  If you had the same problem as me, then don't be scared to change the filter head to fix your problem.
summary: very easy to install, fixed my slow water dispenser problem

reviewText: If this is the part you need, I don't know what else to say - it works. Arrived quickly, well packaged, and I had no troubles. I guess some instructions would have been nice? But if you're swapping out an old one, it' s a no-brainer.

My clothes washer developed a leak. I reviewed some YouTube videos and determined this pump was the likely culprit.

There are multiple videos that show you how to install it. It took a few hours but I saved a lot of money by NOT calling a repair  service.

The water leak has stopped and the clothes washer is working fine again.

This filter added a terrible metallic taste to my water.  I ran water through it several times a day for over a week to give it a chance to clear up, just in case that was some impurity from manufacturing that would wear off.  However, it has not improved substantially.  This may be the cheapest filter available, but, in this case, you get (less than) what you pay for!

I read the other reviews for this product, including the questions and answers, which stated that this product filtered out mercury.  When I received my package and opened it, I was not happy to discover that it only filters out chlorine taste and odor.  That is worthless to me.  I will be replacing this product with a high quality filter.
summary: I was not happy to discover that it only filters out chlorine taste ...

reviewText: These filters fit my refrigerator just fine and they're much cheaper than the ones Sears sells--in fact, two of them are cheaper than one from Sears. I don't know how they'll last because I just got them a couple of weeks ago.
summary: Much cheaper than Sears, and they fit

reviewText: This shelf can hold very little weight.  It falls out even when it is only partially filled.  It's much more flimsy than the original.  Because it falls out and is of poor quality, it has now cracked on the right lip where it attaches to the door, so it is worse than ever.  I wouldn't recommend this shelf to anyone, unless they are just looking to have an empty shelf.  $15 is a complete rip-off.

These fit my refrigerator just fine. I wish they lasted longer, but break from the weight of the contents I put on them. I use the top shelf to hold a gallon of milk, a half gallon of iced tea, and a half gallon of almond milk. The other shelf is used for miscellaneous condiments of varying weight and it also cracked on the ends. This is the second time I've had to replace them.

The freezer arrived a day early, well boxed. When I say well boxed, I mean double cardboard boxed, plus foam. No dents, perfect condition. I plugged it in to make sure it worked. Honestly, it was so quiet, I wasn't sure. I left it for an hour, and Oh yes, it was already cold inside. Great little freezer, it's going to be perfect for my cabin. With the temperature control on low, the temperature inside was -4 degrees F.

I've had the freezer for about a week now and it's doing great! I can hear the slight noise mentioned in some reviews. It's definitely not jarring but as with most freezers, the motor has to run in order for it to operate correctly. Duh....

I had a problem with soft ice cream and lack of space in my refrigerator. No longer an issue with this freezer! A good investment thus far!

I'd rather pay more for a product that is not damaged.

Update:  I was sent a replacement, and it was dented also.  However, this time the dent was only the size of a quarter, so I decided to keep the unit.
It's a real shame to buy something new, have it be damaged, and have to decide that "it's good enough."

Just what I needed. I use this for beer fermentation. A 6.5 gal carboy fits nicely on the left side. There is a shelf, which covers the compressor, on the right. I can set a 3 gal carboy on this shelf. A five is just a little too tall. Maybe a bigmouth would fit. It took a while to find the right unit for my purpose. This is the one you beer people want.

Only freezes at the bottom, the top doesn't get cold at all. I've tried all the troubleshooting and got no results. I tried submitting a help form on their website, but it continually gives me an error saying I'm using "<>&" characters, which I was not, so I can't even contact them.
summary: Only freezes at the bottom, the top doesn't get ...

reviewText: We got this to store breastmilk in the basement. It was super easy to set up. I keep a thermometer in it to ensure it stays at the right temp, and it's always been perfect. When my breastfeeding days are over, it'll be perfect for general freezer overflow.

I was pleased with the size upon arrival and it went right to zero degrees with the Temp knob set in the middle.....So far so good. One note is that the Instructions say if it loses power you must wait at least 3 minutes before turning it back on......I called the Company and said the instructions really mean it will automatically go back on after 3 minutes ....Whew !!!

This freezer is just the right size for one person. It's light enough I can move it around. The basket is handy. I am happy that I purchased it. I will have to schedule a defrost sometime in the future, but the freezer is well engineered and it won't be difficult to defrost and clean it.

I am so happy with my freezer.  Living in an apartment and being a cook did not allow me to store and freeze in the fridge that came with the apartment.  This is the perfect addition and just small enough to fit in and hold what I need it to hold.

I have been using this freezer for a couple of weeks and so far it is excellent. It freezes food very fast and runs very quiet. It is deeper and roomier than I expected. I am very pleased with this freezer so far.

First of all, I have to say this was bought at a discount due to a "cosmetic defect." Unfortunately, the defect was not cosmetic, it was defective in operation. It leaked oil immediately, smelled like it was about to catch fire, and died within 10 minutes. That being said, I can't comment on how it would perform new.

It's a fridge. The first one we bought for the office was the same brand, a bit smaller. After a year or so, it turned into a freezer; ONLY. it would freeze and then thaw out and in a few hours, freeze soda bottles, sandwiches, fruit, whatever. We chipped in and bought a new one, we hope it continues to just refrigerate the food that needs to stay cold. We bought the same brand, because it was a good price. There you go.
summary: because it was a good price. There you go

reviewText: Got this for my husband for his birthday to be used as a beer fridge. It keeps the beer at a good temp (many small fridges like this are meant for wine and do not cool properly for beer) and looks nice too. The light can be turned off if you don't want a blue glow coming from it at all times, which is nice. It also holds more than a mini-fridge since it doesn't have a freezer or that random shelf at the bottom.

I bought this for my son after he had shoulder surgery and needed to apply ice on a regular basis. He says it works great, produces plenty of ice and it was the model he was planning to buy. From what I've seen, it doesn't take up a lot of counter space and turns out ice pretty quickly.

This part is a perfect replacement for my small refrigerator. It took quite a long time for it to get here (almost a month) but it was worth it. I plugged it in and it worked right away. Still working today.

This was one of two relays (the other being the overload relay) I needed to repair a Vinotemp wine refrigerator.  I purchased this and the other relay for a combined total of <$15.  Vinotemp wanted $75 (!!!!) for the same two relays.
summary: Fixed Vinotemp wine fridge and saved $60

reviewText: This part is a direct replacement for the one on my Black & Decker mini fridge from Walmart. My old part would rattle when I took it off and shook it. I could not find this part anywhere on the Internet but found it here on Amazon. It took a good 2-3 weeks for part to arrive from China. As soon as I installed it the fridge started right up. It's been running a week now with no issues.
summary: Don't toss that minifridge just yet! Buy this part first!

reviewText: This is same as the Kenmore filter. Kenmore does not make any appliances.  They get other manufacturer's to make appliances and they put their name on it. The refrigerator that I have was made by Whirlpool, with the Kenmore name on it. So this filter is fits perfectly.
summary: This is same as the Kenmore filter. Kenmore does ...

reviewText: Works great! It did take a little longer than normal for the water to clear up after the initial installation... but the water tastes great!! And, trust me... I drink a LOT of water... and it's definitely filtering out a lot of the nasty tasting impurities in my unfiltered tap. Matter of fact... I've had a couple of random comments about the water tasting good.
summary: I've had a couple of random comments about the water tasting good.

reviewText: I Love This! It works quickly and make lots of ice. Also, it is so clever - if you leave the ice in the hopper and it melts, it takes the water and remakes the ice without having to do anything! So, I always have fresh ice on hand. I can't believe I didn't get one a long time ago. My freezer is always too full and doesn't have an auto ice maker, so now I can have margaritas all the time. Don't waste your time deciding - get one now! By the way, I was in no way paid for this review.
summary: I Love This! It works quickly and make lots of ...

reviewText: It makes ice I like it.  So far so good.  Keep in mind this does not keep ice frozen for a long period of time.  But it makes the ice quick and if you want to save it just put the ice in zip lock bag and put it in the freezer.
summary: It makes ice I like it. So far so good

reviewText: All I can say is this unit is amazing.  It does what the company says it will do.  Produces ice very rapidly compared to my $3,000.00 refrigerator.  We turn it on every time we have friends over to demonstrate its workings even if we don't need the ice.  We are putting it in our camper and will get lots of use out of it I'm sure.

The machine stopped working after 3 months and I can not see how I can get it covered by the 1 year warranty that it boasts.  If someone sees this and knows how to return (under warranty) an appliance, please let me know.
summary: Stopped working after 3 months ...does not seem to give option to be covered under one year warranty

reviewText: We've been using this ice maker constantly for over a year and it is still working great. The only time it's turned off is when we're out of town. Never had a problem. Love the roundish shape of the ice and the fact that you can select three different sizes.
summary: Still going strong after a year

reviewText:
This ice maker is one of the nicest things I've added to my kitchen in a long time. It makes ice quickly and lets you know when it is full of ice.
Also, it tells you when to add water.
It is a nice addition and I think anyone would enjoy it.
summary: It is a nice addition and I think anyone would enjoy it

reviewText: I would not recommend this humidifier.  It was highly rated in Consumer Reports but I find it is way too noisy.  Can not even determine if it works well at humidifying since I am only able to put it on for an hour or so before I go to bed due to the noise.  Sounds like a loud engine.

Perfect - exactly what I needed and is the exact same item that originally came with the dishwasher. Needed a new one since my installer (father in law!!) cut the originals too short and the dishwasher wasn't flush with the cabinets.

Our dishwasher came with a basket in the door and it always gets overly full.  Now we have one basket in the door and this second basket in the front row of the dishwasher.  With the 2 baskets, I have room to put oddly-shaped gadgets, as well as my utensils which now have space to really get clean.  This basket stands easily on the counter top when I'm emptying it.  I love it.
summary: This basket stands easily on the counter top when I'm emptying it

reviewText: Don't buy this if you want to check the outside or inside humidity !! Today, July 20, 2015 it shows outside humidity at 42%. It rained this morning over 2 inches. It's summer in the St. Louis area. It is 79 muggy degrees outside !! It should read about 88%. You can calibrate inside humidity, but not outside. What a high priced piece of junk !!!!!
summary: Don't buy this if you want to check the outside ...

reviewText: Fits, works, much cheaper than OEM Samsung filters.  Can't comment on water quality as I have no means of testing it, but the water continues to taste fine and I don't notice any differences from the more expensive OEM Samsung filters.
summary: I don't see any difference from the more expensive OEM Samsung filters

reviewText: I have only used official Samsung filters until now. I got tired of the awful noise that came even with a new filter. The ice was 1/2 the size it should be, and half the time it wouldn't fill up. All of those problems went away when I installed this filter. I'll never buy another Samsung filter again.
summary: Finally, no noise and we have water pressure!

reviewText: I was having second thoughts about this after reading some of the negative reviews.  I decided to give it a try anyways.  I'm glad I did because it saved me from paying too much for a filter.  I don't normally write reviews, but this might help some of you that are on the fence about purchasing this.

This filter was less expensive than the OEM filter, installed with ease, and actually has greater throughput.  By that, I mean that the water pressure allowed through the filter is about twice as strong.  Cups fill up faster, which makes me happy.  I'll be using these filters from now on.

Great filter. I can honestly say that the water out of my refrigerator has never tasted fresher, even with the OEM Samsung filter. The filter fit well too, no leaks. The water pressure is fine. I've only had it on for a week, so I can't attest to the longevity. If there's a problem, I will update the review. So far, so good!

Perfect!  I will be ordering more.  Pretty convenient and quick.  I wouldn't have to order more than one at a time cuz this makes it so easy, but I'm a worry-wart and like to have them on hand.  I will be buying two at a time.
summary: Perfect! I will be ordering more

reviewText: We have only used this filter for a few weeks, so I cannot comment on how longs it will last.  It installed cleanly, with no leaks.  The water flow is excellent, one of the best we have seen in a replacement filter.

The water that is dispensed from the refrigerator is clean and clear.  I feel like the filter has improved the quality of the water dispensed and made it much more palatable.

The filter fit without issue and shows no signs of leaks.

I will definitely buy this filter again when the time comes to change it.

This has been installed for a month or so. It looks identical to the factory filter. No problems with installation.

I'm pleased with the product. I got 2 for less than the cost of 1 factory filter.

A no-brainer purchase.
summary: Replacement at a fraction of the "name" brand

reviewText: Great filter.  I can honestly say that the water out of my refrigerator has never tasted fresher, even with the OEM Samsung filter.  The filter fit well too, no leaks.  The water pressure is fine.  I've only had it on for a week, so I can't attest to the longevity.  If there's a problem, I will update the review.  So far, so good!
summary: Great filter. I can honestly say that the water ...

reviewText: you get what you pay for.  When I first bought my Samsung fridge from Sears, I purchased the filter for $70, then I found the Samsung Da29-00020b one from Amazon for $30 and I loved it,since it was cheaper and had the same functionality.  When I saw this product, I was surprised and wanted to try it out. Don't bother, my filtered water tastes the same as my sink water.  I will be repurchasing the Samsung Da29-00020b one from Amazon.
summary: Filtered water taste no different than sink water

reviewText: We love this beverage cooler. It fit perfectly and cools our soft drinks and bottled water just to the right temperature. It's also perfect for boxed juices for the grandkids! The cooler is in our kitchen and looks great. It matches the rest of our stainless steel appliances well. Everything runs smoothly and although I was worried it might be noisy, I was pleasantly surprised. There was just a little hum from the fan, but nothing loud or bothersome. I really have nothing negative to say! We love it!
summary: Looks Great! Works Great! We Love it!

reviewText: These are the cat's meow!!!  I just moved into a home with an older (but far from dead) dishwasher, and the metal prongs are rusting at the top and leaving rust deposits on my dishes (Fiestaware).  I purchased these years ago for another old dishwasher and loved how they covered the prong tips protecting my dishes.  Well?  They're still as good as they used to be!  I didn't think there were enough for all the prongs in my dishwasher, but I have a few leftover.  They're wonderful!!!

My dishwasher rack looks like new after installing these tips. It was not as hard as other reviewers say. Sure, you need to apply some pressure, and if you're using dishwasher-rated glue, you may also want to wear latex gloves. In my case I was done in about 45 minutes. I've had them now for about 6 months, and they still look like new. Make sure to get rid of the rust before putting them on.
summary: My dishwasher rack looks like new after installing these tips

reviewText: Used these to cover the prongs on my dishwasher that was beginning to rust. I've had them on for about 6 months and they still work great! They are nice and strong, and no rust is coming through. Be warned that they will be stained if they come into contact with tomato sauce but this will not impact their performance.
summary: Works great to cover rust spots!

reviewText: I got tired of the little marks on my good plates, and wondered where the scratches on my pans was coming from, until I looked at the rust on my dishwasher rack tines. These cover them up great!  I had my husband snip (not as easy as it sounds) the ends of the really deformed tines off and put these on.  I didn't use the glue, and have only lost one so far.  No big deal.  The shorter tines doesn't seem to be an issue either, where they were snipped.  Great product, and a super cheap way to fix a problem.
summary: Great way to repair that dishwasher rack!

reviewText: I refurbish and sell used dishwashers, and one of the biggest problems I come across, outside of dishwashers that are so dirty that I wonder how the people who owned them hadn't died from food poisoning, is rusty racks. Now, instead of using a half bottle of ReRack, I can just clean the rust off of the offending tine tip, slide one of these on, and I'm done. Don't have to go hunting for a replacement rack from a scrapped unit that way either.

I put a few of these on a year ago with Marine JB weld and they held up beautifully. They have not deteriorated further as far as far as I can tell. I went ahead and did all the rest a couple months ago in the same way and none of them have come off either. Since Marine JB Weld only comes in gray as far as I know, I was careful when applying it to wipe off any excess. Since one typically looks at the dishwasher rack from above,the ring of gray doesn't seem noticeable to me.
summary: ... ago with Marine JB weld and they held up beautifully. They have not deteriorated further as far as ...

reviewText: I didn't buy these for dishwasher rack tips; I bought them for covering the ends of brake bleeder screws to keep dirt and moisture out.  They work better than the caps sold as brake bleeder caps and are much, much cheaper.  FYI the inner diameter is 1/8 inch easy slide on and off but if warmed up they can be made to fit as big as 3/16 inch.

These fit snugly on the rack tips / tines of my 30-year-old dishwasher. The only drawback is they make the process of loading-unloading the dishwasher a little slower since the space between the tines is a little smaller now.

I love this machine. I made a batch of bubble hash last night in this machine and it's amazing how good this washer did. I got a 13 gram piece of bubble hash by just using my trimmings from my plants. This machine is awesome. I would recommend this washer in a heart beat to anyone and everyone. I would give it more than a five star rating if I could. Thankyou bubbleman for this great product.

I wanted a filter that is equivalent to the one that came with my refrigerator including that it meets NSF 53. Nothing on this product's packaging states that they do. It only says it meets NSF 42. The original filter that came with my refrigerator clearly states that they meet both standards so this filter is not an equivalent replacement. I returned them.

As good as the LG brand filters.  Some of the other aftermarket filters I have tried do not provide good tasting water.  This one is the only aftermarket filter I have used that provides good tasting water.  I would only use this brand or the LG.  The LG costs much more though.
summary: As good as the LG brand filters

reviewText: The cost of these two filters is less than the cost of one LG filter. Fit and function is as good as an LG filter. My wife says she can taste a hint of chlorine in the water, which she couldn't with the LG filter, but it tastes fine to me. I won't be buying any more LG filters as long as these are available.

This was a great alternative for my LG refrigerator when the factory filter needed to be replaced. The LG ones are around $30-35 USD each, which is way overpriced. These work just as well for a fraction of the price. Just a note that you NEED TO RUN WATER THROUGH THIS BEFORE DRINKING. No one reads instructions but if you run a few gallons of water through this filter you won't have any issues with taste.

I bought a brand new Whirlpool dishwasher and this part didn't come with it. So I ordered it from Amazon and it came in super fast and was just what I needed. The package had Whirlpool markings on it. Great deal.
summary: that part your dishwasher didn't come with

reviewText: Product arrived on time. We had let our warranty run out on our front load washer. As more and more of our clothes were being shredded, I realized the bellow needed replaced. This was a great price! I found step-by-step instructions on-line for replacing the old bellows. It was very easy for my husband, with the neighbor's help, to replace. The job was done in an hour and the bellow fit perfectly!

I am not sure what the difference is between this unit and the off-label unit.  I went with this because it was OEM and I figured it would be less of a headache.  The old one had teflon on the ice tray that was peeling off.  I was not sure if that one was OEM or some off-label.  Anyway, installation was super easy and it works great.

THIS ICE MAKER WAS SO EASY TO INSTALL. OURS HAD BEEN BROKE ABOUT A YEAR. CAN'T BELIEVE WE EVEN CONSIDERED GETTING A REPAIRMAN. LIFE WOULD BE GREAT  IF WE COULD ALWAYS FIX OUR  OWN APPLIANCES FOR 1/2 THE COST!
summary: GOOD QUALITY AND A PERFECT MATCH

reviewText: For years, I had a broken timer in my Kenmore dryer.  We could never leave the house with the dryer running because it would never go off.  I decided to replace it and found it here at a reasonable price.  The swap was easy (you can find instructions online) and it has worked flawlessly for the last several months.  Hopefully some improvements were made over the original timer and this will last for a few years.
summary: The swap was easy (you can find instructions online) and it has worked ...

reviewText: Replaced this on my dryer myself after contacting a repairman and learning how much it was going to cost for him to do it. Was easy to do and the price was great. My dryer has been humming along ever since I replaced this part. It works!

The timer arrived on time and was the correct model.  It turns out that I didn't need it as the problem was corrected prior to receiving the timer.  However, I would not hesitate to order this type of equipment again as I was more than pleased with the service and equipment.

I love this fridge!  If you love to chew ice, this is the perfect ice maker.  The ice comes out a little soft, perfect texture for chewing ice and not breaking your teeth, which is exactly what I wanted. Since the ice is soft, if you leave the ice in the ice maker basket, it will eventually melt again to water and remade into ice cubes.  This is not an ice maker for those who want hard ice that will not melt fast in drinks.
summary: Great Ice maker for those who love to chew ice!

reviewText: There's something wrong with this unit. I've spent hours trying to get the connections to both CO2 and the keg to stop it from leaking. I'm really disappointed with this. Now I have to return it for refund.

I didn't realize that this was sold by a company just down the road from me.  It fit my Whirlpool fridge perfectly and it's better made than the originals.  I cannot tell the difference between the originals and this one, but for the strength improvement.
summary: It fit my Whirlpool fridge perfectly and it's better made than the originals

reviewText: I installed this filter in the fridge on Jan 5 and about 10 DAYS later, the water tastes horrible and trickles out of the dispenser.  It's supposed to work for SIX MONTHS, and it didn't even last 10 days. Rubbish.  Save your money.  Buyer beware.
summary: Save your money! This worked for less than 10 days.

reviewText: When I ordered this product, I did not realize that it came from China. I am not comfortable with  using this type of item that is not made in the USA. I returned the item. I feel it should be noted in the description as to where the item originates.
summary: Beware these filters are from China!

reviewText: Installing this new part was easy and my washer now completes the high speed spin cycle but there is a very strong electrical burning odor after only a single rinse/drain cycle. I uninstalled the part to make sure the smell was coming from this and not some other part of the washer and sure enough, this brand new part is the culprit. I ordered another one and I'll update my review if the 2nd one works as it should.

Replaced the old lock mechanism with this, because a piece had been broken and it was making a loud noise, because the lock wasn't catching completely. Now the door won't even stay shut. I have to tape it shut in order to do laundry (and even that doesn't work all the time). I have a family of six, and laundry just doesn't wait around here. Now I have to buy another part!
summary: Door won't even stay shut, let alone locked!

reviewText: Perfect replacement for the original.  Of course the original isn't all that good - it self destructed because we put a water bottle in it.  *CRACK*  Oh come on.  But if you do end up with a broken tray shelf, you are going to need a replacement and this is the one to get.

The switch and latch worked perfectly.  Installation was very simple.  The hardest part was figuring out how to remove the rubber gasket around the door.  Once I realized there was a metal ring with a spring attachment that held the gasket in, it was a simple task to remove it.
summary: Door latch and switch worked perfectly.

reviewText:
I bought this because the door latch on my Frigidaire front load washer was buzzing when the door was locked.  I had originally put a strap around the door to keep it closed but after several loads, it started buzzing again.

I installed the new part in about 15 minutes using a video that I watched on Youtube.  It's been working for about 10 days now so I have high hopes it will work for years to come.
summary: Works just like the original part

reviewText: The part was just right! After looking around on youtube we realized this was the part we needed.  We also used youtube to help with the install but it was not hard at all! And the price was way cheaper than at the local parts store!

When our washing machine stopped working after about 3 years, we were really concerned that we were going to have to buy another washer/dryer combo.  Every time we tried to start the washing machine, we would get the warning buzz indicating that the door was ajar.

After doing a little research, I found out how to check error code which lead me to this part.  The part was easy to access and replace.  Our washer works again.  This is a bargain compared to buying a new washer!

This is, indeed, an original LG OEM part, and fit my washer perfectly. I simply took pictures of the washer parts as I disassembled the pump, installed this new pump, reassembled everything, reconnected the washer to water and power and fired it up. Works flawlessly. If this is the part you need for your model, buy this item to be sure it's original.

Got these last week and couldn't be happier with them. Water tastes good and water pressure through the filter is also good. I've been using the Whirlpool filters for years now, but won't go back. The price of this 3-pack is the same as a single one of the overpriced ones I'd been buying.

I was skeptical  of these but decided to try them anyway when the old ones i was using were discontinued.  I wasn't going to pay a lot more for the new ones.  I don't detect any difference in the water taste from the old ones and they fit perfectly.  I did make sure they were a direct replacement by number for the old ones before ordering.  How long will they last-we'll see.

I ordered this filter to replace one that was too big to fit in our Kenmore side-by-side fridge (model number 106.53359300) despite being on the list of replacement filters that should have worked. This one fit perfectly, and it's been working fine for a couple months now. No problems, no leaks, and I'm knocking on wood now in hopes that it will stay that way.
summary: Perfect fit for Kenmore side-by-side fridge!

reviewText: THESE FILTERS HAVE LASTED ME OVER A YEAR AND WITH A FAMILY OF 7 WITH FRIENDS AND FAMILY OVER A LOT WITH CONSTANT USE YOU WOULD THINK I WOULD BE REPLACING FILTERS LEFT AND RIGHT BUT THESE LAST AND WITHIN A YEAR I HAVE ONLY USED 2. I WILL ORDER THESE AGAIN WHEN NEEDED.

The directions make it easy.  This valve doesn't look the same as the one originally installed in some refrigerators, but the instructions make it easy to see how to attach everything.  I've never fixed a refrigerator before, but I had no problems installing this valve.
summary: It might look different than your stock valve, but if the part number is right, it will work.  Instructions are good.

reviewText: I normally try to make my own repairs where it is safe and cost-effective to do so.  Replacing this part in my fridge was one of the easier and quicker repairs I've made.  Now, the water dispenser does not drip.  The part was not identical the one I replaced, but that's been the case with nearly every replacement I've made to my Whirlpool/Kitchenaid appliances.  Hopefully, this is the result of improvements in their supply chain to reduce unreliable parts.

I think this little freezer, for a little over 200 bucks, exceeds my expectations.  It keeps everything very cold...I have it only turned up half way.  It's quiet running...it does seem to run a lot...but according to the energy guide it only cost 70 bucks a year...hopefully, that's accurate.  3.8 cubic feet is just the right size for my kitchen, it's out of the way, doesn't take up too much space, and complements my side by side refrigerator. I definitely would buy this again. I highly recommend it.

Arrived as promised, and works as represented.

I bought a freezer thermometer with it, which I think is a good idea. It's allowed me to adjust the temperature just so, and the freezer stays steady at that temperature.

This is just what I needed for my pantry/laundry room.  I stacked my washer and dryer and placed this where the dryer used to be.  Because it is not very deep it was able to fit without having to relocate the dryer vent in the floor.  It seems to be working very well and hold lots of food.
summary: This is just what I needed for my pantry/laundry room ...

reviewText: JUST PLUGED IN TO VERIFY OPERATION. COLD QUICK, QUIET OPERATION, INSIDE LIGHT A BONUS. FIT AND FINISH MUCH BETTER THAN EXPECTED. SEPARATE FREEZER SHOWS GOOD ENGINEERING . HAVE NOT YET INSTALLED TO ITS WORKING LOCATION
summary: FIT AND FINISH MUCH BETTER THAN EXPECTED

reviewText: We've had this running inside our very small house for several months now, and it hasn't given us any problems at all. It's quiet, maintains the correct temperature, and is the perfect size for our needs. I was hesitant to go with a brand I've never heard of, but it's been perfectly reliable, and I'm glad we went with this model and saved the money over the big name brands.

Finally found the perfect size freezer.  Works great.  The door seals really tight.  No way to accidentally leave it open. I just wish it was frost-free.  But... I knew that when I bought it.  And... most freezers this size are not frost-free.  Very quiet.
summary: Perfect size, quiet, NOT frost free.

reviewText: My wife and I are looking forward to putting up frozen veggies from the garden this year. There's plenty of space. We never knew how much of a relief it would be to have the extra space, and the convenience of the vertical access.
summary: My wife and I are looking forward to putting up ...

reviewText: So far, so good after one week in operation. The freezer is keeping all the food in a deep freeze. This may be due in part to how the door works; each time it is closed, there is a hiss, as though the door is being sealed shut. The freezer was relatively light, so I was able to drag it into the house and down a flight of stairs on my own. Yes, it arrived dented, but I did not buy it for its looks.

I received this freezer this afternoon. It came doubled wrapped in cardboard with an extra layer of styrofoam. It was in perfect condition with no dents or scratches. I plugged it in and put a tray of ice cubes in the basket. Within a couple of hours, the water had turned to ice. It is the perfect size for my needs. In addition, the motor is silent. I am thrilled with this purchase.

The shipping box looked like it had been rolled down a flight of stairs, but the inner box and freezer were fine.  I leveled the unit with a 'level' and waited about 12 hours before plugging it in.  It got very cold quite quickly.  So far, so good.  Only time will tell how well it's made.  But at present, I really do like it.

I am quite happy with this freezer.  Now I have my own TV dinners nicely stored in it.  I freeze them in my refrigerator freezer then move them to this one so I won't have to defrost it very soon. I have had this since June 2015 and in March 2016 I thought I had better defrost it.  I did yet I didn't really need to.  Also it is also so quiet I can't hear it running.

It is October 2016 and I am still very happy with it.

We've been really happy with this freezer. Apartment living doesn't allow for a lot of wiggle room when it comes to storage and as bulk-food shoppers it's a great fit.
It's quiet, doesn't frost up much at all and the size makes it easy to find stuff when we need it.
I would buy the same model if I had to do it again.
An added bonus is that it's very quiet and doesn't put out too much heat.

The refill comes in a bag just like the first product you bought which was in the box as well.  The refill replaces the bag in the box.  If you don't already have a box, why would you buy a refill?  You wouldn't buy refills for a pen that you don't have.  The product is great and saves money over purchasing regular stuff.
summary: Its a refill - Just the bag to go in the box you already have

reviewText: I bought this as a replacement for my Honeywell HCM350. It fits and I think is even a little thicker (and therefore yields higher moisture in the air) than the one that came with the original humidifier.

THE WORST FILTER!!!! This filter is like a piece of wet bread when it gets wet. Even with the humidifier running on low constantly with ample water, the top of the filter gets crusty and dried out. With prior filters, I need to rotate them every few days. With this one, it's at least once a day. It also can't even stand up when wet. It flops over constantly. If I didn't have to consistently turn the filter around, I wouldn't mind as much. Ugh, so disappointed I spent money on this.

These work very well and are sturdy enough that they can last for a significant amount of time. I used to order the manufacturer replacements, but they are so flimsy they couldn't be used with the humidifier. I would definitely recommend these as they are sturdy and work very well.

This humidifier is easy to refill and does not make much noise.  There are controls for the amount of humidified air provided.  It is not a noisy
machine.  Excellent to keep in places where you spend much time, i.e. home office or in your bedroom by your bedside.  Especially helpful during the dry winters for persons on blood thinners, because the humidity it provides helps to avoid nosebleeds.  Persons who are taking blood thinners are particularly susceptible to heavy nosebleeds.
summary: This humidifier is easy to refill and does not make much noise

reviewText: This filter was worse than the original Honeywell filter that came with my humidifier.  It worked okay for a few days, but then it became waterlogged and lost its shape, so that it retained water instead of releasing it into the air through the humidifier.  The filter would not even dry out completely after leaving it out for two days.  I was hoping that this would be better than the original filter, but this is not it, and I'm still looking around for a better replacement for the Honeywell filter.
summary: Filter stops working after a few days

reviewText: Exactly what I ordered and arrived on time.  Have not used the filters yet but have no reason to believe they will not do fine.  They appear to be of the same quality as the original Honeywell branded filter.
summary: Have not used the filters yet but have no reason to believe they will not do fine. They appear to be of the same quality ...

reviewText: After about a week I would say these are great. They seemed very flimsy and I wasn't sure they would work. But they wick the water up to the very top of the filter so you get more moisture in the air. I keep having to add water to the reservoir. I don't know how long they'll last-but so far I'm extremely happy with them

The filters are holding up well and they are not paper thin. I immediately noticed a difference after replacing the filter, now I have to fill up the humidifier twice a day instead of once a day. I'm glad I could find something that performs well and doesn't cost as much as the OEM ones.

Don't waste your money, buy actual Honeywell brand filters. These off-brand filters are difficult to install, and they collapse once installed. The actual Honeywell brand filters cost a couple of dollars more, and do a much better job.

If you are looking for the thick HAC-504 filters, then this is the one for you. They are almost twice as thick as the ones that are now being sold as the official replacement filters.

Humidifier is much more effective with these.
summary: If you are looking for the thick HAC-504 filters, ...

reviewText:
These do not work nearly as well as the ones from Honeywell (Kaz). They are so poorly made, so light weight that they do not wick the water up to be evaporated. These are a complete waste of money. You can buy the genuine Honeywell HAC-504AW Humidifier Replacement Filter, Filter A
by Kaz for almost the same price and they actually work as they are designed to work. DO NOT BUY THESE, BUY THE ONES FROM KAZ, THE GOOD ONES ARE LISTED AS Honeywell HAC-504AW Humidifier Replacement Filter, Filter A by Kaz
summary: THESE ARE GARBAGE, A COMPLETE WASTE OF MONEY

reviewText:
The "Humidifier Filter Buy" replacement filters do not seem to last or hold up like the genuine Honeywell "HAC-504" filters.  These knock-off filters by "Humidifier Filter Buy" also had an odd odor to them after they were used for less then a few hours.  After buying these "Humidifier Filter Buy" filters, I discovered I could purchase genuine Honeywell "HAC-504" direct from Honeywell (HINT. . . The genuine filters were actually cheaper then these knock-off filters)

DO NOT PURCHASE
summary: ... filters do not seem to last or hold up like the genuine Honeywell "HAC-504" filters

reviewText: I hate being fooled or taken advantage of!  This replacement filter is not the same quality as the original that came with the machine.  It is thinner and after only three days of use,  it is already deteriorating.

Why do all the ice makers look the same with different company names no matter what website you're on??  This is like a freakin' conspiracy.  My third ice maker I need to buy.  I'm rating not only the ice makers that keep breaking after one year of average to less-than-average use, but I'm also rating all the companies making a buck on the consumer that has no other options.  Garbage.  All of them.

This is going to have a great life!  I bought this because it isn't always easy for me to get out to stores. I like being able to fill up a cooler with my perishables while I defrost the freezer in my compact fridge, which doesn't have its own ice maker attachment like the big refrigerators do. I'd have been happier if it was a bit smaller, but that's just a preference. It works well and is a decent price.
summary: Nifty gadget. Ice...whenever I want it! Fast too!

reviewText:
It's nice. My parents seem to enjoy using it. It's simple. The only thing that would make this better would be if the ice stayed frozen in the machine and also if the ice didn't come out so wet.

Addition: mine has stopped working in the 3 months I've had it and it cannot be returned. This is ridiculous.

I love this ice maker, its easy to use, and makes a lot of ice. It's perfect for people like me that never have room in the freezer for ice. It's kind of heavy though, but otherwise awesome. I love that I can sit it right on my counter top. I'm looking forward to using it in the Summer time, for my ice cold tea.

It works well. Usually the first couple of "trays" are a little on the thin side but after that the cubes are perfect. My grandkids LOVE it. Sometimes they eat it just so fast that tray is often empty... waiting for the next cubes to plunge into the basket. Great price too!  And one reservoir of water makes several little baskets of cubes.  I just bag them and stick them in the freezer.

I was a little nervous about this purchase, afraid it would not produce the ice it said it could or that the ice would not taste good but this thing is amazing. The output is just as it says and I love the ice. I've only had it about a week so I can't vouch for longevity at this point. But I am very glad I made the decision to get this. UPDATE-I've had this more than a year now and still love it. Definitely recommend.
summary: afraid it would not produce the ice it said it could or that the ice would not taste good but this thing is amazing

reviewText:
I wish I would have bought this a long time ago. It has made life a lot easier.
It works well, is easy to use and I have used it on an almost daily basis.  I waited to write this review to see
how it would hold up after time and it has done very well. I would recommend this ice maker
to anyone.

This portable ice maker is amazing!!! I don't have to buy ice anymore!!! I have been using it at home but have also taken it to our camper to make ice. I can't believe i haven't gotten one sooner. It has saved me so much money. Very fast! Makes ice in about 6 min, easy to use.

Had this icemaker just over a month before it stopped working.

The timer never worked properly - it would go off at all hours and start making ice, so after a few days of that, we decided that we would only plug it in when we wanted ice.

On the 5th time we went to use it, it would no longer power up.

It was quick at making ice, such a shame that it didn't last. It could have easily earned a 4-star rating, but the timer was non-existent and the ice maker quit working after a handful of uses.
summary: Could have been great. Sadly wasn't.

reviewText: We are enjoying our ice maker very much.  Our refrigerator has a small freezer space that is needed for other frozen food.  In this heat we enjoy having ice  in our drinks and the ice maker makes that possible.  It is easy to clean and makes lots of cubes in a short time.
summary: In this heat we enjoy having ice in our drinks and the ice maker ...

reviewText: I replaced an older unit that ran for 3 years 365 days a year without a problem.  This one arrives and it is 75% quieter than the old one and puts out 50% less heat.  Works like a champ.  If it lasts three years I will be very satisfied.

This little ice maker is a wonderful addition to our ice making needs. Sometimes when we run low on ice we use this ice maker to help out. I recommend this to anyone who is looking for additional ice needs.

So far this unit has worked like a charm.  Bought this for my mom because she didn't have a refrigerator with an ice maker, and she absolutely loves it.  Not a fast ice maker but it does work very well.  Gives you the choice of 3 different sizes...
summary: So far this unit has worked like a charm

reviewText: I've owned quite a few ice makers and they never seem to last long and definitely have their limitations.  This one is great!  It makes way more ice than any other one I've had- it's overflowing all the time!  Well worth the price.
summary: This one is great! It makes way more ice than any other ...

reviewText:
While we have only had the ice maker for one week, we found it extremely easy to set up and use.  The ice can be made in three sizes of which we choose the medium size.  Ice is made quickly and if not used, melts down and water is used to make fresh ice.  Does not freeze ice extremely hard, but more than enough for the average user.  I did not find this to be a problem.
I would buy this product again.
summary: we found it extremely easy to set up and use

reviewText: Purchased this machine 4 months ago. it is hard to get it to turn on and off when you want it to. the lid is uninsulated so when it is off the ice melts quickly. and after 4 months the pump went out and it quit working. So I turned it back in Amazon had to refund it because they didn't even have the phone number of the company that sold it. I bought a simpler model with an insulated top so the ice lasts longer.

So far it is working great. It keeps the ice coming. It's not as big as the last one we had, but we just bag the ice and put it in the freezer to ensure we have enough for bigger things like lots of smoothies.
summary: So far it is working great. It keeps the ice coming

reviewText: Received ice maker in February of this year. Ice maker has been making ice every day since. We start the ice maker in the morning and before we turn it off at night our ice bin is full. We use a lot of ice through out the day.
summary: Received ice maker in February of this year. Ice ...

reviewText: I like the ice cubes, however the unit smells very strongly of plastic.  We tried twice to run a bleach solution through it as well as lemon juice.  That helped a little bit but eventually the plastic smell came back.  It ends up in your ice cubes and makes your drinks taste bad.  I wouldn't buy it again for this reason.  We've had other units which didn't have this problem.

I bought this ice maker for my husband for Christmas. It produces ice very quickly and is relatively quiet. Perfect for personal use. This is the 3rd  ice maker we have purchased in the past few years. The 1st one (by another company) lasted approx. 2 yrs, but was not as efficient. The 2nd one, (also another company) only lasted about 6-8 mths before it died.  So far this is the best purchase we have made. Hopefully it will have a decent life span.

We're having a party this weekend and I've been running this ice maker for 3 days. It works great. I store the cubes in bags in the freezer. Once the guests arrive, I can make more. I like the window so people can watch the cubes being made. And I love the little ice scoop that comes with it.  There isn't anything that I dislike about this product.

These are the genuine LG filters, so if this is the right fit for your refrigerator, then these are the ones to get. Each was in it's own retail box and each filter was wrapped in plastic inside the box.
summary: Genuine LG filter in retail packaging!

reviewText: These filters work as well as the ones I purchased directly from LG, except that this time I paid half the price. Unlike filters which I bought directly from LG which came packaged loose in plastic baggies, these filters from Discount Filter Store came packaged in their original carton boxes, individually wrapped in plastic foil.

I found these parts on Amazon after a brief internet search regarding my Whirlpool washing machine's broken agitator.  I was surprised to find out that my machine had a common problem. I was more surprised to learn I could fix it for less than $10.  After watching an instructional video on YouTube, I purchased these parts and fixed my washer in 15 minutes.  Now it works just like new.
summary: Quick, easy fix for Whirlpool upper agitator.

reviewText: Worked just fine I was very happy with my purchase. It's a lot cheaper to do it yourself then to pay a repairman. If you have all the tools that are needed. And if you don't have the tools that are needed it is still cheaper than a repairman.
summary: Worked just fine I was very happy with my purchase

reviewText: Description read HYGROMETER and the picture shows the (%) percentage for relative humidity (which is what a hygrometer is supposed to do). What I got in the mail was a thermometer that only reads Celsius. I'm sure somewhere else in the world, Celsius will do just fine. I couldn't even use it. Waste of time. Now that I've returned some time later, the description now reads THERMOMETER. I guess they realized their error after I requested my refund.

This thing is really meant to be an alarm clock rather than a weather station as I wanted.  There is no illumination unless you press a button on the back, and then it only stays lit for a few moments. The rest of the time it is dark and useless--impossible to see. I returned it and got another of our typical LaCrosse weather stations which can always be easily read.

Accurate. We used it to measure humidity in the house in the winter to help us figure out how much to use the humidifier. We didn't use the outdoor temperature feature, so I don't know anything about that feature.

Nice repair kit. With it I was able to fix my dryer within about 30 minutes.  It came with two pages of instructions making the job go quicker.  My dryer now has some more time before I will need to replace it.  It also saved me the expense of hiring a repair man.

Had no problem with the bulb.  It came covered in a little box so well protected all I had to do was take it out of the box and put it in the drier.  Well let's be real I gave it to my husband and he put it in.
summary: Had no problem with the bulb. It came covered ...

reviewText: The only reason I bought this was so that I would close the dryer door when finished.  If I don't close the dryer door, the light will burn out.  If you have a problem leaving the dryer door open, try this.
summary: Don't Leave That Dryer Door Open!

reviewText: A very inexpensive repair that was very easy to complete!  Fifteen minutes worth of work and the defroster is working again.  Fortunately we were able to test the heating element (much more expensive) for continuity with a multimeter and were able to rule it out as the failed part.  After pulling out the old thermostat and testing it for continuity, it had indeed failed.

This bulb was the recommended replacement for my GE dryer.  Once received it didn't last for more than 3 or 4 cycles.  It arrived on time and packaged well but that's about it.  I will go without a bulb in my dryer rather than ordering another in the hopes that the new one will last longer.

Exact replacement for my GE Electric Dryer.  Don't get the bulbs from the home improvement stores.  Even though they fit and light up, they don't last very long.  The GE bulbs have a thicker filament which resists the vibration of the dryer.  At this price I got 2 bulbs, keeping 1 on the shelf.

This may be the greatest knob that has ever been made in the history of Earth. It has, without a doubt, changed my life in profound ways. No longer will I be forced to use pliers to set the timer, trying in vain to figure out how long it will actually run.

These work -- you don't have to defrost your freezers that aren't frost-free (continual daily defrost cycle) very often at all.  A friend has been using them for several years and that is how I learned about them.

I've had my new, cute little freezer up and running for a month now, and there is NO frost in it as yet.  I am careful, though, not to go in and out of it all the time. I just use it for "spillover" and items I've stocked up on.

This valve lasted about a week, maybe two, before malfunctioning just like the original valve that came with the refrigerator (which lasted nearly a decade). Bad luck? Garbage product? I couldn't say. Paid $22 for it! The only good thing I can say is that I learned how easy it is to replace this valve, because I'll be replacing it again.
summary: before malfunctioning just like the original valve that came with the refrigerator (which ...

reviewText: I was able to install this in less than an hour and I am a novice.  Instructions are clear and it installs and performs as listed. There are Youtube videos if you need. Don't pay $300 or more if you are the least bit handy with tools.
summary: Money saving and easy to install!

reviewText: While an interesting idea, the device doesn't work. I tried a few different locations in my dishwasher but it never popped up to indicate the washer had been run. About the fourth time I tried to move it, the clips that hold it in place broke off.

This thing is useless. Half the time it doesn't come up when the dishwasher runs and even if it does it falls back down as soon as you open the door. I really wanted this this to work so we wouldn't need one on the outside but it just doesn't.
summary: This thing is useless. Half the time it doesn't come up when ...

reviewText:
Good idea but has some problems:
1. It must be in a specific spot in the dishwasher for it to work correctly.
2. Mine broke in less than 2 months (the clips on the back broke and after that, the whole thing fell apart.)
summary: Wanted to love...worked for a bit...then broke

reviewText: This product is wonderful! My husband could never tell whether the dishes in the dishwasher were clean or still dirty. Now he knows instantly when he opens the dishwasher door! I highly recommend this unit.

This works!  I placed it on the top of the front rack turned inwards, and it works perfectly.  Since it is not just me who runs the dishwasher, this is very helpful to know if what's inside is clean or dirty.

This is a small meter to protect your frozen foods. It is reliable, easy to install and works with all freezers no matter their shape or size. It protects by letting you know if the food has been exposed to high temperature.

I've got a fridge in my cabin and I've always wondered if things ever thaw out. Sometimes the ice cream is funky. When the weather gets colder the fridge won't run as much when it really needs to to keep the freezer cold. This will show me if that happens. I had to mess around with the Velcro tie because I needed to hang it vertically. I didn't have anything to tie it to the side of. See my picture. Very easy to use. I should have thought of it!

I bought one for my garage freezer, and one for my kitchen refrigerator/freezer. They work very well. Quite an ingenious solution, letting me know that my food has not defrosted to a dangerously low temperature.

And OK, they're a bit pricey, but the piece-of-mind is worth it. Highly recommended.
summary: Did your frozen food thaw out and then refreeze? Find out with this cool gadget.

reviewText: Wow. The price of these parts are so affordable, I saved at least $200 on labor by doing it myself. I didn't want to try and figure out what part was faulty, so I replaced all 3 parts and my dryer now has heat again after breaking 3 times! If I didn't invest so much money in the POS dryer, I wouldn't bother repairing it, but thank goodness Amazon has these parts for me to do the repairs on my own.
