I actually purchased this for a non ti Evga gtx 980 sc as it has been next to impossible to locate one. It is the "exact" same backplate as the non ti version by the way. Only difference is it  has ti on it. Basically what's happening is Evga is giving all the backplates to ti owners, then non ti owners can't find any to purchase.

Adds some rigidity to the card and makes it look even better, especially in cases with windows. Also helps to protect the electronics on the back of the card from cables, falling screws (oops), etc.

Super easy to install.
summary: Adds rigidity and protection to sensitive electronics.

reviewText: Doesn't make enough ice for two people to have even a couple of drinks in a night.  Seriously, I can't have a glass of tea during the day and have enough ice for tea with dinner.  Ugh.  It's the model for the fridge. NOT worth the money at all! I've never seen an ice maker with such piddly output.

These are a different design from the wheels that had originally come with the GE dishwasher, but they fit precisely and were a huge improvement over the aged wheels they replaced.  They've helped extend the life of the dishwasher by a few years I'd guess.
summary: These are a different design from the wheels that had ...

reviewText: The parts fit just fine. Every time the washer starts breaking down I start looking for a sale on a new one. Then I check youtube and amazon. The price to repair the washer/dryer is considerably less than buying a new one and I don't have to get rid of an old one.

My husband and I ordered this and followed directions on a YouTube video.  Neither of us have ever done this kind of repair, but it was so easy.  I don't know why any able-bodied person with simple tools would pay someone to do this for them.  We had our washer up and running in less than an hour.
summary: Saved us big money on repairs or a new washer

reviewText:
The washing machine started to rust at an inlet to the tub.  Looking up the problem on the internet shows this problem happens all the time.  The warranty is for one year.  After that, you are on your own to find a fix.

LG failed to make a washer that will last for years.  Lots of consumers have this problem.  It is too late for us.  You can see for yourself on the internet.

I've only had my dryer for a couple of days, but I really enjoy how easy it is to use. Obviously it's not to be relied upon like a traditional dryer, but it does the job for a single person like me living in an apartment with no washer or dryer hookup. It is a bit noisy, but so is my air conditioner (I'm not about to complain about that.)
summary: but I really enjoy how easy it is to use

reviewText: I love this little dryer. I use a portable washing machine (Panda) in my apartment and dry my bulky items in this dryer. If you pack it completely full, yes, it is going to take forever. I usually will throw in 1-2 hooded sweatshirts, 1-2 pairs of jeans, and 1-2 towels and it takes anywhere between 1 to 2 hours to dry completely depending on how much I put in it. It works great and is fairly quiet. Not sure what all the negative reviews are about!

These burners are very effective in heating up my food and soups and any other items that need to be heated to a nice boil. What I really like is the durability and the convenience of use when it comes to using these burners. The high quality that it brings to the table is something that is desired, and I really enjoyed using these for the past couple of months.
summary: Great heat provided by these electric burners

reviewText: This is the 3rd time I've ordered this brand's replacement piece for my refrigerator/freezer in the last year & a half.  I have been very happy with all 3 replacement parts.  It's really great to be able to replace things like this at a reasonable cost! Buying OEM replacement parts just isn't affordable.  I highly recommend.

It was a perfect replacement for the bin which had worn out. I had tried to fix it with parts, but apparently I wasn't too good at reassembly. So when I found the assembled bin, it solved the problem. (And made my wife happy, which made me happy!)
summary: Wife happy, and so am I

reviewText: I purchased this item after reading all the great reviews. I would say it has lived up to the expectation of what other customers are saying. Very durable and sturdy. It's a better quality than the original one.

I use this for a small cigar humidor and it works great. It takes up very little space and is pretty accurate ( I tested it for accuracy). Temperature only shows in Celsius, but doesn't really matter to me.

We were very excited about using this thermometer in our incubator. It had good reviews so we went with it. Put it in our incubator with 42 eggs and not 1 hatched. Put a different thermometer in to see if maybe it was off and it was 3 degrees under the other one. We've used our old thermometer with good results it just doesn't do the humidity. Very upset that we more than likely overheated our eggs and killed them.

THIS REPLACED AN OLD ONE THAT RECEIVER PICK UP HUNG OUT A WINDOW. WE REALLY LIKE THIS ONE SO MUCH BETTER. IT IS COMPACTED , EASY ACCESS TO THE BATTERY,THE RECEIVER PICK UP JUST HANGS OUTSIDE OUR DOOR OUT OF RAIN AND IS VERY ACCURATE WHEN CHECKING OUR OTHER REGULAR DEVICES. REALLY LIKE KNOWING THE HUMIDITY INDOORS WHEN LIKE TO LEAVE DOORS AND WINDOWS OPEN.WE WOULD HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS TO FRIENDS.

I bought two for a couple of my cigar humidors. Took them out of the package and placed in the humidors and they worked great. Checked them with a more expensive hygrometer and they were right on. They are small so they do not take up much space. Love them.
summary: Took them out of the package and placed in the humidors and they worked great. Checked them with a more expensive hygrometer and ...

reviewText: We were very excited about using this thermometer in our incubator. It had good reviews so we went with it. Put it in our incubator with 42 eggs and not 1 hatched. Put a different thermometer in to see if maybe it was off and it was 3 degrees under the other one. We've used our old thermometer with good results it just doesn't do the humidity. Very upset that we more than likely overheated our eggs and killed them.

THIS REPLACED AN OLD ONE THAT RECEIVER PICK UP HUNG OUT A WINDOW. WE REALLY LIKE THIS ONE SO MUCH BETTER. IT IS COMPACTED , EASY ACCESS TO THE BATTERY,THE RECEIVER PICK UP JUST HANGS OUTSIDE OUR DOOR OUT OF RAIN AND IS VERY ACCURATE WHEN CHECKING OUR OTHER REGULAR DEVICES. REALLY LIKE KNOWING THE HUMIDITY INDOORS WHEN LIKE TO LEAVE DOORS AND WINDOWS OPEN.WE WOULD HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS TO FRIENDS.

I bought two for a couple of my cigar humidors. Took them out of the package and placed in the humidors and they worked great. Checked them with a more expensive hygrometer and they were right on. They are small so they do not take up much space. Love them.
summary: Took them out of the package and placed in the humidors and they worked great. Checked them with a more expensive hygrometer and ...

reviewText: I use this for a small cigar humidor and it works great. It takes up very little space and is pretty accurate ( I tested it for accuracy). Temperature only shows in Celsius, but doesn't really matter to me.

I was able to fix my dryer for much less than the cost of even having a repairman come out and look at it, and certainly a lot less than a new dryer.  The components work well, and the actual installation wasn't difficult.

I received my order the day after I put it in. I installed the first filter yesterday and everything is working well so far. The price of the filters is great! It's about a fourth the cost of the store we bought the refrigerator from. I'm all about saving money!
summary: I'm very satisfied with my order of EcoAqua filters .

reviewText: Reasonably priced and excellent shipping.  We are renting for a few months and the refrigerator is an older model but works well.  I don't think the filter has been changed for a long time, so this was just what we needed at an affordable price.  Works great and gave us comfort in drinking water from the fridge.

This product was ordered as a replacement for a brand name filter.  It installed easily and the filter performs as expected.  I did run a small pitcher of water through the filter after installation to clear out a small amount of residue.  I have been using the filter for over a week now without any complaints.  If you are looking to save some money over brand names, I would recommend this one.

Work as good as the original and it did not leak. A lot of the aftermarket filters will leak, this one did not. I think the others leaked because the O-rings were different. If I used the O-rings off of the original filter they would not leak. This one sealed without having to mess with the O-rings. I also found it helps to put a little lubricant on the O-rings to help them seal and for ease of installation.

They do the job exactly as they are supposed to. They seem to be a perfect match to the manufacturer's filters. In my case, there were absolutely no differences in the installation, and I can't tell any difference in the taste of the water. I see no reason to pay any more.
summary: They do what they say they do

reviewText: What was supposed to be the WF1CB and so it said on the outside fo the package was in fact something else when the package was opened.  They look the same but have a different number.  There was nothing that indicated this could be a replacement for the WF1CB so I sent it back twice.
summary: What was supposed to be the WF1CB and so it ...

reviewText:
The filters arrived before the expected delivery date and was delivered intact.

The filters received matched the previous filters perfectly, and the filters more than met my expectations. The best thing, of course, is the price. I paid for 3 filters at a cost similar to what I have paid for 1 filter in the past.

I'm so glad that we tried these instead of purchasing the more expensive LG filters. I haven't been able to tell a difference at all with these filters compared to the LG brand ones. If you need to replace your refrigerator's water filter and want to save some money, give these a try!

This filter is only about half as thick as all the other ones I've ever bought. Consequently the humidifier does not work nearly as well as it should because this crappy filter does not absorb much water for transfer into the air.  I will be returning it and certainly won't buy it again.

This filter is totally useless.  It's not 1" in thickness as advertised, but around 1/2".  It's so flimsy that it totally collapsed with the first use.  Even with it collapsed, I still let the humidifier run, but the humidity level never came up.  Don't buy this!

I'd give this filter 0 stars if that was an option.  I use a humidifier for health reasons.  It's a necessary part of my life to have at least 45 to 50% humidity.  This filter, which I installed just yesterday, is not generating more than 35 to 38%.  This filter is so cheaply made and thin that it's totally collapsed in the humidifier.  I couldn't be more displeased.  Now, I'll have to spend extra money to buy one locally.

I bought this to replace the louvers on my old dryer vent. They had succumbed to the scorching sun. Pulling the louvers out of the new vent cover and reinstalling them in the old cover was simple and easy. Hooray! Dryer vent fixed! I am sure I will be doing this again in a few years but now I have the extra vent cover ready for when it is needed and I don't have to worry about replacing the whole thing. Hip, hip for easy projects!

Worked well and was a direct replacement for the hood I was replacing.  The old one had lost a door at some point.  (If you're looking for something with a pipe on it, this isn't what you want!!  It's just what you see, a plastic hood designed to snap onto a vent pipe.)
summary: Match my old cover perfectly!  (This doesn't include a pipe on the back)

reviewText: I bought this to replace a "deflecto" unit already installed on my house. The plastic flaps had aged and cracked over time and broken off earlier this summer. The flaps from the new unit fit into the old one perfectly, so I left it at that.

I found after my ice maker stopped working that I just wasn't cleaning it out often enough. It's just ice and water, right? Yes, but "stuff" still accumulates and affects the ice making process. I strongly suggest you clean  it out absolutely no less then once every two weeks. I've had no more problems now that I clean it out often. I think Emerson should emphasize more the need to clean it out and explain that if it stops working, not cleaning it out is probably why it isn't working properly.
summary: I found after my ice maker stopped working that I ...

reviewText: Piece of crap.... Installed pump, which was different from OEM style in October of 2016. Now, middle of June, 2017, not only does it leak, the impeller broke off from the motor shaft.... DO NOT BUY THIS REPLACEMENT PUMP....

It works so far.  The plug was a bit strange.  It didn't attach the same way the old one did but the adapter worked.  So far it is working really well.  I will update after some time to let you know how it is working.

Saved me hundreds of dollars by not going with a appliance service company.  The old one popped out and the new one popped in just as easily.  Took a total of 20 minutes, mostly looking for the right tools.  The tools needed were for taking the metal panel off the bottom of the front of the machine to access the pump.  Removing the pump required no tools.
summary: The old one popped out and the new one popped in just as easily. Took a total of 20 minutes

reviewText: I hate my humidifier design because these trays keep getting caked up with minerals to the point where the wicks don't work and the water starts leaking out of the humidifier and spilling on the floor next to the furnace.  I used to try to chisel out the mineral deposits, but had poor results. These replacement trays solve that problem.  If you own an Aprilaire, Bryant, or other humidifier that uses these trays, then you had better keep these replacements handy.

This product did not work for me. I purchased this for my ultrasonic cool mist humidifiers to help with the "white dust" that is given off from them. It is common for this to happen to ultrasonic humidifiers. This did not solve the white dust problem. Disappointed. Will be returning along with the ultrasonic humidifier.

This wheel assembly is better than the original that came with the Whirlpool dishwasher. I watched a youtube video on how to install it. That made installation quite easy. I couldn't be happier with the product.
summary: This wheel assembly is better than the original that came with the Whirlpool dishwasher

reviewText: The seller provided an online tutorial that really helped us install this part. It is made of metal and should last much longer than the crummy plastic parts my dishwasher came with. This is the third time I am replacing those plastic parts! The video was clear and informative, which is very helpful when you are working with your husband.
summary: The seller provided an online tutorial that really helped us ...

reviewText: Took about 20 minutes to put together. Watch the online videos first. This is slightly different from the original but seems to work better. Don't need to be incredibly handy to do this. Saved a lot of time and money.
summary: Not hard. Watch the video first...

reviewText: Was a little concerned with all the parts in the image, and then looking at the parts at first I wasn't sure how they all went together, but installation was pretty easy once I had figured that out. It looks like it will be better quality than the OEM part that I had to replace with it, so I don't expect to need another one of these for quite a while
summary: but installation was pretty easy once I had figured that out

reviewText: These are a major upgrade over the original plastic arms that are used in the KitchenAid/Whirlpool dishwashers. Very durable and should last the life of the dishwasher. Installation is easy, just follow the included instructions and it should take about 15 minutes.
summary: Installation is easy, just follow the included instructions and it should ...

reviewText: Excellent replacement for the cheap plastic part that came with it.  The instructions that came with it were not very good, but you can find detailed instructions on youtube and it does not take more than 10 minutes to do the job.  Excellent.
summary: Excellent replacement for the cheap plastic part that came with it.

reviewText:
Works great, much better than the original one that came with the unit.  Instructions were easy to follow.

By the way, this is my last Whirlpool Dishwasher, too many problems.  Just trying to keep it alive long enough until I can buy a replacement.

This is a complete replacement kit. You won't need to keep any of the old parts. I would have just broken the old parts off and saved some time instead of carefully removing them if I had realized that to begin with.

This is a better part than the original, and it was pretty easy to install. 30-40 minutes max, even for a noob.

Much better than the original design.  It did take me a few minutes to figure out the directions, but in all it probably took me only about 20 minutes to remove the old and install the new.  I noticed a few posts indicated the need for a hex screwdriver, which is true, but a hex adapter was included in my package to use in case you don't have one.

The installation took about 20 minutes mostly because the instructions were completely clear.  The sliding rack is more stable than before and this will extend the life of the dishwasher by a few years.

Couldn't be happier.  Should have pulled the trigger on this in the first place instead of just replacing the left side when it broke saying to myself "that was a fluke"...there's a reason these are on the market (right side went 6 months later). Do yourself a favor and just buy this one and replace both sides at the same.  I've had it installed for 6 months and I'm still very happy with my purchase.
summary: Should have gotten this the first time

reviewText: They should eliminate the instructions and just put a link to the youtube video.  This is a difficult project with the instructions but an easy project with the video.  Also, this is not just a replacement, but also an upgrade.

WAY much better than the crappy plastic kit that comes with the dishwasher. Both of the ones that came with the dishwasher broke within the first couple of years! These ones are made of metal and will last the rest of the life of the dishwasher.
summary: Higher quality parts than what comes with the dishwasher!

reviewText: Very nice replacement for the original defective parts. Instructions were not stellar, but the video on Youtube was.  The upper rack is now more stable than it was when we bought the dishwasher -- which I wish we hadn't!
summary: Very nice replacement for the original defective parts

reviewText: This replacement part is vastly superior to the original part. This one looks like it will not be as likely to suffer from the constantly breaking wheel axles, and the stressed portion is now all metal. It doesn't re-position up and down quite as smoothly as the all-plastic original, but I'll take that over having to replace it once or twice a year any day.
summary: Much improved over the original part!

reviewText: This is the third filter I've had for my Maytag dryer and this one, I'm hoping, will last until the dryer "dies."  The first two, Maytag original equipment, were very tightly strung across the plastic holder and in a fairly short period of time, began to rip away from the top of the holder.  This one isn't as tightly strung and it's easier to clean, so I'm thinking this will last longer.  So far, so good.

This is a poor excuse for a lint screen.  Although the same size as the original, the screen is a very loose fitted product and it does not want to let go of lint.  My grandson and I used this lint screen for target practice the other day and it was fine for that.
summary: This is a poor excuse for a lint screen

reviewText: It's junk. First time to use it and all of the pieces fell off and would not stay in place. The drain plugs don't stay in place. It's flimsy. It's actual junk. Don't waste your time or money. Absolutely worthless. There's got to be a better option. DO NOT BUY!!
summary: Don't waste your time or money

reviewText: I like the size of this freezer (it is very small but will do the job), but the freezer must have been dropped before it arrived.  It arrived with a broken wheel, the panel in the back was buckled and a big dent.  The freezer still works, but it is in rough shape.  Considering I paid more for it than other chest freezers that are larger, I am very disappointed.

My mother-in-law bought this hood and it stopped working after a month (the motor no longer turns on).

Aside from that the overall build quality is very poor too. The stainless steel feels very flimsy and it feels like I am denting the hood every time I touch it.
summary: You get what you pay for

reviewText: It works great. We've used it every day for about a month now. We'll quickly make up the cost of this soy milk maker over store bought non-dairy milk. We've particularly liked the soy-peanut-sesame milk we've made with it. Highly recommended.

This has to be the best washing machine that I have ever purchased.  My wife and I are pretty much old school and had to have an agitator.  We tried the high efficiency machines but were never satisfied with them.  This machine is really quite and sturdy.  You will not be disappointed.
summary: This has to be the best washing machine that I have ever purchased

reviewText: Installed easily and doesn't leak, but it's given such an awful taste to the water I can't drink it, nor can I use the ice.  I've tried running gallons of water through the filter, hoping to clear the weird, vaguely metallic, taste, but at almost two months, the water is still not drinkable.
summary: Adds a nasty taste to the water.

reviewText: Great little fridge!  It is exactly what we wanted.  No complaints about the sounds as we did not expect it to be a silent unit.  The sounds coming from the compressor are normal and to be expected, as described in the manual.  If you want a silent appliance, you'll have to look elsewhere.  Otherwise, this appliance does everything it should.  Beverages are nice and cold; the shelves are customizable, and the interior light and display are very nice.

They worked! I should be able to extend the life of my stove for at least another year! These are much better than the knobs the repairman sold me at an exorbitant price. They were easily installed and we can use the two burners that work on my cooktop.
summary: These are much better than the knobs the repairman sold me at an ...

reviewText:
Has worked flawlessly in my Whirlpool Dryer. I've since bought another one.

It worked better than the stock filter that came with my dryer actually. The stock whirlpool filter fell apart after a couple of months while this one has held up for 6 months now.
summary: Great filter, fits Whirlpool Dryer perfectly.

reviewText: I installed this on a friend's washing machine. I ended up only using one half and the new rubber, since the other half on the transmission was fine.  This part went out after about 2 weeks.  So I put the other half in... and that lasted about another 2 weeks.  I would NOT recommend this product for anyone (Unless you like disassembling your washing machine all the time)
summary: since the other half on the transmission was fine. This part went out after about 2 weeks

reviewText: My gas stove hasn't ignited on it's own for more than 10 years.  My husband bought this thing for a small price and spent a while on youtube learning how to fix the stove.  He's a genius!  This little part has made my life so much easier!  No more searching for a lighter (out on the grill of course), or matches (out on the lawn where the kids took it to light sparklers).  Cooking is easier and all 4 burners now come on within 10 seconds of turning them on.  Hooray!
summary: Made My Old Gas Stove Seem Brand New

reviewText: These are great. It should be noted that they only fit the bottom half of the door. A different one is required for the top half of the fridge because it is smaller due to a groove. At least that's case with our fridge. However, I believe both can be purchased through the same seller.
summary: These are great. It should be noted that they only fit ...

reviewText:
I almost spent $40.00 dollars on one of these for my Whirlpool fridge/freezer.  I was pretty fired-up over finding this one at this price.  My family owned an appliance repair business for over 40 years.  It kills me every time I have to pay retail for parts!!

This is one of the easiest fixes you'll ever attempt on an appliance.  And, at this price it's a win win..
summary: Almost spent $40.00 on the same part.

reviewText:
This filter is defective - it does not fit my Samsung refrigerator correctly and will not install no matter how hard I turn it.  In contrast the Samsung OEM filter can be removed and reinstalled with ease.  (And no I'm not going to use pliers to try and force this filter on and potentially damage my refrigerator.)

Avoid.
summary: Does not fit my Samsung refrigerator - avoid

reviewText: I know these are "JUST" Burner covers ..but I'll bet I've been through a hundred in my Lifetime..and I've "NEVER" seen anything like these. The picture on Amazon does not do these any justice. WOW..Im excited about Burner Covers. Go figure. Happy Camper. THANKS!!!

I went from a fruit theme to a coffee theme in my kitchen and happened across these. I fell in love ( as much as you can with burner covers). I like that you get four different designs and that the tops have a textured feel to them. They do their job and everyone loves them! I even bought an extra set just in case one gets damaged. Hope you enjoy them as much as I do. :)

Doesn't get any colder than about 50 degrees, which is not safe for food. This is my SECOND one of these. The first one did not cool properly, and Amazon kindly replaced it. Now the second one is the exact same thing: thermostat turned almost all the way down and inside is 50 degrees. This must be a very old or defective batch of refrigerators being sold.

I purchased this when we were going to be without our fridge when our kitchen was being renovated.  It held much more than I expected...maybe because it does not have a freezer.  We didn't need the freezer since we have a free standing one in our basement...so this was perfect for our needs.  We will move it into our basement for extra storage when we are able to use our new fridge. For the price, it had much more space than the little cube fridges out there.

My 11 yr old son got this for his birthday and loved it.  It was easy to use and worked just like it says.  He's creating his own characters and having a great time with it.  He even made some christmas ornaments for the family and loved that he designed and made them himself.
summary: Made an 11 yr old boy very happy

reviewText: According to Whirlpool's website, this is the filter for my fridge.  But it doesn't actually fit, and has a slightly different design. It appears that others have had this problem and that Whirlpool is aware of the problem -- so I'm pretty surprised it hasn't been resolved.
summary: Doesn't fit my older ED2SHAXML10 Whirlpool fridge!

reviewText: YES the filter is expensive and YES it is worth it. This thing will make your water taste better than bottled water, and even if you do replace the thing once every 6 months, it's a reasonable price for keeping who-knows-what out of your water. Everyone has their things they "splurge" on, and I recommend that you add this to your splurge list if you haven't already.
summary: This thing will make your water taste better than bottled water

reviewText: Needed for the replacement filters for my Thermador refrigerator.  Why these product numbers change all the time I do not know.  Confuses people. Since I purchased my Thermador, I think the product has changed 3 or 4 times.  I buy multiple filters now to save some of the hassle.
summary: Needed for the replacement filters for my Thermador refrigerator. ...

reviewText: I bought this as a replacement filter for my Whirlpool side-by-side refrigerator, and I am very pleased. It was easy to install and the water tastes great.  When it comes to my drinking water I don't trust the quality of cheaper off-brand filters and this is the genuine Whirlpool part.
summary: Easy to install and the water tastes great

reviewText: JUST INSTALL THIS FILTER ABOUT 3 DAYS A GO,SEEM TO BE WORKING FINE HAVE HAD NO LEAKS ,THE PRODUCT INSTALL JUST LIKE THE OTHER ONE I HAD IN BEFORE.WATER FLOWS FINE ICE MAKER MAKES ICE  FINE NO HICCUPS YET SEEMS TO BE  A GOOD PRODUCT
summary: SEEM TO BE WORKING FINE HAVE HAD NO LEAKS

reviewText: This filter seems to filter out more of the impurities than most of the others I have used.  We have very hard well water and need a high quality filter and this one definitely does the job.  When it is time to replace it I will order this one again.

This filter is not any good!! When I put this one in I ran 4 gallons of water through it before we tried it & the water tastes like well water.....It smells & tastes awful...I'm glad I decided to just purchase 1 of these filters to try it to see if they are any good...Terrible!!

PRO:

1.  Works like OEM.
2.  Easy install.
3.  Good for one year if you only use the ice maker.

CON:

1.  None

Other:

1.  RUN FIVE LARGE GLASSES OF WATER THROUGH THIS ASAP.
2.  Again, this will last a year, if you only use ice maker.  Just reset the filter notification on your appliance.
summary: What your refrigerator don't know... won't hurt it...

reviewText: Bought this filter and used it in my work refrigerator and the fit is perfect! Same fit as OEM and works like a charm! At a fraction of the cost of the OEM filters, this one is worth a shot! So far so good, and I plan on buying these from this manufacturer in the future!

Refrigerator was making a loud chattering sound when trying to dispense water. New filter wasn't the issue and with a bit of internet searching I found out this piece was the likely cause.  Install video on YouTube helped, and I had it replaced in about 15-20 minutes.  No more noise and water is dispensing again.
summary: Fixed Loud Noise when trying to dispense water

reviewText: Perfect size for my Amanna Refrigerator. When I opened the box they arrived in I thought for sure they were too big and not the right ones. I was wrong. I am completely satisfied with this purchase and will recommend this to anyone who asks.

I made the mistake of buying a "cheaper" brand because I didn't want to spend $50 on this filter. I got what I paid for, the other brand did not do nearly as good of a job as these OEMs do. I ended up spending more money because I was looking to save money. I will never buy anything else than these filters from now on. Yes $50 is a lot comparatively but they absolutely do the job if they can remove the contaminants and horrible taste of our water here in San Antonio. Highly recommend!

It was a repeat of a previous filter but this one was a bit nicer and looked better than the last one which was considerably cheaper, why, I have no idea.  Every time I order one, they are priced higher.  Overall it was satisfactory.
summary: ... but this one was a bit nicer and looked better than the last one which was considerably cheaper

reviewText: Different brand lasted a full year for my normal usage.  This one reduced water pressure in the dispenser within 3-4 months to the point of being impractical to use any more.  Replacing it was such a dramatic increase in water pressure that I nearly dropped the container.
summary: Clogs and drops water pressure significantly faster than other brands

reviewText: This is the worst water filter Ive ever tried. I live in a place with very hard water, so almost anything is an improvement to our tap water. After installing this filter and passing the recommended 4 gallons through it, our tap water tastes better than what comes through this filter. The water has a metallic, stale taste.

I wish I had listened to the poor reviews on EveryDrop water filters. We replaced our old filter with this brand new one and now we cannot drink the water that comes through this filter. It tastes awful! I hope I can return it for a refund because this is a ripoff, and there's no way water that tastes this bad is good for you. Shame on you Whirlpool!

Worthless filter. This was supposed to be a replacement Whirlpool EDR3RXD1 / 4396841 / 4396710 Compatible. The design of the inlet connectors is straight as opposed to slightly bent as in the original filter model EDR3RXD1. Whoever came up with "bright" idea to alter the design of the filter...
summary: Worthless filter. This was supposed to be a replacement ...

reviewText: I've bought about 4 of these filters thus far.  1 filter every 6 months works great.  My water tastes good with or without the filter so I've never had issues with the filter changing the taste of my water.

I had previously used a Best Buy filter refill that supposedly is for my Whirlpool refrigerator.  What a disappointment that was. This refill that is a Whirlpool replacement filter for my refrigerator is perfect. This is the one I'll purchase from now on.
summary: I had previously used a Best Buy filter refill that supposedly is for my Whirlpool ...

reviewText: Fits like a glove. If you go to the EverDrop / Whirlpool website, they show you all the additional pollutants this filter catches versus the original (and still available) Whirlpool refrigerator filter. Yes, it's more expensive than the original filter and has slicker packaging, but the way I see it, it provides a lot more protection for my family and I against the stuff in our municipal water supplies.
summary: Fits Great. More expensive, but better protection

reviewText: Not sure what the deal is here, but this replacement for our former filter that was discontinued is faulty.  It reduced our stream of water to a very small trickle.  It's made all of us dehydrated because it is so difficult to fill a water bottle.  We will not buy this again of course, and I would not recommend.

I have bought many water filters from Amazon for my refrigerator. This last filter, purchased from Amazon in August, 2016 does not filter the water.  The taste is foul and I would return this water filter if I had the packaging and the time to do so.  The cost of the filter, $70 (plus or minus), is high and the filter has not improved the taste of the water. I will replace it with a filter from either Sears or Home Depot. Such a disappointment.
summary: Every Drop Refigerator Water Filter by Whirlpool

reviewText: Works great as a replacement for "Whirlpool 4396841 PUR" which was no longer available. So far I didn't have any trouble with the taste. My initial reaction is the taste is better compared to the PUR. I'll update if anything changes.
summary: Works great as a replacement for "Whirlpool 4396841 PUR" which was ...

reviewText: I used to buy the original water filters made by Whirlpool and shipped from Amazon. But decided to try this filter as a replacement for that original one. This one was so much easier to install than the Whirlpool one.  Will see if it filters water the same. And the price is fantastic - almost half of the original Whirlpool. $60 for a water filter is ridiculously overpriced by Whirlpool.
summary: Works Better than the Original Whirlpool Filters at Half the Cost

reviewText:
Bought  and installed this 2 months ago, hoping for a cheaper alternative to the more expensive one. But this is not worth it. Two weeks ago, the flow started to slow down. It would take about a minute and 15 seconds to fill up a 32 oz container. The taste was affected as well. You could actually hear the dispenser unit strain to get the water to flow properly.

This is not a high quality product and would recommend against buying it.

Our water tastes pretty great to begin with so that's probably why we didn't notice a difference between this new filter and the previous model. I can't say if it helps bad water but I can say it doesn't take anything away from already good water. And I'm very picky with water since it's the only thing I drink other than tea and coffee.

Good product, works well, but the top of the line filters just keep getting more expensive. These filters have to be replaced every six months. The cost of the filters has almost doubled in the past few years. Can't fault the vendor, this was the best price I could find, but geeze! Whirlpool give us a break!!

Top Notch Appliances must have gotten their name from experience.  The filter came a day earlier than promised.  Installed with ease in our Whirlpool side by side.  Water is crystal clear. Will use both the filter and Top Notch again.

I bought this 2 years ago. I use it at least twice a week. It has changed my life for the better so much!! It also has easily paid for itself and saved me so much money. I think it's easier on my clothes, too, with no agitater. I just can't praise this item high enough!!!!
summary: Has paid for itself!!! Changed my life, too!!!!

reviewText: The best purchase I made recently. Works perfectly and gets the job done. I have a spinner from Laundry Alternatives and the two together are great. I live in an apartment and it's hard to carry a basket of clothes to the laundry room on the property.

It stopped working after a few months. The motor still runs, but the upper part won't turn with the motor. The screws that hold the parts in place keep unscrewing/loosening themselves when it's running. Waste of money.

I originally bought this because we cloth diapered our children, and it was a godsend to be able to use it for cloth diapers. The bucket doubled as a diaper pail and I could do multiple loads in a day and hang them up to dry. Now that the little ones are out of diapers, I use it for delicates, sweaters, bras and other items that I don't want to wash in the regular washer.
summary: I originally bought this because we cloth diapered our children ...

reviewText:
I loved this little washer. I lived in a fourth-floor walk-up apartment with no laundry facilities. Having this washer meant that I could wash my work clothes (blouses, skirts, bras, undies) without having to lug everything to the laundromat down the stairs and then back up the stairs (did that for towels, sheets, blankets, of course).

I had this for the four years that I lived in that apartment and it was running fine when I left it with a neighbor in the building.
summary: Lasted for four years with frequent use

reviewText: We live way out in the boonies and don't have a washer hook up or laundromat close by. I was hand washing our clothes for a while but that did not do the job. This little washer is great. It doesn't have a spin cycle and you have to dump out the water from wash to rinse cycles and hand wring the clothes but it washes them great. It doesn't hold a lot but if you use it every day or every other day you can keep up with the laundry easily. I love this little washer!
summary: This little washer is great. It doesn't have a spin cycle and you ...

reviewText: It doesn't get clothes clean. I tried washing tee-shirts in it. They weren't clean. I had to wash them about three times AND since there's no wringer, wring them with my hands to get out the water and soap. It's okay for washing lingerie, though.

It seems that this product doesn't rinse or spin so you're left with watery, soapy, clothing. You need to take the clothing someplace else to rinse them and spin them so they're not covered in water.

I've tried using this machine twice without luck. It now sits in my closet and I'll probably never use it again.

This little washer appliance has proven to dependable and of lasting value-it has washed many loads of pants and shirts without problem-I only wish that it was a little bigger so that I could wash more clothes at the same time-but other than that I give it five stars and a great big thumbs up!!
 I only wish that all of the products that I have bought over the years would have lasted this long and done as good of a job!!
summary: A Great Little Washer that could

reviewText: This is a great little washer.  It cleans better than the commercial washer in a laundromat.  It can wash a pair of jean, or a bath towel at a time.  It saves me time to go to laundromat, and make doing laundry fun!

This little washer is just perfect for our cabin in the mountains.  It is good for washing small loads of clothing such as dish towels, underwear, or shirts.  It doesn't do large loads, but it is perfect for our needs.

It was really easy to install.  Loosen a couple of screws, remove the old seal, insert the new seal and the leak is gone.  It saved a lot of money compared to having someone come to my house to install.  If you have a leaking dishwasher door I would start with this.
summary: Do not wait to get this

reviewText: Unbelievably difficult to find a braided hose for your dishwasher that is longer than 8 ft.  The 8ft one that I had originally purchased was $18 there might have been another 10 ft one for $30.  The other hoses did come with the dishwasher elbow though.  This one comes with the elbow that is pictured, which doesn't work with my dishwasher.  I bought a dishwasher elbow, which was about $6.  Everything is working as it should.

Very nice water supply line for my new dishwasher.  The old dishwasher was connected with a very short piece of copper tubing.  I could not even pull the dishwasher out because the tubing was so short.  I had to disconnect it from the shut off valve before I could get it out far enough to remove the power cord and the discharge line.  This new hose is plenty long enough and appears to be extremely well made.

I usually don't write bubbly reviews, but these filters are clearly outstanding. Replaced the filter in the frig in my RV and the water instantly cleared and tasted fantastic. I shudder to think what was in the water and the ice cubes prior to using the wonderful MORE filter. The filter was easy to install and fit perfectly in my frig. I am looking forward to six months of sparkling, clear, great-tasting water. Thank you MORE.

Easy to install and it works as advertised. When first installed, the dispensed water had "floaties", so I followed the directions and ran a few gallons through it until the "floaties" disappeared. Water tastes and looks great. I replaced a Maytag filter that was at least 28 months old (which is when we moved into this house) and I see an improvement in both water flow and quality.

Installs the same as my previous OEM filters on my Maytag fridge. Seems a tad bit lighter than the previous filters, but the water tastes the same and since I pre-washed out any of the loose carbon in the sink, I didn't have any issues with the dispenser in the fridge. Assuming it lasts as long as the previous ones did (6 months), it's cheaper and I like it.
summary: Fits as well as OEM, seems to work fine.

reviewText: I just purchased this water filter, and it seems to be working fine. It replaced a previous filter brand I had, so I will have the next 6 months to use it. The installation was easy and quick, so no problems there. My first impression is that it is a quality product and will serve my needs well.

I have purchased these filters for the past 3 years for my fridge.  They work very well and are much less expensive than buying them at the store where I purchased the fridge.  Be careful to look because some of them only last for 6 months and some last for a year.
summary: I have purchased these filters for the past 3 years ...

reviewText: This purifier is great and serves its purpose wonderfully. The best part is, you can't find one cheaper that does this great of a job. We bought it to try and fix the water flow on our fridge. The water stream was coming out very slow and was a very small stream. When we replaced our purifier with this one, the water flow was instantly better. The water came out a lot faster and thicker.

Makes ice in a jiffy.  It takes a round or two for the  water to get cold enough to make solid cubes.  The first two rounds of ice cubes are watery so I dump them back into the water reservoir to chill the water further.  After that, this thing just chugs out the ice cubes.  Love it.

This little machine exceeded our expectations. Our cabin is quite a ways from the nearest store and we have a very small freezer in the refrigerator. We made ice for several hours, bagged it and put them in the freezer to use for drinks. So glad we bought it.

The metal clip is very flimsy because of this my dryer door continued to pop open. After having to duct tape the dryer door shut for a week, I decided to buy the factory replacement door latch kit and I must say there is absolutely no comparison. The metal on the factory item is much stiffer and holds it's shape. This product may work in a pinch but do yourself a favor and spend a few extra dollars and buy the factory replacement.

I chose this washer because it seemed like it might be higher quality than the cheaper washers and washer/dryer combos on Amazon. Initially, the washer performed well, for a single use. The second time I used it, there was significant leakage. The third time I used it, the drainage pump was completely non-functional and allowed the water to freely flow out so that the machine couldn't fill enough to start the wash cycle. Luckily, I had saved all the original packaging, so the return was a breeze.
summary: I chose this washer because it seemed like it might be higher quality than the cheaper washers ...

reviewText: The box was undamaged, but the washer inside was not.  The lid, which has a switch so the washer won't work if the lid is open, was broken completely off.  In addition, the whole washer looked scuffed and used.  The whole thing was very flimsy and cheaply put together.
summary: The box was undamaged, but the washer inside was ...

reviewText: This is a very cool little machine! My brother uses it in his man cave and says it is perfect. He likes the medium size ice cubes and can't believe how fast this thing makes ice. If you don't use all of the ice, the water recycles and makes more ice! This machine is better than expected for the money.

I have read many of the reviews of this and similar machines. You can get a clear picture of these machines from doing the same. It produces soft, chewy ice quickly. It's plenty of ice for a family of 3 that loves having ice. My only fear is durability. Read other reviews about that. We've had it for about a month and it's worked as promised.

Bought it the end of May and it worked great until last night - started saying it needed water when it was full. Unplugged it, drained it, refilled, plugged it back in - still says it's out of water.

Will not purchase another.
summary: Bought it the end of May and it worked great until last night - started saying it needed water ...

reviewText: Bought this icemaker for work.  The crew drinks a lot of bottled water and we were buying ice every day because we don't have room for a full fridge with a freezer. We have used this icemaker for 2 weeks now. So easy to use. The first employee into work that morning puts water in and turns it on. Easier than and fewer steps than making a pot of coffee. After running for about 3 hours we have enough ice for the day and we turn it off. Should have bought this years ago.

It turns out that I didn't need this part. My problem is that the drain hose was positioned in a way that allowed water to flow backwards into the dishwasher, causing the machine to throw an error code. I'm keeping this part anyway, in case I ever do need to replace it.

I love the taste of the water with this filter. I live in Venezuela, a place where there is barely any water treatment at all... This filter seems to hold up because the refrigerator keeps asking for a replacement every 7 months...

Sometimes you have to pay a little more for quality.  People rave about the cheaper filters, but when you compare what they actually do and can filter out, they don't come close to being the same quality as this filter.  I have used the other cheaper filters, and the water doesn't taste the same.  I would rather be safe...  Definitely prefer these filters.

I wouldn't give the water that comes out of this filter to my dog if I had one. You would think that a filter would at least take away the chlorine smell, but it couldn't even do that and I ran about 5 gallons of water through it before I even smelled it. Sorry Whirlpool, like your refrigerators, but your filters leave a bad taste in my mouth.

We finally used the water filter and the water is coming out cloudy.  If we remove the filter the water is clear again.  The problem is clearly the filter.  Whirlpool recommends dumping 3 gallons of water to clear the filter out.  We've dumped much more and the problem persists.  It is the filter that is the problem, but too late to return to amazon.

The last filter we bought was one of the cheap ones and it did not last very long and did not work well.  This is well worth the price.  We have had no problems with these filters and I would definitely buy again.  I won't go back to the cheap ones we were buying.  Just not worth it.
summary: Good product - much better performing than the cheap knock offs

reviewText: I was hesitant to purchase this as we used PUR filters for years.  Since the PUR filters are apparently being phased out it seemed like there was no other choice.  Now that this filter has been in for a few weeks I can saw with complete confidence that this is a better product.  The water just tastes cleaner and that's all that matters to me!
summary: Since the PUR filters are apparently being phased out it seemed like there was no other choice

reviewText: Spending nearly $100 a year for refrigerator filters - you have got to be kidding! Shame on Whirlpool for sticking it to their loyal customers. I spent $1500 on a Whirlpool fridge, and this is how they reward me? I will not be held hostage, so I'm in the process of installing a non-Whirlpool inline filter on the supply line.

This is a lousy filter.  Our city water still tastes like city water, which tastes horrible in the first place.  Too bad the PUR product is no longer available. The PUR filter worked well compared to the EveryDrop filter.

I decided to go with the Whirlpool brand filter after reading some negative reviews about aftermarket filters.  I'm glad I did because this filter performs perfectly, has great flow, and doesn't have any weird tastes.  It is a little more expensive than an aftermarket filter, but it's still a good $20 cheaper than buying it at either of the 2 big box chain stores.  Very easy to install, just unscrew the old one and screw in the new one.

This filter fit perfectly in my refrigerator.  I compared the original OEM filter against this one and I thought they were identical.  Also,  the flow rate on this filter is AWESOME.  I'm always willing to spend additional money on a great product when it saves me time.  My water glass is filling much faster now with this new filter.

Its too expensive for what it is but it drastically improved the water flow. We had the exact same one in our new fridge but the water flow has always been too slow to even use. Once I replaced the filter the flow has increased dramatically. We can actually use the water in the door of our fridge now. The water quality is pretty good. No strange smells or tastes. Tastes like...water.

So, just in case others are not paying attention (like me) -- this is an ICE & WATER filter (NOT the big one for the bottom of your side-by-side frig). This is tiny, tiny, tiny. It's for up in your ice maker compartment. I don't have one there -- I have the big one at the bottom for the whole frig. The filter selector said that this model would fit my Whirlpool Side-by-Side -- it doesn't.
summary: This is a tiny ICE & WATER filter for your freezer compartment-- NOT a normal fullsize water filter for your frig (below).

reviewText: Perfect replacement and it's an exact match to what was in the refrigerator when we bought it. Fits great but run a few pitchers of water through it before drinking it. It's cloudy at first but it ends up being fine.

I don't know if this just works with our Whirlpool fridge, but it's a lifesaver in a town where the tap water is as hard as ours. It works well and it usually lasts close to 6 months, though the flow slows down and doesn't do much as a filter if we don't change it in time. I've had no reason to look for any other product, it works just fine on our 3 year-old fridge.

I've bought this a few times to replace in my fridge. Make sure you run a bunch of gallons of water through the filter (per the instructions) before drinking it. Works just right and the water tastes great.

Does what is supposed to do. Before, if I filled a waterbottle with water and finished it then left it there for a few days, I'd smell it and it'd smell like mildew. Now it doesn't do that so its great.
summary: Good, fits and does what it should

reviewText: Previously I bought a discount filter for much less than this EveryDrop, but it wasn't worth it as the charcoal leaked out of the canister and into the filtered water. I had bought a three pack and every one of the filters was defective. I've had no trouble whatsoever with this EveryDrop, and since there's only two of us, I've reset the filter without changing it, a couple of times, and it was still satisfactory.

I switched to these a year or so ago.  I have NEVER liked water nor have I ever drank it unless absolutely necessary.  Since I began using these I have really enjoyed drinking water.  Matter of fact, I drink mostly water now.  Ok I sound like a commercial for these but seriously these take a lot of the yucky metal/mineral (or whatever it is) out and I really do love water now.

These are the worst filters known to humanity.  Used for a few days with no issues and then it begins blocking the water flow.  Take the filter out and water flows through - insert the filter and water is blocked again.  Terrible filter.  Very bad.
summary: These are the worst filters known to humanity

reviewText: These filters seem to work well. When I replace mine, I can see all sorts of yucky stuff that - I guess - we would have drunk if not for the filters. They fit well and appear to be well made. This is my second or third purchase of this item.
summary: These filters seem to work well. When I replace ...

reviewText: Horrible!  Regardless of how many times I've run water and ice through the filter, I cannot get rid of the chemical (chlorine) taste.  This never happened with previous filters.  The "new and improved" one is absolutely awful!!!!!

Good alternative to the more expensive Pur filters. I was concerned with the lower price, however I find the water taste to be equal if not better than the Pur filter. The added bonus is that the water does seem to come out of the dispenser faster than before.

After researching to be sure these filters would fit our humidifier, we purchased in hopes they would last us for a few weeks.  Unfortunately, the material the filters are constructed of is thin, when wet, does not support their weight.  The first one only lasted a couple of days and kept sagging not allowing the humidifier to work properly.
summary: Not constructed well and will sag.

reviewText: I don't think amazon should let these get sold here. I read the reviews, and tried to cancel my order after that... but they told me tough. Got it, decided to give it a shot anyways and it's worthless. Does not work, at all. Don't buy this unless you want to throw your money away like I did.

These are the lowest quality filters I have ever bought for my humidifier. They are so flimsy they won't even stand up in the device.  These are completely useless in my humidifier.  See my photos. I tried to save a couple bucks and Im really disappointed. I guess you get what you pay for. Try at your own risk.

I have been using these stove seals for a few months now. At first I loved them. Then I had to wash them due to spills. So I took them off and washed them. Now they don't stay in place and are constantly popping out.

Gets the job done. Used it to close the gap between my stove and counter. I placed a very hot pan too close to the seal, and part of it (a very small part) burned, but that was my fault. My favorite thing about these is they're easy to clean.
summary: My favorite thing about these is they're easy to clean

reviewText: We discovered after having a new range installed that there was a difference in height between the cabinets on either side of the range.  These gap seals are the perfect solution.  They stay where they are put, they mitigate the obvious difference in height of the cabinets and they eliminate the possibility anything will fall down in the gap.  The fact they look good, are dishwasher safe and are fairly heat resistant are just bonuses.

I cook a lot! There were always a lot of spills and crumbs between my counters and my stove.  This solved the problem completely. They are very easy to put in place and clean. I've recommended it to friends and family.

We had just bought a new stove and was surprised to see how much "stuff" had fallen down the sides of the old stove. Purchased these gap seals to prevent the same mess with the new stove. They fit perfectly between the stove and counter and prevent any "stuff" from falling between the stove and the counter.
Great product that does what it claims.

After having these seals on my stove for a couple of weeks I'm very satisfied with them. They are easy to cut down to the length needed and stay put. Also easy to clean. I researched this item a lot before buying and took the chance with this one and I'm happy I did. I also like the fact that the McClure's show personalized care if there are any problems in the future with these seals. That helps buyers a lot.

These stove gaps are very hard to find, especially the flexible type. I am very happy with my purchase and the delivery time. They should last me for a very long time, if not, I know just where to buy them. They are a little expensive, so maybe you will consider selling them in a two pack(2-white, 2-black for example), or in a three pack(same as a two pack but include the clear) in the future.  You know how women love to decorate!

After only a few uses, the piece in the photo broke, and prevents the washer from working. I believe it is called the "pulsator". We have tried gluing it and tried everything we could think of to fix it, but it is useless.

This compact washing machine is exactly what I was looking for. It does a great job of washing a surprisingly large amount of clothing at one time. 10 T-shirts. That the spinner does not handle the same amount of clothing is the only thing that I wish was different. Being a retired single man, this machine easily takes care of my washing needs. The spin dryer does an excellent job of removing the water from the clothes to the extent that I just hang things on hangers and they are dry within a few hours.
summary: Great dryer that does a great job at a good price

reviewText: I love this machine.  I live in an apartment building and the laundry is in the basement.  I don't always feel comfortable using it at night.  This washer saves me time and energy from having to run down from the 3rd floor to do laundry.  It works extremely well and my clothes always come out very clean.  If I have a "complaint", it's that I wish the hoses were longer.  I have to sit it on two kitchen chairs in order to hook up the hose.  Otherwise, I'm very happy with it.

I couldn't be happier with this ice maker. It makes a ton of ice very quickly. The only issue I had was that my ice smelled like car exhaust when I first hooked it up. However, I noticed on the last page of the manual you're supposed to clean it before you begin using it. After I initiated the cleaning cycle two times the smell went away.
summary: Makes a ton of ice very quickly... I couldn't be happier!

reviewText: Our washer and dryer are quite old, and I noticed that the original lint filter was beginning to wear thin on the edges.  It's nice to have a new, clean filter, it looks good, and does what I need it to.

Fits perfectly on my dryer and very easy to install. My husband was going to put it on but it didn't arrive till after he left so I had to do it, I have never done it before. I watched a video on how to install it and then put it on super easy to do!

I read all of the reviews that said this new and improved version of the filter caused problems, but we didn't come across any of those.  I installed it and flushed a few gallons through first.  The water comes out just as it did before and tastes great.
summary: The water comes out just as it did before and tastes great.

reviewText: I put this in my refrigerator on October 7th. They are supposed to last 6 months.  Today is January 8th.  The water is trickling out of my refrigerator.  I have to pay nearly $200 a year to drink water and make ice.
summary: I put this in my refrigerator on October 7th. ...

reviewText: Installation was fairly straightforward - instructions were pretty clear, but it does take a little bit of fiddling around to get it right.  Much smoother than the low-end plastic parts that came with the dishwasher.
summary: Installation was fairly straightforward - instructions were pretty clear, but it does take a little bit ...

reviewText:
This is a fantastic improvement to the wobbly adjusters originally on our Whirlpool dishwasher. The top rack is much more stable now than it ever was, even when it was new. It would be worth the price and time to swap out the old  adjusters for this, even if they weren't broken.
The instruction sheet is not clear enough for your first installation, and not many people will do this more than once, but it's easy to find a video that makes everything clear and easy.
summary: fantastic improvement to the wobbly adjusters

reviewText: When our Whirlpool dishwasher rack failed we looked to Whirlpool for a replacement part.  Arrived as expected and it only took my husband and I about 15 minutes to change.  I suggest viewing a YouTube video first, because it can be tricky.
summary: When our Whirlpool dishwasher rack failed we looked to Whirlpool ...

reviewText: It doesn't match what I have. The picture in the directions that came with this filter looks exactly like my set up but the filter doesn't fit my existing fittings. The filter I had before came with the required fittings but,in order to use this filter, I will have to buy new fittings. I think the required fittings should have been included with this filter or at least suggested/offered as an additional purchase.

These drip pans fit my older Jenn-Air cook top.  I read reviews that said they were thin.  Yes, they are thinner than the original drip pans.  But they are not too thin.  I was very pleased with them for the price paid.  They can certainly do the job they were made for.

These were cheaply made.  I almost sent them back, but it wouldn't have been worth the postage.  My old drip pans (which I decided to continue to use) have some nice weight to them, but these new ones are almost paper thin.  Won't buy from the seller again.
summary: My old drip pans (which I decided to continue to use) have some nice weight to them

reviewText: I was worried about the taste of the water because this filter was so cheap.  I have to admit I was more than happy with the taste of the water.  It removed all of the metallic taste that had been there.  It also has a higher flow rate than the old filter I had which means less time waiting for the cup to fill.  Great filter.
summary: I have to admit I was more than happy with the taste of the water

reviewText: Tastes exactly like the filter that came with the fridge.  So I'm giving it 5 stars since it costs so much less than the LG one.  That being said, it is not as good as Brita water.  All 4 people in my family agree Brita water tastes better.
summary: As good as the original, not as good as Brita (in taste test)

reviewText: The water was good for the first 5 days or so but after that it didn't taste good at all. Due to the stale, undrinkable taste of our water I"m switching to bottled until a new filter arrives. I will not buy these filters again.

The first filter I ordered had a flaw in the ring (somehow it had gotten crimped), which was causing a leak in my fridge. However, as soon as I had contacted the company about the issue, I had an immediate refund, a response from the owner and a new filter (that works perfectly) on the way. This is seriously the best customer service I have ever had the pleasure of receiving. Thank you! And - the water tastes great and works perfectly in my LG Fridge (1 year old)
summary: Great product - fantastic customer service. Do your business with this company.

reviewText: This filter has leaked ever since I replaced the original equipment (LG braded filter). I've placed a tupperware dish in the top of the refrigerator to catch the water that leaks. The water tastes fine, but has leaked since day one. I've pulled it out a few times and placed it back in to make sure I had installed it correctly, but had no luck.

The filter imparts a taste to the water, unlike the previous LG-brand filter I used. I say this because the filtered water doesn't taste like my unfiltered tap water.  If this filter simply did nothing, "filtered" and unfiltered water should taste the same.  I suppose you do get what you pay for. I'm considering this purchase a loss and going back to a brand name.

I was hesitant to purchase at first, but I read the reviews and made the purchase. I'm glad I did. It works just as well as the LG brand filter. I didn't see any difference in how the water flows out of the dispenser and no leaks. Save yourself some cash and buy this filter.

Full disclosure: I received this item in exchange for my unbiased review.

This filter fit perfectly in my fridge and let me save a little money on a name-brand replacement.  It seems to work just as well as the name brand, as well. I don't notice any odors or foul smells coming from my fridge, even after I found that some of my leftovers had spoiled. Definitely a great product!
summary: I don't notice any odors or foul smells coming from my fridge

reviewText: After one week of using this filter our water tastes yucky, like no filtering is going on and it's coming right out of the tap.  We have old pipes so filtering is necessary.  Very disappointed, waste of money.  I guess you get what you pay for when it comes to these filters.
summary: After one week water tastes yucky!

reviewText: Easy to install, good fit, no leaks, good water flow, reasonable price. As I don't live in Flint, Michigan I'm not too worried about what it does and does not filter.  Personally I think replacing every 6 months is baloney, I do it once a year.

This 2 pack is half the cost of a single filter at Lowes or Home Depot. Filters work great and water quality is excellent. I have purchased this 2 pack twice already and will continue to purchase them in the future.

We have had this filter in our refrigerator for over a week now and have had no problems with it. The water flow rate is fine and the water taste the same as it did with the $50 filters we have used in the past. You cannot beat the price. We only ordered one just to see if it would be compatible with our refrigerator and since it is working like it should, we will be ordering more.
summary: Works as good as the $50 filters

reviewText:
This is a perfect fit for our Whirlpool-made Kenmore fridge.  We've had it installed for about a month now.  In that time we've seen:
- No leaking
- No bad taste
- No worries.  And of course it's a small fraction of what you'd pay at one of the big-box stores.

I received this filter a couple of days ago and wanted to test it before reviewing. I have to say it has worked great and I have been using it for water and the ice maker. It fit perfectly and the water tastes great and has no hint of chlorine or other impurities. I would recommend buying this filter.

My husband and I just bought our first home and are slowly making our way through different things.  I made it to the water filter on our fridge, and realized it must have been eons since it was replaced.  I ordered this one, hoping it would work (since I have no clue what I'm doing really...).  It fit perfectly, was easy to follow the directions, and now we have water that we actually like to drink.  It has made a huge difference in our water quality, wish I had found it sooner!
summary: was easy to follow the directions

reviewText: The last time I bought this water filter, I think at Lowe's, I paid about $40.  This filter seems to be the exact same thing, and the flow rate and taste of the water is great.  I'll be back to buy another in 6 months.  Thanks!
summary: and the flow rate and taste of the water is great. I'll be back to buy another in 6 ...

reviewText: Someone posted that the water was so much better with this filter.  I don't drink water very often so didn't seem to matter to me but my husband said it was good.  Yesterday I decided to drink more water and got some from the fridge and was so surprised with the water.  I will never be a water drinker but this filter does really help with the taste. Will get these filters again.
summary: Someone posted that the water was so much better with this filter

reviewText: We purchased three of these, and several days ago put in the first of the three.  The water tastes good sometimes, and other times it tastes like our tap water, which is really bad.  Some of the ice is bad too, and I keep dumping out the ice to start over, but it's the same.  We just ordered a different brand and will probably have to throw these away.  Won't order this brand again.  Waste of money, at least for us.  We haven't had this happen with replacement filters before.
summary: The water tastes good sometimes, and other times it tastes like our ...

reviewText: I bought these and they are knocked off's. The water taste medicinal. Do not buy. Purchase the brand-name filters that go with your refrigerator. There is a reason why the cost of these filters are so much less than the original replacements.  These went into the garbage can and I purchased the brand-name filters that go with my refrigerator.
summary: Water tastes medicinal with these filters.

reviewText: It arrived quickly. It works well by taking the chlorine and other bad tastes out of the water. I chose this one over others because it does not filter out all the minerals, etc. and lets the water flow much more quickly.
summary: It works well by taking the chlorine and other bad tastes out of the water

reviewText: We purchased these because it was supposed to be the exact same filter as the ones we've bought from Sears and significantly cheaper.  When we put it in, we had a constant dripping from our water dispenser.  When we removed it, water ran all over the inside the refrigerator.  After cleaning up the water, we put the old filter back in and the drip stopped immediately and no water leaked.  We need to know how to get a refund for the one we used and will send the unopened one back.
summary: Do not buy this as a substitute for the Kenmore 46-9990!

reviewText: This product did not work.  After installing, the water taste was not good.  Still had a very strong chlorine taste and smell.  The old filter was better than this one.  I went to the store and paid twice as much but the water tastes good and problem solved.  I will not be purchasing this product again.
summary: Product did not filter out the chlorine taste

reviewText: The water coming through this filter was tinted black. It took about three gallons of water flushed through the filter for it to become more clear.  However, the water looked cloudy so I put my old filter back in.  This one is going back.

This filter arrived quickly and fit perfectly.  There is no leaking and the water tastes great.  So far, so good!  At this point, I see no reason why this won't be the filter I order every single time.  Thanks for making a quality product at a great price!
summary: Works perfect on my LG fridge

reviewText: What can I say other than this is a "plug and play" OEM replacement for our current refrigerator filter and it does a good job in filtering the water we get from the refrigerator dispenser.  We buy a replacement every year.
summary: ... for our current refrigerator filter and it does a good job in filtering the water we get from the ...

reviewText: This filter replaced the OEM LG filter that was fine but was getting old. Figured I'd try out a generic. Bad idea on my part - water immediately tasted  strongly of sulfur and no amount of flushing the filter out would get rid of it. Replaced this with a new (and more expensive) OEM LG filter purchased from my local blue colored hardware store and the water tasted fine again.

After buying the filters from LG for several years, I decided to try a different brand.  From what I can tell, there's no difference between these and the name brand, other than the price. Mine fit perfectly, and didn't leak.  The water tastes just as good as with the name brand too.
summary: Just like the name brand, just less expensive.

reviewText:
I purchased these filters because they were advertised as an exact replacement for the more expensive LG filter.
They are not. The first filter we tried leaked a large amount of water into the fridge. The second leaked as well, despencing gray water. We didn't try the third. This was a total waste of money. The nozzle of the filter is shorter than the LG and does not fit as tight. I will purchase an LG filter.

I ordered this for my LG fridge.  I figured I would give it a try since it was 1/3 of the price of the LG.  It was easy to replace and I've had no issues.  Filtered water tasted great and I see no difference from using the LG.

This is the second or third filter I have ordered from Refresh.  They are compatible with the Kenmore filters, which cost an arm and a leg, and work equally as well.  I am quite satisfied with this product and will be re-ordering as long as I have my Kenmore refrigerator.  Product came in a timely manner, and was boxed in a secure way.

I received this product at a discounted price for my honest review - I have tried many filters for my Kenmore Elite fridge and this product provided the perfect fit for my filtered water.  I was worried it wouldn't fit but it was exactly right.  Filtered water tastes so much better coming from the dispenser in the fridge!  I would recommend this product to anyone that has a Kenmore Elite fridge.

Perfect fit for our fridge and it appears to be doing good enough a job to normalize the water flavor. It's definitely not as good as a Britta filter, of course, since it is pushing a lot of water through it in a short amount of time, but it beats drinking tap water directly from the faucet.
summary: Good and cheap alternative to OEM part

reviewText:
I bought this as a cheaper alternative to the factory filter and am happy so far.  The installation was the same as the factory filter and was quick and easy.  The only thing I have yet to determine is the filter's longevity compared to the factory filter; so long as it's comparable, I'll maintain this is a 5-star product.

UPDATE: These filters last approximately the same length of time as the factory filter, making it well worth the purchase at the lower cost.
summary: Great alternative to factory filter for much less

reviewText: I was concerned about buying this filter because it was about 80% less expensive than the Kenmore name brand filter. I installed it yesterday and after flushing out about 2 gallons of water as recommended, the water came out clear and tasted good. I had no problem with leakage and I will definitely use this filter from now on.
summary: I installed it yesterday and after flushing out about 2 gallons of water as recommended, the water came out clear and tasted goo

reviewText: So far, so good.  They arrived quickly!  In just a few days, I had my new filters.  The replacement went without a hitch, just like with the GE brand filter, which costs more than twice as much.  It remains to be seen how long this filter will last.  Hopefully, up to 6 months or more.
summary: Pay half price for generic water filters!

reviewText: Very good quality water filter. I have purchased much more expensive filters in the past. I was really impressed by the quality of this filter. The water was fresh and the filter appears to be lasting just as long as the other filters we have used in the past. I received this in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

THIS IS AN EXCELLENT REPLACEMENT FOR THE NAME BRAND, AT A CHEAPER PRICE.  THE SAME QUALITY AS THE GE BRAND THAT CAME WITH MY REFRIGERATOR.  VERY PLEASED AND WILL PURCHASE AGAIN.  I RECEIVED A FREE OR REDUCED PRICE IN EXCHANGE FOR AN HONEST REVIEW.

You can't beat this filter for the money. After running a few gallons of water through it, it works perfectly. I was mostly looking to eliminate the chlorine taste and smell and it does a great job of that. I detect no other scents or metallic tastes of any kind. Produces water that is really close to bottled water. I like it and you can't beat the price.
summary: I was mostly looking to eliminate the chlorine taste and smell and it does a great job of that

reviewText: I put this in my fridge and it worked for a couple days, then water just stopped flowing.  When I went to remove the filter to check it out, after turning it once, there was so much back-pressure that it shot off and made a huge mess. Even after re-attaching the filter, it never worked again. Buyer beware on this one.
summary: I put this in my fridge and it worked for ...

reviewText: I purchased this filter to replace the water filter in my GE fridge. I received it in less than a week and it fit perfectly with no problems. As far as I can tell it is just like the OEM filter but much less expensive than the ridiculously overpriced GE MWF filters. I will be ordering this replacement filter from now on.

We are very disappointed with this filter. The water tastes very medicinal. I took the filter out and the water tastes the same.  It is almost like the filter is not filtering anything.  We will go back to the original GE filters; they cost more but it is worth the extra cost to have good tasting water.

I don't know what happened but the filter quickly turned rust color (as you can see in the photo) and was turning our drinking water yellow/orange.  It also made our water taste quite disgusting as you can imagine.  Ordered a genuine Frigidaire filter in a hurry and now all is better.  I would not recommend buying one of these off-brand filters.  Yikes!

After reading all the reviews, I was still skeptical that this filter could be this good for the price. Well guess what? It's every bit as good as the reviews say it is and at a fraction of the price you would pay at those large stores.
