As instructed, you need to run about a gallon of water through it at first till it runs clear but this filter seems superior to what I've been purchasing in the past. My next purchase will be for the two pack.

This filter is the only one that fits my fridge. Before we put the filter in, our ice was tasting funny and the water was just okay. After putting in this filter, our ice is clear and doesn't have a taste or smell and the water tastes really good. We never drink from the tap anymore. We love the water and ice now.

I bought this filter to replace a Frigidaire brand filter in my refrigerator and the water tastes much better! Be sure to follow directions and run about a gallon through it after you have put in the new filter and you are good to go!
summary: ... filter in my refrigerator and the water tastes much better! Be sure to follow directions and run about ...

reviewText: Very pleased with the product and the price.  We were purchasing these filters for quite a higher price, and it was the only appliance parts store where we could purchase them--but now I've found your website and will gladly purchase them from you in the future

Put this in your refrigerator and enjoy clean, filtered water without that "chlorine" taste you get from tap water. Far cheaper than bottled water! So far as I can tell, the taste is just as good at a much lower cost. Depending upon usage, these will go up to about six months between changes. The same water is used for making ice cubes so you get the same good taste if you drink "ice water" as I do.
summary: These work great! And save a lot of money over bottled water.

reviewText:
I could not be more pleased with this filter.  It came on time, was wrapped well to protect from contaminants, was easy to install, and after we ran about 2 gallons of water through it (it did not take as much water as the manufacturers suggested), we have sparkling clean water that tastes great.  I will definitely be a repeat customer, especially at this price.  Highly recommend!

Update:  Still very pleased after one year of using this brand of filters!
summary: This Is The Filter You Want To Purchase!

reviewText: I bought this brand at the end of 2016, so I've been using these bags well over a year now. The bags I had been purchasing were no longer available. I decided to give this brand a try, and I'm so glad I did. They fit my Kenmore compactor perfectly, and I've never had any issues with tearing or leaking. I'm placing another order today. They're great!
summary: Great fit with no leaking or tearing

reviewText: Expensive but worth the extra to have a clean, neat bag in the compactor. The plastic bags never fit properly and you always run the risk of tearing when you pull a weeks worth of garbage out of the compactor bin.
summary: The plastic bags never fit properly and you always run the risk of tearing when you pull a weeks worth of garbage out of the compactor bin

reviewText: Used to buy these at my local Sears outlet store. They closed the store so it was a 45 minute drive to the next closest store. These bags are every bit as good as the ones from Sears and they are less expensive.

These knobs were originally purchased for my gas range but they didn't fit. It seems they are for an electric range. I couldn't use them but gave them to my brother for his stove and they fit perfectly. He's very happy.

Worked like a charm - hopefully, this will keep my old washer going a while longer.  As near as I can tell, this is an updated version of the switch that came on the washer originally, but it fit exactly where the old one did, including all the electrical connections.  Installation was a snap.

This is an inexpensive way to save hundreds of dollars.  Don't pay attention to the other reviews saying it doesn't fit - that isn't the seller's fault, it's the buyer's fault for ordering the wrong parts. If you actually pay attention and make sure you order the correct parts, you won't have a problem.

This was a complete replacement set for the rear rollers on my dryer and everything fit properly.  Plus, it was delivered quickly and I was able to look up how to install it on the internet.  Five stars.

I have used this dishwasher every couple of days for a year without any problems. Surprisingly, it fit into my small kitchen perfectly and the dishes always come out clean. I pre-rinse everything. Not sure how well it works for dishes with caked-on food. The only issue I had was the glassware being a bit cloudy when using dishwasher gel. I switched to the all-in-one tablets and that made a real difference. Would buy again.

Induction is the way to go for cooktops.  Fast, efficient and so easy to clean up.  Spills do not burn or stick onto the surface.  I installed this cooktop on the end of my island, rather than in the middle, and the best part of the placement is that two people can cook on it at  the same time without getting in each other's way.

We love this filter! The glass carafe is so cute! We have hard water and although it doesn't have a very strong taste it is still unpleasant to drink straight out of the tap. With this filter it tastes just like bottled water without the cost. I also like that they're made out of corn so they will biodegrade.

I picked this item because it was the best price for what I was looking for.  I am very impressed with the quality of the item.  Some silicone products feel flimsy or too stretchy and I worry they will rip/tear quickly.  This product is durable and sturdy.  Also, it is odorless, which is essential to a product that will be used with food.  The item withstood heat in the oven and cold in the fridge.  I am pleased and will be buying one as a stocking stuffer for my mom.

This lid is even sturdier than I expected it to be, and it arrived quickly.  There are no flaws that I can see, and it's just the right size and shape to cover my longer baking dishes.  No more hunting for glass lids at the thrift store and then trying to find a safe way to store them.  This one will fit all my casseroles and hang on the fridge door when I'm done with it.  Thanks for a good product!

I love it!  It fits in the corner nicely and it seems very durable.  The utensils are not falling through like the one that came with my dishwasher.  Why do they make them like that?!  The plus on this one was the price was great!

IT IS ABSOLUTELY RIDICULOUS THAT YOU AREN'T ABLE TO PURCHASE THE ICE TRAY SEPARATELY LIKE ALL THE OTHER BRANDS. MY ICE TRAY CRACKED, JUST THE 98% OF THE REST OF THE REVIEWERS. IT IS A $2.00 ITEM. I WILL NEVER, EVER BUY A FRIGIDAIRE PRODUCT AGAIN AS LONG AS I LIVE. MY FRIDGE IS 2 YEARS OLD, AS WELL. THEY SUCK.

Not sure why all dishwashers don't come with a pan like this. If the dishwasher develops a leak you won't know until too late. With this pan water will come out onto the floor in front on the machine ... and you will know immediately that you have a problem. Really good insurance.
summary: All dishwashers should come with this.

reviewText: Purchased this gasket for my Whirlpool dishwasher which was leaking from the door. It was supposed to be compatible, but the machine leaked even worse after installing it. The appliance repair person who fixed the dishwasher said this gasket was too thin. He replaced it with a genuine Whirlpool gasket and the dishwasher works great. This was a waste of our money.

What a godsend.
I've had this for almost a year, and it's been life-changing.

I loathe the idea of going back to hauling my laundry to a laundromat like a penniless grad student, but there's no laundry in my new apt.

I've had 0 problems with it (knock on wood!) although I did buy the extended warranty just in case.

I love my washing machine!!  In the beginning I had some issues because I wasn't used to having my own washing machine.  I made some mistakes, such as overcrowding the machine, turning the water on before I press start, etc.  Now I know how to operate it and I absolutely LOVE it!  My only regret is that I've lived in my apartment ten years now and I should have bought this machine years ago!

Amazon's subscribe and save service for this product is second to none.  It reminds me that I need to replace my filter in my fridge and it costs much less than buying the filter at the local home improvement store.

The filter works well and is easy to insert into the fridge, giving out pure clean water.  I recommend using this product (or others like it) for better tasting and better quality water straight from your fridge door.
summary: The filter works well and is easy to insert into the fridge

reviewText:
These filters are terrible!! Some clog after a few days of use. The last one lasted about 6 weeks and is now clogged.
When this happens the flow of water that they allow is so thin that it takes forever to fill a glass. In the past I used the regular filters from Whirlpool without any problem.  I just ordered one of the old ones to replace "every drop".
summary: These filters are terrible!! Some clog after a few days of ...

reviewText: It's a water filter. I have no comprehension as to why these are so expensive, other than the fact that "they can be". But it works! New packaging compared to the past...maybe thats why they charge so much for them.
summary: It's a water filter. I have no comprehension as ...

reviewText: Less than half the cost of the original manufacturer's filter, although it supposedly doesn't last as long (Frigidaire recommends changing their filter every 9 months, the knockoff's instructions recommend changing it after 6 months).  I didn't notice any leakage or insertion difficulty, and the water is indistinguishable from the Frigidaire version.

I use this to do most of my laundry.  Once you get the hang of it it works very well.  Saves me hundreds from going to the laundromat.  Kinda wish it was metal so it would last longer but I haven't actually broke one yet.  I bought one for standby just in case though.

Arrived with pieces missing, no instructions. Too still to even plunge up and down. Very little motivation. I didn't want to deal with them, so I just threw it away. I use a shag rug "rake" to agitate in a plastic tub in the bathtub. Works great. Save your money.
summary: Horrible experience. Felt violated and ripped off

reviewText: I absolutely love this washer.  I live in an apartment building and even though they have new washers/dryers, I don't like using other peoples washers...I'm a little fussy.  I attached a broom handle to mine so I wouldn't have to bend over (I'm a little older), and I use a 5 gallon bucket set in the tub.  If I have bigger items like sheets or a blanket, I can wash them right in the tub.  Don't hesitate, you won't be disappointed!

This monitor set has brought such peace of mind to my family! We have always worried when away from the house because we live in the south, where it gets very hot, and we have three ferrets who would not be able to survive for long if the air conditioner failed. Now we're able to check via the app on my phone to make sure the temperature stays within the safe range. What a huge relief!
summary: Works well, love the app, and finally peace of mind!

reviewText: I purchased two of these three sensor units. One unit is for my home while I'm away in Florida for Jan, Feb & March. The other is for my motor home. We have 3 dogs traveling with us and want to make sure the air conditioning or heat doesn't go over or under preset limits when we go out for a few hours.  The units send me a text message if anything goes outside my preset limits. Great peace of mind!

I bought this as a gift for my dad - he loves it! He uses the temperature gauges for monitoring the house: one temperature sensor in the garage to make sure the boat doesn't get too cold before he winterizes it. One temperature sensor goes in the basement to make sure the pipes don't freeze. And one goes in the dog kennel outside. I like his setup so much, I'm going to buy one for myself, next!

Don't waste your money at Lowes or Home Depot. This is the exact same water filter that came in my LG frig I purchased 6 months ago only at almost half the price. I changed the filter without telling my family and no one noticed any difference in the quality of the water or ice.

We have discontinued our purchase of bottled water since we began using this water filter.  Of course this is coupled with our purchase of an LG refrigerator.  We are completely satisfied with the water that we drink from our refrigerator.
summary: We are completely satisfied with the water that we drink from our refrigerator

reviewText: I gave them 5 stars simply because they are so much less expensive then the ones offered by Keurig. As far as determining if they work better than the Keurig filters is impossible for me to determine since I can't tell if the Keurig filters I have used were doing anything.
summary: The price is better that Keurig.

reviewText: When we suddenly had smoke from our bathroom heater/vent, we knew there was a problem. A quick look and we could see what the problem was. We found this part, replaced it, and so far so good. It;s been a few months at this point and it's doing well.
summary: and so far so good. It

reviewText:
I have spilled so much crap between my stove and cabinet, and I hate pulling out the stove to clean it, so I rarely do it. I am so excited for this product because I am anticipating that the amount of crusted crap is going to be reduced tremendously. It's going to be so fast to clean now!!!

Due to the obvious and hilarious grammatical errors on the box, this product is made in China. However, I have never seen this product anywhere else, so I don't mind.
summary: I wish these were invented long ago.

reviewText: So far so good. These fit perfectly in between my granite countertops and glass flat top stove. They are easy to clean and don't burn. They also don't move or shift while you're cooking. I never knew something like this existed but I'm glad it does.
summary: So far so good. These fit perfectly in between my granite countertops ...

reviewText: Works great between the stove and my prep table.  One side is wider and the other is slimmer.  I wish the wide side was a tad slimmer and the slim side was a tad wider but, I  still am thankful for the gap being covered.

I bought this product to replace a previous gap cover in my upstairs apartment.  My tenant had melted and broken the previous one which was made of hard plastic, and this new set is just fabulous.  It looks good, it fits perfectly, and compared to the other one, it appears that it will be a lot more indestructible.  Of course, I just put it in a few days ago, and my new tenant just moved in and hasn't had a chance to test it much, so I don't know how it will behave long-term, but so far, so good.
summary: It looks good, it fits perfectly

reviewText: I'm really pleased with this product because it saves me time cleaning up messes that are hard to reach in between the counter and stove! I only wish I had found this a long time ago! Great seller as well!

This product solves an annoying problem of debris (crumbs, flour, etc.) falling down the cracks between the stove and counter, which can create an unsanitary mess between adjoining cabinets and the stove.  Sturdy and easy to clean.
summary: no more pulling out the stove for spring cleaning

reviewText: I had been looking for clear stove gap covers in the local stores for a few years, but all I could ever find were white or black. These Kohzie clear stove gap covers are exactly what I had in mind. They are the right color, and are wide enough and long enough to do the trick.
summary: I had been looking for clear stove gap covers in ...

reviewText: Bought two sets of these for two stoves..and LOVE THEM BOTH!  They are easy to install, clean, and do the job they're supposed to do.  I would highly recommend these to anyone who is tired of food and liquids falling between the stove and countertop.  They have a wide edge to cover a pretty big gap.  I purchased both a clear set and a black set.  You can't go wrong with these!

Product fits close to perfect in between our counter and stove top. Though it is wider than I imagined, it still gets the job done. We cook a lot of bacon in our house and with that comes a lot of splatter. We no longer have to worry about grease slowly making its way down in between the stove and the counter.  Plus, if they get too grimy to wipe in place, you can simply pick them up and wash them in the sink.
summary: NO MORE GREASY SIDES OF STOVE!

reviewText: I just opened the package yesterday as my new stove was just delivered to my house.  I have not yet "put them to use" as I haven't used my stove yet, but I have put them in their proper place.  They fit perfectly, they look like nice, and I believe they will get the intended job done.  When they pulled out my old stove I was shocked at all the food that had fallen between the space of stove top and countertop.  It was a pretty nasty sight.  I hope I don't ever have that problem again.

Both of these were defective. Water leaked out in streams (not drips). Unfortunately the door was shut while I was dispensing water so I didn't realize it until I noticed that the water pressure on dispenser seemed way too low.  I have been changing filters on my refrigerator for at least 5 years and never had this problem,  so I do know how to install the filters.
Luckily, I still had my old Water Drop filter so I replaced it until a new one is delivered.
summary: Both of these were defective. Water leaked out in ...

reviewText: As far as I can tell these are the same as the manufacturer's recommended filters. They filter just as well, and last just as long. The best part is they only cost about half as much. I have ordered these before so I have used them for a good while now.
summary: Same as original for half the cost.

reviewText: So far it works fine.  My fridge is 10 years old so it was hard to get in at first as I don't think the woman that had it before me had ever put a filter in her fridge but other than that I have had no problems with it.  My fridge only has an icemaker and not a water spigot, so we don't go through filters that fast.
summary: So far it works fine. My fridge is 10 years old so it ...

reviewText: These are not NSF/ANSI 53 certified as stated in the product details.  People need to educate themselves on the NSF/ANSI certifications, there are major differences between NSF 42 and NSF 53.  A quick google will tell you all you need to know.  Google NSF 42 vs NSF 53 and you will see what I mean.

I admit, I held my breath when I ordered these.  I have been purchasing the OEM, but I thought I would give these a try.  I was lured in by the price difference.  They work great!  I just installed my second one.  I had no issues with the first and it lasted just as long as the OEM.  I was skeptical, but I plan on reordering after I use all three.

They work well.  Our garage refrigerator would occasionally "lock up" due to the extreme heat.  This device has notified us of a lock-up multiple times allowing us to restart the refrigerator in a timely manner.
summary: They work well. Our garage refrigerator would occasionally "lock ...

reviewText: I'm enjoying this new type of stovetop. It's taking a bit of getting used to but I love how fast it heats up and the fact that you can lock the burners OFF. I have a cat and was worried that she might get on the stovetop and turn it on. I can absolutely keep that from happening by locking the burners off! Great feature!

I have 2 of these (in different places) and use them daily.  I find that washing 4-5 towels at a time works best.  I've also found that powder detergent works best, but that's just me.  I've been using mine several times a day for several months and they still work great!
summary: I find that washing 4-5 towels at a time works best. I've also found that powder detergent works best

reviewText: Was easy to replace and fit perfectly.  It took longer to pull the dryer from the wall and sweep up the dust balls than it did to replace the timer.  The new timer fit perfectly and has been working exactly as it is supposed to.

Our oven had started to take a long time to heat up, and wouldn't get hotter than about 325. After doing a little research on the web and watching the flames, it became obvious that our igniters were worn out (they still 'worked', but not within specs).

These replacements were much cheaper than the genuine Viking parts, but the fit was perfect (including the wire lengths, connectors, and mounting holes). Installing them took about 30 minutes using basic tools, and now our oven is working great again!

Only works intermittently. I have only had this for a few weeks and it doesn't work properly. It occassionally stops putting water out, so I have to take it out and reinstall it, sometimes several times, before it starts letting water through again.

I like these filters better than the OEM filters.  The flow rate is better, the water tastes better and I think they do a much better job of filtering.  With OEM filters, the water in my pets' dish used to develop a green slime after a day.  This doesn't happen with this filter.  I have to wonder what I have been drinking all those years with the OEM filter.

Contrary to some other reviews, I found these filters to be of high quality and they fit my humidifier perfectly.  Yes, they are after market, but they seem to be of better quality than the one that came with our unit.  The price was great.  I will continue to buy these replacement filters when I need more.

I think these filters are much more durable than the original filters that came with my humidifier. They are a little thicker so it is a tight fit but I don't mind that at all. These are excellent and I will purchase them again.

I got these for a very good price and they fit my humidifier well. I was so relieved when I was able to find them on Amazon because these specific filters weren't in stores and they were a lot more expensive on the company website.

I PURCHASE FILTERS REGULARLY FOR MY TWO YEAR OLD'S HUMIDIFIER, AND LIKE EVERYBODY I LIKE TO SAVE A FEW DOLLARS WHEN POSSIBLE. SO FOR THE FIRST TIME I BOUGHT THESE GENERIC FILTERS AND THEY ARE JUST LITERALLY GARBAGE. THE FILTER LASTED A COUPLE NIGHTS, DID NOT HOLD IT'S SHAPE AND HAD TO BE DISCARDED. USE A WET PAPER TOWEL IT MIGHT LAST LONGER!!!! BUYING THIS PRODUCT IS JUST THROWING YOUR MONEY AWAY!
summary: total garbage, the ultimate in low quality!!!!

reviewText: I got this for the Whirlpool Gold fridge in my new house, which was missing a filter. I have no previous experience with this type of refrigerator or filter, but it seems to be working well. It was cheaper than the brand name replacement, fit perfectly, and well-reviewed, which is why I bought it.

I have been using this in place of a GE filter for almost six months now.  I have ordered a second one as it is almost time for the light to come on again.  The filter has performed well and I have had no issues with it.  As far as I can tell it filters just as well as the GE one at a much lower price.
summary: Works as well as the GE filter at a lower price

reviewText: Felt dizzy and sick to my stomach after drinking water from this filter. Installed it three days ago, followed all instructions (not that there are many), and had the same result every time. I almost solely drink water from home, so it's easy to determine what the cause is. Have requested a refund.
summary: Felt sick after drinking from this filter.

reviewText: I recently replaced the water filter in my GE refrigerator with this product. I was pleasantly surprised at the price, and the quality of the filtered water is excellent. It tastes great! I highly recommend this product!
summary: and the quality of the filtered water is excellent. It tastes great

reviewText: Filter arrived early and was very easy to install.  I am replacing a pure line filter that I used last time which has worked extremely well and much cheaper than OEM. I do not plan on using any other type of filter again.

Did not come in a box and smelled like mold. What the hell, these are for use in humidifiers and having them full of bacteria is dangerous, so I didn't use them because of the smell and lack of sealed packaging.
summary: waste of money, find a more reputable place to order

reviewText: These filters aren't available in stores in my area, so I'm happy to find them on amazon. They fit my Sears humidifier that is several years old. Every year I expect to find that these filters have been discontinued which would render my humidifier useless. That's why I'm extremely glad to find them.

Ordered the duckbill grommet, W10309238, received the drain tube extension: W10619951.  I have that part, wanted the duckbill as a backup in case the drain tube doesn't fit.  In any event, whether or not the W10619951 is the best solution, the vendor has engaged in a bait-and-switch.  I paid for something other than what I ordered.
summary: If You Want the Duckbill, Don't Buy This

reviewText:
I highly recommend that if you're going to go through the hassle of replacing this piece on your refrigerator, that you replace it with the W10619951 Whirlpool Extension-Drain Factory Replacement for Gromet W10309238, otherwise you're going to replacing it again in another few years.

Sold on Amazon at http://www.amazon.com/W10619951-Whirlpool-Extension-Drain-Replacement-W10309238/dp/B00GWN92N0

We bought a new grommet as we were having some leakage. After reading up as to how to repair the problem, we removed the old grommet; cleaned it out and returned it and everything works fine.  So the product does its job; we didn't need to buy a replacement and now just have the new grommet as a backup.

The wicks were received in a surprisingly short amount of time.  I've used them for about a month, and keeping my humidifier on a quieter low setting appears to evaporate as much water as compared to a noisier medium setting with other wicks I've used.  I'll grant that this is not a technical test, but both the company's service and product appear to be excellent.

This is exactly what I needed. My washing machine was giving me an error code so I looked it up and it said that I had a bad Thermistor. I was a little freaked out about the idea of doing work on my $800 washing machine, but this was the easiest thing I've ever done. Once you remove the back panel from the washer, the Thermistor is held in by only 2 screws. After you remove those screws you can pop the old one out and put the new one in and you're done! The whole thing took me about 5 minutes.

I purchased this to replace a filter that came with the refrigerator. It's been in for a month now and we've not noticed any difference than the original filter. I will purchase this again when we need a new filter!

Very pleased that I ordered the IcePure Water filter three pack. It is an outstanding value, a perfect fit, easy to install and they last as long as the original Samsung filter (6 months each).  I plan to purchase these again when my three pack runs out. Can't tell the difference between the IcePure filter and the original Samsung filter, other than Samsung's higher price.  I highly recommend this product.
summary: IcePure Waterfilter - Quality Product at a lower price

reviewText: I can't believe the water has such a bad taste. I used a lot of other off-brands before, but the taste of water using this filter is the worst by far. I thought the first filter was defective so I used a second one. Same bad taste with the second one.

Thank you so much for helping us with these filters. They are exactly what we need for our use. We use more than most people do, so we look for good bargains and these filters are just that.  We feel we get our money's worth from these excellent filters. Our ice and water have no odor at all and is clean and pure.

Was excited for this product, and it looks lovely.  That excitement went away quickly when one of the burners went out and then a second and then a third.  The manufacturer is not very good at honoring their warranty and well now I have a stove that I'm unable to return and struggling to get fixed.  The company sent me the parts to fix it...I'm not someone who can fix stoves much less gas stoves.  To date the issue STILL has not been resolved.

Same as the Whirlpool brand at a fraction of the price, no wonder Whirlpool is trying to take legal action against the knockoff manufactures.  Consumers should bring a class action suit against Whirlpool for overcharging us for years.

We have been running this filter for about 2 or 3 months now and it seems to be pretty great. It may be declining a bit faster in quality than a more expensive filter as time goes on, or it could just be in my head. Still tastes just fine though, not that I feel I'm that picky.

I have been paying around $45 at Sears for a filter that fits my Kenmore Refrigerator.  Way too much for what it does.  I decided to try this.  It fit perfectly.  The only thing I cannot know for sure is what is on the inside. The water is clear and the taste is good so I will order it again when needed.

Filter ordered did not fit our appliance, but OnePurify did a great job responding to our need and made the return process very easy.
Gave OnePurify 5 stars for excellent customer service, even though the filter did not fit.
summary: Filter did not fit, but no issue with returning product...great CS service by OnePurify

reviewText: This is the second time I have ordered these filters.  I like them because they do a good job. What more can be said about a product except that it fulfills its purpose in an excellent way at a very reasonable cost.

Piece of crap. Didn't work more than 2 days before the ice shovel got stuck in the forward position and wouldn't allow the ice-making cycle to continue. Where is the quality control on this product? It looks nice, all shiny and well rounded, but like many human beings, ultimately dysfunctional. They damn well better give me my money back or allow me to exchange it for another brand or I'm going to raise hell.
summary: Piece of crap. Didn't work more than 2 days before the ...

reviewText: This one replaces my older one in red. It has large capacity. It's easy to clean. The stainless steel makes it look very appealing. I love it and will buy it again and again. I hope Kitchen Aid will continue to make it.

I've only had this fridge for a few weeks, but it seems to be an excellent product. It is quiet and capable of sustaining very cold temperatures (although the built-in thermostat allows a user to control the degree of cooling).

Before purchasing this fridge, I did a ton of research into it. It appears to be worthy of the high praise it has received.

Great mini fridge. I didn't expect the freezer to work as well as it did. If you're interested in cooling off items quickly, plug it in for a few hours or over night to cool down before adding perishable items to it.

This pump does exactly what i need it to do. It came in well packed and looks exactly like what was in the picture. The pump is just as good as the OEM one that was in my washer. Installation was a breeze. Just pop off the front panel of the washer. Undo the two bolts and plug in the two wires and you're good to go. The best thing about this pump is that it doesn't make too much noise like some other after market pumps do. If i need another pump i will order from this seller again.

I've been without a dishwasher for four years and advocating for one for three of those years. It fits well under the cabinets, gives enough room for a days worth of dishes for two people, is quiet (except when the water is expelling to the sink), and gets the job done. I'm very happy with it.
summary: Compact and gets the job done.

reviewText: I bought this for my sister so she had a dishwasher in her very small apartment.  I have one for my camper and I just love it.  She has been enjoying it so very much.  This is so great for a small place and when you don't like to do dishes this just fits perfectly.

It takes about 1 hour 45 for the normal cycle. My girlfriend couldn't believe such a thing existed, or how good of a job it did. I will never go back to not having a dishwasher. If you're hesitating on whether or not to get one, just do it. It's totally been worth every penny.
summary: Freaking phenomenal machine. Stop living without a dishwasher!

reviewText: Very disappointed.  I bought this for my mother so she wouldn't have to wash dishes by hand.  It's very large and not "countertop" sized at all.  Door will not stay closed and buttons don't work.  Followed all instructions and it can turn on but doesn't do anything but sit there taking up space.  I hope to return this piece of garbage as soon as possible.
summary: Very disappointed. I bought this for my mother so she ...

reviewText: I just moved into a house with a refrigerator that has an ice maker. So this is my first time replacing a filter. Replacement instructions were clear but what was not clear was whether I had to shut the water off to change the filter. That was not mentioned anywhere that I could see.
summary: I just moved into a house with a refrigerator that ...

reviewText:
Did not fit! It was a little snug but I made it fit. As I was running the 3 gallon to flush it out I noticed that there was water on my floor.
It was coming out of my fridge and leaking all over the floor! It was a mess!! I had to quickly pull it out which was not easy.

When we moved into our new house, I didn't know how old the filters were in the refrigerator. After looking at the genuine filter prices and this, I thought to myself, "let's try". I can say that the quality of the water skyrocketed immediately after I change the filter. I actually don't know why a person would pay 3x the price for the same thing.
summary: When we moved into our new house, I didn't ...

reviewText: Unfortunately, the filter did not fit our Samsung refrigerator.  My husband tried for about 15 minutes to put it in and it just did not work.  He went to Home Depot and bought the actual Samsung filter and it popped right in with no trouble at all.  I'm sorry but we'll have to return the product to you.
summary: Unfortunately, the filter did not fit our Samsung refrigerator ...

reviewText: I give this five stars because I have been using this product for the last six months and had no issues with it. No leaks, no issues with the taste of the filtered water, it worked so well that I couldn't tell the difference between it and the Samsung brand filters. I am ordering again because it is cheaper and there is no discernible difference in product quality.

I am very happy with this filter. I tried a different generic Samsung filter and it worked but didn't fit right so when I put this filter in I was very happy to see it fit just like the OEM brand. I will definitely buy more of these filters when it is time for a new one.
summary: Great filters.....Fits my Samsung fridge perfectly

reviewText: This filter fit perfectly into my Samsung fridge. It's only been a day, but it has worked well so far. I'll update in about a month to see how it works long term. It does feel way lighter than the original filter, but I was not willing to pay $50 for the original.
summary: Good filter after a day (long term review coming in about a month)

reviewText: I have to admit I was a bit skeptical about a filter that is not direct from Samsung, but my concerns were unfounded.  The filter works well and we have had absolutely no issues with it.  Besides, it is about a third the cost of a typical Samsung filter.
summary: I have to admit I was a bit skeptical about ...

reviewText:
This is a very good low-priced alternative to OEM filter. The water flow rate is slightly higher than the OEM filter, which helps with the freeze-up problem common with Samsung refrigerators. This is my third time using this filter with no problems.

Update:
I have now used this filter for four replacement cycles, and I still think this is a very good alternative to OEM filter.
summary: Great low-priced alternative to OEM filter.

reviewText: I didn't have any issues or problems like some others seem to have had. I just undone the old filter and installed the new filter and ran about a gallon or so through it to flush. You always have to flush any new filter. The water tastes great.

Worth every penny spent on these filters.  Water tastes great and it's comforting to know that all the contaminants are not going into our bodies.  A healthier family is a goal for us and we have filled in a large part of the equation.

This filter fit my GE refrigerator perfectly.  I haven't had the water tested for contaminants, but the taste is excellent.  There is no taste of any minerals or metals in the water.  This filter seems to work just as well as an OEM filter.  Be sure to run 6 or 8 cups of water through the filter before drinking it or using it in a coffee maker, etc. to clear any loose charcoal.  The water initially comes out with several bits of fine charcoal, but clears up right away.
summary: Just as good as OEM for far less money

reviewText:
Excellent product, excellent price! I was hesitant to order a generic filter  at such a low price, but overall the reviews were good, so I gave it a shot. The filters are fantastic! They fit easily into the fridge and work great. I had tried another brand of filter in the past and was not happy with the taste of the water, but with the ice pure filter, the water tastes great again.
I'm extremely pleased with the filters and will continue to buy them.
summary: Great filters at a great price!

reviewText: A waste of money. Description says it can be used to fill the gap between washer and dryer. This product is so flimsy and pliable that the vibrations of the washer and dryer cause it to fall down between the washer and dryer!  Now I have to try and fish it out from the gap.

I thought I would love this product but was very disappointed in it. These are very soft and bendable with a tacky surface. I thought they would be  hard plastic with a smooth surface so they could be wiped off. And they won't stay in place. I threw them away after only a few days.
summary: I thought I would love this product but was very disappointed in it

reviewText: These gap covers are great.  They serve the purpose of preventing things from falling into the crack between the counter and the stove, but as an added bonus, they protect the side edge of the stove. (which for me seems to be my favorite place to drop things, leaving little marks on the stove!).  They look great and are easy to clean, too.
summary: PERFECT SOLUTION FOR YOUR STOVE GAP

reviewText: No more crumbs between the counter and stove!  These work perfectly and are much better than the metal ones you find in stores.  If your stove is level with your counter top (as it should be), you will have no more spills and crumbs down into the area you cannot reach without pulling out the stove to clean!  They keep your kitchen free from insect attractants!  Highly recommended!
summary: Keep the crevices clean and a smooth line from counter to stove top!

reviewText: The filter leaked every time you pressed the button for water. The inside of the refrigerator was a mess with water on all my shelves before I realized what was happening.  I tried reinserting the filter, checked it for a malformation and nothing worked. I had to place a cup underneath until I could get a new filter. Not worth it!

I've had spotty luck with 3rd party filters.  Tried this brand for the first time.  Water still tastes like chlorine after two weeks.  Cannot say the brand is bad because I've had good ones and then bad ones of the same brand (not this brand) in the past. So maybe just this single filter is faulty.  Don't understand why that happens.

I only ordered 1 filter because I worried that it wouldn't work as well as the manufacturer's filter. No need for concern because it installed and works just like the Whirlpool filter and costs much less. I'll be back to order more.

Don't know how they can market these filters at such a low price compared to my filter purchases in the past.  The filter came in no time and so far it seems to be working just as well as the more expensive fridge filters that I have bought.  If I don't have any problems, I'll be buying this replacement again in the future to be sure.

It's a water filter - it filters water as it should and as I would expect. No surprises or disappointments. It came very quickly and well-packaged. No issues at all with the seller. I would not hesitate to purchase from this seller again.

The old ice maker in our Frigidaire quit working. This one was identical to the old one. Was easy to replace the old ice maker with this one. Loosen two screws and disconnect the electrical connector and the old one came out. Plug in the new one and tighten the screws and it was done. New one works fine.

I always put a new air filter in when the red line shows the filter is finished working. This time tho, there wasn't a usage guide with the filter.  This usage guide has a red line to show when a new air filter is needed.  This is extremely helpful.  Hope this will be included when I have to order again.

The most important thing "right out of the box" is whether they fit my fridge...they DO!  And after a few weeks, they seem to work just fine too...my fridge is odor-free.  Add that to a good price and no one could ask for more!

This is a great replacement for your OEM pump. It is sturdy and well built. Installation is simple enough. The tooling on the pump is the same as the OEM part so everything lines up perfectly. I wouldn't hesitate to purchase this part again.
summary: This is a great replacement for your OEM pump

reviewText: It was a perfect fit for my dryer. I like the fact that this replacement has an extra support down the middle, unlike the original. The shipping was much faster than I had expected. I got it in just a few days.
summary: It was a perfect fit for my dryer

reviewText: A little snug fitting into my Kenmore HE2 dryer, but it does fit. I expect it'll wear down to a perfect fit in time.  I really appreciate the support bar down the middle of the screen. I'm hopeful that it will last the rest of the life of the dryer. I will update my review if it ever falls apart.

First quality and getting the job done. These water panels arrived quickly, were adequately packaged, and have worked well since I installed the first one. I anticipate that all of the water panels will work as well as the first.

I've had the two units side-by-side on my desk for several days as a test.  The humidity readings have remained exactly in synch.  The temperature readings have remained consistently two degrees apart.  I'd prefer for them to be exactly in synch also, but two degrees is acceptable for my application because I'm primarily concerned with monitoring humidity.

These little sensors are nice because they have a magnet on the back so you can put one on your refrigerator.  They also have a fold out tab so you can put them on a table.  They are made of plastic but seem to be of high quality construction.

I love being able to order these filters from Amazon, getting them at a decent price, and not having to drive to the store to pick them up!  They work great!  I have let them expire a couple of times, and won't do that again!  The fridge got stinky quickly.  They really do work!
summary: I love being able to order these filters from Amazon

reviewText: The lamp cords are exactly what we wanted. They enclose the electrical wiring in a clear material and are very unobtrusive. The molded plug is flat against the wall when plugged in and I like that as well. These are very high quality.

If you don't need a dishwasher and will wash all your dishes by hand before putting them in, get this one. Absolutely atrocious at cleaning and needs to have its filter cleaned with great difficulty after every use. Manufacturer has a very limited warranty. Do not buy.

As described.  Looks (and fits) exactly like the original filter that it replaced.  I especially like the fact that each filter is individually wrapped so that I don't have to worry about storing them until needed.

We paid an appliance guy to change our ignitor about 18 months ago and it went bad again.  I couldn't afford to hire another one so I bought this and figured out how to change it.  Overall, it was easy to install and this saved us a lot of money.
summary: Easy to install & a great way to save money

reviewText: I really wish I had purchased this set earlier than I did. 5 minutes after these new and improved dishwasher rack wheels arrived I felt one particular point of daily aggravation melt away when I no longer had to retrieve wheels from the bottom of the dishwasher and reattach them so I could slide the rack back in.

These work great so far, and seem a little better than the original wheels, which had all fallen off at some point. I was considering getting a new dishwasher, but these have bought me a few more years. I am very glad I made this purchase.

Family said don't get it, friends said don't get it and I didn't listen.  Got it and love it!  Cleans better than any full sized dish washer I've had over the years.  In this tiny place it does look like the elephant in the room, but I really don't care.  If I never have to wash any more silverware by hand I'lll be a happy camper!

I bought this for my Mom.  She has a small kitchen with no dishwasher.  She LOVES it!  I was concerned that it would be loud, but it's not.  We don't even worry about the noise level even though it's in a small house.  I also bought a stainless steel rolling cart to go with it.  All around great buy!

What can I say about this other than I love it. I was able to hook it up by myself (no hubby assistance). It was larger and heavier than I thought it would be (needed hubby assistance). So far it is running great. It does take a bit for a cycle to complete, but who cares I am not washing anymore dishes.
summary: What can I say about this other than I love it. I was able to hook it up ...

reviewText: This is an excellent counter top dishwasher. It is my second counter top and by far the best. It holds more dishes and silverware than I thought it would. I like having the controls on top. My grandson can't reach them or open the door. The dishwasher cleans everything great. I also like the black color because it matches my stove.

I've had this dishwasher for about a year and it's great.  It washes dishes as thoroughly as a standard size dishwasher.  It's quiet and I haven't had any problems with it.  It's not for a large household but works fine for the two of us (we run it about every other day).

We've had it for about six weeks now and have not had any problems at all. It holds more than I expected. It will work best if you rinse the dishes first, since it seems to have a tough time with dried-on food. The regular cycle is kind of long (1 hour and 25 minutes), but it's not a problem for us. We love it!
summary: Love it, love it, love it!

reviewText:
Honestly, who really knows whether your refrigerator air filter is working the way it's supposed to? I personally don't. And I don't think you do either. But we all feel better knowing that we have a fresh filter installed to do whatever it's supposed to be doing in there.

With that said, this rating is based strictly upon the fact that the price beats Sears, and that Amazon delivered it right on time. Can't complain!

The handle on this Maytag dishwasher is cheap plastic, and will quickly crumble. This latch assembly is completely useless because it does not come with a handle. Without the handle, the door can't be unlatched. This is a complete waste of money. Furthermore, this supplier charges double what other suppliers charge for shipping.  Go to http://www.appliancepartspros.com/  you'll be more than satisfied.
summary: This latch assembly is completely useless because it does not come with a handle

reviewText: Some dryer manufacturers recommend rigid duct for venting the warm, moist air from their dryers. The problem is, how does one connect the rigid duct to the rear of the dryer when it is backed-up close to a wall? MagVent offers a solution that works well.

This was an excellent solution for us. The distance between the dryer and the wall connection was very small and the old arrangement left us with too long of a piping, which was an obvious fire hazard and very likely affected the performance of the dryer. The installation was easy as well.
summary: This was an excellent solution for us

reviewText: This little gadget called MagVent MV is one of the best things I've ever used.  I only had a very small space between the wall and my dryer.  I was able to position the MagVent in such a way that the powerful magnet "caught" the dryer vent perfectly.  Once the magnet attaches to the vent, it seals perfectly without losing air.  If I ever need another dryer vent coupling with limited space available, I will buy a MagVent coupling.
summary: Limited Space for Dryer venting - MagVent is the ticket

reviewText: This is a pretty cool product. Overall it was easy to install. I gained at least 2" of space. The dryer is a lot closer to the wall. It's really nice when you have to move the dryer. It just disconnects and easy to reconnect it.

This was a hard to find but perfect product for what I needed. I had an existing in-wall dryer vent, but it was difficult to connect my dryer to the vent in a reliable way. This product worked perfectly!

Change your hoses. Change your hoses. Change your hoses.

That said, these are very high quality hoses - they are very tough, screw on well, and should do the job of STOPPING if there's a leak. I didn't test it, for obvious reasons. they maintained good flow in use, were easy to install, and won't strip.

I would recommend.
summary: Excellent quality, flow seems to work, would recommend.

reviewText: I don't know how accurate the hygrometer part of this item is,  but if the the thermometer reading is anything to go by I'm not impressed.  TEN degrees higher than the other three thermometers in my incubator. 10 degrees HIGHER.  If I went by this I would lose all my eggs.

Seems to work as well as the LG filters (I've used both). In the local city tap water, there is a fairly strong chlorine taste/smell and these filters completely remove any odor and taste from the tap water. I'm very pleased with these filters.

I ordered this portable ice maker for my husband serving in Afghanistan.  He recieved it in good shape after I mailed it to him.  He says it works perfectly and makes enough ice for him and some friends.  The ice maker itself is a little on the heavy and very bulky side.  I had a lot of trouble getting it out of the box it came in.  But, it is a good value compared to other more expensive models.

IT STOPPED WORKING AT 6 MONTHS AND ONLY HAS A 90 DAY WARRANTY!!!  Listen to everyone who tells you theirs broke down!  The company will not fix it unless you return it at your expense and pay the fee to fix it.  This is obviously a disposable item as it's cheaper to buy a new one then to return and have it fixed!  I'm so disappointed!
summary: Best thing I ever bought UNTIL IT STOPPED WORKING!

reviewText: I used this product continuously for a month from last month to this month, and somehow, the product just stop making ice.  I don't know how to repair it and I will not even try to pay for any repair cost.  It's such a waste of money.  Don't buy this product, it's gonna be a waste of money...!

Love the ice maker. It works just as described. I am thankful to be able to remove the ice trays from our small freezer. YES, you do have to store the ice in your freezer.  The machine makes ice, it is not a freezer.

I really love this ice maker.  The freezer in my fridge doesn't work that well, so this ice maker is great!  Initially the ice had a plastic flavor, but that went away after a couple of days.  Now the ice tastes great.  I read that some people were unhappy because it broke quickly.  I've had it for a month and have no complaints.  If I have any problems, I will post about it.

I needed a small hygrometer to put in my chicken egg incubator and this one worked well. Small (which is what I wanted) but the numbers were large enough to read clearly. I had 5 eggs out of 7 eggs hatch so it must have been accurate. Worked perfectly for my needs.
summary: Used in a chicken egg incubator

reviewText:
These small thermometers are neat.  We've bought a few recently - we keep one in the freezer and in the fridge.  We also carry one on airplanes - it's smaller than a car key fob - and we use it to show the attendant when it's too hot on the plane.
The first one is about 6 months old - no quality issues at all.
They only show the Celsius scale.

Simple and very useful. I have been using it in the bedroom to track the humidity in the winter to see if the humidifier I have running is doing its job. It seems to be accurate enough for home use. In the summer I will probably use it to track temperature in the basement for fermenting beer. Overall, I'm happy with the investment.

I bought three of these.  One for each guitar case and one for the entire room.  I put them next to eachother first to see if they all read the same thing, and they are within a percentage point of eachother, which is good enough for me.  Cheap and fast.

Bought 2 of these units.  One read exactly 75 on the salt test.  The other read 68, well outside of the tolerance.  The second one is going back.  The low rating is for the hassle of having to fish through these units in order to find a good one. I will revisit this review after I've had the "good"  one for a while.  I want to have a better idea of how it holds up.

The freezer died within 15 months of purchase. This seems to be an ongoing issue with the freezer- all lights are on but the compressor won't kick in. I just ordered the compressor starter to see if that fixes it.

DO NOT BUY THIS FREEZER! IT HAS BEEN MAKING A CLICKING SOUND AND NOW ALL MY FOOD IS EXTREMELY SOFT AND THAWING OUT. IT WILL NOT STAY COLD ANY LONGER AFTER JUST ONE YEAR. THIS IS RIDICULOUS! ALTHOUGH THE LIGHT IS ON, IT NO LONGER WORKS. NOW, MY BREASTMILK AND FOOD IS THAWING OUT COMPLETELY. WE ARE VERY UPSET BECAUSE WE WOULD EXPECT A FREEZER TO LAST LONGER THAN A YEAR!
summary: DO NOT BUY THIS FREEZER! IT HAS BEEN MAKING ...

reviewText: I loved it while it lived, and I hate the fact that it died. It lasted exactly one month longer than the warranty. The company that makes it is the worst to deal with; their customer service is outsourced, and the people you talk with do not care about you, the product, the company, or their jobs whatsoever. To repair the unit would cost me more than the purchase price. It will be promptly donated, and I will never buy another Igloo product again, not even a lunchbox. I'm very disappointed.
summary: I loved it while it lived

reviewText: We were looking for an inexpensive smaller chest freezer for our basement. We don't need anything too big, so this fits our needs perfectly. If you're stocking for the zombie apocalypse, you'll probably need something bigger. So far I haven't noticed much of a difference in our electric bill over the last couple months, so it seems pretty efficient. As long as the longevity is good, this will stay a five-star review.

After searching for awhile, I finally found this knob which fit perfectly on my dryer.  I have a Frigidaire Electrolux  GLGT1031CS1 washer/dryer combo unit.  The serial number on my original knob is 1340349 and this replacement knob is the same serial number.  I had bought another knob with the serial number 134844410, which the frigidaire website says replaces the original knob 1340349, but that is not true.  The shape of the opening on the back of the knob is different than the original.

I have had my Aprilaire for 2 years now, and had to replace the control unit every year.  It fails, and doesn't run the Aprilaire.  The old control unit from the old Aprilaire worked for 40 years.  It was still working, and I wish I would have kept it when we replaced the Aprilaire.  The Honeywell control is even worse.  Why is everythink junk today?

I've ordered from this company twice and, both times, had VERY fast shipping.  (Thank you very much.) Also, the product works very well.  It outlasts the other brand I had used several times before and the drying time is significantly shorter.

Seems to work as well as the Samsung filters for a lot less.  Fit perfectly.  Might be worth researching to see if there is any information on particulates that this does/does not filter out that the Samsung filters do/do not, but seems to work just as well.

Was a little nervous ordering a large appliance online.  It came when they said it would.  It was packaged well.  I love the stove and the top oven (have not had a chance to use the lower oven yet).  It is great to not have to heat up a whole oven and yet have more room than my toaster oven.  My children (all grown) wanted to know why the inside of the oven was purple.  I don't have the answer, but I kinda like it.
summary: I love the stove and the top oven (have not had ...

reviewText: Good quality and very powerful. My husband (an engineer) did a lot of homework and suggested this one to me. I was doubtful at first. After I used it, it works really well, even when you fry something it works really well.

I love it. Unfortunately, it wasn't handled with care during shipping and it came with a HUGE dent. Unfortunately, I couldn't send it back since I needed it  really bad for a house party that week, and wouldn't have time to reorder or replace it.

I don't really need it, sinceI have a water purification system in my home, but I'm ready if I ever need it elsewhere. i DID try it out, it worked VERY well- and now I'm wondering if I need to keep it moist, or let it dry out.
summary: Great idea; inconspicuous, handy, does the job.

reviewText: This was a perfect fit! Installing it was simple. After removing the old one, it just plugs in and has only a couple of screws. The ice maker successfully started making ice within a couple of hours. It has worked perfectly ever since. I don't see or hear any difference from the previous ice maker. It's great to have fresh, normal looking ice again!

So far so good, it's only been a month.  I've finished off my first bullet keg and the last glass was just as cold as the first glass.  Keeps beer very cold with an adjustable thermostat.  I have it set at 35 degrees, it can go as low as 32 degrees.
summary: So far so good, it's only been a month

reviewText: This replaced our 4 burner Frigidaire cooktop, and I am really surprised how much better it looks. We love the center griddle that you can use to grill things on. I don't have any complaints yet, but I have only had it for about a month now. I will update as time goes on, but as of right now, at this price range, this is the best you will find.
summary: Best cooktop in its price range

reviewText: Seems to work as a perfect replacement for the original filter at a fraction of the regular price. Can't say how durable they are but we've had it for a few months, it's a bag of charcoal so I imagine it'll work just like the original one.
summary: Seems to work as a perfect replacement for the original filter at a fraction of ...

reviewText: These filters fit in our Kenmore refrigerator, and provide a noticeable improvement in the taste of our drinking water. Unfiltered water tastes rather chlorinated, but filtered water tastes like it comes from a fresh spring! The filters last a long time (6-12 months).
summary: Dramatically Improves Taste of our Drinking Water

reviewText: Affordable source for water filtration in my refrigerator.  I haven't installed the new replacement yet, but looks to be identical to the previous one.  Ordering was hassle-free and the delivery was prompt.

This is a very useful Spin Dryer.  I'm glad I bought it.  I believe it saves drying time and is economical.  It's also definitely easier on clothes.  My clothes will last longer without having a regular heated tumble dryer.  Every time I cleaned the lint filter I was thinking the tumble dryer is literally destroying my clothes a little at a time.  This Spin Dryer doesn't make lint and is gentle.
summary: This is a very useful Spin Dryer

reviewText: I didn't think it would dry my clothes since it doesn't feel that warm but, it has proven me wrong. Yes it takes about 90 to 120 mins to dry my jeans but it gets it done.  With every wash you'll learn just how many items to put and for how long.  At least I know my clothes are not being fried in a regular HOT dryer. My clothes feel as soft as they used to.

Wow! I'm so surprised how well this works. It's quiet and dries the clothes pretty fast.  I put about 6 sweaters in it and it took about 2 1/2 to 3 hours to dry.  Much better than hanging for two days!

Arrived broken. The heater base portion gets extremely hot, but the fan and power lights don't turn on. If I had not been watching it carefully, the base portion would have melted or caught fire. Returned.
summary: Arrived broken. The heater base portion gets extremely hot ...

reviewText: Amazing product.  When I first opened the package I didn't believe this product would actually work.  I was wrong.  I use wooden clip clothespins to pin my clothing on plastic hangers and hang them on the arms in the dryer.  Zip it up and turn it on.  My clothing comes out nice and dry in a very short time.  The dryer is very quiet.  Easy to move around.

Easy to install, and is working well. No idea how long it will last, but I don't remember how long we've had this dishwasher either. Oring will take a try or two to get installed, but it's still easy enough to do yourself.

Saved a bunch of money here. Took me all of three minutes to change the dishwasher collar. No more sliding off the faucet or fighting it to get the hoses to stay on. I'm happy! The alternative was to buy new hoses, completely disassemble the dishwasher, install new hoses, reassemble etc.,
or buy a new dishwasher. Again...way happy with this purchase!
summary: I'm happy! The alternative was to buy new hoses

reviewText: We have a portable dishwasher and the part that attaches to the faucet stopped working. When that part doesn't work the whole dishwasher doesn't work. We bought this replacement kit and it worked perfectly. The parts were very easy to replace. It now works like a dream.

Item broke within a few days of installation. This item was either defective or was not the same quality as OEM. I ended up paying for and installing the much more expensive OEM version, which has been working fine.

I am so pleased with this product. It saved me so much money and made me feel like an expert, but really it was just so easy to switch this part out! I own a Maytag and it fit perfectly. I needed this part because the original wore down and would no longer stay attached to the faucet and switching this part out did the trick! It arrived sooner than expected as well.

THIS WORKED OUT GREAT. THE CORDS WERE A LITTLE LONG BUT I KNOW THAT WAS BECAUSE IT FIT SEVERAL BRANDS. INSTALLED QUICKLY AFTER WATCHING (ACTUALLY GLANCING) AT A YOU TUBE VIDEO. THE SELLER SHIPPED VERY QUICKLY. WILL DEFINITELY BUT FROM THEM AGAIN.

I had a problem with our KitchenAid dishwasher not reliably draining. Sometimes it would drain. Sometimes it would not drain.  I replaced both drain hoses and the drain pump. Both of these did not enable the dishwasher to drain every time. Replacing the check valve seems to have fully resolved the problem. Perhaps the stiffness of the valve increases over time, decreasing the drainage flow.

I bought this switch because the description suggested it was made by Whirlpool. When it arrived, neither the part or the packaging suggested it was made by Whirlpool. I am now pretty sure it is not a genuine Whirlpool part. This part worked for only two months before it broke. The original part worked for approximately 15 years before it broke. I would not order this part again unless you don't mind replacing it every couple of months.
summary: I am now pretty sure it is not a genuine Whirlpool part

reviewText: Shipped the wrong knobs.  The knobs were listed with one part number but shipped with a slightly different part number on them.  Stems, as a result, were too short to work.  It was not cost effective to return the knobs for a refund.
summary: Good knobs for someone, but not me.

reviewText: This part came very quickly. It arrived days before I expected. I'm very happy it did.  I put it on and the washing machine worked perfectly once again. I was so excited. This simple part made a big difference.  The part was perfectly packaged and again, it was delivered very quickly.

This was much easier to replace than I thought it would be based on the reviews I read. My dishwasher had been leaking from where the hose attaches to the sink for quite some time. I figured I'd have to replace the entire hose. Nope. This fabulous piece did the trick and took me all of 5 minutes to replace.

This was exactly what it took to fix my dishwasher's broken latch.  Thanks to an on-line video that showed how to do it, with my power screw driver and a pair of needle nose pliers, I had the old one out and the new one installed in less than ten minutes. It has worked fine now for several months. Looks identical to the original one.
summary: Easy to get a handle on this

reviewText: Switch worked exactly as it should. I watched a couple youtube vids to see exactly how to replace it, and it was more or less a piece of cake. Whirlpool makes it pretty easy to pop the machine open to access this switch. Not much more to say. It worked!
summary: Worked as expected, and easy to install.

reviewText: I purchased two of these Whirlpool Stove Knobs, and I am completely and totally satisfied what the products advertisement. These knobs are exactly like the original Whirlpool Knobs that was purchased with my stove. (These are the exact same knobs). I'm in love.....
summary: and I am completely and totally satisfied what the products advertisement

reviewText: High quality plastic, Heavy duty replacement silverware basket for my dishwasher.  Seems like it is better quality than my original basket.  My original basket got brittle and the bottom broke out little by little and it would no longer hold silverware.  I'm very happy with this as a replacement.  I feel like it will last longer than the dishwasher might at this point.

My old one became brittle after years of use, so this was a much-needed purchase. The old one had so many holes in it that the silverware kept falling straight through. The new basket has a different layout than my original basket, but it fit in the space perfectly. Glad I could find it.

I purchased this item as a replacement for another part number that had been discontinued.  However, I believe this item is actually superior.  The original part I had was a very fragile two-piece part and the bottom portion was made of clear plastic that was very brittle and easily broken.  This replacement part is all one piece made of white plastic.  I believe this item will hold up much better than the original part.
summary: Great replacement product.  Item arrived as discribed.

reviewText: As advertised, it fit my dishwasher just fine. The layout/size of compartments was very slightly different than the one that came with my dishwasher originally, but who cares? It fits, it holds my silverware, and it got here quickly.
summary: it fit my dishwasher just fine. The layout/size of compartments was very slightly different ...

reviewText: When the original silverware basket for my Whirlpool dishwasher broke (just one small plastic clip broke, but it was annoying), I wasn't sure if I'd be able to find a replacement. I was so happy to find one! It arrived very quickly and was in great condition. The only problem I have is that the clip that secures the front of the basket is a bit stiff and it takes a little force to make it close properly. But I'd rather have it clip securely than not at all! Great replacement product!

Wonderful!  With it's new design I was concerned as to whether or not it would fit on the rotator arm, and if it would actually clean and function normally.  I was actually quite surprised that not only did it work as it should, but I also noticed that the staining and grit around the door seal had completely vanished after its first use,  and as for the price, "couldn't beat it with a stick" as my grandma used to say.

Poorly designed and badly manufactured, with sloppy and misshapen injection molding that prevented it from fitting in the slot. I waited too long before testing it out. Should have returned it. This is NOT the OEM part.

This looks just like my old one but without the handle. Fits perfectly into the slot where the old one was. Pried the handle off the old one and stuck it on this one. It doesn't fit perfectly, but it holds well enough for me to pick it up full, so I'm happy.

Good, well made, proper fitting factory replacement filter for our Whirlpool dryer. Fair price as well. The filter that came with our dryer had a poorly attached gasket that came loose early on. This filter's gasket is securely attached. We are very pleased. We recommend this product.

The bottom of the original basket in our dishwasher started breaking apart leaving holes in each section.  The utensils kept falling through and jammed the large basket when sliding it in and out or they stopped the blade attached to the bottom of the dishwasher from spinning. It always took extra time to load the utensils then make sure that none fell through the holes. The Whirlpool Replacement Basket arrived on time, fit perfectly, and made our family's life simpler again.

The basket that came with our dishwasher broke down. The bottom was riddled with holes that allowed the flat ware to fall through. This basket was the perfect replacement. It shipped in a timely manner, and replaces the basket we had perfectly.

This basket is a vast improvement over the one that came with the dishwasher.  It feels and looks a lot stronger and seems to stand up to the high temps in the washer it self.  I like the fact that all three baskets came with a lid.  I don't use the center one but if I need it, it's there.  This is a good replacement for the one that simply fell apart from the heat and soap.

This basket is just like the original. I am very satisfied with it and just wish that Maytag  would make it sturdier,so it would not need to be replaced in the first place.
Getting this item from Amazon saved me a lot of money . I am happy with my purchase.
summary: This basket is just like the original

reviewText:
It's much easier to just put all the utensils in this basket and place it on the bottom part of the dishwasher than to put one by one on the door rack and they don't always come out very clean because the water can't reach them if there's a plate or large pan covering it.

This is just fantastic, no hassle and easy to use, highly recommendable.

I have no experience with appliance repair, but after looking up a few videos online about why my refrigerator was leaking, I discovered this part and instructions on how to install it.  Took maybe half an hour and my problem was solved. No more leaky refrigerator.
summary: I have no experience with appliance repair, but after ...

reviewText: Call whirlpool. They will send it for free even if you are out of warranty. But you must ask then to have it sent for free. If you are under warranty they will install it for free. Whirlpool likes to hide the fact they will send it for free. You need to ask and then they will do it.

Worked great but you really, really, really have to do a 24 hour defrost before installing this part.  I thought I could circumvent that with a shorter defrost but I did not melt all the ice that was blocking the drainage opening so I continued getting ice on the bottom of freezer.  I did the defrost and that did the trick.  I also got a pipecleaner and made sure the opening to the drain was not clogged by other material just to be safe.

Had a lightening strike that knocked out the control panel. The freezer still worked, but there was no way to set the temperature. I rolled the dice on buying this hoping it would work and it did !!!!!
summary: Had a lightening strike that knocked out the control panel ...

reviewText: I was skeptical at first, but removed the old pieces and installed the two new pieces in about 30 mins. It took a while to defrost with the help of a space heater. But all has worked well since the replacement. Yippee, no more water puddles on the kitchen floor.

Easy to install. However you MUST defrost your freezer before/after installing, otherwise don't bother installing this. If you don't defrost, the ice will never be able to drain and you'll have dripping forever until you do. I've heard that Whirlpool will send you this part for free, but for $14 and free 2 day shipping, I'd rather not have to argue with a rep on the phone to get them to send it. (I've heard you have to convince them) It's simply not worth my time.

This thing has saved me a ton of time and money. First, I avoided a service call from Whirlpool.  Second, I no longer need to defrost my refrigerator every month.  It's just too bad that Whirlpool did not see the opportunity to install this to begin with.

THIS WAS A NEEDED ITEM AND I FOUND IT WITH YOU AT A GREAT PRICE.  THANKS FOR OFFERING IT, OTHERS WANTED A LOT MORE MONEY.  I DIDN'T KNOW FOR SURE THIS WAS THE PROBLEM, AND I DIDN'T WANT TO SPEND TOO MUCH IN CASE IT WASN'T THE PROBLEM.

It worked perfectly. But if you're having a problem with water pooling at the bottom of your freezer, you'll have to do much more than just replace the drain tube. You'll have to remove the cover over the coils on the back wall of the freezer and remove all the ice blocking the hole that leads to the drain tube.
summary: It worked perfectly. But if you're having a problem ...

reviewText: Great ice maker!  I live in a place that has terrible ice coming from the fridge and haven't had ice in months.  This ice maker makes ice very quickly and cleanly with the use of filtered water.  It has a permanent spot on my kitchen counter and looks good too!

I bought this as a Christmas gift last year.  My family loves iced tea and thought this would be a welcome addition to the gadgets we have in the kitchen.  We were terribly disappointed with the ice maker.  It is very slow, and in just a month or so, it quit working.  I think we made enough ice for perhaps 2 or 3 cups of iced tea.  Sorry about this delayed review.  I hope it helps the last minute Christmas gift shoppers.

WOW!!!  This little ice maker is tremendous!!!  I don't think I could live without it now that I have it!  I have a regular ice maker in my fridge, but these little cubes are so much better!  They look like little thimbles made of ice.

I love the color. I put this next to the refrigerator on the counter top. It makes ice very quickly which I then transfer to the freezer. It is a little noisy when working but I don't run mine all the time it makes so much ice.

These are great.  They are double the thickness of the Vornado wicks and cost less.  I use them for my Vornado Evap3 humidifier.  I had been using Vornado wicks but the don't always stand upright.  Further, they last at most 2 to 3 weeks.  The FilterBuy wicks have lasted a month each, with daily vinegar soaking.  I enthusiastically recommend the FilterBuy wicks.

Takes more than twice as long to evaporate water. The original filters for the Vornado Evap3 will evaporate the whole tank in under 12 hours. These filters take well over 24 hours to evaporate the same amount of water.

Works great, so far! We decided to move the microwave away from the cooking range, and searched for the thinnest vent fan we could find. We love this one, and it seems to be working just fine. We cook quite a bit, mostly Indian food, and this seems to be more than equal to the task at hand! The filters are the best part- It was a real pain, having to clean the aluminum mesh filters- The baffle filters are extremely easy to clean, whether you want to do it by hand or in the dishwasher!

These are not NSF 53 (health effects) certified, only NSF 42 (cosmetic effects).  The original LG filters are both NSF 42 and 53.  As such, these are not true OE replacements.  (If you have no idea what I'm talking about, Google NSF 42 and NSF 53 and compare the specs on the filters.)
summary: Misleading sales pitch, not truly compatible with LG filters

reviewText: The Bristi filters worked out just fine for me on my Kenmore refrigerator .After installing the filter there were no leaks and the ice and water tasted much fresher than before. I have to say that my experience with this product has been very positive.
summary: The Bristi filters worked out just fine for me on my Kenmore refrigerator

reviewText: Was delighted with the new knobs.  My Jenn-Air is 30 years old, believe it or not.  Husband doesn't believe in replacing something that's not broken, but the knobs were so bad you could hardly see most of the numbers.  Now I'm happy, at least with the knobs.  I want a new cooktop!
summary: Now I can see the numbers!

reviewText:
From box to trash in less than 10 minutes.  This product advertises that it's a replacement for a DA29-0003B.  It is not; it will not fit in place of a DA29-0003B!  Removed and compared with my old filter, it's close but it's been mismanufactured so there's no way it will fit (stem is not tall enough).

Garbage, complete garbage.  Not worth $1.
summary: Not even worth $1.  DOES NOT REPLACE DA29-0003B!

reviewText: Bought this for my husband since we do not have an ice maker connected to our freezer.  I am impressed.  It makes ice quick.  I don't have to worry about constantly refilling water into the unit.  It holds 2.8 liters in the water reservoir.  You don't have to worry about transferring the ice from the ice maker to the freezer.  We have never transferred the ice and it stays frozen.  Very pleased.

I was apprehensive about buying this machine.  I knew I wanted a portable ice machine but was unsure of which brand.  I am very pleased with this machine.  The ice is chewable ( an important factor for me).  It produces ice just as described.  We use it everyday.  It's great not having to make extra runs to the store when I forget to buy ice.

We were looking for a counter-top ice maker and this is the best machine.  I pull it out once a week and fill up our ice tray in the freezer, since the ice maker doesn't work anymore, but the frigerator works great. I looked at other machines and this one looked like the best one.  We made a great choice.  We love it!!
summary: ... for a counter-top ice maker and this is the best machine. I pull it out once a week ...

reviewText: This little machine cranks out a lot of ice. We live in Florida and our refrigerator was just not keeping up with ice consumption. Every time the ice tray is full we bag it and put it in the freezer. We have had the machine about two weeks and it has been running constantly. I hope it keeps up the good work for years!
