I can't say enough nice things about this ice maker.  I've been using it now for several weeks, and I find it so easy to just dip in for a serving.  This one sits on my counter in the kitchen.  It is  fairly quiet, and the slight sound it makes isn't bothersome.

I love my new ice maker. I did have an issue with the drain plug being broken when I first received it but customer service was very cooperative and they sent me some new plugs. I would definitely recommend this product for anyone looking for an ice maker.

I bought a new fridge and wanted to have it well organized.  I have had these about a month now and they are working very well.  I keep one up higher in the fridge and one on the bottom shelf and move them from bottom to top putting the new "hot" ones on the bottom so that I am able to keep the one full of cold drinks at all times.  The cans dispense well.  I can take an empty one out, fill it up and then place it back in the fridge.  I am very satisfied with the product.

We have a Kenmore refrigerator that dispenses water and ice.  Usually we go to our local Sears store and get replacement filters every 6 months.  But, Sears quit stocking replacement filters.  Found this filter on Amazon.com, gave it a try, and it fits perfectly. Also, the price is much better than getting it at Sears.  Recommend.

Does the job and appears to be of high quality.

I used it to flush a tankless hot water heater.... however, I wish I had higher volume hoses. While these may be fine for washers, the small openings appear to restrict the water flow when flushing a hot water heater..... but I can't deduct stars for that because this hose isn't meant for what I used it for.
summary: Good quality and relatively inexpensive for stainless steel hoses

reviewText: Replaced our washer and needed new hoses. Putting on  pants and going to the store  didn't seem like a good option so I found this and it works great. Arrived earlier than the delivery of our new washer.
summary: Putting on pants and going to the store didn't seem like a good option so I found this and it ...

reviewText: This appears to be a well made product.  I purchased these to use with a new washer.  In reading the reviews it was noted that the diameter of the opening was small and restricted the flow of water.  Although it is true that the opening in the hose does appear to be small, there has been no ill effect on the water flow.  Our new washer works great and a lot of water passes through theses hoses in a short period of time.
summary: Works great with our new washer.

reviewText: These bulbs are hard to find in a retail store but they are exactly what fits my microwave oven. They fit and work exactly as expected. When I run out of these bulbs (we use the microwave light as a night light in the kitchen) I will order these again.

It didn't seem to be very effective from the very beginning. Got worse when I tried rinsing it. It became a soft wet rug that flopped inwards. Useless. The original filter is much more rigid -and better- than this one.
summary: Got worse when I tried rinsing it

reviewText: This is not a direct replacement.  My old solenoid has 1/4" fittings but this one comes with 5/16" fittings.  Checked every store on the planet and online 5/16" fittings do not exist.  Would love to return but my 30 days are past trying to find a 5/16" fitting.
summary: Would love to return but my 30 days are past trying ...

reviewText: I really like the way these door handle covers look on my refrigerator. I have a stainless steel refrigerator and we all know just how easy it is to get finger prints on it. So with these handle covers you are able to prevent finger prints and stains on the door handle. I recommend this item as it give you fridge a new look kind of!

I love these handle covers.  I use them on my refrigerator and freezer drawer handles and on my stove handle.  When I am in the middle of cooking, I don't always have time to rinse and dry my hands carefully before touching my appliances to get another ingredient or what have you.  I love that I don't have to mess up my appliances to open them and this handle cover takes wet fingerprints and absorbs them.  Since they are washable, no problem.

THE FILTER ARRIVED EARLY AND I REMOVED THE OLD/BROKEN ONE AND INSERTED THIS ONE.  WHAT A DELIGHT TO SEE HOW PERFECTLY THE FILTER FITS AND WORKS.  THIS IS AN ESSENTIAL PART OF THE DRYER BECAUSE IT KEEPS THE LINT FROM GETTING DOWN BY THE DRUM. HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS GE DRYER SCREEN FILTER.
summary: FITS PERFECTLY AND IS LIKE THE ORIGINA FILTER

reviewText: This item seems well-made, but there are two glaring design flaw.  When you open the tap, some soda (or beer) comes out, but not much.  A vacuum is created in the bottle, which stop the flow of the contents inside.  With no way for Air to get back into the bottle, it locks up.  Also, you will only get half of the contents out of the bottle, because the level will equalize once the remaining contents of the bottle are the same level as the spigot.
summary: This item seems well-made, but there are two glaring ...

reviewText: I was concerned about the product being the same quality and fitment as the OEM before I purchased. I read the reviews and decided to order them anyways. When I received them I could not tell any difference between the OEM and this aftermarket. I installed it and it has been working like a charm. I would highly recommend these to anyone who needs to save money and still get quality workmanship.
summary: Great Product. Great Savings. High Quality

reviewText: When I use the filter as soon as they get wet they got so limp they wouldn't stand up. Every time I filled the humidifier I would have to reset the filter. It has no rigidity to it it's just like a wet noodle.

I see that these are now unavailable. Wish that had been the case when I bought them. Complete ripoff. Didn't fit correctly, lasted about two weeks and the humidifier barely worked at all. Should have returned them immediately, but didn't.

These humidifier wicks are awful.  The material is so flimsy, that once it gets wet it will not stand up inside the humidifier.  It does a horrible job of wicking the water out of the humidifier basin.  You can run the humidifier on the highest fan setting and the humidity will not budge because these wicks do such a horrible job.  Save your money and try a different brand like the ones made by AirCare if they are available.

I like these better than the Emerson filters. I've had better success at cleaning and re-using them than I ever had with the OEM product. (I soak them in vinegar, rinse thoroughly, and dry them.) They are also a lot cheaper than OEM. I bought a four-pack, and it has lasted me twice as long as I expected. I hope they are still available when I am ready to reorder.
summary: I like these better than the Emerson filters

reviewText: I suppose you can call me a regular customer of these filters. They do a great job and make the water and ice taste better. I'm not sure what they did different but for whatever reason, these filters don't seem to drip as much water out when I'm replacing them. Usually I take the old one out and it dribbles all over the floor. These? Well, there's still a dribble but not as much as other filters.
summary: Works exactly as one would hope. Filters the water for the fridge and makes it taste better.

reviewText: These filters are terrible and not at all comparable to the higher priced Whirlpool filters. I purchased these to save a bit of money but do not trust them at all. To me, with the quality of these filters you are probably better off drinking tapwater. My guess is that there are more contaminants in the filter! They take forever to run clean.

With the Pr filter that originally came in my refrigerator being over $50 each, I was surprised to find these at such an outstanding price. They have been equal to or better than the original, in every way!!! My ice cubes even went from a frosty white to crystal clear!!! I don't know if these will last as long (I haven't had them long enough yet) but so far, so good!!

These filters are working great.  It took us a while to get them properly inserted but that seemed to be a problem on our end.  We had someone else insert the filter and it went in the first time.  I like the idea of the 2-pack because when it comes time to replace the filter again, we already have one on hand and we know it will work.

I was very excited to get this but was very disappointed. The large cubes are like little bullets and are hollow with no substance at all. If I didn't pull the cubes out of the basket right away, they would melt. I put in 3 liters of water and after 6 large ice cubes that were small,  the light to add water would come on, when there was plenty of water.

mY DAUGHTER AND SON-IN-LAW LOVE THIS.  THEY HAVE A NEW REFRIGERATOR WITH FRENCH DOORS AND A BOTTOM FREEZER.  THAT DOES NOT ALLOW FOR MUCH OF AN ICE MAKER UNIT SO WHEN ENTERTAINING THIS POPS OUT THE ICE IN RECORD TIME AND CAN BE PUT AWAY WHEN NOT IN USE.
summary: mY DAUGHTER AND SON-IN-LAW LOVE THIS. THEY HAVE A NEW REFRIGERATOR WITH FRENCH ...

reviewText:
Works well for my refrigerator! Installation is easy. Haven't had any strange odors ever since these were installed.
They'll come in pretty basic packaging, nothing special. But that's what was expected.  They'll be simply wrapped in plastic with no logos or other information, so if you don't know how to install the filters onto your refrigerator, make sure to read your manual.

They fit fine and were easy to install.  Honestly have no idea if they work as well as the originals but they were a heck of a lot cheaper and it makes me feel safe at night knowing there is a new filter installed.
summary: Works great as far as I know

reviewText:
These filters contain activated carbon which absorbs food odors from inside the refrigerator.  The filters from the manufacturer come in sealed wrappers.  These filters look like the original filters but since they are stored and shipped in an unsealed bag, there is a great chance the activated carbon has already absorbed odors and have been compromised in performance.

ONE SHOULD CONSIDER THIS BEFORE PURCHASING!
summary: These filters look like the original filters but since they are stored and ...

reviewText:
JUNK!!!!
Customer Service swapped it out with just as useless a machine. Wouldn't cool with a fan blowing directly on the vents. JUNK is just JUNK. Customer Service tried to help. They just need a decent product. I will NEVER buy a Tramontina product again. GOOD LUCK my record is 0-2 with this product. You would think the people selling this product might get the message. I guess GREED is good in this situation.

I am very happy with this product.  Instructions are included as well as a sticker for the date of install.
It was easy to install and we are very pleased  with the quality of the water.  Other refills  that we ordered previously did not include instructions and
we tend to forget the details.  It was shipped promptly in a bubble wrap package.
summary: I am very happy with this product

reviewText:
I've been using the filter for a few weeks now. I haven't had any problems and the water taste great.
I will be buying more at this price.
  Follow up , I did buy another filter and the water was lousy I will not be buying this filter again. I had good luck and good value with the first  one but the second one is so bad that I will not buy again.

We've been using it for months now and it has 2 problems, at least we're hoping it's the filter and not our fridge cropping out on us. The filter allows the water to shoot out so fast that it splashes back out of the glass everytime. We've also noticed that it sprays the ice cube trays so hard that the water that was meant to be our next batch of ice cubes, leaks out the bottom of our fridge, creating a dangerous and hard to notice puddle.

This is just as good as the higher priced name brand filters that I have purchased in the past. I have a whirlpool fridge. This is the 2nd time I have purchased this filter for my refrigerator and I will definitely be buying again in the future, as they need to be replaced about every 6 months (and that is the same even with the name brand filers). I have had no issues with it. The installation instructions were easy to understand and the installation was super easy.

We've used the PUR brands until we couldn't find them on Amazon. Thought we would try this one. Have been using this filter for almost two months. Not sure what it filters but the water tastes as bad as it did the day we installed it. I'm going to find a PUR and replace this thing.

We are very satisfied with the performance of our EcoBlueLife Premium Water Filter.  The price and quality of the filter is excellent. It is a great replacement for the very expensive manufacturer's filter. I would recommend this filter and will be replacing my filter every 6-months with a EcoBlueLife Premium Water Filter.

This product was slightly smaller than the filter that came with the fridge.  It was the correct filter, but because it was slightly smaller, it leaked.  I had to return it.  I ended up purchasing a more expensive filter from Lowes, which fits perfectly.

I had hoped that this filter would perform well, and I was prepared for the worst but I can honestly say that the water from the refrigerator tastes every bit as good as it did when I was using filters that cost twice as much as these.  They fit perfectly and have no issues that I am aware of.  I am very pleased with their quality and performance.
summary: and I was prepared for the worst but I can honestly say that the water from ...

reviewText: Not happy with this filter.  We installed it about a week ago and have noticed a chlorine taste to our water that has not gone away.  Other filters that we have used never have the chlorine taste.  I do not recommend this filter.

As others have noted, it seems like this filter allows water through more quickly than the original.  That worried me--if the water gets through faster, is it getting less filtered?--but the water tastes fine (in my home, you can clearly taste the difference between filtered and unfiltered water).

I was a little hesitant to try a different filter than we had previously used, but this filter works every bit as good as the more expensive filters we have purchased in the past. We have been VERY happy with our purchase and love that it costs a fraction of the price. Thank you so much for a cost saving alternative!
summary: Very pleased with our purchase of EcoBlue Life Water Filter

reviewText: I bought this filter for my KitchenAid refrigerator, to replace a filter that was causing problems. My old filter dispensed water much more quickly, loudly, and with a bang at the end of each water stream. This filter is silent and slows the water flow. The water also tastes noticeably better. I suspect my old filter wasn't doing much filtering. This filter is obviously filtering as it is supposed to. Though I believe this cost a bit more than my old filter, it's obviously worth it.

We purchased this ice maker because my husband had surgery on his shoulder to repair a torn rotator cuff. We had the opportunity to purchase an ice machine to place on his shoulder & alleviate the pain. The machine used 40 to 50 lbs. of ice daily! The Ivation Ice Maker has been amazing & kept up with the daily demand for ice!  The stainless steel looks beautiful in our kitchen!
summary: The Ivation Ice Maker Is Incredible!

reviewText: I love this ice maker.  It is very quiet and produces ice quickly.  It produced so much I had to turn it off for a few days because I ran out of storage to keep the ice.  I love the adjustable cube sizes and the red light turns on when it is time to add water.  I have only had this item for a few weeks but so far it exceeds my expectations!!

This is an excellent ice maker. use it at our lake house. It keeps on producing ice to the point where I run out of room in the freezer.

But note, this is a freezer, the ice will melt if left in the bin. Granted it recycles the water. Also, the ice does come out wet, so you have to break it up after you put it in the freezer.

Lastly, this thing is big and heavy.
summary: Excellent ice maker despite a few drawbacks.

reviewText: The instructions say to remove a reusable knob/cap from the end of the old filter - there is no knob/cap on the end of the old filter. The old filter works, with this one no water comes out of the fridge.  I haven't drunk water in days.  This product is actually killing me.
summary: The instructions say to remove a reusable knob/cap from the ...

reviewText: The filter is smaller than the HWF62 that it replaces. As a result, the air flow in the humidifier apparently goes around the filter and does not prduce the same moisture content as a real HWF62 paper filter. It does not use the water in the humidifier as rapidly as the paper filter and a hygrometer attached to the top of the humidifier indicates a lower moisture content. It will be returned!
summary: The filter is smaller than the HWF62 that it replaces ...

reviewText: Lasted a couple (maybe three) of weeks.  It stopped absorbing water. Followed instructions for light clean. No change. Followed instructions for medium clean. No change. Followed instructions for heavy clean. No change and by then it was pretty much falling apart..
summary: No change and by then it was pretty much falling apart

reviewText: i've been using this with my Honeywell humidifier for the last 10 days.  I really like the idea of a reusable filter but it just doesn't work.  I went from filling my humidifier twice a day to once every 2 days and my humidity is down to 10%.  Tried cleaning it with vinegar -- no improvement.

The description of these filters states that they are interchangeable with the original filters on my Whirlpool refrigerator that I purchased at Sears... They are NOT interchangeable and they don't fit and lock properly... Once again, this is an example of a knock-off product from China that doesn't measure up... I will go back to the filters sold by Sears...

PRO:

1.  Works like OEM.
2.  Easy install.
3.  Good for one year if you only use the ice maker.

CON:

1.  None

Other:

1.  RUN FIVE LARGE GLASSES OF WATER THROUGH THIS ASAP.
2.  Again, this will last a year, if you only use ice maker.  Just reset the filter notification on your appliance.
summary: What your refrigerator don't know... won't hurt it...

reviewText: I purchased this filter to replace my Whirlpool 4396701 model filter. Even though this filter is advertised as being a replacement for the model #4396701 filter, it does not fit. It will fit into the "socket", however, it will not turn to lock in place, thereby rendering the filter completely useless.

This filter is SO MUCH BETTER than those expensive Honeywell replacement filters. There is absolutely no comparison between the two. I'm glad I purchased the six-pack but I'm still on the first filter after almost two months of use!
 The quality is noticeably better. Like I said before....no comparison. Buy it.
summary: These are the BEST filters you can purchase...bar none!

reviewText: Ive tried a few different filters for my humidifier, and these are the best so far. The others were stained, falling apart, and clogged within a couple weeks to a month. So far in 2 weeks Ive seen no appreciable deterioration in this one, and the humidity level is much better. Good price for 3 filters, and I like the way the expanded metal is sandwiched between layers instead of being exposed. The outer layer is a stronger material than any of the others Ive tried as well. Highly recommended!

This is what I came to know and love in the old blue-coated Honeywell filters.  When Honeywell changed their filter to a cheap, coatless variety that cost too much and only lasted a few weeks, I was glad to find these replacement filters.  They last much longer and seem like the same quality I had come to expect in my filters.  I'm really happy to have found these, and in a three-pack for a great price!

So far I'm very happy with this purchase. It's a great price for these filters that often run $10 a piece. I used them in our two humidifiers last night and the whole tank emptied. That's a good sign because when our filters were getting old they wouldn't humidify anymore. I'll update this review if I find that the filters don't last as long as they should (at least a couple months each).
summary: emptied the tank in one night, great deal

reviewText: Installed this Pump to replace my defective Whirlpool drain pump and it works perfectly for about 1/3 the cost of the OEM Part. Fits perfectly. What I like is that I did not have to make any modifications for it to work with my washer. Also thanks to YouTube Videos that allowed me to diagnose my problem. My washer is now as good as new.
summary: Very good replacement to the OEM Drain Pump

reviewText: The ice maker came with no plug, it was cut off. I am going to try to splice a plug onto it, but this is not something I expected I would have to do. I had an ice maker someone gave me, if I knew I would have to do all this work, I never would have ordered this. Very disappointed. :(

This aftermarket ice maker is nearly identical to the OEM it replaced.  The only difference is the cable attached to it is slightly longer, which isn't an issue at all.  Installation was a piece of cake ... no need to pay a repair tech hundreds of dollars to fix a broken ice maker.
summary: This aftermarket ice maker is nearly identical to the OEM ...

reviewText:
Badass little fridge.

Actually not so little. It's huge and has plenty of room for a week's worth of breakfast, lunch and dinner materials for me.

I'm using it to keep a whole head of romaine, several breakfast biscuits, a couple small containers of milk, sodas, condiments, and cooked meat like fish fillets or burgers cold during the week so I don't have to cook every day.

Super handy to have. When I move in with the new roommates, it's going to become a beer fridge with late-nite snacks fridge.

LOVE it so far but only had it for 3 weeks. We will update at a later date. My only complaint is that the idiot FedEx driver left it in my driveway unattended and did not ring my bell (although all my lights were on!!). Thankfully I was home and noticed the box when I was about to pull the car out and leave the house. I'm glad it was still there....crooks are everywhere these days.

Very easy to put together.  It came with a 5 lb CO2 tank which was a plus at this price.  I bought a $5 thermometer from Walmart to stick on the inside of the door to check the temperature.  I watched a video on Youtube on how to override the thermostat to make the keg ice cold.  Very pleased with it.  Love it.

Bought this for my husband for his birthday. He loves it! It's very easy to set up. My advice if you are looking to buy one, or any tap system, is that you start looking around for a place that fills CO2 canisters. We have several welding places in town but none of them fill/exchange. We have to drive to the nearest big city to get this done. The plus side is, we have gone through 5 1/2 kegs and still have not had to fill/exchange the CO2.

Best washer made today, bar none. Forget the HE crap. Forget the computerized pieces of junk that do not get clothes clean. Get this one for doing what it's made to do, get dirty clothes clean. Get this one for one that will last and last. Get this one that's made in the United States, not one that's made with cheap cut-rate labor and don't send your money overseas.

After having two expensive Whirlpool washers fail in the past five years and getting no help from the Whirlpool tech who knows nothing about fixing a washing machine, I bought a good old fashion washer that is heavy duty and of commercial quality. This machine weights about 60 pounds more than my previous washers and is as solid as a battleship. This is a washer that may last me the rest of my life and when my Whirlpool dryer fails you can bet that I'm going to buy a Speed Queen dryer!
summary: I think that I'm in love.

reviewText: My wife and I did a lot of investigation before we bought a washer because we have many friends who have gotten the newer computer aided washers which control water level and most other features.  In short this washer, according to my wife, is fantastic.  It is quiet, cleans well, and she is able to control everything. As far as I am concerned it is great because it is very well made and most of all MADE IN THE USA.

fits perfectly on my stove top.  I am so glad I purchased it.  I wish it was a better quality, but it's the same as what came with my stovetop.  We've messed it up with hot pots on top of it.  But it is exactly what we wanted and needed

Nice replacements for the poorly designed originals.  While these are metalized plastic, just like the originals, they work fine and will last a long time if not improperly installed or abused.  These will eventually fail after a few years, just like the originals, and I'll buy them again!

It's quiet, it's fast, it looks nice, it does its job.  There's nothing to really dislike about this, except maybe the fact that the enclosure does not stay cold enough to keep the ice from melting.  By the time you have a full basket, the stuff on the bottom is almost gone.  Still, it keeps our drinks cold, so who cares?

I just love this ice maker. It makes three different sizes of ice and makes ice very quickly.  I like that it lets you know when it needs water.  I am so glad I ordered it.  It is in my kitchen because my ice maker on my refrigerator broke for the second time and I decided to take a chance on one of these ice makers. Works excellent.  No problems so far.

Can anyone tell me how to operate this machine? I just got it and I can't get it to do anything. I press the snowflake button. It comes on and sounds like it's going to run. I see water going somewhere, hear a low noise, get my hopes up, then it starts beeping and shuts off. The instructions are useless.
summary: It comes on and sounds like it's going to run. I called technical support and requested a call back today after 5. At 4:30 I cal

reviewText: This ice maker is soundless when making ice at a rate that is hard to keep up with.  I eat ice instead of drinking water so I was always buying ice because my refrigerator ice maker couldn't keep up with my demand.  This icemaker makes ice faster than I can use it and is in constant use.  The only drawback is that the instructions on how to use it aren't very clear.  I still can't figure out how to turn it off.  I just let it run out of water and it shuts its self down, it is a very good ice maker.

This vent duct is exactly what I needed. It was easy to install, and is long enough to reach wherever I need it to for venting. The aluminum seems sturdy, and I don't have to worry about it getting brittle as it gets older.

Adorable little piece that lets my husband know when it's time to empty the dishwasher. No more screaming across the house "dishwasher clean or dirty!?" It is a lot smaller than I thought it would be but it still works as intended
summary: So easy a husband can use it

reviewText: Works great. Except it beeps every hour. Tried turning off the timer, keeping the water filled to the top. Doesn't matter. And you can't turn off the beeping. If you're deaf, this is the ice maker for you.
summary: Perfect for those hard of hearing!

reviewText: As a building engineer I purchased this unit to check the performance of heating and air conditioning equipment accurately.  It does just that at a very affordable price.  It is eady to use and easy to explain to those who may ask questions.  It is the perfect choice for what I purchased it for.
summary: Gread performer at a great price.

reviewText: This is a great thermometer/hygrometer. I was prepared for it to be 2 degrees off but it is very accurate. It takes a few minutes to register the correct temperature. It is just what I was looking for!
summary: Great thermometer/hygrometer! Accurate and just what I was looking for!

reviewText: My stopper had become harder and harder to turn or get the magnetic thingies just right to make it turn on. I put off getting a new one for ages, because I didn't know if it was the stopper or something else. I wish I'd gotten this sooner!
summary: If your stopper is cranky, get this replacement!

reviewText: I'm not sure what possessed my husband to put our original Insinkerator stopper in the dishwasher several times over, but I highly suggest you DON'T DO THAT.  It completely ruined it and we were no longer able to even get it to fit into the disposal opening.  The replacement stopper works perfectly and we no longer argue over why the stopper was ruined in the first place.
summary: This replacement stopper spares me from having to argue with my husband

reviewText: GREAT FILTER!!!  Finally one that fits!  This is the actual UKF8001AXX filter.  UKF8001 is many times substituted for UKF8001AXX but it will NOT fit!  Look at the top of your filter - if you see a bunch of tiny holes it will NOT work in a fridge that requires the UKF8001AXX filter.  Physically it will fit, but you won't get even a trickle of water.  If you have one or two oblong holes, each about half a centimeter, this is the filter for you!
summary: Finally a filter that fits and works correctly!

reviewText: What a relief! Now we have ice when we need it. Our ice maker in the refrigerator is slowing down so much it is not keeping up with our demands. This ice maker has saved a lot of frustration for my husband and myself. Thank you for a great product!
summary: Thank you for a great product!

reviewText: I was so excited with my icemaker.  It was fun for the first few days, kind of a pain in the rear to have to keep checking the water level, but I loved the texture of the ice and how soft and chewy it was.  I've had the unit about 2 weeks and it quit making ice.  I tried all sorts of troubleshooting and nothing worked.  I am going to try and send it back for a refund.

This thing is slick and perfect for our RV. It doesn't hold much ice but it does make it fast. You'll always have enough ice for a few drinks but if you need more ready at a time you'll have to empty the bin into bags and put them in the freezer so the machine can make more. I'll be keeping it at work when it's not in the RV for the summer.

The Hygrometer Thermometer arrived with only the battery to install, and then It was on and displaying the humidity and temperature. There is a button to switch between Celsius and Fahrenheit. The display is easy to read.  It's accurate according to the thermostat in my home and weather forecasted humidity. I'm happy with this product.

The thermometer is cheap. The battery that goes in the back of the unit is too loose to power up the unit. A simple movement or step causes the battery to come loose and the thermometer turns off. I have to apply a lot of force to get the battery to connect. :(
summary: Battery connectivity bad, thermometer does not power on

reviewText: I have several acoustic instruments, piano, guitar, ukulele, drum and more. I live in an area that fluctuates between very dry and humid. It is important to monitor the humidity level. This little device works very well. The display is very easy to read and to the best of my knowledge, accurate.

We are using this in an incubator to hatch eggs and it is working perfectly. I really like the high and low setting so I can check and see if  the temperature has spiked and know that the eggs are doing well.
summary: I really like the high and low setting so I can check ...

reviewText:
This little gizmo is adorable at the size of a credit card. Functional and easy to set up!
But one fall on a hardwood floor rendered my cute little whirligig inoperable.
Seller contacted me, and offered a refund! WOW! I am so impressed! Such professionalism and award winning customer service is so very rare these days!
I recommend buying anything from this seller - including the Indoor Humidity Thermometer Monitor Sensor!!!

This humidity thermometer is nice and small just like I wanted. The display is easy to read. Having only three buttons makes the device very easy to operate. I'm glad I spent a few dollars more to get the one that suited my needs.

The fit was perfect and it got my washing machine working without leaving a puddle on the floor.  The hardest part was getting the old pump off the shaft and getting the shaft cleaned up enough to slide this pump on.  The old pump was apparently leaking for quite awhile before I noticed water on the floor.

Received this as a gift. Its very small. It cools off fairly quick, however, after 2-3 days of use it freezes over and quits cooling. Turning it off melts the ice and then you're left with a big puddle. Tried using it several different times and it froze over each time.
summary: Received this as a gift. Its very small. ...

reviewText: Just what I was looking for to replace my crumbling one. This cover is made of a nice quality plastic with a matte finish. I think this one will hold up better than my first one. Perfect fit, I would recommend this as a replacement any day.

I LIKE THIS BECAUSE IT IS SO WELL MADE.  VERY PRECISION.  IT HAS VERY LIMITED USE BUT FOR THE RIGHT OCCASION, IT IS THE BEST TOOL FOR THE JOB.  IT IS SMALL AND CAN BE CARRIED EASILY, OR USED ON A KEY RING FOR SOME PEOPLE, BUT MY KEY RING IS A LITTLE TOO FULL FOR IT.

I got my order superquick and the removal of my old filter and the installation of the new one was super easy. I can't speak for how the filter works because I don't have the ability to test for the contaminants it says it takes out of the system all I can attest for is how quick I got my product, and how easy the installation was.

This dryer works great.  My wife and I live in a townhouse and we hate going to the laundromat.  So we got this dryer and the Panda portable washer.  This dryer is nice and quiet, easy to set up, and works like a dream.  Wife is happy with it, which means my life is good!  Love this dryer!
summary: This dryer works great. My wife and I live in a townhouse ...

reviewText: I've only run a few loads so far.  Theres a surprising amount of heat, and it cycles on & off, so it won't overheat, I guess. Kept checking to see if it was still running because it's so much quieter than my old full sized whirlpool.  So far I'm very satisfied. It was easy enough for an old lady (me) to set up.
summary: Heat cycles on and off but the clothes get dried

reviewText: For the past few years, I've been washing our laundry by hand in the tub, spin-drying and hanging it in the apartment on racks to dry. The children are getting older and clothing takes up far more space on the rack. With it being winter it takes a lot longer for our laundry to dry. We have a small apartment and would rather not have racks sitting out for 16-22 hours a day. Our clothes can dry faster and we can use the floor space for other activities.
summary: For the past few years, I've been washing our ...

reviewText: This dryer does a nice job of drying clothes.  It takes longer than a standard dryer but it gets the job done.  The only thing I don't like is the lint trap is at the back of the drum and a bit tough to pull out and put back in but all of the compact dryers have their lint traps there so there is no getting around that. I am pleased that I don't have to make the dreaded trips to the laundromat.  I highly recommend this dryer.
summary: This is a mighty nice dryer for being so compact!

reviewText: I've had this for almost a year. This machine has seen daily use from a family of four. It takes longer than a regular dryer, but it is well worth not having to go to the laundry mat. This has saved me money and it's paid for itself since i bought it. I also bought one of their washers.
summary: I've had this for almost a year. This machine ...

reviewText: This dryer does a great job for being a 110v unit. I've been using it for 2 months with no issues at all. As others have mentioned, it takes longer to dry than a 220v dryer but that is to be expected. Make sure to keep the filter clean. I am also using the Panda PAN70SW washing machine. They look great with the dryer mounted on the wall above. Actually very impressed with the quality of both Panda products.
summary: Impressed with the quality of Panda products

reviewText: This dryer is bigger than I expected but it works great for an apartment sized dryer since I don't have hook ups. As long as I keep cleaning the lint trap, it should work great. It takes a little longer than a regular 240 volt dryer but that is to be expected. This is a lot better than the portable closet style dryer I first purchased. I returned the first one and decided to spend the extra money on this one and I feel it's worth it to not have to go to the laundromat anymore.

It takes a long time but i love my dryer it makes my house smell so good. I bought a detachable filter but I'm not using it very much not at all actually I just put a stocking cap over the filter and I let it air out I clean and I change the stocking once a month. As a New York City Housing Authority resident it's perfect for the 110 watt outlet.

I should have looked at the picture more closely. We don't usually buy 18 eggs at once. At least the container has a lid so we can stack things on top of it. These are all quite sturdy and fit well in our fridge.
summary: These are all quite sturdy and fit well in our fridge

reviewText: These are extremely high-quality clear plastic and I think they will be VERY durable. They are exactly the right size to maximize fridge space. I particularly love the covered egg holder! GREAT product! I'll be buying more of these soon, I'm sure!

Love these! My favorite thing about them is that I can easily take them out of the refrigerator when I'm making my lunch and need easy access. Will definitely be purchasing more at some point in the future.

I've had this for over a month and it's never really gotten cold enough for canned beverages.  It's also way too warm for beer.  It holds a lot of cans but maybe that's the problem.  It's just not powerful enough to cool the entire cabinet.  It's also got this bass humming that can be fairly loud in the middle of the night.  So far it's just not working well for me.

I've been using this beverage refrigerator for a couple of weeks and it works great. The beverages stay very cold. The only downside is if you aren't careful about closing the door gently, the door stays open.
summary: ... refrigerator for a couple of weeks and it works great. The beverages stay very cold

reviewText: This water pump was reasonably priced and arrived quickly.  Since we were able to find this pump, we were able to fix our washer instead of replacing it.  It was easy to put on but be sure to tighten the fittings on the hose so that it doesn't leak.

Not an OEM part as the seller describes it as.  Both the fittings are slightly smaller than the OEM Whirlpool part.  I tried upgrading the clamp to a screw type, but it still didn't seal the gap, leaving a leak.  I wrapped duct tape around both the fittings, to beef them up, and that is a temporary solution, but it still drips a little.  Wished I had bought the OEM part directly from Whirlpool's website.

My washing machine had a leak. After my husband did some troubleshooting, he figured out what needed to be replaced. He didn't want to have a repairman come, so he got the part and installed it himself. Yay!!!! Saved probably $75 by doing it ourselves.

I've only had this a few months and so far I love it.  It will hold A LOT of food!  So far, there is very little, if any, frost inside.  I don't have it in an ideal location, but that's my fault.  I searched around and this is a really great deal for a freezer this size.  I did also purchase the additional 3 year warranty, which wasn't much $$$.  So far, so good!!
summary: ... had this a few months and so far I love it. It will hold A LOT of food

reviewText: Very pleased with this freezer. Also the delivery. It was delivered a day ahead of schedule, and set in the exact place I wanted it. All I had to do was unpack it and plug into power and wait to cool. I highly recommend this freezer.

I love this freezer!  This is the third appliance I have purchased from this manufacturer, and I have yet to have any issues.  The freezer works great!  it is super quiet, and keeps your food good and frozen.  I couldn't be happier!

This freezer is perfect for a family of 1 or 2. It holds all the extras and so far I have not had to defrost it or see any signs of ice accumulating at all, none whatsoever. That was my concern, but I am glad I bought it. I bought extra baskets to go inside and that works well in separating the food. I recommend it. It doesn't take up much space either.

I bought this because our refrigerator doesn't have an ice-maker and there is no way to plumb a line if we get a new one.  This thing works wonders.  It makes tons of ice.  As soon as you take ice out, it makes some more.  It only takes about ten minutes to make a new batch of ice too.

I changed my old filter and installed this one with no issues at all. It works perfectly and my water tastes great. I don't even know how long it had been since the filter was changed, so the old one was pretty bad. Now, the water comes out faster and has no chlorine smell or taste at all!
summary: Oh, I'm supposed to change the filter?

reviewText: Paired the device with the app yesterday.  Where the app should have shown the humidity and the temperature, it displays N/A and N/A.  This morning I put in a brand new battery, unpaired the device from the app and tried to re-pair.  Couldn't do it!  Hopefully I can return this overpriced toy for a full refund.  UPDATE several hours later:  I just tried setting it up again, and it worked as advertised.  I did nothing differently from what I did earlier.
summary: Far worse than I ever anticipated!

reviewText: Essentially worthless. I've got Geib style cases, and the tape won't stick to the lining, so I'd have to remove it every time I moved the case. I had it in a case about 10 feet from my phone, and it wouldn't pick up a signal most days. I suppose I could lay the phone on the case, but that's a bit silly. A much better alternative would be the Oasis hygrometer, but that requires you to actually look at it to see the reading. Oh, the inconvenience.

Direct replacement at a fraction of the cost. If you've replaced your filter before, you know everything there is about the process. If you don't, these filters come with detailed instructions on how to do it right. I didn't expect it, but each filter came with a sticker to remind the user of when to change the filter.
summary: Direct replacement at a fraction of the cost.

reviewText: The filter for my GE refrigerator must not have been changed before we rented this house. The water was coming out of the dispenser at a trickle. I replaced the old filter with one of the filters from this order. The change was quite noticeable as soon as I used the dispenser again. The water came out in a strong stream, flowing much faster than before. Honestly, I can't tell if the water tastes any different but at least I know the filter isn't old and clogged.

We needed to replace our water filter so I did some research and when I found this deal I thought the price was too good to pass up.  We need to change our filter roughly every 6 months so we should have a ready supply on hand for a while.  Switched out the old one and replaced it with one of these and it didn't skip a beat.

What an amazing little washer. This is perfect for apartments and does the job well! Only thing that needed adjusting was the end of the pipe to fit over the faucet that fills the washer. But other than that I am satisfied with the product !

My della portable washer arrived today, and at this moment so to speak, I am currently using it, it a bit smaller than I anticipated..It's very light so I can move it easily...So far its working fine...I tried using the washer and the spinner at the same time..It did work fine, but while using both, the excess water that came from the spinner became stagnant under the bottom of the spinner...So Im guessing while using the spinner, you really have to put it on drain mode...Will update in a few days....

Bought this as a replacement for an old clunker of a washing machine.  I was a bit worried about how it would perform, but have found it to be perfectly serviceable.  Does a good job of cleaning, and if (sigh, if only) I keep up with the laundry pile I make, it works great.  I live alone, and it can handle the volume of dirty laundry I produce.
summary: Does a good job of cleaning

reviewText: Awesome portable dryer for use in any apartment. I like this alternative drying method. Definitely can't be left unattended especially with children around. During winter months, this dryer helps heat up the room.
summary: Awesome portable dryer for use in any apartment

reviewText: I couldn't have a washer or dryer so I opted for this with a portable washer.  It was much cheaper than going to the laundromat, and now that I live in a house with a washer and dryer, I'll still use this for things that can't go in the dryer.  I love it!

Perfect!  This was easy to install (5 minutes) and fixed the burner ignition problem.  The only "watch out" I would recommend is taking care to get the burner reset properly.  So much cheaper than calling an appliance repair outfit.  FYI:  If you are not sure how to install the igniter, there is a tutorial video on You Tube.  Cheers!

More and more often my washer was stopping because it was out of balance with the UL error. I did some research and the recommendation was to replaced the  Suspension Rods. I wasn't optimistic that this would solve the problem but figured I'd try this before buying a new washer. Sure enough, this has resolved the issue and it is back to normal.

I love this. It is perfect for my little apartment and the best part is that it's totally collapsible for storage. I was about to buy a Panda dryer for over two hundred and fifty dollars. This saved me two hundred dollars and has the clothes dry in two hours just like the Panda. Good buy.
summary: I love this. It is perfect for my little apartment ...

reviewText: It was a little difficult getting the old one out, but the new filter went in easily.  I am not particularly strong and needed pliers to get the old one out.  I look forward to better tasting ice and water!

I have only used this filter for about 1 month and so far it seems to be working o.k.  As of now, I love the price compared to the
the other brands that I have tried.  Time will tell if it is in fact as good as the more expensive filters.
summary: Price is Right. Not sure if it's as good.  Time will tell.

reviewText:
This replacement filter has done exactly what it is supposed to. My mother replaced her old one with this new one and has had no concerns or complaints. Highly recommended. Excellent product and excellent seller.
Disclaimer: I received this product at a discounted rate in exchange for an honest and unbiased review.
summary: Highly recommended. Excellent product and excellent seller

reviewText: Works great. Put it on a stool in the bathtub. Have a double extension cord to handle this machine and a spin dryer at the same time. I use a handheld showerhead to fill it, and there is no need for a whole lot of water or soap.
summary: Works great. Put it on a stool in the bathtub

reviewText: When I bought this filter it was sold as a replacement for the GE RPWF/RPWFE water filter. It does not work in place of the RPWFE. I notice that the description now says NOT RPWFE. I wish it had said that when I ordered. It would have saved me wasting my time and money.
summary: When I bought this filter it was sold as a ...

reviewText: My washer malfunctioned.  Through the internet, I learned that this part was what I needed and easily installed.  I went to the manufacturer's website and the price was $28.  Amazon had it for a little over $19 (that included shipping).  My husband fixed the washer and it is working fine now.

We tested this machine as soon as it arrived.  Works wonderfully, no complaints.  It will be used in Haiti for the non profit organization called EcoVillage: The Community Living of Haiti.  They will be working with the most malnurished children to get them back into good health and teach the parents what kind of food these young children need so when it is time to enter school, they will be able to attend.

This washer was just what I needed for my apartment. It took some trial and error to set up in a way that would work best but once I got the routine of filling and draining down it was easy. So much better than a laundromat!

Just used it once and never used it again. Do not trust the reviews. It is very inconvenient to use it because you have to change water manually. If you use too much detergent, it will take forever (you need to repeat adding and draining water many many times, otherwise your clothes will have a very strong smell of detergent) to rinse your clothes. If you are very busy, avoid buying this product or something similar. Better to buy a second hand automatic washing machine.
summary: It is not worth buying, 100% manual machine, very inconvenient

reviewText: We loved our washer! We lived in a small cabin with no washer/dryer it worked great for us. We moved and had it for a year until it died but that was okay because we got a washer and dryer it lasted long enough for us and it worked great!
summary: Great little washer and sponner, must have!

reviewText: I absolutely love this little machine.  I wait for several months to post my review. I can honestly say it works better than my large washer it's easy on water and electricity.  It's also my opinion it gets my clothes cleaner than my large washer.  If for some reason it stopped working I would buy another one to replace it.  Takes up little room in my kitchen so linens are always clean and ready to go.
summary: When draining the hose is at the bottom so it empties by gravity the hose can adapt to either side.

reviewText: We purchased this washer for our RV. I love it. Keeps me from hauling dirty clothes home or needing to find and sit in a laundromat. I have even used it at home for those small loads that you don't want to use a regular washing machine for.

I love this washing machine! It gets the job done really well. I live alone in an apartment and so, this is perfect for me. The clothes will wash clean if you don't overload the machine. The tube that connects to a faucet to get water in the machine has a small opening; I just fill the machine up with buckets of water (about 2 and a half). The clothes come out a little damp from the spin cycle, but mostly dry. You can just hang them out for a few hours for them to finish drying.

This washer is definitely a life saver. It cleans clothes just as well as a normal sized washer. It's everything I expected. I would recommend this to anyone who lives in an apartment complex that doesn't provide washer/dryer in your unit.
summary: I would recommend this to anyone who lives in an apartment complex ...

reviewText: We have a Frigidaire Pro refrigerator that uses these filters and we received the warning light that it was time to replace the filters. These were identical to the ones that came with the fridge and fit perfectly. We couldn't be happier with the purchase.

I'm impressed with the fair pricing and the quality of the product.  For some reason I usually get skittish about cheaper priced products on Amazon, but I found this water filter absolutely perfect.  It fits just like it should, and it works like it should.  Roll the dice on the cheap price!  You'll win with this one!
summary: but I found this water filter absolutely perfect. It fits just like it should

reviewText: At first it seemed like it'd work well, but after 3-4 weeks the fridge started to smell weird, like if it had a chemical spillage. Then the water and ice started tasting the same way. I just recently changed the filter for a different brand, and the problem went away.
summary: At first it seemed like it'd work well

reviewText:
I bought this unit to replace my failing original ice maker in my Samsung refrigerator.  It was easy to install.  It took me less than 15 minutes to remove the old ice maker and install the new one.  The original only lasted a little over 3 years.  Hopefully this new one will last more than that.
So far it is working like a charm.

If you are having problems with your Samsung ice maker, I recommend you buy this product.
My ice maker had a mind of its own and was terrible at producing ice. Finally I broke down and replaced it with a new one.
This new ice maker is well equipped to do the job. I am so glad I installed it, I now finally have ice!

Works really well, and am happy with the product.

Not much else to say.  Make sure it is the appropriate size for you (not too big, not too small) before buying.

I purchased this with my own money and this was not an item given to me free for evaluation/review. I am not associated with the seller and manufacturer in any way other than as a satisfied customer.

These were a perfect match for my washer flange/spider. The flange and bolts were corroded due to poor washing machine design. Had to  cut out the flange with a grinder to remove the old bolts. These bolts are the exact match.

These are not OEM Whirlpool filters.  They do not come individually wrapped (although some older orders did indicate that they were).  Mine arrived in two packages of four filters wrapped in a single plastic pack.  Once I opened the package to use one of the filters, the remaining three filters in the package were exposed.  The filters also have a smell to them.  I am not entirely sure that these aren't recycled filters.  I will be returning.  Don't waste your time or money!
summary: There's a reason the price seems too good to be true

reviewText:
These are the exact same filters as the one that came with my Whirlpool Refrigerator.  They fit perfectly and they go in with ease.  They last 6 months and I am hoping my refrigerator lasts a few more years, so I have enough for four years.

As you can see from my uploaded photo, these filters are exactly the same as my original... the one on the right is the original, the one on the left is the new one and as you can see, I received 8 with my purchase!

I've owned several of these ice makers and have had some problems with reliability.  When they work, they are great.  They produce chewable ice fairly quickly.  This last one I bought failed after a couple of months, but the company went out of its way to make it right by sending me a replacement at no cost to me.  If you need extra ice, these are great machines if you have some extra counter space.
summary: Good ice makers and great customer service

reviewText:
I've been using this ice maker for a little over a year now and it is still churning out ice perfectly. What works best for me is to use cold filtered water (a Brita pitcher from the fridge, in my case). This speeds up the ice making process and the ice "cubes" come out nice and big on the first cycle.

Very happy with the purchase.
summary: A reliable and excellent ice maker

reviewText:
Based on a suggestion from me, my wife bought this ice maker for my birthday in March 2017 and it stopped working 6 months later in September for no apparent reason.  It no longer makes ice at all so I now have a very heavy paperweight.  I tried to get help from customer service but they are difficult to contact and couldn't provide any constructive help when I did reach them.

Buyer beware

I got this for my office, and all the girls I work with absolutely love it. If I had space at home, I would totally get this, but with a small kitchen and small amounts of counter space, it just won't fit.
summary: and all the girls I work with absolutely love it. If I had space at home

reviewText: This stopped working slowly, which is really annoying. It worked well for a few months, then the ice cubes got smaller and smaller and now it just recycles water. Of course it's outside of the return window and the request to return has been denied - not a company that stands by their product, which is a shame.
summary: THIS WILL STOP WORKING AFTER A FEW MONTHS

reviewText: This machine is great!  My wife loves to crunch on the ice, and the ice from this maker is a little softer, so it's better for her teeth.  It also helps us keep up with demand in the summer when everybody wants ice for drinks.  The ice maker has not skipped a beat since we got it.  We plug it in, pour in the water and off it goes!  Could not be happier.

DO NOT BUY. It worked for a while and then started producing giant ice chunks instead of ice cubes. After a while that issue stopped and it worked for a bit, but now it just doesn't work at all! It will only produce ice cubes the size of my pinky nail. AWFUL.
summary: DO NOT BUY. It worked for a while and ...

reviewText: I bought this for a party I will be having and so far it works great. I was able to make the ice ahead of time which saves me from buy bags of ice. It works in a timely fashion. My husband thinks it was a great idea.

After years of either having to buy bags of ice or refilling ice trays, having access to a machine that makes ice is very welcome! I have only had it a few days but it is already making a difference in my home.

OMG, I am loving this ice maker. I've only had it a week and I have no idea how I've gone this long without it. I never run out of ice.
The only complaint is that it is a bit noisy, but I turn it off when I go to bed, & turn it on when I get up.
I'll have to update this after the party I'm having this weekend, but it's fine for me alone.

Thankful to have this gem of an appliance. I drink distilled water and wanted distilled ice cubes. This icemaker does not disappoint. Ice is produced quickly and relatively inconspicuously. No more buying bags of ice!

UPDATE!!!
This ice maker worked fine for a few months and suddenly the 'Add Water' light would come on when the machine was at capacity for water. Would love a remedy for this problem.
summary: Beware! Works for a short while

reviewText:
Stopped working after 4 months. Although I was happy while it was working, PLEASE BEWARE!! SELLER HAS 90 DAY RETURN POLICY!!!
WHAT TO DO WITH $124 ICE MAKER THAT STOPS WORKING?????????? THINK TWICE ABOUT THIS ICE MAKER AND THIS SELLER!!!
summary: Although I was happy while it was working

reviewText: I LOVE IT!!! I make ice every day with it... I load it and start it in the morning and it makes a big bowl of ice that keeps in my reefer all day and night for personal use... Highly recommended for those that like ice in everything...

I BOUGHT THIS PRODUCT DELLA ELECTRIC ICE MAKER MACHINE,IT DID WHAT OTHER PEOPLE REVIEWED,NICE SIZE ICE,DOESN'T STICK TO ANYTHING. RELIABLE MACHINE. I USE IT EVERY TWO WEEKS WHEN I NEED IT. GREAT MACHINE,COMES IN A SECURE PACKAGE AND DELIVERED ON TIME. GREAT BUY.

My unit arrived with a large dent in the back of the unit due to poor packing for the weight and size of the unit.  I would have kept the unit but it was dead on arrival.  The compressor refused to operate and as a result it would not make ice.  I might also note this is a very large unit.  It is much larger than the one it was intended to replace (which lasted less than one year).

This is one of the best products I've ever gotten. I don't have an ice maker on my fridge, and this makes up for it. The only thing to note, is that once the ice is formed and put into the basket... it is not kept cold and will melt. So you need to continuously move out the fresh ice that's made and put into an ice bucket in your freezer. It's not too large either. It fits on my kitchen counter top and doesn't look out of place or ugly. This is a great product. I definitely recommend it.
summary: This is one of the best products I've ever gotten

reviewText: Why did I wait so long to get one of these?  It cranks out ice in no time, and even comes with a scoop.  It's about the size of a bread-maker, so it fits very well on my kitchen counter.  It's NOT a freezer, so you'll need to move the ice from the maker to your own container in your freezer, but those are cheap and easy to come by. Love it!

We have been using the Della Premium Portable ice maker for several days and are very pleased with it.  It is easy to use and just keeps the ice coming.  Also, OneBigOutlet - Amazon Marketplace contacted us by email after we received the ice maker to let us know that they are available if we have any questions, concerns or problems.  That speaks very well for OneBigOutlet's customer service.
summary: Pleased with this portable ice maker.

reviewText: So far, so good. It's only been on less than 24 hours and it harvests every eight minutes or so. It arrived on the same day the appliance repair guy showed up to fix the ice maker in the fridge, so I don' see using it too much. But I can see how it would be a nice addition to a small party. It's also very quiet while running, but a little clanky when harvesting, but not bothersome.
summary: so good. It's only been on less than 24 hours ...

reviewText: We've had this ice maker for several summer months so far. It works quickly to fill up the ice bucket. If you keep up on emptying the bucket, you'll have quite a bit of ice in a relatively short period of time--shorter than an ice maker in a freezer.

This works really well.  It actually exceeded my expectations.  Will start to make ice in minutes.  I got it for my parents who live in a small apartment without an ice maker.  It gives them plenty of ice and is much quieter than I had expected.
summary: This works really well. It actually exceeded my expectations ...

reviewText: I have had this refrigerator for over a year now and it is still working as well as the first day I bought it. Very pleased with the look and ease of setup. Compliments the rest of my stainless appliances well and frees up some valuable refrigerator space.

So far so good! We've only had it installed for about a week, but it looks great in our new kitchen island and cooled down really fast. Unless the house is super quiet (never happens) you can't even hear it. It's installed on wood floors and there's no vibration whatsoever. I've heard beverage coolers don't last long, but I'm hoping those are only the ones with the fan in the back and that this one will last for many years to come.
summary: So far so good! We've only had it installed for about a ...

reviewText: These filters do not improve the taste of my water.  In fact, they make my tap water taste worse!  I've been using the Pur filters for years, and unfortunately those now sell for around 5x the price of these.  Sadly, I pre-ordered these too far in advance for when I needed them, now it's too late to return them and I'm stuck with chlorine-tasting water.  I tried both of the filters in the box, both the same.  Bummer.
summary: These did not work for me

reviewText: I have not had this product for very long, but so far I am very happy and have no reason to believe that it will continue to perform as advertised. It certainly is a great value when compared to the Samsung version.

Replaced my Samsung OEM filter with this one. Easy to install and so far is working just as well as the original Samsung filter. For a price that is about 1/3 of the Samsung price, it is well worth it.
summary: Easy to install and so far is working just as ...

reviewText: Worked great.  Accidentally chewed up one of my knobs in the garbage disposal.  After going without for a year, I finally decided to replace it.  This knob fit perfectly and other than being shinier than my older knobs, it's great and would buy again.

From what I can tell it does not filter Mercury, Pesticide (Carbofuran), Pharmaceuticals (Progesterone, Trimethorprim, Fluoxetine, Atenolol, Ibuprofen), Particulate chemicals (Benzene, P-Dichlorobenzene). Since most of this is found in your water supply, curious why you would waste your money?
summary: It's not a GE MFWP Filter....thoses certifications mean nothing.

reviewText: I'm afraid you get what you pay for here. In less than a month, the water started tasting like water you drink from a hose. It is so bad that my wife started buying bottled water. Not worth the money at all.
summary: Bad taste in less than a month.

reviewText: Great service, great product and a great price what more could you ask for. Do not see any difference other than they do not have the GE name on them and I got three for less than the price of one with the GE name on it. I will buy this product again when needed.

So far so good. The last heater I bought only lasted a year but when I opened this one it was much higher quality. The coil configuration and the plate holding the heater coils is much higher quality than the last one I bought. This one looks just like the original one.

I bought this about a month or so ago, and so far it's still working. Being so much less expensive than other places and brands, I was concerned about the quality. Fortunately, my concerns have been laid to rest. Buy with confidence, do-it-yourselfers!

My dryer had been turned into a "spinner" when the old heating coil shorted out. This was a relatively easy fix, but would have been easier if I wasn't jammed in a tiny laundry room contorting my 6'2" self to get a good angle to unscrew the old heating coil assembly.
summary: Easy fix and still going months later

reviewText: Didnt work for me. And it makes a loud noise when I remove the filter. Looks like pressure is getting built up and water is not flowing. Glad I removed the filter before it has blown up. Beware there are no returns if you run into the same issue. Seller does not accept returns.

It actually did not work on the old Amana dryer that I was trying to fix, because it was not the original thermostat that I needed (which is not found anywhere anymore).  But that is not the seller's fault. I tried to fix it with this similar looking thermostat, but it just did not work.

Shipped quickly and worked perfectly.  I had read some reviews about how flimsy this was but it seemed to me to be just as adequate as the OEM part.  We'll see how long it lasts but for now, I'd highly recommend it.  It was really simple to install it.
summary: I'd highly recommend it. It was really simple to install it

reviewText: It is not an OEM part but it fits and works fine. It does not come with any instructions and I wish it did. It took me some time to look online and finally found an youtube video to get an idea how to install it. It did not take long to take the old one out and put the new one on once I figured out the process. I have it for a month or so and hard to comment on quality at this time.

The product is exactly what I needed for my Kenmore refrigerator.  I was a little nervous ordering the 9083 when the manual specified a 9020 filter.  I double checked and found 9083 replaced 9020, so I ordered this filter.  I have to wonder what changed between the two filters?
summary: Exact Filter for my Kenmore side-by-side Refrigerator

reviewText: I love this clothesline. It's much bigger than I expected. It was easy to install, seems very sturdy and I've managed to hang a set of king-sized sheets along with another full load of laundry, all at the same time. I did my research before purchasing and most clotheslines in this style wouldn't accommodate all of that. I also like the green color. I definitely recommend this for anyone looking for a compact, removable clothesline.

I especially love that the price is so good for this product.  It came on time and in good condition.  It was also very easy to install.  I can't tell how well it works because I just got it a day ago, but so far so good.

These filters are fantastic! The water tastes the same as the name brand LG filters, but at a fraction of the cost. I'm just disappointed that I bought the name brand filters for so long before finding these.

**UPDATE** After using these filters for several months I just wanted to confirm my initial 5-star review. These filters last just as long as the OEM LG filters. My fridge recommends changing out the filters every 6 months, but these filters keep the water tasting great for even longer than that.
summary: Buy these! Don't waste your money on the name brand filters!

reviewText: This filter worked for about 2 days, then the water stopped flowing. It seems as if its back to being clogged, just like the one I replaced. I have not contacted the seller because I shouldn't have to. I do not have the time or money to return this item. I will simply wait a couple weeks, and buy a plug for my fridge, and then buy an inline filter. You guys can keep these. I will not be purchasing this item again, nor will I be recommending this item.

I have a wide gap between my washer and dryer so I need both (stapled together) to cover the gap. They work great! Some others I've tried are either "sticky" on both sides or they fall down into the gap. These are only "sticky" on the the one side and they stay where they're put. And, when something brushes against them, they still stay put instead of sticking to whatever brushed them. Just what I needed.

This set of rollers was purchased to replace GE dishwasher PDW8480J01SS original rollers, which were worn out.  The replacement rollers were an improvement over the old rollers in that they attach to the washer rack on both sides of the roller, rather than one side only as the original rollers.  The rollers were easy to replace and seem to be durable.  They roll in and out very smoothly and have a solid feel to them.  I am definitely glad I purchased them.

Great fridge! I wish it didn't come with a dent in the bottom but its ok, as long as the food stays cold. Another problem I found was that if you don't close the fridge all the way, it will freeze the rest of the food and not close.
summary: Great fridge! I wish it didn't come with a ...

reviewText: Do yourself a favor; buy something this large locally.  The item may be good, but by the time it arrived at my house the sides were all dented.  Of course the box is made with very heavy cardboard, so to unpack the fridge the box becomes basically destroyed, so now I have a dented fridge I can't return.  If you do decide to buy this fridge, please please please take your time unpacking it.  Don't break the box.  There is a good chance you'll need it.

What a life saver for my son. He lives in an apartment and they share washer and dryer with EVERYONE.  He is happy with the fact that he can use this in his own apartment and not have to run around bringing it home or up and down stairs. It works great and comes out clean and the dryer works fast.
summary: He is happy with the fact that he can use this in ...

reviewText: Works as well as the original as far as I can tell. I believe it improves the taste of the water and I can tell when it is ready to be replaced. They seem to last as long as the more expensive "name brand" options. The original replacement cartridge is several times more expensive and not worth it as far as I'm concerned.
summary: Works as well as the original as far as I ...

reviewText: These filters are so much more economical than the name brand and they work exactly the same.  They have a snug fit. I had the water tested and it was just as good as the water filtered by the name brand filters.

I bought these cartridges to replace a more expensive brand name. So far I cannot tell the difference in the way our water or ice cubes taste. I think these cartridges are doing what they need to do and I will purchase them again.
summary: No Taste Difference Less Expensive Than Brand Names

reviewText: Amazing! I don't understand the negative reviews! Just follow the instructions and your water will come out perfectly! I've been buying filters that cost $40 a piece and now I've found my go to that's so much cheaper and the water tastes just as good! Can't even tell the difference between my previous filters and this one! Thank you!
summary: Why I have not found this sooner?!

reviewText: These work every bit as well as the original filters and are much cheaper than the ones from your local home improvement or appliance store. I have purchased these multiple times and have never had any problem with any of them.
summary: These work every bit as well as the original filters and are much cheaper...

reviewText: I am picky when it comes to how my water tastes (or doesn't).  I was hesitant to try a new brand as some filters I've used have left a strange taste behind.  These filters do not taint my water with any flavors, scents, or particles.  They also come with reminder stickers of when you should change your filter if your fridge hasn't warned you already.

This is a non-Whirlpool replacement for a Whirlpool refrigerator water filter. It fits like the original filters and doesn't change the good taste of the water; but it's quite a bit less expensive. So there's nothing not to like....

I am actually using these filters on a Whirlpool water filtration unit for a separate faucet on my sink.  Whirlpool is not making these filters anymore, and they are a perfect fit.  Ideally, the water tastes much better as opposed to my highly outdated Whirlpool water filter.

I purchased this for a refrigerator that came with my newly purchased condo  I was so pleasantly surprised at how great the water tasted. It is by far the best filtered water I have ever tried.  Very inexpensive as well. A win-win

These are perfect replacements... easily installed (took me less than a minute to remove the old one and install the new one).  The quality is at the level we expected and we are using these going forward. These cost about 1/3 of the price at Sears and do the same job.
summary: You  will love these water filtration replacements for ease of use and built in quality!

reviewText: I needed to replace my water filters and was able to order two, with one being used as a back-up.  They arrived on time and I was able to replace my old filter with the new one that I just purchased.  Easy to install.

This is my second order of this product and I am very happy with it.  It's convenient to order the two-pack, so that when I get the notification that it's time for a new filter I already have at least one on hand.  When I have used the second filter in the two-pack, I immediately order more, so that I never run out.

Highly recommended, and delivery is very speedy!
summary: ... second order of this product and I am very happy with it

reviewText: It is always nice to have a water filter around the house when you need it.  I always keep one on hand for when the refrigerator signals that it is time to change it again.  These filters have worked out very well for me and I will always be a repeat customer.
summary: Great filters at an outstanding price.

reviewText: These worked perfectly in our Samsung refrigerator.  Unfortunately for us, our refrigerator's compressor died an untimely death and, after spending a ridiculous amount of money getting it fixed, it burned out and we had to buy a new refrigerator.
summary: Great Product for a Great Price

reviewText: These filters fit my refrigerator perfectly and work just as well as the ones that are three times more expensive at Lowes.  I got tired of spending quite a bit of money for these filters at Lowes and finally found these.

This is the second time I have ordered this product. It is just as good as the more pricey one and there have been no problems with it. I am on a fixed income and will definitely order this again. If you have this Samsung product and are looking for a quality product, this is the one you want. I will provide an update if I see any issues with it.
summary: Save some money - buy this one!!

reviewText: When we purchased a Samsung refrigerator I was shocked at the $40.00 cost for the replacement water filter. When I saw the Waterdrop filter on-line, I was wasn't sure it would work because of all the "warnings" from Samsung about not using their OEM replacement filters. But at a third of the Samsung price I gave it a try. It fits and functions exactly like the original filter. I would highly recommend this product.

I refuse to pay for the OEM Samsung replacement filter.  As far as I can tell, the Waterdrop filter equals the Samsung in all respects and we always use a Waterdrop when we change the filter.  Over the years we will save hundreds of dollars.

Having read a bunch of reviews that the product was too long or that it leaked, I was a little hesitant to purchase it, but the amazing price lured me in. They're awesome! They look exactly like the original, fit perfectly, and don't leak. I'd highly recommend these!

So far so good.  It installed with ease and the water pressure wasn't diminished at all. With other water filters in the past, they were good at the beginning but petered out in less than 3 months, so as of right now, I'm very happy with Waterdrop.  If I have a problem after some time, I will revised my review.
summary: So far so good.  Happy with this filter.

reviewText: Count me among those that thought it was fabulous for a week or 2, then very suddenly the water tasted as if it wasn't filtered at all.  Maybe I got a dud, but I'm shocked these are rated as well as they are.  For fun, I might buy another (since they are so cheap, and I hate to give up on them).  I'm really hoping I just got a defective one.
summary: For fun, I might buy another (since they are so ...

reviewText:
This is the first time I bought these, as I've used the Samsung brand and the Best Buy Insignia brand prior to buying these.  The main reason was the Insignia branded ones rose in price, and were 2 filters for $49.99.

So far I have no complaints on these.  They fit perfectly, don't leak, and everyone has no complaints on the water's taste.  If these keep working as they have so far, this will be my new 'go to' replacements since these are much less costly.
summary: as I've used the Samsung brand and the Best Buy Insignia brand prior to buying these

reviewText: When you see an offer for 4 filters for less than the price of 1 brand name filter, you might be skeptical about how well they will work. I took a chance on these filters, and have been very happy with them. They fit perfectly on the first try, and the water tastes good. No complaints so far!
summary: A good, and less expensive, alternative

reviewText: Some of the other reviews said this filter leaked. I've used it for a couple of weeks now and no leaks. The only issue I encountered was lots of air coming out while I was dispensing the first couple of gallons to clean it out, so that made a bit of a mess. The instructions don't mention anything about dispensing water to clean it out, but the water was dark and greenish until I had taken out at least 2 gallons.

Works just as well as the OEM version. Replace these every 6-9 months to ensure the flow rate is highest. If you leave them in longer, the flow rate decreases and eventually the water starts to taste like it comes from the faucet.

Works fine. I was a little apprehensive when I read reviews that said some folks were having trouble with the fit. No problem. It is a good snug fit. No leaks, Everything seems to be operating smoothly. So far, so good.
