summary: Works fine. I was a little apprehensive when I read ...

reviewText: I agree with the review that compared the noise this thing makes to a jackhammer. Absolutely awful racket! I traded the first one for the second one in the box. Same racket. Adjusted the water pressure. Same racket. I guess it's best to pay the higher price for the real thing.
summary: I guess it's best to pay the higher price for the real thing

reviewText: Given the huge disparity in price between this and the brand name, I gave this a shot.  After a few days, I haven't had any leaks or other issues, and this has worked fine.  Time will tell whether this continues to work as well as the manufacturer's filter, but I've been very pleased so far.

The filters seem to work well when first installed and then, after two weeks, the power of the water stream reduces to a trickle. These do not work!!

I did not write this review or purchase this product!!! This is a scam!!! I do not use or have use for these filters.
summary: The filters seem to work well when first installed and ...

reviewText: This water filter is just like the original Samsung version. It is NSF Tested and Certified. I'm going to buy a bunch more to have on standby.  I was a little reluctant buying an off-brand filter but this one is just perfect. So glad I didn't waste my money on something else.

I was scared to buy this for a while because it was SO MUCH cheaper than the filters we were buying before but after using this, I will definitely be ordering these from now on. I couldn't taste any difference in the water, and haven't had one problem with it. Now I'm just sad that I wasted so much money in the past when I could have been saving money this whole time.
summary: Now I'm just sad that I wasted so much money in the past ...

reviewText: This filter is EXACTLY the same as the one that came in the refrigerator.  EXACTLY THE SAME as the one the store wants to charge $49.99 for.  Isn't that amazing?  Naturally it works well, no problem at all.  Why go to a store wwhen you can get the same for a fraction of the cost?
summary: Perfect and at a great price

reviewText: THIS FILTER WAS A PERFECT FIT FOR MY SAMSUNG REFRIGERATOR. THIS IS MY FIRST TIME PURCHASING THIS BRAND. THE QUALITY IS REALLY GOOD AND THE WATER TASTE GOOD. THE INSTALLATION WAS EASY ALL I HAS TO DO WAS TWIST IT CLOCKWISE TO INSTALL. I HAVE BEEN USING IT FOR MORE THAN A WEEK WITH NO LEAKS. I AM VERY HAPPY WITH THIS PRODUCT AND WOULD PURCHASE IT AGAIN. WHEN I FIRST INSTALLED IT I DRAINED OUT ABOUT ONE GALLON OF WATER. I RECIEVED THIS PRODUCT FOR  A DISCOUNTED PRICE OR FOR FREE FOR MY HONEST REVIEW.

I waited a little while to leave a review for this because I wanted to make sure it didn't leak.  All I can say is these filters are WONDERFUL!  I've now said goodbye to the pricey, expensive filters & I will now only reorder these.  I can't tell any difference in the water quality, and they are so much more affordable.  Great purchase!
summary: Good tasting water, no leaks, great price!

reviewText: Since this wasn't an LG product, I was concerned it would not work properly in my refrigerator. I was pleasantly surprised. It was so easy to install and works perfectly. Thank you for a less expensive product that works just as well. I will definitely purchase from you again.
summary: Just as good as the LG brand

reviewText: Installs quickly and easily. No leaks. Water flows at the right rate and tastes great. There are even stickers to mark when you  need to replace them. What can I say? At this price I can see actually replacing our filters as often as we're supposed to replace them.
summary: 3 for less than the price of 1 at the big box stores.

reviewText: This product is NOT the same as the filter I bought at the hardware store.  I sent it back.  It fit, but didn't have the ability to filter out nearly as much as the one I was trying to replace.  Sometimes, you look and look until your eyes are crossed.  This one said something somewhere in the description about being a replacement for the MSWF, and when it came it was GSWF.  I don't remember what the G stands for, but the MSWF I believe means Multi-Stage Water Filter.
summary: This product is NOT the same as the filter I ...

reviewText: It was tricky to get all the bubbles out and no I didn't get them all out.  I suggest you unroll it and leave it unrolled for a couple of days.  It is thicker than contact paper so as I said it is a little tricky but it looks great.

Wow was I happy I got this filter.  I've been buying filters for some time now and have paid a fortune in buying them.  I finally found a
Refrigerator water filter that does what it says it will and at a reasonable price.  I plan on buying this water filter from now on.  Awesome!!!  I'm so glad I tried it.
summary: Fantastic refrigerator filter for my Samsung!

reviewText: Was hesitant to use this at first but for the price I had to give it a shot. I do not regret my decision either. I've found that this water filter works just as well, if not better, than the OEM water filter that came with our GE refrigerator.

I am very pleased with this filter. The original filter was easy to remove and this one was just as easy to install. So far no issues, no leaks etc. Nice sticker to place on new filter so you can remember when you changed it. 5 STAR PRODUCT
summary: Great Filter, Easy to work with.  5 STARS

reviewText: This filter works great in my refrigerator. I drink a lot of water and I use it for cooking so it's important to me that I have a working filter. The water tastes great and the filter fits perfectly in my GE appliance. It can't be beat for the price.

After I installed this, I pressed the water dispenser button and water shot out everywhere. It's like it had super built up pressure in it. Not to mention the filter came with a chipped piece of plastic at the top. Was really hoping this would work...

Instead of ordering the more expensive Brand I decided to try this one since the reviews were generally positive. It was easy to install and although it's only been a week or so, it appears to be working just fine.  I would order this type again and may be more inclined to replace it regularly due to the lower cost.

Something was wrong with the filter as it left the water with a terrible taste. We've had the refrigerator for five years now, and have used and changed filters when they've needed to be changed. However, this filter did not do the job. The water had a terrible taste and smelled. We bought filters elsewhere.
summary: ... the filter as it left the water with a terrible taste. We've had the refrigerator for five years ...

reviewText:
This product was easy to install, no leaks as of 1 week. The water tastes good and appears clear. I will subscribe to this product on a regular basis.

I've tried other filters that required 5 minutes of flushing before the water would clear. I did not experience that same problem with this product.
summary: This product was easy to install

reviewText: This is a very inexpensive replacement filter and is the second one I've ordered over the course of a year.  Since they are a fraction of the cost of other filters and seem to work just fine (and are easy to install), I give it a five.

We haven't had the best of luck with GE filters over the years and they are so expensive I wanted to give something else a try. The filter fit perfectly and appears to work well. The water has no taste. I would like to say it's as good as the GE but I actually think it's better and way less expensive. Next time I'll order the two pack.
summary: We haven't had the best of luck with GE filters over the years and ...

reviewText: This filter is a perfect replacement to our previous GE filter. It filters the water just as good or better than the one it replaced AND the water pressure has increased due to it's high flow rate. We are VARY happy with the purchase and will buy it again when the time comes. GREAT REPLACEMENT!!!

I have purchased this filter twice.  It works perfectly at a fraction of the cost of a OEM GE filter.  Maybe it is my imagination but it seems to me that the OEM GE filter restricted the flow of water more than these filters.  I seem to get a better stream of water out of the water dispenser when I use the Waterdrop filters.  I will purchase them again when I need more.
summary: Have purchased these filters twice.  Great replacement filter.

reviewText:
This water filter is incredible. I moved to an area with hard water that tasted like sulfer so I bought this filter. It was a fraction of the cost of other filters on the market so I decided to give it a shot.
1. Instantly improved the taste of my water. No more sulfer taste.
2. Refer too 1.

Let me say that I am very satisfied with the purchase of filters for my fridge.  The order arrived on schedule and the filters fit perfectly.  In the past I have ordered from other suppliers only to find that the filters did not fit my model.  Not this time!  Thank you and I will be a return customer.

It's the second time I am using this particular filter. I like that the water flow is fast in comparison to other filters I have been using in the past. Easy installation without any water spillage. In the beginning there were dark particles in the water but they cleared up after 1-2 gallons of water
summary: I like that the water flow is fast in comparison to ...

reviewText: When inserting the first filter of four, it took a while for the flow to reach the normal level.  After re-inserting the filter a couple of times the flow normalized and the filter seems to be working just fine.  I am very happy with the product; the price was right, the shipment was executed as promised and the filter works to my full satisfaction.

I cannot believe the price of these.  I was going to have to pay something like $40 for one for my refrigerator (first time replacing filter) or maybe even $60.  I saw these and decided to give them a try.  I was a little skeptical but they work great!!!

I am always cautious when it comes to "compatible" items; I generally buy one to see if it is truly compatible. These filters are absolutely compatible with my fridge. They fit well, the water is just as clean and crisp as it was with the OEM, and finally, the order arrived in just a few days even though we were in the middle of the holiday mailing season. I will most definitely buy this filter again and feel no reservation in recommending this filter to other shoppers.
summary: I am always cautious when it comes to "compatible" items ...

reviewText: This filter offers the same performance as the GE Appliances MWF filter at a much lower price point per unit.  Further, the GE filter is rated for 300 gallons, whereas the Waterdrop MWF filter is good for 350 gallons.  Both filters have the same 0.5 gpm flow rate.
summary: Same Performance as GE at Less Than 1/3 the Price

reviewText:
Water was great for a couple of days.

I've been cycling through all the MWF compatible filters on Amazon and so far nothing has matched the OEM. This filter was great for a couple of days and now, literally six days later, the water is marginally better than tap. There was a week where there was no chlorine smell but that's about it. I think there are better generic filters on Amazon. Not a fan of this one.
summary: Water was great for a couple of days... week later chlorine is back.

reviewText: Installed this to replace the Whirlpool brand. Have been using it for the last 3 weeks, and there is a marked improvement in the water flow to the icemaker and the door dispenser. The instructions that came with these units states that they are only good for 6 months rather than the full year of the Whirlpool version. We'll see if they last that long and give an update then.

I haven't installed these yet, I purchased them so I would have them on hand when needed.  They appear to be of good quality and I can't imagine they will not work every bit as well as any other filter I could have bought.

I tried all three of these in my refrigerator. I made sure that I got the correct ones for my model. I ended up going to a local appliance store to get the filter. They told me that I should never have purchased this one because it's not a good fit for the General Electric Refrigerator that I have. Live and learn.

These work great and fit just like the ones I got at Lowe's before. I can't believe that I paid more for 1 filter than what these 3 cost. I was skeptical at first that it was too good to be true, but so far these filters work great. I can't tell any difference between these and the more expensive ones.
summary: I'll never buy my filters from a big box store again

reviewText: Some reviews complain that this filter is not NSF 53 rated (which removes cysts and other micro organisms). Like most filters of this style, it's rated NSF 42 for taste, odor and esthetics. If you NEED a filter better than NSF 42, you've got more problems with your municipal water supply than can be addressed with a simple refrigerator filter.

I bought these to replace in my fridge. I was hesitant to buy an off brand, but I'm so glad I did. The water tastes refreshing and very purified. I won't buy the overpriced LG brand anymore. This brand is just as good at a much cheaper price.

We switched to these filters when we realized we could get THREE of these for about the same price as one LG OEM filter at our local Home Depot. LG must be making a small fortune selling overpriced replacement water filters and air filters.

Bottom line: The water tastes just as fresh with this filter, and it fits perfectly as a drop-in replacement to the original LG filter.
summary: Your family won't notice a difference after you switch to these filters, but your pocketbook will

reviewText: LG brand replacement filters are ridiculously overpriced, so I decided to take my chances and order this three-pack. I was not disappointed. The filters fit perfectly and they do their job. If you want to stop paying for overpriced replacement parts, I highly recommend these.
summary: A Perfect and Less Expensive Option

reviewText: This product is better than the original LG filter that came with my refrigerator. The water quality is equal.... I like this product more because it allows my water to flow faster than the original filter. Most of all I like the price...

Works fine, no taste of anything foreign in the water.  No turbidity or any sign the filter is not working properly.
Just a warning, previous filters I have used have had grey "dust" from the filter media in the first few cups of water.  The first cup of this water came out black.  I would assume Waterdrop uses a different filter media.  Do not freak out if the initial color is not what you expect.

I changed my original review, as I was having a great deal of difficulty installing this filter.  After further consideration, I put a small amount of Vaseline on the O-Rings and was able to install the filter.

My original review was not so good, so I am happy to be able to upgrade it, as I do not like giving bad reviews.

Water quality and taste is good, and unit does not leak.

MUCH less expensive than GE's prices, and while some warn that you MUST use OEM for this, I see no differences.  They last the same amount of time without noticeable degradation, and are just as easy to install and remove as OEM.  I see no reason to pay the HUGE premium demanded by GE.  This works.
summary: and are just as easy to install and remove as OEM

reviewText: I am not inclined to buy original (OEM) filters because they are excessively priced.  I have purchased non-OEM filters but they are still over-priced or do not fit well.  This filter is priced very well and fits perfectly.  I am glad i fount it.
summary: I am glad i fount it

reviewText: The filters were delivered quickly and the price was right. Install was a bit of a hassle, but that was because the previous owner of the unit did not have a filter in place and the mineral buildup made the removal of the cap difficult. Once I got the cap off and installed the new filter I was very pleased with the water quality. I will definitely be ordering these again when I need to replace them.
summary: Once I got the cap off and installed the new filter I was very pleased with the water quality

reviewText: The installation of the filter was quite simple. I mean how hard can it be to twist & push. The first thing I noticed was the flow through  this filter is greater than the filter that came with the refrigerator. I don't know if that means anything but I like it. I did not notice any change in the taste of the water compared to the previous filter. There was no discoloring and right from the start the water was clear. I'm fine with the filter and I'd buy it again.

I was very pleased with this new water filter for my KitchenAid  refrigerator.  It is the perfect replacement for the PUR filter that is no longer available.  The price was right, replacing the old filter was very easy to do.  The filtered water & ice cubes have a nice fresh taste.  I have already put in an order for a spare to keep in my kitchen drawer.
summary: This a great water filter to replace the PUR that is no longer available

reviewText: I had received a notification that my order was temporarily out of stock, but still received it about the time I had originally expected it to arrive. I appreciate that I was able to order 2 at once for what I considered to be a fair price.  Will definitely order again when it is time.
summary: I had received a notification that my order was temporarily ...

reviewText: We purchased these for our whirlpool that is located in the RV. We were having issues with the filtered water coming out too slowly. It was driving me mad. We bought these and now the water flows quickly and tastes great!
summary: We bought these and now the water flows quickly and tastes great!

reviewText: Seems to be doing its job. I replaced it and just like any other filter, I had to run a couple of glasses of water through the filter to clear it. Once that's done, water flow is very good, much stronger than previous filter. I do not have a PH meter but I do have a sensitive taste, and the water tastes the same as the original filter.

We have a Maytag refrigerator.  I purchased the "Waterdrop" UKF8001 Replacement for Maytag UKF8001, 469005, 4396395 Refrigerator Water Filter.  The "Waterdrop" was easy to install.  Then we ran 2 gallons of water through the filter, and declared it ready for use.  The water is clear, the taste is good, and we are pleased.  Have set it up so we will receive a NEW "Waterdrop" every 5 months.  One less thing to worry about.

I purchased a 2 pack of replacement cartridges from Waterdrop in order to replace the original cartridge that came with our refrigerator.  It was very easy to replace the cartridge and the quality appears to be the same as the original manufacturer cartridge.  The price for a 2 pack was very reasonable so I would not hesitate to purchase them from Waterdrop again.

DOES NOT WORK in our Whirlpool. I ordered it to replace the original filter.  I had to wait for the refrigerator to "tell me it was OK to replace the filter."  The Change Filter light never went off and now two weeks later it is telling me to Replace Filter. The water flow is much slower than the original filter and since I had to wait to replace the filter the window for a return has closed.  I did not even consider the time to return would expire so quickly.  I WOULD NOT Recommend this product.
summary: I WOULD NOT Recommend this product

reviewText: Bought one of these to replace the recommended brand at a fraction of the cost more than a month ago. It was easy to install and it has worked flawlessly since. I plan on buying another when the time comes.
summary: Much cheaper than the name brand

reviewText: When I couldn't find the water filter for our Kenmore refrigerator on the Sears website, I tried this. We've had the filter in place for about a week now, and it's working fine.  Simple instructions, no problems.
summary: Good savings when comparing prices of other replacement filters...

reviewText:
This water filter works perfectly!  Do not waste your money on the expensive one that the refrigerator manufacturer recommends, this does the job just as well for little cost.  I will definitely buy this again when it is time to change my filter.

As a side note: When you do change the filter in your fridge, it will sputter and spit water for a few seconds.  Do not freak out like I did!
summary: Do not waste your money on the expensive one that the refrigerator ...

reviewText: We hadn't changed the filter in our fridge since we moved in and the water flow had become a trickle. With the new filter the water tastes great and we can fill a glass in just a few seconds, just like new!

We were long overdue to change our water filter and finally sat down to find one that would work. We had previously ordered from amazon but the one we had ordered before was no longer in stock. Came across this one and checked to make sure it would work and it did. Received it in fairly quick and changed out the filter and it worked like a charm. Price was great to. Would definitely order again when the time comes.

This product is a total crapshoot. Or maybe just crap. I had one of these filters that worked for a few months, then stopped allowing water to flow through it. I ordered a replacement and the new filter did not work at all. Fortunately, Amazon refunded my money and I bought a different brand. I will not go back to the Waterdrop. Too much time wasted.
summary: This brand of filter is very unreliable

reviewText: I tried another brand and I was so disappointed.  The water tasted like mildew.  It was strange because only a couple of us found it repulsive.... others found it fine.  However,  these are perfect!!!  The water tastes great to everyone!  These are just like the original Maytag filters.  Thank you!!!!
summary: I tried another brand and I was so disappointed. The water tasted like mildew

reviewText: These filters were the same as the ones that came with our refrigerator (JennAire) but are about half the cost of those I could get directly from JennAire. I am once again confident that the water and ice in our refrigerator is adequately filtered.

This is so cute. I'm a dog lover and on the reverse side of the magnet is a dog's hind end with the dog's front end inside a garbage can and it says "Dirty". The magnet is heavy enough to stay in place on your dish washer without slipping or falling off. I've had mine about a month and love it.
summary: I'm a dog lover and on the reverse side of the magnet is a dog's hind end with the dog's front end inside a garbage can and it says "Dirty"

reviewText: I ordered the Wine Chuckle Dish Doggy Dishwasher Magnet to replace an old magnet.  Shipping was very fast and I absolutely love the adorable magnet!  It's so cute!  It's also the perfect size.  Not too small.  Not too large.  It makes me smile every time I turn it over.  It makes doing dishes so much fun!  LOL! The company that sells the magnet is very responsive and concerned about your satisfaction.  I would highly recommend purchasing the Wine Chuckle Dish Doggy Dishwasher Magnet!
summary: Shipping was very fast and I absolutely the adorable magnet! It's so cute

reviewText: This was a great purchase! The selling point for me was that the magnet was two sided, with clean on one side and dirty on the other.  I'm very happy with this purchase.  It is well made and will last forever.  The pictures on both sides are cute.  Well worth the low cost.
summary: This was a great purchase! The selling point for me was that ...

reviewText: This amazing product should be a standard in every household.  It was exactly what I wanted and was delivered on time in a damage proof container in perfect condition.  Every dishwasher and washing machine should come with one of these in the box.

This is the perfect dishwasher magnet for "dog people."  It's made of good quality and it's strong enough to stay in place but not so strong that it's difficult to remove and turn over to change from "Clean" to "Dirty".  We have a stainless steel dishwasher so the gray background coloring of the magnet blends nicely with our dishwasher.  And the surface is smooth so it won't scratch our dishwasher.  The delivery was quick and the price was reasonable so overall I would recommend this product.

Good visual management - we use it for our dishwasher.  We do not always completely unload the dishwasher right away, so when it's opened and closed, the "clean" light indicator also goes off, even though the dishes remaining are still clean.  This solves the problem.  Also fun for our kids.

This magnet is so cute.  I love the playfulness of the pictures on each side.  It solves the problem of letting people know if the dishes are clean or dirty with just a quick glance.  The magnet is very strong and sticks to the side of my refrigerator for all to see.

So cute.  When we bought our first dishwasher I knew we needed one of these when my husband assumed the dishes were clean when they weren't.  I had heard of magnets with clean and dirty on them.  When I saw this magnet with a dirty dog on one side and  dog in the bathtub for the clean side I knew this was the one for us.  We love our dogs in our house and this magnet made us laugh, so thank you.
summary: Such a cute dirty/clean dishes magnet.

reviewText: I purchased this as a gift for a man who is re-doing his kitchen and he said that it would go with his new dishwasher perfectly!  He LOVED it because he is also a wine drinker and it gave him a chuckle!
summary: He LOVED it because he is also a wine drinker and ...

reviewText: I love this double sided magnet! It is thick and sturdy,  and appears to be well made. It sticks well to our stainless steel dishwasher and the pictures make us smile. We have used it for about 2 weeks now, and it has prevented the usual kitchen squabbles when loading the dishwasher.  ;)
summary: I love this double sided magnet

reviewText: Love this cute little magnet! Unfortunately it does not stick to our dishwasher. Nothing wrong with the magnet, it sticks to our fridge just fine. We keep it on our fridge. His hands point to our dishwasher so its perfect!  Gone are the days of my husband always asking whether these dishes are clean or dirty!

What can you say about a dishwasher magnet. Looks good and it sticks well. If we can just get into the habit of using it. I thought it a bit pricey after I saw it, but it appears well made and will do the job .
summary: It works if you remember to use it.

reviewText: I haven't tackled cleaning my ignored oven as of this day but when I do, you can  bet I will use the liners.  The only clean part of the very dirty oven is where the old liner was. My oven is self-cleaning but I don't like that.  I prefer to clean it by hand.
summary: You shouldn't be without these in your oven I have a selfcleaning

reviewText: The oven liners are very nice. When first opened the package I thought they were a bit flimsy, but thought well let's give it a try. I have been using them now for a couple of months. I really like them. I didn't notice any smell that I read in other reviews. I love, love, love that they are dishwasher safe, and I love that they come in a pack of three. This is a must have for me. I will not use my oven without them. It keeps things much cleaner.
summary: The oven liners are very nice. When first opened the package I thought they ...

reviewText: I bought my first box of liners 2 years ago. I have an electric oven and I cut the liners to fit the floor of my top and bottom ovens.  Spills fell and baked on the liners.  I cleaned them off and reused.  After 2 years I decided to get a new set even though the old ones were still usable.  I use my ovens at least 3 to 4 days a week and this has been a very good buy for me.

These oven liners work great.  They are the perfect size for my oven, no cutting or trimming was necessary.  I love that they are black in color so stains will never be noticeable and when too dirty to wash I can just throw them out and put in a new one.
summary: These oven liners work great. They are the perfect size for my oven

reviewText: Perfect oven liner.  I cleaned my oven - and put one of these in there, and it looks great.  I got three of them, and since they can easily be cleaned, I probably won't even need to use the other two of them for a long time.

These are really well made black liners for the floor of the oven, toaster oven, etc. They work in either gas or electric ovens. They are easily cut with scissors to fit your oven. The price is great, too.

I love these oven liners. I used to for a large oven and I use one for my built-in oven. They are sturdy and last about a year. If I have something that boils over in the oven I just take the oven liner out as soon as it's cool rinse it off dry it and put it back in; the perfect solution. This means I clean my oven about once a year instead of every 3 months.

Great product - you can cut it to fit your oven and it just wipes clean. They last a long time - you can take them out and wash or rinse them occasionally and slip them back in.  No more scrubbing the bottom of your oven.

Easy to cut.  Thick enough to be stiff but thin enough to push down into a pan.  I used one piece to line the bottom of a toaster oven and the pan that fits in it to collect juices and oils.  I used another piece to line the bottom rack of a gas oven.

Very well made. Much better than the liners I bought at a kitchen store. I've used the oven since I put the liner in and I don't notice any problem with temperature or time of cooking/baking. No odor from the liner at all.

It specifically says on the listing and the box that if you have a visible heating element in the oven, to place the liner underneath the visible heating element on the bottom of the oven. So I did exactly as it said, and it melted the liner and left a white residue on my heating element after just a few uses (at normal baking temps, 350F-400F). Please do not waste your money like I did.

I've been using this for a couple of months now and it's been very good so far. I have one in my toaster oven and regular sized oven. I've washed the one in the toaster and it still looks good. Because it comes in a 3-pack, I still have more of it left for when I need to replace it. Compared to other liners, I think this was a very good deal because it came in a 3-pack and it's been good so far.
summary: ... a couple of months now and it's been very good so far

reviewText: I really like these things. Helps to keep the bottom of the oven clean and are very easy to clean up in the kitchen sink. These are a must if you like to cook things like pizza directly on the rack like I do. Looks like they should last for a very long time.
summary: Great product for a messy pizza maker

reviewText: At first I thought they would not fit my oven, but these are great. We bake and grill a lot in the oven and these oven liners have made clean-up 100% easier. I keep one in the bottom of the oven at all times, then use the other two when I'm baking sticky foods or items that have a tendency to spill over.  Its so nice when you get something that exceeds your expectations.
summary: but these are great. We bake and grill a lot in the ...

reviewText:
First Thing:  READ THE DIRECTIONS!! These oven liners go on the bottom rack if your oven does not have an exposed coil.  I installed my liners on my oven's bottom rack and it has worked perfectly.

The negative reviews clearly show to me that they did not follow the directions and placed them directly on the bottom of their oven.  You can only do that if your oven has an exposed coil.

I highly recommend these liners and I am pleased that I took a minute to read the directions BEFORE installing them

I used these to cover the inside of my solar oven.  I did not want to paint the sides of the oven black because of the toxic fumes.  I purchased these oven liners since they are designed to be in contact with food in high heat environments and contain no chemicals, so they were a logical purchase.  So far there are no weird odors inside the oven, so I feel confident they will be up to the task.
summary: Using these for my solar oven

reviewText: These are the best liners I have ever used. This is the second time I have ordered them, they last forever. They can be washed and are so much better than anything I bought in stores. Also much cheaper. I would recommend them to anyone.
summary: These are the best liners I have ever used

reviewText: So far I am very impressed with them! They were easy to cut to the size I needed in my oven.  I have not had them long enough to make a full comment as I have only had them for over a week now & we will see how they do over the next couple of months.

Bought these for my daughter.  She says these things are "awesome"!  She wishes she had known about them sooner.  She learned a lot about cleaning an oven recently which is why I bought these for her.  She is very happy with how easy they are to clean after a cooking spill.  She will be a die hard supporter of these from now on!  My wife was jealous because she did not get any.  I will rectify that situation soon.
summary: She is very happy with how easy they are to clean after a ...

reviewText: I love these oven mats.  My oven is slightly bigger than the mats but they still do the job.  I like that they're black and if I spill anything it wouldn't be as noticeable as the beige mats I used to use.  Those were embarrassing!  These are great!  Love the fact that there are three in the box.  I'm going to use one to BBQ  on the grill next year and save the other for the oven.  I will definitely  order these again as needed. I recommend them to everyone who likes a clean oven!!

I didn't really need three but it was the best deal I found. I gave one to my mother and she is happy with it as well. I was concerned with it burning in the oven or something going terribly wrong as some reviews for similar items stated. I can say that this particular item is very safe, at least it shows no signs of being burned. It has not gone up in flames and it has no funny smells or anything. I am happy with this purchase because now it is way easier to keep my oven clean.
summary: Made my life easier. I do not want to spend my time scrubbing an oven.

reviewText: I had a set from a different manufacturer fall apart.  After scrubbing the oven, yuck, I'm starting over with these.  They're sized right and I'm looking forward to NOT needing to scrub the oven again.

This is the second time we have purchased this product.  We are very pleased with it.  It is so easy to remove and replace after you have wiped it down.  It saves so much time from cleaning up spills.  Don't hesitate to buy it.

Very happy with the large size of these liners; it covers the entire oven floor!  I gave one to a friend and she is as equally impressed and delighted with these as I am.  I highly recommend these liners to everyone who bakes.
summary: Very happy with the large size of these liners

reviewText: Purchased these liners as we have a new oven without a bottom burner and I needed a way to keep the bottom of the oven clean since I'm a messy cook. These worked amazingly for the housewarming party I cooked like crazy for, no mess to clean up thanks to the liner. I look forward to dirtying these liners up and seeing how well they really work.
summary: These worked amazingly for the housewarming party I cooked like crazy for

reviewText:
I have received my new Panda Portable washing machine and am both thrilled and sad at the same time.  My Panda did an great job of washing the clothes (made me happy) but did a better job than my $1000+ washing machine in my home (made me sad).  I wanted to test it before we placed it in our motorhome.  So far it works much better than I had hoped for.

I will keep everyone posted!

This is an amazing washer to have if you live in an apartment. The only noise it makes is shaking from the water being sloshed around while it washes your clothes. However that is a small price to pay for clean clothes with no laundromat!
summary: This is an amazing washer to have if you live in an apartment

reviewText: This was the first time I tried a 3rd party water filter and it was a big mistake.  For the first week it was ok.  Now the water tastes like chemicals and my dog won't even drink it.  I had to use bottled water for her!  Something isn't right with this filter and I'm going back to the LG filter even though it's so expensive.  I have no idea what is used for this cheap product.
summary: You get what you pay for.

reviewText: Skip this one! I bought it to try to save money over the Samsung branded filter at 3 times the price. Caused water to have a bad chemical taste, worse than tap water.  I'm going back to the Samsung branded filter.
summary: Caused water to have a bad chemical taste

reviewText: I'm using the gap cover for exactly that, to fill in the gap between the counter top and stove. Now I don't have to worry about food pieces like onions, chilies or miscellaneous items falling between counter and stove.  It fits perfectly, lays flat for easy cleaning.

works great and looks nice. I have a greenish colored counter top, and a black stove top, looks great and I love the fact that I was able to trim it and it all but covered the entire length of the stove and counter top. No more spills or crumbs going between the stove and cabinets.

I don't know why there are positive reviews of this product. It looks like you've put electrical tape along your stove, it doesn't lie flat and it doesn't fit very well. It looks much, much worse than the gap itself.

If you have any gap between your stove and countertop, these silicone strips work very well to cover that gap and are easy to clean. I highly recommend them! They blend in with my gas stovetop and my grey/white countertop. They do not look 'cheesy' at all, which was my concern when I purchased them.

I have nothing but love for these. They stay where they are put. They clean easily, regardless of what a few claim, with a quick wipe or by taking them up, washing them and putting them back into place. I recommend them and have no idea how I made it this far in life without knowing about them.

Just put these on a few days ago.  Time will tell how well they perform.  I like them because they are flexible and stay in place and do the job of keeping stuff from falling into the cracks on both sides of the stove.
summary: I like them because they are flexible and stay in place ...

reviewText: These silicone gap covers are just what I needed.  They fit well and were easy to install.  They are a little wider than what I wanted, but it really doesn't bother me.  With these covers, I no longer fear spills or crumbs falling down the side of the stove!  Love them!
summary: No more messes running between the stove and counter!

reviewText: The silicone "gap" filler works perfectly to keep the crumbs out from between the stove and countertop. The dark stovetop and black granite makes the silicone gap filler invisible. And it's real easy to keep clean.

Such a small thing that makes such a difference. Just redid my kitchen and spent a lot of time cleaning the sides of the stove and the cabinets. Don't need to do that anymore. They wipe off and fit perfectly between the stove and cabinet. It's the small things that make life easier!
summary: Review says "easy to clean". It's true.

reviewText: These silicone stove counter gap covers are a big improvement over my old ones, which were made of hard plastic.  The old covers would become bent and stop laying flat enough to fully close the gaps. The new silicone gap covers remain flexible and don't become bent. They always lay flat and fully cover the gaps between the countertop and the stove.  Highly recommended.
summary: Big improvement over old gap covers

reviewText: After shopping around at local and big box stores, I took a gamble and bought this stove top from Amazon.  It has been a week since the stove top was installed. I couldn't be happier with this purchase. I'm keeping my fingers crossed that he will stay functional for years to come. At this point I am looking forward to other large purchases on Amazon. Would definitely buy this again.
summary: I couldn't be happier with this purchase

reviewText: I purchased this refrigerator for my son for his college dorm room.  He only used it since August 2016 when he move into the dorm and it only lasted until March 2017.  It no longer is cooling and is making clicking noises.  It is probably the condenser.  I liked the idea of the chalkboard on the refrigerator, but I probably should have purchased one locally considering not just what I paid for this refrigerator, but the shipping cost as well.

I like the fact that JZK, once they realized there was not a good working replacement filter for their product, did something about it! As soon as they had a replacement filter available, they notified customers to let them know. That says a lot to me! I haven't used my humidifier yet, waiting for heater season. I did however purchase the replacement filters to make sure I have them on hand.
summary: I like the fact that JZK

reviewText: This is so usefula cooler that stays as cold as a refrigerator without ice! Plugs into a regular outlet or a cigarette lighter. Not only is it great for camping, but we use it at home, for example when we buy a frozen turkey and aren't cooking it for a few days. It defrosts the turkey but it keeps it from going bad until the morning we pop it in the oven, without filling the fridge. And its large capacity allows us to pack enough food and beverages in it for a  3- or 4-day camping trip.
summary: Not only is it great for camping

reviewText: Nice cooler that works as described.  We like that we don't have the extra weight of ice to contend with ... and that we can bring it into our hotel room and plug it in - just like a refrigerator. This ice chest makes road trips or RV trips easy to not have to succumb to junk food eating while on the road. We make our lunches in the morning and they stay nice and cool until we find the right spot to enjoy... we can have our cereal in the morning or a hard boiled egg ... and we're good to go!
summary: Nice cooler that works as described

reviewText: I've been using this unit for a month or so, and really like the information provided. I was skeptical about the "forecast" feature, but to my surprise it is quite accurate. Only gripe is that the display could be a little brighter, it's a little difficult to read with all the information displayed. Highly recommended.
summary: and really like the information provided

reviewText: This product is a copy of an Ambient weather sensor, and a bad one at that.  The instruction booklet that comes with it indicates that you can adjust the temperature, if it is inaccurate.  When you follow the directions you discover that it's impossible to do this.  If you want an accurate weather station do not buy this product, buy one from Ambient.
summary: and a bad one at that

reviewText: I can get this information from a weather website, but it would not be as accurate to what is going on at my home. This is the only unit I found that has everything I need to know. It was easy to set up and has a nice little built-in stand, so that you can either hang it or just set it on a shelf.
summary: Nice, compact unit with lots of information

reviewText: Great weather station so far.  Very easy to set up and is working great.  Thinking of getting another!  Great weather station so far.  Very easy to set up and is working great.  Update:  this station is accurate but uses more and more batteries and there is no charger/adapter available.  It only uses three batteries and use Duracell but the pain is in the reprogramming!  Looking to replace this one!

Unfortunately the O ring on this filter was slightly smaller than the original one so I had a slow continuous leak when I installed it.  I tried removing it and reinstalling it again but it still continued to leak.  I pulled it out and put in my old filter and the leaking immediately stopped. So much for trying to save money.  It's going back.

These filters are a good value and work great!  I bought one 6 months ago and it's not been a problem.  I should probably order more than one at a time, but since one lasts for 6 months, I have plenty of time to get another one.

This is the first time I bought a filter that wasn't the Samsung brand. I haven't had any issues and the price is great. I used to wait longer than recommended to change the filter because how expensive they are but with this brand and great price I will be able to change it more frequently without feeling like I am spending a fortune on water filters.
summary: Great replacement for the overpriced name brand filter.

reviewText: I ordered this product for my Samsung French Door Refrigerator. The filter fits perfectly. However, it started leaking into the pantry compartment. Didn't notice it until the day after. I then contacted the seller and they were quick to resolve the issue. They sent me a replacement, almost overnight. The new filter fits perfectly and doesn't leak anymore.
summary: If it leaks the first time, try again. Awesome!

reviewText: I purchased this filter based on the reviews. I installed it the day it arrived. I noticed it was difficult to install and would not turn fully into position. It also caused a chattering noise when water was dispensed. I contacted the seller directly and explained the problem. The seller promptly shipped me a replacement. It installed very easily and works flawlessly. I am very happy with the results. The seller was a pleasure to work with and I will definitely purchase this filter again.
summary: It installed very easily and works flawlessly

reviewText: NOT WORTH THE SAVINGS!!!  The rollers started to deteriorate almost as soon as we installed them!  There was dust coming off the ball bearings that then stained my clothes, and the squealing was WORSE than the rollers we replaced!  We ended up buying the more expensive ones.  So much for saving money!

These rollers were a perfect fit for my LG dryer. I was skeptical because of some of the negative reviews but I'm happy to say they were installed as soon as they arrived and have been working fine ever since.

As a filter you need to let some of the water cycle through before you consume the water. Yes, the first few quarts of water will have a black discoloration and this is not the first filter I've seen do this. It takes only a gallon or two to filter through to work that out.

I'm not a scientist so I have not been able to test the water but it does taste cleaner than without it. I'd buy again.

I thought the idea of a water cooler that also made ice was a good idea. However this device failed to mention that it has no way of keeping the ice frozen so that it won't melt. It also does not state that it needs to be always making ice in order to get water. I would not have purchased this item if I knew these things in advance.
summary: A waste of money, bad design flaw

reviewText: Terrible machine stopped working after three months, and of course I can't return it at this point. All of the ice melts before you can get it out of the machine. Should have some kind of freezer inside so that the ice doesn't melt immediately. As soon as I hear the ice fall I take it out and it is melted. For the price of this machine you expect it to work for more than three months. This photo is immediately after the ice fell out of the ice tray.
summary: Great idea if it worked for more than three months

reviewText: Our household need for ice exceeds what the freezer can make.  We have used a counter top ice maker for years.  This one is by far the best!  It makes ice quickly and with the water on top, eliminates the need to continuously "feed" it water.  I am very pleased with this maker and would recommend it for large families that need to have an external ice maker.
summary: This one is by far the best! It makes ice quickly and with the water ...

reviewText: This has been a great little ice maker and water dispenser. I followed the directions about cleaning everything before my first batch of ice was made and the ice came out without any bad smell or taste. It makes ice fast and in a very nice shape. I use a lot of ice for my arthritic knees and this ice maker is just what the doctor ordered!  It's louder than my old water cooler but certainly not too loud.

I ordered two of these, one for my desk at work and one for my bedroom. If I'm going to be uncomfortable, I want to know exactly how uncomfortable I am. (My work is always too hot or too cold.) My only regret is that there is no light option, but that would probably run the battery down so it's fine.

This item stopped working after two weeks.  Do not buy.

A couple of days after writing this review, I received an email from the seller of this item.  They apologized for the fact that it stopped working and immediately sent me out a new one which has been working great ever since.  The customer service is fantastic!
summary: Seller replaced item at no cost to me and the New item works great!!

reviewText: At the same time that my drain pump died, the wheels for the top rack died as well. I ordered the replacement wheel system for the top dishwasher rack. This one is metal where it counts.  The old one was plastic. In 15 minutes I had a good-as-new top dishwasher rack. The only advice that I would give is to carefully watch how the rack is disassembled to make assembly easier.

I am not 100% sure what to say in this review. It's a replacement water filter for a refrigerator water dispenser. It fit perfectly. There was no damage to the item. It is new and not used. I will be happy to purchase more in the future as they are needed.
I received this item for a discount in exchange for my genuine, unbiased review. The views and opinions in this review are solely mine and are in no way influenced by the price I paid for this item.
summary: Great replacement water filter. Fit perfectly.

reviewText: I have had to replace my water filter twice in the year that I have owned my refrigerator.  When I bought my refrigerator from Sears, I asked how much a new filter would cost. I was told $50.00 each.  These filters work and they cost 1/5th the price of the originals.

I ordered enough of these to last years. I had no problem replacing the factory filter with these and they seem to be lasting longer. As far as I can tell these are as good or better then the originals.
summary: Seem to last longer than the factory filter.

reviewText:
I cannot vouch for accuracy, but the device seems to work great.  I will post results when I have an accurate thermometer available.  Battery life is good.  Display is easy to read.
 I use the dew point reading to tell me when to open the windows at night and when to close them in the morning.  That way, I do not need air conditioning.

It took less than 5 min for me to unfreeze the line that hadnt dispensed water for weeks using this tool. I highly recommend this product- it is very easy for even a novice to use. Its a simple, yet very effective device.
summary: Worked like a charm! Super easy to use.

reviewText: I read the reviews and drank the Kool-Aid. This is nothing more than a cheap syringe with a piece of cheap tubing attached to the end. You can build one yourself for less than $1.00.  It was so poorly constructed that the tubing came off and now I have the cheap tubing inside my refrigerator tubing. Out of the frying pan and into the fire. Not at all recommended.

This inexpensive little device works great for thawing out frozen lines in my water and ice dispenser in my refrigerator.  It's one of those things that makes me wonder, "Why didn't I think of that?"  It's very easy to use and I like to keep it  handy if my water lines freeze up again.  If you have this problem with your fridge, give this a try before calling a repairman or buying a new fridge.
summary: Give it  a try, what do you have to lose, a couple of bucks?

reviewText: My water line froze up and I got it working using a blow dryer. The blow dryer worked but took a very long time. A few months later it froze up again. I tried using the blow dryer again. But after 10 minutes I gave up and came and ordered this. It was delivered the next day and I was able to thaw the line in less than a minute. This was completely worth buying.

This thing truly works!  I used to have to stand with a hair dryer for 15 min to unfreeze my water line, but now it gets fixed in about 90 seconds.  Takes two syringe-fulls of hot water to unfreeze mine, but it gets the job done!  Highly recommend this product!

I had my doubts but this little tool worked for me.  It took me about 4 or 5 syringe refills but it cleared the blockage.  Less than 5 minutes total.  I could hear the solenoid valve working and could have pulled the water line out of the valve but then still would have had to thaw out the freezer door.  Clever idea.
summary: This Worked for me! - Whirlpool side by side refrigerator.

reviewText: The product does its job well. However, the line would freeze up again within 24 hours. Someone else commented that he left the dispenser light on and it fixed the problem. I didn't seriously think it would work but I tried it and it kept the line free. Problem solved.
summary: Worked well, but the solution was...

reviewText: This is a must-have tool. It is flawless. It is easy to use and will save you service calls. Water lines often freeze, especially on GE refrigerators and this is the easiest way to thaw the line. Otherwise you'll spend an hour with a blow-dryer trying to heat the line from the outside. This tool is worth its weight in gold

Worked perfectly, and within seconds I had free-flowing water.  The instructions were simple and easy to follow.  I decided to store the device inside a sandwich bag and taped it to the side of my refrigerator so that I can use it again when necessary.

So far so good with this ice maker. We have not tied it into the water line yet, but I'm sure I will like it even more. There is always plenty of ice--all the time. The water dispenser is quite handy and we use it more than we thought we would.

The acrylic container included for adding water manually was broken, but it did not bother me enough to notify the vendor.

The ice machine came sooner than expected, was easy to get up and running, and we have been using it every day since we got it. The designs is great because you never have to touch the ice. It freezes relatively quickly, the ice is just the right size for our preference,and it stops making ice when the reservoir is full. So far, we love it. I hope it lasts a long time because we rely on this a lot already.
summary: Perfect in all the ways that are important to me

reviewText: This filter is garbage!!!  It fits in my Maytag refrigerator, but when I try to get water it spurts out some water then drops to a trickle.  I let it run for several minutes and it still does the same thing.  I put my old TRUE Maytag filter back in and the water runs at the normal rate.  I will not buy this filter again.

I just installed it last week. It's the exact same size as the original. I flushed it for a whole gallon's worth and didn't see any debris in the pitcher. The flow is much better than the old filter we replaced. And it's cheaper than the original to boot.
summary: The flow is much better than the old filter we replaced

reviewText: Makes a horrible noise when trying to get water and the stream is extremely weak; more like a trickle. Tried numerous times to adjust it in hopes we could continue using it. Ended up throwing it away. Total waste.
summary: Makes a horrible noise when trying to get water and the stream ...

reviewText: I've read so many reviews about cheap filters, leaks, bad seals, etc. that I actually put off replacing the filter much longer than I should have. I finally decided to give this one a try and I have been very pleased! I did fill it with water and let it soak for a few minutes before installing, but it went into my Frigidaire without any trouble and started producing clean water at great pressure immediately! This is the brand I will be using regularly!

I'm quite annoyed by the Waterfall filter I just received.  I installed it exactly as the directions state (no different than filters I've used for years), and pushed the water button for several minutes.  Virtually no water came out.  Then, I noticed a big puddle underneath the filter housing.  It was leaking...one drip at a time all day.  What a mess!  So, I went to Sears and bought one of their's...works fine & no leaking.  So much for trying to save a few bucks!

could not get this filter to work. The water would just trickle through. I put the old filter back on and it worked fine. Read several reviews that had the same problem. The customer service of this company is excellent. I just wish the product worked as well.

I didn't want to pay the amount the store where I bought my refrigerator wanted for a replacement filter.  I tried one of these and it has worked flawlessly so far.  I plan on getting all of my replacements here in the future.

This filter costs quite a bit less than the original. It looks and appears to be of equal quality to the original. After one week of use, I'm very satisfied with this purchase and plan to replace the next filter with this one.
summary: I am very satisfied with this purchase and plan to replace the next ...

reviewText: New favorite thing. I drink a lot of water and I use a ton of ice. I bought one of these for my office. That one squeaks really loud when it's running low on water. However, I bought another one for my yacht. I love it. We can have lots of ice all the time. It's super quick.

Simple, easy to use. Lets me monitor temperature and humidity throughout my entire house. I had moisture concerns in my basement that had me worried - now I just keep an eye on the dashboard and I know what's going on. The thermometers are wireless and the numbers are bold and legible on the displays. Nice quality - I was surprised at how quick it was to set up.
summary: Perfect for whole home temperature monitoring

reviewText: I really like this setup. I know the temp inside and outside and upstairs and in the basement. WIFI works great. In the reviews, some people complained about the variance in the temperature sensors. You can easily calibrate the sensors if needed. Highly recommended.

I have this set up to monitor the temp in my workshop (garage), bedroom, and outside.  The main unit is in my living room.  I was happy at how easy it was to set up and so far it has been very accurate.
summary: So far it seems to work great - temps in 4 locations

reviewText: The readings are very inaccurate. It is very nice to be able to monitor the temperature and humidity level in different locations around the house, but the readings are so inaccurate, it's of no use. We will be returning this item.

I love this washing machine. I've been looking for a reasonably priced portable washer for what seems like forever. I've been hand washing clothes between trips to, he laundromat for the last 3 years and my clothes just never felt clean enough. This thing washes so well though. Plus, I get to do other things while washing clothes instead of getting my hands all pruny standing in my way too hot bathroom for ages scrubbing my husband's socks. For me, it was totally worth it.

I am a big believer in aromatherapy and essential oils. Hence, when I was offered the chance to receive a review sample, I jumped at it. I have a number of diffusers throughout my home, and also at work. I have been very pleased with this unit. It is a smaller one, and is suitable for use on the nightstand next to the bed, or on your desk at work. The unit has performed well for me, and I find the shape and colors attractive.

It works well and I am happy to recommend it to others.

Having had a compactor for many years, I tried these bags and was very disappointed. They are virtually impossible to install in the compactor without tearing them. Very difficult to install, and at the price, a poor choice for your compactor.

Are they really burst proof?  The packaging has no information to support this claim.  They are made in China.  The product description also says a 5 year warranty.  The packaging says a 1 year Limited Warranty.  I purchased these for my 2nd home.  In my other home, the  burst proof  hoses came from a big hardware chain. They are thick and stiff.  These seem thin and very flexible.  I have to wonder if they are really burst proof.

I finally had a chance to replace my five year old stainless steel washing machine hoses with these. They hooked up to the faucet and machine without any leaks and after a month they appear to be working well.

Bought these to replace the plain rubber hoses in the house we bought. They appear to be of good quality. They attached perfectly and we have had no leaks since installing them. I like the red and blue striping on them. Very pleased with the product and the price.
summary: They appear to be of good quality. They attached perfectly and we have had ...

reviewText:
Hoses arrived on time in excellent condition.  They are presently in use on a washer.  I was impressed with the quality and flexibility  of these hoses.
I suspect they will outlast my new washer.  The red and blue color coding is also a nice touch. These hoses appear to be of the highest quality.  I will follow up on this in fifteen years.

I was replacing the GE brand filter with your aquacrest filter. I fit okay but water would not go through it.  I sent two e-mail requests for information and did not get a reply.  I guess I will need to send it back and pay the higher price for the GE brand filter.  If water will not go through it, it is useless.

I've been really getting tired of hearing "are these dishes clean?" when I haven't managed to unload the dishwasher soon enough...but most clean/dirty magnets are pretty boring.  This one is cute and fun, and solidly made.  I'm very happy with it.

Because this filter is NSF certified I was confident that if it fit properly it would do the job.  (In reviews of some other filters there were horror stories about filters not fitting properly and water leaks.)

This filter is a perfect fit and installed in less than one minute with no problems.

I am quite pleased and will order again.

I bought this filter last year and it worked fine.  Got it this year and didn't work at all.  No water flow.  I replaced the old filter and it worked.  I'm going to get the maytag version of this filter.

I just got these so I can't comment on how long they'll work.  However, they fit my 8 in x 8 in stovetop gas burner just fine.  I had to cut the corner a little bit so that the grate would fit into place.  I'll update this post after I find it necessary to replace one of them and let you know how long it lasted for me.

I have purchased similar stove burner covers locally but could no longer find them.  I am so glad I ordered these, as I prefer the ones I have been using.  These are more like "heavy duty" foil; therefore, I can bend them down in places to make them fit more snugly against the stove and not interfere with the burner.

These are great.
My only problem is remembering where I put the spares so that I can do a quick clean up when I have a boil-over.  MUCH easier than scrubbing the cook top.  When I run out, I'll buy them again.
summary: These are great. My only problem is remembering where I put ...

reviewText: The magnet does not stay stuck to the backside, so it's constantly falling off our dishwasher. I'll probably end up supergluing it to fix it, but that's not the point. It should work, as is. And it doesn't. Rather annoying to have to go out of my way to make it functional just to be able to use it.
summary: Be prepared to glue the magnet to it. It doesn't stay put.

reviewText: These are great and easily attached to either the dryer or wall and are quality made. I purchased 2 of them, one for the dryer and one for the wall, so that I could switch the positions of the washer and dryer in my newly purchased home. Definitely recommend!
summary: These are great and easily attached to either the dryer or wall ...

reviewText:
I have always had problems with the location of my vent. It is near a wall stud and the vent tube always gets bent or damaged when the dryer is slid back. This is the perfect solution. It prevents damage to the vent tubing and also allows for easier and more secure installation.

I did not need tape or clamps to connect the hose to the dryer. This is genius. All dryers should come with one of these.
summary: Pure genius! This should be standard equipment included with dryers

reviewText: Great Solution to a Frustrating Problem. I was cleaning my dryer vent, and was having a ridiculously hard time getting the hose securely reattached to the dryer while working in a very cramped space. I was going to run to Home Depot, but checked amazon first - glad I did. Great way to affix dryer hose to dryer and/or wall. Highly recommend.
summary: Great Solution to a Frustrating Problem

reviewText: I was nervous about getting this because I didn't know if it would work. It did, it still does, and it saved me a very expensive service call. Easy to install. Quick to install. One of the few times I did a repair on my own without paying and it felt great!
summary: Easy and quick to install. Works and seems good quality.

reviewText: I live in the Arizona desert so A/C is a necessity. Our capacitor blew in early May of 2017 and luckily my neighbor had a spare so I used his and bought this as a spare. Ended up giving this one to another neighbor a month later when his blew. The one I got from my neighbor has already blown again but this one is still running strong, albeit at someone else's house.
summary: I live in the Arizona desert so A/C is a ...

reviewText: Long story short... Had to wait for the washer to actually arrive before I could fit the adapter to my kitchen faucet.  I got very concerned that I might not be able to mount the adapter, however, a $4.19 additional purchase at home depot solved the issue... AND MOST IMPORTANTLY: THE WIFE WAS PLEASED! (Let's face it, I'm whipped!)

I have had this machine for almost a year.  Can't tell you how it washes and dries. I have not been able to connect it to sink spigots. It won't connect to any of the faucets that pulls out and a sprayer.  It now serves as a place to store the already cleaned dishes.  WAIT  I have it now--I should put the dirty ones in until I have a chance to wash them by hand.  I hate looking at dirty dishes.
So unless you have the old type faucet stay clear of this one.
summary: WAIT I have it now--I should put the dirty ones in until I have a chance to wash ...

reviewText: So far so good.  It does what it is supposed to do.  We never run out of ice...We live in Hawaii so we love having the ice at our finger tips.  It is a nice addition to our bar...How did we get along without this for so long?  It just keeps pumping out the ice...

I have had two of these ice machines the first one lasted about six months the second one which is more expensive stainless steel one lasted about a month before they start making these horrible loud noises that are just unbelievable and I can't stand it!!!  Don't buy this!
summary: ... lasted about a month before they start making these horrible loud noises that are just unbelievable and I can't ...

reviewText: Most water filters leave a noticeable taste, but the Waterdrop filter has none.  I'm concerned, though, because I have a "water hammer" problem after a new filter is used for a few days.  I've tried installing an in-line arrestor, but that didn't seems to resolve the problem.  The arrestor with a 1/4" fitting is pretty small, so perhaps I need to buy a larger arrestor and use a series of reducers to go from 3/4" to 1/4".

I was a bit hesitant to buy a replacement filter other than the Samsung brand.  However, the Waterdrop replacement filter is identical to the original and works perfectly fine.  The price of the Waterdrop brand was
highly affordable, and I'm absolutely satisfied.  Will purchase this brand the next time I need replacement.
Thank you!

My ice maker on my fridge/freezer died on me and I needed an ice maker quickly.  I bought this and it arrived quickly.  This product worked very well the first time I used it and I had a full bowl of ice within 20 minutes.  It is very simple to use and I highly recommend it.

Our Whirlpool dryer was giving us some problems shutting off on high temperature. Replacement of these thermostats solved the problem. The work was pretty easy with a lot of on line videos and stuff. We have kept our dryer going for over 20 years with easy fixes like this.

I was very happy to find this item on Amazon. I had searched several other websites and the prices were through the roof! This item came in and was perfect. We have been using the dryer ever since with no problems.

Don't let the price fool you....these are great. They fit just like the original filters and I haven't noticed any difference in water quality. Just make sure to fill up and pour out a few glasses after changing the filter just like you should do with any filter. I did notice the water was cloudy right after changing the filter but after running about 8 glasses through it is nice and clear like always.
summary: Don't hesitate......these work just as good as the expensive ones

reviewText: I'm sure the filters work just fine, we're simply replacing our old one. But when we opened the package a bourbon New Orleans Christmas ornament was included. I don't know if this is a standard silly thing they do, but I appreciate the quirkiness of it.

First one worked okay, but the second one leaked all over the inside of our fridge. Both were an uncomfortably tight fit, and when I got a higher quality replacement it went on much more easily. I'm all for saving money, but these are too cheaply made to be useful.
summary: Buyer beware - Tight fit could leak or damage your refrigerator

reviewText: Installation was easy. It was a bit unsettling to see the blackish water when flushing it after installation, but once that was gone the water tasted great. We've been using it for almost 3 months with no problem.
summary: Installation was easy. It was a bit unsettling to see the ...

reviewText: The description says NSF approved materials, maybe but there is no NSF mark on the box so you have to wonder why...  This is not an NSF approved product and the description would lead you to believe that it is.  That's deceptive and I don't want my drinking water supplied by deceptive people.

This cartridge made the water have a very metallic taste and gave the water a gray tint.  I flushed gallons of water through the cartridge and even tried to keep using the cartridge for more than a week and the taste did not go away.  I eventually took out the cartridge altogether and am just using the bypass plug.  I'd rather drink unfiltered water than use one of these cartridges.
summary: Gave water a metallic taste and gray tint.

reviewText: I'll give you 5 stars even though I was hoping the silicone would not be silicone.  I've had these before and everything sticks to it.  But your service is great and it was my fault in ordering silicone.  It's all I can find.  I like the plastic with the magnets.  I found one mail order catalog that has them on sale (probably getting rid of them).  But I'm using the silicone and the quality is great. They are good quality - it's me that likes the older stuff.

It was actually easy to replace, plus the satisfaction of knowing I fixed it myself!  It was just an $8 part, but I fixed it!  I will be spending the weekend doing laundry, instead of shopping for a new dryer.

Bought this to replace the thermal fuse in my Whirlpool duet dryer that was stuck in the sensing mode, it would turn on but the drum wouldn't rotate and no heat was coming from the dryer. After doing a search on the internet for people with a similar situation there were two solutions, it was either the thermal fuse or the panel board, I ordered the fuse, which was just under $8.00, the panel board was about $120.00. I installed it myself, it worked like a charm!
summary: Inexpensive fix to repair a dryer!

reviewText: I needed this part to hopefully fix my dryer.  I paid extra to get here on Monday and it arrived early afternoon.  It took less than a minute to test and install.  Plugged in my dryer and it immediately started to heat.  For under $12, I was able to fix my dryer.  I have no idea how long it will continue to work but for now this fuse fixed the problem.

This kit worked great.  I bought them to fix my friend's dryer.  Installation was a breeze.  They worked great.  I am happy to report that I was able to save them hundreds of dollars, thanks to these little guys right here.
summary: So happy to do laundry again!

reviewText: thought i needed a new dryer, watched some youtube videos and most of them said this was the part I needed to fix the dryer. I received this piece and it was what I needed. so much better than spending $600 on a new dryer or $200 for someone to come fix it.

I got this for the Whirlpool Gold fridge in my new house, which was missing a filter. I have no previous experience with this type of refrigerator or filter, but it seems to be working well. It was cheaper than the brand name replacement, fit perfectly, and well-reviewed, which is why I bought it.

This vendor is quite reliable, and their product does the job well. It's something I need for my LG refrigerator twice a year, and I've been purchasing from this vendor for 2 years, I believe. I highly recommend them.

Works great!  Need to replace the filter for my LG Refrigerator.  I can't tell the difference in the taste of the water from the original filter it came with and this one other than the cost is much less.  I will be buying more in the future.
summary: Works great! Need to replace the filter for my LG ...

reviewText: Ordered this for my LG refrigerator water dispenser; the filter is a very good fit and the filter provides very good water quality.  The price of the filter is  very good as well and I will be setting up a regular subscription service for this product.
summary: the filter is a very good fit and the filter provides very good water quality

reviewText: I don't think I've ever replace the water filter inside my Sears refrigerator since I've always had a filter on the main water line. However since I was going to be using the built-in water dispenser much more, I decided to replace it with these and they seem to work just fine. There's definitely an increased water pressure so not sure if they're filtering at the same level as the original.

This item was a perfect replacement for my built in water filter in my fridge.  It took less than a minute to install. It took longer to open the packaging, which, by the way, came very well packaged. It also came with stickers to remind me when to change out the filter for next time. Thank you!

Ordered these filters for my Whirlpool Gold Refrigerator.  I read some of the reviews and was apprehensive about ordering them but decided because they have a satisfaction guarantee, I would take a chance.  I am so glad I did. They fit perfectly.  I have no issues with them and will be purchasing them again without any hesitation.  Thank you

Came quickly.  Easy to install. Great price.  Water tastes much better.  Most of us don't live in a third-world country (or Flint, MI) so we're not going to be harmed by drinking water straight out of the faucet.  I buy water filters basically because my fridge water dispenser comes with a water filter feature (mindless consumer) and because it makes the water taste better.

I was looking for replacement filters for my Frigidaire fridge. At this price I figured I'd give them a try. These filters appear to be good quality. They fit properly in my fridge and provide great tasting water. I've had one in for a couple weeks now and so far they work very well. I'll update if anything goes wrong, but so far so good.

like the product. Water taste great. I would like to comment on your request for a donation to folks in Africa. If you had asked for a donation for folks here in the USA, no problem. There are many folks here in this country that need help. Africa isn't a concern of mine. Hungry kids in this country is.

This is it. The perfect replacement for the "rip-off" GE filters. It works perfectly, it fits perfectly with absolutely no issues. I'm very happy with the product and will be using this filter in the future. It works. The price is unbeatable. Value and quality all in one.
summary: Exactly what I was looking for.

reviewText:
If you are looking for DA29-00003G filters for your Samsung fridge, these fit perfectly.
Some companies say they fit DA29-00003G but have a different connector. THE OTHER CONNECTOR DOES NOT FIT.
This filter is a DA29-00003G and it fits the DA29-00003G.
I ordered 9 more filters.
Thank you Aquacrest.
summary: If you are looking for DA29-00003G filters for your Samsung ...

reviewText: Liked the fact that it had clear instructions and a set of stickers to track when the filter needs to be replaced. Filters where wrapped in plastic to keep them clean. Installation was easy. Pulled out the old filter and popped the new one back in with ease. All in all, great product.
summary: Liked the fact that it had clear instructions and a ...

reviewText:
This filter is NOT a direct replacement for the Samsung DA29-00020B. The hole is round on this filter. The original Samsung DA29-00020B is a square hole. I was able to use it by drilling a larger hole in it.
Since I have two I guess I will have to drill a hole in the other one. I plan not to return the filter since it is easier to drill out the hole. I would not recommend buying this product
summary: This filter is NOT a direct replacement for the Samsung DA29-00020B.

reviewText: I purchased these to replace the original filter in our LG refrigerator. These filters are an exact replacement for the LG branded ones and cost far less. The filtered water tastes just as good with these as it did with the original filter. Definitely recommended.
summary: Lower cost filters that work as well as the OEM ones

reviewText: This product is a great alternative to the Samsung bottle. It works great with no noticeable difference in the taste of the water or ice cubes. Samsung wants about $85.00 for 1 bottle and AquaCrest wants about $25.00 for 3 bottles that are just as good if not better.
summary: AquaCrest is the best way to go

reviewText: I have purchased several different brands of filters for my Samsung refrigerator. This one was easy to install and had no leaks. The flavor or I guess lack of flavor of the water is the best I have had so far. I find that some filters give the water a slight aftertaste but not these.

So far so good.  We have been using the filters for a few weeks now without any problems.  Installation was a breeze and the water tastes fine.  We're glad we gave this product a try.  We saved quite a bit of money for what appears to be a very comparable product to the name brand replacement.
