summary: Seems as good as the Samsung filters

reviewText: I have had this ice maker for over a year now and its still going strong. No problems, no issues and it makes all the ice I want it to. This little guy works hard to produce ice for me constantly since our refrigerator ice maker took a dump over a year ago... I love this machine and I highly recommend!!!

I bought this ice maker for my Dad as their new-ish refrigerator doesnt keep up with the amount of ice he consumes everyday. He cant believe the amount of ice it makes and didn't believe me when I told him what the ice maker cost. Yup, although Im not the kind of person to be telling people how much I spent on their gift, he kept insisting and I finally gave in and showed him the receipt. Hes still amazed that it works so well and costs relatively little. I tell you, he is very impressed!!

DO NOT BUY ANYTHING FROM THESE PEOPLE!! YOU CANNOT GET IN TOUCH WITH ANYONE TO REPLACE OR EVEN USE THE MANUFACTURER WARRANTY. THE MANUFACTURER NO LONGER HAS A U.S. WEBSITE.
THE MACHINE STOPPED WORKING FOR US WITHIN A MONTH!! IT IS A PIECE OF TRASH!!
summary: DO NOT BUY THIS OR BUY ANYTHING FROM THIS COMPANY OR MANUFACTURER!!

reviewText: Works well for me. I keep 2 to 3 bags of ice in my garage freezer and leave this on all the time to keep ice available in the house (I don't have an icemaker in my refrigerator/freezer). It's a bit loud when it drops the cubes but other than that it works great.

This is a remarkable ice maker.  Use it in my office.  Turn it off every night, and the cubes melt and recycle back into the reservoir.  Turn it on in the morning, and it makes cubes EVERY 9 minutes.  Everyone on the floor is coming to me for their ice because they love it.
summary: Everyone on the floor is coming to me for their ice because they love it.

reviewText: This device is terrific!  When you first fill it with water, it takes about 20 minutes or so for a couple of cycles to really get a decent amount of ice.  After that, it cranks out ice every 10 minutes or less and keeps up with 4 adults enjoying various beverages all afternoon and evening.  When the ice melts, the water goes back into the reservoir and it makes more ice!  How cool is that?  It is a little on the loud side but not so annoying that you notice it all the time.  Highly recommended!
summary: This device is terrific! When you first fill it with water

reviewText: I purchased this because I was tired of buying ice. Within a few hours we had our first ice cubes. I like that you can select the cube size as well as the automatic feature of knowing when to make additional ice. It is very easy to fill with water when needed and it always tells you when it is low. I really am happy I purchased this product.

Awesome Ice Maker. It has paid for itself in the short period of time we have used it. We no longer have to buy bags of ice from the local store anymore. You get to choose from 3 different sizes of ice and large is our favorite. It's a must have.

The product I ordered was received on the date promised. The filters fit my Honeywell Humidifier perfectly. My advice is don't use any filters other than those made for the Honeywell Germ Free Humidifier.

These are convenient and easy to use.  I am not usually one to promote disposables when there are re-usable options, but there is great peace of mind, knowing that the humidifier filter is new and clean.

I have used several different filters in the last 3 years in my Honeywell humidifier.  These are the best quality, most substantial ones, even compared to the actual Honeywell brand.  I highly recommend them.  They hold their shape, do not get mushy and soft, and they seem to be less susceptible to mold.  They also are very competitive in cost.

In the past I've struggled to find decent replacement filters for our Honeywell humidifier. These ones fit the bill. They are both affordable and effective, and we haven't had any problems with molding.

It's definitely important to flip the filter over regularly to keep it working right. I flip the filter every time I re-fill the water (every 1-2 days).

Purchased these filters as replacements for the old one on our Honeywell humidifier. They are a perfect fit and working well. Every few days I clean the whole system for fear of mold and these filters seem to be holding up better than the original. I will continue to buy these as needed.
Definitely recommend these filters!

These filters fit our model 350 humidifier perfectly.  They are a bit more rigid than the Honeywell filters.  This is good as they don't get as misshapen as the Honeywells.  Evaporation rates seem as good, if not better than the Honeywell filters.  I haven't used them long enough to determine their lifespan, but if they last one month, I will be very pleased.
summary: Replacement evaporator pad for Honeywell Humidifier

reviewText: I received my shipment promptly and without hassle. The humidifier is great but I haven't figured out how often I should change the filter. The original is holding up pretty well after almost 2 months of continuous use - it gets pretty dry here in Plymouth in the winter. But I'm guessing there's a point where contamination may be an issue. These filters are inexpensive and easy enough to change periodically. I'll continue to order replacements from Fountain Distributors.

So far (one week into use) these seem to be the best replacement filters that I have found.  I've had others that fell apart and turned a weird moldy pink color almost immediately, but these seem to be holding up well.
summary: ... (one week into use) these seem to be the best replacement filters that I have found

reviewText:
I love these filters, they are very absorbent and with my Honeywell HCM-350 a gallon of water empties in 8 hours. My house went from dry and scratchy to moist overnight. I highly recommend these filters to anyone needing a replacement filter that actually works.

Edit: After 5-6 months, they are starting to decrease their rate of water evaporation. From a gallon in 8 hours (originally) to a gallon in 36 hours. Two of these with Honeywell HCM-350's are still keeping my apartment fairly moist.
summary: Quickly absorbs water in my Honeywell HCM-350. Just as good as the originals

reviewText: I have been using these filters for less than a month and they have mold growth all through out the filter which I discovered after trying to find the cause of my sudden onset of allergies and sickness. In the product description it specifically says the filter is designed to prevent mold growth.

Have not had the opportunity to use this product yet but it looks like it will work perfectly as a replacement filter for my Vick's cool mist humidifier purchased 2 years ago. Thank you for making this product available because we love the humidifier and it is certainly worth not having to purchase a new humidifier. As usual, Amazon is my "go-to" place to buy by making so many products available. This saves so much time, energy and frustration by not having to search local stores for such items.
summary: ... opportunity to use this product yet but it looks like it will work perfectly as a replacement filter for ...

reviewText: This beverage cooler does not work properly.  It does not get as cold as it should and it fogs up.  It does not sit level.  Had I not destroyed the box, I would have returned this product.  It also does not hold the number of cans as indicated.  I am not satisfied with this product at all.
summary: I am not satisfied with this product at all

reviewText: This thing died yesterday.  The compressor just stopped working.  It is hot to the touch.  Went back to my Amazon purchases and I see that this piece of junk lasted 2 years and three months.  Now I'm looking for a replacement and I can't find one with good reviews that doesn't suffer from the same problem.  There is a real opportunity here for a company to make a good mini fridge.

After reading some of the reviews I was a little nervous about purchasing. However, it was pretty much my only choice due to the space available under my home bar. I've had it a few days now and all I can say so far is... I love this little fridge! I've been tracking the temp of the cans and at 6 on the temp dial they're about 34 degrees. Perfect beer temp! I'll update as time goes on but so far so good.

So far so good.  Relatively quiet. No dents upon delivery. Keeps everything ice cold and looks great in my living room. I've owned it for 8 months and the only downside is that you'll get some frost in the middle of the back panel.  I'll update if the compressor fails.

DO NOT PURCHASE THIS ITEM!  Despite the comments and reviews, I purchased this item because I wanted the lower cooling range.  It's a piece of junk!  The case was dented and the door hinge was bent to the point the door wasn't on.  After I repaired the door hinge, I plugged the unit in but it did not run.  The compressor overheats.

I'm so excited to finally have gotten this!  I was looking at first for a small refrigerator to keep drinks cold, but this beverage cooler was by far a better choice because it allows so much more space for drinks.  The shelves are adjustable allowing for different sized drinks and I love the glass front.  I've only had it a couple days and it's running very smoothly.  It made a little noise when I first plugged it in, but I don't notice any noise from it now.  Overall, I'm very pleased with it.

Stopped working right about the time the warranty ran out and worked great until that time. If you buy this consider it a "throw away" as the quality leaves a lot to be desired.

Spend a little more money for more quality.

This is an update to my previous review. The fridge COMPLETELY DIED after only 9 months. The compressor locked up!  My neighbor, who is a professional HVAC mechanic told me the compressor was a piece of junk and not repairable.  My lose.
--------------------------------
I've had this for 6 months now and like it a lot. I'm using in my garage to store beers laying down.  It struggles a little in the summer to keep cool, and is a little noisy -- but all-and-all I would recommend it.

The AB-850 Beverage Cooler is durable and portable.  It works really great in small spaces, and allows us to keep our refrigerator free!  We have a lot of parties, BBQ's and other gatherings.  This cooler is so portable, it can go anywhere with access to a 3 prong outlet - including under or behind a bar.

The adjustable shelving makes it easy to organize cans and bottles.

I received an AB-850 for the purpose of this review.  However, the opinions stated herein are 100% my own.
summary: Great and compact - great for parties

reviewText: There has been nothing I don't like about this product. I like that in comes in a three-pack, the price is good and it is really easy to install. Also, you don't have to run 2 gallons of water through it before you use it.

Bought a Waterdrop DA29-00020B filter a while back and every time we used the refrigerator water dispenser it made a groaning noise like the the water pump motor was having an issue. We assumed it was the refrigerator. I bought the same Waterdrop filter as a replacement and the groaning noises were gone. This time I bought the Waterdrop Plus DA29-00020B and the groaning noises are back. I sent an email to the seller and didn't receive a response. Bad customer service!
summary: Makes Our Fridge Groan Like An Angry Ghost!

reviewText:
We purchased the regular Waterdrop last time and didn't have any problems but decided to go with the Waterdrop Plus this time and we're glad of it.
It came on time, easy to install and we feel like it has a better quality taste than the regular Waterdrop.
summary: ... go with the Waterdrop Plus this time and we're glad of it

reviewText: Every time I put this filter in my refrigerator, the ice maker quits making ice. After 3 days of not making ice, my refrigerator started leaking water. I took the filter out & after about 20 mins the leak stopped. Without the filter in place my ice maker is working again. I would not buy this again.
summary: Caused water to back up & leak onto floor.

reviewText: This is my second order for this filter. Unlike the ones I have purchased at the store these last an entire year. I was skeptical at first but I'm very discerning about the quality of the water that comes out of the refrigerator and it was perfect for the whole time. I have now replaced the old one and the quality continues. Thank you for making a top notch product being a trustworthy company.
summary: I was skeptical at first but I'm very discerning about the quality of the water that comes out of the refrigerator and it was perfect for the whole time

reviewText:
I got this about a month ago. I LOVE IT.
I'm an ice chewer so I panicked a bit when I realised my apartment didn't come with a fridge that has an ice maker...then I found this.

It's super attractive, so I don't mind having it on my counter. It produces ice extremely fast-about 8 cubes every 6 minutes! I'll be doing an updated review in about 3 months.

This is the first time we ever purchased and used an ice-maker so we don't have others to compare it to. However, we really love this ice-maker. Once it gets going, it really makes a lot of ice. When we first started it, we had to use 5 bottles 16 oz.bottles of water. Then after that first use we only need to use 2 -3 bottles of water to fill it for it to start making ice. It works great an is not loud at all. The only loud beeps are when it lets you know you need to add more water.

This ice maker only made 4 batches of ice and I can't get it to work anymore.  The manual has a lousy translation and no troubleshooting information on the website either.  This ended up just being a big piece of trash for me to throw out.  Now looking for another ice maker.

I received this a week ago, cleaned it, plugged it in and filled it up with distilled water.  It's been producing ice like a trooper ever since.  I've had an ice maker before and it didn't last long but hopefully this one does.
summary: It's been producing ice like a trooper ever since

reviewText: Not impressed with these.  Based on the fact that they are silicone, I assumed they would be very soft and pliable.  This is not the case.  They do not work as they should ... The basis of this product is to prevent "stuff" from falling between the stove and the counter.  They may do that but since they don't fit snug to the stove or counter, all the "stuff will just slide right under the edges.  Basically defeating the purpose all together.  They are going back!

Wow, I really like these mats.  You receive 3 mats plus 1 small round one, I just don't know what the small one would be used for?  I put one in my oven, perfect fit and I put one on my grill.  The one on the grill has been used the most and it has taken a beating but it serves it purpose, saves the briquettes for sure and it keeps my grill clean.  I haven't spilled anything yet in my oven but I am sure it will do the trick and keep my oven looking clean.

This product is one of the best to keep the bottom of my oven easy to clean.  The fact that there are 3 is really a  plus, with a smaller one included as a bonus.  If you are thinking about purchasing this product...I say GO FOR IT!!

I opened up the box today expecting these liners to be on the cheaper side since there were three of them.  I thought for the price, I would go ahead & use them and pull a new one out as needed.  Much to my surprise, these are heavy duty liners which you cannot find in the stores around here anymore.  I love them and when I get down to one liner left, I will reorder.

WE PURCHASED THIS FOR MY HUSBAND'S USE IN OUR NEW KITCHEN RENOVATION.
THE TEMPERATURE KEEPS BEER, SODA AND WATER AS COLD AS YOU CAN STAND IT.
WE ALTERNATE THE BLUE AND WHITE LITE FOR DIFFERENT LOOKS AT DIFFERENT TIMES.

WOULD ORDER THIS AGAIN OVER THE HIGH END ONE WE FIRST RESEARCHED.

These were exactly what we were looking for when we finished our basement. We were looking for refrigerators that would look good  and perform well built into our cabinets.  It was much harder to find what we were looking for than we thought it would be when we started. They haven't been installed long ( only about a week) so we still have a ways to go to judge performance but so far so good.

However, despite my order, I received a washer.  Unfortunately I didn't notice that before the driver from FedEx drove away.
Hopefully I get it all sorted out and then we can actually get a dryer. Until then, I'm at a loss for words.
summary: I would love this, if it was actually what I received.

reviewText: I needed more freezer space. This product is perfect for that purpose. Now I'm able to buy more sale items such as meats and vegetables. I would have liked a self-defrosting freezer but other reviewers say it's an easy process.

Bought this for my grandmother who needed extra freezer space in her kitchen after her other extra freezer broke. It works quite well and was very easy to set up, easy enough that she was able to do it herself.
summary: It works quite well and was very easy to set up

reviewText: This replacement filter fit perfectly and was easy to install.  It is much more reasonably priced than the LG brand.  I will be buying another one in six months. We also replaced the air filter, which was also less expensive that the LG brand.  Just be sure you have the model number and that it corresponds to the replacement filter model designation.
summary: This replacement filter fit perfectly and was easy to install

reviewText: I was very happy to find the water filter replacement for my LG refrigerator since the water filter light was on. It is easy to snap on and replace. There are videos on youtube  showing how to replace the filter and reset the water filter light.
summary: I was very happy to find the water filter replacement for my LG ...

reviewText:
This is an excellent replacement filter!
The filter fits perfectly with our refrigerator. I don't have any equipment to test the filtered water, but it seems to do a great job with filtration. I will definitely be back when the time comes to replace the filter again.

DO NOT  GET THIS ONE. It will break again. Its a poor design and you will need to replace in another 1-2 years. Instead get: Whirlpool, Kenmore, KitchenAid - Dishwasher Replacement Rack Adjuster Kit # W10712394. It is a metal design and should have been used in the original. Watch the youtube video "Dishwasher Replacement Rack Adjuster Kit # W10712394 V-rail" as the instructions with the kit are hard to follow.
summary: DO NOT GET THIS ONE. Better part available.

reviewText: I have to replace these every year or so on my kitchen aid dishwasher. The wheel housing breaks so easily. You would think there would be a metal version.  It's ridiculous I have to do this on a $1200 dishwasher. I'm just glad I do it and don't have to pay a repairman $200 every year to do it!!!
summary: The wheel housing breaks so easily. You would think there would be a metal ...

reviewText: I had part W10350374, and this one (ERW10350376) fits just fine as replacement. Seems like the same quality as the original (not great), but since I just replaced it, I can't tell you how durable it is.
summary: and this one (ERW10350376) fits just fine as replacement

reviewText: Just pop in the battery, select Fahrenheit or Celsius for the temperature with the button on the back and you're ready to go.  I have one on the main floor as well as in the basement to keep an eye on humidity levels.

I got this thermometer to see the temp in my trailer, and it serves the purpose.  I kind of like the fact that it has a magnet back so I can get it up and out of the way.  It's a simple device, nothing fancy, but it helps.
summary: Pretty content with this little thing

reviewText: Bought this thermometer to test thermostat on air conditioner.  Actually had an A/C company inspecting our A/C and this thermometer actually read the same as their more sophisticated thermometers.  Can't rate battery life since I haven't had it long enough.  Works really well!!!

I ordered this ThermoPro for my desk at work. It gets down right cold some days, and I like to see what the temperature is at my desk. I also like to monitor the humidity level. I am going to order a few more for home. I love this one so much!!!
summary: GREAT tool to have for the office

reviewText: Arrived DOA. The display shows values, but they do not change. It reads "LL", which, after doing some research means that the sensors are not working. I called support, and they said they would send me a replacement. It has been 3 months, so it looks like it is not coming. I have two accurite hygrometers that have never failed. I wanted to give ThermoPro a chance.
summary: so it looks like it is not coming

reviewText: This temperature gauge is working very well. I needed a temperature gauge for my second floor to see just how hot it was from the first floor. It also lets me know the humidity, and if I should get a dehumidifier.
summary: This temperature gauge is working very well. I needed ...

reviewText: Basic, inexpensive, and seems to do the job pretty well. Comes with the battery you need to get started. I don't have another hygrometer or thermometer to compare it to for accuracy, but my gut says it's probably accurate enough.
summary: Cheap and cheerful - does the job!

reviewText: Compact, useful, and accurate.  I purchased two and set them up in the bedroom next to two other more expensive and presumably more accurate thermometer/hygrometers for two days.  They all displayed the same temperature and humidity.  A rough test, but good enough for me.

My sister has had one of these for a long time and I had always wanted one. I like being able to glance at the table where it sits and know the temperature and humidity. It also helps to judge whether the thermostat is accurate!
summary: I like being able to glance at the table where it ...

reviewText: This is the second ThermPro I ordered because I liked the first one so well. This is a simple device with clean lines, easy to operate and very easy to read from across the room. The service was great and the follow-up was too. This will be my choice again when I need another room thermometer.
summary: This is the second ThermPro I ordered because I liked the first one so well

reviewText:
This is a cool little humidity monitor and thermometer. The screen is easy to read, and set up is a breeze. Simply install the battery and press one button to switch between fahrenheit to celsius and its set up.

What I Like About This Device
Both humidity and temperature display in a large font that is easy to read, while also displaying the low and high humidity and temperature in a smaller font.
summary: Cool Little Humidity Moniter And Themometer That Works

reviewText: This device is very useful for those rooms that are far away from your air conditioner's thermostat.  Also gives you your room's humidity reading, which is very important for people with respiratory problems.
summary: This device is very useful for those rooms that are far away from your ...

reviewText: This product is exactly what I had been looking for and the price was great.  My husband has had an extended stay in the hospital this winter and so often he wondered what the room temperature and humidity was.  This is compact and easily read.  I would highly recommend this.
summary: ... I had been looking for and the price was great. My husband has had an extended stay in ...

reviewText: This product failed after less than three months of use.  Amazon refuses to take it back or exchange it.  I will be calling the manufacturer tomorrow to  apprise them of this and to determine whether they will take responsibility for the faulty device and replace it/refund my money.  If not, I will be writing another review.
summary: This product failed after less than three months of use ...

reviewText: This is a great gadget to have around the house.  I really rely on this in the winter when the air is very dry.  I run a humidifier to keep the air comfortable and keep my skin from getting to dry.  This gauge helps me know where the humidity is at in my room and whether I should turn up or down the humidifier.  It's important to not let the air get too humid or else you can get condensation on the windows that could lead to mold.  With this you will always know the humidity and temperature!

Amazon has sent 2 emails asking me review this item - It's a  Digital Hygrometer Indoor Thermometer Humidity Monitor I really don't know what to say it's a Digital Hygrometer Indoor Thermometer Humidity Monitor  - it works

Exactly what I needed after adding a whole-house humidifier.  Wanted to be able to see how well the humidifier was working and this makes it easy to see how much humidity is in my home.  I like the "high/low" for both humidity and temps as well.  I'd buy again for sure...

Great thermometer and hygrometer. It's nice to be able to put numbers to what I'm feeling in a room. Prior to using this, the last digital thermometer I used was manufactured in the early 2000s, so the refresh rate has been pretty impressive to me.

This unit is nice and small and does not take up a lot of space.  I use it to monitor humidity in the master bedroom to keep our eyes hydrated with a humidifier (recommended by eye doctor) during sleep time.

I live on the coast, and use this in conjunction with a dehumidifier. The Hygrometer helps me know when the humidity is too high, or too low so I can adjust the use of the dehumidifier.

it is also handy for knowing if I'm having a hot flash, or if it really is hot indoors and I need to turn down the heater.
summary: Great portable indoor Hygrometer that helps monitor Humidity and Temperatures.

reviewText: This product is exactly what I was looking for for home use. I needed to determine the amount of humidity in my bedroom after adding a humidifier to the bedroom to combat dryness during the winter months. Would recommend it to others due to the information  (temperature and humidity) it provides as well as its ease of use.

Batteries that came with it were old, so it wasn't accurate when I first set it up.
I replaced the batteries with some fresh ones and it became very accurate, I compared it to some other good digital thermostats in the house and it matched them all.
Memory function keeps track of "Hi Lo" stats, you can reset the memory by holding the button on the back for a few secs.
summary: Works well with fresh batteries, have used for a few weeks, still working well.

reviewText: Now that I have had a week to evaluate the product, I can write a short review. The digital thermometer and hygrometer work well and are very accurate. The numbers are large enough and dark enough to be easily read from across the room. I will definitely be buying another one for my back room. I will definitely recommend this hygrometer/thermometer to others.

I am very impressed with this product.  I purchased it to keep track of the interior humidity for my musical instruments.  I have been testing it out by altering the temperature in the apartment, and it is quickly responsive.  I am very pleased with the purchase and encourage others to give this nice, and inexpensive, product a try.

I had a faulty thermostat and the manager of my apartment building had it replaced. However, they switched a very modern, digital thermostat for a bare-bones, analog one. This means I can't see the actual temperature. Therefore, I needed something to make sure the new thermostat was working properly and that the house is at the temperature it's supposed to be.

It's as easy as opening the packaging, putting the battery in, and it's already working!

I bought this for my desk at work to monitor our temperature since they installed new thermostats that don't seem to work.  I tested it at home first.  It works great and to the best of my knowledge is very accurate.
summary: It works great and to the best of my knowledge is very ...

reviewText: The unit came with a battery included, which was unexpected but nice! It works great, easy to read. It also has a magnet on the back, which came in very handy to keep it in view. It tells you the humidity level in the room, but the little smiley face next to the readout is cute! Makes it easy to see at a glance if the humidity level is acceptable.

I have been using the ThermoPro and it appears to work just fine.  I have no way of knowing how accurate the hydrometer is, but it does respond to humidity changes and displays low/high reading over the past few days - which is very helpful.
summary: Clear display is easy to read

reviewText: I bought this unit to provide me with an accurate picture of the humidity in a room where I have several guitars. It's a nicely made unit that works flawlessly and at a very reasonable price. It lets me know if my little humidifier is doing its job. I can recommend it without reservations.
summary: It's a nicely made unit that works flawlessly and at a very ...

reviewText: I bought this excellent priced Hygrometer to cross check a very expensive dehumidifier controller.  The TP50 is excellent.  It is also very responsive. I would recommend this to anyone looking for a Hygrometer.  At this price, you can't lose.
summary: At this price, you can't lose.

reviewText: For the price and size, this is a great little thermometer.  I think it is relatively accurate, both for temperature and humidity, though I did spend too much effort on checking.  It can be rather slow to adjust, and it would be great if it were back-lit, but for the price, it does exactly what it should.

Great little device for monitoring the humidity and temperature in a room.  I bought one for myself when I purchased a humidifier for my bedroom.  My son-in-law saw it and liked it, so I ordered two more to put in the bedrooms for my granddaughter and grandson.
summary: Very happy with initial purchase and purchased two additional units.

reviewText: Seems to work well. No issues as of now. There does seem to be done disparity between what the humidifier registers as the level of humidity and what this does. Although it could be because I don't have the ThermPro right next to the humidifier.
summary: Seems to work well. No issues as of now ...

reviewText: Easy to use, easy to read, fast reading. No need for to buy a very expensive thermometer when this is available. One thing that wasn't clear to me when I bought it was the auto on/off feature. It is on when you open the probe and it does shut off automatically when you close the probe. If you leave it open then it will shut off after ten minutes. It also comes in a giftable box.
summary: Handy Dependable Auto Thermometer that works well and is reasonable cost = Good Buy

reviewText: The Instant Read Thermometer arrived quickly and works as expected. I like the fact that I can hang it on the wall for easy access. We are happy with our purchase. The thermometer would also make a great gift.
summary: The Instant Read Thermometer Works Great

reviewText: This is essential if you're cooking steak if you want to get it the best texture and if you want it to be safe. This thermometer can be used to cook anything. From steak to turkey and chicken. A very great tool to have in the kitchen.
summary: ... cooking steak if you want to get it the best texture and if you want it to be safe

reviewText: These were exactly what I needed.  When I got a new stove I saw the gross grease drippings on both sides of the old one, as well as the walls of the counters on either side.  These will prevent that from happening again.

GREAT PRODUCT!  IT WORKED PERFECT FOR THE GAP BETWEEN MY STOVE AND COUNTER.  UNFORTUNATELY, I FIRST PURCHASED ANOTHER BRAND, AN ALUMINUM STIP THAT WAS TERRIBLE.  THESE SILICONE STOVE COUNTER GAP STIPS WERE PERFECT.  THE COLOR WAS RIGHT ON AND BLENDED IN JUST RIGHT.  I WOULD RECOMMEND THIS PRODUCT TO ANYONE.

Only one problem with the Rojo filter; it doesn't work. I measured the tap water coming out of my faucet and the reading was 45 ppm undisolved particles. I measured the water coming from my refrigerator after it had been filtered through the Rojo filter and it also read 45 ppm undisolved particles. In summary this filter does not work. Save your money.
summary: Only one problem with the Rojo filter; it doesn't ...

reviewText: This is a good filter and the only one that works in the model GE refrigerator that I have.  My only complaint is that after installing a new filter it takes a long time to flush out.  I waste a lot of water.  The instructions warn you of this.  This may be true of all refrigerator filters.  This is the first time I've had a refrigerator that has a filter.

I am not sure that these filters actually do anything because the water comes out of the dispenser so hard & fast like there is nothing that is being filtered. The water from this filter tastes just like the tap water. There is no chlorine taste being removed by this filter.
summary: I am not sure that the water is being filtered

reviewText: A NEW & MORE FAMOUS WATER FILTER LEAKED, AS SOON AS I INSTALLED IT!!  I THREW IT AWAY AND WASTED MY MONEY!!  THE LOW PRICE AND FEEDBACK, OF THESE CRYSTALA FILTERS WAS HARD TO BELIEVE...I ORDERED THREE FOR THE PRICE OF ONE!!..  I JUST INSTALLED MY FIRST ONE...AND...IT WORKS PERFECTLY!!!.....THE RATINGS AND FEEDBACK ARE TRUE!!...HAPPY...HAPPY!!.....WOW!!  THEY WORK PERFECTLY WITH MY LARGE SAMSUNG FRIDGE!!
summary: HARD TO BELIEVE THE PRICE....AND THEY REALLY WORK!!

reviewText: It is an amazing product and well worth it.  I had to replace my old filter and I searched to a compatible product that doesn't cost an arm and legs.  This product came up first on most list so I decided to try it.  It was delivered with no problem, I opened the package and it was simple and easy to install. THIS PRODUCTS WORKS!!! IT REALLY WORKS!!! I will buy more in the future...

Had to replace an old deflector that had become brittle (allowing birds to nest in my dryer vent!!). Talk about a potential fire hazard. This was an identical replacement that will hopefully outlast the previous one (brittle after 6 years). I also added a coat of paint to help absorb and protect from UV rays.

Easy to install.

This is a big drip pan! It's exactly what I needed for a rusted out leaking old 1983 Jeep Scrambler that I'm rebuilding. The drip pan keeps the stuff off the floor and is super easy to clean up. It's lightweight and easy to move around, but not so flexible that it bends.

For some reason our stove is in the corner of the kitchen with a wall next to it. We noticed there were already a ton of splatter marks from previous renters. I didn't want to add more. The best thing about these is that when I have a recipe I don't know by heart, I can write on this with a dry erase marker and look at it while cooking. Genius.

I love this counter-top dishwasher! I did not buy it brand-new because they have been out-of-stock for a long time but I found one and it is wonderful! Perfect for one or two people. With one you only have to run it every couple of days and with two people, every day or so. It holds alot and does a great job of cleaning the dishes. If you need one and can find one BUY it!

This thing is a total piece of crap. None of the metal parts fit together well and the finish is horrible. The cast iron grates on top are uneven and cause your pots and pans to wobble and make noise when you cook. I wish I didn't have to buy a 36" range...this is the only affordable one out there and I can tell why. Spend the extra $600 and buy anything but this. Everytime I use it I am disappointed. You really do get what you pay for.

This filter looks like the original filter but it doesn't perform like a true original equipment filter. I could only get 26% humidity out of it. I finally gave up and replaced it with an original filter which provides at least 36 - 40%.

I purchased this model last August (August 30, 2010) and it now needs a new control panel (approximately $200).  I am very displeased with the Whirlpool name now and will not purchase another Whirlpool appliance.

I bought my washer 11 months ago. Even though the wash cycles are pretty long, yet the clothes always came out clean. Now, the washer leaks all over my floor. The leak is coming from underneath the washer. Please do not buy this washer unless you want it leaking and destroying your floor.
summary: The washer leaks all over the floor!

reviewText: This was not what I expected. The quality of these was not what the original was. They do not fit properly, once they hit water they shrank and started to fall apart. The fact that one filter will fit many humidifiers is great. This however is not a good fitting filter for my unit. I'll have to try another and see how things end up.
summary: These did not meet quality of originals.

reviewText: Humidifier filter gauge read 'replace filter' after only two weeks. We tried flipping it over and cleaning the filter out but it still reads 'replace filter,' the one that came with the unit lasted exponentially longer.
summary: Stopped working after a few weeks.

reviewText: This stuff is quite stiff and included a good set of clamps.  With a lot of fiddling I got it on my LG drier and the clamp installed.  But when it came to attaching it to the vent outlet, I gave up after 30 minutes of struggle.  It is just about 1/4 inch too small and no amount of persuasion on my part could make it fit.  I gave up and went to the big orange box store and bought what they had.  Cheap as you'd expect but it did fit.
summary: Too small to fit my dryer outlet

reviewText: You need these.  Yup, you need these.  Just make sure you get the appropriate size.  Also, you don't have to use them just in the refrigerator.  You can use them to secure all your drawers too.  Get them.  You will be happy.  I recommend.
summary: You will be happy. I recommend

reviewText: I've been running this ice maker off and on for several months now. I really can't tell the difference between the size of the ice when you adjust to the different size settings, but it's all good. Very happy with this purchase.

I got these for my old Whirlpool electric stove. It has three small burners and one large which makes it very hard to find replacement drip guards without buying a set of two. They fit like the old ones did and get the job done. They will eventually rust due to neglect or abuse, but so far they're holding up very well.

I've owned at least 3 portable ice makers [we have uncooperative refrigerator ice makers]. This is by far the best one. It's much more sturdy & much better insulated than most other like models. It's well worth the higher price tag.

We have a wood burning stove which kills the humidity in the house.  Our old humidifier had spent a few years in the attic at our old house, where it got pretty hot during the summer and the wick was in pretty bad shape. We bought this wick as a replacement, and the difference is like night and day.  This works great and puts a lot more water into the air than the old one did. Great product.
summary: Really puts the water back into the air.

reviewText: I purchased this rice cooker as a wedding gift for my best friend, who mentioned she was using her daughter's rice cooker.  I asked her how she liked it.  She said it makes perfect rice.  I love the cheery red color, which was what I wanted, something different from the usual black or white.  She tends to have large gatherings, so this 16 cup rice cooker fits the bill, perfectly.  It was a good price too, from a well known company.  Would purchase again. To me, it's a perfect wedding gift.

I ordered this product shortly after returning from Asia with a strong appetite for steamed rice. This product does a great job, cooks a large quantity at one time, and cleans in the dishwasher very easily. The color and styling also goes well and gets lots of compliments. Well worth the money.

Love it. This dishwasher came with everything needed to connect it directly to the kitchen faucet. It fits perfectly well on any countertop space next to the faucet and you do not have to pay for professional installation.  However, if you have a big family this might be a little too small for you.

I bought two of these as a christmas gift, one for my parents and one for my in-laws. BOTH died within one year after purchase. The company said they are not repairable and told me there was nothing they could do. Garbage product.

Funny how this little thing quieted my icemaker down. Worked perfectly, no problems at all. I went ahead and replaced the water line at the same time just because it was so old. Now I can't hear the icemaker filling with water from upstairs.

I ordered two of these and I can't believe the difference they make!  No more shocking incidents!  I have to fill them up at least three times per day, however, that tells me how much moisture they're putting in the air!
summary: I ordered two of these and I can't believe the ...

reviewText: These "airwashers" have a double function, they humidify the air and remove dust. Very easy to take apart and clean, Much easier to clean than other humidifiers. No filters involved. Just make sure you don't break the central cylinder, it is a bit fragile and if you drop it when you take it out, it will be broken and it can't be repaired. Other than that one thing to be careful of, these are much easier to use than other humidifiers.
summary: Very easy to take apart and clean

reviewText: This unit does not humidify at all. I have a relative humidity reader and putting up right next to the unit the reading doesn't change at all. Perhaps it cleans the air, I don't know but it sure doesn't humidify at all.
summary: This unit does not humidify at all. I have ...

reviewText: We have an old Westinghouse-White stove, and my attempts at getting pans and trim rings for it have all failed... Until now! I HATE drip pans that don't separate from the trim rings. They're a pain to keep clean. But these fit just perfectly. My stove got a makeover! It's like a whole new appliance.

It works.  What's great about this system is there are no filters and multiple parts to clean and change.  Just one basic "maintenance free" box.  You take out the old, and the new one easily fits in the slot.  That's all there is to it.  Nothing more, nothing less.  It works fine and seems to last forever. (Of course, ours was quite dirty by the time I got around to changing it)

I RECEIVED MY REFIDGE USED AND IT HAD BOOST ADVERTISEMENT BUT, IT WORKS GREAT!  I HAVE HAD IT FOR A FEW YEARS AND BESIDES HAVING FROST IN IT FROM TIME TO TIME IT IS EASY TO DEFROST AND ENJOY THE EXTRA SPACE FOR BEVERAGES AND EVEN SNACKS. I LOVE THE GLASS DOOR BECAUSE IT HELPS PEOPLE TO SEE WHAT IS INSIDE WITHOUT STANDING WITH THE DOOR OPEN.  I PURCHASED MINE FOR $125. AND IT IS WORTH EVERY PENNY!

This review is not specificity for this product but for Broan.  We had terrible experiences with Broan.  It cost us thousands of dollars because of their poor quality product.  Their customer service is terrible.  So stay away from a Broan!
summary: We had terrible experiences with Broan

reviewText:
Honestly, I'm using this as a cellphone "jail" that allows for charging and hearing alarms. I like to keep my phone on my nightstand to use as an alarm, but my toddler has been playing with it before I'm fully awake. This latches closed tightly enough that toddler can't get into it (yet), and is open enough that it doesn't muffle the alarms at all.
Google Pixel fits diagonally with a regular-sized case.

This washer is so loud when it spins that I am afraid it is going to take off like a helicopter, a very loud helicopter. I checked to make sure it is balanced and it is. You also have to leave the door open when it isn't in use or it smells like stale water. I have a Bosch dishwasher and it is great. This thing is a mess

The first unit I bought from Lowes about four years ago.  After about a year, the lower unit caught on fire and melted the electronics inside the junction box.  Lowes and Bosch replaced the unit at no charge.  Now the upper control panel started smoking and no longer works.  Trying to work with Bosch but not much luck.

I've owned this refrigerator for years and it works great.  We live in a 100 year old house and the scale of most refrigerators would be overpowering in our kitchen.  I love the slim width and low profile of this refrigerator.  It has a surprising amount of room.  We have a second small under the counter refrigerator in our kitchen and this has been sufficient.  We have raised 3 children with this refrigerator and have never felt we wished it was larger.
summary: I've owned this refrigerator for years and it works great. We live in a 100 year old house ...

reviewText: This is my color. I could never find it again at Walmart after the first time, but then, that's why we have the internet. I'm a low maintenance girl and I like a nice color that will last a while, and this fits the bill.

The freezer delivered to my house was broken! Did not work for one second. It made the sound as if it would be fouling, but did not! I am sending it back- it will be picked up at my house. I guess I need to be thankful that it was broken from the beginning on, and did not stop working with actually food in it....well I guess it is obvious that I do not recommend this freezer
summary: Bad luck or a big no go

reviewText: I have had good bottles of wine around for years and every once in awhile I get a bottle that had just been at room temperature too long and wasn't that good. Since I have gotten this unit I am confident that I can keep my wines until they have matured properly. So far this has been great and I love to get those special wines that I can hold without fear of spoilage. THIS was a great purchase.

The best of its kind. It features three tiers which supports everything from simmering to searing. Also, the three burners work well at either low or high heat. This is the kind of stuff you want to have in your household.

I bought this dishwasher direct from ABT a few months ago, and I love it.  ABT delivered it, so they took it out of the box and set it up for me.  It was no problem hooking up the faucet adapter.  I live in an older apartment building so the faucet isn't fancy or brand name, and it went right together.  It hooks up easily and cleans very well.  It even has more space inside than the built-in at my old apartment.

In the 40 years I have been a home owner I have had four dishwashers. Only one has been replaced because it stopped working. The others were replaced because the racks became so rusted. Pricing replacement racks; I thought "I only want the rack, not a new dishwasher". Two lasted longer than designed because I ground off the rust and used these caps and glue. Now I would apply these caps to any new dishwasher I may purchase.

Second year motherboard failed. Third year pump failed. Fourth year pump failed. Fifth year motherboard failed. You get the picture. Piece of crap. Now the drum bearings are failing. Rips up clothing. Time to put the machine where it belongs. In the scrapyard along with the engineers who designed it.

PAID A TON OF MONEY FOR THIS MACHINE IT IS CONSTANTLY GETTING ERROR F 21. MY CLOTHES SOUR CONSTANTLY I HAVE TO WASH THEM TWO AND THREE TIMES TO GET THE SOUR OUT THEN IT DOESN'T HAVE MUCH WATER IN THE LOADER SO MY CLOTHES ARE NOT GETTING CLEANED PROPERLY IF I HAD TO DO IT AGAIN IT WOULD NOT BE THIS MACHINE. AVOID IF POSSIBLE IT IS HORRIBLE AND I'M REALLY DISAPPOINTED FOR WHIRLPOOL!!!!!!

We bought this washer when it first came out. I was a little nervous about spending so much, but I am so pleased with it! We have never had a problem and it does a great job cleaning. I can wash my quilts a bunch of jeans, and all our winter coats! I don't need to take them to the laundromat or cleaners!
My only problem is that I didn't buy the dryer and now I don't know where I can get it!

I gave this item one star because I couldn't give it zero stars.

I bought this ice maker to replace one almost identical.  The first one worked very well for over 3 years before it quit working.

I received this one on March 8, and it quit working on March 16.  That's right.  It worked for a week.  Of course I have thrown away all of the packaging, so I won't be able to send it back.

I've seen good and bad reviews on Vent-A-Hood products and really struggled with buying a Vent-A-Hood last year for a kitchen remodel.  Vent-A-Hood works extremely well!  I've never had a problem operating it or cleaning it.  It removes smoke and odors quickly and efficiently.  It cleans up very well, removing only two pieces and placing in the dishwasher.  Do not hesitate to consider Vent-A-Hood if you're looking for an effective, and still easy to clean, kitchen hood.

You'll use most of what's in this kit so it's a good assortment to have laying around. Don't even bother trying to keep it all organized in the package. They'll end up scattered on the floor in no time.

Despite the high power burner, this cooktop is not capable of maintaining high enough heat for stir frying or even sauteeing at high temperature.  Also, part of the logo flaked off almost immediately.

We had a factory serviceperson come to look at this unit.  He claimed that it was working just as it was supposed to ... so this one went back.  We're hoping for better luck with a different brand.  Not worth the money unless you don't care about cooking at high temperatures.
summary: Disappointment - does not get hot enough

reviewText: It is what it is__a foil dryer vent tube. After doing a dryer repair job, I bought it to replace the one I had for years and years. It does its job well, although the 8 foot one was just barely long enough. I hate the clamps that came with it, but that is just me--I  never learned how to use them quickly and efficiently, but I managed to get 'em on securely. Next time I will use hose clamps as others suggested.

This is a high quality duct and isn't thin like some of the other dryer transition ducts out there. The clamps are a bit hard to use but you can easily pull the clamp apart and "catch" the two end on each other so it stays open . Then wiggle the clamp on one end, put the duct on, and release the clamp. I had to have my son do that, if you have arthritis or something similar I would recommend buying a pair of screw clamps.
summary: This is a high quality duct and isn't thin like some of the other dryer transition ducts out there

reviewText: First off, this is a very nice looking cooktop.  The stainless steel accents are nice and the center grate is very attractive.  This is an excellent deal if the price stayed the same and the shipping charge wasn't $500+.  Not quite sure why Amazon emailed me about this 'closeout' deal, when in fact, it's not even closeout.  This needs to be taken down.

Absolutely the worst washing machine I have ever had the misfortune of using. This machine seems to go out of its way to unbalance itself. This machine will also skip over the drain and spin cycle and stop, I don't know if it is because it seriously unbalanced itself or it couldn't unbalance itself enough and decided to stop trying.

I've had my Kitchenaid dishwasher drawers for ~12 years.  I bought one of the first ones.  Over the weekend I was bragging about how great it was and jinxed myself.  On Monday, the bottom drawer started beeping and a red light came on.  The repairman will be here on Thursday.  The top drawer is still working perfectly.  I LOVE my dishwasher and I will be crushed if it cannot be fixed.  I couldn't ask for a better dishwasher.  I'm not sure why some people have had bad luck, but I'm not one!
summary: Over the weekend I was bragging about how great it was and jinxed myself

reviewText: Piece of crap.  There is no way to set the temperature for the alarm so it will beep seemingly randomly.  A true piece of crap.  This was a waste of money and I should probably return it, but I'm too lazy.
summary: Piece of crap. There is no way to set the temperature ...

reviewText: Bought two, but only installed one. I left for work in the morning and when I returned (less than 24 hours from install), the hose had busted at the coupler and water was spraying everywhere at my home. I immediately turned the water off, removed the hose and returned to amazon for a full refund. I do not recommend this product.

Just like the original filter that came with my Eureka vacuum.  Works great.  I rinse the foam pad that sits in front of the filter after every vacuuming.  I think if you keep the foam pad clean, it helps extend the life of the filter.  I replace mine every two years since I don't have a lot of carpeting or pets.

Control board failed just prior to end of warranty.  Dacor non responsive until warranty ended then replied "out of warranty".  Unable to find new control board.  Unable to repair.  Must buy new oven.  Needless to say, it won't be a Dacor.

This was not used for what you might expect. My husband had wanted to set up a water distillery and this was the cheaper way to purchase the amount and size of tubing we needed. We have enough left over to fix our icemaker if we ever need it and can distill water as well. Two for the price of one. Love it.

My new washer and dryer came with a short cord, so I bought this to alleviate the stretching of the cord that the delivery person seemed to think was "okay". I'm not the handiest person in the world, so I took a photo of the back of the dryer - a before shot, if you will, just in case it wasn't obvious what I was supposed to do. My dryer was back up and running, without risking an electrical fire, within 15 minutes. I read another review on this product that said, "If I can do it, anyone can." Ditto.
summary: I did it all by my lonesome...

reviewText: Very simple, but just right. Long and sturdy wooden handle and two different diameters of bristles make the job of cleaning under the fridge less of a hassle. I was able to clean all around the refrigerator compressor and get the caked dust out of there. Most of the dust fell to the floor, which I vacuumed after. I hosed the brush off later to clean the bristles. Probably not something you would use too often, but when you need it, it's nice to have the right tool.
summary: Simple, reasonably priced, and got the job done.

reviewText: We bought this to replace the one that we LOST (read: wasn't taken out) when we changed fridges.  I MUST have one of these in my fridge at all times -- a space saver and a perfect way to store refrigerated wine.  Every fridge should just COME with one -- why don't they?

easy to use logger to record temperature, dew point, and relative humidity.  It can log up to 32000 points throughout a period of time in different durations (2 sec to 2 hours).  It is battery powered so it won't affect the recording.
summary: easy to use logger to record temperature

reviewText: I don't think it's possible to make this product any worse than this. If they tried, they would fail. The finish began to peel on day 2 and by the end of the month this looks like worthless junk metal. I can't stress this enough, do NOT buy this thing. Avoid at all costs.
summary: The finish will peel and it will look like it's 100 years old.

reviewText: The transition piece was exactly what I ordered and came packaged so that there was no damage to the product. The seller didn't give me tracking information--which was a big bummer. That's the only drawback I can share.

This item looks exactly like the OEM one, only a lot cleaner than the one it replaced!
At just 25% of the store price, this was a no-brainer. I took a chance and ordered two pads, even though I had not tried one from this supplier before. I did check to make sure I had the right product number for my model of humidifier.

It fits perfectly, works perfectly and I have no regrets at all. In two years' time, I will be ordering a couple more from Amazon.
Highly recommended.
summary: Perfect replacement pad for our Carrier

reviewText: Our four year old Samsung washer stopped working.  I think the error code was "drain".  My husband found a YouTube video that detailed how to take the washer apart to replace the pump.  He replaced the pump and now all is well with the washer.  It did not look very easy taking the washer apart and putting it back together but the YouTube video really helped.

This worked for about a week and then stopped.  It "makes" ice but the ice doesn't fall into the basin and there's no way to knock it out.  This replacement is completely useless.  We will have to re-replace it!
summary: This replacement is completely useless. We will have to re-replace it

reviewText:
This didn't really solve my problem and I wound up buying an $800 dryer a few weeks later anyway, but for a few days it made me feel like I was the owner and  master of the things in my house rather than the other way around.

Five stars for that feeling.  Plus I like my new Samsung dryer (which is to say the credit card statement hasn't arrived yet).

This is the best stool for your kitchen. I've had one for 18 years, and I've bought one for each of my 3 grown children. It's never in the way, because a gentle nudge with your foot sends it wherever you want it to go!

I wasn't 100% sure this would fit my dishwasher because the part that came with it doesn't have the hole, but rather it's filled in.  However it did work and the hole matches up with a "stub" on the dishwasher itself.  No more wasted rinse aid...

After the defrost heater in my fridge broke, I had to manually defrost my freezer otherwise it would lose cold as ice accumulated around the cooling unit. After replacing that broken part with this, the fridge is doing what it's supposed to be doing without me having to melt ice around the freezer regularly. Saved me from having to buy a new fridge!

Very excited to find this part.  The dryer was working but it was not warm at all, so a friend looked at it and told me it was the heating element and directed me to this part.  It came sooner than estimated, was easy to put on, and is still working great after two weeks.  So much cheaper than the new dryer I thought I was going to have to buy.

When we returned from vacation, we discovered our Kenmore (Whirlpool) refrigerator had stopped working.  After a little troubleshooting, I deduced this thermostat was at fault.  Being a Kenmore, I looked at the Sears website for a part. It was $80, which seemed high, so I searched the part number on Amazon, finding the exact same part (same number, same manufacturer) for $20.

It took less than 30 minutes to install, and it has been working now for more than six months.  Thanks, Amazon!

The part I received is the mirror image of the part in the picture, and so is an unsuitable replacement.  Also, the central shaft hole is 6mm, rather than the 5.5mm of the motor's shaft and the old part I was looking to replace.  When attached to the motor it falls right off, and so is unsuitable for this reason also.
summary: The part I received is the mirror image of the ...

reviewText: This part is the exact replacement for what I need to repair my dishwasher. It is a factory part and it was shipped very fast at a very good price. Thank you very much and I want to thank you for the fast shipping.

We didn't want to spend a lot of money on a new dryer.  I just wanted something very basic because I always choose the same setting. This has an "energy efficient" setting which I always choose and then just press the start button.  I would have preferred to have the door open from right to left but that is a small inconvenience.  I like that the lint collects at the top of the dryer, instead of the door.  We've had the dryer for 3 months now, with no problems.
summary: So happy we chose this dryer!

reviewText: We own this dishwasher in black. Dishes are never fully dry and the finish on the front panel around the steam vent is bubbling. I suspect it is rusting underneath the finish. Design flaw? It's just over a year old so whirlpool won't cover. We bought the HH Gregg warranty but, unlike what the salesman told us, (he said the extended warranty covers absolutely anything) the warranty only covers mechanical issues. Do not buy whirlpool and do not buy from HH Gregg!!!!!!!!!

I'm glad I didn't have to call a repair person to fix my washer. The cold water didn't want to shut off. I had to keep checking washer and when finished I had to turn water valve off behind washer. My husband went to Samsung website and found the cold water valve needed replacing. So I checked on Amazon and they had. My husband replaced it and my washer is back to normal. Thank you AMAZON.

Love the glossy black of the base and the compact arrangement of knobs on the front.  The cast iron grates over the burners are really solid but not too heavy for me (63 year old female) to lift and maneuver.  I am not much of a cook but I haven't been burning too many pancakes on it.

I have owned this cook top for less than a year and the knobs scratch easily and warp underneath. The company's response is to delay replacing the knobs. I have been trying to get them replaced for two months and I still have not gotten new ones.

The only good thing I can say about this cooktop is it looks good. It takes a long time to heat up, a long time to cool off, either burns the food or is not hot enough to cook. The  controls mean very little. It does as it pleases. A real piece of junk with a high price tag.

Simply put, I am getting tired of seeing the repair man.  We have had it for almost 4 years now.  Within 6 months we seen the repair man.  At 1st it was every 6 months, then every 3-4, now I'd say I see him about every other month.  I am so glad I purchased the extended warranty but that will be running out soon and I will be getting a new washer that is NOT a Maytag.

Great complement to the washer.  Great for storing detergent and other products/items.  The unit is easy to install and connect to the Electrolux washer.  Provides a great space to place the washer at an ideal height.  This storage unit has a soft push open mechanism that makes for easy access to detergent and other cleaner items stored.

The product worked for about a month, almost like when the dryer was new. Then it started taking extra time to dry the clothes, up to 4 times for a load of towels. It hasn't been a full year and we're back where we started and have to buy another. I'm disappointed.
summary: almost like when the dryer was new

reviewText: This freezer fits anywhere! It was purchased as a gift and has been well used and appreciated. Our children have been so happy with this freezer that we plan to buy another one for our other children who will be buying a home soon. When I say it fits anywhere, it was first installed in a spare closet. When they decided that was not convenient, they easily moved it into a corner of the kitchen. They have saved more money having this freezer than the actual cost of the freezer!
summary: Lots of food storage for not a lot of space

reviewText: This worked out well for us, but we put quite a bit of work into it. I'm not sure how we would have gotten the final result we got without this. We bought two. We assembled them, then we did reinforce them with additional wood on the top. We stained them and built a bench. The two sit on top of the bench, side by side. We make beer and wine. The wine goes in the rack, the beer goes on the bench's shelves. It looks pretty good and serves us well.

Tasted similar to the lemon one, but this helps me in the summer months when it gets hot and humid and it seems like there's just never enough water that I can drink to not feel like I'm going to pass out or throw up
summary: That extra hyrdation I need in the summer

reviewText: I ordered several at once, the first one worked really good, the second and third ones did not last as long or keep things as fresh.  I would leave it up to anyone to give them a try, because they are an excellent product if they work the whole time.
summary: the first one worked really good, the second and third ones did not last ...

reviewText: This duct connector is priced very well and it suited perfectly for my application. FYI the duct connector is NOT super thick , it is actually very flimsy/bendable. But like I said it suited perfectly for what I needed it for.
summary: FYI the duct connector is NOT super thick, it is actually very flimsy/bendable

reviewText: the silverware basket that came with my dishwasher was flimsy and had holes in the bottom of the basket for about the last three years so we would have to strategically place silverware in there to keep them from falling through.  I am an avid Amazon shopper and i wish I had looked up this years ago.  It is a nice thick plastic, very sturdy and I am so glad I invested in it

It's a humidifier filter so my expectations were that it would fit the humidifier I ordered it for , which it did, and that it would do the job, which I assume it's doing. Hard to know, really, if a filter is actually filtering but I think it must be. The humidifier seems to be working just fine w//this filter in it.

This sucker is HUGE. Almost 3X the size of it's little brother. You don't want this guy unless you have a fridge-sized humidor. I am getting ready to install it in my fridge-sized humidor just as soon as I finish lining it with Spanish cedar.
summary: This sucker is HUGE. Almost 3X the size of ...

reviewText: Got a refund for this. It says it's supposed to fit into the Air King Range Hood, but it doesn't. Waste of money. You would think that since it's made by the same company that it would fit, but it doesn't.

Our washer and dryer are stacked and are on the second floor. From a structural point of view this is not desirable as the vibrations can loosen the structural elements of the house. Our washer has a five speed transmission and vibrates greatly, but the silent feet effectively isolate the washer.

Didn't fit my stove at all it was a waste of my money I don't know if this was supposed to be for American stoves or for European stoves they never specified so I lost out on the deal even with their adjustable pieces that they put in there didn't even fit my stove at all
summary: Lost my money not made for American stoves

reviewText:
I got this, but never used it.  I did not even open up the package.  I returned it & personally paid for the shipping myself.  I did not get a full refund of what I paid for it.  When I contacted the company, they said their refund was in accordance to amazon policies.

I was going to use this to connect 2 hoses.  I ended up buying a longer hose from Walmart, so I did not need this part.
summary: Be sure you know the refund policy

reviewText: This item is GREAT.  I added this to supplement the built-in silverware rack in my dishwasher... seems I always have way more silverware and utensils to wash than plates and glasses.  This was a very worthwhile purchase. Highly recommended.
summary: Works great if you need extra space for silverware.

reviewText: Fit perfectly, took about 30 minutes to replace.  If you're questioning your mechanical ability to do this...don't.  It's easy.  There's an access cover in the back of the washer to access the pump.  Three screws hold it on.  Once that is off the pump is easily accessible.  Pump has been working for a month or so now and it works perfectly.  Saved me a $200 repair bill or a $400 washer...for 30 minutes worth of work that's not too bad.

Do not buy this product. It will not last more than 2 years and after that nobody will know how to fix it so you will spend too much money trying to fix it. After that you will just buy a new dishwasher. believe me i've been there.

Why does whirlpool always make change of the rubber pad but makes no improvement at all? This set is the only one that matches the shape of the whirlpool in the kitchen but they are just not sized correctly. Looks like it is a little smaller than the original but even the original is too small for the holes.
summary: Looks like it is a little smaller than the original but ...

reviewText:
Avoid Maytag refrigerators at all cost.  This company is not what it once was.  My maytag fridge has been nothing but trouble from the day we had it installed.  And their service is laughable.  Their "Maytag Man" is/are actually third party repair reps that are unable to solve problems with their products.

HUGELY DISAPPOINTED with Maytag - both their products and their service.

This is the worst refrigerator I've ever purchased -- and it's all because of the icemaker. It's been repaired 7 times in the last 2 years thanks to having purchased an extended warranty. Predictably every 6 months, the icemaker stops functioning. There's a piece that jams. The repairmen are at a loss. I give up -- this weekend, I'm headed to my appliance shop and buying something different. Don't waste your money on this piece of junk.

After going to several retail outlets looking for a replacement filter with no success,I purchased  two of these filters so I would have a spare.  I was very disappointed that the filter did not fit the vacuum cleaner.  It was much too big. Now I am filterless and will need to replace the vacuum cleaner.

This thing is huge. I managed to situate it on the bottom rack of my home dishwasher. It comes in handy after big parties because it holds a lot of silverware. If you need something like this at home and it doesn't fit you can always expand a few holes on the bottom of it so that the tangs on your bottom rack will fit into the bottom of this thing.

Adhesive between the magnet strip and the silicon piece failed.  The magnet became welded to the side of the oven and had to be removed with a chisel (which damaged the finish,of course.  And the silicon piece warped.

I don't know what the ideal solution is, but this is NOT it.

If you're the type of person who's always complaining, "They don't build things the way they used to," this dryer vent hood will make your day.

UPDATE:  After six months this vent is working as it should.

I did not buy this stove from Amazon. However I bought it from another retailer, and I would like to warn all potential buyers - stay away from this JUNK. I have had it for only 9 months and it already broke twice. The problems with the Frigidaire stoves are their control panels - they just keep breaking. When it breaks you will most likely get error code F13. My advice is DO NOT BUY THIS ONE OR ANY Frigidaire stoves. And to add insult to the injury it takes at least TWO WEEKS to have it fixed!

FYI: Earlier I posted a positive review of this product.  But about a month after I wrote that, my dryer started having all the same problems that everybody else talked about.  It basically just didn't get hot enough and then it turned off way too early.  It's sad, because when this dryer worked, it worked well.  But I exchanged it for a used whirlpool, which has been hot and noisy but very reliable.

At first, I used tape to hold it in place, thinking the filter was to blame.  Then I took a flashlight and looked into the space where the filter goes.  The old ripped filter that this replaced had allowed a massive build up of lint, which was pushing the new filter out of place.  Using a screwdriver, I removed the lint.  This filter is great, and has worked flawlessly for months.
summary: This filter is great, and has worked flawlessly for months

reviewText: Awesome oven!  Works wonderfully, looks good!  The only downside was that the man from delivery company would not (could not) carry it up our stairs.  I had the guy deliver it to our side yard, then arranged for  a couple of strong men to carry it up 15 steps and into our kitchen.  I had a local appliance repair man install it and it has been great!  Arrived right before Thanksgiving and proved its worth on Thanksgiving dinner, turkey and all!

I have used this product for about a year and a half now and still going strong.  The only problem I've had with it is after about six months the gravity drain started to pull away from the machine. If you have an apartment or dorm room this is a great product.
summary: If you have an apartment or dorm room this is a great product.

reviewText: This was a perfect fit for the old one.  Filter says "permanent" but its only permanent until it turns dark with age or mold.  Had no success cleaning the old one, it just started disintegrating around the edges.  So I bought a new permanent filter to replace the old permanent filter.

We recently purchased a Bosch dishwasher and have had extreme problems with it from the get go. Finally, we asked Bosch to replace it after their 4th unsuccessful attempt to fix it. They flatly refuse. This machine has been non functional almost the entire 6 months that we have owned it. I am so disappointed in Bosch, learned the hard way that they just don't care about the consumer. I recommend you buy a different brand.... Any brand but Bosch.

My compressor broke in less than 3 months of regular use. They sent A&E to check it out. The techniican didn't even file a report and lied to me about what was wrong with the fridge. They sent a different company to come look at it and they confirmed that the compressor is broken. I called Whirlpool cust service and was told that the warranty only covers repairs not replacement even though I paid over $1000 for a defective product. I am so livid and will NEVER buy another Whirlpool product.

We have the Kenmore version.  Anytime there is a power fluctuation, the unit displays an error message and beeps constantly.  Only solution is to shut it off and wait several days before we can use it again.
summary: We have the Kenmore version. Anytime there is a ...

reviewText: Doesn't clean well at all.  From what I can tell washer is just not capable of washing anything thoroughly. Sure the items come out less dirty, but they are still not clean. I am extremely disappointed. It's unsanitary and it's making our allergies worse.
summary: Items come out grungy, not clean

reviewText: This is the worst appliance I have ever bought. The ice maker when working puts out enough ice for one person. It only works 50% of the time though. 3 times a week you have to thaw it out and reset it. The freezer drawer slides are already broken so you have to hold up the drawer to open or search for food. The buttons on the door are heat sensitive and you have to blow on your fingers to make them hot before the controls function. I can't wait for a class action lawsuit over this piece of crap.
summary: Don't buy or accept even if free.

reviewText: I strongly recommend anyone to NOT BUY products from this manufacturer.  Their products are cheap and will stop working after a few months.  I was told "the warranty would only apply to the original purchaser", and since I purchased a "state-of-the-art" home from a flipper, the warranty is no good for me.  This kind of warranty shows to me the character behind the people running this company.  They don't trust their own product to give it a real warranty.
summary: I strongly recommend anyone to NOT BUY products from this manufacturer

reviewText: We purchased this fridge in October of 2011. A few weeks ago it stopped cooling and making a lot of noise. Shortly after that happened we started smelling smoke coming from the fridge. After taking the back panel off, we discovered the compressor had melted. Very disappointed that a $360 fridge didn't last more than a little over a year.

DO NOT BUY! CUSTOMER SERVICE IS THE WORST WITH THE FISHER PAYKEL COMPANY! THE DISH WASHER IS SUPPOSE TO BE HIGH END. THE HANDLE BROKE OFF AND THEY CANT HELP YOU.  POOR DESIGN, DRAIN ISSUES WITH CLOGGING, THE WORST DISHWASHER I EVER OWNED!!!  THE MOST EXPENSIVE DISHWASHER AND THE CHEAPEST ONE WOULD HAVE WORKED BETTER!! DO NOT PURCHASE!!!!! NOTHING BUT PROBLEMS WITH THIS CRAP!
summary: CUSTOMER SERVICE IS THE WORST WITH THE FISHER PAYKEL COMPANY

reviewText: If you don't need a dishwasher and will wash all your dishes by hand before putting them in, get this one. Absolutely atrocious at cleaning and needs to have its filter cleaned with great difficulty after every use. Manufacturer has a very limited warranty. Do not buy.

After only 4 1/2 years I had to buy a new machine.  My husband and I are in our 70's so this machine definitely did not get over worked.  Last year the spin cycle was not working and this time all the water would leak out of the tub.  The repair was going to be so costly (and they weren't sure if it could be repaired) that we had to buy another machine.  Very disappointing!!!
summary: After only 4 1/2 years I had to buy a ...

reviewText: I had this washer installed today, and it makes a horrible high pitched screeching noise that sounds like a rodent got caught inside it. I had the repair man take a look at it and he told me that there is nothing wrong with it, the GE models just make that high pitched sound normally?! So, needless to say I am not OK with that. So, I'm going to exchange this for a Whirlpool and see if those are quieter.

This dishwasher is not appropriately named!!! it is NOT a dishwasher!  It leaves the dishes in worse condition than when they went in and there is no water source for the upper rack.  Too many "rules" like making sure there is no cold water in your hose by running hot water through your faucet BEFORE you start washing your dishes.  Faster and more clean by washing them by hand!!  I actually don't give it any stars.
summary: It leaves the dishes in worse condition than when they went in and there is ...

reviewText: My home builder unfortunately epoxied one of these to the side of my house. Within two years, all of the plastic flaps had become brittle and cracked.  Two of the flaps had broken off completely, leaving the vent completely exposed to the elements. I had to purchase another vent just to replace the flaps on the existing one. I'm sure I'll be back in another couple of years unless I finally get fed up enough to tear the whole vent out, epoxy & all

Flimsy piece of junk. Kept falling apart during installation. The tube easily breaks open, so we had to duct tape it shut. Then the vent hood kept popping off because the tabs that are supposed to latch on to the tube don't work. Definitely made installation extremely frustrating. Also, the plastic that the vent hood is made out of doesn't seem like it will last more than one summer in the heat.
summary: Don't waste your time or money

reviewText: It should be called the Condenser Electric Tumbler.  All it does is tumble your clothes and not dry them.  Another reviewer mentioned that he 'despises' this appliance.  That is probably the most accurate word.  We despise it so much that while we were shopping for a home in a high rise, we always made sure it wasn't a ventless situation.  The pedestrians on the ground floor should be grateful that our 19th floor condo doesn't have a window large enough for me to throw this appliance out of.

This dishwasher really stinks.  We've had it for 2 years and have had constant problems with it.
Recently the control panel broke and they actually blamed us -- they said we must have gotten water on it !  Really ?!?  A dishwasher that can't get wet.

I'd stay away from this brand.  It might have been good at one point, but it's a piece of junk now.
