This product worked for 6 months and then stopped working.  The window on returns was one month.  I spent $78 for an item that does not work and cannot be returned.  I am very disappointed in the item and in the return policy and in the fact that I threw away $78.
summary: I am very disappointed in the item and in the return policy and ...

reviewText: This stuff left a horrible smell and taste in both my fridge and my freezer.  What a horrible mistake I made to use this product in my new fridge/freezer just so the ice would taste better.  Now everything in there tastes awful;  it permeates even the frozen food.  I am using charcoal and baking soda and I still can't get it back to normal.  Not a good idea!!

I bought this item along with the warranty. It broke in less than a year. We had 2 different companies come out and look at it and the warranty would not cover it. So, why did I pay for a warranty? And why did I purchase a piece of junk?  buyer beware. Go to your local appliance store.

This gasket worked well for 3 months before it sagged in the top corner and the rubber tore.  Now air leaks into my fridge and causes condensation.

Although this gasket is made as an original part, it is not at all constructed like the original gasket.  And after having bought a few in the past few years it doesn't matter if you buy the knock off one from eBay or the OEM from Amazon.  They are all of inferior quality.
summary: Rubber is too thin and stretchy.

reviewText: These things are a colossal rip-off, but what can you do if you need one? This is a tiny piece of rubber, not much bigger than a pencil eraser. I don't blame the vendor, but GE. They should sell these in packs of 8 at least. They fall out easily and get lost or swept or vacuumed up. I get that there's cost in stocking and packaging these, so why not include several in one pack? They can't cost more than 1 or 2 cents each to make.
summary: Try not to get screwed by GE

reviewText: Bought this refrigerator from our new home contractor, and one week out of warranty started leaking water onto the floor.  The freezer defrost condensate drain plugged. The serviceman said he had seen it many times in the KitchenAid and that it is a design flaw.  Stay away from KitchenAid unless you want to start paying for repair (in our case $160) the minute it goes out of warranty!!
summary: Repair needed one week out of warranty

reviewText:
These lint traps only work well for the first few loads. The reason for this is that the mesh is so tight that even a little bit of lint buildup will block the flow of water. Once it hits that point (after 5-10 washes), the trap will fill up with water faster than it can filter it and will come off the hose.

I switched back to metal lint traps.
summary: Only last for a few loads

reviewText:
Very frustrating. I replaced the old seal that was falling apart, but not leaking. I was able to 'adjust' the new one so it didn't leak and was able to run thru one cycle.
After that, it will not hold. I'd put the old one back, but had thrown it away after it worked for a full cycle. Now what? I guess buy a new dishwasher after spending $150 to spruce up the old one.
I hate to say it. But, no more American crap for me.

I bought this for our dryer, which has the same part number as the one for refrigerators.  Unfortunately the two versions have different motor shaft diameters.  This one has the smaller shaft hole and wouldn't fit my dryer which has the larger shaft diameter. No way of knowing if you'll get the right one or not.
summary: Watch out for motor shaft diameters! Does not fit dryers.

reviewText:
I had frost on my freezer door and bought a new gasket and replaced it and now the frost is worse than before.  The gasket appears to fit correctly but obviously something is not right.
Also, when I first put this in my wishlist the price was $64.  I looked around for a better price and when I got ready to order the price jumped to $78.  I went ahead and ordered it and a few days later I noticed it went back down to $64.  I found that very odd.  I complained to Amazon but never heard anything.

This dishwasher has been a complete and total disappointment.  Poorly designed, bottom rack falls out of dishwasher because of "gravity" weighted rollers and no secure track to guide them.  Frequently clogs and will not operate.  I have owned many dishwashers in my life and this is the WORST I have ever owned.  I will never ever buy a Bosch product again.

I ordered this at the end of last winter, but didn't use it until this fall.  It was stored in a clean, dry area, in the original packaging.  When used in the humidifier, it made the entire house smell like dead fish.  This is clearly an off brand, not an actual Sunbeam filter.  I quickly replaced it with the actual Sunbeam filter and had no odor problems.  Don't waste your money.

After 8 or 10 visits trying to fix this dishwasher, the company we purchased it from finally installed a new one. It had the exact same problem. It works fine for the first few washes, but then the door won't stay fully closed so it keeps stopping mid-cycle. Several times. I have to use a wooden spoon stuck in the top to make it stay closed. It's horrible. Don't buy this dishwasher.

I will never buy another Bosch. I bought it less than three years ago and it has needed so many repairs that I'm buying a new dishwasher (not a Bosch!) rather than have one more repair call -- I've spent as much repairing this Bosch as it originally cost me. The last repair man said Bosch dishwashers were cheaply made and fragile. He recommended a Samsung or LG.

We've had a Miele dishwasher for the past 8 years.  Four years ago, we replaced the main wash pump (over $600,) and were just told that we need to do the same AGAIN.  Two main wash pumps in 8 years????  That is not reliable in my opinion.
Yes, it's a really quiet dishwasher, but so is just about every other dishwasher by every other manufacturer out there....

I RECEIVED THE PART PROMPTLY. HOWEVER, THE PART DID NOT WORK WHEN INSTALLED.  THE PART ACTUALLY LOOKED LIKE THE PART I JUST REMOVED.  IT LOOKED LIKE IT WAS A RECYCLED PART. I HAVE REPLACED THE IGNITER ON ANOTHER OVEN AND THE PART WAS DARK BLACK AND GRITTY AND SHINY.  THE PART THAT I RECEIVED WAS GRAY AS IF USED AND NOT VERY GRITTY AND DULL.
summary: THE PART ACTUALLY LOOKED LIKE THE PART I JUST REMOVED

reviewText: Wound up getting rid of it and going back to conventional methods. Worked erratically after about a year.  Still under warranty but found out there was no local service for it and we would have to uninstall and pay to send it to the company for repair.
summary: Wound up getting rid of it and going back to ...

reviewText: This is the second one that I have purchased in three years and it now is malfunctioning.  The washer-motor went out in the first one I bought and now the seal is coming loose on my new one!  Upon further inspection of the leaking, I found that the spot-welds on the retaining area that holds the seal in place are rusted out already!  This dishwasher has only been installed and in-use for approximately 6 months. I would NOT recommend this product to anyone.

The only positive thing I can say about this dishwasher is that it looks pretty. I don't know why we've even kept it for so long (almost 2 years) because it does a terrible job of cleaning the dishes and it doesn't dry them. I'm not going to waste my time calling a GE technician, I'm just going to replace it with something else. DO NOT BUY THIS DISHWASHER!

Worst washer I have ever owned. No matter how I distribute my clothes in this washer, they always end up a jumbled, twisted mess. The washer goes "off balance" all the time. And the cycles are ridiculously long.  I thought it was going to be efficient, and boy! Was I wrong!  Do not purchase!!!

I purchased this product and it broke in a year and a half.  Replacement parts were pricey nor did whirl pool offer any type of service for where I live (Guam). I will never buy a whirl pool product again.

If you don't need a dishwasher and will wash all your dishes by hand before putting them in, get this one. Absolutely atrocious at cleaning and needs to have its filter cleaned with great difficulty after every use. Manufacturer has a very limited warranty. Do not buy.

We purchased this unit over a year ago.  The control panel stopped working just before the warranty expired, so at least we didn't have to pay for that.  Now it's just out of warranty and the heating element just snapped on it.  I wish we'd paid a bit more and gone with a different brand.  Who knows what'll break on it next.
You'll save money in the long run by just purchasing a better unit.

This is the worst refrigerator anyone can ever purchase. It builds up frost on the back wall of the freezer and keeps a lot of noise.
I have to defrost the refrigerator every two or three weeks since I have bought it 8 months ago. There is a problem with the defrosting and Whirlpool would only fix it but it goes back and do the same thing months later. I will never buy another product from Whirlpool again.
summary: This is the worst refrigerator anyone can ever purchase

reviewText: Do not waste your money on a Whirlpool dishwasher.  They are CRAP!  If you like leftover food stuck to your dishes and cloudy dirty dishes, then by all means buy a Whirlpool.  I used to think this brand was one of the better ones, but they are not.  I will NEVER buy another Whirlpool appliance again!  Not only that, but they do NOT stand behind their products when they do crap out (which will be within 6 months).  I will be buying LG going forward!
summary: Do not buy a Whirlpool appliance!

reviewText: The ice maker stopped making ice at 14 months. Warranty only good for 12 months. Several hundred dollars to repair. My 14 year old Frigidaire always made ice and never had an issue. We bought the Whirlpool to upgrade but that was a mistake. The water filter must be replaced every 3 months and that alone costs no less than 30 bucks each time. Don't waste your money on this Whirlpool piece of crap! I will never buy Whirlpool again!

Cheap flimsy material. They don't even cover the burner, they just sit on top. Actually they don't even do that, the material is so thin they're twisted. My mom wanted something to cover the burners to make the stove look nice, and it looks worse. Save your time on this one!

THIS IS NOT A TWO BURNER COOKTOP.  This is the worst case of false advertising I've seen in a long time.  The photo has nothing to do with what is being sold.  This seller is showing a cooktop, but is only selling a COVER for a cooktop.  When I contacted them, they said "too bad".  As far as they're concerned, as long as the word cover is in the description, they aren't doing anything wrong.  I've bought a lot of stuff from Amazon, but this is the most dishonest seller I've ever encountered.

This is so basic. It does not dry evenly. I just had a pair of gloves in the dryer, one was dry the other was wet. It never blows out wrinkles either. In fact, if you have something that is wrinkly and you want to fluff it to get the wrinkles out, it actually becomes even more wrinkly.
Worse dryer I ever owned. I can't wait for it to go so I can replace it.
summary: Wrinkly maker and doesn't dry evenly

reviewText: I also had a bad experience with Frigidaire products. Seven years ago we bought a Frigidaire Elements, dishwasher, microwave and refrigerator. The dishwasher stopped working, so we called the number the company provided. A woman told us it was useless to try and fix the dishwasher, so we took it to the dump. A month later the microwave stopped working. I expect the refrigerator will go next. Maybe my expectations were too high, but I will not get involved with the company again. I am very disappointed.

This refrigerator has never worked correctly. The ice dispenser only works occasionally and now the water dispenser freezes solid.  Even though the problems have never stopped, Electrolux has stopped fixing them. They now say  I have to pay for them because it is out of warranty. Very disappointed in this brand and will never buy another Electrolux product.

This is the worst purchase i have ever made on Amazon!!! It stopped working just after a year and there was absolutely no ANY customer service. Shame on you Golden Vantage, shame!! It's absolutely garbage. I'd have given it a negative 5 star if possible. WILL NEVER buy any Golden Vantage product ever. And will tell everyone I know to avoid any Golden Vantage product. Shame on you, Golden Vantage!!! You are a scumbag company.
summary: This is the worst purchase i have ever made on Amazon

reviewText: I had a question about the battery and received immediate response. Arrived on time and took it out of the box and installed it within minutes. It already had more than 3/4 of a charge and have been using it fine ever since. Good choice, good price.

I have had the dishwasher since December 2014 and it has not drain consistently since the beginning either during the wash cycle or rinse cycle. GE has sent three different repair companies to replace the pump, the control panel, and ultimately the entire dishwasher, yet it still does not drain consistently. Sometimes it drains and sometimes it doesn't. I do not recommend purchasing this dishwasher. I was just online to try to see if others have had a similar issue - I do not usually write reviews.

This item was so very disappointing. It came with ten parts missing so it is not usable.  When we called the place to get help they said they were no longer going to make this item so couldn't replace the parts. We cannot use this item so it is useless. It was a Christmas gift for someone and very disappointing to me and the person I gave it to.

This is advertised as being 24 inches wide - it is not! It's about 23.5 inches wide, which means it's not wide enough to stay in the oven. The seller needs to give accurate dimensions for this product. I'm returning it because it is not the correct size.

Purchased this controller in late April. Installed it in a plastic box, wired it, configured it, no problem. The unit was working great until a few days ago when I noticed the terrarium humidifier that it controls was continuously running. The display read 99.9%; I had it set at 65%. I checked all the connections, tried to reprogram it, tried to reset it, nothing works. Very disappointed it only lasted 3 months.

This ice maker has hung three times in the open position for the water solenoid (allowing water to run far beyond the 5 seconds required), causing my ice bucket to fill and water to run out of the freezer and flood my kitchen. I am beyond aggravated at this point. I replaced both the solenoid and the ice maker at the same time. I just want my ice maker to work properly.
summary: ICE MAKER keeps water running beyong 5 seconds randomly flooding the freezer and kitchen

reviewText: This has to be the cheapest thing I've ever purchased.  It is so flimsy I actually tore the frame by accident when I opened the envelope.  Not worth it at all -- flimsy, and with gaping holes.  I can't see how it filters anything!

I installed two new seals, this one and another in April and now in September it is in much worse shape than the one I took off. It has cracked and peeled. Obviously not good quality. I am VERY unhappy. I feel I should have left the old ones on.
summary: this one and another in April and now in September it is in much worse shape than the one I took off

reviewText: Unfortunately it only lasted 5 months.  Which sucks because I thought I had convinced the wife that we didn't need a new dishwasher because the latch broke.  Do you know how long I'm going to have to hear about this now?

Just like everyone else, mine lasted 13 months and broke. Maytag denies there's any problem with them. They offered to sell me a "Repair +1" plan where they repair it and add one more year to the warranty for $250. I paid $500 for the machine, so I'm basically renting a dishwasher for $250 a year. What a piece of junk. This is the last Maytag I'll ever buy again. The service was junk, the product was junk.
summary: Avoid this, and all other Maytag products. It is not worth the money.

reviewText: This washer does not clean.  It does not fill with enough water to clean the clothes.  The lack of water also means it can't rinse the detergent out of the laundry.  I've had the washer for two months and will contact GE for repair.  A brand new washer should not need to be repaired.  In the mean time, I run the laundry through additional wash cycles without detergent to rinse it.  Also using very little detergent because of the problem.

The check valves are a great idea, but all they did was cause us to be frustrated.  About every 3-4 loads the check valves would trip even though no leaks had occurred.  The reset procedure made  these hoses a big waste of my time.  A few times per week I had to go under the laundry tub to shut  off the water and disconnect the hoses.  Doing that repeatedly was a waste of my time.
summary: The check valves are a great idea, but all they did was cause us ...

reviewText: The screw on rings for these hoses are entirely separate from the hoses themselves. This means that you need two hands to install it - one to pull on the hose to keep it pressed against the ring, and the other hand to try to screw the ring onto the pipe.  Without much space to work in, it turned out to be impossible for us to get one of them on. My husband had to go to Home Depot to pick up new ones.

These filters don't last anywhere near as long as advertised. I've used distilled water in my kid's vaporizer in hopes of extending the life of the filters, but instead of 30 days, I can't get more than a few nights use out of them. I think 6 days was the longest I've used one before the smell became bothersome, and it was more than discolored by that point. I have followed all instructions to the letter, but still the end result is the same - smelly, moldy, discolored filters.
summary: I wish I could give a zero star review.

reviewText: This filter just doesn't work. It doesn't add moisture OR maintain the current moisture level. It takes 2 days for 9 gallons of water to be completely used up, and I honestly don't know where it went because it's certainly not in the air. I've re-soaked it several times and it doesn't make a difference. I'm really disappointed.

I have replaced the top hose 7 times and the lower hose once. The design is terrible, a good quality hose should last more than six months. I wouldn't buy this washing machine again. For that matter I intend to never buy another LG product. This washing machine may be the worst appliance I have ever owned.
summary: Holes in hose every six months.

reviewText: DON"T BUY THIS ITEM!!!!! The display is total garbage! You can't read the display when you face it directly. The ONLY way you can see anything on the display is if you are above it looking down at an angle. Or, if you mount it so that the display is about 45 degrees from horizontal, instead of being completely vertical like in all the photos on this ad. Save yourself the time, money, and effort. DON"T BUY THIS ITEM!!!!! Now I get to go through the return process.
summary: DON'T BUY THIS ITEM! THE DISPLAY IT TERRIBLE!!!

reviewText: These filters are so flimsy. Nothing like the original filter for this humidifier. I don't know if they have discontinued this humidifier along with the filters or what, but I couldn't find the ones I normally bought. It is my favorite humidifier, but these filters really stink. I should have known when they arrived all stuffed in a ziplock bag.

These Whirlpool knobs break as easily as the Jenn-Air knobs the stove originally came with.  Have to keep replacing them over and over.  They usually only last a few months, to at most a year on the back burners that aren't used as much.  We will never buy a Jenn-Air again, nor will we ever buy a Whirlpool appliance if they can't even make a decent knob.  How embarrassing for these two once previously well-respected brands!

It worked for five (5) months.  It has now completely stopped working. Amazon provides zero warranty assistance, even though the item page claims that Amazon provides warranty support.  This is extremely frustrating and will make me think twice before ordering through Amazon.
summary: After five (5) months it has completely stopped working!

reviewText: $50!! Are you serious.  Surely you meant $5 or maybe you misheard and it is supposed to be $15.  $50 is highway robbery for this flimsy thing.  They warp within just a few months.  If it was made of aluminum or steel, it might be worth $30, but this is flimsy degradable plastic.

It's hard to say anything good about a product that is supposed to do nothing besides dry your wet clothes, but fails miserably at the one task it is designed for.

The dryer simply does not dry my laundry load.  I have put as few as 5 items in it, and it STILL requires FIVE (5), 45 minute cycles to dry that small load.

Moreover, it advertises that it has an automatic mode which will stop the drying process when the clothes dry, but that automatically stops when the clothing is still very wet.
summary: Terrible Dryer, cannot dry laundry at all

reviewText: Beware that Maytag will not stand behind their products.  I had to do a repair within the warranty period and when the same problem continued 5 months later, but outside of the warranty period they refused to do more than provide replacement parts, leaving me with expensive service/labor bills.  I have since spoken with several other Maytag appliance owners and they have had similar problems.  I strongly recommend purchasing from a company that stands behind its products.
summary: I strongly recommend purchasing from a company that stands behind its products

reviewText: I don't have this particular dryer, but I do have a Bosch Axxis dryer that's less than 10 years old, and I will say that based on that experience, I will never ever get a Bosch dryer ever again. Way overly complicated controls that don't really work. Dryer turns on and off constantly, like every 30 seconds -- talk about maddening. And it takes way too long to dry clothes. I am very surprised Bosch put such a high priced piece of junk out there.
summary: like every 30 seconds -- talk about maddening

reviewText: I bought this as a replacement for a Jenn-Air cooktop because it advertises that it is.  But it isn't.  It doesn't look at ALL like the original and it is too large for the space and doesn't fit.  The coil is wrong, the center button is black matte instead of glossy like the black enamel cooktop and I do NOT recommend your buying this as  a replacement for a Jenn-Air coil.

WAS INFORMED BY THERMADOR TECHNICIAN THAT THESE FILTERS DO NOT WORK WITH A THERMADOR REFRIGERATOR - THE ICE MAKER STOPPED PRODUCING ICE AS A CONSEQUENCE OF USING THIS FILTER. THIS IS AN INCOMPATIBILITY ISSUE.
summary: If you have a Thermador - CAVEAT

reviewText: I ordered a 3 pack, but 2 of the 3 were defective and water was not passing through them correctly.  One was not allowing any water to pass through it and no water = no ice.  Another worked but was very noisy, again due to water not passing through it correctly.  All in all, 1 of the 3 worked, so not a good buy.

This is an aftermarket gasket and, at least in my experience, lacks the ability to seal the freezer compartment as the OEM version does. Within 12-18 hours hoar frost was deposited on the upper interior of the freezer compartment.  I definitely would NOT recommend purchase of this item.
summary: I definitely would NOT recommend purchase of this item

reviewText: The replacement part shown in the photo has a threaded attachment for the incoming water line.  The part shipped has a non-threaded attachment.  If you have need a threaded attachment, you may wish to verify that a replacement part with a threaded attachment will be shipped.
summary: Item delivered is not the item pictured

reviewText: IT TAKES TOO LONG TO WASH AND IT DOES NOT CLEAN THE CLOTHES VERY GOOD. STILL HAVE THE NASTY DIRTY SOCK SMELL .  THE ANNOYING THINGS ARE YOU HAVE TO CONSTANTLY CLEAN THE LID AND DRAIN THE DIRTY WATER AT THE BOTTOM VERY SLOWLY.

We bought this last year, in March,  for a house that we were remodeling.  We moved into the house in August and the vent hood has already died!!! We had our electrician check it out and he said the "mother board" needed to be replaced.  We called the company...no answer but left a voice mail....no return phone call!!!  URGH!!  If I could give a zero rating, I would!!!
summary: We bought this last year, in March, for ...

reviewText: This is not a true replacement part.  Opening is twice the size as shown in the picture.  I bought a replacement part with the same number from another company and it was great.  This one is not the same and does not fit..  Beware that if you purchase from this company and it is wrong that amazon does nothing to help and it is up to the company to decide if you can return it. They totally misrepresented the part.

The part went on without any issue but failed within a week. I ended up changing out the dishwasher. Personally, I think it is a cheaply made part and I thought the same about the original once I saw it. Perhaps that's how they all are...I don't really know. Maybe mine was faulty.
summary: The part went on without any issue but failed within ...

reviewText: I gave this filter one star and that was too many. I installed this filter and purged the first gallon and I accepted the fact that the first few days all the water tasted like the plastic filter. Its been over a week since and the water still tastes horrible! Ill never buy this filter again and I hope no one else does either. It proves the theory that you get what you pay for.
summary: Do not buy this filter! Do not buy this filter!!!!

reviewText:
Disappointed. Got it as a gift for my dad  as a Fathers Day gift . Arrived and he set it up, plugged it in and it did not work.  There were definitely some other bad reviews but I figured I would take a chance. Maybe I shouldnt have. A replacement is been sent so I guess I will cross my fingers for now.

Replacement update-
It arrived. WIRES ARE HANGING OUT AND CORNER IS CRACKED!! THIS IS THE SECOND ONE SENT. Now we have two defective ones!!!!!!

worst product I've ever bought !!!!!
Starts up by itself and the manufacturers wouldn't even acknowledge my complaints.  !!!!!!
don't buy anything from this manufacturer!!!
This is without a doubt the worst product I've ever bought from Amazon.com!!!

Please do a simple search online to see all the issues the ice-maker in this refrigerator has. It started freezing up as soon as the warranty was over, at first it was a couple of times a month not it's couple of times a week. We purchased ours in 2016, maybe since then Samsung has made changes to or updated the ice-maker in these models but they did not handle the original design flaw the way they should've. No more Samsung products for us.
summary: Please do a simple search online to see all the ...

reviewText: I bought a handful of these and they all died within a month or two.  Replaced the batteries and again they were all dead within a few months.  They might be fine for short term use, but I wanted to monitor refrigerators and freezers long term.  For that purpose the frequent battery replacement makes them too much effort.  I got frustrated and threw them away.

These just don't work. They don't add moisture and they don't maintain the current moisture level. I've re-soaked it several times and it doesn't make a difference. It takes 2 days to empty my 9-gallon humidifier with no measurable increase in humidity. I'm really disappointed.

The tabs on the filters are too small and do not completely press the tabs down on the water filter housing.  If the tabs are not fully pressed down you will get no flow or low flow.  I tried two of them and had to put the old filter back in.
summary: No flow due to faulty design

reviewText: Beware that Maytag will not stand behind their products.  I had to do a repair within the warranty period and when the same problem continued 5 months later, but outside of the warranty period they refused to do more than provide replacement parts, leaving me with expensive service/labor bills.  I have since spoken with several other Maytag appliance owners and they have had similar problems.  I strongly recommend purchasing from a company that stands behind its products.
summary: I strongly recommend purchasing from a company that stands behind its products

reviewText: Beware that Maytag will not stand behind their products.  I had to do a repair within the warranty period and when the same problem continued 5 months later, but outside of the warranty period they refused to do more than provide replacement parts, leaving me with expensive service/labor bills.  I have since spoken with several other Maytag appliance owners and they have had similar problems.  I strongly recommend purchasing from a company that stands behind its products.

reviewText: Don't waste your money, because if you have to pay to ship them back, then you've wasted your money.  Mine came in with scratches all over them, and you cannot touch them without leaving your fingerprints! Very disappointed

The way the picture is taken makes it look different than what I received. Then the plastic broke when I put it on the post of the stove. It was more than I wanted to pay and was thin plastic. Difficult to find what I'm looking for I guess.
summary: Thin plastic and it broke upon installation

reviewText: Purchased 1 month ago. Installed immediately. Worked for 3 weeks. Woke to find a puddle of water on the kitchen floor. The drinking water side failed and was allowing a slow drip from the dispenser.  I tried multiple times to cycle the valve to get it to close completely, but it did not work, and I shut the water off to the fridge. I would not recommend this part.
summary: Leaky valve after just a few weeks

reviewText: This latch handle is cheap plastic, poorly designed for sturdiness, and with no moving parts. It can't cost ten cents to make. Charging $25 is an outrage. You can buy an entire latch assembly with the handle attached for $26. Go to http://www.appliancepartspros.com/.
summary: This latch handle is cheap plastic, poorly designed for ...

reviewText: The original equipment lasted 12 years. This thing made it about 2 weeks before it broke. I don't know if it's spent the last dozen years slowly deteriorating in a warehouse or what, but I won't be buying another one.
summary: Broken in less than a month.

reviewText: My original part was leaking and caused a lot of subfloor damage. I replaced the valve and this one leaks too, out of the outlet port. Ive tried sealing it with silicone and caulk, but I cant make the leaking stop. I don't know how to solve this problem.

This is NOT a replacement kit as described. This is a single roller wheel. Someone screwed up somewhere and listed this as the replacement kit that is supposed to contain 4 wheels, belt, and other parts. It does NOT contain anything more than a single roller.
summary: This is NOT a replacement kit as described. This ...

reviewText: This product works perfectly but I'm giving it one star because it's extremely overpriced. Just because you're the only company that makes them doesn't mean you can charge this much. There's no way this thing should cost more than $20. It's probably only really worth about $10.
summary: This product works perfectly but I'm giving it one star ...

reviewText: Purchased in March of 2015, and had to replace it again in December. I have no idea if the warranty is any good, and have no intention of finding out. My time is worth the cost of a quality replacement.
summary: I have no idea if the warranty is any good, and have no intention of finding out

reviewText: Although this is advertised as a genuine GE part, it is not--it doesn't even have a part number stamped on it--and it burned out after six months.  When I contacted the company to complain, their response was, "We apologize for the inconvenience."

The filter was defective. It must have been clogged. It shot water all over the inside of the refrigerator when I was running water through it to get it started. I didn't know there was a problem until water ran down the sides and into the floor. What a mess!  I know that the filter was the problem because I put the old one back in and it was fine.  I bought the filter a little early and the return window has expired.

The knob shouldn't have broken in the first place. It was the least used of my range's burners. Fifty dollars is way too much to pay for a knob. The new knob is of better construction; but too small for my range. I believe it's smaller because GE wants one knob to fit several different models it makes. GE is not serving me; it's serving itself. In this case, the consumer has no choice. I wish I could give GE a negative star.

DO NOT BUY! If you are looking to buy this it's because your current tank is cracked and leaking, but there is a better solution. Just by-pass the tank by connecting the inlet and outlet water lines and you won't ever buy another one of these poorly designed tanks again. I bought one of these to replace a cracked tank and after 2 years the new tank cracked. Waster of time and money and the tank really doesn't do much, just cools the water down a little.
summary: but there is a better solution. Just by-pass the tank and you won't ...

reviewText: I bought 3 of these to put into some of my guitar cases... but before I ever had a chance to put them in the cases, I noticed that all three were sitting on the same 'reading' and never changing.  I have other electronic ones I use in this room as it is full of guitars hanging on the wall also... but during the time I switched from using the humidifier to needing to use the de-humidifier in the room ... they NEVER CHANGED their reading.  So I'd say they don't work.  You get what you pay for.
summary: You get what you pay for !

reviewText: After a year, the soap dispenser's front snapped off. It was always full of water and grime and it was not possible to remove it for cleaning. The gasket in front gets moldy and no matter how many times you wipe it down with bleach or do a hot wash, the mold smell is still there. Do NOT buy this washer.

We bought this range from a different store. This was a great range at first but after a few months it intermittently started clicking on when you turned the power burner on, which is the main burner we use. It wouldn't happen consistently so we weren't that worried about it. After it went out of warranty, it started clicking all the time, making that burner useless. I thought Bosch was a good name in appliances. I guess I was wrong.
summary: Endless clicking on the power burner.

reviewText: The first one I bought from UniversalParts-SameDay via Amazon, it worked for about 45 days, had to open it up and adjust copper sensor, it worked for another 45 days then couldn't get it back to work. I bought another one from Thrifty Appliance Parts, LLC via Amazon, it worked once and I returned and they refunded me. UniversalParts-SameDay would not refund. I had to call a Service Tech to verify that it was the Washer Door Lock, they suggested buying an original, so I bought the original for $80.
summary: You May Have To Purchase A Genuine Part

reviewText:
Not a complete repair kit. Only the thermostat was received. I purchased the entire repair kit so my husband could repair our dryer, and this was useless in helping us solve our problem.

****
Replacement also only had the thermostat instead of the entire repair kit. The picture of the label on the package indicates that the package contains everything, when it does not.
summary: and this was useless in helping us solve our problem

reviewText: I have purchased two of these stoves for my guest house.  The first stove worked perfectly for about 8 months and then when the stove would be used you couldn't turn it off.  So I ordered another and I had it installed.  This time it wouldn't turn off from the beginning.  So confused by a stove that won't turn off.  Very dangerous and I am completely unsatisfied with this product having purchased two of them.
summary: I have purchased two of these stoves for my guest ...

reviewText: Don't buy this filter because it puts millions of visible particles in the filtered water. I'm not sure if these millions of particles are harmful or not but I am not willing to find out. I have ran the filter through 10 gallons of water and the particles are still visible. A waste of money!!!

We have only bought this product once because we have always bought the LG filters. We flushed it out as the directions stated & our water still tasted like chlorine. We flushed it out with 3 more gallons & our water still tasted like chlorine. I will be returning this product & go back to paying more money for the LG filter.
summary: We flushed it out as the directions stated & our water still tasted like chlorine. We flushed it out with 3 more ...

reviewText: Ordered these as a replacement for the OEM MSWF filter.  It worked for about three weeks...then the water system made horrible noises and stopped dispensing water.  I thought the fridge was broken..but on a recommendation, I swapped this filter back again for the OEM GE filter...and everything works fine again.  I can only conclude that this AquaFresh filter is not compatible with, or is an acceptable substitute for, the original filter.

This is the second pump that I've ordered. Each one lasted less than 6 months and by the time it stopped working, it was past the return date. Don't buy these unless you want to replace them again within a year.

I installed this water filter and ran double the amount of water through the filter as required. I then tested the water with a water purity test. The water tested much worse than the six month old water filter that I was replacing and the old filter cost half the price. I do not recommend this product.

Worst washer machine I've ever owned. My first and last Maytag. Clothes don't get clean, gets unbalanced with bed clothes, so it has to be babysat. Horrible, wasteful washing machine. When we called Maytag to report are problems they indicated we had to clean the washer all the time. I cleaned previous washers even though my clothes appeared clean. I also don't agree with the idea of no agitator, which could be the issue.

Nope.  There are 5 knobs and various colored inserts. But there aren't five matching inserts in any size/type/color.  In addition, the inserts don't go all the way into the knobs so they sit about 1/2 inch too high.

Did not work for me at all.  Maybe I didn't understand the specs.  It certainly looked like it would work in place of the 9002 filter  - but not.  The nozzle for the water intake was much shorter than for the 9002.  So I bought a totally useless product.  I have learned my lesson - if it sound too good to be true, it probably is too good to be true.  I won't be ordering anything from this outfit in the future.

The switch in this thing IS NOT RATED FOR 10A 250V!!

It is rated for 6A at 250V, or 10A at 125V.

Everything else is rated for 15A at 250V, so if you don't use the switch, you can get away with a 10A 250V fuse.

I won't be buying anything from SMAKN again.
summary: Do not use 10A 250V fuses, product description is incorrect

reviewText: Looks great, but you get what you pay for. Broke a few weeks after installation. Took weeks to get new parts. Broke again after repair. On hold now waiting to report the problem and request replacement parts. Each time it has been difficult to get in touch with the distributor.
summary: You Get What You Pay For

reviewText:
I purchased an LG refrigerator and dishwasher. The refrigerator packed in when 13 months old, it now takes up space in our garage. Today, our 2 year old LG dishwasher gave up the ghost.
The customer service at LG is pitiful.

The filter was very light when it was removed from the packaging, which surprised me, because other filters I used in the past where heavier.  It suggested that the filter was a carbon infused material, not a charcoal core.

Filters last about 2 weeks max before starting to discolor and break down. Some filters received were shorter than others. Even at the beginning of using one of these filters it did not provide the appropriate level of humidity. In the future I will only purchase the Honeywell brand.
summary: Do not last nor as effective as Honeywell brand filters

reviewText: DO NOT PURCHASE.  THIS PRODUCT IS A PIECE OF JUNK. IT LOOKS LIKE IT MAY WORK BUT THE ROLLERS DO NOT FIT IN THE METAL BAR PROPERLY AND IT CONSTANTLY BREAKS AND FALLS OFF OF THE SLIDING METAL GUIDE. Do not be fooled, you have been warned.
summary: IT LOOKS LIKE IT MAY WORK BUT THE ROLLERS DO NOT FIT ...

reviewText: Used this non brand name filter to replace my brand name one. Despite having run several gallons through this filter in the last week, the water quality is TERRIBLE and a glass of 'filtered' water is cloudy with impurities. The second in the twin pack is going straight into the trash. Don't waste your money on this product!

Purchased in August of 2016.  Stopped working in January 2017.  Was replaced with brand new refrigerator and the icemaker stopped working in March 2018.  For $2500.00 I would think this product should last more than a year and a half.  Samsung is very difficult to contact when their refrigerator stops working properly.  I spent over an hour on the phone arguing with them.  Would NOT recommend their appliances.
summary: REFRIGERATOR WORKS FOR ABOUT 18 MONTHS if you're lucky.  Big waste of cash.

reviewText: Got this filter because we had white dust everywhere. Didnt really want to spend $30 a month on distilled water. After adding the filter, the dust continued. I didn't really want to breathe in this dust every night with sinus problems. I then bought distilled water because I was having sinus surgery and needed the moisture at nite. After 2 days of distilled water, the dust was eliminated. I honestly don't believe the filter works.

This worked for a few months and then died.  Whirlpool refused to replace it claiming that since I did not purchase it directly from them they would not warranty it.  Amazon did give me 25% of my money back since Whirlpool wouldn't warranty it.
summary: It worked for a few months.

reviewText: Box was labeled correctly, but what was in the box was not a dishwasher control board, but a Whirlpool Refrigerator control board.  It does not match the picture and won't do much good in my dishwasher...
summary: It does not match the picture and won't do much good in my dishwasher

reviewText: These filters are defective.  The minute they touch the water they collapse and fall to the bottom of my humidifier.  The digital readout then tells me to change the filter.  I want a refund on this product.  DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY!!!!!!
summary: These filters are defective. The minute they touch the ...

reviewText:
We decided to go cheap when we bought this refrigerator... In this case, you get what you paid for or maybe less. While it does create a cold environment for beverages, it is VERY loud when in operation, the temperature display is incredibly bright and cannot be turned off, and it reeks of chemical odors.  The smell (and taste) of the cheap plastic permeates the containers in the fridge and everything starts to stink and taste of chemicals.

Pay more to buy a fridge from a reputable manufacturer.

The machine worked decently for about a year, then out of the blue, it stopped working entirely. I contacted customer service only to be told: "I wanted to update you, after talking with the product team they have said that there nothing we can do. Unfortunately, that item has been discontinued and was outside of the warranty. I am sorry for the inconvenience."

Don't waste your money!!
summary: TERRIBLE MACHINE, EVEN WORSE CUSTOMER SERVICE..DO NOT BUY!

reviewText: I bought these as replacement filters with the Dirt Devil Simpli Stik SD20000RED. The amazon information page says these will fit SD20000RED and they do not.  I can use them for an older Dirt Devil Stik vac but already have replacements from a previous order for the older vac. I will keep these since I can use them, but am unhappy that you gave me misinformation. I'm still looking for allergen dust cup filter replacements for my new SD20000RED.
summary: Does NOT fit Simpli Stik SD20000RED

reviewText: Ordered this thinking it would last for an extended period of time. The filter worked well for the first week and then it started to fall apart and not absorb the water well. I cleaned it as specified and didn't abuse it. The filter started to separate and sag. I would think for what it cost and being reusable it should have lasted longer.

You get what you pay for. I've noticed that these don't work as well as the original OEM filters. They don't last last long at all. They last about a few weeks and the OEM filters can last a whole season.
summary: Not as good as the OEM filters, not worth it.

reviewText: Started beeping as soon as it was turned on. It arrived a few weeks ago, and we finally were able to have it installed.  It immediately started beeping nonstop.  We tried turning it off and starting over, but it again started beeping nonstop.  It is defective and I requested a return.  I will update this post after we see how this return is handled.

This is an unfunny practical joke. This thing isn't the same size or shape as the real part. It didn't even come close to fitting. Wasted my time. Pic shows the real part lying on top of this piece of trash part. You can see how much bigger the knockoff part is. How is that supposed to fit in the slot for the original part? It doesnt. Not. Even. Close.

I spent $250.00 to have the plumber install. It worked for two weeks. Complete and total waste of money. I never wrote a review because I actually forgot that we had this thing. It's in the laundry room and I never go in there as our house manager handles that task.

WHAT IS INCREDIBLE - AMAZON LET ALL OF THE REVIEWERS GET RIPPED OF WITH NO REPERCUSSIONS TO THE SELLER.

VERY DISAPPOINTING AMAZON.

WE ALL SHOULD BE REFUNDED!
summary: Complete and total waste of money

reviewText: I purchased this valve in December 2017. This solenoid valve is a 2-part valve, one output for the water dispenser and one output for the ice dispenser. The valve installation was easy (10-15 min). By the end of July, the solenoid valve for the water dispenser stopped working (after 7 months). I have no idea how to get a hold of the seller, but I doubt it's still under warranty. I am disappointed in this transaction.

I found these filters to have very, very low moisture output. I replaced the original filter that came with my humidifier with one of these and there is no comparison.  The humidity in the room does not increase, and the water in the tank takes days to run out. It used to empty in less than a day. I would not recommend these.

This did not regulate heat as well as my nuwave.  It would go back and forth from burning to barely heating.  It did do much better at boiling water than my non-pro nuwave though.  But now after 6 months of use it is dead. Huge waste of money.  Luckily I still have my much older nuwave that works great still.  Ill just use the stovetop to boil water.

I bought this fridge without realizing how small it would be so that was my mistake. However, I thought I could manage with a smaller fridge, which would have been true if it actually worked. The freezer actually has a gap between the door so it freezes everything and when it defrosts, the entire back overflows and spills onto the floor, making a massive and inconvenient mess. Awful in every sense of the word!

I was excited to buy these as they are a lot cheaper than the original Samsung filters. However, I guess you get what you pay for. Water tasted horrible, I could still taste the chlorine. When I was using the original filter, I never tasted chlorine in the water.
summary: I can still taste the chlorine

reviewText: Not sure what's wrong with this filter, but it isn't working.  When first installed, there was no period where the water became super aerated as the carbon filled up-- almost as if there is no carbon in the filter at all.  And even after a week there is a chemical taste to the water.  I'm going to take out the week old filter and replace it with a new one.

The design is cute, but the magnetic piece is sandwiched between the two decorative pieces, and the entire item weighs so much that the magnet isn't strong enough to hold it up. It just fell right off my dishwasher. I tried some of my fridge magnets to make sure the problem wasn't with my dishwasher, and they all stuck to it just fine, so the issue was definitely with this magnet. Im returning it.
summary: Magnet isn't strong enough to stay up

reviewText: Suggestion: get battery backup for the freezer. It was cheap and worked fine. We knew we'd have to defrost it occasionally. We did read that the freezer must remain off for 5 minutes after a power outage, as. well as setting the dial to "OFF" before turning it back on. Since we were not there for the outage (there may have been more than one), the freezer turned back on when the power returned, which could have been less than 5 minutes. If I can fix it easily, I'll up the rating to 3.
summary: Compressor will die if unattended during power outage

reviewText: I found it to be made of substandard materials. Blower was too fragile to resist being packed in a suit case. The rest of the plastic parts (most of it) were of very poor quality. I returned it right away.
summary: The rest of the plastic parts (most of it) were of very poor quality. I returned it right away

reviewText: It came with batteries but the unit was off when I opened it. I fiddled with the batteries and the unit came on for 5 seconds and then died out. I figured the batteries were dead so I put new ones in. Same thing. Goes on then off. Not eligible for returns. Do not buy.

The unit was damaged so much that we could not use it. We had to send it back and we were told there was not another one available. It was very disappointing. We would have tried again if there was another available.

Awful. Terrible. Not universal at all. Had to cut the old gasket apart to take it off. Trimmed the new one to size only  to find that it's too thick. The door won't close at all now and I'm too broke to buy a new, correct, gasket for another two weeks. Don't bother with this item.

First order fit.  Second didn't.  The fittings that lock it into place are a little different.  You'll just have to trust me, the second order of the same thing (it was listed the same on Amazon) just won't fit. The one that fit was labeled RFC0200A and the one that didn't was labeled RFC(TM)0200A (the TM is superscript).  The picture doesn't show the label, but it does show the different fittings.  It's a frustrating experience.
summary: First order of these fit, the second didn't.

reviewText: Don't waste your money on this.  This filter only lasted 2 months, when the actual filters from either Whirlpool or Kenmore really last 6 months.  After 2 months with this Aquacrest filter, water started flowing at a significantly lower rate implying that it is clogged and no longer capable of true filtering.  With filters from either Whirlpool or Kenmore, this behavior typically isn't seen until the end of the 6th month.

Liked the product but didn't like that it only lasted 6 months instead of the 12 months it advertised.  My fridge is flashing an alert that I need to change the filter.  Unless there is something I'm suppose to reset in my fridge to make it last another 6 months I have to rate this a 1.
summary: Lasted 6 months instead of the 12 months

reviewText: This product started having problems within the first few months. After 8 months it quit altogether. I have attempted to contact the seller multiple times however I have not heard back a month later. I am very disappointed in the product.
summary: I am very disappointed in the product

reviewText: DO NOT BUY, THIS IS CHEAPLY MADE AND MADE QUICKLY. EVERYTHING CAME LOOSE AND IT WAS LEAKING GAS. THE THE WHOLE BURNER CAUGHT IN FLAMES AND LEGIT WOULD BURN THE HOUSE DOWN IF YOU WERENT FAMILIAR WITH THESE THINGS. LOOK SOMEWHERE ELSE BECAUSE QUALITY AND SAFETY IS NOT HERE. DOESNT EVEN COME WITH A MANUAL OR INFORMATION SHEET. AVOID.

I give this 4 stars for my art projects, but if I had to use it in the garden I'd give it 1 star. Even for thick dahlia stalks, the edges are too sharp and cut into the plant while it's growing. The metal wire in the center is surrounded by green plastic.
summary: Edges too sharp for growing plants.

reviewText: Tool came with three rust spots.  I take care of my tools and would never allow rust to take hold of any of them!  I can't believe that I had to pay for a "new" tool that came with rust does not make me happy!

Everything about this bag is fine... except for the zipper, which is a complete piece of garbage that broke the first time I used it. Garrett definitely "dropped the ball" on this one. If they didn't use the cheapest zipper known to man, then I would have given the item 5 stars. It's just that a carry bag with a broken zipper is not really functional--it's just an expensive piece of fabric.
summary: Material, design, and size is good; zipper is terrible (deal breaker)

reviewText: Like many others have stated, the label they put on this is impossible to remove. It leaves a very heavy glue residue that does not come off with solvents. It has become unusable unless you don't mind getting glue all over your hands every time you touch it. I contacted Thermos about it and they were no help.

I  have  had to  use  practically  the  entire  bottle for one  1000 piece  puzzle.  The  applicator  is  not  good; a  brush  would be  much better.  This  glue  does  not  hold  well  and  the  amount  is  not  sufficient  for  two  1000  piece puzzles.

I used this adapter for less than two weeks before it just stopped working. Tried using it on some other Dept. 56 products thinking maybe the lights were the issue but it didn't work on them either, it was just broken.  I expect more from Dept. 56 products and am very disappointed that they sold something this shoddy.

DO NOT BUY THESE! They do not work and are a waste of money and time, I put water in them and they would not spray. They are useless and I am contacting Amazon for my money back. Spend a couple more dollars and buy ones that work.
summary: They do not work and are a waste of money and time

reviewText: I bought these because I use vinegar for cleaning vegetables and fruit; bleach & water for cleaning grout; and vinegar to spray on laundry stains. Of the 3, only one is still working. One quit after 2 weeks. The other after a month. One the trigger sticks, and won't spray. The other, the trigger works fine, but the tube may have a leak. I haven't be able to identify the problem yet. Don't waste your money on these. I thought they were a good deal, but that turned out not to be the case.
summary: the trigger works fine, but the tube may have a leak

reviewText: These bottles are a "you get what you pay for" situation. The first sprayer broke within one minute of the first use - the top popped off, and would not stay back on. The second and third sprayers were not functional at all. I marked this item as a return within an hour of opening the box, and it is one of the worst quality items I have ever purchased on Amazon.

I read the other reviews and did not believe that so simple of a product could be so bad. This is a laughably bad product. It falls apart after one or two uses. If I owned a store I would be embarrased to sell it. If I manufactured it, Iwould do so under an assumed name.

This towel is quite small to be drying off a dog of almost any size.  And it does not hold a great deal of water.  The towel gets soaked almost immediately and does not dry the dog any further.  I end up having to get a terry cloth towel to finish the job.  I have 2 towels, one for each dog.  My dogs are 40 and 50 pounds, so they are not huge, and these towels just don't do it.

Despite the several negative reviews, I trusted the Zojirushi Brand and bought one of these in January. I have used Zojirushi hot pots and rice cookers for decades.

I like to add a bit of sesame seed to my morning oatmeal. I used the grinder for less than 30 seconds, 4 or 5 days a week. In about 3 weeks' time, the grinder stopped working. I cleaned it thoroughly and with water, then waited for it to dry. But it no longer grinds :-(.

I am about to see how Amazon handles this situation.
summary: Broke in less than one month

reviewText: I have had this grinder now for a few months and regret not having returned it right away.  It just doesn't grind flax seeds whatsoever.  I had bought a manual grinder that was just very slow so I ordered this one hoping it would be a lot faster.  It is not and the flax seeds mostly don't get ground up.  I don't like giving really bad reviews, but this one has earned it.
summary: very disappointed in this grinder - a waste of money!

reviewText: I purchased this egg cooker about 6 months ago and it's leaking water all over my counter from the base of the unit. What a huge disappointment! We can't use it now! Other than that, it was a great little cooker. I've never had a Cuisinart brand item be a piece of junk. I thought I was safe going with Cuisinart. Lesson learned.
summary: Is leaking all over my counter!

reviewText: I bought this one to replace an old Oster egg cooker I received when I first got married. It lasted me over 20 years. I love hard boiled eggs and make them quite often to put in various recipes. I thought the design was cute, and it looked nice on the counter. However, it leaks. Doesn't matter how much liquid is in it, it leaks. So I have to place a towel under it. Also, there is an odor that comes from it after the eggs have cooked. I'm going to buy another Oster. What a disappointment.

At first I enjoyed the product for its ability to produce hard boiled eggs. After a year it started leaking onto the counter. When I turned it on, all the water would leak out through the on-off switch.

I've bought at least 5 of La Crosse's weather stations.  They all don't work after a short period of time.  Here I am this morning trying to fix 2 that my mother has.  Same old problems, and there are a lot of them.  Personally, I recommend staying away from all the products this company makes.  Their product support is a joke.

I have several of these and they do not prevent tarnish! I thought they were pacific cloth when I was purchasing them, they aren't.  I have pacific cloth  bags that do prevent tarnish.
Don't waste your money.

I'm really disappointed with my recent purchase.  I just opened the bag to take out some silver and it's tarnished.  Really a disappointment.  I don't know if the bag was made in China as others have said, but I do know the product didn't work.  I should return it.  Very reluctant to buy more until they change manufacturers.
summary: A shade of what they used to be

reviewText: This hanger is terrible and should be taken off the market.  When you place your platter in the hanger and try to hang it up the springs stretch out and the platter falls to the floor.  My platter was 23 1/2" so it should have worked.  I requested a refund for my purchase and promptly received it.
summary: This hanger is terrible and should be taken off the market

reviewText: This is not comfortable to use, it digs into your thumb and index finger since there are no rubber inserts for the handle - it's just metal. It didn't appear to be uncomfortable until I tried it - OUCH! Also, this is VERY large. If you intend to use it for meatballs, they are large meatballs. Bottom-line: awkward and uncomfortable to use, and overpriced for the quality. Norpro, I will be donating these to Goodwill and I will not be recommending this product to anyone.
summary: Awkward and painful to use - OUCH!

reviewText: I bought one of these about a year ago - tested it in boiling water - it registered 160.  Tested it in a 350 oven.  It registered 240. Contacted the company, which was also difficult.  They weren't very nice at all, but finally agreed to send me another one.  I tested the second one in boiing water.  It registered 190.  In a 350 oven, it registered 275.  (Now, I see they're selling them at 2 for the price of one.)  I ended up buying another brand and while it wasn't perfectly exact, it was close enough.

I bought these containers because the tops of my original containers were cracked. The originals lasted several years before cracking. These cracked within a month. They were hand washed, never put in the dishwasher, and didn't receive heavy use. They were probably each used twice before half of them cracked, and now, a few months later, only one is still uncracked. They're in worse shape than the ones they were replacing. I won't be buying them again.

reviewerName: T. H. Blair in DFW, TX
reviewText:
This meter never changes no matter the type of soil. It always reads a 7 when I know that certain of my soils are a lower pH.

UPDATE: I  contacted Amazon Customer Service and they gave me a full refund and told me to dispose of the PH Meter.

I am very happy with Amazon's customer service.
summary: The Reading Never Changes No Matter the Soil Type

reviewText: I tried sandpaper and I tried steel wool and I tried the cleaning pad that came with it. The best I could get is orange juice that had a pH of 6 and lemon juice with a pH of 5.5. Obviously the calibration is way off and impossible to tell with any accuracy what the pH is.

Bought this because I need a fast soil pH test; and with 3 scientists on staff, thought we might be able to make it work.  I was wrong.  It's just possible SOMEBODY can make it work- but- not us.  It's in the dumpster.  My guess- ALL similar products are wishful thinking.  You'll save time and money if you do your soil pH testing the old-fashioned ways.

I have been using these for years, in fact I have about 15 in my garden right now, but these that I just received are completely rubbish!!!  Two of them collapsed on the plants less than two hours after I set them up.  I thought the plastic seemed different-much flimsier.  I am trying to decide if it is worth it to package them back up and send them back...

Awful product. This is the second time I purchased this product and they continue to fall apart. The glue holding the filter to the casing is either missing or not in the right spot EVERY TIME. This has been a complete waste of my time and money. I've never been more dissatisfied in an Amazon purchase than whith these filters.

The filters arrived in a timely manner in good shape. They quit absorbing water after only a few days of use and dry up. This is the second batch of this brand of filters we tried and they are totally useless. Don't recommend to anyone.
summary: Essick Air 1040 Replacement Wick for humidifiers.

reviewText: Floppy and flat.  It catches water but cannot guide it anywhere because the drainer has no structure/height/angle.  Sadly, it is the only one I've found to fit the drainer I purchased (which is awesome) so it has become a quest:  find a drainer of the same dimensions and orientation as this one but which works.  Bummer.

Really useless dish drainer. It is flimsy and cannot support a full dish drainer. It also doesn't have an incline built into it so the water doesn't drain properly. I definitely would NOT recommend this product to anyone.

You should discontinue carrying this item. It has a permanent curl and rises where the water is to drain. As a result of poor quality, it does not provide a function. I'd like to send it back for a full refund including shipping. I have not used it.

Please let me know how to return this item.

Not only is this not worth the price, it's not worth fifty cents. It's a cheap, thin plastic piece of junk. And the postage is more than the price of the item. What's more, when I went to return it, I was only refunded half of what I paid.

This thing doesn't work. I have a normal iron. Nothing special; just normal. I don't know what iron this thing is designed to hold, but it isn't mine. It will not hold my iron because the tabs on the sides that are supposed to keep it from falling out are too far apart. Don't buy this. I'd return it if it weren't such a pain to do so. We're going to put a bungee cord around it or something. What a piece of junk.
summary: I don't recommend this at all. Not to anyone.

reviewText: I have bought four of these in the last year and never had any problem BUT the last one to arrive the two halves of the blower body were separated. I had to spend 2 hours trying to put it back together. I will not buy another one.
summary: Stanley High Velocity Blower came in pieces

reviewText: This product was listed as frequently being bought along with things like the demineralization cartridge for the Venta Ultrasonic VS-205 and VS-207 Humidifiers. When I received it, the labelling says specifically that it is NOT for ultrasonic humidifiers. It would cost about as much to ship it back as it cost, so I am stuck with it and hopefully will find some use for it someday.

There is no way to secure the belt around the child without the nylon belt part slipping through the plastic buckle. There is no end piece to the nylon belt. I knotted it, but that could come out. I think this is very unsafe.
summary: Unsafe belt that can come loose.

reviewText:
This item comes completely disassembled.  There are 60 or so parts and maybe 100 or more screws and bolts.
The edges of the parts are very sharp - I cut my hands more than once. The directions are poor and hard to follow.
The time required to get it assembled is excessive. If I had known I would not have gotten the thing. In the end it looked
O.K. but the light material makes me think that it may not last very long. If I had known I would not have bought it.
The Ad doesn't mention assembly,
summary: The Ad doesn't mention that the item is COMPLETELY disassembled.

reviewText: I hoped that this would be the last eco-friendly odor neutralizer that I'd buy, but I was wrong.  I'm not sure how i'd describe but as the smell of a houseplant on a hot summers day.  The smell lingers for days.

A visitor came to our house. She left, but her perfume remained on the arm of our upholstered sofa. I applied X-O, probably a half dozen times. While wet it masked the odor, but when it dried, the odor was back. With the passage of time (two months) the odor has faded, but I don't attribute that to X-O.

I purchased one, got it home, followed the instructions--thing never worked.  Brought it back, got another one--followed the instructions--thing never worked. Decided not to waste my time and go for a 3rd try.  If you buy one, just save the receipt, in case it doesn't work, you can return it.

I had to get two replacements for this toaster...one from the manufacturer, and one from Amazon...in less than a year! For an "all metal" toaster, it has many plastic parts, including the dial. An overpriced piece of junk..I finally returned it, bought a twenty dollar toaster and have not had any problems since!
summary: A disaster from start to finish!

reviewText: I had to get two replacements for this toaster...one from the manufacturer, and one from Amazon...in less than a year! For an "all metal" toaster, it has many plastic parts, including the dial. An overpriced piece of junk..I finally returned it, bought a twenty dollar toaster and have not had any problems since!
summary: A disaster from start to finish!

reviewText: I had one of these for years and loved it.  But this one must be defective.  In the past few days I've noticed it is laying on it's side and is not doing it's job.  I am 2 days past my return period so I guess I'm screwed.
summary: Rolled on it's side. Not working.  I'm screwed!

reviewText: I've used several brands of de-icers over the years, and this is the worst performing of them all.  I went out this morning and the ice was completely frozen over, I had to use an axe to break through, the heater just does not get warm enough to contend with Northern Illinois temps.
summary: Can't hold up to Northern Illinois winters

reviewText: This worked fine until it got water inside it and didn't float anymore.  It lasted about 1 month, but I didn't get around to returning it in time so I may be stuck with it.  I had ordered an aerator at the same time, and that seems to be working well enough through the winter, so I probably won't try to fix this.  I don't know why they didn't fill this with something to keep it from filling up with water.
summary: Worked great until it sank after 1 month.

reviewText: I bought this item a year ago and put it in our pond this winter.  After our first really heavy frost we looked in the pond after a few days and found all the fish frozen and the heater not working.  My husband took it out and tested it and it did not work.  We tested our electrical connection and that was working fine as all our pond lights were still on.  It is now too late to return.  Don't waste your money or jeopardize your fish.

It worked great, but only for one year.  The next winter when I plugged it in it just didn't turn on.  I tried jiggling and tweaking and such, to no avail.

I notice many others have had the same problem.  How hard can it be to make something so simple that's also reliable?  Very disappointed.
summary: Worked great but only one season

reviewText: This is the second one of these I have purchased. The first one lasted two seasons. The second one lasted only one. Too bad the only way of finding out it doesn't work is AFTER the pond is frozen over. I shouldn't have to test for continuity BEFORE I throw it in the pond. JUNK!

I bought this and it wasn't as tall as I had expected but that was my fault for not measuring. I had to sort of put it together and it was very flimsy after I was done although it was as tight as it could be. I ended up sending it back because it was low and flimsy and looked very cheap.

This product does its job, but not very well. All the end pieces, except the shovel, and the handles have to be attached to the rods. The poker, the main tool used, does not fit on the rod very well, and will spin loose when trying to move a log. My husband said he will weld it on so it won't move. Would recommend a different product, probably something that is constructed of one piece.

This stuff is nothing but cayenne pepper, which you can buy at an Indian Food Store by the pound. You'll need a pound of it to work anyway, not 1.5 ounces. Rain washes it away, see, and the critters might sneeze a little, so you have to put it on thick to really irritate them. This small bag is a joke.

This worked so great in my barn that I ordered a second one for my chicken coop. The first one stopped working after a few weeks. I sent it back for replacement, thinking it was just defective. Now the second one has failed after just a few days. Two thermostat plugs within a month? I think it's a faulty product.

Does not work.  I have used it with my heat lamp for the chicken coop.  It is supposed to go on at 0 degrees and off at 10.  Did not go off was still on at 25 degrees this morning so I unplugged the whole unit.  Tried to plug it in this afternoon when it was 27 degrees and it went on and should not have.  Can't and will not trust it.  Beware!
summary: Does not work. I have used it with my ...

reviewText: I purchased one of these for my well house.  It did not work.  I got out of bed and checked the weather, it was 26 deg. and no light was on in my well house.  I went back to just leaving a light bulb on.  This is just junk.  I saw lots of reviews about how it did not work but thought I would luck out and get a good one.  No such luck.  Do not depend on this to keep your pipes from damage.

this to put in the chicken coop this winter. Plugged it in and when the temp dropped below 25 I checked and it didn't turn  the heater on. So unplugged it and plugged it in a different outlet. It still didn't work.

It did not work. I bought this to use in my chicken coop to keep the temperature in there above freezing. My thermometer which is inches away from the Thermo Cube said it was 30 degrees F and yet the Thermo Cube was not turning on even when it was 5 degrees colder than when it is supposed to turn on.
summary: It did not turn on at 30 degrees F.

reviewText: I like the concept, but I could not make it work for me.  The cube would have power to its receptacle, but the moment I plugged in the heating element it would cut out.  There was power flowing inside its circuitry.  I am not totally sure the cube was faulty or the problem was me.

Ground plug IS TOO BIG !  But they have the patent, so you are stuck with this flaw !

Over the years I have bought four of these because I need them regardless of the flaw [ground plug too big].  No other choices.

Today the ground plug broke off when I attempted to unplug one of the units.  Oh well, maybe ground plug is unneeded.
summary: Ground plug IS TOO BIG !  But they have the patent, so you are stuck with this flaw !

reviewText: I got this to keep the heater running in my greenhouse when the weather drops. The first one didn't work, so I assumed it was defective and exchanged for another. The second one stopped working in the middle of the night and I lost half the plants in my greenhouse! Don't waste your money on this. There's a better one out there that works like a charm.

I thought these things were a great idea, but when I plugged a lamp receptacle (without the lamp) into it, it caught on fire!  Not just smoke, but flames!

I would never, never, never---repeat, NEVER---trust these things in or around my home.

I have filed a report with Underwriter's Labs about this issue.

I purchased two of these items.  I installed the first one to use on a baseboard heater in my RV to prevent freezing temperatures.  It stopped working after one night.  The next day, I returned both of them for a refund.  It would have been great if the product had worked properly.

In it's defense, this heater put out a lot of heat for its size and kept me very comfortable in a large bedroom. But.....it was noisy from the first time I plugged it in, the noise kept getting worse, the fan started quitting, and a few days later it died.  I had only used it for about 2 weeks.  I bought it last year as an emergency heater and didn't even take it out of the box until this year, so I can't even get a refund.  Basically just a very disappointing rip-off!!!

Thought this was a fine little heater at first. Had it less than 2 months now, and it just burned out. I heard a loud wailing noise, thought it was my clothes dryer. When I realized it was the heater, I ran to turn it off and noticed a slight burning smell. After letting it cool down, I tried to turn it back on but it's totally dead. Pretty scary! What if I'd been sleeping in the other room? Would it have caught fire?

It seemed like a good idea...like a wet towel on your neck on a hot summer day with a fan no less BUT....it turned out to be a complete waste of money and I paid a lot more than what it is currently going for.  Luckily I was able to retun it.

I have been using this item for a few years. The recent replacements came in defective. They would not absorb water and as a result did not filter. I sent them back but have yet to receive a replacement.

If you use filtered water for making your coffee (i.e., Brita filter; under-sink reverse osmosis filter; built-in filter for your refrigerator's in-door ice and water; etc.) you do not need to filter the water again in your coffee maker.  I would only suggest buying these filters if your water is not filtered and tastes bad from the tap.  Otherwise, these filters are a huge waste of money.
summary: Unnecessary unless you have really bad tasting water in your house

reviewText: I should have read the reviews here before purchasing. I had the model before this one and it worked great. This one is terrible. The clear part of the upholstery hose where it attaches to the machine clogs and must be cleaned out. Also, the canister does not fit into the unit well. I have to ask my spouse to fit it in every time I use it. It's horrible. Most of my house is hardwood, so I very seldom use a vacuum, but when I do, I want one that works.

I would give this ZERO stars if they let me.  I bought this because it was lightweight, easy to maneuver and claimed to have powerful suction.  The first time I used the vacuum it was on carpet and it worked fine, but it does not work well on tile or hardwood floors!  It literally just blows the dust and dirt around!  The vents on the vacuum are (unbelievably) in the FRONT of the vacuum!  And the hoses get clogged VERY EASILY.  DO NOT BUY THIS, no matter how cheap it may be.

Didn't get much of a chance to review this item because it did not work right out of the box.  I assembled it, turned it on, and the belt would not turn.  This meant that the brush would not turn, which meant that I wasn't going to pick up much on a rug.  It was nice and light, though, and easy to assemble.
summary: Did not work right out of the box

reviewText: This is a terrible vacuum.  It started having problems two months after I purchased it. I brought it into a repair shop because it was still under warranty.  The person said he couldn't do anything because the problem is the machine overheats and you just have to wait until the unit cools down and empty the container each time.  It takes me over 3 hours to vacuum a 600 sq. ft. because this unit overheats after 15 mins of use. Worse vacuum ever!

This is a complete and total piece of junk.

When I first got it, it leaked like crazy. I had to go buy extra washers to fix it because the ones on it were so bad.

Within a month it had failed.  So, I just gotta echo what others are saying...it's a piece of junk and you should avoid it.

....URGH...I have to remember to read reviews before I buy stuff on Amazon.
summary: Be sure to read the reviews...like I didn't

reviewText:
Had this sprinkler system for about 8 months, and it now turns on fine but stays stuck in the "ON" position and won't turn the water off.  Caused some minor flooding in our back yard.

The dials and the labels on our unit are not aligned correctly, so that the dial falls in between settings and it's hard to tell which setting is being used.  The dials are small and hard to turn, and if your hands are wet you won't be able to turn them with your bare hands.

Overall, not recommended.
summary: Failed in the "ON" position in less than 1 year

reviewText: We had two of these timers ..... one worked for three months and had a mechanical failure ....... one worked for six months and had an apparent electronic failure ...... (the warranty is only three months)

I followed the instructions to the letter and the seeds never sprouted. I sent the seller photos showing how and where I had set everything up and his reply was to send me a copy of the instructions which I already had. He said it looked like I did everything ok but that he would send me more seeds later. That was two weeks ago and sill no growth and no new seeds have been received.
