Not sure why it ever needed a signature to begin with.  We receive shipped items almost daily that are all valued much higher then $6 and none of them require a signature.
summary: Took a month to arrive & didn't arrive until a day after Christmas

reviewText: Cheap paper, hard to open doors, and....most importantly, you can buy it in the checkout line of the grocery store for $1.95.  I don't think the children think anything of the fact that it is chocolat from Vermont.

I washed and dried this blanket as directed and it created so much fuzz I had to put it in a bag it looks like it is in the process of disintegrating. This blanket was a terrible disappointment especially considering the price!
summary: Falls apart and makes a fuzzy mess

reviewText:
This blanket completely balled up and created a HUGE mess.  I am not sure how there are positive reviews...I can only assume that they had not washed it at the time they reviewed it.
There is a Blaze blanket available at Target that is a little bit smaller (which was better for us) and it does not fuzz up at all.  I have one for each of my kids and both have been so much better than this one.
summary: There is a Blaze blanket available at Target that is a little bit smaller (which was better for us) and it does not fuzz up at .

reviewText:
This little unit is nicely sized and pretty solid as far as the hardware goes. However, that's where the good times stop.

The included software is nearly useless and buggy. Forget about wasting your money on this thing - that's not the major expense you'll incur if you purchase it. What really makes this product a bad purchase is the amount of time needed to mess around with it only to find out that the software never works right.

The software was garbage and barely worked.  After about a week the thermometer died.  I concur with other reviews; this is Chinese junk.  It would be nice to find a quality device in the $20 range, but I've yet to find one.
summary: Why is this the only option on the market?

reviewText: The item received was defective as a couple of the loops were sewn together and it was dirty.  Since it was a gift, I didn't realize this until after the 30 day return period and was unable to return the item.  The company did send a replacement which I have not yet received.  It is not what I was expecting.

I order two of these bushes and they were infested with mites.  Since I was instructed to acclimate the plants indoors, the mites infested my house plants as well.  When I notified the seller of the problem, he told me to give it some time and to treat with proper insecticide.  After the plants died, he refunded the money I paid for the plants, but didn't compensate for the insecticide I purchased or the house plants I lost.....

This belt only lasted one year in my Craftsman snowblower.  The original belt that came with the snowblower lasted 12 years.  I don't think I had an adjustment problem, it just shredded itself in a heavy, wet snow storm.

I bought two of these, and within a few weeks both were coming apart.  The fabric is junk, the stitching is terrible.  My couch even has flat arms, and they don't stay where they belong.  After a couple of months of use, the pockets have ripped out and they've gone in the trash.  Do yourself a favor and spend a bit more on something that's actually well made.

Unfortunately, this arm rest is really flimsy.  I bought this one to replace the one I had which was great...strong and sturdy.  This one sure didn't measure up to my old one.  Even the tray on top is so flimsy that it barely stayed upright.  The price was low, but it isn't worth what I paid.  I returned it!

It's craptastic. Seriously, the photo is very misleading. The "tray" area is nowhere near as deep as the photo shows. It's very flimsy material and the flat piece of cardboard that should make the bottom of the "tray" is loose and comes off. Don't be fooled, this is garbage. Sorry we wasted the money.

I returned it.  It was too flimsy and wouldn't stay put on my recliner, even when I weighed it down. The top part didn't stay flat at all.  It has a piece of wrapped cardboard that sits in the tray area, but it just kept on popping out.  It also reeked of a very strong chemical smell.  I was very disappointed.  If I could give it negative stars, I would.  This thing sucked.
summary: I was very disappointed. If I could give it negative stars

reviewText: This product is cheaply made.  Some stitching around the edges, basically wasn't there.  The fabric rips easily.  When I tried to move it today, I tore the stitching.  I will not be recommending this to anyone.

Really......it stunk!!!!  I had to put it outside to air it out and it still has a little odor to it.  I guess it is the material it is made of.  I'll try and bring it in later to see if I can use it. :(

I bought this for my mom.  She doesn't leave her chair much and needs places to put her medicine so she can keep it nearby.  It doesn't balance well on a leather recliner, she always has to fuss with it  to keep it in place.  The smell is horrible when it comes out of the box, I'm not sure if it's the dye or the fabric but it takes a week or so for it to go away.
summary: Wouldn't buy again...Very hard to clean and smells horrid

reviewText: My couch has pretty broad armrests.  I was specifically looking for a product like this.  It did fit the armrest almost perfectly.  The problem is that there's nothing that secures the item to the couch, meanwhile the bottom of the item rests on the couch arm like an afghan blanket: as long as you don't touch it, it'll stay put.  To be honest, it would be less precarious to simply rest a glass of anything directly on the couch than to use this.
summary: Dare you to leave your drink on it...

reviewText: I had a different brand before and liked it, but this one was disappointing.  It keeps slipping off the arm of the chair or couch, and my drinks get spilled.  I can't trust it enough to put anything in it or on it.  It spends more time on the floor than on the arm of a couch or chair.

If you are looking for something to hand carry and not carry it on your shoulder than this is what you want. I however like to use bags that I can easily place on my shoulder. I don't know why you would want a bag to hold in your hand...

I used this product two times this year and once last year.  The first spraying was in July, and it did not kill the weeds.  I thought it was perhaps me, so I applied it again in September.  It wilted a few weeds, and they are coming back as strong as ever.
summary: Used two years in Fall- it killed nothing

reviewText:
I used this exactly as indicated on the label, and got very poor results. It did kill a few weeds, but most weeds were not killed.

I put down a little over half the bottle to treat my 3,000-4,000 sq ft lawn, applying the product evenly across the lawn. There was no rain following the application for another 2 days, so the product didn't wash-out.

I guess it's just not that effective. I won't be using this product again.
summary: Used As Directed - Vert Poor Results

reviewText: Our lawn is Bermuda grass, and the crabgrass is taking over.  We bought this product in hopes of killing off the crabgrass before it invaded our lawn.  Unfortunately, the crabgrass is still going strong.  Switching back to Scotts and hopefully we will have a weed free lawn like we have had at our previous house.

As someone else mentioned below, the on/off valve popped out of the spray head as soon as I turned it on (yes I did pull the tab back prior to turning the valve). This resulted in me getting sprayed with poison. I did manage to spray the yard but had to hold the on/off valve to keep it from popping out. After I finished spraying the yard, the level indicator on the side of the bottle showed it was still full. I don't think I sprayed anything but water on the yard. FAULTY AND DANGEROUS PRODUCT.

I should have read the other reviews.  I did not pay attention to the fact that the real end attaches with velcro.  Didn't even try because I knew what the end result would be.  Also, as compared to the versions I had used before, these require two holes in the cover for each connector.
summary: Attaches to real with VELCRO (and not enough of it).

reviewText:
This light is way different from what I was expecting. Very small, only about 12 inches tall and made of cheap plastic. When we plugged it in the red light didn't work and the yellow and green light only worked for a minute or two before turning off. Very disappointed. It's already been returned.

Do not buy!
summary: Didn't work right out of the box......DO NOT BUY!

reviewText: I bought this for my 4 year old son for Christmas last year.  The lights have stopped working all together for no apparent reason.  I am not sure how to contact the customer service since the "return window has expired".
summary: Lights stopped working after 6 months for no reason!

reviewText: Don't buy please don't waste your money. When they arrived I thought they were the right size, so I threw them in the washer and hung them up to dry. I did not put them in the dryer. I tried one and I had to stretch the heck out of it. And it still would not close at the top, but the worst part was it would not glide across the floor, it just stuck to the floor like glue. What a waste, I should have known the price was too good to be true.
summary: DO NOT BUY, READ MY LIPS, DO NOT BUY, DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY!!!!

reviewText: IGNORED OTHER'S COMPLAINTS ABOUT SIZE AND ORDERED ANYWAYS. RECEIVED THEM AND DISCOVERED THEY WERE TOO SMALL FOR THE SHARK EXTRA LARGE MOP HEAD. COULDN'T CLOSE VELCRO FASTENERS AFTER FORCING PAD ON. RETURNED FOR CREDIT AND ORDERED ORIGINAL MOP FROM SHARK (HAD TO CALL THE 800 NUMBER). RECEIVED EXACT SAME MOP (1 EA) AS CAME WITH THE MACHINE. 1 EA DID COST THE SAME AS 4 OF THE ONES I ORDERED FROM AMAZON BUT FIT PERFECTLY.

I ordered these sheets because I really liked the design.  I had plans to buy the comforter and redesign my bedroom.

When I received these sheets, I was shocked.  They are not cotton. They are polyester/microfiber.  They are so thin as to be almost like paper.  The sheets were weightless. They're not silky, just papery.

I returned the sheet set.

Terrible design.

Impossible to clean.

Looks VERY cool.

Smells like death, once the germs set in.

No amount of disinfectants, cleaners, degreasers, or HOT water, will EVER restore this or other Contigo Autoseal Containers clean.

I have tried them all, and each will still leave traces of old residues (along with new chemical contaminants), in the Autoseal mechanism. This goes for the hot beverage Autoseals as well.

I wanted to love it... but it is flat out unsanitary.

reviewText:
DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY. THIS IS AN IMITATION OF THE BIBLE QUOTE FROM PSALM 118:24. IF YOU ARE A TRUE BELIEVER/FOLLOWER OF JESUS AND THE WORD OF GOD, THIS IS AN INSULT!

SELLER: PLEASE READ THE BIBLE SCRIPTURE AND SELL THE COMPLETE WORDING.

I ordered this for my mom's home and she was really excited about this decal; however, when we tried to apply it to the wall, it would not even peel off the paper and adhere to the wall and we followed the directions exactly. She and I both were very disappointed!

I have just returned my second one. The first one stopped working within a month. I thought it was just defective. The second one lasted about 2 weeks. It's not the battery. It's not anything I did. They just die. They aren't that accurate, the one I had prior to this one probably lasted 18 months, but really, why do I keep going through this? I'm choosing a completely different brand, I no longer trust La Crosse.

reviewText: It only worked for a month, if that.  My husband didn't want to waste more money on a battery to see if that was the problem. Couldn't see buying a new battery every couple of weeks.  The only thing I liked was the large numbers, but then they would fade, I'd put it out in the sun again thinking that was the problem, brought it back to its spot, it made no difference.  Very disappointed.

I was very disappointed when I received my items because they were not the color I had expected. When I inquired about a correction I was told customer does not get the color selected. Colors are chosen at random and sent to the customer. I do not think I will order again since I have no control over what I will actually receive.

I bought two of these, one for my friend and one for myself. I was a little excited to see what the big deal was. I have noticed more and more of these in peoples cars where I live. BIG DISSAPPOINMENT. I have ordered lots of things from China, but this item came in broken, unfixable pieces. Bummer. I requested a refund.

That is where this is going. Worked the first time I put batteries in it. Then I moved the receiver too far from the sensor (like 10 feet) and it lost the signal. Now it won't pick up the transmitter. I've had the batteries in and out at least a dozen times. Each time I put the batteries back in the receiver, the interior temperature shows a different temp. La Crosse should be embarrassed to sell such a worthless piece of junk.

If getting 10 clips for less than seven dollars seems too good to be true, it is. Clips like this need a double loop at both ends in order to fasten properly to straps. These clips have a double loop at one end and a single loop at the other end, rendering them virtually useless. Do yourself a favor and spend more money on clips that will actually work.
summary: ... 10 clips for less than seven dollars seems too good to be true

reviewText: When I opened the package, I quickly found out that it looks NOTHING like a real shirt. It is in the shape of a shirt, but the material is terrible. In my opinion it will not be very beneficial in safe gauding my possesions.
summary: I quickly found out that it looks NOTHING like a real shirt

reviewText: The pockets are too small and some of the fringe(stitching) is hanging out.  I would like to return it but I will only get back $4 of the $12 that I paid for it.  The picture does not show the true size.

The product description claims that it is made of cotton.  This was not made of cotton.  I found it rather fiddly to get into the pockets - the zips kept sticking.  This might work if you were to conceal it on the hanger underneath a shirt or sweater, but it didn't look very convincing on its own.  I returned it to Amazon because the zips didn't work properly, and the product was not made of cotton as described on the website.

Not that great a product. It seems like it might break if you aren't careful.  But, the worst part is that you put the lotion on the pad and the foam pad keeps coming out of the holder.  Waste of money.

I was horrified to see dark green blotches of dye on several of the 4 napkins in the set I ordered.  Unfortunately, I only noticed the dye blotches after I had laundered the napkins, so I kept them.  But I cannot recommend anyone else buy these napkins.

I have to agree with the previous reviewer...if I could give this piece of junk no stars I would.  It is easy to use and has nice features, but I've had it less than a month and it leaks very badly. It is very overpriced at around $30, definately not worth it. I would not recommend this iron to anyone. I wish I would have looked up reviews before I bought it.  If  I still had the receipt I would return it.

I like that these pens come in a nice range of colors and have double-sided tips for finer details. Unfortunately, they'll dry out before you get any mileage from them. Every single marker dried out on both ends completely in less than 4 months and I was really looking forward to having them for a while :(

UNFORTUNATELY, I CANNOT GIVE THIS PRODUCT A ZERO AND IT'S TOO BAD BECAUSE THAT'S BEING GENEROUS!! THIS PRODUCT DOES NOTHING THAT IT CLAIMS. WHEN THEY ARE PUT IN THE GARBAGE DISPOSAL, YOU MIGHT PICK UP THE SUBTLE SCENT OF LEMON OR ORANGE AND THEN AS QUICK AS THEY WENT IN, THE SCENT IS GONE. THEY DON'T DO A GREAT JOB OF BREAKING UP FOOD OR FAT IN THE DISPOSAL. MY SUGGESTION IS THAT YOU'D PROBABLY BE BETTER OFF USING REAL LEMON OR ORANGE PEELS IN YOUR DISPOSAL.

the smell is just awful! Also, don't use it when you have a pet with epilepsy disorder. The cedar can trigger seizures. I found out the hard way. My dog had a seizure right after I sprayed inside the house. I later learned that cedar is one of the essential oils that triggers seizures.

This product is not safe for cats period!! One cat is foaming at the mouth and is very lethargic.  The others have a decrease in appetite and are not feeling right. DO NOT USE ON CATS!!!!!
Update: My cat is doing better but I will never use this on them again.

I had fleas in my carpet. I sprayed with Best Yet cedercide. It didn't really do anything that I could tell. I wanted it to work. I finally gave in and laid down some poison and that seems to have done the trick. Also, I'm not a fan of the smell. I thought a nice ceder smell would be nice, but I didn't like it. It also irritated my lungs.

I bought this umbrella because I've actually owned one before and I loved it, due to the high quality of the construction and the carabiner handle. However, this umbrella, when it arrived to my house, did not have the carabiner handle, despite the product's description. This is a funny and well made umbrella, but the product description is misleading.
summary: Doesn't actually have a carabiner handle.

reviewText: Bags smell like smoke - threw them out.  Complete rip-off.  By the time I unpacked them and hung my clothes the stink became obvious.  Didn't want them in my apartment and got rid of them.  Now I have to wash my clothes.

Very disappointed in this product.  Extremely flimsy and cheaply made.  I would not ever consider giving it as a gift to anyone.  I was very impressed with amazon because when I emailed that i wanted to return it they didn't even require me to return it but refunded the money immediately.  I was very pleased with this great customer service and will always consider amazon when I shop online.

Within the first week of us using this blanket the electric controller stopped working and smelled like a burnt circuit board. We call the manufacturer who sent us another controller to replace the burnt one. This one worked fine for about 1 week again and then stopped working and again smelled like a burnt circuit board. For this to happen twice in a row shows to me there is a design flaw with the controller. I would not buy this blanket again.
summary: Controller breaks after 1 week of use!

reviewText: This bag of seed is magnificently heavy. In fact, it is so heavy the postal worker charger with bringing it to my door decided to say I had moved. Buyer beware, you may never get to see what the world's heaviest bag of seed looks like.

Huge piece of junk. Don't waste your time. The lid cracked the first time the temperature dropped below freezing. That'd be ok if you could buy replacement lids but since you cannot... the whole thing is ruined now. Go get the Rubbermaid RM5F8201 Animal Stopper Trash Can instead. We bought one of those at the same time and it's still going strong. The only downside of the Rubbermaid RM5F8201 Animal Stopper Trash Can is that it doesn't' have wheels.

This is the worse piece of junkl!  It is so flimsy!  The lid does not latch on it.  We had one of these before and it was great and lasted a long time.  This one is not going to last at all.  We didn't return it because it was too much trouble.

I ordered two for a party.  I decided to go ahead and open the boxes early to see how the parts fit together.  One set was missing part of the stand.  The other set was missing the serving utensils but had all of the parts to the stand; however, one of the stand pieces was damaged.  I couldn't make even one good set out of the two sets.  Was not returnable but I was given a refund.  I decided not to reorder. Didn't want to take a chance on it happening again.

The adhesive pretty much comes off when you remove the back vs. staying on the gem. Would be very hard for a young kid to remove the backing and use these as stickers. I had previously ordered these and they were terrific...not sure what happened.
summary: The adhesive pretty much comes off when you remove the back vs

reviewText: Terrible pillow. It goes flat. Really flat. I ordered the firm and it is definitely NOT firm at all. It's also weirdly bouncy. This isn't my first latex pillow but it is the strangest piece of junk pillow I've ever owned. Returning it.

It is very, very soft. I'm not sure what it could be used for. I don't understand the good reviews. Did they get something different than what I received? I might cut it into pieces and see if they are useful as sponges.

This bag says it is for a 7 foot tree!  It is HUGE!  A much larger tree would fit in it.  People say they like it because they can store their wreaths in it with the tree.  I have a narrow 7 foot tree.  There is so much room in the bag, I could fit 2 trees in it.  I returned it, because it is just too bulky.

I bought this bag to protect my tree from sitting in a damp basement all year, but when I opened the bag it had an overwhelming mold smell to it.  This is exactly what I wanted to protect my tree from, so there is no way I would place my tree inside this bag.  I returned this and will look for something else.

I had to return these pillows because of the smell.  It actually made my eyes water. I have asthma and had to put the pillows in another room.  I would like to know what caused the odor.
I had read a review from someone else who also complained of the odor.

Wow.  I read the reviews on this pillow, and decided to give it a try.  This pillow is definitely "high loft"...and very hard, not plush.  Your head barely sinks into the foam at all and there would be no way I could sleep comfortably with this pillow.  If you like hard pillows, then this may be a good choice for you...but it is way too hard for me.
summary: Not what I expected.  High Loft Plush

reviewText:
I bought this 10 days ago and have yet to see a new blade of grass sprout up out of the ground.
It has rained several times...I watered other days - NO NEW GRASS!!!
Waste of money, and its not like you can put it back in the container and send it back for a refund!

The quality of this electric blanket is substandard and the price is outrageous for what you get.  The blanket is so poorly made that it feels like stiff fisherman's netting wrapped in dryer lint.  The power cord and controller are way too short. Avoid buying.

I was disappointed in this blanket. It is thin, you can feel the coils in the blanket and it seems like the top and backing aren't connected well. So, I'm always having to straighten the blanket because it doesn't stay flat like a blanket. It's hard to explain, and not what I expected.
summary: I was disappointed in this blanket

reviewText: I'm very disappointed in these sheets. I washed them before I put them on the bed. They shed terribly and I have burgundy fleece all over the floor and all over my bedspread. I tried anti-static spray and other things and nothing works. I finally removed the sheets and I won't use them again.

With 2 sleeves in place, the blanket looks like a robe. Except that there's nothing to tie any part of the blanket to your body.
Therefore, when you walk around, it drags on the floor. And if you stand up, it falls wide open, you would have to use your hands full-time to hold the blanket in place.

It is useful only if you remain lying down, never standing up or walking around.

Cats cannot metabolize alcohol. It causes liver and kidney damage. So in addition to the essential oils that are toxic to cats, there is grain alcohol which is toxic as well. Honestly, it is really hard to find a good oral hygiene product for cats that is completely safe. It is, however, easy to find lots of these products that CLAIM to be completely safe.  SO important to do our own research to protect our animals.
summary: Second Ingredient is Grain Alcohol, TOXIC to Cats!!

reviewText: This stuff is a rip off!! I have been using it on one of my cats and have noticed no difference at all. I feel I have been taken. Once I ordered, I was bombarded with phone calls from the company to buy other crap, that probably don't work either. I am now expecting crap in the mail from them. Crap, Crap, Crap. I rated them one star, but I didn't want to give a rating at all.

As the title says, I don't know whether this product works or not because my dog was terrified of it and ran away whimpering! I hadn't considered that she may actually fear the spray when I bought it. If it works for your pets, I'm very glad. But if your animal is skittish, that is another thing to think about before purchasing.
summary: Have no idea whether it works of not

reviewText:
"Generously filled with plump feathers." HA! That's laughable.

This is an absolutely awful featherbed. It's gone completely flat after only a few months of use--it's like sleeping with a piece of cardboard under the sheets at this point. Do yourself a favor and buy a different brand.

I am really not a fan of this feather bed, however I don't know if that is due to my personal preference or the feather bed in general. I don't find it is like "sleeping on a cloud" as another reviewer described it. I bought it to soften a firm mattress, however I think if anything it adds to the firmness. I will be purchasing a memory foam to replace this one.

When it arrived the packaging looked like it was put in the washer, then the dryer then thrown around in the back of a truck before it was mailed to me.  Although it was meant as a little gag gift... it still wasn't worth $6.00.

reviewText: The stars and moons are not magnetic...only the base so if this is the only way you want to use it this is the item for you.  I only figured it out when I set the base down on something metal and had a devil of a time getting the base off.

The item arrived on time and was as pictured; however, it was unusable. When I put tissues into the box, they became permeated with an odor that seeped through the entire stack. I was afraid to use them, so I threw away the tissues and the box.  I was disappointed because the box was attractive.
summary: I was disappointed because the box was attractive

reviewText: Well I loaded it up.  It worked correctly.  The next day there were several drips under it.  Then I didn't use it for a week.  I put my hands under it and nothing.  The soap was all gunked up in the nozzel.  Cleared the nozzel with a pin and it worked again.  It still drips.

I REALLY wanted to love this.  I was so excited to get it and put it together.  But that's where the excitement ended.

 It's flimsy and not stable.  Says portable but it's not.  Every time I touched it the poles fell out and the whole thing would fall down.  When I moved it, poles fell out, it kept twisting on itself and the fabric kept falling off.

If you have a large space and can keep this up without having to move it, it would be better.

If I could give it zero stars, I would. The flannel does not hold anything but small pieces of fabric. Larger blocks fall off almost immediately. What's more, if you try to use pins, they don't hold either and fall off because there is only one layer of flannel to hold them. Unfortunately, I opened the package and assembled the wall, so I am not sure I can send it back.

I found this product to be impossible to use.  After a few weeks, you need the Terminator to turn the darn thing.  Then it begins to reek leading me to think, this product stinks.  Literally.  All in all, an unpleasant and vain attempt to recycle.  Look elsewhere.

reviewText: The design is extremely flimsy: when you try to roll the main container, it has a tendency to slide off the wheels. We also found that this product did not compost nearly as well as two simple plastic garbage cans flipped upside down and stacked on top of each other in the yard (with the bottom of the lower one cut out). Avoid this overpriced piece of junk... realistically, I would pay $20 for it, but not $150.

After just three years the edges had worn through.  It was not overloaded and I rotated it just once/twice a week.  The edges began to literally crumble.  I threw it away! (Actually, it was recycled).  The old adage prevails......"you get what you pay for".  Stay away from this piece of junk.

After a few hours of not being used, the dispenser requires multiple activations to actually dispense soap. It seems the soap flows back out of the pump into the reservoir if the dispenser is not used frequently. Once soap is flowing, the dispenser dispenses only a tiny amount of soap, requiring at least 3 activations to get a sufficient amount of soap on your hands. All in all, it looks similar to the CVS store brand, but the performance is sub par.
summary: Poor implementation of a very simple product

reviewText:
*****Update! The step cracked and broke about a month after purchase. My Mom is a small person. I would NOT recommend this step for anyone! It cracked when she stepped on it, she would have fallen if I wasn't there to catch her.

Bought this to make it easier for my Mom to get in my front door. It works great, but I would love to see one that is the same width as the door, this is  not quite wide enough. It also tends to be a little slippery when wet.

This is not worthy of even one star!  DO NOT PURCHASE THIS PRODUCT.  IT DOES NOT STICK TO ANYTHING. The reason is not because of the surface(s), but it is because the metal covers on the suction cups hit the surface before the suction cups, thus not allowing the suction cups to work.  I am not returning because I threw away all wrappings it was in, thinking that there was no way that this simple gadget wouldn't work.  Amazon needs to take this off their product offers.

It is described as "fog free" and it doesn't even come close to being fog free. The product description also says "2 super strong suction cups....". Whoever wrote this description either hasn't ever tried to use this product or is in serious need of a dictionary as this product does not stay suctioned to a clean glass surface.

It doesn't work. It doesn't stick to any surfaces no matter how much I clean them or how hard I press into it. And yes, I've been trying to apply it to the correct types of surfaces. Total waste of money

Came out of the box with only one working suction cup. The right cup seemed to have been creased at some point during packaging so that it doesn't seal against the tile no matter how hard you press. I ignored the problem when setting it up because the left cup seemed to hold it up just fine.. for about a week or so. A cannot give a good rating to a product that isn't fully functioning straight out of the box!
summary: I ignored the problem when setting it up because the left cup seemed to hold it up just fine.. for about a week or so

reviewText: The hooks aren't shaped right to hold a razor.  The razor just ends up twisting sideways and falling out.  Maybe it would work with a disposable razor, but I have a Venus razor that is a bit more hefty.

When I received this product, the first thing I did was remove the plastic protection. Upon just gazing at myself in the mirror, I felt dizzy. Why? Well this mirror is wavy, kind of like a fun house mirror. This is not something I want to use in my shower. A mirror should not be wavy. I'm truly disappointed in this product and I am returning it.

I feel foolish for not taking the picture literally.  The mirror really is blurry as the picture shows.  It's not a mirror in the sense that you are thinking.  I found out that if I smear soap on it, I can see my reflection; but that is just extreme.
summary: I feel foolish for not taking the picture literally. ...

reviewText: Horrible product. Complete waste of money. One of the suction cups seems to work only when it wants to. The mirror isn't even a mirror. It's just a piece of metal that gives me a blurry reflection of myself.

"Fog Free" and "POWER LOCK" is a complete lie.  I just received the mirror today and already, the "POWER LOCK" has broken on the right side.  I could not get it to stick in my shower and the right side suction cup seems to be bent all around making it even more difficult to suction to the shower.

I am not happy with this product and really hope the company who makes this thing can fix it before anyone else has the same problem as me.

NOT IMPRESSED.
summary: Horrible. "Fog Free" and "POWER LOCK" is a LIE!

reviewText: "Fog Free" is just plain not true about this mirror. It's incredibly foggy, and I can't see my own face from two inches away while shaving. I do not recommend this product at all. The suction cups fall off of the wall, the razor balances precariously, falling all the time. This mirror is so faulty it's not functional and I strongly recommend buying a different brand.
summary: I do not recommend this product at all

reviewText: It sucks, it is the worst thing I have ever bought. What ever you do, do not buy this piece of crap. I bought one it didn't stick at all, so I returned it and got a new one, well this one does the same thing, piece of crap!

I was not happy with this product at all.  It was certainly not fog free and I could not get it to stay on the shower wall with the suction cups.  I ended up throwing it away after becoming frustrated.
summary: InterDesign Forma Power Lock Suction Fog Free Rectangular Mirror, Clear

reviewText: My poor son... He has been taking care of these two egg pods for three months now and nothing has happened... We have a CHE on it 24/7, keeping the tank around 80 at all times, and nothing has happened. Hes so hopeful, and I hate that hes going to be heartbroken. :/

This is an invasive species of praying mantis.  It's the Chinese praying mantis which you can tell by the wide egg case.  Invasive Chinese praying mantis are killing native praying mantis species.  Also, praying mantis in general also kill many beneficials.  They are known to kill Monarch butterfly larvae.  Monarch butterflies are in severe decline.  Praying Mantis have also been known to kill hummingbirds.

It's not. A while. Still waiting for any of these babies to come out. I don't know what they're doing in there but nothing happening out here. Have seen no offspring. Am disappointed so far. They took a while to be delivered. Meanwhile, aphids are snacking away on my zinnias, dahlias and other flowering plants. Bought this because I wanted natural pest control. So far, aphids are winning by landslide. The mantis team has yet to even show up.
summary: Two inactive egg cases. Aphids in my garden. Mantids are a no-show. Not a good deal.

reviewText: I'm starting to wonder how old these eggs were when they were sent to me. It's been three months and they haven't hatched, which is a good indicator that they won't hatch. I've raised mantis' several times before and they normally hatch in 4-6 weeks. I see most of the reviews here are quite old so I'm wondering if I was just sent eggs that have been sitting in a warehouse for years.

Out of FIVE egg cases I have ZERO praying mantises, even though I followed the instructions exactly and it has been two months.  Got a refund, so maybe next year I'll place the egg cases in a controlled environment and test them again?

I put these in my garden in mid June and it's now mid September.  I haven't seen 1 praying mantis but many, many grasshoppers.  That's why I wanted these.  I'll give it another shot next year.  Maybe I was just unlucky?

You are buying an instruction book that should have been included with the unit. There is nothing extra in this book that is worth paying for. Poorly written. Full of basic stuff that you know already. Waste of money.

These are 1.) Not cotton.  2.) Not 1000 thread count.  Amazon should not allow such blatant misrepresentation in a product's description.  Otherwise, the fabric is soft, and the price is low.  If you think you're getting a great deal, these polyester sheets aren't it.
summary: False Discription - not cotton, not 1000 thread count.

reviewText: This product should not be sold at the price listed. It can not be used for anything. Don't waste your money on it! My fingernail scraped, and took a chunk off the cork, when taking off the plastic wrap. I'm going to write to Amazon next, to see about getting my money back.

This replacement broke through it's clear packaging and was uncapped in the box.  I installed it and it was working great for a little over a month.  Now it is doing the same thing that the old one that was 2 and 1/2 years old did, slow the flow down to a trickle.  Very possibly it was caused because of poor packaging, bouncing around in the box and disrupting the membrane.  The filter is supposed to last 2 to 5 years.  My original that came with the system lasted over 2 1/2 years.
summary: Installed it on 12-14-2012 and it's plugged 1-24-2013

reviewText: Sharpener will not spin the rotary blade in a way that will allow it to sharpen the blade.  I have tried to do it multiple times per the instructions and the blades come out duller than they were when I put them in. Definitely do not buy.
summary: Would not buy this product again

reviewText:
I bought this to sharpen the blades on my  45 rotary cutter, which seem to go dull after about four uses.

I am very disappointed with this sharpener, which was expensive. It doesn't sharpen the blades at all. I ended up buying new blades. It was a waste of money. I could have used that money for new blades.
summary: Don't waste your money on this contraption.

reviewText: Despite the reviews, I thought I'd give this a try.  Unfortunately, it just didn't work.  My husband, a retired mfg engineer, did everything he could to get it to work.  He called the customer service dept. and they sent him out a new one (great customer service - 5 stars), but the new one didn't work much better than the old one.  We returned both.  At the cost of blades, we really wanted this to work.  Hopefully we can find something that does.  The search continues......

Not only does this product does not work., it is difficult to use as it requires changing out very small sharpening stones. It actually puts a blunt edge on the blades.  They were sharper before using this sharpener.  I had a machinist try to get a sharper edge on the blades, and even he found them to be useless.  The stones are of poor quality and wear out quickly.  DO NOT BUY this product.  I wish I had used it sooner, but unfortunately I am past the return date... Don't waste your money.

Tried twice to sharpen blades, but they still come out dull and unusable.  Thought I could save money on blades, but I'll go back to purchasing them now.  It is very noisy when in use.  Wish this would have worked.
summary: but they still come out dull and unusable

reviewText: I managed to sharpen about four blades and then it quit working. When I load the blade and push the button, nothing happens. While it worked it worked great. So for the price per blade, you might as well buy new blades.

These do not fit the Rubbermaid water bottles that they say they do. Unfortunately, I didn't realize this until the night before our trip to Disney so I was stuck without our water bottles for the entire trip.  And I did't realize this until it was too late to return them so now I'm stuck with them.  These need to be pulled from Amazon because they are completely useless.
summary: DO NOT BUY, THEY DON'T FIT

reviewText: I loved this bottle because it kept me from having to constantly buy bottled water. I recently purchased a twin-pack of filters only to find out they had changed the design and it no longer screws into the top. It just hangs uselessly in the center letting unfiltered water seep through. I am not sure what the point was to change it but it definitely defeats it's purpose.

This is NOT a suitable replacement for the screw-on filter that came with the bottle. I tightened the top as much as I could but unfiltered water escaped with the filtered water. So, what's the point? I guess I'll look for another bottle...

Despite the claims that this works just as well or better, the fact remains that THEY DO NOT FIT the bottle. The bottle is threaded, these filters are not. Won't fit, won't ever fit. Super bummed because it was my favorite bottle. Don't buy the bottle anymore either, at least for now....

I went to Rubbermaid.com to see if they had any old-style screw-in filters left. I couldn't find any filter bottles or filters of any kind. I guess they don't make them anymore. I am so tired of finding a product that I like being discontinued.

These are not the correct replacement filters for Rubbermaid 20-Ounce Filtration Personal Bottles.  The original filters screw in.  There is no way to attach this filter to the bottle.  I don't know what these are for, nor do I know where to get the correct replacement filters. I think you may have to buy a new bottle :/

The former screw-in filter was flawless in every aspect! But this new one, what a difference! Why did Rubbermaid change something that had ZERO problems into something that leaks, is a pain to attach and doesn't work nearly as good? PLEASE GO BACK TO THE SCREW-IN FILTER!!! I have recommended the older version of that water bottle to so many people. It USED TO BE best water bottle in the market! Now, because of this new filter, I do NOT recommend this product!

Unfortunately this bottle was the older version where the filter screws into the top and does not fit the new version of replacement filters. This happened to me before with an older bottle I had and was shocked to see that this bottle was the older version. Having ordered this bottle in the last six weeks I assumed it would be the newer version. Once this filter is used up the bottle is useless. I was very disappointed.
summary: Older version does not fit newer version of replacement filters!

reviewText: Absolute waste of time!  I bought it because of the positive reviews that were made when the product had a filter that screwed into the cap.  If you search through the reviews, you'll read that the filter now just lays on top.  Well, even after putting the cap on, you can tell that the water is bypassing the would-be filter.  So what's the point?  It doesn't fit perfectly Rubbermaid!  So go back to the screw in type and stop screwing your customers!

Too bad that Rubbermaid decided to change the shame of the filter and have it floating on the bottom instead of screwed into the top. Having the filter be able to screw into the top was one of the reasons I bought this water bottle in the first place. I am quite upset that the filters no longer attach to the bottle. I even went as far to email Rubbermaid to ask the if they would consider brining back the screw in filter but at this time they said no.  I will not buy this product again or recommend it.

I sent my kids to camp with one Brita filter bottle and one Rubber Maid filter bottle.  No question about it they both said the Brita was much better.  Apparently the Rubbermaid filter did nothing to reduce the bad taste in the water and Brita worked well.

We purchased this set for our newly remodeled kitchen.  They look great and the sizes in the set are useful.  However, the lids fit so tightly that they are next to impossible to remove!  I have injured myself several times trying to get the lids off of these.  They are going into the garbage, what a waste!  I cannot recommend them.
summary: Nice canisters, but the lids are impossible to deal with!

reviewText: I ordered Endurance Stainless Steel Drink Straws and Endurance Stainless Steel Frozen Drink Straws as I saw that they were different.  I received two sets of the drink straws and none of the frozen drink straws.

Catastrophic failure after less than 1 year.  The "springs" just start popping and the bed collapses in that spot.  There is mention of a 5 year warranty but there is no information on how to make a warranty claim.  Amazon does not respond to requests for help getting the product warrantied.  It is actually kind of dangerous.
summary: if you don't need it to last very long works great.

reviewText: This bird feeder worked pretty well until our first blustery day.  Under a strong wind, the pole bent over until the two bird feeders were on the ground. The pole is simply not strong enough to hold two bird feeders loaded with bird seed.  The metal in the pole seemed strong, but did not hold up to the first windy day.
summary: Not Strong Enough to Hold Two Bird Feeders

reviewText: Significantly noisier than expected. Even on low, you know it's there. Also moves less air than expected. Even on high, it just doesn't feel like much. All in all, I guess it serves its purpose, but there has to be something better out there...

I purchased two of these and both of them leaked the first time that I used them.  I froze them and one leaked in the freezer and the second one leaked at the picnic.  Horrible....not worth the money spent.  Do not purchase this product.

I'm not new to canning, but I usually use Pomona Pectin.  It has never, ever failed me.  But I found this recipe that used liquid pectin, and it sounded so good...  So I bought a flat of gorgeous, fresh strawberries. I followed the recipe faithfully.  Now I'm looking at 18 jars of strawberry-lemon syrup that were supposed to be marmalade.  Never again!!
summary: Forget this stuff--I'm going back to Pomona Pecrin!

reviewText: The jars worked great initially, but Ive had them for a couple of weeks now and Ive noticed that the plastic tops swell tight onto the jars when they are on the countertop or refrigerator. This makes it impossible to remove the lids. Its very frustrating. My husband, who is rather strong, could not get the plastic lids off these jars for the life of him. What is going on with this? Ive never had this problem with sprouting jars before...

I have used many of these indoor outdoor thermometers in the past. I know how to use and install them properly.
I purchased this item and after several days the outdoor temperature didn't show on the screen. I tried everything, new batteries etc and it still didn't work. I exchanged it for another one and the second one had the same problem after several days. I exchanged the second one and the 3rd one had the same issue.
summary: Returned several of these and none of them worked properly!

reviewText: This mop broke during the very first normal use!  The entire mop head came out of the bracket and there is no way to put it back in.  I tried contacting the company and am waiting to find out how they plan to resolve this matter. I wouldn't recommend this product at all.  I am very disappointed and will be returning it to the Walmart where I purchased it for a complete refund.  I'm sticking with my old fashioned mop from now on!

This mop leaves streaks on the floor no matter what I do or use. My Libman mop that I got from Walmart works better. I don't like it nor would I recommend it to anyone. It's over priced. I was crazy to pay $30 for it.

DON'T BUY THIS. Outrageous. They offer you a 30-day warranty but don't have enough confidence in the product to cover the cost of mail. I would have had to pay $36 to mail it back by UPS. Add that to the $16 cost of them mailing it to me in the first place, and it would have cost me $52 to return the mattress, not to mention the hassle of repackaging it and sending it back. The mattress does a moderate job of  cooling but there is NO WAY it is worth $187!!!!!
summary: DON'T BUY THIS! THE WARRANTY IS MISLEADING AND WORTHLESS.

reviewText: I was skeptical, and it turns out, rightly so.  I did not buy this on Amazon, but directly from the manufacturer.  It's going back, and I really resent the postage it's going to cost me to send something this large back to them.  IT DOES NOTHING.  Don't waste your money.  I'm sorry to say it, because I wanted it to work.  I still have my hot sleep problem, after all.  But really, it does NOT work.

This thing is a complete piece of garbage and waste of money. Installed on pool cover this morning and as soon as any pressure was applied the thing broke in 2 places. Now I have to order a new one and have my pool cover held down with clamps.

I bought two and used them for an entire year. Unfortunately, they do not do what they are intended to do.
I think that is a fair amount of time to write an honest review. They also stain over a period of time.
I am now going to purchase two satin pillow cases and give them a try. C'est la vie!

If I want to make a dessert for only one person (myself), I'll have to open the machine and dig the shredded frozen yogurt stuck inside the grinder. Better to eat the frozen fruits instead of grinding them if you plan to use this machine for a single user.
summary: Better to eat the frozen fruits instead of grinding them ...

reviewText: Not happy with this product. I love ice cream and I bought this product to hopefully be my ice cream/frozen yogurt substitute.  In order to get the amount of dessert depicted on the box you would have to use about 5 to 7 bananas or MORE and only for ONE person.  I like bananas, but not that much. Even using 5 bananas, the product did not look anything like it was shown on the box. I even allowed it to melt a little to see if it would simulate ice cream like texture.  Didn't happen. Disappointed

The machine worked excellent, but the concept turned out was not my cup of tea.  The product is excellent, but the end result is not what I expected for my taste buds.  PLEASE NOTE: THE PRODUCT IS EXCELLENT !
summary: The machine worked excellent, but the concept turned out was not my ...

reviewText: This item was a disappointment to me.  It was extremely difficult for me to open so I could clean it the first time.  Once I used it, it was even more difficult to open it up to clean.  Once I finally got it open and cleaned, I donated it to the Goodwill. The fruit that came out (bananas and strawberries) was just OK.
summary: This item was a disappointment to me

reviewText: I have been making banana 'ice cream ' in the food processor for several years & thought the Yonanas machine would be a big improvement over the processor. It is not at all. There is so much banana left in the machine that you need to use an extra banana or two just to get a normal small serving size of finished product. It is messy to clean up with mashed banana in all sorts of crevices and crannies. I much prefer the food processor to this gimmick !

Too many rules for my purposes.  The bananas had to be ripe but not too ripe, and then frozen, but not too frozen.  I gave the product to the good-will in hopes that someone else will have better success than I.

I ORDERED & RECEIVED THIS TREAT MAKER & WAS SO EAGER TO GET STARTED.  IT WAS SOOOOOOOOOO LOUD THAT IT JUST ABOUT BLASTED MY EARDRUMS OUT!  ALSO, YOU HAVE TO USE 2 BANANAS EVERY TIME YOU MAKE A SERVING SO IT'S DOES NOT MAKE FOR A LOW CALORIE TREAT.  I DECIDED TO RETURN THIS ITEM AS IT DID
NOT MEET MY EXPECTATIONS. AMAZON MAKES RETURNS VERY SIMPLE SO IT WORKS OUT GREAT!

I have never before bothered to review any product, but this was such a disappointment. I am not happy with this machine because the noise level is very high, and hurting my ears. Ear plugs are a must!!! In addition,  The machine is very hard to open - it needs to be opened with a turn to the right, but I had to call my husband, and it was not easy for him either. I managed, with difficulty, to close it.
The banana ice cream is nice and creamy, but this is still not worth it. Going back to the store.

I was very disappointed in these sheets. While my 3 yr old grandson loved the appearance, they are so rough he cannot use them. He has severe eczema and these sheets are like sandpaper on his skin. Even without a skin condition they are too coarse for anyone to enjoy.

The pillow case that was delivered was completely different from what I ordered. The colors were dark and the material was very thin. I was very disappointed. The case I ordered had a checker board pattern with light colors and the one I received had a dark brown and dark blue background.

There is no way to lock the rods into place, so the caddy is difficult to install.  Was a pain to put together.  Tension rod jammed, got stuck in one place, and I couldn't adjust it.  Had to make a DIY fix just to get it installed.  Not worth the money.
summary: There is no way to lock the rods into place ...

reviewText: Don't recommend this item.  It does not have a spring at the top,  it is a tension rod and it will not extend more than an inch to work properly.  We needed it to extend 4 inches, and it collapses.  There were extra rods but they were not the correct size.

We have been using this product for ten days, and it is already discolored.  We have a water softener, so it is not our water.  We are very disappointed with this purchase.  It appears to have been a complete waste of money, and I cannot understand how other purchasers have given this product 4+ stars.
summary: We are very disappointed with this purchase

reviewText: Ive only owned this for a few months.  It was more expensive than some of the other caddies so i thought the quality would be top notch.  I guess i thought wrong.  It's already rusting!  This product should be as anti-rust as they come considering it's going in a wet place.
summary: Ive only owned this for a few months. It ...

reviewText: Out of the box only two of the led panels worked.  From day one I have had to jiggle the flag pole to get the lights to come on.  Less than a week after installation it was down to one bank of LED's.  I kept it because it is a bit of a pain to take the pole down and even with one bank of lights, it was adequate to illuminate the flag.  Well, yesterday the last bank of LED's went down. Do yourself a favor and save your money.

I was happy when I first got these because they are soft and silky.  They eally feel nice, just like what I wanted.  Within a month, though, one of them started to rip at the seams.  I thought maybe it was a fluke, but no.  Another one ripped, then another.  It's really disappointing because they seem like  fantastic buy, but clearly this is why they are so cheap.  If they are just meant to be decorative, then they'd work for you, but they do not stand up to actual use.  Cheap and disappointing.
summary: They do not last a month

reviewText: You get what you pay for. You'd think by now I'd have learned THAT lesson enough times! They looked fine when I opened the package, but after washing they went directly into the rag bag! DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY!!

Don't expect satin sheets. The only thing close to it is that it's shiny, other than that, it's extremely poor quality and feels like paper. Literally rough to the touch. It's hard and unlike satin that doesn't hold shape, this one has creases that stay and won't flatten out. Mine also came with stains. I had to return it to Amazon.
summary: Cheap, thin and rough. I might as well sleep on cardboard

reviewText: Would not recommend this particular set of pillow cases.  The texture wasn't as smooth as I was hoping.  Also, the color (red in this case) wore off on the pillow after using it for a couple of weeks and my wife's fingernail tips turned pink.  It may have something to do with the type of fingernail polish she uses but it doesn't explain why the pillow also turned red.
summary: Color wears off on your pillow.

reviewText: These are NOT *soft* or *silky* as in the product title, they are hard, stiff and quite coarsely textured, not at all like satin, although it *looks* like satin, it's not at all smooth. Very rough on the skin. Great to look at, if all you want is pillows that look like they're covered in satin,but you don't even want to sleep on this. I'm very disappointed.

AWFUL, cheaply made product. Seam ripped open as soon as I washed them! I was so disappointed by these. I know the price was low but I never expected them to completely tear as soon as I washed them, which had to be done before using. I was really hoping these would be nice and almost tossed them in the trash but that's not fair to waste any money. I contacted the seller and I'm just waiting to find out if they will allow me to return them for a refund.
summary: Seam Ripped Open Immediately After Washing!

reviewText: These blue satin pillowcases (as well as the purple ones) are stand outs online for their attractive appearance.. In reality though, the fabric is dull, grainy, and stiff (even after washing). It reminds me of bamboo, but not in a good way. Additionally, I've awakened in the mornings after sleeping on these pillowcases, with my hair having some huge snarls! This sort of defeats the original purpose of a satin pillowcase...to keep your hair looking good in the morning.

These are NOT *soft* or *silky* as in the product title, they are hard, stiff and quite coarsely textured, not at all like satin, although it *looks* like satin, it's not at all smooth. Very rough on the skin. Great to look at, if all you want is pillows that look like they're covered in satin,but you don't even want to sleep on this. I'm very disappointed.

DO NOT BUY!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! These are nowhere near being "soft" or "silky". I guess you get what you pay for because these are the cheapest imitation satin pillowcases I've ever seen. They were hard and scratchy. I requested a return with the seller and sent in my package months ago NEVER GOT A REFUND. Don't waste your time with this low quality seller or "satin" product.
summary: Don't waste your time with this low quality seller or "satin" ...

reviewText: These purple satin pillowcases (as well as the blue ones) are stand outs online for their attractive appearance.. In reality though, the fabric is dull, grainy, and stiff (even after washing). It reminds me of bamboo, but not in a good way. Additionally, I've awakened in the mornings after sleeping on these pillowcases, with my hair having some huge snarls! This sort of defeats the original purpose of a satin pillowcase...to keep your hair looking good in the morning.

Don't waste your money on this product.  It doesn't work.  I bought it and applied it as directed and three months later my driveway was still gray with mold and mildew.  A pressure washer works much faster and better.  You would do well to rent one and not waste money on this product.  It just does nothing at all.
summary: Don't waste your money on this product

reviewText: We ordered two of these. Both came with the same issue, the top part was totally unglued right out of the box. Cheaply made with not enough glue and clearly a defect. Shame because the design was exactly what we were looking for. Both sent back.
summary: We ordered two of these. Both came with the ...

reviewText: The size of the product is listed as "1 x 3.8 x 9.8 inches". However, the actual size of the tray is only about 2.5 x 2.5 inches. I think the size of the "product" listed may be the size of the total packaging that holds all the trays/bags...very misleading... I was going to use these as a goodie bag for a bachelorette party, but since they are tiny I will have to see what I can do about returning them.
summary: actual size is MUCH smaller than listed size

reviewText: I have to really squeeze the bottle, and I hate that I have to squeeze the bottle and suck on it hard to get a sip of water. It makes it really difficult to increase my water intake. Honestly, I stopped using it, and I regret purchasing it.
summary: and I hate that I have to squeeze the bottle and suck ...

reviewText:
If you like the taste of cancer, you'll LOVE the Under Armour Undeniable Squeeze Bottle! That's right! The delicious, refreshing flavor (or, I suppose since it's Under Armour "flavour") of plastic-y goodness! Sure, I may not be able to use it because of an unhealthy fear of chemotherapy, but it's nice to know that if I get to the point where I long for the sweet release of death, this bottle is my token for the express train.

THANK YOU, UNDER ARMOUR!!!

Well the bottle was great, but now it has started leaking on the sides where the black grips are. Apparently I'm not the only one with this problem. Of course, now it's been too long to be able to get it replaced, so that's cool. Has only been used about 20-25 times.
summary: Well the bottle was great, but now it has started leaking on the ...

reviewText: BEWARE: The design of the bottle and the cap prevent the cap from maintaining a seal when the bottle is squeezed. In other words, if you flip the bottle over it won't leak, but if you're pushing water from the bottle then water will go all over the place.

If you're going to use constantly.. I wouldn't recommend it. I've used it every day for almost 3 months and it's falling apart now. Water is coming out of the seams on the grip sides. Every time I take a drink with it full now,water squirts out. I spent 15 dollars on this piece of crap and didn't even get 3 full months of use.
summary: Doesn't last long, don't buy this piece of garbage. Overpriced waste of money.

reviewText: Please be aware that the bright color on these glasses comes from a plastic-like coating.  This coating started wearing off after about 6 months, leaving pale spots on the glasses.  Also, the glasses are quite small, even for juice glasses.

I can't get this thing to work.  I put a hose on one end, other end of the hose in the pool I'm trying to empty.  I pump and pump and pump... and all I get are small squirts and splashes of water.  I could empty the pool faster and with less effort by just using a bucket.  I think I wasted my money.

Update:  Seller will not return if it has been used.  How I was supposed to know it doesn't work without using it is beyond me.  Don't buy this!
summary: I think I wasted my money

reviewText: While they look great, all three that I ordered smell like they were soaked in fuel oil, or worse.  The odor is so bad, I cannot even keep them in the house.  Tried washing one, the smell just got worse.  No idea what I am going to do with them now, don't want them in the house, don't want to kill the wildlife outside by keeping them out there.  Truly disappointed.

I was so happy to put my new birdbath in my garden.  What a nice addition it made! Problem is two days later it broke off at the base.  My husband tried to epoxy it back together and now I'm going to have it welded back together in hopes that I can fix it.  The bowl itself is beautiful, so I don't want to return it.  I would have been willing to spend double the price for a birdbath that would last.  POOR QUALITY. Very disappointed.

This card box came with no directions at all - The logical way still did not work-It just folded up and collapsed in on itself-We had to go out and buy a different card box - You couldn't give me this box!

If there was a lower score to give, I would. I have ordered seeds from this company and the seeds that I received were all broken up. Only 3 out of 20 appeared to be viable. There was little to nothing to germinate, and they did not germinate. I wrote a review and contacted the company. I have yet to receive the replacement seeds that I ordered. I have finally just given up waiting for the seeds that I ordered.
summary: beware, don't order from this company

reviewText: I liked this product in theory but when it fell out of the refrigerator it broke. It also is hard to open because there's condensation on the outside and there's nowhere to grab it so I had to use a device to even open it which it shouldn't be that hard to open. For the reasons of not being able to open easily I would not recommend this product.

This product does NOT contain the smell of an onion is any way, shape or form.  Put it in your fridge or freezer with onion slices or chopped onion in it and the smell will hit you in the face next morning when you open the door.  Threw away.  Not worth paying the postage to return.

I had been searching for a small size plastic cup since I like to drink espresso at work. But this cup leaves a bad aftertaste in the coffee. At first I thought it was the coffee maker that I used but I was wrong. Am I the only one to experience this?
summary: Left a bad taste in my mouth...

reviewText: The first few times I used it, I had no issue.  True it didn't give off very much light but I was fine with that.  But on the 5th time lighting the wick, the oil had clogged it and it was not burning properly at all and I thought a fire was going to be started. Not buying this again.

The cat is a cute little statuette, but as a ring holder - not so much!  The image suggests that you will be putting rings on the tail, but that image does NOT show that the rings will rest on the surface, which is what happens when gravity acts on a ring you slip onto the cat's tail!  If you only have one or two rings to hold at a time, you can hang them on kitty's ears quite nicely.  But that suggestive tail is just really not the ring holder it could be.
summary: you can hang them on kitty's ears quite nicely. But that suggestive tail is just really not ...

reviewText: This cat ring holder is cute but useless. I got this for my desk at work. I work in a lab and take my rings off before I put gloves on so the gloves don't rip. Using this ring holder, my rings just fall right down to the base of the tail and sit on the desk. I might as well just put my rings on the desk. What's the point?
summary: Cute but useless... rings just sit on the desk

reviewText: The dividers are flimsy paper, and there aren't enough dividers for the number of labels they give you. The labels aren't shaped for the tabs, so you have to trim the excess to keep the labels from sticking to everything. The organizer itself is flimsy and feels like something you'd find at the dollar store. A toddler could make this in about 10 minutes, and for $9 less than they're selling it for.

This product is worthless and I sent it back for a refund. It's too long and the dividers are not attached, so they slip and fall everywhere. They are literally just pieces of cut out cardboard set inside an "organizer." I ended up going to a big box store and purchasing a plastic one that had the dividers attached for a fraction of the cost! Works much better!

The ad said that it expanded to hold a large number of coupons--it doesn't, it doesn't expand enough for the amount of coupons that I use--a waste of money unless you are a part time couponer, no place to put the coupons once you take them out while shopping--ended up giving it to my daughter who is a part time couponer---I don't recommend this product

This detergent does not do anything for cloth diapers. My daughters diapers smell so badly I cant bring myself to put them on her. Ive washed, soaked, washed again and again with this detergent and no change. After 2 soakings and 4 washes, no change, diapers still smell like they just came off her.

The coasters were packaged well, but that's pretty much the only good thing about them.  One of the coasters had chipped paint on all four corners, and they looked very cheaply made.  (Looked on the back, made in China of course.) These could easily be something stocked in a Dollar Store for about $2.00 total.  The holder was also not bronze, just a lightweight black metal holder.  I wouldn't recommend these to anyone.  You're better off using a paper towel for a coaster, frankly.

This new hydro stick doesn't work as well as the old (silver) stick.  Using the old sticks & cleaning weekly worked great, but with this new hydro stick I've had to clean the humidifier every couple of days.  The new hydro stick doesn't seem to be doing anything - it's a total waste of money for me.  I'd give it zero stars if I could.  Sure hope they bring back the old silver sticks!

Doesn't work very well, the old silver stick was much better. But what can I do? I have a giant humidifier that is useless without these, so I'm kind of stuck. I'm very close to starting over with a different humidifier.

This does not work at all like the old ones, no matter what anyone says.  No matter what the guy I e-mailed at Air-O-Swiss says.  Can't remember his name but we had a long e-mail discussion and he assured me this worked as well as the old ones.  Well don 't waste your money!!

This "new" stick is a joke. It look to be a piece of plastic for the price of the original silver stick which I know had antimicrobial properties for sure because of the silver in them. My humidifier gets dirty so fast now and it's hard to get rid of the slime. I'm very disappointed that Air-O-Swiss took this route. I'll give my humidifier another year, or until my silver stick is depleted before I look for another humidifier, and it's not going to be Air-O-Swiss again.

The material it's made from doesn't bend at all so you can only use it for a very skinny bottle of water/fluid. Now it's sitting on a shelf doing nothing but taking up space. Not even a soda can will fit in it.  Useless!

The set of hardware necessary for assembly was not complete,  and the wrench for tightening what bolts were there did not fit them. The seller never responded to my phone calls and I was forced to improvise and buy more hardware on my own to assemble it. It wobbles on it's legs - not sturdy at all.

Absolute piece of junk.  Fell apart in less than three months and it scares me that it was purchased for someone with a disability and they could have fallen.  We now have one of the heavy duty, plastic chairs.  No, it doesn't look as nice as this one, but it was a third of the price and seems much sturdier.  This was a truly awful product for the price.
summary: Do not buy for anybody with a disability!

reviewText: I wanted to like this.  I wasn't expecting it to taste like 92 point wine, or even 88 point wine. The thing is, this doesn't even taste like grape juice much less wine.  This tastes like urine.  Disgusting.
summary: I wanted to like this. I wasn't expecting it to taste like ...

reviewText:
I purchased this October 2012.  It worked great  until about 3 weeks ago.  The heater fan does not turn on anymore.  Nothing I do, seems to make it work.

I bought it as it was a "best seller". Turns out that being a best seller does not make it work.

The fan itself looks nice for the $5 I paid for it but when I received the product it had a giant snag all the way across it. If it hadn't had a snag, I would have rated it somewhere around 4 stars but with the snag, it's just a waste of money. I would rather pay twice as much for a product that is actually in good condition.

The item I received (sold and sent by Amazon) was a cheap knock-off, and certainly not in anything close to an Umbra brand box. When I called Amazon, I asked for a replacement item, actually made by Umbra as the product description states, to be sent to me. We'll see what happens, as the customer service agent said she couldn't make any promises.

How disappointing.

Sorry to say this little heater was received in such poor condition.  It had obviously been used before with marks all over the casing and was rattling when I first turned it on.  Within an hour the heater the rattling increased along with the noise.  Lightweight and mostly plastic, this heater is not designed to last.

This heater has 4 flaws - 1: it's very loud. It sounds like a power tool 2: switch is very hard to turn 3: switch is on the side and being hard to turn requires two hands to turn on and off, one for the switch and one to hold the unit. If the switch was on the top, you could operate the switch with just one hand by pushing down hard. And finally 4: It stopped working after 3 months of use.

These arrived bundled in a wad of plastic wrap. They certainly are not sterile (or even clean for that matter)! I expect the products I purchase new to indeed be new, and the way I received these did not give me confidence that these were new.

This is the saddest, most pathetic looking tree I've ever seen. I know, it's a fake tree, but even by fake tree standards, it's pretty sad. Very scrawny, very scraggly branches, and it was only 32 in if you include the base. We ended up buying a real tree to cheer us up.

This cornucopia is very small, smaller than I thought it would be based off the measurements.  I had to return it because it can not even stand upright.  The legs are poorly positioned and it just wobbles, can not sit up straight on its own.  Do not buy this!

Last year I ordered three stockings for the family. This year I ordered one for my new baby. It looked completely different and the font was incorrect. The seller offered to replace it and it was pretty much the exact same incorrect stocking with a different incorrect font. I'm really disappointed.
summary: Really disappointed. Not as pictured, not the same as last year.

reviewText:
More than half of the "ice" decorating the twig branches had fallen off in the packaging.

Even removing the items from the plastic bag and handling with care the ice was falling off.

Either the product is old and the adhesive is failing or insufficient adhesive was used.

It stunk ... literally!! We opened the box and it had the foulest smell you can imagine. Don't know if it was the chemicals used in the manufacturing process or the facility in which it was stored, but it was foul! We opened the box on a bed and had to put the blankets from the bed directly into the wash. That's how badly it stunk. Needless to say, we returned it immediately. We'll keep looking.

I just revived this item and although it is exactly what I wanted, the wheel lock mechanism is broken on one of the wheels and it won't stay on.
It is absolutely of no use to me with one wheel, I will be returning this item ASAP.

I received the multi-pack filters with the Mavea name on the packaging. I'm 100% convinced they can't possibly be genuine Mavea filters. The water tastes pretty bad -- like it hasn't been filtered at all. I've had better tasting water straight from the garden hose! Now I read that they're going out of business. I'm not surprised.

I received Brita Maxtra filters. It does not say on the box it is BPA-free like the Mavea filters do. Since Brita changed its name to Mavea in 2008, I can only assume this is an old and probably expired product. If I receive a timely refund, I will remove this review.
summary: It does not say on the box it is BPA-free like the Mavea filters do

reviewText: I purchased these mavea filters recently and for the past 3 months, I am seeing black particle sediment from the filter settle at the bottom of the mavea jug everyday. Drinking water or tea or any clear liquid has become cumbersome and distasteful. I am disappointed that a mavea filter leaks its filter material into drinking water! Then why is this called a filter? It has been a waste of money if you can't even trust the filter to do its job.
summary: I am disappointed that a mavea filter leaks its filter material into ...

reviewText: Maybe I just got a bad bag, but this stuff does not work at all like all the other yeasts I have used.  In 7 days it brought the specific gravity down from 1.110 to 1.050 or 6.45 ABV.  The stuff in the grocery store would have done just as well.  Thinking about sending it back,  I replaced it with Distiller's yeast and it has been bubbling like crazy for 2 days.

This culture is dreadful.  I make cheese with buttermilk as my starter, but also like to drink buttermilk and this buttermilk is gelatinous, not at all like the buttermilk from a culture I bought from another source.  I'm using it for cheese and that's turning out fine, but I'll go back to my other source once these are all gone.
summary: Gelatinous when made with my goat milk.  Yuck!

reviewText: Terrible Sheets. These shed and shed, you wake up in the morning and you have hundreds of lint balls all over your body. These have been washed several times and they haven't improved at all. I like the way the sheets fits the bed, but they are practically worthless unless you shower or use a lint roller over your entire body when you wake up every morning.

I bought these sheets because I have had good luck with DreamFit sheets in the past. I have owned the Degree 3 sheets, but opted to buy the Degree 1 due to how thin and silky they felt and the fact that I sleep warm.

It didn't take long at all for these sheets to start balling up. I've never owned sheets that have done this. I am very disappointed with these sheets and with DreamFit.

Yes, it was blue plaid. No, it was not the blue plaid in the picture. It was some faded, medium block, grey and plaid configuration that would look more at place in a house belonging to some lumberjack's grandma.

Not that I have anything against Lumberjacks, or their grandmother's, this just isn't what would fit in my house. Call me Old Fashioned, but I expect to get the item unpaid for.

Don't waste money on this brand.  The first one we bought crapped out within 3 weeks.  So we bought another one. Mistake.  That one lasted little over one month.  What a crap brand.  Do NOT buy Biddeford.  I'm sticking with Sunbeam.
summary: Don't water your money on Biddeford.

reviewText: That's all I can say.  It worked one night and was very nice.  No nicer than any other heated blanket I've used - it didn't seem to get especially warm, though.  The next time I plugged it in, I got no lights or response from the controller.  Terrible.  Really, really awful.
summary: This throw literally worked for one evening.

reviewText: This is garbage.  You buy an essential part for a pellet stove and you expect it to last at least a whole heating season, but this one won't.  I go through two a year, and always have to have a spare on hand.  Fortunately, they're very easy to replace.  But $70 a year in ignitors is more than I expected to pay when I decided to get a pellet stove.

This stuff is so watered down that you have to put it next to your nose to be able to smell any cedar. I tried spraying it on an old cedar chest that I have and there wasn't any smell at all and then I tried spraying it on my finger and held it to my nose and then I had a little bit of smell. Not worth anything.

These are not the same stakes that come with the garden edging kit (EasyFlex 3000-100C No Dig Edging Kit, 100-Feet) even though it says "Frequently Bought Together".  They are not the same size diameter so you must enlarge the hole to 1/2" Diameter so they don't get stuck.  They bend very easily which is what will happen if you do not enlarge the hole.
summary: NOT INTENDED TO USE WITH THE EDGING KIT!

reviewText: Bought in gold, spring does not re-expand when compressed. I've had to bang it on a hard surface to get it to re-expand, which is very frustrating when trying to get it seated in the wall mount. Will try a different color to see if the gold coating has anything to do with it.
summary: Bought in gold, spring does not re-expand when compressed ...

reviewText:
Is it supposed to have a straw?  I didn't think about it until I noticed that it would consume only half of the bottle.  I finished the job turning the bottle upside down but I'm quite unhappy with this because I am not quite sure how well the job was done.
I feel stupid for not having noticed the missing straw but I guess I just assumed it was OK.
summary: I feel stupid for not having noticed the missing straw but I ...
