reviewText: It got about half way unraveled and was stuck. Disappointing is not a good description of how this thing is half way on. I'm angry and want to throw the entire shovel away and forget I was ever dumb enough to buy this.
summary: Disappointing is not a good description of how this thing is half way on

reviewText: The battery on this is terrible- maybe because we kept it plugged in all the time but we wanted it to be ready to use. They did send us a new one the first year we had it but now the battery doesnt work at all and I haven't been able to get ahold of them to send us a new one again. The battery is completely not working 2 years later but has always only worked for a few seconds before dying.
summary: The battery on this is terrible- maybe because we kept ...

reviewText: Terrible item, I have tried many times to charge it but it just doesn't charge therefore doesn't work. Total waste of my money. I would not even give it a star since it doesn't do what it is supposed to do. Shame on the seller.
summary: Terrible item, I have tried many times to charge ...

reviewText: It has great sucking power but it scares the crap out of me every time I turn it on.  I'm scared.  The motor is so loud and so high pitched...  I hate it.  I really truly hate it.  I only use it as an unavoidable last resort...
summary: It has great sucking power but it scares the crap out of ...

reviewText: Piece of Crap. I wish I never bought it. It's has an ugly design, the charging stand isn't well thought out, and the small opening doesn't pick anything up. The only thing it has going for it is the battery.
summary: Piece of Crap. I wish I never bought it

reviewText: Bought this in June 2015.  First off it was so loud I felt like we were going to have ear damage!  It seemed to work well, but I vacuumed up a bunch of small shreds of paper that had come out of a paper shredder.  Somehow the paper seems to have been sucked up into the motor.  Hasn't worked since.  $60 down the drain!!!

Got it and charged it fully. First time the battery lasted for 1 minute, second time for 30 seconds, and third time for 10 seconds. It is useless.
There is something very wrong with the battery of this device. I am exchanging it and see if this happens again.
summary: It is useless. There is something very wrong with the battery ...

reviewText:
Charger is strange.  Vacuum stands upright (very phallic) during charging.
****UPDATED*****  I've had this for a year now.  This is a terrible vacuum.  Filter clogs within a few minutes.  Poor suction.  Charge doesn't last long.  Very disappointing for a B&D product.

This Black and Decker dustbuster stopped working properly after only five weeks of use. It would not hold a charge for more than just a couple of minutes even though it was fully charged. I am very disappointed! And, of course, since it's been just over 30 days, Amazon won't take it back! I will have to try to contact Black and Decker to see if they'll honor the warranty - major hassle!

This isn't worth the space it takes up.  I just now threw it in the trash.  It won't even pick up cobwebs.  Don't waste your money like I did.  Plus you can read by the light on the charger, it is that bright.  It might function better as a night light than a vacuum.
summary: Don't waste your money like I did

reviewText: I just can't believe how useless this thing is.  I'm a little perplexed because I could swear it worked fine the first couple of times I used it, and then I tried to pick up some tiny bits of cat kibble and it couldn't even suck that up.  It can pick up DUST but that's about it.  It has no power and is pointless for the purpose I bought it for, which is to clean up after my messy cats.
summary: I just can't believe how useless this thing is

reviewText: This vacuum is HORRIBLE... I should have returned it long ago but it's too late now.  I got it to vacuum my car. It is so weak it doesn't pick up anything except a little bit of dust or dirt and that is only if it is at the perfect angle.  I can hold it down on anything else and it does NOT pick it up.  It is totally pointless to even try to clean with it, the worst tool I have ever purchased.

Terrible suction went from bad to worse after a few weeks use. After spending far too much time attempting to troubleshoot the poor suction, I finally threw in the towel when my girlfriend was unable to vacuum up a small spider. This piece of junk went straight into the trash. You get what you pay for, I guess.

This vacuum is garbage. It has absolutely no suction half the time and often spills dirt all over the floor. We have had problems with this vacuum from the day that we bought it and will never buy Black and Decker products again.
summary: This vacuum is garbage. It has absolutely no suction half the time ...

reviewText: I am very disappointed in this product.  I don't even use it.  It does not suck up good at all.  I read reviews before and everyone talked about how great this product was.  Not for me.  I am going to look for another one somewhere else.  Maybe a different brand.  I was looking forward to this picking up little things around the house and car.
summary: I am very disappointed in this product

reviewText: This item worked just long enough to be out of warranty and now no longer has any suction at all!  It worked great for the first six months but now it's got no suction whatsoever.  Don't waste your money on this dustbuster.
summary: It worked great for the first six months but now it's got ...

reviewText:
At first I noticed that I didn't receive the crevice tool, which was okay because I probably wouldn't have used it. But then I charged the battery, it blinked, it looked fine. The vacuum didn't even turn on once it stopped blinking to notify me that it was fully charged. The battery seemed to work fine, but the actual mechanical components were just rubbish.

So I got a Defective mechanical issue and no crevice tool...what are the odds.
summary: Battery fine, Mechanical Issue(not vacuuming at all) and no Crevice tool

reviewText: I bought this item because it was so well-reviewed and I cannot for the life of me understand why.  The filter design makes this hand-vac very hard to clean well.  I would much prefer a disposable insert that I can throw away.  I use it in the kitchen and mold winds up growing in it because I can't clean it out well enough.  Also the nozzle does not stay on the unit well and keeps falling off, which means that the contents of the hand-vac spill out (gross). I wish I could return it!

You should never ever purchase this.  Ever.  It is the worst piece of junk I have ever purchased.  Ever.  It does not work.  Nothing.  Clean the filter so it works better?  Nope.  Do not waste your money like I did.  I cannot return it.  Too late because I took too long to try it out.  Do yourself a favor and take that $60 and do something with it that will make you happy.  Like maybe getting some ice cream.  Or a vacuum that might actually pick something up.
summary: Run!  Run and get something else!  Hurry!  What are you waiting for?

reviewText: The rechargeable battery in this model only lasted about 3 months. There are a lot of bad reviews about this model and the battery problem. The replacement battery, which is also questionable, costs almost the same as the total unit.

This is like somebody played a bad joke on me by writing all these positive reviews.  This vacuum fully charged won't pick up anything!  I have an earlier model which has lost suction after 4 years so I replaced it with this--luckily I hadn't thrown the old one away because it still works three times better than this one.  Maybe I just got a dud but it's absolutely useless--almost no suction at all.

Don't waste your money. I used three or four times before the battery stopped holding a charge. When I turn it on now the motor begins to slow down within a few seconds. Literally a few seconds. Piece of junk.

This DustBuster worked very well between September, when I purchased it, and January. Now, nothing. Won't work. It's fully charged and absolutely nothing happens when you turn it on. Do not buy this unless you want to waste $59.99.

The suction on this item is quite poor, and I cannot do anything productive with it.  I really just wanted to clean the car and do some light household cleaning; however, it cannot seem to do either.  Also, as other people have mentioned, the nozzle is quite annoying.  Do not buy this item.

This dust buster was a replacement for the same model which suddenly stopped working for no apparent reason. The original one lasted for about a year or two.  This one lasted only 4 months.  Unfortunately, it's been too long to get a refund through Amazon.  Don't get me wrong, when it worked, it was awesome!  But with this kind of track record, I can't afford to take a chance and buy yet another one and have it die on me.

We have dozens of different species of birds that come to our feeder every day, especially finches. However, after hanging this out for several weeks, we haven't seen one bird come near it. This is nothing more than an empty black mesh net.

I bought this Damp Rid fresh scent, and while it took only 30 minutes to stink up the room, it's taking over 24 hours to get rid of the horrible smell!  The smell was so strong I could actually taste it.  I returned the second bag for one with charcoal, which will hopefully help rid the Damp Rid 'fresh' scent.  Don't waste your money.

After using the steamer for about 6 months we discovered that the condensed steamed water is leaking inside the steamer causing it to malfunction.  We use this device every day for our baby and having it malfunction after such a short time was a major disappointment.  A device like this should be sealed tight.
summary: Malfunction after a few months of usage

reviewText: I got this as a baby gift. I didn't like the fit of the lid. I used it anyway and it only lasted for a few uses. Water leaked every time. And then the lid started breaking off into small pieces after using it to sterilize a few bottle parts. I never even got to use it for food.

This product is poorly constructed and barely functions. We tried to use this clapboard for a short film, and within hours the clapboard had broken. The top of the clapboard detached from the lower half. All of the metal dowels that fasten the top of the board to the bottom literally fell out. Stay away from this product if you are looking for a slate that will actually function.

When I opened the package the device was already working and the light was beeping. Who knows how long was it working because after only 24 hours the battery is dead and it doesn't work. I don't even know if it's a battery or not.
summary: One day and it's already dead

reviewText: Please do yourself a favor and do not buy these headphones. Most of all of the reviews are from people who didn't have to pay anything and got their stuff free. I paid for mine and it is terrible. My headphones lose connection when my phone is in my shorts or more than 4 feet away. Do yourself a favor and stay away from these headphones. There are better ones for the same price out there. DO NOT BUY!
summary: I paid for mine and it is terrible. My headphones lose connection when my phone is ...

reviewText: If I could give this 0 stars, I would. When it came, all the chocolate pieces had fallen to the bottom. I ended up opening it from the bottom, putting all the pieces back, and then trying to glue the cardboard to the inner tray so they would stay put. It didn't work. It was way more hassle than it was worth. Total waste of money.

Ordered it for our 4 year old grandson who lives in another state.  It arrived on time and the first two days of the calendar seemed fine but then the next day the chocolates were whitish and crumbled and they opened a few more and some candies were missing and the candies were all crumbled.  Our grandson was so disappointed, we were so disappointed with the quality of this product.  We were given a refund.  Would not order this again!
summary: It arrived on time and the first two days of the calendar seemed fine but then the next day the chocolates were whitish ...

reviewText: Even though the calendar was encased in plastic, many of the windows were partly open. I could see chocolate shavings through the plastic. This was supposed to be a gift for my grandmother in the nursing home, so I ended up opening it to see what the deal was, knowing it wouldn't work as a gift now! The chocolate had fallen through the different compartments and there were three pieces in one 'door'. A piece of chocolate dropped out of a 'door' as I opened the outer plastic. I'm really disappointed.

Lasted less than six months. The fan itself still works, but it developed a crack in the plastic at the base. I thought it would be OK but it has gotten worse and worse (maybe due to the vibration of the fan going?) and now has cracked all the way through on both sides. Frustrating. If you notice a small crack, get ready. The whole base will be broken soon.

This product is very poorly made. The concept is good but the craftsmanship is very poor. We had to have the door replaced 3 times because of the imperfections in it, and still my husband had to do a lot of repairs to it. The seller was accommodating in trying to get us a good door, but the quality is just downright poor.

The tub is formed from the thinnest plastic imaginable and the edges around the top are sharp from being cut instead of formed.  It was not worth the $4.50 I paid for it.  This tub is really not good for anything.

This is a great product, and I would love to buy one, if only I could buy one which works.  The first one I got never worked at all, it was dead on arrival.  This one worked for a few days, and then it failed.  I give up.  I'll go back to sticking my finger in the soil once in a while to see if it's gotten too dry.
summary: Would be great if it worked

reviewText: This thread is extremely weak.  I would not want to use it for any kind of project that I want to last.  It breaks extremely easily.  I might be able to use it for basting quilts, but even then it does not have much strength.  I would not recommend this product, especially for people making heirloom products they want to last for generations to come.

I was very disappointed with this product. I'm pretty certain that all I got in the tiny package that came was pieces of a broken watch. Most of the pieces are too small even for jewelry making, and many of the larger parts are bent. It's not worth sending back, but I discourage you from ordering this product. I had to buy another product, as this was just unacceptabe. You'd be better off buying a cheap watch and dissembling it yourself.

This thermometer floated horizontal on top of the water and not in the water. Since the thermometer floated on top of the water, the temperature readings for the water were incorrect and it also allowed  the thermometer to float right into the skimmer. I quickly returned it and got a refund.  Now to find something that works.
summary: Floats On Top Of The Water

reviewText: Had to give it one star, because there is no way to give a zero.  This thermometer is supposed to float vertical in the pool, but floats horizontal on top, rendering it totally worthless and waste of money.  No matter how I tried to hold it underwater to get all of the air out to make it float vertically, it kept floating horizontally and getting sucked into the skimmer.  It's a piece of junk and a wast of $10.00.
summary: rendering it totally worthless and waste of money

reviewText: This was a complete waste of time and  money. The temperature readings were way off. It was more than just that the scale was not adjusted properly, because the readings didn't track the scale even if it had been in the correct position.

They will keep billing you monthly, even if you weren't aware that you'd signed up, didn't want to sign up, never in a million years would sign up, to buy this every month.  One shipment and you know it's bogus.  Read the fine print, or better yet, don't shop with them at all!!!
summary: This is a scam.  Avoid at all costs.  The product is junk, plus, they hide the fact that you're signing up for monthly purchases

reviewText: I strongly recommend you read reviews and search the internet for reviews of this company before buying. This product did not work for me. I had to cancel my Visa card to keep them from continuing to bill my account even after canceling my contract by phone and via email. I am disputing a charge on my account now. The amount is double what it should have been.

I agree it doesn't work and don't buy the product, you'll waste your money on this item. I bought direct from the company, I didn't buy but one box of the product. I was just seeing if it would work and it didn't. I was just out a few bucks, so I'm glad I didn't buy a lot of these gadgets. But now a month later they charged me a extra 37.87 and I didn't even buy any more of this garbage they're selling. So now I have to deal with this now. Don't buy this product.
summary: Agree with the rest, it doesn't work.

reviewText: Save your money. I bought this because I couldn't find the brand I'd previously had which lasted TWO YEARS. Installation was simple but the magnet at the bottom fell off within the first week. Since then another magnet has fallen off & the screen is fraying where the magnets come together so it feels like you are walking through spider webs every time you go in or out. We've had it four weeks now.

I've had these towels since Feb. 2015. Each time I wash them they shed blue dye. I use cold water washes. I am extremely dissatisfied with them. I gradually made them into rags, and I am now throwing them out instead of washing them.
summary: dye bleeds out even after a year

reviewText: This is very cute. But, once we plugged it in, it only stayed lit for 2 days. Now, it's past the return policy and we are stuck with a Yoda that does not light up. We checked all of the lights and the fuse. It simply appears to be defective.

Well I bought this to replace our 7 year old Dyson, because it is on its last legs, but it doesn't work as well as the old one!  We went back to using the older Dyson, as this one would not pick up cat hair from the carpet.  Very disappointed.  Not sure if this is a bad model?  Or that it isn't working properly.  Either way, it doesn't work.
summary: Not sure if this is still broken?

reviewerName: I buy too much on Amazon
reviewText: This did not work for us.  Besides myself and my wife, we had friends look at it to see if we were doing something wrong.  We've purchased multiple metal detectors, and you get what you pay for (we purchased this one for $18).
summary: This did not work for us. Besides myself and ...

reviewText: Does not resemble any teak wood I have seen before.  I can't use it in the shower as it puts pressure on the floor too close to the drain. Disappointed but that is partly my fault for not knowing how it would fit. Do not think it is a good choice for showers with a fiberglass floor.

I bought the Commercial Mat, and when I bought the smaller Professional Mat, I thought I was getting another wonderful product. Disappointed. The Professional Mat is flimsy and moves whenever you step on it; the Commercial Mat is solid, feels good, looks good and stays in place. The Commercial Mat is a quality item, the Professional Mat is crap. Bad purchase.

I ordered these needles because of the price.  Service was good and prompt,  but it turned out to be a waste of $20. They are so poorly made,  the bamboo feels different than other bamboo needles  on the market. I was giving these needles a try but found that the stoppers fall off before you can even knit a couple of rows.  It's a total waste of money.
summary: Inexpensive but turns out to be very expensive because:

reviewText: A lot smaller than what I expected. Pillow is flimsy and could have been more stuffed. I feel like I could have made this on my own. It feels more like cuddling with a little boy instead of a man haha!

This is a total disaster and dysfunctional spout and was not thought out at all.  This spout is on a Walmart 5 gallon gas can I purchased last month.  I have spilled enough gas to buy a well designed can and spout.
summary: A yuppie design for an outdoor product

reviewText: This spout has got to be one of the worst designed products I've ever had.  Gas goes everywhere when refueling.  The spout has to rest on the rim of the tank lid, but the spout is too weak to support the 5 gallon tank so it bends.  Seriously, do not buy this.

If you're looking for a dress, choose another selection. The product is much shorter than pictured. Also, the material appears to be a cotton blend, but it looks and feels 100% polyester. If I wear it, I'll wear it with some leggings or shorts I suppose.

Why does everyone assume the toilet seat should be down and men are just "forgetting" to put it down? How about the seat should be up and women keep forgetting to put it up? There's no real danger of falling in if you have half a brain and just look before you sit down. For God's sake, are women just too lazy to do anything for themselves and can only whine when people don't cater to their every need? If you want the seat down and it's up, be a grown up and just put the seat down yourself.
summary: Dear men: leave the seat up if you want to. Women can take care of themselves without our help.

reviewText: When I opened the box, there was black dust everywhere. I understand that this pillow is stuffed with a natural material that sheds a little. Given that, one would expect the designers to come up with a pillowcase that could contain the dust if they were unable to clean the buckwheat hulls sufficiently to get rid of the dust. No such luck. The pillow, the dusty black pillow case, and all the dust inside the box got shipped right back to Amazon.

I am a amateurs with embroidery, if I thought this would really help me, I would buy it. I just don't think I could use it with no instructions, I can't afford to buy something that doesn't work and then get dinged again when you TRY to send it back. It's like GIVING THEM MY MONEY! AMZON SHOULD BE ASHAMED!
summary: It's like GIVING THEM MY MONEY

reviewText: This tool does not compare to the original Dyson product. The tool is much shorter, and the bristles are too short. The crevice tool opening is much wider. Would definitely purchase the Dyson tool the next time even though the Dyson upholstery and crevice tool is way overpriced.

when I received this two months ago it worked fine. It would heat up nicely but now it barely warms up. This is either defective or it's just a bad product. I thought that Sunbeam was a reliable manufacturer. Now I'm not so sure. Don't waste your money. Try another brand.
summary: when I received this two months ago it worked fine. It would heat up nicely but now it ...

reviewText: This is a very nice, plush blanket. However!!! One time it would not shut off with the remote, I had to unplug it. I no longer wanted to keep it as I didn't know if the problem was in the remote or the wiring.

I bought this as a Christmas gift for my mother, but after an unusually warm winter, when she finally got it out to use it, she only got 3-4 uses out of it before a section of it stopped heating. I wouldn't recommend this.
summary: Died after only a few uses

reviewText:
Original Review: I wish it were a little larger, but I knew the size when I bought it. I love this blanket.

Update: It stopped working after less than three months, and it's not like I was using it every day in California in the summer. I loved it while it lasted, but that wasn't long enough to justify the cost.

There is an obvious design issue with this product in that the hook-up for the cord plug-in is in the middle of the item.  If you put it at the bottom, you can't reach the controls.  If you put it at the top, you have the controls poking you constantly.  Additionally, it barely heats up and there is no real difference in heat between the low, medium or high settings.

We've had this product for over a month and has worked great until last night. Last night my wife was using it, when she smelled something burning. She started to look around her and noticed the thermostat dial had begun to melt and was burning. Sunbeam needs to be aware of this fire hazard as well as all of you who are considering purchasing this product.

I purchase this item with the past 4 months and it no longer works.  It turns itself off frequently.  Now it has stopped working.  When I turn it on the setting light flashes.  When I disconnect it and then reconnects the setting light just flashes.

This product did not help me at all...I think the problem is , that I do not have enough water pressure....After this experience,  I did a lot of research...I have had problems with peeling hard boil eggs all my life...nothing really ever work...Until....A gentleman suggested using a tablespoon of baking soda, along with eggs, and enough cold water to cover...and so forth and so on...This does really work....

Save your money!  If you live in Appalachia, and are lucky enough to have indoor plumbing, you may have the type of plumbing required to make this worthless piece of equipment work.  If you live in the real world, and have an aerator on you faucet, it won't!  I'm sure this piece was made in China for the Chinese to shed the shell from the egg, but lets face it, what else have they got to do all day????

Another one I wish I could give 0 stars. I tried to get it to work but it just did not.
Someone told me to try hair spray the next day (I used one called Big Sexy Hair) and that finally did the trick. Do not waste your money on this.

I am sorry to say this but it is a really bad product. I tried to use the Air Mattress Repair kit to patch a very small hole on my air mattress and it doesn't really work. The adhesive is not strong at all, very easy to peel of and it doesn't stick very well and the plastic patch curls up whenever I apply the adhesive on it and it wouldn't even stay on the plastic surface.
summary: ... sorry to say this but it is a really bad product. I tried to use the Air Mattress ...

reviewText: Dont be fooled.  Even though it says you can brew 2 gallons of beer if you order this, you cannot.  It does NOT come with booster.  So, if you buy this REFILL kit, and attempt to brew beer for the second time with your MR Beer brewing system, and it gets to the part about the booster, you are probably gonna be upset.  This kit does NOT contain booster.  A vital part of the brewing process.  Now, I get to order booster, AND more sanitizer, so I can brew some other time.

Incredibly sticky, you're always having to peel them apart. One came melted together on the inside and was unusable. They're also very bulky, and I couldn't imagine putting more than two on a keychain.

They were cute at first and did exactly what they were suppose to do. And then they all started to tear and fall apart. I guess they weren't made to withstand being inside pockets for that long which is kind of where I think most people keep their keys. If you do buy these, just be aware that the rubber is very soft and if you put these on consecutive keys they stick to each other and pull on each other.
summary: They were cute at first and did exactly what they ...

reviewText: The description says latex, but it has an inch or so of memory foam. I do not like memory foam. I would not have bought it if it had been described properly. I can hardly lift it, and the box was destroyed in shipping, so I cannot return. Very disappointed.
summary: Not all latex! Half memory foam!

reviewText: While it is cute as heck, it does not work well. The holes didn't allow water to get into it and the tea was practically dry for a long long time. Eventually after a long while it got wet. Cleanup is difficult since the tea swells and gets really packed into it.

Repugnant. Hey, Fred and Friends, maybe in a hundred years you could make a Twin Towers infuser that sinks below the surface to give the appearance of the towers collapsing! Since almost twice as many people died as on the Titanic, that makes it almost twice as hilarious, right?

Made of all rubbery plastic. The handle of sword falls off easily and the opening to put tea in is so small it makes it difficult to put tea in. If it would have cost more, I would've sent it back but it is not worth my time.
summary: The handle of sword falls off easily and the opening to put tea in is so ...

reviewText: When I saw the reviews for this, it seemed that reviews for many different designs were clumped together. It was very cheap, so I decided to take a chance. The one I bought looks like a lemon slice. It is completely useless as a tea infuser. The silicone is somehow meant to hold together by small grooves in the side of the "lemon peel". It doesn't hold together at all! Useless product.

The stem broke after three uses. I had just steeped some tea and was trying to get the infuser part open(it was stuck). The stem pulled out from the bottom of the infuser. It's cute, but not worth that much money when so cheaply made.

I was given this as a gift.  It's really cute, but I found it very difficult to get the tea leaves out once it was brewed.  It also is not shaped well to stay in the water. Try the Manatea tea infuser.  Equally cute and it works well.

i thought this item would work , but i was fooled!  it does not move at all. i'm being to think the solar cell is fake.  it's a shoddy piece of equipment. do not buy this item , you will not be happy at all with it.  a waste of time and money.

Real disappointed with this product.  I thought it would be made of some kind of flexible tupperware type material, but it's not, it's made of a thin, brittle material that shatters when stepped on.  I had them next to my door (naturally, because it's a shoe tray), and stepped on one of the edges and the part that I stepped on shattered into a bunch of pieces.  Terrible design, in my opinion, and an absolute waste of $16.
summary: Brittle material, will shatter if stepped on

reviewText: If I were designing a non slip mat, I would make the bottom of the mat stickier (to keep the mat in place on my dash) and the top side just a little bit less sticky (so I can take my items off of the mat)... but these people decided to do the opposite. I put this mat on my dash and on the very first turn I made, my cell phone goes flying while still attached to the mat and ends up knocking over my coffee cup, spilling coffee on my phone and making my day suck a little bit more than it needed to. FAIL
summary: Its hard to hate a piece of plastic, but I do

reviewText: Please do not waste your money.  There is nothing luxurious about these sheets.  They have very shallow pockets and will not stay on the mattress.  They are so thin it feels like I could tear them accidently just getting into bed.  I have already bought another set and gotten rid of these.

They have not stayed inflated. I thought maybe some people just got a few from a bad batch or something, but I had the same problem. I bought two. One lasted maybe a month before it was completely deflated and the other one is still floating but it's only half way inflated. I'm just hoping it lasts just long enough until I am ready to open my pool or else I'm going to be opening it up in March instead of May like I normally do.

Very well advertised, we thought this was what we needed. Not only is it made of cheap plastic, which can barely hold a decent cutlery set, but our knives are too long for it and can't fit in. I don't have the courage to return this. Just don't buy it!

I saw the previews online and in the Halloween store and has really high hopes for this DVD. And $40 seemed pretty steep but I figured if the previews looked that good the actual DVD should be worth it. Well I was COMPLETELY dissatisfied with the DVD. It only had 3-4 skits on it and then repeated..I liked the skits but for $40 I expected a lot more than just three minutes worth of footage. I can see it being worth $10-$15 but no way is it worth $40!
summary: Complete rip off for the money

reviewText:
UPDATE - The new ones leak as well. Returning for another brand.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

We bought two of these and both have the same non-closing lid.  It doesn't snap shut, it just rests barely touching the opening, plus the hinge seems really flimsy.  Exchanging for another two to see if it's a one off.  Hopefully the new ones will close.  If not I'll post an update.

These sheets were just delivered to me this morning and are not at all what I was expecting.  One star rating only because they were packed well in a zip up clear plastic bag. Did not take them out of this bag because it would be a problem getting them back in. I can't say that I even consider this fleece. I will be returning these sheets. One look was all I needed to know that I was not satisfied with this.
summary: Not worth the money. Very poor "fleece"

reviewText: I was so excited to get these, but I've tried them on a couple of rulers and hate them. At the very beginning, the fabric sort of bunches up as the ruler tries to 'grab' it, and the cut is not smooth. After the first half inch, it's fine, but that's not the intent. I tried three different sized rotary cutters, and the same result. Also, the small (28mm) cutter doesn't work because with the grip strip on the ruler it is too thick.

Purchased this blanket a couple of months ago.  It never did heat up all that well, and it recently quit working completely.  I contacted Sunbeam (Jarden) customer service and was told to ship the blanket back to them at my expense.  My experience with customer service was cold and impersonal.  Essentially, I'm paying more money for a blanket because it doesn't work...not cool.

I would not recommend this product.  I'm giving it one start because it's still a blanket, just not heated.

Stand does not fit the frother. It's not even close.  I have an older one at work and brand new one I bought at the same time as this order and it does not fit either. The hole is about 2mm too small for the base of the frother.
summary: Stand does not fit the frother. It's not even ...

reviewText: WAS VERY NICE BUT PACKAGE VERY POORLY SO WHEN I RECEVIED IT WAS ALL BROKE UP AND DAMAGE PASSED THE POINT OF REPAIR. VERY UNHAPPY WITH AMAZON AT THIS POINT. THIS WAS A GIFT FOR A CO-WORK THAT LEAVING US NOW I HAVE NOTHING TO GIVE. REALLY THINKING ABOUT NEVER USING AMAZON AGAIN...

I did not like these hair ties.  I tried to use them one time and haven't tried again since.  They did not even stretch enough to make it around the hair one time!  I finally tried to force it around a small amount of hair and the rubber bands just kept snapping.  I did not get any use out of them.  My daughter can't even use them on her barbie's hair.
summary: I would not purchase these again.

reviewText: The wire on these brushes (the part between the brush head and the handle) is so flimsy that it just buckles when I push the brush into a bottle.  It is almost completely ineffective at cleaning the inside of a bottle.  Mine are going in the trash.

After a few months, it overheated. I had gone into another room but my dog alerted me to the burning smell. I quickly turned it off, let it cool down, then, turned it back on. It had stopped working. Luckily, it didn't start a fire.

Somehow quite a few people have had positive experience with these, or at least there are quite a few positive reviews. Interesting. But anyway, these things don't hold my boots. All I have to do is barely touch an item on the same rod as these, and they fall off. I do have a pair of short canvas-like boots that seem to work just fine, but the majority of my boots are leather or suede and these will not hold them.
summary: Way too loose or something - boots are constantly falling off the hanger.

reviewText: This product is not worth the purchase.  The hanger cannot support the weight of even the lightest boot.  I have no idea why this is even on the market or how this company can still be in business.  Do not waste your money.
summary: Not strong enough to hold the boot up

reviewText: This thing is awful compared to the older model. There is a small rubber piece on the top that opens and closes to let the fluid out as you drink. Somehow it isn't forming a seal and the bottle now leaks. I wash it in the top rack of my dishwasher (same as the old model) and this started happening within a month of purchase. I will say that the rubber piece feels more flimsy than the older version. Very disappointed! This used to be my favorite water bottle.

I loved this water bottle when I first got it. However, after only a couple weeks of using it, I dropped the lid on the floor by accident. The parts all popped out and I haven't been able to put it back together again.

I purchased this after reading these flattering reviews and it appears that I received a defective bottle.  I wish I could upload a video of the bottle leaking when held upside-down.  Needless to say, I'm disappointed.  I received it last night and was excited to finally have a leakproof water bottle today.  Huge let-down.  I will try to find a way to send my video to Ignite USA.

this is a rigid water bottle.

it is annoying to use.  you have to push in a button at the top to open the spout.  as water warms, pressure builds and it spits.

this water bottle is not durable, and it is too big to easily hold and carry.

it slipped from my hands and fell to the floor after having it for two weeks and the top part of the cap cracked right off.

i have not been able to find a replacement cap, and now my contigo is a cap-less plastic cup.

I think the subject line says it all. The puppy version of these slippers, which is what I ordered, sells for $19.99. The unicorn version of these slippers which is NOT what I wanted, but received anyway, sells for only $9.99. So, not only did I receive the WRONG slipper, but I was overcharged by double!
summary: Paid $19.99 for PUPPY slippers, was shipped Unicorn slippers which sell for only $9.99

reviewText: Had problems from the beginning. Only 4 of the 10 lights worked consistently. They were in full sun during the day so charging shouldn't have been a problem. I tried turning them off and back on, and they would light up for only a few seconds, and go dark again. I returned them after giving them a 2-week trial period.

I bought this as a christmas present. The first time it came, I received 4 of the patterned flower pots, and 1 plain one. I returned it for a replacement and again received 4 patterned flower pots and 1 plain one. Well...now I have no time to return it again before christmas. Apparently, this is what you will get if you order this.

This is my first review of any kind as I generally take the negative ones with a grain of salt. I have had shower mirrors before. This one has little or no magnification so it is very hard to see up close. The water drops that adhere to it add to the confusion.

This is a complete waste of money and plastic.  I was hoping it would be useful for bottle brushes, but I never got that far.  The suction cups kept falling out of the slots.  They wouldn't stick to the walls of the sink at all.  The top stabilizer piece is just a piece of plastic -- I expected a foam backing to grip the sink.  Nope.

Totally useless.

Would've been great if the thing would have stayed suctioned up. But it never did. Tried several times. It would stick to my dishwasher door ( lot of good that did) but never to my stainless steel sink. Too bad.

I had hoped it would work well for me, but it will not stick to the side of my sink even when it's empty.  I also found the rod for my dishcloth to be inadequate as it is too close to the body of the caddy and not enough room to slip the cloth through.  I'm looking for something else.

For the price I did expect the exterior to be plastic (the small uneven ridges on some of the edges make it seem like it was cut out of a mold), but I didn't expect the glass to be chipped in one of the corners. The outer uneven ridges are not a deal breaker, being that they aren't very noticeable, but the broken glass has me returning it.

As soon as I opened up the first one (from the outer plastic) I could see that the ingredients were leaking even before I opened the inner lid and it had already soaked up moisture as it dripped all over the place.  I then went to open the inner lid on the 2nd one and part of the outer casing was completely cracked and the ingredients were spilling out, it was a mess and not even usable.  What a disappointment and a waste of money!
summary: What a disappointment and a waste of money

reviewText: I bought this and gave it as a gift.  It leaked.  When I tried to return it, I was 2 days shy of the return period.  Ridiculous considering I had to get the mug back from the recipient in order to return it.  So now I'm stuck with a useless mug that I can't return.

Poor design. The dirty water tank is held on the bottom gasket only by it's weight, so it doesn't get a good seal on the gasket.  As a result, the dirty water pools on the bottom and pours, and I do mean pours, out of the screw holes. Don't buy it.
summary: Poor design. The dirty water tank is held on ...

reviewText: I'm very disappointed with my purchase.  I bought these sheets back in February and they already have a hole in them.  The fabric is pretty flimsy.  I've actually only had them on the bed only a few times.  For something so expensive, you'd think they would last longer.  My advise is to not spend the money.

I need this product to measure a water tank on a trailer. Because of the movement of the trailer it had to be reset over and over. It is very confusing to set up and I had to cut a hole in my water tank for it to work. I would not suggest this product to anyone.
summary: I need this product to measure a water tank on ...

reviewText: I guess i was expecting something different. I didn't think this was going to be like a white colored pencil. This actually leaves white marks on top of the stones which just make them look cloudy and dirty.  I wasn't expecting that. If that's what it's supposed to do then it's fine but i don't like my stones looking dirty.
summary: I didn't think this was going to be like a white colored pencil

reviewText: It is IMPOSSIBLE to get a shirt in this frame without it being HORRIBLY wrinkled. It is cheap, flimsy plastic and not at all worth $40 frikkin' dollars. Buy something else. Buy anything else. THIS IS TOTAL GARBAGE. Amazon should be ashamed. Sent it back for a full refund within an hour of opening the box. TRASH, TRASH, TRASH.
summary: TOTAL GARBAGE. BUY ANYTHING ELSE BUT NOT THIS JUNK.

reviewText: This Umbra T-Shirt Display Frame was a gift and I'm very disappointed with it since I could not get the T-Shirt to lie flat without any wrinkles.  I now see others with the same complaint.  In my attempt to return the item for a refund, I'm advised that it must be returned in the original manufacturer's packaging.  No sense in returning it for a possible 50% refund as well as paying for the shipping.  Too high-priced for what you get.  Steer clear.
summary: ... T-Shirt Display Frame was a gift and I'm very disappointed with it since I could not get the T-Shirt ...

reviewText: I finally had a chance to wash the sheets and put them on the bed and they had 2 large snags.  I am 2 days out of the return window unfortunately so I am stuck with poorly made sheets so I want to make sure no one else has to suffer the same consequences from these poorly made sheets.  I guess you get what you pay for :-(

One of these already stopped working after 4 months of light use so I had to replace it once again. I've just about had enough of this cheap maverick crap. Do yourself a big favor and just spend the money on the thermoworks thermometers that use the heavy duty thermocouples. That's what I'm gonna ask Santa for this year.

I bought two bushes in 2015.  They have grown well, but neither bloomed, and neither (of course) produced any fruit.  I will give them one more season, then get rid of them.  Not at all pleased, and not sure if what I got was really what was described.
summary: Not at all pleased, and not sure if what I got was ...

reviewText: I thought this would be great for traveling, but it's too large to put in the suitcase and it's quite obvious what it is, so I don't want to be seen hauling it in somewhere with my luggage. Mine is now tucked under my bed and used as storage for bras I don't wear every day. Disappointed in this product, but at least I found a use for it.

I was so disappointed in this jewelry stand. It is very small and cheaply made. The price is way too high. It is too small for necklaces and does not look like the picture. This is something you may be able to find in the dollar store.

Tried to use it yesterday. The ball refused to close/click together -- I finally settled with the half closed ball and put it into a washing bag for my laundry. My bra came out not in great shape, but better than if I just put it directly in the washer. The quality of the balls is just horrible and I'm not sure they will last more than a few washes. The bottom line is, if you can't find any other bra saver to buy, choose this one. As for me, I'm going to start looking for a different bra saver.

I wanted to buy OEM Rancilio burrs. When they arrived they were missing the Rancilio logo which ALL Rancilio burrs have. So I sent them back. They weighed 11 gems less than my OEM burrs so maybe the metal is lighter.

I received this item and immediately notice that I could look through the material.  I then washed them and was appalled by the result.  The edges of the flat sheet and pillowcases were  wrinkled and did not flatten out.  The pillowcases were 2/3 the size of normal pillowcases.  Overall a disappointingly shoddy product.

I paid $9.50 for one bucket. The picture made it seem as if it came with several buckets and shovels. Even if it didn't come with the amount of buckets pictured, it still should not have cost me $9.50 for one bucket!!.

Tried to use it with a 1 5/16" pole but it would not fit,  Could not force either bracket onto the 1 5/16" pole.  I took a tape measure to them to make sure it wasn't the pole that was too big and found that the sockets have an inside diameter of 1 1/4".

One of the sockets had a bubble in the chrome finish.  I don't expect it  would be long before it started to flake if I were able to use it.
summary: Only use with 1 1/4" pole.  Despite description, will not take a 1 5/16" diameter rod.

reviewText: I bought this mattress cover to put on my daughter's futon in their playroom. It tore the same day I received it in the mail as I was putting it on the futon. The material is made from a VERY thin plastic. It almost reminds me of the material a cheap shower curtain is made out of. I recommend spending a few more dollars and getting a different mattress cover.
summary: Spend a few more dollars and purchase a different cover!

reviewText: I don't know if this zippered cover was ripped when I opened the package but after it was on the mattress, as I started to zip it, I noticed that the seams were ripped. I had to use duct tape to close the seams.  I am glad that this mattress was going into storage and not being used.  You could not use the mattress pad cover as it was.  It was very cheaply constructed.  As the old adage goes, " you get what you pay for."  I would not recommend this product.

Not what I expected at all.  Not a bright white, which is what I expected.  Fabric looks cheap, not luxurious.  I was looking for a quilt that was bright white, fluffy and rich looking.  This item is none of those things.  Sending back.
summary: Not what I expected at all. Not a bright ...

reviewText: Please don't buy these sheets! At first I was thinking they felt soft when I took them out of the package but the quality is horrible. I just took them out of the dryer after the very first wash and there is a huge snag that ripped all the way down the middle of the flat sheet. If these can't even handle one washing I hate to think what multiple washings would do. I'm calling amazon to return these. I'll be sticking with good quality egyptian cotton from now on.
summary: You get what you pay for...

reviewText: Not worth it. They do not even light up the bottom of the pool. They are sitting on the rail because they serve no purpose. Waste of money, now I feel like I should not buy any of the lights. I was really looking forward to having them for our pool party and they were a dud.

I'm very disappointed with this product.  I was excited about the liners, as the print on the sheets was very lovely.  The faint lavender fragrance is just OK when you initially open the box.  Once I put the liners in my dresser drawers, there is absolutely no fragrance emanating from them whatsoever.  This was a waste of money to purchase.

Quality of these wine glasses was very poor.  One of the glasses had what looked like air bubbles in the bowl, and all the glasses were dirty -- they looked like they had an oily film on them that made the glass look cloudy.  I bought these as a gift, and needless to say, I won't be able to give them with such poor quality.  Returned them.

I used to love these glasses but not anymore. I don't know if I got counterfeit ones or what but I still have three of the ones I bought a couple years ago, and the difference is stark. The new ones are thick rimmed and very lightweight at the same time. I am very upset. They don't even look like crystal glasses. Would not buy again and don't recommend them.

Absolutely useless.  Does nothing, even in bright sunlight.  The much less expensive model I'd been using needed to be replaced each year, but at least it worked for a few months before failing.  This one was an epic fail right out of the box.

This is NOT a "floating fountain" as it is labeled. The instructions that come with it state that it must be submerged under at least 3" of water. There are small suction cups on the bottom, which didn't work on my application. I have tried silicone (lasted 1 day), and super glue (no luck), and now have it wedged under water with rocks. This fountain is not worth the money, in my opinion.

Not really pleased with this.  When opening the package the smell reminded me of a berry flavored Kool-Aid. Okay.  I put this in a small bathroom.
It's been in there for two or three weeks, placing it in different locations in the room for a few days.  No matter where I put it, you can't smell it.  The fragrance doesn't waft out into the room.
summary: Wasted my money on this one.

reviewText: I put this in my car and I only smelled it for about 10 minutes into my drive. It's still in my car, and I can't smell it at all. I bought two of these and I feel like I got taken. These do not give off a powerful enough scent or last.
summary: This is weak as far ascent is concerned

reviewText:
I measured my valance and it measure just a tiny bit over 3". I received these and put my valances up. They are precariously balanced in these clips. If you bump them or even slam a door, the valance falls right out. I guess I am going to have to order the 2 1/2" size for my 3" valances to get them to be snug. Hopefully I won't break them.

Follow-up: The 2.5" clips are way too small and my valances keep falling out of the 3" clips. Looks like I just bought a bunch of recyclables! Waste of money.

If I could give this brush a half of a star, I would. I used this brush once to clean off the buildup on my grill grates. The best time to do this is when the grates are hot. Well...the plastic holding the bristles melted. Every time I use this brush, I lose two to three bristles. After 4 uses, half the bristles are gone. I do not recommend purchasing this item.
summary: Not meant for cleaning hot grill grates

reviewText: Don't ever use a wire brush on your barbeque grill. My son is in surgery now having  a bristle removed from his esophagus. If you google this it is not uncommon for this to happen. It's very dangerous and can be fatal. Why these things aren't banned is a mystery. DON'T BUY THIS BRUSH!!

What I received were dead dried up twigs that were all twisted together and were so brittle, the tops broke off when I tried pulling the limbs apart. The arrangement was nothing like what I expected. Very very poor quality.  Seriously, don't waste your money.
summary: Don't waste your time or money!!

reviewText: I PURCHASED THIS PUMP FOR OUR INGROUND POOL. IT WORKED FOR ABOUT 6 MONTHS. WHEN I CALLED FOR REPAIR FROM A LOCAL POOL DEALER, I WAS ADVISED THAT IT IS A CHINESE PRODUCT OF VERY LOW QUALIFY AND HE WAS UNABLE TO REPAIR..

it was dead when it arrived, I've planted it any way and still nothing... I have a degree in horticulture and 99% of the time I can get anything to grow from seeds to cuttings. I just don't understand.
Thank you

Take a sunscreen bottle, a real flimsy one, wash it out and ya get the same thing.  This was a waste of money - no special lid to ensure a tight seal and to be honest, I'm hesitant to really use it b/c the bottle is so flimsy that I'm sure no matter what's inside, it will end up all over my beach bag!

A magnet that holds nothing! If you put two paper clips on, one falls off. The picture with several clips on it is deceiving! I tried several times to put a few paper clips on-the really small ones-and if one stuck, the rest would fall off. Worst "magnet" ever! And I loved the design-so I am majorly disappointed. I returned it.
summary: Waste of money and time-it doesn't work!

reviewText: This makes great coffee, but is completely unreliable. We were on our fourth Nescafe machine in four years until this week, when the latest one broke after less than a year of operation. This was the second replacement unit sent by Nescafe, after the previous two also broke after less than a year - I made the mistake of buying the first replacement myself. Apparently Nescafe has grown tired of sending us new faulty machines, so it's back to Keurig for us.

This is advertised as "The Serenity Prayer" however this is NOT..the Serenity Prayer...please change this..its very deceptive..the prayer is taken out of context so how effective can it be..especially to a recovering addict who is beginning they're recovery...
summary: Not The Full Version of The Serenity prayer

reviewText:
These sheets are definitely soft, and look great. They come in a well put-together package, with a little ribbon holding it all together.

Unfortunately, the stitching is poorly done, and mine arrived with multiple rips along the seams, and with many "stray" threads hanging out that are sure to be an issue in the future.

If you like to sew, I'm sure these sheets would be great for you. Otherwise, look elsewhere.

This is the most awkward adhesive tool I have ever used. It is huge and hard to manage. Lining up the dispenser head with the spot you want the adhesive to start is problematical because the dispenser head is about .75 inches in width while the tape itself is .25. So there is room for a half inch error. I wasted more than I used of the tape plus I got a blister on my thumb. I thought if I just kept using it I would get comfortable with it or figure it out better, but that never happened.

This product is a poorly laminated piece of regular printing paper. The product is crooked and has defects. I would not recommend purchasing this product. A similar product can be created at home or at a copy store using a printer and a lamination machine.
summary: Looks like someone made this at home

reviewText: I needed a new toothbrush holder and this looked like a great deal, so I figured this would do. Wrong! The part where the two pieces join is badly shaped, so that I really have to struggle to fit the two pieces together. The first 2-3 times I did this, I was like "eh, so it takes a bit of work, whatever." But then I finally realized how stupid it is to waste ANY time with a toothbrush holder when I could just go spend a few dollars at Target to get one that fits properly and never waste that time again.

This received 1 star because it had 2 red discoloration marks on it. I ordered the khaki. I was able to tuck in the part where it had the red marks so I didn't feel like going through the aggravation of returning. If it didn't have the red marks, this would have received 3 stars as it is just "ok". Serves its purpose, but I wish I had paid only 10 bucks for it. Not worth more than that, and even that's pushing it. The khaki color is nice, and the material is soft, but obviously cheaply made.

I've used two different repellents and I'm still killing them in mouse traps.
Darwin's theory prevails, however, and the survivors seem to have learned to get the apple without triggering the trap... Repellents don't seem to really work.
summary: I've used two different repellents and I'm still killing them ...

reviewText: I have no idea how these pillows got such good reviews. I figured it was just a new pillow so it would take a few nights to get used to. False. They fluff up beautifully, but lay your head on them for 10 minutes and they are flat as a pancake. And no, I am not overweight or have a fat head. I'm just really annoyed I paid $180 for 2 really crappy pillows. I ended up giving them to my dog. He doesn't seem to mind sleeping with pancake pillows.

I thought I would try making omelettes with it. They were OK, but the aftermath was horrible. I spent 10-15 minutes trying to get the egg & cheese off the "easy-clean" surface. reviewText: It's astonishing that so many people think that this device can somehow reduce EMFs.  There is no way this could possibly do that, all it does is suck the money from your wallet.  The only way to reduce EMFs is to live in a Faraday cage.

As soon as I plugged it in, the voices in my head went away.  No more urge to do the things I see in my nightmares.  No more incessant screaming in my head.  Just the silence of white noise that comes with peace of mi...  AGH!  The Voices!  They're back!  Someone must have unplugged it!  I need to call home and tell whoever's there to plug it back in!  Plug it back in now!

Ah, I'm just kidding.  No one who actually owns one of these lives with anyone else.
summary: It makes the voices go away

reviewText: The plug in has been plugged in since I received it, which was around June 3, this year. Since nothing changed, I can only believe the device does not work. One of its selling points was that it neutralized a 5,000 sq. ft. area. The area I wanted neutralized is only 1,000 sq. ft. and it didn't even cover that. When I read about the device I thought this is too good to be true and you know what they say about that.  I wish I had saved my money.

STAINLESS STEEL DOES NOT DO THIS!!!! These come from China, so I can only begin to imagine what metal they are REALLY made of. Don't risk death by using these horrible and dangerous straws.

Product did arrive on time and packaged well. However, these two plants did not survive over 10 days. I am a skilled gardener and my favorite flowers are morning glory's and lavender so am very familiar in caring for them. These two plants were noticed to be very questionable the morning after they arrived so I paid special attention to them for over a week trying to nurture them back to heath.....This could not be achieved and were dead in under two weeks.

The only part of the kit is the icing that is usable.  Save your money, save your time, just don't bother buying this kit.

This product was IMPOSSIBLE to open and close once it got cold. I used it for keeping sliced onions easily available for lunch sandwiches. However, it took so much force to open it, they would go flying everywhere. I bought another version at Container Store that was much more user friendly.

Well, as it turns out.  Lemons (and onions) for that matter, need air so they don't mold.  As it is, if I leave a lemon or an onion (in my onion saver) it gets moldy within a day or two.  I ended up drilling tiny holes in the top of both of them so it would let some air in and out.  Ended up saving the product in the end for me.  I do not use this product much any more.  Seems like more plastic for our landfills.  Avoid!
summary: Seems like more plastic for our landfills

reviewText:
Depending on where you live, this product may not be compliant with your city's composting guidelines. This product is "degradable", not "biodegradable". Do a search and make sure this product is acceptable where you live.

This product is still made from plastic and does not meet my composting needs.
summary: Degradable is not the same as biodegradable

reviewText: These so-called degradable bags will most likely not degrade within the next millennium!  I mistakenly bought these and threw them in my compost bin, thinking they would compost along with the kitchen waste inside.  Boy, was I wrong!  After a year and a half of composting, they were still completely intact.  I had to pick them out of the rich, brown compost and throw them in the plastic recycling bin, along with what was left of the roll.  Don't waste your money!
summary: DON'T PUT THESE INTO YOUR COMPOST BIN!

reviewText: Short and sweet review: Don't waste your money. These bags do not breakdown in your composter. I had a great batch of compost to put into my vegetable garden last week, except for the fact that I was forced to fish out all of the compost bags that had not "degraded". What a mess. Don't waste your money. I am going to use the bags until they are gone to simply keep my countertop compost pail clean, but never again will I put them into my composter.

Like other reviewers, I glossed over the term "degradable" without realizing that these bags are not biodegradable. Degradable basically means that these bags will become tiny bits of plastic over time -- they will not turn to organic compost. Try the Oggi Eco-Liners on Amazon. Slightly more expensive, but legitimately biodegradable.

reviewText: My husband bought this pillow for me and I like the concept, but it did not work as expected. So I purchased this for my Bissell steam mop.  Unfortunately, the scent is so light that it is completely undetectable once steamed.  Barely even worth the energy pouring the rest of it into my steam mop.

You get what you pay for I guess.

Oojra's  Canadian Christmas Tree doesn't smell in the least like anything resembling christmas or a tree. It smells horrible, more like a bug spray. I had to pour it down the drain to get rid of the smell.  However Oojra's Thai Jasmine Bamboo is amazing! Forget the Christmas tree diffuser.

Comes with a label that reads: "WARNING: The power cord of this product contains lead, a chemical known to the State of California to cause cancer, and birth defects or other reproductive harm. Wash hands after handling (in bold)." The on/off switch is connected to the power cord itself so you would have to wash your hands every time you turn it on/off. I just can't get myself to put this in my daughter's room. Returning it.
summary: Comes with a giant lead warning

reviewText: Not only did it crack the second time I used it, it was too large to rotate in the microwave even though I have a large microwave.  My return window closed two days ago so this was a total waste of money.  I see the price went down.  Don't waste your money even if it was selling for $1.

FINALLY USED THIS AT OUR CABIN THIS AUGUST.  WORKED GREAT ON COOKING BACON.  LIKE ALL SUCH MICROWAVE BACON TRAYS, CLEANING CAN BE PROBLEMATIC.  2 DAYS LATER, COOKED UP MORE BACON, BUT UPON CLEANING THE TRAY BROKE.  THIS INVOLVED HAND CLEANING, NOT THE DISHWASHER!

Junk. The sides of the bottom "grill" part cracked in two places the second time I used it. It cracked in one corner, and right down the middle of the other side. I thought the lid would be a good thing. It prevented splatters in the nuke, but if using it in a microwave causes the plastic to crack, what good is it?
summary: I thought the lid would be a good thing. It prevented splatters in the nuke

reviewText: Way too small for a lunch bag. Tried to exchange for the larger one, wasn't able to. The cost to return it is the same price I paid for it. So now I'm stuck with a tiny lunch bag that would fit 1 item. :(

This thing is garbage!!! I bought one and it burned up the first time we used it. The replacement was used 4 times, as we shampoo once monthly and it burned up. This is the biggest waste of money i have ever spent!!!!

Very dim and about half of the lights I got didn't work.  Sent the whole thing back because after having to individually check each of these things, I got really irritated when so many of them failed.  I didn't want them to send me another batch of half-working half-not-working lights.  Ugh.
summary: Really dim, and about 1/2 of them didn't work.  Sent all of them back.

reviewText: It refers in the description as rechargeable but it's because the base is a charging dock to heat up the iron.  You only have a couple minutes to iron then when the light comes back on you have to place it back on the charging dock to heat the iron up again.  I'm completely unsatisfied.  I'm returning today.
summary: The iron itself is not rechargable

reviewText: This was awful. The wheels are too small. They don't roll well over anything other than a hard flat surface. The strap comes undone easily. I recently couldn't get the handle to its highest position (which could be higher for people over 5'8"). I kept turning the knobs to raise the handle and it wouldn't release and raise. One hard tug and it came right off the cart and I couldn't get it back on. It went into the trash. I had it for one miserable year.

If I could give this zero stars I would. I purchased this timer to remind us when it's time to feed our disabled loved one. After two weeks of use the timer stopped working. The only way to get it to work is to flip it upside down and rest it on the knob. Very upsetting.

We ordered two of these.  The first didn't work at all and we had to return it.
The second worked for less than a month, and now doesn't ring at the cessation of time.  Which defeats the point of having a timer.

Although these sheets did serve their purpose, I got exactly what I paid for. They were not very soft, a completely different color and they barely fit the bed. I can't even tuck them in. Luckily, they went in a guest room that only the children use.
summary: Although these sheets did serve their purpose, I got ...

reviewText: Awful. Returned! They are super cute. The problem is they are completely unusable. They are tiny and fragile and the paint was sprayed on with the pins closed. So when you try to pinch the ends to open the pins, the paint has kind of glued them together and the legs just snap off! Lol!!! It was the silliest thing!!! I tried to open one, SNAP. Ok... tried another, SNAP! I tried about 10 and at least 7 of them broke. It was rather comical.

It is defective and it was a gift. I bought it ahead of time to make sure I got in on time. And now I have exceeded the time limit to return it. All I wanted to do was return and replace. Now Im out all kinds of money and gave a defective gift.
summary: Defective gift and was unable to return since it was past the return date. I didn't want to inbox it. Its a gift

reviewText:
To even state that this is a 'small hunk' gives the  purchaser some size expectation...
 a ' minuscule sliver' is the most accurate description that is possible for what was received...
not even half the size of my baby fingernail.  The wad of glue that held it inside the packaging was bigger than the iron meteorite.
summary: To even state that this is a 'small hunk' gives ...

reviewText: I was very upset when I ordered these. I thought they would be perfect for a project I was working on, but when they arrived there were only about 8 in the package- not 50. The ones that did arrive were flimsy. By the time I was able to receive the package I had no time to wait for a correction and possibly a new shipment so I had to scour our town for similar ones. Very disappointing.
summary: I thought they would be perfect for a project I was working on

reviewText: Terrible Sheets. These shed and shed, you wake up in the morning and you have hundreds of lint balls all over your body. These have been washed several times and they haven't improved at all. I like the way the sheets fits the bed, but they are practically worthless unless you shower or use a lint roller over your entire body when you wake up every morning.

I bought these sheets because I have had good luck with DreamFit sheets in the past. I have owned the Degree 3 sheets, but opted to buy the Degree 1 due to how thin and silky they felt and the fact that I sleep warm.

It didn't take long at all for these sheets to start balling up. I've never owned sheets that have done this. I am very disappointed with these sheets and with DreamFit.

This is a very cheap product, and does not look like the one in the picture. The foam cylinders on either side are much smaller than the picture leads you to believe. The material that covers the cylinders is a shiny/sleek nylon material, but a softer/felt-like material like the photo shows.

I have a concrete floor, and this does not stay in place when I open & close the door.

Also, I'm not positive how long it is, but it does not cover the entire length of my door. It's about 6 inches short.
summary: Very cheap product. I would not recommend it.

reviewText: Doesn't hold up to use. As I used it the very first time, I noticed the metal bristles coming off. After six or seven uses, it's essentially bare. Flipped it over and used the scraper one time until the metal blade came off. Very, very poor quality.
summary: Very poor quality, doesn't hold up to use

reviewText: I was hoping for something much more than what I got.  I was in need of an excellent BBQ brush and needed it before this one arrived.  I got one for $1.00 at Walmart.  To my surprise, this one is VERY much like the $1.00 one.  Except the less expensive one has a 2 inch shorter handle.  The rest is exactly the same material and design.
summary: I was in need of an excellent BBQ brush and needed it before this one arrived

reviewText: When my son opened this last night at his 2nd birthday party, I would have given it 5 stars. He honestly wouldn't even look at any of his other presents, he loved this one so much. Today, (less than 24 hours after he received it as a gift) it fell off of the counter and now it no longer works. Right now my husband has the stupid thing in pieces trying to repair it, but what a pain! Piece of garbage. Look for one that will withstand more than a day of toddler use.
summary: he loved this one so much

reviewText: My son got this for his birthday and it lasted about 2 days before it stopped working. The wiring inside is very loose and the toy constantly needs to be taken apart to put it back together, which is a pain because of the large number of screws holding it together. It barely blows air like it claims. You have to hold it about a centimeter from your hand to feel the wind that feels like it was created by fluttering butterfly wings. Would not recommend.

They look good when they work. They honestly run through batteries every few weeks. The cost of these lights never ends. This product is not what we had hoped for.  We have stopped using the lights completely at this point.

These decals are so cute. I was very excited to put them in my daughters room. I followed the directions as close as possible and these decals will not stay stuck to her wall. Her wall is only the slightest bit textured. I've put a lot of time and effort into making them work and they just won't stick. I'm sad and disappointed.

If you're expecting to kill weeds down to the roots, this is not the product - it'll kill weed-tops, but it won't kill the roots.

(And, if you find this out after the fact, don't count on being able to return it.)
summary: Doesn't Kill Weed Roots - Can't Return It

reviewText: I saw that someone answered a question, that this would work on bushes that turned brown.  They said it would.  I can tell you that it doesn't.  I also tried it on some dead grass and it gave a light bluish green tint.  It stayed on for longer than I thought it would, but 2 months later, it has totally disappeared.  Granted, it really wasn't for bushes as a previous purchaser said it was, but I wasn't crazy about the color on some dead grass.

I got this today and some of the screws were missing and the back hinge was tore half off. We did our best to re-install the back piece, but the screw holes are stripped. So we are not able to open the chest without the hinge coming off. Also, the inside of the chest was ripped (it has a velvety sort of cloth lining). For $125 I don't expect it to be GREAT craftsmanship, but I do expect it not to be broken and ripped.

This auger motor is low quality. It failed twice. Total run time was approx 15 minutes before the gears sheared off and stopped functioning. Good seller did refund my money, but it cost me about $30 shipping with NOTHING to show for it. argh! I have since purchased OEM auger motor from Traeger. Total run time on the OEM motor, since replacement, has been about 3 hours and counting. This low-quality auger motor certainly didn't work for me while my new OEM Traeger motor is working happily.

We were so excited to buy these to use for hand soap and dish soap in our kitchen. They have rusted so badly that it's difficult to get the lids open to refill the jars. WORD TO THE WISE: Coat them with polyurethane or something to keep the rust away. Other than that, the pump works well.
summary: We were so excited to buy these to use for ...

reviewText: Man I had high hopes for this thing. The infomercials sold me on it. First, a rake is much faster. Second, any piece of mulch or stick jams the machine. Third, the "blower" feature doesn't really work. I'm not even going to try to offload this on Craigslist because I don't want to steal some sucker's money. Please do not buy this little machine, just grab a rake and some elbow grease.

The worst! Purchased it as a gift and when it arrived it not only looked NOTHING like picture but it was embarrassingly cheap looking. I refused to pass this along as a present because it was so awful. I would have returned it but between the dual shipping cost I would have had to pay for it arriving and then sending it back; it simply wasn't worth it. Now it's just buried in the back of my closet. Maybe I'll sell it on Craigslist and make a killing off of it. (Insert sarcasm)

This desk is made of compressed wood, meaning it's absolutely cheap! Do yourself a favor and go to Office Depot, where you can find quality desks for the same price (maybe a bit more). We've wasted money and time on this product. Boards are not labeled; pieces crumble apart as screws are inserted. It's nothing more than a piece of junk. Office Depot has beautiful, high-quality desks that are easily assembled. Plus the final product is sturdy. This "desk" is wobbly and unreliable. Save your money!

Better to call them "disposable earrings."

I fell in love with the elegant look of these earrings, and their low price.

What I don't like about them is the wire piece with the hook in the back. There's NO WAY to put them on without twisting the hook around, and then twisting it back into shape after it's in your ear. It's a major design  flaw that's rather irritating.

Once you get them on, you'd better keep them on. Trying to take them off will likely break the wire.

It looks nice, but it was amazingly noisy for such a small unit - so loud I had to raise my voice when talking to others who entered my office -  and it didn't put out heat that was noticeable even from just a few feet away. I'd bought it to help make my heated office at work a little warmer, but this unit simply wasn't up to the task. I promptly returned it for a refund.
summary: Great - if you want a lot of noise and no heat.

reviewText:
Too noisy. The fan motor makes a lot of racket. Wakes me up every time it goes on. If you aren't going to use it in a bedroom, it works okay.

I'd like to update this review. This thing no longer works on the "HI" setting. I suspect it gets too hot inside and shuts itself off so the thermostat setting is about useless. It will work on "LO". It only gets noisier as it gets older. Sorry I bought it.

All would be fine if not for the smell. I'd hoped the smell would dissipate after I ran it outside for several hours, but it's as bad as ever. We're throwing it out, and I'm baffled how this ever made it to market.

I bought this for a small bathroom.  I turned it on high for about 20 minutes to warm up the bathroom before a shower. I was surprised to find it didn't heat up the room. After my shower it was still cold in the bathroom. I had to stand right in front of it to feel any heat whatsoever.
I'll be returning it.

Our blower was used for 10 minutes a day 3 days each week for about a year and needs a battery, A new battery costs about as much as a new Blower with battery. Our Ryobi blower had a useful life of one year. For us it was not worth the cost.
summary: Our Ryobi blower had a useful life of one year

reviewText: Worst piece of crap I ever paid too much for. The rechargeable battery stopped recharging in less than a year so I have to use an extension cord now - a huge hassle. And the black nozzle part keeps falling off all the time so I either have to hold it on or tape it with duct tape. Do not buy this!!
summary: Worst piece of crap I ever paid too much for.

reviewText:
A very bad choice - my last Ryobi purchase.
After 2 months my battery wouldn't charge.  The nearest service point was 30 miles away (there was no service station in the City of San Antonio).
I had to make a $40 deposit and wait for about 2 weeks for the service to test the unit and order parts (if defective).
My last Ryobi purchase.
summary: A very bad choice - my last Ryobi purchase

reviewText: The upfront description of these napkins is deceptive. It only used the word cotton to describe what they are made of. In actuality it is a cotton/polyvester blend. I did not know this until I had cut off about half the tags of the napkins. I really do dislike polyvester and the upfront description appealed to me. Can't send them back now.
summary: I really do dislike polyvester and the upfront description appealed to me

reviewText: I bought two packs.  One of the antlers had a hole in it and wouldnt hold air. The other pack had two rings with holes in it.  I am bummed because I bought them for a party and unwrapped them just before it.
summary: I bought two packs. One of the antlers had ...

reviewText: This "wedge" is barely more than a flat piece of foam rubber.  Even after leaving it to "inflate" for 3 days it is still almost perfectly flat on one end & a little bit "wedged" at the other.  Quite useless

Don't waste your money.  I thought I would take a chance, having read the mixed reviews.  This is a crappy product.  I bought the twin.  Only 1/2 of it "inflated" and it has been six days  I'm just going to fold it in half and try to keep pillows from hitting the floor.
