Awful product. I've been waiting 4 days for it to reshape since taking it out of the box. The directions state it takes 12 hours. It doesn't look like it's ever going to be more than just a flat piece of foam that I paid way too much money for!

The wood is beautiful, so is the finish. The construction, however, leaves much to be desired. In the middle of a busy trade show, I had screws falling out of each of the rungs in between the legs. The screws sent with the stool were about 1/4 inch too short to hold into the legs. I finally had to find a hardware store late at night and get some wood glue to hold the stool together. Terrible construction.
summary: The wood is beautiful, so is the finish

reviewText: I bought these about a year ago and just tried them out today. I kept having to adjust them.  Each strap has already stretched over twelve inches, and that was just over the course of about 30 minutes of messing around with my hammock. I'm a pretty big guy at a little over 200 lbs, but the straps still shouldn't stretch like this.

IT BURNED!!! BEWARE. DANGEROUS PRODUCT
We plugged it in to charge it but after 1 hour, it sparked couple of times. When we unplugged it, it smelled burned and was extremely hot. It's good that we were home when it happened and were able to unplug it.
summary: It's good that we were home when it happened and were ...

reviewText:
I purchased two of these at the same time.  I tried and tried to prime them, but neither of them work.  I also see the manufacturer has stopped listing them on their own website.

I can feel and hear the motor/pump spinning.  Water only enters the tube half an inch.  When the motor/pump spins, the water bounces around less than a quarter inch.  It does not make any headway up or down.  I fully understand how these are suppose to work and there seems to be  a serious flaw in these.
summary: Two out of two did not work and the manufacturer has stopped listing them on their own website.

reviewText: I have had these for less than two days with plants in them, I watered them twice and the planter is already stained yellow, they look dirty and no amount of wiping them down will get rid of the discoloration. Its as if they were not made for plants.

These are horrible. I even contacted the company and got advice on how to prepare the log before I light it so it will burn because I was having so many issues. "Slam the ends harder on the floor," they said. It does not burn. The paper burns off of the log and then it just sits there. And they are so expensive! Not worth it. And the company didn't offer any reimbursement for the logs I ended up having to throw away because they won't burn. Beware!

VERY flimsy!!.....They COULD have used two pieces of material and had you slide the cardboard in between the two layers of material...That would have made for better support and durability....But instead there is only one layer of material which it is very thin and the cardboard sits loosely,(even with the glue strip and velcro),in front of it.

This cabinet is completely unstable! Yes, I understand to make it totally stable it needs to be anchored to the wall, but prior to mounting it to the wall I expected the cabinet to have some sort of structural integrity. If I set something on it, it shakes. It has at least 2 inches of movement side to side. I will take a video and add it to my review to show what I am talking about. I would not recommend this item! Go to Target, they have much higher quality items.

I'm really upset with this purchase.  The legs were nowhere near strong enough to support the top.  When my roommate and I picked it up and put it in place, both legs cracked and the whole thing came crashing down and broke.  We're confident that we followed the instructions correctly (they were actually pretty good), and are now left with a completely unfixable piece that we needed to throw away 4 hours after receiving it.  So disappointing and a waste of money!
summary: We're confident that we followed the instructions correctly (they were actually pretty good), and are now left with a completely

reviewText: Beware...very tiny.  Not to be used if you open and close it a lot, because it's very cheaply made. It's for decoration only. I just can't believe I paid $10 for it. It's worth maybe 2-3 bucks from the dollar store. I don't normally leave reviews on anything, but I just had to this time.  Don't be fooled.  Oh well, live and learn.
summary: Tiny and cheap. But you get what you pay for.

reviewText: I purchased this after my old one broke after many years of use.  I can't figure out why this pizza cutter got such good reviews.  It is rusting near the center of the wheel after 3 times through the dishwasher.  It is sharp, but it feels cheap and it is not solidly made.  Fortunately it was cheap, but I am willing to pay more for a better pizza cutter.  Given how it is holding up, I expect to get my chance in a few months.
summary: I can't figure out why this pizza cutter got such good reviews. It is rusting near the center of ...

reviewText: While it looks pretty on the screen, what I got back was a very cheap, discolored piece of cloth. There is no padding within the fabric to make it remotely appear like a quilt. Overall, I loved the price but had to buy a new quilt in the store for fear of making the same mistake.

If this product could have been made any more cheaply, I'm sure the manufacturers would have jumped at the chance. The main body of the piece is made from foam, and the adhesive applied wasn't even strong enough to hold said foam for minutes, let alone a  length of time that would satisfy its nine dollar cost. Even if the adhesive had worked, I cannot imagine a situation where it would be possible to clean around this model without damaging it in some way.

When I received it I thought it was exactly what I needed. We attached it exactly as the manufacturer instructed. It was in use a week, then fell off, and plugged up the commode. We had to call in a plumber to come in on a Sunday morning to bore it out.

We were pretty happy with these knives initially. However, they don't last long, I suspect because although ceramics are very hard, they are also brittle. In our case, the edge of one of the knives chipped after less than 6 months of only occasional use (see picture). Is it a coincidence that this product carries only a 60 day warranty?  Not worth it.
summary: Edge CHIPPED after less than 6 months & SHORT warranty

reviewText: Sorry to say, this latest one doesn't work well.  The plastic is too stiff and the suction cups are too small and shallow.  Won't mold to the shape of the sink divider and the suction cups don't work even if the plastic would lie flat on the divider.

These sheets are awful. The one good thing is that they are a very deep black. But they are so cheap and poor quality. They feel like they're made out of the same material as a child's Halloween costume. They're sticky and your skin drags against them when you move.

The package only contains 2 items, not 4, making it definitely not worth the money. As other reviewers mentioned, they're a little flimsy, but would probably do for tea bags, if there really were 4 in the package.

The product is okay and will serve the purpose for which it was purchased. Overall, the quality is subpar -- glad it did not opt for the less expensive shoe bags.
While the "fabric" of the shoe bag seems durable, the drawstrings are another story. The drawstrings are frayed and the ends are not properly finished off. Although I pulled the knot tightly, the drawstring material is so slick the knot automatically comes undone.  Should have at least finished the drawstring off so it does not unravel.
summary: the quality is subpar -- glad it did not opt for the less expensive shoe ...

reviewText:
Bought them for a friend, they looked cheap after she opened them in the package.
Then she put them in her ears and took them out.
When she took them out of her ears, the metal rod sticking out from the shark's mouth came unattached to the shark. It broke before she even had them for 1 hour.

Beautiful and so easy to work with!  Took no time at all

EDIT:  It didn't take a week before all the tiles were peeling.  I tried the recommended spray adhesive, and other things, all to no avail.  Eventually pulled it all off.

I finally got the pillow out of the bag it was sent in and put it  in the dryer 3 times to get it slightly puffy.  Slept on it and it kept flattening.  Tried to fluff it up every morning and still flattened out every night when I slept on it.  I tried to return the pillows but had missed the return date by two days so I'm stuck with horrible pillows.  Memory foam my butt.  These pillows are horrible.

This is the worst pillow I have ever purchased. I bought 2 king size pillows and both of them sit on the floor. These pillows feel worse than if you slept without a pillow on concrete. My husband and I both have had a migraine from a stiff neck for the last 2 days since we've been sleeping with them. Do not buy these pillows unless you like extremely uncomfortable and hard pillows.

This is the worst pillow ever. It is huge, heavy and hard as a rock and as lumpy as a rock. Unless you are a giant who likes to sleep with their head on a lumpy rock don't buy this pillow. I didn't want to bother with returning it because it is so huge and heavy. Finally decided yesterday that it was ridiculous to keep something I will never use and of course my return cut off was two days ago.
summary: This is the worst pillow ever

reviewText: I want to love this machine but I hate it. When it is low on water it forces you to add water. You can not turn it off. So I make a nice hot cup of coffee and I have to stop everything to add water before I turn the machine off. I should not have to do that. I should be able to turn it off and add the water later. It's a very poor design.
summary: Must add water before turning off the machine

reviewText: What a terrible product and terrible company.  Whoever came up with the idea to put DRM on a coffee pot should be fired.  Keurig, just make better products rather than trying to fleece your customers.  This crappy product is going back to the store it came from.

Corporate greed at its finest. This unit only works with Keurigs K-Cups which only benefits Keurig by forcing the consumer to buy the most expensive K-Cups. The unit is also very poor quality.
I returned this to Costco and I will never buy another Keurig product. I'm sure another company will step in to offer a better product without the restrictions that add no value.
summary: Corporate greed ruins a good product

reviewText: This was my first time buying a Keurig brand machine and I am very, very disappointed!  I was so excited to go online and buy various flavors of coffees and teas just to find out that most of them don't work with the machine.  I bought my machine at Sam's club and if there is any way to return it I will..... I don't want to give up on the K cup concept yet so I will try a Mr. Coffee K- Cup brewer!

Too frequently the switches fail to respond to the remote.  Sometimes I press OFF on the remote for my second light, and nothing happens.  Maybe if I press OFF twice, or three times, it turns off.  Maybe if hold OFF down long enough it turns off, maybe a different light turns off.  I had similar difficulties with the ALL ON and ALL OFF buttons on the remote.  Frequently one light would stay on after I pressed the ALL OFF button.

It arrived on time and looked very good but it would not turn on so we returned it the next day.  We are still waiting to see if the whole cost is refunded.  I send it back two days after I received it. I still think it would have been nice had it worked.

This is an absolute piece of garbage! I've  had it for less than a week and the light won't stop blinking and it won't  work. I've never been as disappointed as I am now! They will NEVER have my business again!!

style.Style Name:: Hanging Basket with Silver Bristle,  Red Berries, Pine Cones, and 50 Battery-Operated LED Warm White Lights

reviewText: I paid $55.00 for this and Menards is selling something similar for $20.00.  I should have returned this.  It looks OK, but is not full enough and the lights aren't very bright.  Check out Menards and look at it in person.  Don't make a mistake like I did and accept a skimpy overpriced item instead of returning it.

Don't waste your time buying this. It does not work as advertised, and the smell is not good. Makes the room feel stuffy. I got this for my closet which gets humid and has a smell to it. Thought this would help but it just made it worse, did not get rid of smell but rather mixed with it.
summary: Don't waste your time buying this

reviewText:
Don't waste your money.
What came doesn't look like the picture at all. The wood color and finish, the nose, the mustache, it's all different and exceptionally cheap looking.
The others I ordered from different vendors looked much nicer and just like the pictures.
Even the nose is off-center and would kill me (OCD).

The blanket is very soft, but leaves hairy fuzz balls everywhere! My bedding, including dust ruffle and bolster covers, were covered in lavender fuzz (see photos). Fuzz on the bedroom carpet would get stuck on our socks and was tracked all over the house. The fuzz did not subside, even after washing the blanket three times.  Washing machine also full of hairy fuzz balls.  This blanket made a terrible mess of the entire house and had to be returned.

Does not work the way people say. You have to use this in a very specific way, and you still lose some of your veggie. I don't know who is writing all these great reviews but don't fall for them. Veggies have to be really big around and then you have to hold this a certain way in order to get the most out of your veggie. Watch lots of videos before buying this item. Seriously consider buying a different product.

I looked at the picture, read the description, and believed that I bought glasses that made of glass. "Tritan" is a trade name of a company for a type of durable plastic used for making this "drinking glass". I did not know this until I received the merchandise. I think I deserve a clearer description, like "plastic", "polymer", or whatever that is commonly understood. "Tritan" is not a common name.

I am looking for "drinking glass" that made out of "glass", so I return it right away.
summary: To be clear, it is "plastic" not "glass"

reviewText: MISSING SEVERAL PARTS. ISSUING THE MISSING PARTS WILL NOT HELP ASI I AM AN 84 YEAR OLD WIDOW WHO WAS RELYING ON THE HELP OF MY GRANDSON TO ASSEMBLE THIS MONSTROSITY.  HE HAD TO LEAVE TO GO BACK TO HIS HOME.  I CAN NOT DO THIS MYSELF.  WHAT ARE MY OPTIONS NOW?????
summary: MISSING SEVERAL PARTS. ISSUING THE MISSING PARTS WILL NOT ...

reviewText: I received the wrong color.  I ordered mocha and got beige.  My husband had already put it together before I got home and realized it was the wrong color.  I ordered it to match the one I previously ordered.....not only is it the wrong color....they aren't even made the same.  One is taller than the other and the parts are made differently.  Very displeased with the product.
summary: I received the wrong color. I ordered mocha and ...

reviewText: I haven't even had it more than a day and it's already broken. I only got to make a few balls with it before the handle broke. What I had to do in the middle of the ball was push the handle in till it spun the cylinder but even then it sometimes stopped and ruined the whole ball. I had to wrap the rest of the yarn to finish it.

It did not work very well at all with a Cricut.  The cuts didn't come out clean and the transfers looked bunched up and tacky.  Not smooth or clean looking at all.  I ended up using an iron on application that came out much cleaner looking.  I would not use this product again with the Cricut.
summary: It did not work very well at all with a ...

reviewText: The heater on my car does not work and so I bought this to use as a supplemental heat until I get my car heater fixed. It does blow out warm air but does not get the inside of your car warm. It is good for defrosting a windshield but if you are thinking about buying this to use to warm the inside of your vehicle, don't. I do not recommend this product.
summary: It is good for defrosting a windshield but if you are thinking ...

reviewText: This is an absolute piece of garbage.  You can stick your nose right on top of it and you will never get hot. It is advertised that you can defrost your windows.  It does not get hot enough to do anything. I totally wasted my money on this and would not recommend it to anyone!

Both are pieces of crap! They don't hold water, etc., in bathroom, kitchen nor bathtub. You'd think that you could 'mold' them to fit the hole you're trying to use them in but no matter what you do they just do NOT work !
VERY frustrating!

The first one I received broke the first time I used it (the handle broke off).  The second one was also only used once because the grease made a white film all over the strainer and bottom bowl.  I can't seem to get the white film off so I haven't used it again.  I do not recommend this product at all.
summary: I do not recommend this product!

reviewText: once you fill the bag it is difficult to remove the bag from this stand without tearing the bag on the stand itself.  The cross braces are a bad idea.  If you fill a bag with garbage or with leaves/grass, you will have difficulty removing the bag once it is full.  Look at it.  Think about it.  If the bag protrudes between the cross braces you will have to maneuver the braces over the bag without tearing the bag.  Frustrating.

My mother-in-law loves it; however, after a few weeks it no longer turns off.  She can no longer use it because she is physically unable to get to her hands and knees to unplug it since it won't cut off.

I know it's only $4.95, but the fact of the matter is the picture does NOT represent this item. There was no mention of this pin shimmering and having gold stars throughout. This is not an American flag pin. It is a bedazzled lapel with a flag background.
summary: NOT a good flag pin, especially for men

reviewText: It works really well as long as you don't mind having coffee spilled all over your shirt. At first coffee only occasionally leaked through the air port in the lid, resulting in a few drops on the shirt. Then after a few months the seal failed, so less coffee goes through the lid than spills out under it.

These are TERRIBLE. DO NOT BUY. There's barely any tape on the rolls and the edges are crooked and wrinkled. They're also very low quality plastic and none of the rolls I got were like the ones pictured. PLUS it took well over a month to arrive. I don't know if I'll be able to use any of these. I'm extremely disappointed - these are not worth the two dollars.
summary: AWFUL - NOT LIKE PICTURED - DO NOT BUY

reviewText: It's tiny so it overflows and anything bigger than a small lime won't fit. The reamer is too pointy so it can break through the rind if you're not careful. I do not recommend this. Way too expensive for what you get.

More of a conversation piece, did not work as it said it would. I regulated the heat trying to get it to work, and when the stove top was inferno red and ready to start melting down, I came to the conclusion that this was a no go.
summary: Not sure what it is supposed to do.

reviewText: Spent an hour fluffing the branches and plugged it in and NOTHING.  No lights, no color, no nothing.  I was very disappointed and proceeded to take it out and throw it in the trash.  Not worth the money or the time.
summary: I was very disappointed and proceeded to take it out and throw it ...

reviewText: Somehow quite a few people have had positive experience with these, or at least there are quite a few positive reviews. Interesting. But anyway, these things don't hold my boots. All I have to do is barely touch an item on the same rod as these, and they fall off. I do have a pair of short canvas-like boots that seem to work just fine, but the majority of my boots are leather or suede and these will not hold them.
summary: Way too loose or something - boots are constantly falling off the hanger.

reviewText: This product is not worth the purchase.  The hanger cannot support the weight of even the lightest boot.  I have no idea why this is even on the market or how this company can still be in business.  Do not waste your money.
summary: Not strong enough to hold the boot up

reviewText: "Universal Stopper" did not appear to be so. Used a 52 oz bottle of Ajax dish soap and couldn't stuff the stopper into the bottle. The website says this rarely happens if using a "non-standard" bottle of dish soap - whatever that means.
summary: Stopper wouldn't fit into soap bottle

reviewText: It was cute when we first received it. Although the light inside was very dim, so it wasn't too bright in the dark and it was also difficult to maintain upright. Sadly, the motor died within about 2 weeks. I contacted the company and they noted that there was no way to repair or replace the motor, so now I have an overpriced piece of junk. Very disappointed.
summary: Not worth it, motor dies quickly

reviewText: I don't quite understand why this was so highly rated because it didn't do anything to help my bed from not sagging. It was so small I felt I needed so much more than what was provided to me. Save your money and buy something more substantial.

My wife spent hours going through her earrings and putting them on the holder only to have the whole side rip away from the cover when she opened it. This item was not cheap (I paid nearly $50 ) I am not a happy camper. Because of all the time she spent organizing and attaching her earrings to this item, she doesn't want to return it (which is what I suggested she do). The design was unique and a very good idea, but I am completely dissatisfied with the quality.
summary: I am not a happy camper.

reviewText: Hate is a strong word but that is exactly how I feel about this item. Please heed the warning and do not buy this hammock. After only two months of rare use it is falling apart and has completely faded. As you can see, there is no longer any green color on this hammock. It has only been used lightly by 2 adults under 160 lbs.

I usually do not write reviews, but I had to warn people of this product. We bought this hammock in the middle of July, by the end of October the fabric holding it to the wood rotted. My friends son went to sit on it and it fell to the ground. I guess you get what you pay for. If you want a long lasting hammock, this is not the one for you.

The suction cup does not work at all. It is too shallow so it doesn't compress enough when pressed to the glass to give a good suction. I love the design, but hate the fact that it's completely useless trying to get it to stick to our window! FIX THIS FLAW and you'll have a decent enough product.
summary: Not enough suction via the suction cup.

reviewText:
I purchased this a couple of years ago, and I keep meaning to write about my experience. It registered pH 7.0 when I first turned it on.
Put it deeply into the soil, waited a few minutes, it registered pH 7.0. Replaced the batteries, same thing, pH 7.0.
Put it in  a cupful of vinegar..pH plummeted to 6.9..wow! put it in a cup of Clorox, pH shot all the way up to 7.1.
What would you think? Thank you

Got this and a hydrometer for Christmas. Neither worked. I put the probe for the hydrometer in a glass of cool water for half an hour and it only went up halfway!

This meter is stuck on 7.2. I got it to change one time for a few seconds, then it went back to 7.2 no matter what soil I put it in.

Avoid! Avoid! Avoid!

I should've heeded what the majority of reviews for this item said... it doesn't work at all. Constantly registers 7.0 and doesn't change. This tester is an absolute piece of junk. DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT!!!!!

This is a very short looped recording that sounds completely fake to me. I ended up throwing it away. Price is good, sound is not in my opinion.  For me, I would rather not have my family and friends listen to an unrealistic sound. Its inexpensive so I took a chance, but I literally  threw it away.
summary: Does not sound real to me.

reviewText: This started out as a great product, but after several uses the volume became so low (even if I adjusted it to the highest setting) that you couldn't hear it.  I returned without any hassle and bought a replacement.  That one didn't even last an entire day before the same issue happened.  I'm really disappointed and have moved on to another product.  I'd have to say that if it happened with two separate systems that there is a flaw in the product.

The sound was good but I was disappointed in how long it lasted. It only lasted one season. I changed the batteries and I still could not get it to work again. You would think for the price it would last longer.

This product "does not" sound like a real fire. There are some crackling sounds and what sounds like a ruler being slapped down on a counter. The track is short and loops quite often. If you have had a real fireplace and are looking for the sound of wood burning - this product leaves a lot to be desired.
summary: This product "does not" sound like a real fire

reviewText: This is a piece of junk.it does not sound real because it's too loud.  You can't turn it down low enough to have it out and if you put it under a pillow or something, it's too muffled. Do not waste your money like I did.
summary: Do not waste your money like I did

reviewText: I would not recommend this product because it slides around on the dashboard, which make it useless and almost dangerous. And yes, my dashboard is clean. The phone sticks to it really well. But the whole reason I bought this was to be able to have the phone easy accessible. Instead, I end up having to hold it in place every time I turn a corner.
summary: Does not stay in one place.

reviewText: The shaver actually works as advertised.  It will de-fuzz anything. That said, the problem is getting the plastic lint shield off to install the rechargeable batteries that do not come with the shaver.  Then getting the plastic lint shield off again to empty the lint.  I still have to have my husband to do it and a piece of the shield broke off while he worked to get it open. So yes, it works but I still can't get the thing open.
summary: The shaver actually works as advertised. It will de-fuzz ...

reviewText: nothing yet at 6-8 weeks. I tried to stratify one time, I tried to stratify 2 time, I tried to heavily scarify and lightly scarify and I tried to simply plant the seeds. So far not one of the 14 seeds planted has germinated.

The misting part does not work  AT ALL. No mist; just the blue light. I had it plugged into my computer for a half hour and it still did nothing. Dont waste your money. Its cheap, but as the phrase goes, you get what you pay for. It's now in the trash.

It worked for a day and then the vapor stopped coming out. I kept the bottle full of water and followed the instructions but only a small trickle come out the top. I'm really disappointed in this product. Don't buy it, it's not worth the money.
summary: I'm really disappointed in this product

reviewText: Arrived in non-working order. The top would get very hot and a high pitched noise was emitted but it never worked as a humidifier. I'm sure I just received a defective product but since a replacement isn't an option (out of stock) I can only review what I received.

Don't buy this if you are looking for something that humidifies your room. My room is tiny and this doesn't even make much of an impact. Used it for barely 2 weeks before it started sputtering in the middle of the day.
summary: Don't buy this if you are looking for something that ...

reviewText: This worked great for about 10 times, and now will no longer work at all.  It makes a horrible high pitched sound, gets very hot, and will not work.  I tried cleaning it with vinegar to no avail.  Waste of money!

I should have listened to the other reviews.  It only lasted 2 days, the mist was so heavy it left a puddle of water at the base of the unit, and  stopped working after only a few hours.  Save your money
summary: Not worth it, trust the reviews

reviewText: Very cheaply made. Both earrings were broken when I opened the package. One had completely come off the rhinestone and the other one's closure wouldn't stay closed. Don't waste your money on these earrings. I asked for a refund not an exchange, that's how cheap they look and are made.

I purchased this totally disgusting stuff to get rid of the mountain beavers destroying my yard. I poured LARGE amounts into each of the holes. They just pushed it out!!! It was worthless for this purpose. It might work very well for other critters, but definitely NOT for mountain beavers. If you have mountain beavers in your yard, you have my deepest condolences. It seems impossible to get rid of them.
summary: Not for getting rid of mountain beavers

reviewText:
I was very disappointed. The insert was very thin, sharp and rough around the rim. In addition, the bottom 'funnel' was bent to the side (meh), but the whole thing sat in there so tightly that both times I  had to pry it out. When it was empty, it was just annoying, but with wet coffee grounds, it became a nuisance. I had to pry it out with a knife, and it took a good while. It makes it disfunctional for me.
I'm sending it back.

I am very disappointed with this purchase.  The can opener feels sturdy and well-built, but it just doesn't work well.  It has difficulty latching on to a can and, once on, quickly falls off track resulting in a can that has sporadic openings around the circumference.  It is extremely frustrating to use!  I need a new can opener!

The one I got didn't cut all the way through the lid on any of the three different cans I tried it on. It cuts fine all the way around, but when it gets back to the starting point, it leaves a jagged thread holding the lid to the can -- NOT what I wanted. If I have to tear the lid off, I'm not going to get a smooth lip. Really disappointed. Not what I expected after reading the reviews.

Simply put, this is cheaply made (made in china). It was broken right out of the box, I didn't even get a chance to use it. I was really looking forward to this desk, and feel some of the reviews on it are misleading.
summary: Simply put, this is cheaply made (made in china) ...

reviewText: Meh. Too many colors that don't really match, and though they're an irregular shape, every piece is the exact same shape. So it ends up looking like a candy basket full of nonsense. I got rid of a couple of the colors and made the set look a little more realistic, but it's still not very good. Keep looking, friends.

Not Worth It

These butane canisters work well, but there are several problems.

I bought these at a higher price because it is a Japanese brand, however, these canisters are made in Korea.

I checked locally and found 8 oz butane canisters made by a well known brand for less than half the price. There is also a case of 12 made by someone else sold here on Amazon for way less.

This product is not worth the price asked.

I love the design and concept of utilizing space, but this bar sticks out far enough from the wall that it gets bumped when we step out of the shower, resulting in the bracket pulling from the wall. We've rehung it twice now and won't be doing that a third time.
summary: I love the design and concept of utilizing space

reviewText: Is it possible to write a review with less than one star? The HD Video Converter: VGA to HDMI is absolute trash. It doesn't even work... I bought it, plugged it in and it did absolutely nothing. Tried 2 HDMI cords and that did nothing... Save your money and don't buy this. I can't even return it now...
summary: Giving it One Star is Nice...

reviewText: Product shipped from Thailand, and was intercepted by the US Department of Agriculture in the USA. At which point it was removed and destroyed. According to the legal papers I received in the mail from the USDA it is illegal to ship this into the USA without proper paperwork. But at your own risk, I will be requesting a refund.
summary: Not legal to ship this to USA from Thailand.

reviewText: Just got back from paying my vet $1700 for removing one of these from my cat's intestine. If you have a cat, do not buy these. They are tiny and adorable, cats are curious and playful, and no matter how careful you are it's not worth the risk. These were in the bottom of a covered cup on the counter next to my sink waiting to be washed, and my cat still managed to steal one. I can't imagine what would happen if a tiny human got ahold of one of these.
summary: SILICONE CAT KILLERS!! CAT OWNERS BEWARE!!!

reviewText: Every last one was in orange (the only color I didn't want).  I could not use them for my intended purpose.  I ended up painting them and using them for decorations on my planters (I had no idea what to do with them after not being able to use them at a baby shower).  I don't think I'm the only one that got all orange, so buyer beware.

Do. Not. Buy.

I bough this for a small tank that just has plants in it and it hasn't been running for a month and it makes a horrible grind noise and smells like burning electronics.  I unplugged it because I'm scared it will cause a fire.  As a volunteer fire fighter it's things like this that can make you lose your whole house.

I used this cart for the first time yesterday, and the axle broke in half almost immediately. I didn't get 1 city block before it collapsed on me, leaving me with two bags of groceries to carry for an additional 2 blocks. It was only 15 pounds of groceries, so, I cannot imagine what this particular cart would be good for other than carrying air from one place to another. Not recommended at all.

This thing is absolutely terrible! It reeked of chemicals! We even left it outside to air out for two days and it still smelled very strongly of chemicals. I put it in the laundry room for a very brief period and it took a whole day for the smell to go away. I have a small child and I don't want things that smell strongly of chemicals in my home.

This product is a complete waste of money. It has never worked reliably.  Most times, the door won't close no matter what you do. I haven't been able to use it for a few months now. Probably one of worst built products I have ever used. I wouldn't pay $50 for it, if I knew what I know now. Please don't waste your money or time on this garbage.

Doesn't stay suctioned, even for like 5 seconds. Which is pretty annoying when you have a toddler who likes to stay in the bath for around 45 min. And the temperature warning is a little too sensitive for my taste. The water has to be a little too chilly in my opinion for the "too hot" to not be there.

Terrible filters. I threw them away. Instead, I used compressed air to blow out the dust and buildup in the original, factory filter. If you don't have compressed air at home, stop by a mechanic's shop and slip him a 5 to blow out your filter. It will make his day.

Brush is big and strong.  But the main reason for buying this brush is that the brush  comes with  a grill cook book.  However, I didn't receive the cook book and only received the brush.  Please, don't trick the customer like this.
summary: Don't believe the picture & the description

reviewText:
This thermostat is poorly designed.  The sensor for air temperature is affected by the heat generated by the relays.  When the cooler is not running, the sensed temperature is about 2-3 degrees lower than when the cooler is running.

A calibration tool is provided so you can choose whether the correct temperature is sensed with the cooler running or off.

It came without the lid. So my daughter was disappointed. She wanted me to re-purchase the item, but since I can't trust they'll send me one that's complete, I can't buy it. It's cute as can be, but what do you do with a saucer, a cup, and a pot with no lid?
summary: So my daughter was disappointed. She wanted me to re-purchase the item

reviewText: Really really disappointed in this product. I had tried LITERALLY everything to make these fleas go away and then I heard about this stuff and really thought it would do the trick. I had this stuff EVERY WHERE in my house. On my mattress, couch, every inch of the carpet, etc. It was in the air a bit, I used it so thoroughly. And guess what? IT DIDN'T DO A DANG THING.
summary: Did NOT do a dang thing.

reviewText: Wow - this thing is ridiculously SMALL....in fact TINY is more like it.  It seriously fits in the palm of my hand with room to spare.  I was able to fit a tea light in it but don't expect to use it for anything more than that.  Definitely not worth the price, even if it was under $10.

These did nothing to discourage the robins from flying at our windows. What ultimately worked best was removing the planter boxes they would conveniently perch on that were near the windows. It made it much more difficult for them to see their reflection in the glass, and eventually they stopped flying at the windows.
summary: What ultimately worked best was removing the planter boxes they would conveniently perch ...

reviewText: This product is pretty much useless it looks like it's made from black plastic garbage bags. It's not wide enough to fit over the arm of a recliner. I'm returning it I thought it would be handy so I ordered two of them. Save yourself some stress and don't buy this product.

Does not do what description says. It was a total waste of my money. It was cheaply made and would not stay on the arm of the chair, everytime I got up it fell to the floor. This product is a waste of money.
summary: It was a total waste of my money

reviewText: Horrible thing this is.  Simply wanted to use them to make pancakes.  OMG what a horrendous mess that was.  I even coated them with nonstick spray and they still stuck horribly.  Silicone doesn't stick.........my foot.........it was awful.  Took me over an hour to clean these little monsters up to send them back, and even then just as I was putting them in the box one of them still had a bit of pancake batter stuck to it.  Would not recommend them for any thing.

THE WORST PRODUCT! It didn't fix my clog... and now all of my sink's pipes leak! also it only worked for 5 pushes... made a lot of smoke like dry ice. AND NOW I HAVE TO CALL A PLUMBER! BECAUSE ALL MY PIPES ARE DRIPPING AT THE SEALS!!! I was looking forward to getting my sink back! but now i probably won't have it back for over  a week.... THANKS PLUMBERS HERO! THANKS FOR F'ING UP MY PLUMBING!!

I'm guessing all of these reviews are fake as well...

Very unsatisfactory.  the LED feature had a bad case of hyperactivity disorder, enough to drive anyone looking at it absolutely crazy.  It was rather cute and if the LED feature had changed colors slowly and gradually, it would have worked.  Now I am stuck with something I can't use.

I'm sending this one back, the alarm feature did not work at all and the clock did not change colors as advertised.  Also it is very cheaply made, I know it's only $9 but I wouldn't even say it's worth half that.  There is one little slip of paper inside the box with terrible instructions, not helpful at all.
summary: Pick something else, this one is a dud

reviewText: This is one of those things... you get what you pay for.  The other reviews spoke so highly of it.  Now I know why... They have some sort of offer if you leave a review.  I can't remember what the offer was but I felt duped right when I opened.  Just remember you are only paying $10 and it looks and feels like something at the dollar store.  I should of known better.

Sorry!  I was bitten all over my body.  I ordered this repellent for my trip to Japan.  I was told that there was mosquitos where I was going.  I wore two repellent bracelets, one on my wrist and the other on my belt.  It did not work.  My bites got infected.

I bought this plant as a Mother's Day gift. After weeks of a little bit of water and sun, per the instructions, a few little stems came out of the soil and that was it. I don't know if the seeds were old or bad, but the plant did not grow and was not as advertised. This was a waste of my money.

This would be a great idea if it worked.  But this particular spray bottle is cheaply-made and unreliable.  The first couple times I used it, it would stop spraying after a few sprays.  Now it doesn't spray at all.  Either I received a defective item, or they're all like that - I'm sending it back for a refund.

After doing a lot of research, I had high hopes that this product would work.  Unfortunately, it didn't work, and appears to have actually sped up the spoiling of some strawberries (we did an experiment and put half the berries with a piece of this paper and half without).

For some reason the material this product was made from has an odor to it and when you put the drink to your mouth the strong odor overwhelms the nostrils.  I recommend it to someone who has allergies and a plugged nose.
summary: I recommend it to someone who has allergies and a plugged ...

reviewText: The holes that are supposed to hold the incense are too large. I remedied this by buying some clay and filling the holes with clay, then sticking the incense in the clay. I could have saved my money  and used a ceramic plate or bowl with clay as the holder.

I had high hopes for these sponges. I like the colors, but the quality is very poor. The spongy part starts off about an inch thick. After a few uses, it squishes down to 1/8" thick and never springs back to full thickness. The scrubby side wears off. On top of the poor quality, the sponges are too small. I have pretty small hands, and these sponges are even too small for me. I won't be buying them again.

I'm having a hard time believing this has as many good reviews as it does. As others have noted, one of the biggest problems is that the prongs that are supposed to hold the vegetable in place as you turn it are way too short and it makes it almost impossible to slice/spiral anything.  I really wanted to like this, but it's more trouble than it's worth.  After numerous attempts, I gave up and put it back in the box....Just another kitchen gadget that I unfortunately wasted money on :(  ....
summary: Hard to use, prongs too short to hold vegetables very well, does not stay in place, overall just not worth it :(

reviewText: Its not worth what it costs! I tried it, was unsatisfied with it, and there is no option to return it if you are unhappy with, it only gives you the option to troubleshoot any problems you might be having with it. Dont buy it!

I carefully followed the instructions the first time I used this espresso maker. After 6 pumps, still no espresso. After about 9 pumps there was a hiss, like a seal popped. On each subsequent pump, a little espresso would come out (not as much as the videos show), and hot water would spurt out from the base of the pump arm. Based on other reviews, this isn't unheard of, but I think this particular espresso maker must be defective.

I used this machine maybe 5 times until it did not work any more. It is not easy to use at all. The hand pump clogs and barely retracts when using (some sort of vacuum is created that keeps it from moving). Not practical at all.
summary: It is not easy to use at all

reviewText: This product is very cheaply made.  The top plastic hanger doesn't curve over the closet rod all the way & the plastic is cheap & flimsy.  The top hanger falls off the closet rod & also you can't see what's hanging on it after you hang it in the closet.
summary: This product is very cheaply made. The top plastic ...

reviewText: This is not as described.  Don't waste your money.  This is the thinnest fabric possible.  To call it a towel is ridiculous!  I am a beach goer, there is no way I'd attempt to use this at the beach for anything other than a scarf!  I am VERY disappointed. I'll post a photo soon.

THe colors and patterns are nothing like what is pictured at all. The fabric is thinner than a table cloth. It looks absolutely nothing like what is pictured. It's labeled and pictured with oranges and yellows and it is navy blue and forest green.

First I didn't realize it was made in China until it was too late to cancel the order. I ordered too quickly without thoroughly reading the reviews. This flag is a waste of money. The stripes don't line up at all on one side plus the blue stretches too long. I'm currently looking for a new flag that's made in the US.

I used this to patch a few small rips in my car leather seats and on a hot day the glue literally melted and created a huge mess. We had to remove the tape and the glue and the situation is even worse now. Do NOT use this tape in cars!
summary: We had to remove the tape and the glue and the situation is even worse now. Do NOT use this tape in cars

reviewText: Really bad quality. It is floppy and lopsided. It doesn't hang properly on the shelf. It can barely hold anything because it bows in the middle and is useless for me. Not worth sending back, so I am just going to throw it in the trash.

Bought this to humidify the bedroom in the winter time when the air is quite dry. Initially it worked brilliantly, kept the air in the room moist and made sleeping more comfortable. Being able to add essential oils was a very nice feature. After several cleanings, it stopped working. Like so many things nowadays, it is not made to last.

I got this for my Husband for Christmas.  I just assumed because it was Mossy Oak, it would be very well made, for the price tag of $39.95.  This throw is very cheaply made.  This is something I would expect to find in the Dollar General store.  NOT worth the price!!!
summary: I got this for my Husband for Christmas. I ...

reviewText:
Out of 20 pieces, there were 3 (yes, THREE) that were so defective that they were totally unusable.

One of them was only half formed. Literally half of the piece was missing. The mold didn't get filled all the way. And it still made it out to the consumer?

What are you doing, reaper?

poor design. The 1st time it was used, the weight of the water and a small amount of debris (leaves) caused the fabric to slip loose from the plastic rim. Had I known this was going to happen, I would have gorilla-taped the fabric to the rim. Bummer. I thought this was the perfect solution to keep debris from clogging my sum pump.

Unfortunately I could never get this timer to work correctly. I bought it for use with a grow light to start seedlings. I set it to go on during the day and off at night. At night it would turn off, but never turn back on in the morning, so I had to return it. Thankfully I was able to get a refund.

Every few days I have to manually turn it off even though it's auto set to turn off and turn on every day. It's completely random. Sometimes it's a every few days, sometimes it a week.

If it was consistently having to be reset at a regular interval, I would think it was my fault for not setting it properly but the intervals are so random that I don't think I set it incorrectly.

This is really really buggy and I'm not happy with it.
summary: Buggy and does not turn off and on properly

reviewText: I'm not sure if I got a dud, but neither my husband or myself could make this timer work, even after my husband watched videos he found on line (no instructions included). Apparently, the "override" button is supposed to turn the timer on regardless of the timer's settings, however, that button didn't work either. I read the reviews beforehand and decided to give it a try, but honestly, it was nothing but a waste of time because now we have to go through the hassle of returning it.

I bought 3 of these and programmed them without any issues...the problem is I can't get anything to plug into these timers (everything plugs in halfway).  I thought maybe one of the timers was defective, so I tried the other two - same issue.
summary: Can't plug any appliance fully into the timer!

reviewText: I ordered two sets. Both power supplies quit working almost immediately. I waited several weeks for replacements to arrive from China, and they only worked for about an hour. The LED strips seem to work fine, but the adhesive on the back is so poor that it would be better off not being there at all. Save your money and buy better components.
summary: TL;DR: Do not purchase this product.

reviewText: Junk, do not buy. Would not power on. Display would not show anything. Left plugged in for over two hours ( to charge as the manual suggested ) and nothing. Any timer that states in it's manual that it needs to be charged before use, means it has a very short lifespan. I don' t understand why a timer that is plugged into an outlet would need to be charged before use... This is a bad design. Any timer reliant upon an internal battery to function should be avoided.

Bought 4 of these and two of them came on for a few seconds and went off. They never worked after that. That was right after I got them out of the box. The company was great about returning them but would never purchase them again.

HORRIBLE!! Don't waste your time or money!! 90% of the letters are a mess. There is no way you can get enough clear letters from it to make a proper message. Got my money back and they let me keep it. Garbage bin!! Such a shame.

BE CAREFUL  WHEN YOU BUY THIS PRODUCT, IT SAYS MINI BUT IT IS TOO SMALL THAT NO ONE CAN WORK WITH THIS TINY LETTERS.  I WASTE MY MONEY ON THIS PRODUCT. THE PICTURE LOOKS LIKE A REGULAR TEMPLATE BUT READ CAREFULLY ABOUT THE SIZE OF THE PRODUCT.  TOTALLY DISSATISFIED

Horrible, horrible, horrible. There's no way to secure the top to the bottom, so when you add water, the top floats off. I have overflowed water so many times all over my floor. Useless. After two weeks of trying, I threw it away. Seriously think the good reviews are fake. No way this works for anyone.

I wanted an old fashioned potato masher and bought this with the recommended additions.  A ladle and spatula.  The first time I used this potato masher the handle slid down and it was unusable.  My husband was able to pull it back up, but the next time I used it it slid down to the masher.  I won't even put this in the Goodwill bag.  It is going in the garbage.
summary: ... old fashioned potato masher and bought this with the recommended additions. A ladle and spatula

reviewText: Candles won't work at all if there is any light around them, even from the outside. Suction cups won't even work with these candles. The base sticks out too far and the suction cup won't reach the glass. Don't waste your money like I did.

I washed these upon receipt and let them dry for several days. There must have been some moisture remaining in the grinding unit of the salt shaker, because when I filled the shaker, it got gummed up with wet salt. I tried to disassemble the unit so I could clear it out, but there is apparently no way to do that. I wrote to the seller and asked for information a few days ago and have not received a response. This might be a good set if you don't have to wash them.
summary: Gummed up and no way to fix it; seller won't respond

reviewText: This thing is terrible!  I feel totally unsupported, my sleep is even worse than before.  I had my fiance (who is also a side sleeper) try it and he didn't even last 30 minutes.  Do not order this thing....I wish I could return it.

If you like drinking dirty dishwater this is the cup for you! If you run it through the dishwasher, water lodges under the seam and drips down into your drink. Same thing happens if you wash it by hand.
summary: Even dogs won't drink from this dirty cup

reviewText:
It worked fine for a couple of days, then stopped. I set it aside for a period and tried it again, and it humidified once more. I had to keep unplugging the unit to reset it. One day, it stopped entirely and I noticed rust around the screws and other areas of the lid.

I did not use distilled water and this may have been the problem.

My hamper is defective. The handles are off-center on both sides. See the attached photo. I noticed that a couple of reviewers have experienced the same issue. Aside from the handles, the overall quality of the hamper does not justify the cost.

Tray arrived with a large, deep scratch on the inside of the tray. Also the bottom isn't sturdy like I had expected but instead, it looks like it's made out  of particle board. I would return the item but I'm having surgery and  don't have time (or energy) to return.  I thought this would help me throughout my months of recovery but I was wrong. It functions fine but cosmetically it is an eyesore.

Extremely Hard Pillow, unfortunately I can't use this pillow as it is very hard. I have neck issues and after laying on it for 1 hour, I was in a lot of pain. Before it fluffed completely I thought I had finally found a pillow to help with my neck issues, but once it was completely fluffed there was no way I could use this. Unfortunately, because the pillow is so heavy the cost of return cost almost as much as what I paid for the pillow. The search continues.
summary: Extremely Hard Pillow, unfortunately I can't use this pillow ...

reviewText: This has to be the most uncomfortable pillow ever made.  I tried drying it to fluff it and it is still horribly uncomfortable.  It is like your head is on a rock.  There is no way this pillow is worth $180.  I'm using it as a foot rest at the moment as returning it would be more of a hassle than what is it worth.  Maybe my dogs will sleep on it.

Buyer beware!  This less expensive version does NOT work like the original FlipFold.  The clips attaching the panels are stiff, which causes the panels to flip inaccurately.  I was able to get it to work by re-attaching the clips in the opposite direction.  The ordeal of figuring out how to make this tool work properly left a bad taste in my mouth.  So, I threw it away and purchased the original FlipFold--night and day!  This product was a huge waste of time and money.

I think there must be a learning curve with this one. I thought it was supposed to be easy but it turned out more difficult than I could imagine. Things have to be popped on or off frequently according to the size/weight of the garment. The adjusting is not easy for someone who has Rheumatoid Arthritis. Also, I know the ad said that there was a carrying bag, but that was not the case with mine. No carrying bag at all. Save your money and cut a piece of cardboard to size your shirts when folding.
summary: Fast Speed Adjustable Blue Folder Fast Clothes Folding Board

reviewText: This soap tray worked perfect for maybe two months. I thought it was so cool that it had two tiers, one for me and one for my wife, and that it looked really nice as well. One day it fell off the shower wall and I thought, no big deal, I'll just stick it right back on. A few weeks later it fell back off, so I made sure to clean the spot really well and I put it back up. Now it won't hold on for more than five minutes. Save yourself the hassle and get a different one.

There is a reason a traditional jigger has sides that are tapered - it allows for easy pouring.  The  design of this jigger, while attractive, is not all that functional.  It's just too hard to pour into such a narrow opening.  If you use this, make sure you have a good sponge nearby.
summary: ... has sides that are tapered - it allows for easy pouring. The design of this jigger

reviewText: I found it very difficult to open and fill this device.  I am usually very adept at figuring devices out, but this one had me stymied.  In fact, I never filled it so I can't even comment on its function.  I sent this back for a refund, which I received with no questions asked.
summary: Sorry, but I sent it back

reviewText: The first time I tried using one of these, it broke before I even could get it to stay open.  I had purchased these for an annual camping trip last month, but didn't end up using them.  So, now it is 4 days past the "30 day return policy" and I'm stuck with a broken product that is unable to be returned.  I haven't even opened the other 2 that came with it, so I don't know if those will break or not.  Not happy with the product, and frustrated that I can't return them at this point.

Absolutely useless. I wore one of these on my wrist and on my ankle throughout a two day trip and soon realized how useless these things are. I wanted to love these so much because of issues I've had with mosquitoes but I had no luck yet again.
summary: Absolutely useless. I wore one of these on my wrist ...

reviewText: I just came in from the garden picking the last of the early raspberries. I had mosquito netting on but it didn't cover my hands so I wore a repellent bracelet on each wrist. In less than 10 minutes I was bit by a mosquito less than an inch away from the bracelet.
summary: Does not work with mosquitoes in the raspberry patch

reviewText: I don't think this product even merits one star because it never worked for me. I'm in the process of returning it. It was a waste of time for me because it had all the appearance of a good product but it just never worked even after I tried it on several air conditioning units.
summary: It was a waste of time for me because it had all the ...

reviewText: As soon as I got this in the mail I laughed and threw it away. Maybe I should have returned it for my money back but I did not want to pay for shipping. This product is extremely cheap looking. I can't imagine someone using this for anything.

These sunglasses are cheap plastic junk. You can buy better quality sunglasses for the same price at the drugstore. Don't waste your ten bucks. They are so large and crooked, I gave them to my daughter to use on her teddy bear.

Gave this to my daughter for Christmas. It was a very disappointing product. She said it fell apart the first time she tried to use it. I had to return it and get something better. Don't bother with this one.

This is a picture of a different tool from the one I received. The tool I received has the opening off center so much that the wall is paper thin on one side. The inner splines are almost non-existent on my tool, unlike the ones clearly visible in the spurious photo. The metal is so soft that it immediately began to strip on the first use, even though I turned the tool with the gentlest of torque. If you receive what I did, you'll have wasted your money on this tool.
summary: you'll have wasted your money on this tool

reviewText: There are several tools on the market which work well for tuning a  small engine carburetor. However this is not one of them. It worked once and then the tip which grips the adjustment broke. Turns out it was a cheap plastic tip. Chrome colored, but plastic all the same. Spend a little more for a carburetor tool. You get what you pay for.
summary: You get what you pay for

reviewText:
If Poulan actually produced this tool it was fished out of the reject pile.

1:  The sleeve's internal splines are filled with copper brazing used to attach the sleeve to the shaft.

2:  The sleeve is cocked off the center line of the shaft so far that it cannot be used to adjust the carb.

3:  It does not fit the Poulan Pro Chainsaw that Poulan # 530035560 Carb Adjusting Tool fits.
summary: Obviously Defective, Totally Unusable Carb Adjusting Tool

reviewText: Absolute piece of crap! The fittings are very nice, but the construction of everything else is terrible,  the outer casing is woven nylon that has a thermally bonded seam running the length of the hose, that's just a failure waiting to happen. I will be sending this hose back. If you ask me, the best collapsible hose for the price is the top brass pocket hose, half the price and better quality.
summary: Absolute piece of crap! The fittings are very nice

reviewText: I originally gave this 4 stars, but I've changed my rating now. We haven't had it very long, and already the heating element between the two slots has quit working. Only the outer elements work, so if you want your bread toasted on both sides, you have to take them out and turn them around halfway through the toast cycle. What a waste of money. This is not the Cuisinart quality I have come to expect.

I read this was the most comfortable cervical pillow so I didn't pay attention to the negative reviews. After I opened the bag and two days, the pillow was quite large. At night I would wake up pounding it with my fist to just be able to have a spot for my head. I tried it for 3 days thinking I could get used to it but I couldn't. I gave it to my son-in-law who likes the dense pillows. I haven't asked him how he likes it. I ended up buying a great pillow for my neck at my chiropractor's office.
summary: Hard for me to get used to

reviewText: After two weeks, this "Pillow" still smells and is very hard.  It certainly isn't something I can sleep on.  As long as I use it as the bottom of two pillows (the top of which is not one of these Bamboo "Comfort" Memory Foam Pillows, it is fair.
summary: After two weeks, this "Pillow" still smells and is ...

reviewText: There was no way to set the time.  So, I took the battery out and waited for the real time to catch up with the time on the clock.  I thought that I was clever, but a few days later when I noticed that the time was way off again, I realized that I was stupid for ordering this product.  Don't be dumb like me.  Buy a different watch.
summary: Looks good, but doesn't work at all.

reviewText: I was very excited to receive this tool.  It appeared to be very well made.  Unfortunately, the blade broke while digging dandelions.  I am 61 years old and have been gardening since childhood.  I have never had the metal part of a tool break before.  Very disappointed in the quality of this product.  The seller never responded to my problem.  I had only used this tool about a dozen times before it broke.

It does work if you hold the bonnet with one hand. Even when I pull the cord as tight as possible it still eventually comes off my head before I am finished. I like to do other things while I am sitting with the bonnet on my head. Unfortunately, I can't because I have to keep one hand on the bonnet and one hand on the elastic that goes around the blow dryer (yea the elastic band doesn't hold either).If I hadn't waited so long I would've returned it.

The adhesive is not very sticky.  This hook was able to hold about 3-4 pounds for almost a week before it fell off the wall.  It does not re-attach now that the original adhesive seal has been broken.  The plastic hooks are attractive and cheap but also useless and cheap.

This product was a waste of money. Unlike similar connectors I have had in the past, this one does not stay connected. In the middle of use the connections pop apart. This is a bad thing if you have a hose of water that sprays all over you. It is difficult to get them to snap together in the first place. I ended up so frustrated I threw the whole assembly in the trash!

I received the product on May 5th and hung it in my garden that same day. It looked and sounded lovely... for 15 days. Today I came home to find that two of the strings at the top had snapped. So keep that in mind if you're thinking about buying this item. It's good for about two weeks of use.
summary: It's good for about two weeks of use

reviewText: These cushions are not very soft and smell VERY bad. I washed both the cover and the foam in the washing machine and the foam still smells awful. Ended up throwing it away because of the chemical smell.

Bought it for my wife who has R.A.  she can't use it.  It looks like a ratchet type with that gear on the side but it is not a ratchet type pruner.  I think the moving handle makes cutting harder.  It is heavy duty and cuts well if one is strong enough to work it.  A $15.00 pruner would have worked as well.

This timer is terrible. It looks nice, but it is extremely poorly made. I was able to use mine twice before it broke. Now it no longer functions in any way. I twist the timer to wind it up and it immediately snaps back to the zero mark. I would never recommend this timer to anyone.

Complete piece of garbage. You're thinking, "Every alarm clock is the same and this one sounds good." But don't be fooled. Very cheap. Buttons to set up are not intuitive like a normal alarm clock and the alarm is an annoying nursery rhyme that you can't change. Don't waste your money.
summary: Complete piece of garbage. You're thinking

reviewText: This thermometer didn't work. I should have known better than to buy it, because the only reviews were from people who got the item for free or at discount.  Yes, I took the plastic off the batteries that came with it, and it  didn't work. I replaced the batteries with my own new batteries, and it still didn't work.

It appears I am the only buyer who was not paid to write a falsely positive review. (Seriously, look at the last sentence of every other review.)

The board is very aesthetically pleasing. However, the slip pads are next to nonexistent. The board will slide right across any surface. This board was purchased solely for its ability to not slide.
summary: Only Unpaid Review = Only Honest Review

reviewText:
-Great idea, but it is truly a piece of junk.
-It won't stick to anything porous or non-porous.
-If they made the suction cup deeper, or can figure out a way to make this stick to all surfaces, it will be a huge winner. However, as it stands right now, it is not worth a dime.

I really had high hopes for these bowls. They looked like a good price, described as stainless steel. But when I got them they looked like metal bowls. Doesn't say on it where it was made. Found out (thanks to the company - that was nice) they are made in China. But I never got an answer if they were real stainless steel. So in the end...I just didn't feel comfortable using them for food. Returning.  Glad I got a refund.  No harm no foul.  I just need to slow down on impulse buys.
summary: They looked like a good price

reviewText: Bought as a Christmas gift for my dad thinking he could use it for chicken wings. It's way smaller than it looks in picture. Basket is not even an inch deep and only a foot wide. Might be good for quesadillas.  What a joke!
summary: Too small, not worth it at all

reviewText: Dumb.  Not worth it.  I bought it more as a gag for my wife who always asks me to slice up her avocado for her but this thing is just plain dumb and unhelpful.  Instead of gliding through the avocado and slicing it, it just smashes them. Maybe it's perfect if you're making guacamole.

Sorry it sucked for me. The slicer part is so small, can't get the whole half of the avocado. I was better off slicing it the regular way with a knife. I'm very sad about this kitchen tool, it wasn't helpful at all to me. I love avocados and was hoping that this could help me out. But I guess not.

I bought a similar tool that worked great but saw this one for much less money and thought it would make a good gift. I tried it out and it was a huge disappointment. The double sided blade was less effective than the other tool. The pitter worked but not as well. The slicer/scooper was the real let down. As many others have noted; it just turns the avocado to mush. It will work fine if you're making guacamole but not for slicing.
summary: Spend the extra and get the good tool

reviewText: This filter completely stopped the water flow.  My water pressure is average, not super strong, not super weak.  When I installed this filter, no water came out at all.  My shower head has a hose so that might have had something to do with it, but in the Q/A it said that should not matter.  This filter did not work for me at all.

I may not be a botanist, but after planting a hundred "Venus Fly Trap" seeds, I was not expecting to have nothing but a single stalk of wheat grow.

Maybe I made a typo and requested a "Venus Rye Trap," but either way, you can understand that I had some unexpected results.

To be fair, I now have a very healthy, rather tall cluster of wheat stalks, so I guess they get credit for sending me high quality wheat.

These are NOT VFT seeds. I have several types of Flytraps growing and these are not flytrap seeds. Just compare your sprouts or even the seeds, to images found online for VFT sprouts, you'll see the difference and VFT seeds don't sprout in a couple days either. What a scam, luckily Amazon is awesome and helped me get my money back.

I bought this to play music from my phone over my car radio. It was easy to use and the sound was great clear without static and nice overall quality . Unfortunately it only worked for 6 weeks then it died. If I try to use it now there is so much static that I can barely hear the music. I'm bummed. I was really liking it but now I'm high and dry since I don't like to drive with earphones and my car doesn't have Bluetooth.
summary: Great for about 6 weeks then it died -- don't waste your money

reviewText:
This is simply a poor quality clock. It's so cheap it comes in a paper cardboard box with a 3x4 piece of paper at the bottom. On it is the entire directions for programing the clock. The directions have to be read with a magnifying glass.

And for some reason the display just...turns off intermittently. I thought this was an anomaly when I returned the first clock-but when I got the second clock it is doing the exact same thing.

Used for a few months and the metal piece on the handles all started coming off. Bought gorilla glue and clamps to try and save them. I don't recommend purchasing them unless you have gorilla glue handy.

Very disappointed with these.  I loved them at first, they had a great feel and added color to my kitchen. I've had the set for barely 3 months and already the handle on one of them is coming apart. The metal is apparently only glued in and the glue isn't sticking so it's popping out of the rest of the silicon handle (see picture).  I don't have a dishwasher, they've only ever been hand-washed and to only get 3 months out of them is ridiculous. Don't waste your money on these.

THESE JARS ARE REALLY PRETTY BUT NOT SURE THEY ARE GOING TO BE GOOD FOR JELLY.  WHEN I TOOK THEM OUT  I FOUND A NUMBER OF DEFECTS AROUND THE TOP WHERE IT SHOULD SEAL IN A HOT WATER BATH.  I AM GOING TO TRY THEM AND SEE HOW THEY DO BUT I HAVE NEVER FOUND A DEFECT IN JARS MADE IN THE USA.  NEXT TIME I WILL LOOK CLOSER BEFORE I BUY.

I do not recommended this corkscrew. The screw is way too thin and won't grip the cork. It's a chore to get it to work and half the time it causes broken or crumbling corks. It looks high quality but does not perform.

UPDATE: The seller contacted me and refunded my whole purchase price. I appreciate that they did the right thing. Also I should mention that I do still use the stopper which works fine (an air tight seal but easy to insert and remove) and is stylish.

Opened about 7 bottles of wine before it fell apart completely ... The hinged end just fell right off. I've owned corkscrews like this for over 10 years and never had that happen.  I guess you get what you pay for.

The product works great but the smell is unbearable. I purchased these in an unscented and I'm much happier with the product then with the scented kind. I'm extremely sensitive to smells and this is what I could not live with.

The "fresh scent" (not fragrance free, as pictured) is horrid. The odor was so strong coming from my closed closet that I had to remove it in the middle of the night. My whole house now stinks of it and my throat is burning, even though I've gotten rid of all of them.
summary: If you're in the least bit sensitive to odors or chemicals, beware!

reviewText: I love these things and use them in a closet of a bedroom that has humidity problem. They do work very well. However, the "fresh" scent fragrance is horrible. It reminds me of the air freshener you'd find in a highway gas station restroom. Not only is the scent unpleasant, but it is so overpowering that I could smell it throughout the entire room. I recommend the fragrance free version.

This review is for the way the quantity of the product is advertised...not for the product itself (which I love).  The picture and ad for this product on the amazon page make it appear as if it is 3 boxes of 3 damp rids.  This would have been a great deal, which is why I ordered it.  However it's only one box with 3 damp rids...they just state that "3 pack" twice.  So, unfortunately I paid MUCH more for this ONE box than I would have at Wal-Mart.  [...]

Awful!  I bought 3 of these at the same time.  First one I tried would not pump at all.  Second one would not stop pumping, even when I was nowhere near it.  I did not try the third one.  I simple boxed them up and returned them to Amazon.
summary: Awful! I bought 3 of these at the same ...

reviewText: This soap dispenser is completely haywire. It dispenses soap spontaneously when there is no one in the room. It dispenses when the lights are turned on. It dispenses multiple times when you want a single dose of soap. If you don't mind soap allover the immediate area and down the drain, go for it. Otherwise, you'll probably come to the same conclusion that I did, which is, 'what was wrong with a manual soap pump?'

Didn't work, had to send it back. Installed batteries, filled it up and it worked. Went back to use it, green light was on steady and it didn't work. Removed and re-installed batteries. Worked. Went back to use it, green light was on steady and it didn't work. tried that 3 or 4 times, same thing.

This is a beautiful decanter however the stopper that goes on top is too tight and doesn't fit. I would give this 5 stars if the stopper fit well since it makes a lovely showpiece and is beautiful.  I gave this as a gift to my brother in law. He loved it so much and threw out the box so I can't even return it.
summary: Very beautiful but the stopper doesn't fit well......

reviewText: If the remote is dropped lightly on a hard surface the back comes off and the AAA batteries fall out. This is unsafe for small children. Poor design. Otherwise the remote works well. We solved the design problem with a small piece of duct tape. Should not have to do this. This is the first remote I've ever used (in dozens) that doesn't stay assembled.

I received this item yesterday and it literally broke the first time my daughter put clothes in it.  One of the screws came loose, fell out and that was that.  I tried to put it back together with a different screw, but the same thing happened when she put her pajamas in it.  Save your money and find another  item.
summary: Wish I could give it zero stars

reviewText: My tub is porcelain with a rougher finish so this does not stick as it's supposed to. The suction cups don't work and it just kind of floats on top of the water and slides around in the tub. The holes are also big so I think hair would slip through them.

This is a piece of crap. It would be okay if the holes were drilled so that it could be put together. We couldn't even build it. The holes are supposed to line up so that you can screw the pieces together but they are facing the wrong way on every single piece. Ridiculous. Save your money.

Don't buy this. It's true that you get what you pay for and this is cheap, cheap, cheap. The soldered joints where the bars connect are barely held together. It's super wobbly and unsteady. If you plan to put more than 5 cumulative pounds on a shelf, better buy something else.

Where do I start? The screws will not fit in the holes or else they are too big and fall out, the legs will not align properly, there was absolutely no way to put this together and even if it could have been put together, it would have been way too flimsy, unless completely and permanently attached to the way.  I am returning this item and ordering a more expensive one in hopes that that will be able to be assembled.

My husband put one of the covers on a can of soda before he went to sleep and left the can on the night side table.  After falling asleep, he was woken by a loud bang, the top literally popped off the can and went flying across the room!!!  Obviously the carbonated soda made the top pop off, but if this top is designed for a soda can, this should not have happened.  We will NOT be using this again, will try a different style.
summary: Top popped off and flew across room

reviewText: These do not stay on the cans. They are difficult to put on in the first place and then they pop off before I can even get them in the fridge.  They seemed to work at first, but after a couple of months they won't stay on at all.

I buy many items from Amazon. I have never written a negative product review; however, this product deserves one.
1. There were an enormous amount of items to assemble. It took an extremely long time to put together.
2. Several of the plastic connectors broke during assembly, and I had to locate pieces at the hardware store to replace the broken ones.
3. The material stretches out quickly and loses some of its strength.
4. It is flimsy.

Bought these, used them but they're a little large for my hand. Then the other night I went to put a couple of ice cubes in one of the glasses from the ice maker and an ice cube knocked a hole in the side of the glass. A little too thin if you ask me.

This is a totally useless product.  As another reviewer stated, level your washer.  Then your door won't swing open!  Since a closed door will cause mildew, use a rolled up towel and stick it in the door, which allows the washer to dry out.  This is what I do, and I've NEVER had a problem.  This item is a total waste of money.
summary: A Cheap, Easy Solution!!  Save your Money!!

reviewText: These spice tins are cheaply made.  The clear top is nothing more than a thin flimsy piece of inferior plastic.  The tins themselves dent easily to say the least.  To top it off, they do not even stack on top of each other.

This baffle is very effective at deterring squirrels.  Unfortunately it is just as effective at deterring birds.  The mirror like finish scares the birds away as they come to land on the feeder.  I have primed and painted mine to see if it helps so the jury is still out. Perhaps if it had a flat galvanized finish it might be a bit better. Had I known I was going to have to do this I would have purchased one that was already painted.

I ordered 6 x 9 inch pouches but received 4 x 5 inch pouches. I cannot use this size, unfortunately, and it is a pain to return them. After waiting 3 weeks to receive them, I'll order them from a different vendor and a different site altogether. The build quality was good, but the size was wrong.
summary: Wrong Size Sent - Quality Good Though

reviewText: I turned this unit on twice.  First time, it heated up (although I found instructions hard to understand).  Second time I turned it on, it didn't work at all.  Would not even come on.  I sent back and was able to get full refund, very quickly.
summary: I turned this unit on twice. First time, ...

reviewText: I was so disappointed to find that these banana protectors are much too small to hold most bananas. Even with smaller bananas, I have found it necessary to cut off most of the stem in order to fit them into the protector.  Wish I could return them, but it's not worth the effort.
summary: Do Not Bother to Purchase These
