reviewText: Good idea but poor design. It would be hard for a young child to open and once opened it has a very sharp plastic edge that could easily cut skin. If you aren't using this for children then it is probably okay, but there is no way it would pass a consumer safety inspection as is.

Don't waste your money.  We used this espresso machine less than a dozen times. Tried various techniques, but it never did work right.  Took a long time to brew a cup of espresso that never got hot.  The steam attachment  dripped.  Poorly made.

When it turns on, it seems to work well; the trouble is, it doesn't always turn on. Most of the time, I have to remove the battery, put it back in, then turn the stupid thing on. The first time I encountered this problem, I attributed it to the fact that the included battery might be weak. I replaced it with a fresh battery, but it's still a hit-or-miss proposition as to whether it will turn on without my having to fiddle with the battery. I wouldn't buy from Accuweight again.

The packaging has the California Prop 65 warning: "This product, its packaging and its components, may contain chemicals known to the State of California to cause cancer, birth defects, or reproductive harm..."
WHAT NOW?!
I'll be returning these.  It may well be that the Prop 65 warning is an overreaction, but I can also find jars that don't cause cancer.
summary: Made of materials that is known to cause cancer (?!)

reviewText: These deserve NO stars. Every single one of them split and cracked in the dishwasher after one use. I've never seen anything like it. Had to throw each one away. What the heck are they made out of? Stainless? No I don't think so. Don't buy these.
summary: I've never seen anything like it. Had to throw each one away

reviewText:
This did not work for me at all.  I used it on my wool sweater and nothing happened. I followed the instructions to the letter but the product did not work.

Based on my experience, I do not recommend this product as it did not work for me as expected.

The product did not work at all. I was a little excited when I pulled my sweaters out of the solution, as the fibers felt relaxed, but as soon as I rinsed it in water (as directed), it returned to its original (shrunken) size. The product doesn't work, and I was extremely disappointed. But it's not a total loss-- at least I can donate to good will!
summary: and I was extremely disappointed. But it's not a total loss-- at least ...

reviewText:
I had two of the exact same wool sweaters that I shrunk at the same time. One is black the other is maroon. Unshrinkit mildly worked for the black sweater, however it did nothing for the maroon sweaters. Both of these sweaters are 100% wool. The one thing that unshrinkit was good for it making my sweaters and home smell awful.

I was really looking forward to using this product after reading about it but unfortunately my results were not positive and I will not be recommending it to other people.
summary: The one thing that unshrinkit was good for it making my sweaters and home smell awful

reviewText: Used this on a shrunken wool jacket. The fabric did soften, but in the end it did not work at all. The only way for this to (possibly) work is if we had a manikin to keep it stretched while it's drying.
summary: Used this on a shrunken wool jacket. The fabric ...

reviewText: Saw this on Shark Tank and decided to try it.  While it might have very slightly stretched the sweater, in no way did it even come close to restoring the sweater to the original size.  Worse than that, it reeked of a sulfur smell, that did not rinse out of the sweater and the smell lasted throughout the downstairs for hours.

This product has the worst smell ever! It stunk up most of my house and I had to open up all the windows. After carefully following the instructions, I was extremely disappointed. I saw very little change in size of my sweater and the smell is so bad that I would have to wash it again! The bottle is only good for one use so I would have to buy another bottle if I wanted to try it again.

While the package was intact, I only received two and a half keys.  The missing piece of the third key was missing from the package, telling me it was shipped as damaged. The metal ring was also missing as seen in the picture on the right. These are also a lighter weight metal, not the heavier metal I was expecting.  With this said, I am returning the item.
summary: While the package was intact, I only received two ...

reviewText: The picture that shows the colors makes the petals look teal or turquoise in color and they are blue with no teal to them at all. Now I have 2 weeks to try and find petals the right color for my wedding....

I couldn't get the lid off. My husband came home and tried and he couldn't get it off either. Returned it the very next day so we'll never know how it might have worked if we could have actually gotten ice in it.
summary: We got a Defective ice bucket

reviewText: First off, as I opened the package noticed something was wrong, one screw was missing and the other one is completely loose! Not only that, it doesn't work as it should, unless you are making a gordita not a flour tortilla. If someone knows the trick to flatten it big enough to make a flour tortilla, please let me know, I wanted to be able to use it.

It was ok. I used it to make fresh tortilla. I still have to use my strength to press it and it hurts my palm because it's not a flat surface. If I just use the handle it won't be as thin as you'd like. As far as cooking with these, it's not too shabby; tortilla doesn't stick so that's good.

It didn't work. I got it, it looked nice and the parts seemed to be of good quality. First time I tried it, it didn't work. I tried to get it to spray for about 20 minutes and it wouldn't come out at all. Very disappointed given the good reviews.

Terrible. The magnet is not strong enough to hold more than a small piece of paper. The sticky side doesn't stick well to things. Many of the magnets are misshapen. They are concave instead of flat. You get what you pay for. These are cheap, cheap, cheap.
summary: Terrible. The magnet is not strong enough to hold ...

reviewText: The one I ordered was described as "peacock" and the colors were vibrant in the picture. But the one I received was not nearly as beautiful as the one in the picture (again, this picture has changed since I ordered mine). Not only that, but the description said it was cotton, and the one I got was definitely NOT cotton. It is some very thin fabric, like a cheap scarf material. I wrote to the company, didn't hear back, so I just wrote again. I will update as I get more details.

Does not fit a standard film roll cardboard tubing.  Axle inserts are far too large for the tubing of the std rolls.  The Axle adaptor appears to be glued in, which if removed, might make it fit a std roll.  However, despite efforts to pry it loose to the point of breaking the
adaptor, it would not budge.  So unless you have a flim with a large tubing, this product is useless.

These seeds germinated well and grew quickly--however, they are blooming now and they are NOT Old Spice heirloom sweet peas--which I have grown every year for decades. These have extremely tiny flowers, with little color, and NO FRAGRANCE.

I don't know what kinds of sweet pea seeds I received, but they are NOT the large-flowered, brightly colored, incredibly scented flowers you want (and that are described in the product listing).

Although I was looking forward to using this, it ended up being such a disappointing purchase.

The first thing that concerned me is that when it arrived, it had a small dent on the bottom of its steel body. Also - and this is the reason why I am returning it - while it insulates just fine, the straw/nozzle simply does not work! When I tried to drink from it, nothing would come out. I'm not sure if this was a defective bottle, or maybe just a poorly-made product, but I am not planning on buying it again.

I purchased this item with the intention of making drinks, not spend 4 hours trying to peel a wrapper off. I used it once to try it out and immediately I lost 10 brain cells. That is how stupid this item is...

If you want to waste your money, buy something else.

The battery life is minimal - batteries lasted for two days, even after changing batteries. Since it does not come with a cord, this is a big problem.

More importantly, it is VERY difficult to set the time and turn on and off the alarm. You have to scroll through every setting every time you want to turn the alarm on and off.

This is a piece of junk. It's too bad, because it's a pretty piece of junk.
summary: It's too bad, because it's a pretty piece of junk

reviewText: Doesn't spin the water off. You pump down on the lever and no matter how hard or fast you pump it, it doesn't spin fast enough to spin out the water.  The lever doesn't always catch to get it started spinning either. You need to fuss with it to get it to catch.  I've had much better spinners.

The side brushes do not spin. The only reason I bought these was for the side brushes but for some reason they do not spin. The design must be slightly off - perhaps the mount is too long? Whatever the problem is they do not spin. If I lift the Neato off the ground it does spin slightly but when I place the Neato on the ground the brush is stationary. The original brush spins like crazy and is needed to get the most out of the vacuum.
If anyone knows of a side brush that works please let me know!!!

This was a Christmas gift for my son.  It did not work at all.  Additionally, the instructions were no help at all - very vague. I've tried to find troubleshooting information online, but to no avail. I definitely will be returning this "clock".
summary: Piece of junk! Do not purchase.

reviewText: I bought this for my daughter for her birthday so didn't open the package when it arrived.  I traveled to her city and when she opened it, one of the red flowers was missing.  I was very disappointed but, she decided to keep it.
summary: I was very disappointed but, she decided to keep it

reviewText: This pillow just doesnt work for me. I've used it for a few months and some nights it is OK, but most nights I wake up with my head in an awkward position as the pillow has greatly deformed.  I'd recommend avoiding shredded memory foam because of this.  I've replaced this with a solid memory foam pillow and I couldn't be happier.

The birdhouse wasn't expensive, but it is worth about 50 cents. Since I wasn't sure the birds would be able to find the birdhouse  I didn't want to spend a lot of money. The  bottom seam was not sealed,so I had to put packing tape along the seam to keep the seeds from falling out. It's very flimsy and the birdseed falls out easily. I don't recommend buying this

These toothpicks have absolutely no peppermint of any other mint flavor in them. Whatever the flavor is supposed to be, it certainly is disgusting. Do not consider buying these picks. They might even make someone ill.
summary: They're cheap for only one reeason.....

reviewText: They seemed alright when I first got them, but after a couple of weeks being in my wallet, it was evident to me how cheap they were.  They are falling apart pretty quickly now, due to the fact that they've mostly made of paper.

I started with 1 stick in a seasoned humidor with 25 cigars, but it didn't maintain 70%. The humidity fell to 65%, so I added another stick. The humidity again fell to 65%. I have had to add a sponge soaked in distilled water to get the humidity back up. I got these sticks because I want my humidor to stay humid, not because I want a sponge hanging out in there.

I was thrilled to find this product. Sounded great. I should have known it was too good to be true. I filled it with distilled water and placed it in my humidor. The humidity didn't even reach 50%. An unfortunate waste of money.

Cannot recommend this unfortunately. Put it in a seasoned, medium sized humidor containing four cigars. Humidity was 75% as per digital, calibrated hygrometer. Within two weeks, humidity is down to 55%. Vial is full of liquid, and yes, I unsealed the top. Last night I put in a piece of wet sponge on top of plastic and it's up to 69% already. Bottom line, a piece of wet sponge is far more effective. Sorry about the 1 star, but it is what it is.

The clock looks nice, and would be great if it functioned correctly. As it is, I have to reset the clock every single day. It is set to the correct time zone, but resets to the wrong time every night, then jumps an hour in the morning as well. It runs an hour behind in at 8 the morning when I arrive at work, then is three hours ahead by noon. This is an everyday occurrence.

I tried to use it on sweet potatoes.  Bad idea!  The "turner" just kept breaking off pieces of the sweet potato.  It didn't come with the "storage bag", but then that wasn't in the picture either.

I thought that for the price, it was cheaply made, so I returned it.

Clock is fully made out of plastic and not good quality.  It kept getting caught at 1:00 for some reason.  It fell off the wall by accident onto the desk (about 2ft) and it hasn't worked since.  Look somewhere else for a clock that's better quality.

Corroding with only the mildest soap in it.

Whatever is at the bottom of this, it's not stainless steel. After only a few days using it, the bottom of the container is corroding and the soap/lotion coming out is blue, not white.

Something is reaction with the soap and causing it to turn bad.

What a waste of money.
summary: Waste of money. Corroding after just a few days.

reviewText: I was really optimistic when I bought this. I read the reviews posted on amazon and I loved the fact that the soap dispenser was made of stainless steel thus preventing it from rusting. After about three days of using this dispenser though, I noticed rust on the stainless steel surface between the square bottom and the glass dispenser. I am very disappointed that it didn't even last as long as some of the cheaper dispensers I had over the years.
summary: Rust after only a couple of days

reviewText: Bags are thin and burst if you put any pressure on them. Tips and couplers stretch and rip the bag without any pressure. The bags aren't 12 in. more like 10 in. If you use piping bags a lot, DO NOT BUY THESE!

Both balls arrived in non-working condition.  They do not twinkle as advertised.  I ordered two last year at the end of the season and installed them at the same time as these two new ones arrived.  Only one of those balls twinkle.  The company has been good about authorizing the return of the two ordered this year.  If you are looking for twinkling light balls, do not order these.  They do not twinkle, not even a little.
summary: If you are looking for twinkling light balls, do not order these.  They do not twinkle, not even a little.

reviewText: Lids aren't right at all - if you flip it upside down, the lid will fall right off. Which doesn't really work for sending a lunch to school for my kid, so these are pretty much worthless to me at the moment.

HORRIBLE!!!!  It said it could be opened easily by kids, but this is rediculious!!!  The lid just sits on top of the container!!!!  My 6 & 7 year old kids can hold the container and blow the lid off!!!!  If you hold the container and turn it to the side (with the nothing in it), the lid falls off!!!!!!

It is truly unbelievable how bad these are. They seemed fine when I first got them but they have literally fallen apart with very little use. I really don't think I have ever bought anything as bad as this. Awful. Do not buy these! Check out my pictures.

This product did not come with an insert for the bottom of the cube so that it would not stand open on its own.  I am not sure if I received a counterfeit product or if this was a design flaw.  I returned the product.

I received 6 and the only ones that aren't full of air after being stored are the 2 I haven't used yet. But I guess these bags are great if you just want to put things in bags... if you want to vacuum the air out, you're wasting your time.
summary: But I guess these bags are great if you just want to put things in bags

reviewText: These bags did not work out. I would get all the air out and put the cap back on. 5 minutes later, the bags were full of air again. Ended up having to go out and buy a different brand just so I could pack. It was very frustrating.

This tree is not six foot! It is 4 feet! It is certainly not the tree I ordered. Very, very, disappointing!!!! I'm embarrassed. I felt like crying.  I had to go to a local store and buy another tree.  National tree 6 feet?! Shame on you!!!!!!!
summary: This tree is not six foot! It is 4 ...

reviewText: I don't think these work. We had a mouse problem and thought these would help solve the issue. After we plugged it in, we still caught 3 mice in the traps. Don't waste your money there isn't enough research. On the plus side, we did have them plugged in and they did not interfere with our dogs.
summary: I doubt these actually do anything

reviewText: Not sure if this thing works or not... because... You have a choice of using each of the 3 waves one at a time.. or all 3 at the same time. i decided to use all 3 at the same time... as soon as i hit the button... Both of my dogs went crazy... they started barking like crazy.. running to the front window and then through the house to the back door... and that continued until i unplug the unit. Not Good.!! If you have pets.. DO NOT BUY.!!!

The holes are not properly aligned to assemble this table. I Ordered two and was able to put one together with the help of a power drill, which took over an hour, but the second was impossible. I received a replacement and it, too, has improperly aligned holes. It's not worth the trouble of trying to fix it and it can't be replaced at this point, so I'll just have to throw it away. Don't waste your time and money like I did!

I found it very uncomfortable and hard. But the worst part is that it gave me terrible hip pain in both of my hips. I never had hip pain before trying this wedge.  It was very surprising to me. I wanted this wedge to alleviate acid reflux symptoms. I thought the worst thing that could happen would be a period of adjustment where I wouldn't sleep quite as well for a week or so. But the hip pain definitely isn't worth it. I'm going to try to return it because it's an expensive experiment for sure.

Had this brush for a few months and the top part of the handle disconnected from the brush. There's no way to secure it back together permanently. I tried a hot glue gun, epoxy, but adhesives won't cut it, and there's not enough space to bolt it together.

Looks nice but useless to me now.
summary: Looks nice but useless to me now

reviewText:
This is such a flimsy product.  I've used it twice and it's already broken.  The chrome-handle-top is not really securely fastened to the brush, so any pressure used in scrubbing will break it off.  It's complete garbage and now I have to go to Bed Bath and Beyond to buy one that I can hold in my hand and make sure it isn't a piece of garbage like this.  I'm very disappointed.

I'd give it zero stars if I could.  It's so bad.
summary: This toilet brush is cheap garbage that falls apart immediately (but it looks nice)

reviewText: If you're simply putting "stuff" in this thing and placing it out of the way, I suppose it'll do the job. On the other hand, if you're taking it on the job, loading it and unloading it, daily, it's a bust. It starts cracking in the first month and then is toast by the third. Cold weather? Forget it! It's cracked down the sides in a week. I've gone through three of these things. NOT RECOMMENDED.

If you are going to spend $ 176.00 on a juicer the least you can expect is for the pulp container to fit properly into the top cover....and it does NOT.
This is unacceptable for any minimum quality product, much more so for a juicer that claims to be top of the line........and I should not have to be writing this right now.
summary: If you are going to spend $ 176. 00 ...

reviewText: Unfortunately, this item did not work. It did not even turn on when I connected it to power and pressed the on button (short and long pushes were given to the on button but nothing happened). I wouldn't recommend this item to another.
summary: I wouldn't recommend this item to another

reviewText: The metal edges on the handle are so rough and sharp that it instantly cuts into my palm.  It's due to the wooden part of the handle not being perfectly fit and aligned with the metal.  Too bad, I really like the size of this chopper.
summary: Nice blade but the handle was poorly fitted

reviewText:
The mug came with a chip in the paint, and it looks as if someone tried to cover it with black marker.
If it wasn't right on the front and very noticeable, I wouldn't have complained. I like the mug otherwise. This mug was ordered as a gift. I feel like I've wasted my money because I certainly won't gift it to the person it was purchased for.
summary: Marker Used To Cover Chipped Paint On Mug

reviewText: The bottom of the mug was completely blank not a single thing on it. Just a plain black mug that said, "HAVE A GREAT DAY". So I thought maybe it was heat activated and I put some hot water in it and nothing... I am in the process of returning it now.

I bought these specifically because they were suppose to hold 14 oz.  THEY DO NOT.  They are 12 oz. They are also listed as 2 inches deep.  They are not!  They are 1.5 inches deep.  I would return these but don't feel I should have to pay for  the shipping when the size is mislabeled.

You get what you pay for. Better off buying the vacuum seal. You can't tell when it's ready. There's no on or off button, so I literally have to take the batteries out when I don't want to use it. And, it didn't really reseal anything. But you get what you pay for. Junk. I threw it away.
summary: Better off buying the vacuum seal

reviewText: Didn't hold pressure for more than a minute. The whole point of this was so I don't have to use a spray bottle and pump it constantly. This smelled like oil or something from the factory it was made so I scrubbed and cleaned it really well just to find out it doesn't hold pressure anyways.
summary: Didn't hold pressure, spend a couple dollars more

reviewText:
We have a masonry heater with two large glass windows.  This is a high temperature wood burning heater.  The only way I have found to reliably remove soot/creosote from the glass is with a razor blade.  Based on the high ratings of this product I had high hopes.

Unfortunately it did not even make a dent in the soot/creosote on the glass.  I followed the instructions as provided. I was able to get a small amount off but only with a ton of elbow grease.
summary: Worth a try but did not touch high temperature soot on glass.

reviewText: Have no idea how to use them, as they came with no directions.  I'll be darned if I'm going to stick sharp metal objects into my ears.  That purchase was definitely a mistake for me, but for those who already know how to use it, I'm sure it's great.

How embarrassing!!!  Gave these as a gift and when the person receiving them poured extremely expensive tequila in them, it leaked out!!!
Do not buy these and expect to use them!!!  I would like a refund!!!

This is not what you think and be sure you understand that this is a printed piece of cardboard, not a mask.  It does not fit everyone and looks quite ridiculous. I suggest you copy the face and glue it to a piece of cardboard with a rubber band.  Same thing.
summary: This is not what you think and be sure you ...

reviewText: Does not cut material. Even a single piece of flannel was too much for this machine. I even used a new dye, but would not cut through. I doubled the material to make it thicker but it did not cut. The hand-crank model had no problem cutting material. It might work with cotton, but if you're cutting flannel don't bother with this machine. I packed it up and sent it back.
summary: Does not cut material. Even a single piece of ...

reviewText: Other users said that this item works in a T5 socket.  My experience was not good in this regard.  I needed to replace the bulbs in two T5 landscape fixtures.  This product worked in one of them, but not the other.  I tried several of these LEDs in the non-working socket and none of them worked.  I then put in a standard T5 incandescent bulb and it worked fine.  Seems to me that it's an 'iffy' proposition.
summary: This LED product does not work in all T5 lighting products.

reviewText: These hangers may be fine if you aren't going to hang them in a typical closet. I was very excited to use these hangers in my home and also for a consignment sale. After opening them, I realized that the hook looked very small, and did not resemble any other children's hangers I've purchased in the past. I tried to hang one in my closet but had no luck. I even tried all the closets in the house, but the hooks are just too small to hang on the  poles. Very disappointing!
summary: Hooks to small to hang in closet!

reviewText:
I bought it to wash my baby's clothes. It worked for two months and then it stopped working. The fact that you can't return the item is the reason why I'm giving it two stars.
It worked fine until this week, but two months of life for this money is not worth it. Don't buy it.
summary: It worked fine until this week

reviewText: I have had a large set of colored plastic cups for years and figured it was time to get new ones.  After reading the great reviews I bought two sets of the 20oz cups and two sets of the smaller ones.  I put them in the dishwasher and four of them melted.  Not happy at all.
summary: After reading the great reviews I bought two sets of the 20oz cups ...

reviewText:
My husband got this pillow thinking it would allow him to get a full night's sleep and he said it was like sleeping with your head on a slab of concrete.
DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY.

He got this pillow after reading all the rave reviews on Amazon which once again makes me think....WHO WRITES THESE REVIEWS?
summary: ... a full night's sleep and he said it was like sleeping with your head on a slab of concrete

reviewText: Upon receipt, I set up the coffee machine and filled it with water that immediately ran through the machine without explanation.  I checked the proper placement of all the tabs and parts but found no explanation.  Just to be sure it was not error on my part, I filled it again and turned it on only to have the water run out the bottom of the unit.
summary: The coffer maker that is not amenable to making coffee.

reviewText: It did nothing for the one mouse problem I had.  The green light was on, but there was no change in the pest behavior. There is no way to tell if the product was defective or just didn't work. I felt like I was buying a pair of pants from the Emperor's New Clothes!
summary: Didnt work and had to use regular traps

reviewText: Does it work? Negative. I watched a mouse run past it, turn around, and run back to it, then nuzzle it. I caught a mouse in that room a few days later. A week after that, I found mouse droppings right under the device.
summary: Might as well burn your money.

reviewText: I boutht this as an oil sprayer and it does not spray oil.  It will put out a tiny little globule of oil, then you need to manually force the pump back up so you can force out one more tiny globule.  I was hoping to stay away from aerosols, but this thing is so frustrating I suspect it's worse for my health than that is.  Don't bother with this one
summary: Doesn't, as such, "spray" oil at all

reviewText: This is a terrible product. It worked quite well at first, but about six weeks after using it I noticed a metallic smell to the soap it was dispensing. I'm 20 days outside of the window to return it. I have had cancer, so I'm very careful about what I eat or put on my skin. It seems to me that this dispenser is creating a carcinogenic effect on the soap by leaching metals into it. I am not using these dispensers any longer.
summary: DO NOT BUY THIS SOAP DISPENSER

reviewText: Our soap went in purple and came out brown. As you can guess, that's because it rusted inside. It's a shame really, it looks really nice and it would have been perfect if it wouldn't have rusted on the inside.

It worked fine for almost two months but got very rusty and started turning green. Then yesterday the dispenser nose that puts the soap in your hand just fell off and I can't get it back on. I'd say this was the worst soap dispenser I ever bought.
summary: Worst soap dispenser I ever bough - lasted less than two months

reviewText: If you are looking for a bedspread that reaches the floor , do not buy it, it does not reach the floor, the picture is a lie. It is a quilt not a bedspread, you need a bed skirt and good luck matching the color. I was not able to find the right burgundy shade . Also is not the right size, it is shorter. The quilt is pretty, well made and the price is good but it is not what I want , a bedspread that reaches the floor, go luck
summary: you need a bed skirt and good luck matching the color

reviewText: For some reason this clock resets itself automatically every night so when I wake up it is hours off from the actual time. Also, it only lights up when you hold the button down. I'm going to have to return it.

The plug looked homemade and made me very nervous. It also didn't grip in the outlet at all and kept falling out. If I held it in the lights would come on but there was a constant low level flickering that was very irritating. I returned them for a refund.
summary: The plug looked homemade and made me very nervous. ...

reviewText: Ordered two of these (one orange and one black).  Installed fresh batteries, one did not work at all, the other, the white light worked, but I could not turn off the red light.  Obviously sending them back.

There isn't a big difference in shades. Too many very similar colors. The color of the caps do not reflect the actual color of the pencil at all. They also are not very pigmented. They don't really show very much.
summary: There isn't a big difference in shades. Too many ...

reviewText: This pillow cannot be considered firm, there is nothing to it.  It's a big ball of useless fluff.  It smashes down to nothing once you put any pressure on it.  I'm back to searching for a good firm pillow....

I did not have a good experience with this pillow. After going through the dryer procedure per the instructions, it smelled like insecticide. I tried airing it out a few times, but that didn't work, so I ended up throwing it in the trash. I will never buy one of these pillows again.
summary: I did not have a good experience with this pillow

reviewText: These simply haven't been working for me. I've tried everything from filling them up to different levels to leaving them in freezers for days at the coldest temp possible, nothing. I don't know why, it's just ice, it shouldn't be this impossible.

I received this product with missing pieces, with dirty thumb prints all over it, and it was wobbly and falling apart. This wine opener is very poorly made.  It did come in a very nice box that would make for a great gift, however the box too was damaged and falling apart. There are plenty of other wine bottle openers that are very competitive in price and much better quality than this one. Very dissapointed.

I did receive this item at a discounted price in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.
summary: with dirty thumb prints all over it

reviewText: The governor linkage from the engine could not be attached to the throttle arm of the carburetor.  I had to go on-line and  found the snap fitting on ebay.  The gas consumption is 1.5 times what the old carburetor used.  I rebuilt the old carburetor and put it back on the Kohler engine.

We have had this thermometer for only four and a half months and it has stopped working. The screws to the battery case are so small and we haven't found a small enough screwdriver to get to the batteries. At this point the thermometer is useless.

This isn't a moveable vinyl wall cling. It's a giant sticker, that doesn't stick very well.  It lasted an hour and then rolled up onto itself, and fell off the wall, and can't be used anymore. I contacted the seller, but they didn't respond. Save your money and don't buy this.
summary: This isn't a moveable vinyl wall cling. It's a ...

reviewText: Looks and works beautifully for about a week and then it won't come on on its own (you need to push the on/off button most nights) and then about 3 months later the dome cracks (or shatters) with the slightest of impact.
summary: Great design but very poor quality

reviewText: Didn't find this to be adjustable enough...have to adjust it in 1/2" increments. Sits precariously in my drawer and falls over if it gets jostled too much. Disappointed, but at least it wasn't expensive. Will find something else and give this to a charity thrift store.

I have been trying to find a useful silverware drawer divider that does not weigh the drawer down, and thought I had found it. This is not it. Not only does it not perform as stated on the box, it is already falling apart. Very disappointed!

Arrived broken. One of the balls that holds the shafts in place was off its track and won't go back in.  In general I don't like the mechanism.  I would go for one that has clamps if I could do it over again.
summary: In general I don't like the mechanism

reviewText: The ball gets stuck every few minutes in my house.  I have hard wood floors, but the ball just jiggles back and forth until someone kicks it and then it will roll about ten feet and start jiggling again.  It didn't move around enough to interest my cats either.
summary: The ball gets stuck every few minutes in my house ...

reviewText: Right now I am giving it a one star due to the fact there are no directions on where to insert the battery. When I figure it out and see how it works I will be back. I saw the review about where the battery goes, however, there are two small screws and I am not sure which is the one to unscrew.

This feeder is beautiful and well made. But it has one drawback which makes it pointless to buy. The hummingbirds won't eat out of it. When I first got it, they used it for a day or two. After that, they refused to eat out of it. I suspect the sugar water gets tainted by the metal.
summary: This feeder is beautiful and well made

reviewText: I've had many shoe stretchers before,and I thought this might be a good buy because of it's low price.  Wrong.  For me it was not worth even it's cheap price.  Broke the first time I used it.  I believe it's very cheaply made. I don't understand how they can call this a "Professional Shoe Stretcher".  Don't waste your money, invest in a quality stretcher.
summary: Broke the first time I used it.

reviewText: This product did not meet my standard it worked for about a week and quit? Not sure what the problem was all I know is one day I turned it on and it worked the next day I mashed the button to turn it on and nothing happened. So I returned this product.

I've gone through two of these electric blankets in a matter of months. The first one lasted a few weeks and worked great, but soon died and did not turn on anymore. I ordered a replacement and it also died after two hours. I have since tried to return the second blanket, but even the replacement was stolen from my doorstep. Avoid the trouble and buy a more expensive but reliable electric blanket.

I gave these to my daughter for Christmas. The instant she plugged them in for the first time, the power pack blew up. There was a popping sound, a flash of light, smoke, and a burning smell from the power source.
summary: I gave these to my daughter for Christmas. The ...
